1b1(rgyud): smra du gu/na du
1b2(rgyud): dpal gtum po khri bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyo phyi zhes byang+ge/bcom ldan 'das
1b3(rgyud): dngalu gtum po khyi bo chen po la phyog 'on lo//'odi skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2a1(rgyud): /thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyi snying po rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i b+ha ga rnams
2a2(rgyud): la bzhugs so//dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /rnal 'byor me'i tshogs rnams kyang ngo //'di
2a3(rgyud): lta ste/mi g.yo ba dkar po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /mi g.yo ba se ri po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /mi g.yo
2a4(rgyud): ba da mar pA rdo rnal 'byor pa dang /mi g.yo ba ljang ku'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /gti mug rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal
2a5(rgyud): 'byor ma dang /phra mo rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang /'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang //phrag dog
2b1(rgyud): rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang //de lta bu la stsogs pa rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma bye ba khri brgya stong rnamaso//de nas bcom
2b2(rgyud): ljon 'das rdo rje sdems dpa' mi g.yo ba nr-igra po'i ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms parare zhugs nas 'di nye b.ro gsung so//dngos drung dngos
2b3(rgyud): myed rnam grol ba'i//dga' ba bzhi yi de cig mchog/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i//spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin de//
2b4(rgyud): rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes//lus dang ngag rnams kun lnga gnas//dri ni de rnams phun don phyir//rnam pa lnga yis
2b5(rgyud): yang drug gnas//de nus bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
2b6(rgyud): nas 'di nye bar gsungs so//stong dang snying rje dbyer med par//lha yi 'dod pas bde bar gnas//bdag ni kun rtog rnam
3a1(rgyud): par bral//smos pa med cing g.yo ba med//bud med gang gisang mi shes//bud myed kun gyi lus
3a2(rgyud): la gnas//bdag ni de rnams phan do na phyir//rnam pa lnga yis yang dag gnas//de nas bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba nag
3a3(rgyud): po la/bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas dam du 'khyud nas tsum pa mdzad de/gsol ba btab pa dang /lha mo lha mo dga'
3a4(rgyud): chen mo//gsang ba shin tu'ang rnyid dka' ba//snying po lus snying mchog gri gtso//sangs rgyas kun gyis legs gsungs
3a5(rgyud): pa//rgyud kye rgyal po dbang phyug mchog/dga' ma rgyud chen mnyan par gyis//dpa' bo gcig pu zhes bya bas//sems
3a6(rgyud): can dngo sa grub myur du 'grub//dkyil 'khor ma mithong ba rnams la//rgyud 'di rab tu bstan mi bya//dkyil 'khor
3b1(rgyud): gzhan du zhugs pa la'ang //rgyud ni bstan par mi bya'o//gang zhig gtum po khro bo yi//dkyil 'khor rab zhugs mnyam gzhag cing //dang
3b2(rgyud): dang brtson 'grus mchog ldan la//gtum po'i rgyud 'di bstan par bya//bla ma la gus snying rje can//sngags kyi theg par mchog tu gzhol//
3b3(rgyud): gtum po'i dbang phyug la rtag gus//de la rgyud 'di bstan par bya//rnal 'byor pa gang la laM zhig/'dod parkam sangs rgyas slu byed pas//gtum
3b4(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor ston byed cing //bla med rgyu de ni ston byed na//de ni nad chen gyis gzir nas//ga shang gci'i dri mas gos par byed//zla ba drug gi
3b5(rgyud): nang du ni//de ni 'chi bo'i sdug bsngal 'gyur//de phyir gshin rje'i pho nyas bzung //dus kyi zhags pa'i dbang du 'gyur//gang tshe sdig can dmyal
3b6(rgyud): bar 'khrod//sangs rgyas kyis kyang srung mi nus//lo ni 'bum du de sdug bsngal//gal te myong gyur las zad kyang //gal te mi ru skyes ni yang //rdo
3b7(rgyud): rje'i gnim lcags kyis de 'jig/sngags rigs brtul zhugs can gyis ni//de phyir dkyil 'khor legs bris nas//de nas sngon du yongs brtag pa'i
4a1(rgyud): //slob ma bzang po rab gzhug bya//'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i//rgyud ni de phyir bstan par bya//gang yang ma thos rgyud 'chang
4a2(rgyud): pade yang 'og tu 'gro 'gyur zhing //grol te sangs rgyas dang mtshungs kyang //de yi gdong du rnam smin 'gyur//slob ma dad pa dmun pa dang /
4a3(rgyud): the tshom zas pas nyin byed na//mgro bor rdo rje'i thog lhung ba//char 'bab dus su the tshom med//mchog gizhalnga mnga' lha mi la//bdag gis 'di ni
4a4(rgyud): bden par bshad//dpa' bo cog nyid rgyud 'di ni//gtum po khro bo shin tu gsang //zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo
4a5(rgyud): gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/rgyud la 'jug pa'i rim par phye ba zhes bya ba ste drang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang
4a6(rgyud): rdo rje mas/gtum po chen po khro bo la dam du 'khyud nas gsol po/dkyil 'khor gyi ni bya ba la//gang gi tshad kyi bri bar bya//de bzhin
4a7(rgyud): de dbus bri bya ba//gang yin gtso bos bdag la gsungs/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dkyil 'khor ched du gang gyur pa//khru
4b1(rgyud): gang dang ni khru ro dang //khru gsum dang ni khru bzhi pa//khru lnga'i tshad las lhag mi bya//glang du de yi rdul mtshon nyid//kha dog sna tshogs kyis byas pa//gru bzhi
4b2(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi yis rnam par rgyan//sgo ni brgyad cha nyi du ni//de yi tshad du rab tu brtag/sgo yi tshad kyi sgo khyud dang //de yi phyed kyis
4b3(rgyud): 'gram dang ni//logs dang de bzhin stegs bu dang //dra ba dra byed snam bu rnams//rtsu ba'i thig gi phyi rol du//de yi phyed kyi rdul tshon sa//rdo rje'i phreng ba
4b4(rgyud): nyid dang ni//ka ba brgyad ldan brtag par bya//sgo yi sum 'gyu ri nyid kyis ni//sgo yi rta babs mchog tu bya//mchog tu sna tshogs rdo rje bri//rdo rje'i rarwa
4b5(rgyud): ba por yug ldan//dpag bsam shing sogs dang ldan pa//khro bo gtum po'i dkyil 'khor la//kye la 'khor 'khor li'i rnam pa la//'phar ma cig
4b6(rgyud): pa nyid du bya//de yi shar sogs phyogs brgyad la//sna tshogs bung+tha yang dag bri//dbus ma dang dgu de dbus su//ral gri sngon po rdo rjes mtshan//rdo rje gri
4b7(rgyud): gug thod bcas 'og/shar du 'khor los mtshan pa yi//ral gri kha dog dkar po bri//lho ru kha dog ser po yi//rin chen dang bcas yang dag bri//
5a1(rgyud): na/ rdzu/ sa nan dang //rgyu rgyun / mas sa da / / na/
5a2(rgyud): mkhyen pa//gi drug marnamasu ni//rin tshu m-i sni margyun /den sbyin byer // pa sa n+dan gi bzhin
5a3(rgyud): dbang ldan la dag ng+gA sa k+She/ud sem ldan pa ma mtshan pa bri//zla baN+DI m+bu'i nga nas pan//man rnam pa mi sa nad rab tu bAn+d+hag/rdu mdzin de kyil
5a4(rgyud): blas //bdag gi 'jig rteni don phyir bye shad//yang nA da khod dI byA//nas rnaMm rgyul du bI ba //snron bzhin dkyil pa 'irI sa byas nas//da
5a5(rgyud): glu bo mthing nag //zhe sdang rdo rnams 'a khyung pa//shar du mi g.yo kar ba b+h+yo//mi ga ser po de bAn na myur//nub tu m-i g.yo dmar ba zo//b+h+r-id du mig sa nga
5a6(rgyud): / ma mam+b+ha kA mug rje pa/byin dus bla m+ba rje ster//rlung du 'ad chags da myu//lha mo man mo yang dag //dbyung ldan pa gdog /
5a7(rgyud): dris dkyil lakhor lo//de nas dkyil la bar la sngags kyis skyeg par gnas par byebya ba ni/oM shrI tsan+da ma n+dA ro jas pa ra wA ras te/ ga hU~M/
5b1(rgyud): a Ta maN+Da lo/a d+hISh+ThA nr-i ku ru hUM phaT swA hA//'dis kun nAs dgug pa dang /rab tu gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du byas te/mchod par bya'o//de nus sngags kyo mchod
5b2(rgyud): par gyur pa ni//oM kr-iSh+Na tsi li puSh+pe pr-I tIts+tsha hUM phaT/oM shwe tI tsi la puSh+Ti pAd+hIn+ti hU~M phaT swA hA//oM pI tA tsa lA puSh+TiM prAd+d+hir+g+haM hUM phaT swAhA//oM rak+Sha tsa l+yA duSh+pe pre tIn+d+he hUM phaT swA hA//oM
5b3(rgyud): sh+yAm+bA tsa la puSh+TaSh+maN+Din+ti hUM phaTaM swAhA//oM dr-iShi bad+d+hi puSh+Tip+pa tits+tsha hU~M phaT/oM moM hi badz+rI puSh+paM pr-ISh+Ti hUM phaT/oM pau shrI ni badz+rI puSh+paM pr-i tIn+tu hUM phaT/oM rA ga badz+rI puSh+paM pra tI nAM hUM phaT/
5b4(rgyud): oM Ir+ya Sha badz+ra puSh+paM pra tIts+tsha hUM phaT/de bzhin du/dI pau dang /d+hU paM/gan+d+haM/ni bi d+yaM/de lta bu'i nye bar spyad pa lngas dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o//gang tshe dbu su me g.yo dkar
5b5(rgyud): gti mug rdo rje me dang bcas//de yi dkyil 'khor nyid du shes//de bzhin mi g.yo ser la sogaso//rnal 'byor lnga yi rab dbye bas//dkyil 'khor lnga ru brtag par bya//
5b6(rgyud): sems nyid rtse gcig gyur pa yis//sngon du bsnyen pa brtsam par bya//dkyil 'khor rab zhugs rnal 'byor mo//rnal 'byor dang ni yang dag ldan//phan tshun du ni phyag byas
5b7(rgyud): nas//bza' ba sha dang chang yang bya//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig po nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba ste gnyis
6a1(rgyud): pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/slob ma ji lta bu nyid la//rgyud 'di rab tu sbyin par bya//the tsom myod par bya ba nyid//khyad
6a2(rgyud): bdag chen po bstan du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dang por skyabasu 'gro ba gsum sbyin par bya'o//bslab pa lnga dang gso sbyong dag kyang //de nas
6a3(rgyud): dbang lnga dang /gsang ba dang /shes rab ye shes kyi dbangango //de nas skal ldan slob ma la//rgyud kyi de nyid bston par bya//gzhan dag ring du spang bar bya//gzhan du
6a4(rgyud): gus bces gyur kyang spang //de la skyabasu 'gro ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di'o//ji srid snying po byang chub par//sangs rgyas la ni bdag skyabs mchi//dam pa'i chos la bdag
6a5(rgyud): skyabs mchi//dge 'dun la yang mi phyed dang //de la bslab pa lnga'i tshigasu bcad pa ni/srog gcod ma byin len pa dang //gzhan gyis bud med brdzun smra rnams//spang bya
6a6(rgyud): kun la 'phags bzhin bya//lnga pa chang gi btung ba nyid//de la 'dir gso sbyong gi tshigasu bcad pa ni/bdag gis sems can bsad mi bya//pha rol nor ni phrog mi bya//bdog
6a7(rgyud): ni tshangs par spyod pa spyad//brdzun gyi tshig kyang spang bar bgyi//myos byed chang gi btung ba ni//bdag gis gang du'ang btung mi bya//gar dang glu dang rgyan rnams dang //rgod
6b1(rgyud): bogo rnams ni spang bar bya//khri stan mtho dang khyi stan tshe//dus mon kha zlas spang bur bya//de ltar gso sbyong yan lag brgyad//dgra bcoMmA rdosu bdag gis bslab//ji ltar sangs
6b2(rgyud): rgyas kyis gsungs ltar//rnam dge bdag gis bzung bar bgyi//de yis g.yon can bdud las rgyu 'o//blo med sangs rgyas mchog thob bye//'dir ni srid pa zhi gyur nas//
6b3(rgyud): lus na nu kun gyi skyabs gyur te//'khor ba ji srid de srid par//skyes bu bde bar gshegs par skye//skye bo bzang po dang 'grogs 'dar//blo ldan 'jig rten la phrin dga'
6b4(rgyud): de la 'dir chu'i dbang ni//slob ma dri ma dang bral zhing /shel dag pa bzhin du bsamya nas/rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs te/lo ma dang bcas pa'i lag pas//
6b5(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri yaM hUM//zhes pa 'dis dbyung bskur bar bya'o//de la 'di dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba ni gos la sogs pa la byas pa'i dbu rgyan
6b6(rgyud): rin po che kun las grub par bsams nas/slob ma yang 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsams nas/mgo bor dbu rgyun sbyin par bya'o//sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ste/
6b7(rgyud): oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na i be sha a s+ya tri da ye hUM phaT/de la ral gri'i dbang bsku rau ba ni/lcags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin las/ral gri de yi leg pa g.yasu byin nas/sngon
7a1(rgyud): banon d+ha bang sgyur baR+Shad+d+ha/any+dzan na/sU rAm+bam+bA ra hA/snang na rmA d+ma/dzo byAd+d+ham+b+ha/ngol zhugs pa da d+hA smad drun
7a2(rgyud): zungs ma la sogs pa la zlum pa'i/zhags pa de'i sngags mdza dang bcas pa'i lag pa g.yon par byin nas/sngun bzhin du dbyung ba sgyur bar byaste/oM gr-id+hI dz+riM
7a3(rgyud): A kaD+D+h+ya/sar+b+ba duSh+Ti pA she bi d+ha bo d+hA/man+ta s+yA t+yA te d+hAr+m+ma te swAhA//de la 'dir ming gi dbang ni/skyob ma lo khro bo gtum po chen po'i phyag rgyu ru nye bar bkod du
7a4(rgyud): rnam par sems kyis dmigs te/oM he shrI b+hA ga b+hAn kr-iSh+Ti tsa la sid+d+ha s+t+ri hUM phaT+Ta/de nas sngon bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o//de bzhin sgrub pa blo nag po la sogs
7a5(rgyud): pa'i dbye bas/mi g.yo ba rnam pa lnga'i ming gis dbang bskor ba sbyin par bya'o//zhes pa ni dbang lnga'o//bud med rnams kyi dbu rgyun gyi dbang bskur ba bzhag
7a6(rgyud): nas/saun d+hA rA'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o//rgyu lha srid kyi lha mo'i tshul du/slob ma dmigs te/oM b+ha ga wa d+hI A bi shwa m+me br-i sh+yA An+ta ts+tshid ya~M hU~M phaT/lcags
7a7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i gri gug de'i lag pa g.ya su sbyin par bya'o//oM karti ke sar+b+ba mA ra Na mAM saM kAr+d+ha ya kArta ya hUM phaT/lag pa g.yon pa mi'i thod pa 'am/rdza las byas pa
7b1(rgyud): rgyu rgyu na k+Sha Sh+mA k+Sha rju / rlungs ldan 'a na m+b+ha rnam par du na darnam pa ng+gA d+hA ma N+Da d+hA
7b2(rgyud): bod+hi si d+him+me hU~M phaT/de bzhin du byed med ni nan mo las gas pa'i khyi dog gi dbyi bas rnal 'byor mo lnga po rnams kyi ming gis dbang bsgyur bar bya'o//'dir
7b3(rgyud): kyi dbang bskur ba'i gan su thabs kyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes//de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gyur pa ni bla ma la slob mas gis la sogs pas yang dag par
7b4(rgyud): mchod nas//de la rang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /lang chos rgyan pa'i shes rab ma dbul bar bya'o//khyed la 'dri ni 'bul lags kyis//'dod kun bde bar rab tu
7b5(rgyud): stsol//bdag ni 'dod pa'i bde don phyir//mgon po khyod kyis brtse bso zung //de nas bla ma la phyag 'tshol nas slob mo phyir byung ste/oM tsat+ta ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT//zhes pa'i
7b6(rgyud): sngags bzlas shing gnas par bya'o//yang bla mas chang dang sha la sogs pa rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod nas/shes rab kyang tshim par byas te/yang dag par sbyor ba las
7b7(rgyud): nye bar byung ba'i dkar dmar lo ma'i skyong bu la sogs par gzhag nas/slob ma bos te/de'i lce la mthe bong dang ming med kyis rdzas bzung nas/hUM phaT kyi yi ge bro bar bya'o//
8a1(rgyud): de nas a ha~M su kha zhes brjod par bya'o//de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/de ring bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed par bya yis/gang
8a2(rgyud): gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur gyis/'on kyang khyod kyis
8a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du 'di smra bar mi bya'o//de nas slob ma'i snying khar ral gri gzhag nAs/'di skad brjod par bya ste/gal te smras na de'i tshe/shin
8a4(rgyud): tu sngo ba'i ral gri 'di//khro bo gtum po'i phyag na gnas//gang gris dam tshig 'jig byed pa//de la 'di yis mchog tu gcod//skyo ba bye ba stong rnams//mi rnams
8a5(rgyud): ral gri lag 'phyar byas//yan lag kun gcod mgo bo ni//'di yis mchog tu gcod par byed//gal te dam tshig 'di nyid kyis//khyod kyis 'jigs par thob
8a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//de nas slob mas brjod par bya ste/de ltar nges zheso//de nas gdong g.yogs bcings nas/dkyil 'khor du me tog dbul bar bya'o//de nas gdong
8a7(rgyud): g.yogs gsal nas/dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan par bya'o//gang dang gang gis mtshan ma de nas bstan par bya'o//de nas slob ma la shes rab ma de sbyin par bya'o//
8b1(rgyud): gzungs ma yid 'ong 'di khyod kyis//bsten byurar+ya sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs//rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa//de la mchog nyi dngos grub med//de nas dga' ba
8b2(rgyud): bzhi'i rnam par dbye ba bla mas rna bar smra bar bya'o//de na bla ma phyi rol tu byung nus/shes rab gcer bu tsog dbus gsang gnas mdzub mos bstan nas/ci ste bu khyod 'di
8b3(rgyud): spo 'am/rnad+ya la sdo mI gtsang ba dang ni//bshong gtsi rik+Sha za ba dang //b+ha ga'i gnas la 'o byed dam//sgrub pa pos smra bAr bya ste//khyod las mi gtsang bza' ba ni//tsI yi phyir/
8b4(rgyud): na bdag me spro//ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar//bdag gis mi mo kun gus bya//des kyang /a ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di//bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan//gang zhig tsho
8b5(rgyud): gas sten byed na//bdag ni dngos grub stsol mdzad ma//blo ldan brtan par rab sbyor bas//pad+ma bya ba ji bzhin gyis//rang nyid khro bo gtum por gnas pas bde ba chen po ste/
8b6(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid khro bo gtum po chen po'i rnam par bsams la/shes rab kyang zhe sdang rdo rje ma'i tshul gyis yang dag par sbyor bas dga' ba bzhi mtshon par
8b7(rgyud): bya'o//de nas yongasu rdzogs pa dang /bla ma la sogs pa la chang dang sha la sogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o//zhes pa ni shes rab kyi dbang ngo //zhes pa
9a1(rgyud): ni dang 'bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dngul khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/dbang bsgyur ts+tsha par phye ba ste gsum pa'o///de nas btsu//
9a2(rgyud): ldan 'das mas gsol pa//ji ltar bsgom pa po yi phyir//khro chen gtum po bsgom par bya//sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar bya//dbang phyug dam pa bshad du gsol//de
9a3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yid dang 'thun pa'i sa phyogs ni//bar du bcod pa kun bral bar//ji ltar rnyed pa'i bstan nyid la//de la mnyam gzhag
9a4(rgyud): rtag par bya//dang po byams pa bsgom par bya//gnyis par snying rje bsgom par bya//gsum pa la ni dga' ba bsgom//kun gyi mtha' la btang snyomaso//de nas rang
9a5(rgyud): gi thugs kau'i sa bon las pad+ma dang zla ba dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis mdun du bsam gtan gyis khro bo gtum po bsams nas/yid kyis mchod pa bya ste//
9a6(rgyud): mkhas pas me tog la sogs pas//yid kyis de rnams mchod par bya//de mdun sdig pa bshags par bgyi//bsod nams la yang rjes yi rang //gsum la skyobasu
9a7(rgyud): 'gro bar bya//bskul zhing gsol ba rab tu 'debs//bdag nyid yongasu 'bul ba dang //bsod nams yongasu bsngo bar bya//de nas smon lam btab nas ni//byang chub
9b1(rgyud): sems ni bskyed par bgyi//de nas phyag ni btsal byas la//'od rjer rnams kyis slar yang bsdu//mkhas pas stong par bsdams pa ni//sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya//oM
9b2(rgyud): shu n+ya tA dz+nyA ne badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/rab tu 'bod pa'i ts+tsha yig ni//'od zer de yis bsregs par bsam//ga dur bsregs pa ji bzhin bsam//'od zer la yang rnam mi
9b3(rgyud): rto/thams cad na mkha' ji bzhin du//skad cig gis ni rnam par sgom//dri med dag pa'i shel bzhin du//rang lus rnam par bsgom par bya//sngon du bsgom bya byi nas ni//
9b4(rgyud): yaM raM baM laM bzhi rnams las//yongs gyur bsgom bya rlung dang ni//me dang chu dang sa rnam so//b+h+rUM yig de las bsgo bya ba//gzhal yas khang du rab tu sgom//gru bzhi pa la
9b5(rgyud): bzhi pa/kra ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes//de yi dbusu bsam bya ba/sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad ldan//paM yig sa bon las byung ba//de la aM yig las byung zla//raM yig
9b6(rgyud): las byung nyi ma ste//de steng hU~M yig las kyang slar//des bskyod mi bskyod pa ru bsam//mA ma kI bcas yang dag sbyor//de la rim bzhin rnal 'byor dbang //de yi spyi bo la
9b7(rgyud): thim nas//skar mad 'dzi bzhin sbyor ba yis//mA ma kI yi b+ho gar bsom//de las khu ba ro ma nyi ma gyur//lhung gyur de yi b+ha ga'i nang //gtum po'i gzugasu gyur nas ni//
10a1(rgyud): b+ha ga'i mtha' las ngos byung nas//mi bskyod pa la ral gr-I yis//bsnun nas phyi nas rab tu bza'//mA mA kIs kyang de las de'o//sha zla bar nA
10a2(rgyud): rab tu bsam//de phyir mAM ma kIs gzung nas//ma dang yang dag rob 'dod bya//des kyang 'khyud par bsom bya ba//zhe sdang rdo rje me yi gzugs//phyag g.yas na ni ral gri
10a3(rgyud): phyar//g.yon pa zhags pa dang bcas pa'i//bsdigs mdzub kyis ni bsdigs par byed//so yi ma mchu yang dag bsdams//rkang g.yas rdebs pa'i stabs kyis ni//bdud
10a4(rgyud): bzhi rnam pur nyid par mdzad//dbus mo g.yon pa sa la btsugs//'jigs byed 'khyog por gzigs pa can//nor 'dzin la ni bsdigs mdzub bstan//pus mo
10a5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rtse mos gnas//mi bskyod sngon pos dbu rgyan mdzad//rin po che yi cod pan can//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur pa'i//gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan///
10a6(rgyud): brgyad gnyis lo yi rnam pa can//skyon gnyis dmar po gtso bo yi//sems nyid brtan pas bsgom par bya//bdag nyid khro bo gtum grub nas//de nas bsrub pa'i sbyor
10a7(rgyud): ba yis//shar du mi g.yo dkar po spro//mi mtshams gti mug rdo rje ma//ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs spro//lho ru mi g.yo ser po spro//phra ma rdo rje bden bral ser/
10b1(rgyud): mi g.yo dmar po nub tu s+ho//rlung du 'dod chags rdo rje ma//mr-i ga yAM ljang ku byung phyogasu//dbang ldan phrag dogA dzA rje ma//phyo nas sho snga rab dang bcas ngos//rang gi mgrin pa/
10b2(rgyud): las byung ba'i//lha mo rnams kyosaM glu yi bskul//ba hu mai tri tu bi badz+nye a ho hi mAM shun+na sa hA ba to//dz+nye bi yo e phi TA mi sau prA dza/ga hi ba b+ha be/ga ti mug rdo rje maso//mA ka ru
10b3(rgyud): NA tsi yaM phin+yA hi pa hu mA ho hi tu shun+na mA mo dzu de ha/suM du kli a he i dzI be bi hun+na/phra ma rdo rje ma yi so//kAM pi hu ha ri pa/bi to hi a shun+na hi ka ri pi paM be sha/to dz+dza ni man+d+ra ne ka
10b4(rgyud): ri DA/ma Nau ats+tsha i lo A she Shi/'dod chags rdo rje ma yi'o//yo ba na bin+ni mu be khe i naSh+Ti la shun+na e di D+ha/shun+na sa hA ba bi gi i a ka ra hi tu mo au saM ma g+hiR+Sha/phra
10b5(rgyud): dog rdo rje ma yi'o//khyab bdage byams pa rnam spangs nas//stong pa'i rang bzhin du ma mdzad//khyod dang rnam bral bdage 'gum pas//'gro kun stong par ma mdzad cig/gti/
10b6(rgyud): mug rdo rje ma so//snying rje'i sems bral bdag 'gum pas//khyab bdag stong par ma mdzad cig/bdag gis lus ni sdug bsngalnga bas//'tsho bya dang bral ma mdzad cig/phywa ma
10b7(rgyud): rdo rje ma so//ci ste mkhas pa khyod nyid ni//dga' ba spangs nas stong par 'jug/'jig rten ma lus pa rnams dang //bdag gi yid ni khyod la sdod//'dod chags rdo rje ma yiso//
11a1(rgyud): lang tsho dang ldan btang snyoms pa'i//mig ni stong pa 'bras med can//stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la//bdag la mnyam nyid sbyor bar mdzod//phra
11a2(rgyud): dog rdo rje maso//'di ni rmi lam ltar thos nas//khu ba las 'khrungs skad cig gis//sngon ma'i gzugs bzhin bsam par bya//bdag nyid yang dag sbyor do las//mi g.yo
11a3(rgyud): dkar po la bsnun nas//grati mug rdo rjer rab 'dod bya//mi g.yo dkar po'i gzugasu bya//mi g.yo ser po slar bsad nas//'dod bya phra ma rdo rje mor//bdag nyid mi g.yo/
11a4(rgyud): ser por bya//de bzhin mi g.yo dmar po bsad//'dod chags rdo rje mar 'dod bya//mi g.yo dmar pos bdag nyid bya//mi g.yo ljang ku bsad nas kyang //phrag dog rdo rje
11a5(rgyud): mar 'dod bya//mi g.yo ljang kus bdag nyid bya//lha mo bzhi la rjes chags pas//dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdu//bdag nyid gcig tu yang dag sbyor//'byung
11a6(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgom par bya//de las nga rgyal byas pa yis//bdag la dngos grub the tsom med//kha dog nag phyir rnal 'byor pa//gang sgom de ni mi g.yo nago/kha dog
11a7(rgyud): dkar phyir rnal 'byor po//gang sgom de ni mi g.yo dkar//kha dog ser phyir rnal 'byor pa//gang sgom de ni mi g.yo ser//kha dog dmar phyir rnal 'byor pa//gang sgom
11b1(rgyud): doni mi g.yo dmar//kha dog ldang phyir rnal 'byor pa//gang sgom de ni mi g.yo ljang //kha dog nag mo'i bud med des//zhe sdang rdo rje ma bsgom bya//kha dog dkar mo'i bud
11b2(rgyud): des//gti mug rdo rje ma bsgom bya//kha dog ser mo'i bud med des//phra ma rdo rje ma bsgom bya//kha dog dmar mo'i bud med des//'dod chagos rdo rje ma bsgom bya//
11b3(rgyud): dog ljang gu'i bud med des//phrag dog rdo rje ma bsgom bya//skyes kun rdo rje'i rnal 'byor po//bud med rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma//nag sogs kha dog dbye ba yis//'di
11b4(rgyud): rnams kun la rab tu brtags//yang na las kyi dbye ba yis//dbye ba lnga ru rab tu brtag/gnag phyir bsad dang zhe sdang la//zhi la dkar po dag tu 'dod//rengs dang
11b5(rgyud): rgyas la ser po ste//dbang dang dbug la dmar po'o//skrod pa las ni lgang kur bshad//yang na rigs kyi rab dbye bas//bram ze dkar po rmangs rigs nag/gtum po ser
11b6(rgyud): po dag la 'dod//dmar po gar ma dag la 'dod//ldeng ku tshos ma zhes bya'o//bu mo sngo bsangs mig yangs ma//nag mo bsgoms pa pos 'dod bya//bu mo dkar mo
11b7(rgyud): dkar po yis//bu mo ser mo ser mo yis//bu mo dmar mo dmar po yis//bu mo ljang ku ljang ku yis//yang na gang gis de 'dzin pa//de dang de yi sgom pa mchog
12a1(rgyud): ji lta ba yang mi shes pas//sems nyid brtan pas 'dod pa bya//phyogs tsam rab tu sbyor ba las//bu mo de yis dngos grub ste//rdo rje'i
12a2(rgyud): shu krar gyur pa la//lce yis kun nas 'jib par bya//ji srid 'dong ba'i bshang gci yang //de yi kha dang b+ha gor sbyin//gu da pad+ma rab 'jib pas/khaSh+Ta~M tsaM 'dod rab
12a3(rgyud): bza' bya//ngo tsha skyug bri byed gyur na//rnam pa kun tu dngos grub nyams//'dir ni rang gi bza' ba mchog/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bzas//zhes pa ni dpa'
12a4(rgyud): bo gcig pur gsungs po'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/lha nyid kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o////de nas sngags rnams kun las btus//
12a5(rgyud): bdag gis rab tu bshad par bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad kyis mi thob paM zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/sngags kun
12a6(rgyud): lasaM ba~M tuswa pa 'di gsungaso//oM tsat+ta me hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/rtsa ba'i sdigaso//oM oM tsa la hU~M hrIH/rtsa bo'i sngags gnyis pa'o//oM hU~M phaT/rtsa ba'i sngags gsum
12a7(rgyud): pa'o//hU~M snying po'i sngags//hUM snying pa'i sngags gnyis pa'o//taM snying po'i sngags gsum pa'i//oM dz+nyA hrIM ha~M tsiN+Da r+'u pe tsiT tsaT/pra tsa Ta~M pra tsaT/ka ta ki he/pra phur
12b1(rgyud): pra phu ra/prA s+yu ra ya pra stA ra ya/hA na ha na/glu sa prA stA/ba d+hA ba d+ha/dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/mo ha ya mo ha ya/sar+b+ba shu d+d+hA NA/mu kha bo d+hA nAM/ku ru ku ru/
12b2(rgyud): sar+b+ba DA ki nI nAM gra ha gr-i haM/b+hU ha pi shA tsaM byA d+hi yak+ShA NAM/trA sa ya trA sa ya/mA ra ya mA ra ya/ruM ruM tsaN+Da ru ka rak+Sha rak+Sha/lhas sbyin l-i tsan+d+ra ma hA se naH/sar+b+ba mA dzI pa
12b3(rgyud): ya ti/ai tsAN+De ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/phreng po'i sngags//na maHsad+d+hi shA bA ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHsar+b+bA tho e tsa la kA No nan+d+ra nan+na/mon+te mon+dza/san+na san+te/shUn+da
12b4(rgyud): tun+na/tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA/I bi sha I bi shwa/IHma hA med+b+ha bA la ka d+hu na d+hA na/tIr+N+Na ti NA/khA da khA da/br-ig+h+r-i mA ra ye mA ra ya/duSh+TaM b+hak+ShA baMk+ShaM/sar+b+baM ku ru ku ru ki ri kai raM/
12b5(rgyud): ma hA bau ShA badz+ra phaT/hUM hUM hUM tri ba li ta raM gA nan+ti ka hUM hUM hUM a tsi laM tsa Ta/s+pho Ta s+pho Ta yA hU~M/se man ti kaM Ta ma hA ba lA satwA ya/sa me nA ye/traM mo hAM/shud+d+he tu lo ka tu
12b6(rgyud): Shu tu badz+ri na ma s+yA a pr-i ti hi tI pa le b+h+yo dzA le tA Ta hA saM ni maiHswA hA/phreng ba'i sdigs gnyis pa'o//na maHsar+b+bA shi pa ri pU raM ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ti thA ga ta b+h+yaHsar+b+baM t+taT+Ta/a maM
12b7(rgyud): g+ha tsaN+Da mi hA ro She Na/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hU~M/b+hU me ya b+h+ra ma ya/hUM trA~M Ta mau hI//phreng ba'i sngags gsum pa'o zhes pa ni mi g.yo ba lnga po rnams kyi spyi'i sngagaso//oM kr-iSh+Na tsa la
13a1(rgyud): /d+ha Ta/oM b+hUtrUn+nalAr+b+hu y+YA/oM b+hId+d+hAN la hU~M phaT/oM bi d+d+hAtsa la hU~M b+h+yaH/oM shUm+b+hats+tsha la d+d+ho sh+tsa/l+h+wa m+bu rnams sgro thun mong bu'o sprugs no//
13a2(rgyud): oM prad+d+ha yo gi nI hU~M phaT/bla'i stan so//oM prad+b+ha pA R+Sha mi t+yai hU~M phaT/ ba'i sngag+sas gsu mu pag/oMhrIn+d+ra bin+d+ha b+hUd+d+ha smI ni/dzA lpA d+hA li me d+hano/d+hirid+hi rI/
13a3(rgyud): bad+d+hA nI skye//byung ba'i phyugs//bye brag pa'i sngags ni/ang+ku badz+rI hU~M Ta/oM mo ta badz+ro drA paT/oM pa~M shu bad+d+hohU~M phaT/oM rA ga badz+re hU~M bAn/oM
13a4(rgyud): d+hInA~M s+t+wa~M/gtor mA'i spyi sngags ni/oMn mo b+ha ga bA~M t+te shAHN+Da maN+Da roSh+Te trU ya de b+hA s+'u ra~M/ma nuSh+Ta dza sa yonA me/swe kA lAn+da rA d+har+m+ma/binAM sha na ya/
13a5(rgyud): mu kr-i Ti k+tsi ta si ra su i ma/ba li gr-ih+Na grid+d+ha ma ma sar+b+ba hrIH/ha rIta ra/tsaM dur mUr+d+ha ni b+hA ba/trA satwA sa~M/b+hU ma b+hU ma/ts+tshin+dats+tshin+te/b+hin+ni g+h+nAn+d+ra/nu shan+na sha/tA pa tI pa/
13a6(rgyud): /da/ /T+Tis na/ ts+tshitwAtwA/ na sa/sa don pa'i migacig pa nyid du
13a7(rgyud): pa'i dpal khro bo gtum pa chen po'i rgyud las/sngags kyi rim par bye ba ste lnga po//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcom
13b1(rgyud): stan 'das kyis dam du 'khyud nas/pad+ma dang rdo rje rab tu sbyor bas gsungs pa/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor bu yi//bsgom par bya ba ci 'dra zhig/rnal 'byor rnams la ngas na
13b2(rgyud): phyir//dri ba mtha' dag bai shud du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rdzogs po'i rim pa'i sbyor gnas pa'i//gcig sbyor de mchog rnal 'byor pa//
13b3(rgyud): nyin mtshan bdag gi tshul gyis ni/sems rtse gcig pas bsgom par bya//re shig rang gi bud med kyang //khyod kyi gzugasu nges par brtag/de nyid shin tu sngon sbyor bas/
13b4(rgyud): jilta ba bzhin gsal po bgrod//ma dang bu mo de nas ni//sring mo dang ni tsho mo dang //gzhan yang nye du kun dang ni//de bzhin Dom+b+hi bram ze mo//gtum mo dang ni ga re ma dong //
13b5(rgyud): chos ma dang ni gzugs kyis mtsho//brtul zhugs can ma rnal 'byor ma//de bzhin thod pa can ma yang //gzhan yang ji ltar rnyed pa yi//bud med gzugs kyis yang dag
13b6(rgyud): gnas//cho ga mkhas pas bsten par bya//ji ltar 'jig par mi 'gyur bas//zhig na khro bo gtum po ni//khros pas sgrib pa po 'joms byed//ral gri zhags pas
13b7(rgyud): 'jigs byed can//mnar med par yang ltung bar byed//'jig rten 'dir yang de'i dngos grub med//'jig rten pha rol kyang de bzhin//de phyir shin tu gsang ba
14a1(rgyud): yin//gnyis kyi spyod yul min par bya//khro bo gtum po'i sgrub thabs ni//mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags bzhin sba//shin tu 'dod ldan don
14a2(rgyud): gyi phyir/sangs rgyas bdag nyid kyis gsungs pa//bar du gcod pa kun spangs pa'i//yid dang 'thun pa'i sa phyogasu//rang sems 'dod ldan ma dga' ma//rab tu spras
14a3(rgyud): pas brtsam par bya//shes rab pha rol phyin dga' mas//bdag ni sangs rgyas mi g.yor 'grub//rang gzugs shin tu 'bad pa yis//mkhas pas sems kyis
14a4(rgyud): bsgom par bya//skye bos dben byas gnosu ni//ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos kyis ni//gnyis gnyis phan tshun sbyor ba yis//rab tu 'bad de bsgom pa bya//mi mo mngon
14a5(rgyud): sum byas nas ni//mngon du phyogs pas nyer 'dug ste//phan tshun gnyis po chags pa yis//rab dga' phan tshun blta bar bya//de las mthong ba'i bsam gtani///
14a6(rgyud): yid ni rtse gcig gnas par bya//de yis de la de nyid brjod//bde ba'i gzi mdangs byed pa smra//de la bu khyod bdag gi bdag/khyod ni ming po mes po dang //bdag ni
14a7(rgyud): khyod kyis chung ma ma//sring mo dang ni tsha mo yin//skye bo bdun rgyud zhabs 'bring ba//khyod ni bdag gi g.yog yin te//bdag ni khyod kyis rin gyis nyos//bdag gi
14b1(rgyud): khyud kya rnga dang nam//rkang pa dag gi drung btud nas//shin tu thul mo rab sbyar nas//drol 'di btsun brjod par bya//byed pa'i gaN+DI mdangs mchog byed brjod//khyod ni bdag glo pa
14b2(rgyud): dong mo//bdag gi chung mtsha mo yin//sring mo'i bu yi chung ma dang //khyod ni bdag gi rje bo yin//khyod kyi bdag ni rnam kun tu//shin tu gus pa'i dpung gnyen
14b3(rgyud): g.yog/bdag la yum gyis brtse bas gzigs//yid 'ong lta bas nges bltas nas//de nas yang dang yang du ni//skyes bu yis ni tsum pa bya//yi ge gsum ni g+ho sogs
14b4(rgyud): sbyin//kha las kha yi bdud rtsi dang //langs nas pad ma bstan par bya//mig 'phrul kha yis 'jib byas nas//ku tsa snyid khar btsir bA bya//mngon phyogs de yi gdong
14b5(rgyud): boltas nus//tsu tI'i gnas la smras par bya//de la blta ba'i tshig la ni//bdag gi rnam par snang mdzod bza'//khyod ni mi skyod chu 'thung nas//bu dong pha dang bran po'o//
14b6(rgyud): khyod kyi rje dpon ma nyid nga //rgyal rigs ma yi yum nyid kyang //bu khyod rab tu 'bad pa yis//bdag gis zhabs la skyab su song //gang phyir bdag ni 'phel byed ma//khyod
14b7(rgyud): lo rin chen nye bar 'ongs//bu khyod byas gzor gyis shig kye//rdo rjes bde skyed bdag la byin//dbus su ze 'brus brgyan pa yi//chu skyes 'dab ma gsum por gzigs//
15a1(rgyud): a hA bde ba can gyi zhing //sangs rgyas sku mdog dmar pos mdzes//chags can zhi bde ster mdzad ma//rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs//
15a2(rgyud): bdag ni gan rkyal yang dag sbyar//chags pas yid ni rnam par mos//phrag par rkang pa zung byin nas//bdag gi steng dang 'og tu ltos//de nas rdo rje rab sad pas//
15a3(rgyud): pad dbus ran trar rab tu gzhugs//brgya stong 'bum dang bye ba phrag/de nas bskyod pa nyid du gyis//bdag pad 'dab ma gsum ldan pa//sha yis rab tu gang ldan
15a4(rgyud): la//rang gi rdo rjer de gzhug pas//sems nyid bde bas rab tu mchod//rlung dang rlung gis bdag pad la//snying po las ni snying po mchog/rdo rje'i rtse mor rab tu
15a5(rgyud): rig/ban d+hu dmar po dang mtshungs pa//'dzag pa'i bsam gtan de la ni//slar yang sems nyid tshim par bya//shin tu mi g.yo'i sems nyid kyis//bde ba de skyes
15a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya//de la lan ni rab tu sbyin//dga' ma khyod ni skad cig sdod//ji srid ma lus b+ha ga'i gzugs//skad cig tsam zhig bsam par bya//de la yum gyur
15a7(rgyud): cig nyid nges par 'gro ba gsum rnams zhing dang bde ba'i ma ma de//sdig pa'i las la gnas nyid mu cor smra ba zhe sdang ba las 'di ni smod par byed//de dang de rnams gting
15b1(rgyud): mtha' med pa'i dmyal bar de nyid mi bzad rtag tu sdug bsngal nyid//lus ni lan mang me yis srog cing ngu 'bod du ni bskal pa gsum du gnas par byed//ma mo'i yon tan gang
15b2(rgyud): brjod na//sems can thams cad yongasu 'dzin//ji snyed brtse dang srung ba dang //mi mo'i sems nyid la rab gnas//rang gzhan skye ba de snyed kyang //kun kyang de la yang yang
15b3(rgyud): rgyas//dpal gyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma//gal te de gzugs las gzhan min//de yi lha dang reg pa dang //nyed pa kun nas ring zhog gi/gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis kyang //
15b4(rgyud): skad cig de la bde ba thob//yul lnga rnams la mi mo yi//gzugs 'di nyid ni mchog tu gnas//de la bde ba 'bab mdzad pa//skyes bu rnams kyis rol par gyis//de phyir nyes
15b5(rgyud): lngas nges grol ba//yon tan dam pa kun gyis rgyan//de yi bsod nams bsod nams che//yum gyis bdag la bka' drin mdzad//de nas de la shin tu bltas//mchu ni so
15b6(rgyud): yis bsdams par bya//nu ma 'gram dang se yog dang //de yi gos bral rnal 'byor pas//byed bcing gis ni bde 'byung bya//do li la zhon bcing ba dang //dbus mo bzung la de
15b7(rgyud): nyid bcing //bcing ba brla nyed pa yang yin//rkang pas gcod byed bcing ba yang //bcing ba sa la mnan par bya//mkhas pas mnyam bcing de nyid ni//bcing ba ri mo can
16a1(rgyud): nas bya//dad+ma paSh+Tad+b+ha byA bcing ba dang //pharnal 'khor dor tron rkang pan+d+ham//de bzhin nyid du A sbrul brjod//kun nus pazang blong
16a2(rgyud): bzhin nyid//de la skyil krung dbus ni//mi mo cog pu stan la 'dug/dpung bzung gis phrag pa la//de la dam du sbyar bar bya//rang gi lag pi zung dag dri'i//rked
16a3(rgyud): pa'i dbusany+dzer son te//pad+mar dzI rje rab bcug nas//bde ba 'byung ba'i btsing ba grag/gnyis ka'i lpag zung ra bo bcug nos//phan tshun sbyor bas bcing ba
16a4(rgyud): bya/gnyis kas cung zad bskyod par bya//do li'i bskyod pa zhes grag so//de yi dbus gnyis rang gi ni//snying kha nyid du yang dag sbyar//dri li bskyod pa'i byed
16a5(rgyud): pa dgod//'di ni dbus mo bzung nas bcing //de yi rkang mthil rlung nyid kyi//brla yi khur yang sbyar bar bya//badre ba 'byung byed bkod pa yis//'di ni brla
16a6(rgyud): nyed bcing ba'o//de yi nu mA rkang pa dang //lte ba snying kha logs gnyis bkag/dro li g.yo ba'i byed pa dgod//bcing ba 'di ni rkang pas spyod//de yi 'phongs
16a7(rgyud): gnyis sa la gzhag/pha rol la ni 'khyud pa pos//bde ba 'byung byed bkod nas ni//bcing ba 'od ni sa la mnan//cog dbus yang dag gnas de la//rkang
16b1(rgyud): pa gnyis po rab brkyang bya//bcing ba mnyam du shes byas la//re re zhing yang brkyang bar bya//de yi rkang zung 'khor lo ru byas//g.yon par rab tu sbyar bar bya//
16b2(rgyud): kun nas mngon par phyogs pas kyang //rgyab nas phongs la reg par bya//lago pas dang por mnye bar bya//bcing 'di tsautru can zhes bya//slar yang bde ba 'byung
16b3(rgyud): byas nas//de la gan rkyal bsgyel bar bya//lag pa g.yas pas de nyid du//pad+mar rdo rje nges gzhug bya//de yi dbus mo'i 'og bzung nus//gri khugs steng du
16b4(rgyud): sbyor bar bya//phan tshun lag pa gnyis kyis ni//bung ba'i dra ba zhesu shes//de yi rkang pa zung dag ni//phrag pa'i steng du nges par byin//bcing ba 'di ni 'khrul
16b5(rgyud): 'khoru zhon//'bebs shring 'bebs pas rab tu sbyor//de yi rkang g.yon phrag pa la//g.yas g.yon baR+Ya yi rtsa ba las//de yi rkang g.yas g.yon pa las//g.yas
16b6(rgyud): pa yi ni rtsa ba ru//'dir ni rkang pa stengs bcing bso//yang dag bde bas sdug bsngal 'joms//de yi rkang pa'i mthil la ni//brang gi dbus mnyam du sbyar//lag
16b7(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis btsir bar bya//dbus mo rus sbal bcing bar gsungs//de yi rkang pa'i mthil la ni//mig dang rna ba mgo bo sbyar//bcing ba 'di ni kun tu bzang //
17a1(rgyud): 'dod kun bde ba rab tu stor//tsitra srid sbyil krung byAsmra//kun nas sna tshogs pA yi ni//khro bo gtum sbyor ba yis//kun nus rnam pa//
17a2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa//ji srid 'dod pas yang nas yang //de yi kha la'o bya'o//mig ni zim bus gdong du blta//ji ltar 'dod tshig smra ba yi//gdong la lci yis 'jib
17a3(rgyud): pir bya//de yi khA nas byung ba'ang btung //so yi dri ma'ang za zhing 'jig/bde bar rnam par bsgom par bya//cho ga shes pas cung zad du//so yis lce dang mchu
17a4(rgyud): ni bsdam//lce yis sna yi bu ga dang //mig gi zur kyang sbyang bar bya//so dang mtshan+da khung las byung ba'i//dri ma kun kyang bza' bar bya//mgo dang mig dang
17a5(rgyud): mgrin pa rna//logs dgra rked pa nu ma lag/'od 'jib sen mo sbyin par bya//mig gnyis spangs lnga bud myed la//lpag pas nu ma mnye bya zhing //so yang gdab
17a6(rgyud): cing 'jib par bya//rang gis glan rgyal byas nas 'jig/lto bo mdzes la 'jib par bya//bdag gis mngon nas 'di nyid ni//yang dang yang ni dran par bya//pad+mar
17a7(rgyud): lag pas reg par bya//rlung gis mdzes pa zhes smra ba//de la 'o dang sen mo sbyin//blta zhing lag pas gsal bar bya//mi mo'i dri ma mnam bya zhing //bu ga'ing
17b1(rgyud): ro'adzin gyis smrang \u0f7f//ji lta bar nA bdag zhugs nas//'di yis kyang ni dpag myed bskyed//de la bad+d+hA nang chog 'di brjod//lam 'ang nyid ni drang po ste//de nyid ma
17b2(rgyud): shes sbyor ba yi//lam 'dis 'gro ba drug tu 'jug/sbyor ba rab tu shes pa yis//khro bo gtum po'i dngos grub 'gyur//de phyir pad byung dkar dmar ni//kha
17b3(rgyud): yis dgug par byas nas kyang //yeng dang yang ni blta byos nas//de ni kha yis bza' bar bya//sen mo legs byas brla dang ni//bran bzhi ni rkang pa mnye bar bya//mgo
17b4(rgyud): bor yi grwa gsum sbyin bya//sgying dbus khu tshur chung ngus sbyin//rnal 'byo pra ni mAnyam bzhag pas//de phyir gzhan don ldan par bya//yid ni rtse gcig bde ba yas/
17b5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i bya ba de lo sbyin//ji ltar 'dod pa rab 'jog paso//'phro med yi ni rtse cig bde//'phos gyur pad+ma las 'jig ste//dbus gcugs rab tu sbyor ba yis//pad+mar
17b6(rgyud): khu ba rdul gyur pa//lce yis blangs nas bza' bar bya//sna yIs na li rab sbyor bas//stobs ni 'phel phyir btung bar bya//khaM la 'o ni byas nas kyang //shes
17b7(rgyud): pad+ma lci yos myangs//'khyud byas de yi phyi nas ni//sha dang nya ni bza' bya zhing //ro mtshang ni yang yang bzung //'dod pas rab tu 'phel 'gyur phyir//ngam dang brtings
18a1(rgyud): rlu /gyur de las ni//phyi nas 'dod 'gyur bad sogs kyis//slar yang sngon ma'i rIm bya yis//gnyis gnyis phan tshun rab tu brtsam//snom pa'i
18a2(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis ni//bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya//skye bar 'di nyid sbyor reg na//khro bo gI tumu po'i go 'phang 'dzin//chags can dngos grub don gyi phyir//
18a3(rgyud): bdag gis sbyor ba rab bshad bya//g.yon pa'i byon pa steng bzhag nas//g.yas pa'i byin pa rol bur bya//'di ni sems dpa'i skyil krung grags//'dod kun
18a4(rgyud): badre ba rab tu ster//byin pa g.yas pa steng bzhag nas//byin pa g.yon pa rol bar bya//'di ni pad+ma'i skyil krung grags//'dod kun bde ba rab tu ster//pad+ma'i
18a5(rgyud): skyil krung bcings nas ni//byin pa g.yon pa steng du dgod//byin pa g.yas pha rol pa ste//rdo rje'i skyilo krung zhes byar shes//rkang pa sa la bzhag nas ni//
18a6(rgyud): mtshungs par ring du gdong phyogs pa//'dod kun rab tu sbyin shes bya//'dir ni tsog pu'i gdani lo ni//rkang pa sa la dgos byas la//skyog por 'phreng la
18a7(rgyud): ring du bya//zla ba phyed par shes par bya//'dis ni bde bo rab tu steraro//dbus bzung 'phred la sa la bzhag/long bu'i dbusu 'phongs tshos bzhag/'dir ni
18b1(rgyud): gzhu yI gdan byas na//'dod pa mchog gi dga' ba ster//sems dpa'i skyil krung de bzhin du//rdo rje'i skyil krung zhes byar brtag/tsIg pu zla ba byed pa dang //gzhu yi god
18b2(rgyud): yang 'dir 'dod do//zla ba phyed pa'i gdan gnas pa//rtag tu mi mo byas nas nI//lhung na pad+marare lce yos byung //go sang gnas yi ge gsum mtshon bya//slar yang gzhu
18b3(rgyud): yi gdan byas nas//rang gi me yi bshang nang du//khro bo gtum po sbyor ba yis//des bskyed bde ba bsgom par bya//rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas//de yi rnal
18b4(rgyud): 'byor ldan par bya//chags bral sems ni spang byas la//mA la rab tu 'dod par bya//rjesu tshogs la bsod nams 'thob//chags bral las ni sdig pa 'thob//chags
18b5(rgyud): bral las ni sdig gzhan med//bde las bsod nams gzhan med//de phyir sems nyid mnyam bzhag nas//'dod pa'i bde ba bskyed par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma thugs/
18b6(rgyud): rab tu dgyes nas mngon par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ste/'di skad du yang gsol pa/kye bcom ldan 'das ci ste 'dir 'di nyid/mi rnams 'ba' zhig/
18b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs yin nam/gzhan rnams kyi yang yin/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//phyogs kun tu rnam par gnas pas 'di la rjesu chags par bya ste/lha dang /
19a1(rgyud): rtswa ma yin dang //mi dang /klu dang do rnams kyis kyang bsgrubs pas 'gyu//de nyi pos nus dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams/gau R+R-i dang /
19a2(rgyud): dpal mo dang /dbang myo dang /dga' ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams blangs nas sgom par D+ho mo//de nas de'i skad cig la de thams cad de'i skad cig thung cig de nyid la khro ba
19a3(rgyud): gtum po'i go 'phang thob nas/sa'i steng du spyod par gyur to//de la dbang phyug chen po rdo rje bde byed nyid du grubo//nor lha rdo rje sred med kyi bu nyid//lha'i dbang po phyag
19a4(rgyud): na rdo rje nyid do//'dod pa'i lha yan lag med pa'i rdo rje nyid do//de lta bu la sogs pa'i gang gi klung gi bye mo dang mnyamahrIm+b+ha'i bu rnams kyis grug//sems can don kun
19a5(rgyud): sgrub pa po//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan nyid//'byung po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa//sgyu ma kun las rnam par rgyal//ji ltar 'drab las byung ba yi//pad+ma 'dam gyis
19a6(rgyud): gos pa med//de ltar 'dod chags las byung ba'i//nyes pa rnams kyis gos pa med//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po'i rgyud las/
19a7(rgyud): rdzongs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor rim par phyi ba ste drug pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa//skye bo kun gyi 'khrig spyod pas//yong su ngal la
19b1(rgyud): na por gyur//de yongal so'i gnas nyid no//mgon po khyod kyis gsung bar rigs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa//bud mod ba ba la dmigs nas//rang gis
19b2(rgyud): mngon sum dgag par bya//sha dang nya ni bza' bar bya//tshong ni btud bye mnyam gzhug pus//gzhan yang ji ltar rnyed pa bza'//'o chu rak+ta la sogs bza'//thog mar bu
19b3(rgyud): med la byin nas//de y-i lhag ma bza' bar bya//de yi lhag ma'i snod la ni//longs ni rtag tu spyad par bya//de yi khab shal chu dang ni//pad+ma bkrus pa'ang btung bar bya//bshang
19b4(rgyud): pad+ma bkrus bzung nas//brtul zhugs can gyis khaM sogs bkru//de yi skyugs pa bza' bya zhing //de yi bzhi mnyam bza' bar bya//skye gnas las byung btung bar gyi chu yang
19b5(rgyud): ni bza' bar bya//ji ltar shIng la lud sogs kyis//'bras bu lhag par 'gyur ba ltar//de bzhin mi gtsang sogs spyod pas//bde ba dam pa skyes bu la//na dang rgas pa nyid
19b6(rgyud): dang ni//de yi lus la 'chi ba med//gang de'i mi gtsang sten byed pa'i//rnal 'byor pa yis de 'grub byed//gang du bza' dang bza' min dang //'dir ni rnam rtog mi bya'o//
19b7(rgyud): sbyor rig bya dang bya min dang //bgrod min bgrod pa'ang de bzhin//bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang medo//mtho ris thar par brtag mi bya//lhan cig skyes pa cig pu'i ga
20a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis mnyam gzhag bya//de nyid sbyor lhun rnal 'byor pa//gang tshe sgom pa mchog gyur pa//khro bo gtum pA TIg sbyor bas//rngarma/
20a2(rgyud): nga rgyal 'dzin pa po//gal te bram ze brgya bsad kyang //sdig pa rnams kyis gAs mi 'gyur//de phyir mgon po cho ga yis//khro bo gtum po de nyid sgom//skye
20a3(rgyud): glang zhig drag po yi//las kyis dmyal bar 'gro byed kyang //de la sdig pas mi gos shing //mtho ris 'gro bar the tsom med//yid ni sngon du 'gro ba 'di//dog dang
20a4(rgyud): sdig pa kun la 'dod//yid dang rnam rtog rnam pa las//gnas la sogs pa'i dbye brwa bstan//ji ltar sngags drang bral ba yi//dug zos pas ni tshe zad 'gyur//snga
20a5(rgyud): deng de nyid shes pa yis//bde ba dang ni tshe 'phel byed//de nas skad cig de lnga lha mo mchog gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mes gri gug dang /thod pa'i phyag gis khro ba
20a6(rgyud): gtum po'i phyag rgyas/rdo rje gtu mo khro chen mas//de nyid mchog la gzigs nas gsungs//bdag gi gzugs no sgos byas ni//nga rgyal mchog 'di byas gyur na//gal
20a7(rgyud): te tshangs 'joms de yang ni//sdig pa yis ni gos mi 'gyur//khro chen sems nyid gcig pu yi//bdag gi gzugs ni sgom byed na//nya dang bya ni bsad byas kyang //
20b1(rgyud): nAn med ga yo dang khyo ba dang //gsod pa'i don phyirar+ya snrums dpya' n+dan//rnal 'byor sdig pas glos mi 'gyur//de rnams spyan la phal tshar no//mthu tsho bar ni rab tu bstan
20b2(rgyud): zhes pa ni dpa' bo cig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud we/lus kyis bde ba'i rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
20b3(rgyud): sprul pa/bcom ldan 'das me la/dkyil 'khor lnga yis phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/dga' ba khyod gzugs rnal 'byor pas//ji lta bur na shes par bya//bcom ldan
20b4(rgyud): 'das mar gus bya ba//rnal 'byor pa yis gang la bye//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas bkra' stsal pa/nga ni 'jig rten gsum po na//mtho dang dma' ba'i gzugs gyur pa/
20b5(rgyud): bud med gzugs de la ni 'dod//ji srid 'jig rten gyis mi mthong //lha mo lha min mo dang ni//de bzhin gnod sbyin srin mo dang //klu mo 'byung mo mi tsi mo//de bzhin mi yi
20b6(rgyud): bu mo dang //dri za mo dang dmyal ba mo//dud 'gro'i bu mo yi dgas mo//tshangs ma rgyal rigs rje rigs mo//do mangs rigs mo ste shin tu mang //yig mkhan me dang
20b7(rgyud): rgyal mo dang ni//gtso mo ka la ut+ti ni//ched mo bskyed mos tshal mo dang //smad 'o tsheng ma dang tshes mkhan ma//ko lpags snod mkhan sha ba ri//hA Di Dom+bi tsaN+Da li/
21a1(rgyud): khrus ma chang ma la du mkhan//lcags 'gar 'dreg mkhan gar ma dang //mkhar ba mo dang gser 'bar ma//nya ba mo dang shan pa mo//srub ma
21a2(rgyud): mkhan dang me tog ma//thod pa can ma dung mkhan ma//gdugs mkhan ma dang kha mkhan ma//ba lang skyong dang muda' mkhan ma//phru klog rdo mkhan ma dang ni//shing
21a3(rgyud): mkhan rgyan cha mkhan mo dang //rigs rnams kun la rab tu 'jug/ma dang sring mo chung ma dang //a nai dang ni tsha mo dang //khan+ti kr-i dang sgyug mo dang //gzhan yang
21a4(rgyud): gnyen 'dab ma kun dang //brtul zhugs can dang rnal 'byor ma//yugs sa mo dang dka' thub ma//zhes sogs mang po kun laM ni//dri ni bud med gzugs gyur nas//
21a5(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don phyir gnas//rang rang tshul du nges pa yis//de rnams ji ltar rnyed pa nyid//'o dang 'khyud pa la sogs kyis//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba//rnal
21a6(rgyud): 'byor rnams kyis bsten par bya//sems can kun la phan 'dod pas//mi mo bsten pas dngos grubo//skad cig tsam gyis ster byed pa//de phyir bud med bstan
21a7(rgyud): par bya//bud med mtho ris bud med chos//bud med de nyid dka' thub mchog/sangs rgyas bud med dge 'dun nyid//bud med shes rab par phyin nyid//kha dog rnam
21b1(rgyud): lnga'o rabya dbye las//so sor brtug par 'dod pa yin//bud med gang zhig kha dog go//sgra sdang rdo rje ma rA grags//bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar//gti mug rdza
21b2(rgyud): mer 'dod do//bud med gang zhig kha dog ser//lha mo phra ma rdo rje ma//bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar//'dod chags rdo rje me ru grags//bud med gang zhig khe
21b3(rgyud): dog ljang //brag dog rdo rje ma zhes grags//bcom ldan shes rab par phyin ma//gcig nyid lnga yi tshul gyis gnas//chang dang bza' bo me tog sngags//rnams
21b4(rgyud): mchod lus la gos kyis mdzes//yang drug smra bas 'dud byas nas//thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te//blta dang reg pa nyid dang ni//dran pa yis ni smras par bya//rtag
21b5(rgyud): tu'o dang lag pas 'khyud//rdo rje rnal 'byor mi mchod bya//lus kyis nus pa rnams byas naso//mi nus pa rnams ngag yid kyis//mchod pas rnyes dris bdag la ni/
21b6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rdo nye bar byed//bud med kun gyi lus spangs nas//bdag ni gzhon du gyur pa med//sna tshogs sbyangs nas bud med mchod//'di ni bdag la ra
21b7(rgyud): mchod 'gyur//'di yis bdag la bsnyen bkur nas//sgrub pa po mnyes dngos grub mchog/de yis mthong ba'i lam zhugs nas//rnam kun rtag tu kun nas ster//
22a1(rgyud): /ma lus gzugs kyis bya dag bsgoms naH//rang ga dud myed 'dod daston b+h+ya//rdo rje pad+mo maHma sbyor bas//bdag la byung chub ster ba mo//
22a2(rgyud): phyir rnam pa kun gyis ni//bdag la gus pas mchog tu de//'di yis de nyid rab sbyor bas//bairtu lo zhu gas can gyis ri bau gus bya//dmyal ba la sogs ngan 'gro
22a3(rgyud): sdig pa yis kyang 'jigs mi bya//'jig rten sdig pas 'jigs 'gyur na//ji srid nus pa thob mi 'gyur//sdig pa cung zad yod man zhing //bsod nams cung zad yod
22a4(rgyud): min phyir//sems nyid mi srung 'jig rtenA gang //sdig dang bsod nams rnam par gnas//gang du sems nyid tsam gyis ni//thams cad skad cig tsamra de gnas//
22a5(rgyud): dmyal bar 'gro ba 'dir gang gis//gang gi 'dir ni mtho ris 'gro/gang gis dug brtags mthu yis 'chi//ji lta ba la de nyid med//drug gi mthu yis yang dgra
22a6(rgyud): brgya la//de bzhin mtho ris dran 'gror 'gro/de nyid yongasu shes gyur pa'i//mkhas pas mya ngan 'das pa thob//myang 'das stong pa'i tshul nyid du//mar me rlung gis ji
22a7(rgyud): bzhin du//nyer chang ltung ba de yang ni//byang chub go 'phang ma yin//de phyir thams cad yongs spangs nas//bdag nyid gus bya ba rtul zhugs can//skad cig tsam
22b1(rgyud): gyis gtum po /dngos zlab sbyor bar blon ma med//dA nas bcom ldan 'das kyus bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab pha rol tu phyin ma la gsal pa/rdo lta bu yi rnam pa
22b2(rgyud): yis//gtum po'i dngos grub ci 'dra zhig/de nas bcom ldan 'das mes bka' sprul pa// dog lnga yi rab dbye bas//rnal 'byor mya ru rab grags gang //de yad
22b3(rgyud): rang rang bdag po yi//kha dog lnga yi rab dbye yas//gtume po kun gyi de nyid 'dis//bdag ni rnal 'byor mA ru shar//kha dog sngon po gang de yang //bdag po mi g.yo
22b4(rgyud): skyon por shes//kha dog dkar po'i bdag po gang //mi g.yo dkar po zhes bya'o//kha dog ser pa'i bdog po gang //mi g.yo se po yang dge grags//kha dog dmar
22b5(rgyud): po'i badrag po gang //mAM gla yo dmar po zhes grag so//khwa dog ljang ku'i bdag po gang //mi g.yo ljang ku zhes bya'o//gtum po de nyid cig pu nyid//rnam pa lnga yi
22b6(rgyud): tshul gyis gnas//'di yi dngos grub brtan pa nyid//de ni btu mi bor yang dge bshad//na mAkha'i mthar thug ji snyed bri//lha mo'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas//
22b7(rgyud): gtum po'i dngos grub ji bzhin gsungs//de bzhin du ni gtum mo 'grub//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum pa'i rgyud las/ngo bo nyid
23a1(rgyud): kyi rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab dag gi
23a2(rgyud): rgyal ji ltar bsgom par bya/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lA pA/mi mo sngon byas rnal 'byor pas//phan tshun de yis lta ba mchog/lus ni drang por mnyam
23a3(rgyud): gnas nas//rtse gcig yid kyis bsam gtan bya//sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin phyir//tha dad med pa'i yid kyi so//slar yang byang chub dbyer med pas//thabs dang shes/
23a4(rgyud): rab nyid du 'dod//'chi ba nyid ni cho su brjod//longs spyod rdzogs pa bAr srid dang //'gro ba drug gzugs sprul pa dang //'dod pa'i ljongs spyod bde chen po//sku bzhi yi
23a5(rgyud): ni rang bzhin 'di//skyes bu la ni khams gsum pa/blosku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin phyir//bud med gzugs la khams gsumo//sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin las//skyes bu
23a6(rgyud): 'dir ni sangs rgyas yon//bud med shes rab par phyin mar//phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gnas//de nyid nga rgyal byas pa yis//slar yang bdag la dngos gru'o//
23a7(rgyud): khro bo gtum po'i tshul nyid du//rang nyid gzugs kyis yang dag gnas//'dod chags gtum po'i gzugs bsgoms no//bdag la dngos grub rnam kun tu//de nyid
23b1(rgyud): m+b+ha gang su nga du// na nus pa dang sa rlom//las ngas gyud byas nas//rnam bston pa nyid mdzu/slad dngas grub sa b+h+ya //ngan pa snyoms da
23b2(rgyud): duspyi gnas//gang tshe rnal 'byor dngos grub thob//sdig pa dang bral dri med 'gyur//rlung dang sems kyi 'dzum mdangs ni//'jig rten pa yis mthong ba med//kun mkhyen kun la
23b3(rgyud): popo//nyon mo sa kun laso rnam par 'das//de le nad drung rgas pa med//de la bsti pa snod min te//de la dug gis 'da' ba med//rgyus min mes kyang 'tshig pa med//mtshon gyis
23b4(rgyud): ma yin dgra yini//da bang du nam yang 'gro ba min/yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis ni//dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung bar 'gyur/ ni de la 'khyod med par//yi bzhin
23b5(rgyud): bu dang mtshungs 'gyur//ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams//gang dang gang du de bzhin gshegs//dri ni gzhal yis mkha' 'gro ste//der ni 'dod kun de rnams kyis//gzugs
23b6(rgyud): dang lang chos rab rgyan pa'i//lha mi du mo dga' myas der//ji snyed mtho ri ste skar ma rnams//the tshom med pa nyid du 'gyur//tshangs drung khyab 'jug dbang phyug gang //brgya byin yan lhag med
23b7(rgyud): sogs gang //mngol 'jug 'gyur zhing 'gro drug kyi//gnas pa'i srog chags kun kyang //rnal 'byor dngos grub ji lta bzhin//de bzhin rnal 'byor mas kyang //skyes bu rdo rje
24a1(rgyud): /rgyanabasgyur//rung med rdo rje tsun ma'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lus 'di la thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba las bde ba chen pong //
24a2(rgyud): lhar skye ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin te//g.yon pa'i rtsa ru rab tu grags//ro ma thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis//g.yas pa
24a3(rgyud): la ni yang dag gnas//brkyang mA ro ma'i dbus dag la//kun 'dar mar ni rab tu gsungs//gang gi tshe u ba d+hU tIr rlung //khu ba dang ni ro ga cig gyur//rdo rjes mgo bo'i
24a4(rgyud): mtsham su 'gro/bud med b+ho ga'i ran tra la//thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas//lte bar gnas pa'i tsaN+Da li//mer me ltar 'bar de yis ni//zhu ba'i khu ba mchog la ni//
24a5(rgyud): de las skyes pa'i bde ba la/cung zad cung zad rab sbyor las//de yang chen po cher sbyor las//de yang dngos po'i rang bzhin las//gang gis de yi bde ba 'phel//rtag tu
24a6(rgyud): goms po'i sbyor ba 'is//de ni skye ba 'di nyid la//dpal ldan gtum po nyid du 'gyur//zhes pa ni dpa' bo cig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po'i rgyud las//
24a7(rgyud): bang ma gtan gyi rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ci ste bcom ldan sgrub pa pos//khro chen gtum po'i go 'phong ni//dud
24b1(rgyud): mA dang bral sgrub nus sam//'on te sgrub par nus ma yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo sgrub par nus pa ma yin//bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das/
24b2(rgyud): ci'i phyir na bde ba ster ba med par mi nus/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/e mi bde ba skyes tsam gyis//byang chub mchog ni thob byed pa'i//bde ba khyud 'phags 'byung ba
24b3(rgyud): las//de nyid 'thob kyis de bzhin min//de med de yi bya ba yang //de nyid med par skye ma yin//byed po bud med dang sbyor las//gzhan du nam yang ma yin//sgyu ma'i de nyid
24b4(rgyud): thams cad la//bud med sgyu ma'i de nyid bsngags//de yi de nyid las 'das gang //de las dngos grub lhag 'byung med//de phyir bud med dang bral 'di//nam yang bye ba ma yin//de
24b5(rgyud): nyid gal te sdug bsngal gyur//'chi dang 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa yang //de rnams thams cad bzod bya yis//'dir ni bud med spyang mi bya//gang phyir bud med bde de nyid//kun nas
24b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas ster ba po//g.yo dang spobs can 'tsher ngo bral//rtag tu 'dod pa'i dpung gnyeno//dngos grub ster ba 'di nyid ni//dngos po kun gyi bston par bya//bud med tshul ni gcig
24b7(rgyud): brjod pa//dga' ba'i phyir ni 'chi ba'ang med//bdag po dang ni bral gyur na//'dod pa'i mchog ni ci zhig smras//de phyir kun gyi bud med ltar//rnam pa kun tu rab tu brtag/shing dang
25a1(rgyud): rdo la sogs rnams kyang //yid kyis yongasu brtag pa'ang bya//skyes pa bud med lha myo dang //bud med kyi ni skyes pa lta//rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas//phan dun
25a2(rgyud): du ni mchod par bya//mchod par bya ba gzhan du min//rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa'ang ngo //de phyir rnal 'byor brtse ldan pas//dkyil 'khor mdun du byas nas ni//de la nyer
25a3(rgyud): zhugs bud med ni//shes rab phor phyin rnam pa la//rtag tu me tog gis mchod cing //de bzhin spos dang mar me sogs//dkyil 'khor lnga ni rab sbyor bas//phyi nas phyag ni
25a4(rgyud): btsal bar bya//de nas g.yasu bskor ba bya//gtum po la ni mchod par bya//gus pa dang bcas sems kyis nI//de bzhin skyes bu bud med mchod//de nyid mchod pa'i cho ga ni//
25a5(rgyud): rgyal bas phan tshun bya bar gsungs//bud med smad par yongs mi bya//de nyid 'dod pa'ang spang mi bya//snyan pa'i tshig gis spro bya zhing //rjesu 'thun par sbyin par bya//dngos po
25a6(rgyud): kun gyis phyag byas to//ji bzhin gdug can shes mi bya//gang du'ang bud med mi spong ba//'di ni sangs rgyas gsung du thos//gang du khyod kyi gzhan byas na//de yi sdigs pas
25a7(rgyud): dmyal bar 'gyur//bud med dang bral ci byas kyang //gzhan du 'chi 'gyur dngos grub min//khro bo gtumo po'i sgrub thabs ni//dka' thob kyis ni 'grub mi 'gyur//yid ni
25b1(rgyud): dri yod ma byas par//'bras mod gti mug dra bas bcings//'dod ldan 'dod pa spong byed pa//brdzun gyis 'tsho ba skye 'gyur te//brdzun gyis glang 'tsho sdig pa ste//sdig pas dmyal//
25b2(rgyud): bar 'gro bar 'gyur//'chi ba'i bus ni thob pa na//brdzun gyis 'chi bar the tshom med//de phyir bsgrub bya bsgrub par bya//rgyal ba'i bdag nyid 'dod paso//'dod yon lnga po de
25b3(rgyud): spangs nas//bdag nyid dka' thub gdung mi bya//gzugs rnyed pa ni blta bya zhing //sgra yAng de bzhin mnyan par bya//di ni bsnam par bya ba ste//ro yi mchog ni bza' bar
25b4(rgyud): bye/reg bya reg par bya ba ste//'dod pa lnga po bsten par bya//khro bo gtum po de mchog ni//myur du sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur//gzhan la slu ba med gyur cing //gti mug
25b5(rgyud): mchog tu med par bya/mi yI la 'tsho thob pa la//mi mo'i bde ba mi spyod na//chen po mchog tu zad byas nas//lta ba'ang 'bras bu med par byas//'dod can ma rtog sten byas na///
25b6(rgyud): 'dod pa tsam gyi dpu gnyen gyis//btsun mo'i skye gnas yang dag bsten//khro bo gtum po'i go 'phang mthong //gnyid ni ji ltar spang bar bya//bza' ba dang ni dgod pa nyid//'jig
25b7(rgyud): rten ma dang spang ba'i phyir//lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma sras mkhas//pho brang 'khor gyi btsun mo ni//stong phrag brgyad khri spangs nas slar//nai rany+dza na'i 'gram gshegs nas//sangs
26a1(rgyud): rgyus dngos grub rab gsungs dang //gang du bdud ni 'dul mdzad pa//de nyid gzhan don kho na yin//gang phyir btsun mo'i napa sangs rgyas//go pA
26a2(rgyud): dang bcas bde ldan grub//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas//gang phyir bde ba las thob//bde ba las thob sangs rgyas ni//bde ba bud med dang bral min//gang du sbyor bral bya ba ni//
26a3(rgyud): 'jig rten nyams pa spang phyir ro//'jig rten gang gis 'dul ba na//de dang de yi sangs rgyas 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sgyu ma'i kar nyid kyis//de dang de nyid tshul gyis//mdo sde
26a4(rgyud): chos mngon thams cad nas//bud med rnams ni smod mdzad pa//sna tshogs slob ma'i snod phyir bshad//de kho na nyid sbas nas gsungs//phung po lnga dang rnam bral ba'i//mya ngan
26a5(rgyud): 'das pa blta bar bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin mas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi sras gang lags/go pA yang
26a6(rgyud): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha mo sgyu 'phrul sras nyid kyang //khro bo gtum po bdag nyid yin//sa 'tsho khyod nyid bcom ldan 'das//shes
26a7(rgyud): rab par phyin bdag nyid me//ji snyed pa yi bud mod kun//khyod kyis tshul nyid 'dir 'dod do//skyes bu bdag gi gzugs de nyid//de bzhin kun tu yongasu grags//'dir ni rang
26b1(rgyud): bzhin gnyis yin to//'gro ba thabs shes bdag nyid//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nyan thos la sogs pa rnams bud med sun 'byin
26b2(rgyud): par byed/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams gnas pa'i//nyan thos la sogs grags kun gyis//bud med la ltos kun ster ba'i//thar pa'i
26b3(rgyud): lam ni mi shes//gang na nye bar gnas gyur pa'i gur gum la sogs rnyed sla na//de la rin ni thob mi 'gyur//gang du ring nas rin chen nyid//thog med me shes sbyor ba yis//
26b4(rgyud): dad pa sman pa'i skye bo 'di//de nyid la ni sems ni 'jug/bdag gi'ang 'di ni rab tu sbas//rtsod pa'i dus la de nyid 'di//sems can re rer bgrangs pa yi//bye ba'i nang na
26b5(rgyud): 'ga' zhig kyang //dud dang brtson pa'i dpung grany+dzan ca na//kun nas de phyir gsungs pa ni//byang chub myur du rab sgrub phyir//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i
26b6(rgyud): dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/mi mo rab tu bsngags pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
26b7(rgyud): khyod ci ste chags pa dang bcas pa'am/chags pa dang bral ba legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdag ni kun te la'ang khyab//kun byed kun gyi 'jig pa'o//
27a1(rgyud): na/na hU~M gzugs 'din sa sar+b+bas te//da po 'dams po khyab bdag da//klung dang gang gis gzugs kyis no//snyoms can gang+gAl byung 'dzin/
27a2(rgyud): 'jug de dang de nyid tshul gyis ni//'jig rten don rgyur bdag gnas//'ga' zhig sangs rgyas grub thob 'gal//la lar chos dang dge 'duno//la ler yi dgos la
27a3(rgyud): la phyugs//l-i ltar dmyal ba'i gzugs can//la ler lha dang lha ma yin//la yar mi yi gzugs can//la lar brtan pa'i gzugs can dang //sna tshogs
27a4(rgyud): gzugs can po tshim med//bdag ni skye sgru ba bud med dang //mi nid ga zugs 'dul la 'o//la chags can la lar sri/la lcer rmos shing la lngar gnong/
27a5(rgyud): ra mo ga ga nag sa ga sas kyi /gnas//'din ni sem m+b+ha bAng+gaH//n+dan du rlung bad med man //ma pa dngos byed
27a6(rgyud): skyed //dku bgag dang rgyun po //na kyigatsu sa yid de zhan/ //sprin na dang na ng+ge dI
27a7(rgyud): da rnamis sdig pa //de la las kyi 'bras nyid dang //'gro na ring bzhin sangs rgyas nyid//kun tu 'dog gi gzugs nyid //ma byur de nyi
27b1(rgyud): dpa' bos//ro mnyam rnam par shes par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa//bcom ldan 'das ci ste khyod kyi gzugs nyid 'di lta bu yin nam/bcom ldan 'das
27b2(rgyud): kyis bka' sprul pa/ji ltar khyod kyis gzugs nyid kyang //rnam pa de ltar kun nas gsungs//bertan drang g.yo bo'i 'gro kun lnga//'dir ni khyod kyis khyab pa po//zhes pa
27b3(rgyud): 'di ni dpa' bo cig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/sna tshogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan
27b4(rgyud): 'das mas gsol pa/sngags rnams kyi ni sgrub pa'i thabs//zhi dang rgyas pa de nyid gsungs//dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor dang //bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang //
27b5(rgyud): drug sel ba dang nang zhi dang //me dang ral gri sogs rengs dang //g.yul du rnam par rgyal ba dang //mkhas pa yi ni mchog nyid dang //gnod sbyin mo sgrub bran dang
27b6(rgyud): ni//pho nya 'byung sogs sgrub thabs dang //dpag med rnam shes nus pa rnams//bdag la nges par gtso bos gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bo ka'i sprul
27b7(rgyud): pa/kyir khyod la mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya//zhes pa dang sgrub pos smra bar bya ste//sangs rgyas nyid stsol cig zhes//de ni sa bcom ldan 'das de'i lus la rab tu
28a1(rgyud): zhugs s+ho//rab tu d+hA gas patsam gyis/lho brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can//mngon par shes pa drug pa/sa bcu gsum gyi dbang phyug/lha
28a2(rgyud): bzhal yas khang nA spyod pa can gyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs brgya stong gis rgyan pa/'dod pa'i gzugs can thams cad mkhyen pa/bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du gyur
28a3(rgyud): to//yang na ral gri dang /mig sman dang /ril bu dang /rkang mgyogs dang /rkang pa'i byug pa dang /rgyal srid dang /'dod pa le longs spyod pa'i dbang phyug
28a4(rgyud): dang /rig pa dang /nor can dang /rig pa la mkhas pa dang /gnod gnas dang /sbyin mo dang /bcud len dang /reg rdo dang /khams smra bo ji ltar mngon par
28a5(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin zhu bar bya ste/de thams cad bcom ldan 'dus kyis ster bar byed do//yang na dpa' bo gcig pa'i ras ris bris la sngon ma bzhin du bsgrub par
28a6(rgyud): bya'o//de la dpa' bo gcig pa'i ri mo ni mi g.yo pi nag po la zhe sdang rdo rje ma su 'khyud pa'o//mi g.yo ba dkar po la gti mug rdo rje ma so//mi g.yo bi ser po
28a7(rgyud): lo phra ma rdo rje ma so//mi g.yo ba dmar po la 'dod chags rdo rje maso//mi g.yo ba lding khu la phra dog rdo rje mas 'khyud pa bri bar bya'o//yang na shes rab dang
28b1(rgyud): bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das gcig pu bri bar bya'o//yang na ri mo la bcom ldan 'das mu lnga po rnams kyi dbus la gcig tu byas la/dor bdag nyid do'i bdag pa
28b2(rgyud): gzugasu bsamase nas sngon bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o//yang na rang gi bude myed lha mo'i gzugasasu bsams nas bsgrub po ro bya'o//grub par gyur na sangs rgyas nyid
28b3(rgyud): kyang ster bar byed na/dngos grub gzhani smos ci dgos/yang na zhabs g.yon brkyang ba ral bri dang zhugs pa bsnams pas bsgrub par bya'o//yung na sems dpa'i skyil
28b4(rgyud): krung /ral gri dang zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa/rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la rol pos bsgrub par bya ste/lhan cig bya'i khro bo gtum po chen pos sngon bzhin du 'grub/
28b5(rgyud): 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi ri mo'i dngos grubo//yang na sku gzugs kyi sgrub thabs kyis kyang 'di nyod bsgrub par bya'o//dri nas ral gri'i sgrub thabs ni yid kyis de'i tshe me
28b6(rgyud): tog dzi ti dang /lcags kyi rang bzhin dang /shing gi snying po'i rang bzhin las sam/ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa byas nas/ba'i rnam pa lngas rab tu bkrus te/dri thams cad kyis
28b7(rgyud): byugs nas yang dag par brtsams te/sngon bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyis yongasu bzung nas/thun mtshams gsum dang zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o//zla ba'i mthar
29a1(rgyud): mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo'i ril po bzlas pa bya'o//tho rangs ral gri 'bar bu 'gyur te/ral ga'i reg pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/lo brgyad gnyis
29a2(rgyud): kyis rnam pa can skra 'khyil pa 'di ni snying po 'dod yon lngas rnam par rol par byed//de bzhin du 'khor lo dang rtse gsum la sogs pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin
29a3(rgyud): du zangs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhags pa bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du bum pa dang /mchil lha ma dang /mchod phyir thogs dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /shes
29a4(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i po ti dang /rgyud kyi po ti la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du rnga pa TA ha dang /rnga bo che dang /pi wang la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin/
29a5(rgyud): du gser gyi rang bzhin las/gnod sbyin dza ma b+hA la dang /nor bu bo zang po dang /gang ba bzang po dang /pi rtsi kuN+Da li la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa
29a6(rgyud): bsgrub par byed//de bzhin du sgyug mo'i rang bzhin las dri bzang bsgrub par bya'o//grog mkhar gyi sa'i rang bzhin las na mkha' lding //thang shing gi rang bzhin las/lha
29a7(rgyud): rnams te/tshangs pa dang /khyaba'i jug dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /dbang po dang /'dod lha la sogs pa rnams//dur khrod kyi sol bas srin po bri bar bya'o//ga Da'i nya
29b1(rgyud): chog pabya yi dbus bya bar bya'o//sgyu tsho gyis mu'o//glang po che'i rang bzhin las tshogs da ga/shrA kho Ta'i shing po rang bzhin las pi lu pa lA sogs pa'i sha za'o//pra bA la'o/
29b2(rgyud): las gots+tshatsau rI la sogs pa byi bar bya'o//mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin las rngam de ba dang /'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa'i ro lang so//nA ga ge sa b+hi shing gi rang bzhin lngas der rgyas
29b3(rgyud): sogs pa'i klu dang klu mo rnamaso//mya ngan med pa'i shing gi rang bzhin las 'phrog ma dang /lha mo sun d+ha rI dang /gur ma dang /dga' ma dang /yid 'ong ma dang /sh+ye ma nu DI dang /pad+mA n+dan+da
29b4(rgyud): dang /rje su tshogs me dang /zla 'od ma dang /tshangs pa'i bu mo dang /'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /mi'i bu mo dang /rA ba ti dang /lta byed ma dang /na ra d+hi ra la sogs pa'i gnod
29b5(rgyud): sbyin mo rnams bsgrub par bya'o//n+ya gro d+ha'i shing gi rang bzhin las dpal lha mo dang /rgyal po'o//thang shing gi rang bzhin las til mchog ma dang /zla ba'i lha mo dang /gsor
29b6(rgyud): phreng ma dang /kur+b+he sa hA rid+d+hi dang /rin chen phreng ba ma dang /ram n+ta dang /ur b+ha shrI dang /dpal gyis brgyan ma dang dga' ma dang /dbang mo la sogs pa ste/lha'i bu mo'i tshogs
29b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /bkra shis dang /lhag pa dang /lha'i bla ma dang /pa ba sangs dang /spen pa dang /sgra can dang /du ba dang /gza' dbu'o//de bzhin du
30a1(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /phyag na rdo rje dang /'dzum dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams//de brdzun du rnam par gzigs dang /gtsug tor
30a2(rgyud): can te/sangs rgyas rnams bsgrub par bya'o//de bzhin du gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa'i 'byung po rnam so//de bzhin du gshin rje la sogs pa 'phags pa'i phinya rnam so//
30a3(rgyud): de bzhin du kaM ka la sogs pa'i bran rnamaso//de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi pho mo rnams bsgrub par bya'o//thams cad dka' sgrub pa byed pa por 'gyuraro//gal te lan cig
30a4(rgyud): gis grub par ma gyur na/de la lan gnyis pa yang bya'o//de'i tshe yang ma grub na gsum pa yang brtsam par bya'o//de lta na yang mi dge ba chen po'i dbang gis gal te ma grub na/
30a5(rgyud): de'i tshe sngon bzhin du dbus mo g.yon pa'i khar rkang pa g.yas pas kyang mnan nas/ji srid ma grub pa de srid bzlas pa bya'o//de nas tshangs pa 'joms pa pos kyang 'grub po//de la
30a6(rgyud): 'dir khro bo gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi sngags kyi nang du byas nas/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hUM phaT/ral gri la sogs pa sgrub na che ge mo bsgrubs shig
30a7(rgyud): ces sbyar bar bya'o//gang gi tshe minan nas/tshig mo la ha na ha no zhes sbyar bar bya'o//de ltar lan gcig brjod pas mtshams med pa lnga po byed pas kyang thams cad sredag
30b1(rgyud): par byed//sarba pA pa mi nA sha ya ti ces sbyar bar bya'o//de bzhin du 'jigs pa thams cad la brjod pa tsam gyis srung bar byed//rak+Sha rak+Sha te zhes brjod par bya'o//de lta bus thams
30b2(rgyud): cad srin po rnams sreg par byedado//de nas rab tu 'bar bzhin pa'i lcagasu bsams nas/nyungs dkar dang /sran mud pa dang /ma/Shi la brgya rtsa brgyad rang gi sngags kyis mngon par
30b3(rgyud): bsngags nas/mkha' 'gro mau la sogs pa rnams la brab par bya'o//thams cad 'bros par byed//'brab pa'i dusu DA ki n+yA di kaM pa sa yo zhes sbyor bar bya'o//yang na thod le kor
30b4(rgyud): gyis kham por so ma btang ba gnyis la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du sngags bris nas kha sbyar te/nyar rgyas dkris nas sgo la bcang bar bya'o//byos pa rnams kyi srung bar byed do//
30b5(rgyud): rak+Sha rak+Sha bA la ka zhes sbyar bar bya'o//spra tshil las bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa byas te/gro ga la sngags mngon par bris nas/de'i snying khar ske tshe la sogs pa
30b6(rgyud): rab tu gzhug par bya'o//de nas tshe ri mas kha la phur bus gdab par bya'o//phyir rgol ba'i kha la phur bus btab par 'gyuraro//lha sbyin gyi mu khaM kI la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//lam
30b7(rgyud): gyi bzhi mdor brkos nas de bzhin du rkang pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o//'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed//lha sbyin gyi rkang po la kA la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//snying la
31a1(rgyud): phur bus btab na khros pa rengs par 'gyuraro//lha sbyin gyi hr-i da yau kI la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//mi'i rus pa'i phur bu 'am/lcags kyi phur bu 'am/
31a2(rgyud): mtshon sbal gyi tsher mas 'ga' zhig gi yan lag la phur bus btab no/de dang de'i phur bus btab pa de zug rngu chen por 'gyuraro//lha byin gyi yan lag che ge mo la kI/
31a3(rgyud): la ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//gang gi khang pa'i sgo ru bskos nas sbas na de skrod par byed//lha sbyin bskrad par gyis shig ces sbyar bar bya'o//dur khrod kyi thal ba la mngon
31a4(rgyud): par bsngagaso nas sgo glegs la gtor na skrod par byed//lha sbyin uts+tsha Da ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//gzugs brnyan la tsher mas btab nas bzlas par bya'o//lha sbyin mA ra
31a5(rgyud): ya zhes sbyar na 'chi bar byed//ral gri la sogs pa la rang gi sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas g.yul du 'jug par byas na rgyal bar 'gyuraro//gang bya
31a6(rgyud): ba'i phyogasu gtor ma byin pas de 'gru'o//sdig pa'i nad la sogs pa la/rma bya'i sgro la rang gi sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdogs nas byab par bya'o//che ga mA~M che
31a7(rgyud): ge ro go nA sha ya zhwa sbyar bar bya'o//nad thaMd zhi bar 'gyuro//de bzhin du mche ba'i dug la sbyar bar bya ste/lag pa'i mthil gnyi su'o//lha sbyin gyi bi She nA sha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//
31b1(rgyud): drug mod por 'gyuraro//de bzhin du gang gi dbang du bya ba la ni rAng gi gnas nas ljongs te gla tsor bu skra grol ba mdun du bsams te 'gyel bar bltas nas bzlas pas dbang
31b2(rgyud): du 'gyuraro//che go mo bdag gi bI sha mU nA ye zhes sbyor bar bya'o//de bzhin du sngon ma bzhin du dgug par bsams nas bzlas pasna 'gugs par byed//che ge mo A kaR+Sha ya
31b3(rgyud): zhes sbyar bar bya'o//bdag nyid kyi nor dang 'bru dang gte ro la sogs pa yongasu gang bar bsams nas bzlas par bya'o//bdag la puSh+TiM ku ru zhes sbyar ba bya'o//rgyas par 'gyur//
31b4(rgyud): sngags 'dis gro gsum gnyis kha sbyar te/dbusu go la'i mdab ma la tsher mar bris te pho ba ris lnga dang bcas pa'i grol zos ni rims thams cad 'joms par byed//sarba
31b5(rgyud): dwe r-i nA shwa ya zhes sbyor bar bya'o//zla ba gzas bzung ba 'am/nyi ma gzas bzung ba la/'o ma'i zan nam zho'i zan gyis lhung zed bkang nas/kAr dang mar dang btsos pa/a
31b6(rgyud): shweshed the'i lo ma bdun gyis stong du bzhag nas/lo ma bdun gyis steng nas g.yogs te/lag pa gnyis kyis bsten nas/ji srid ma grol gyi bar de srid bzlas par bya'o//de zos
31b7(rgyud): pas lo lnga brgya thud//rim pa 'di nyid kyis pa bla 'am/bi wang ngo /ldong ros sam/slang dreg la bsgrub par bya'o//'bar bar gyur na thig le 'am/mig sman gyi rig pa 'dzin
32a1(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//du ba byung na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dro bar gyur na dbang du byed//yang na nA gau gre sbyar gyi shing gi rang bzhin la klu'i rgyal po mtha'
32a2(rgyud): yas bya'o//de chu'i nang du kha thur du bstan nas/gdod na mkhar bltas nas bzlas pa bya'o//ho na ha na a nan taM shI g+haM baR+Sha pa ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//lho yis char
32a3(rgyud): 'beb so//de nA mtha' yas chu nas gton te/'o ma yis khrus byas nas gshegasu gsol bar bya'o//de nas sprin la rnam par bltas nas bzlas par bya'o//char rengs par
32a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro//sarba bA tA br-iSh+Ti stam+b+ha ya zhes sbyar bar bya'o//zhes pa ni phye dang bcas pa'i yi go bcu'i sngags so//de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags
32a5(rgyud): dag gi cho ga dang /snying po'i sngags kyi yang cho ga 'di nyid//dang poro phreng ba'i sngags ke ta ka'i lo me la tsher mas bris nas/gos sngon po dang skud pa dag gis dkris
32a6(rgyud): nas mgo bo 'am/dpung ba 'am/mgul pa'i rgyab bam/g.yon par bcing bar bya'o//kro d+hats+tshe da sa che ge mo dzA raM nA sha ye/zhes pa 'di byis pas rims thams cad 'joms
32a7(rgyud): par byed//'ching ba'i dusu nad pa gdong shar du phyogs par byas nas/nya bsreg pa dang zan dang chang la sogs pas gang ba'i kham por gyis sbyangs nas/'di zo la
32b1(rgyud): rims la sogs pa thams cad myur du phyir dngas shrIg/bcom ldan 'das khro bo gtum po chen po'i bka' 'di nyid kyis song shog/gal te na yang gzhan du mi 'gron/de'i tshe bcom
32b2(rgyud): ldan 'das gtum po khros pa'i ral gris til gyi tshad tsam du gtub par bya'o zhes brjod nas/bden bral gyi mtsham su btang bar bya'o//de nas bde bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin
32b3(rgyud): du nad dang mkha' 'gro ma dang /bar du gcod pa thams cad la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o//'jigs pa thams cad la bklags pa tsam gyi srung bar byed//gzhan yang rtsa
32b4(rgyud): ba'i sngags brjod pas thams cad byed//phreng ba'i sngags gnyis pa la yang cho ga 'di nyid//phreng ba'i sngags gsum pas lhag ma'i chad bu la mngon par bsngags nas sbyin
32b5(rgyud): par bya'o//mchog ster bar 'gyuraro//zan gyi phung pa le mngon par bsngags nas/phyi dro'i dus dben pa'i phyogasu sbyin par bya'o//bya ba gang gi phyogs la des thams cad 'grug/
32b6(rgyud): cho ga lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin//cho ga sngon ma bzhin du dkar po'i chos gcig nas brtsams te de srid nye gang po'i bar ston bzhin du bya'o//phreng po'i sngags rnams kyi stong phrag
32b7(rgyud): bcus sngon du bsnyen par bya'o//lha rnams kyi bye brag gi sngags rnams rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga bzhin du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin//
33a1(rgyud): de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi'o//khyad par du phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pas/stan dngags mkhan dang paN+Di tA nyid du myur du 'gyuraro//rmya ba'i sngags
33a2(rgyud): gsum pa'i rgyo ba'o//mal gyi steng du lag pa g.yon pas ling ga bzung nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o//gang gi ming gang yin pa de 'ong bar byed 'dod par bya'o//
33a3(rgyud): sngags ni/oM bo he ri che ge mo A yA tu hUM hUM phaT/btsag gis b+ha gA la kun nas byugs nas/sa la lag pa g.yon pas brten nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o//gang
33a4(rgyud): gi ming yin pa de 'ong bar 'gyur ro//nyung sau kar la lan bdun du mngon pa bsngags nas skyes bu la bsnun par bya'o//nad dang bral bar 'gyur//yid kyis brtag
33a5(rgyud): pabar bya'o//chu la yongasu bzlas nas bsnun na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro//gos la yongasu bzlas nas bsnun na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro//lan+da tshwa la yongasu
33a6(rgyud): bzlas nas gung gi rkang pa'i sgren mo la byin na de dbang du byed//ba lang gi spu'i thag pa sngags kyis mingon par bsngags nas gang gi mgul du bcings pa de ba
33a7(rgyud): ling du 'gyur ro//nyi ma la mngon par phyogs nas gang gi mang nas mngon par bzlas pa de 'ong bar 'gyuraro//zhum bu'i spu'i thag pa gang gi mgul par bcings pa de
33b1(rgyud): zhum blar 'gyur//byA rAg gi rgyus pa'i srad bus byA rog+sa tu 'gyur//skyes pa'i sgra'i srad pus skyes bur 'gyur//bud med kyi hU~M da da nod du 'gyur//de btsun du gung dang
33b2(rgyud): gang gi spu la sogaso pa'i srad bris byas pas nga dong de'i gzugs nyid du 'gyur//gang gis ming gi bzlas na de'i khrag 'gug so//myig mi 'dzum par bam+b+ha zhing 'di bzlas pa
33b3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyu ro zhes pa ni lha mo'i sngags kyi cho ga'o//gtor ma'i sngags kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o//nad dang bgegs la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi bar/
33b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro//gtor ma phul nas bya ba gang la zhugs na de 'grub par 'gyur ro//me tog dkar po'i kham gror dang /'o mra'i kham phyor dang /dri bzangs kyi chu'i kham phor dang /
33b5(rgyud): zho zan gyi kham por te/khram phor bzhi po 'di rnams shing thog dang nye bo'i shing zlog gis rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan mo oM tsaN+Da mahA roSha Na i maM ba liM gih+Na gr-ih+Na bdag gI bya ba
33b6(rgyud): che ge mo bsgrubs shig hU~M phaT/zhes pa brgya na bi rgyad bsngags nas dben pa'i phyog su bsgrubs pas de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'grug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sdug
33b7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brjid bzlas nas/che ba'i mar nag gi sgyu mo ma'i b+ha ga'i nang du mnye bar bya'o//'thungs na yang rab tu bde ba skye bar 'gyur//de bzhin du 'dis rma la byugs na ya
34a1(rgyud): bde bar 'gyuraro//zos pas kyang thams cad du'o//dang por phreng ba'i sngags kyis srog la rgyu skyes 'dub ma bcu drug pa'i dbusu bri bar bya'o//srad bu ston
34a2(rgyud): bos dkris nas lus la bcangs na thams cad du sbyang bar 'gyur//gi wang ngam rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bya'o//'di ni gnyis pa'o//de bzhin du rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i
34a3(rgyud): g.yang dedi nyid kyi sbyor bas sgyur bar bya'o//rnal 'byor pa'i bsgoms pa'i mthu yis de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//zhes pa ni dpe'i blo gcig pa nyid gsungs pa'i
34a4(rgyud): dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba skye bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das mes gsol pa/rnal 'byor sdom pa
34a5(rgyud): gang gis bzhag spyod pa'i tshul yang ci 'dri zhig/gang gis dngos grub legs par 'thob/bye ba khyab bdag gsung bar mdzod//bcom
34a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas bston pa su ni 'byin pa'i//nges par gdug can bsad par bya//de rnams nyid kyi nor blangs nas//sems can rnams la
34a7(rgyud): pan phyir spyad//yugs so mo kun nges par bsten//gzhan yang ma dang bu mo dang //sha deng nya sha bza' bar bya//mnyam gzhag nas ni chang ni btung //rang gzhan dag
34b1(rgyud): gi brdzun dang ni//nyes pa de bcab bsam gtan mchog/bdag nyid rnam par mi rtog bslab//sbas pa rab sbyor nyid las 'grub//gang gang sdig pa de nyid kyis//sem+ba can rnams ni 'og
34b2(rgyud): tu 'gro//de dang dro yi thabs kyis ni//rnal 'byor myur du dngos grub mchog/de nas bcom ldan 'das mo zhe sdang rdo rje mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di nyid gsol to//bcom ldan
34b3(rgyud): 'das khyod kyis ji ltar sdom pa phyin ci log tu gsungs/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mes tshig pa la me yis bdug/'dod chags kyis bstan 'dod chags
34b4(rgyud): kyis//dug gis bsnun la dug nyid kyis//thabs ni rab tu sbyor la so//'gro ba rang bzhin med bsgoms nas//bdag gi dngos grub zhes bsgom pa//shin tu sbas pa kun nas
34b5(rgyud): spyad//sus kyang ji ltar mi shes bya//sdig pa thams cad zad byas nas//phyin ci log gis 'di nyid 'grub//rnal 'byor de nyid gcig sbyor mchog/gang zhig sbed par mi byed na//
34b6(rgyud): sdom pa phyin ci log 'di yi//de yi dngos grub yod ma yin//sdig pa med cing bsod nams med//rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin las//'jig rten 'phya ba bsal ba'i phyir//
