34b7(rgyud): bdag gis la por ma byaso//da ni bden par gsung mdzad pa//gtum po'i tshul gyis dga' ma kye//rnal 'byor 'jig rten gzhug pa'i phyir//sems can kun gyi don rgyud
35a1(rgyud): ts+tshan+darnams//rabs pa sdom pa shadu pa sa//da ni dga' mkhyod nyon cig/srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing //pha rol nor ni srog mo b+ha//badz+ran
35a2(rgyud): tshig kyang sgra mi bya//blo ldan chang ni btung mi bya//'jig rten spyod pa spang bar bya//rab gsal bsgrub pa'i gnas 'di ni//gus pa dang bcas spyad par bya//don sdom pa
35a3(rgyud): tshul gsungs pa//'di yi spyod pa bshad par bya//mgo bo la ni dbu rgyun bya//rna ba dag la rna rgyano//de bzhin rang lus nyid la ni//sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan par bya//
35a4(rgyud): rkang pa dag la rkang gdug/de bzhin rked pa rgod rgyun//de bzhin lag g.yas ral gri dang //g.yon du zhags pa bzung bar bya//sangs rgyas lnga ni rab sbyor bas//mgo
35a5(rgyud): dbu rgyan phyag rgya bya//zur phud lnga yis rgyun byas nas//sgra dang kha spu breg par bya//lo ni bcu gnyis gsang spyod bya//tshe phyed kun nas yang dag skye/sngon gsung rigs kyi
35a6(rgyud): dbye bo yig//gzhonu ma rnams rab tu bod+b+hag/bu mo la ltos rgyun gyis ni//rtag tu yang ni brgyan par bya//g.yos par gr-i gug sbyin bya zhing //g.yon pa ru yang ka pA la//
35a7(rgyud): rigs kyi dbye bas nges par bya//kha dog dbye bas lus la'o//rang rigs shes rab bzung byas nas//yong na gzhan rigs menya mo gzhag nas//rang 'dod yang dag
35b1(rgyud): bzung nas ni//spyod pa 'di ni yang dag brtsam//rin chen la sogs med gyur na//rdzas la sogs pa sprul paso//gal te rab 'jug ma rnyed na//yang na sems kyis bsgrub par
35b2(rgyud): bya//rigs lnga'i rab tu dbye ba las//dam tshig lnga la spyad par bya//de ni sngon gsungs sbyor ba yis//phan tshun gnyis gnyis brtsam par bya//'dir ni bya ba gzhon mi
35b3(rgyud): bornam//rnam kun rnal 'byor dngos grub thob//thebs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas//yigu gsum sen mo sbyin par bya//'o dang 'khyud pa nyid dang ni//kun gyi nor ni khu
35b4(rgyud): ba nyid//sbyin pa'i phyi rol phyin rdzogs par//de nyid the tshom med par 'gyur//lus ngag yid ni de mchog tu//bde bla yang dag sdom pa ni//tshul khrims pha rol phyin zhes bya//
35b5(rgyud): sen mo gdob pa bzod pa yis//yi ge gsum gyis btsir ba nyid//'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol phyin//gus pa dang bcas dus ring du//shin tu bde bas mnyam gnas bya//brtson
35b6(rgyud): 'grus pha rol phyin shes bya//sems nyid bde ba de sbyor las//dngos po kun gyi gzugs kyis ni//bsam gtan pha rol phyir par 'dod//bud med tshul gyis bsgom pa
35b7(rgyud): nyid//shes rab pha rol phyin mar grags//shin tu dgo' cig sbyor tsam gyis//pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs 'gyur//pha rol phyin lnga bsod nams dang //shes rab ye shes
36a1(rgyud): zhes byar gsungs//shin tu dga' sbyor ma tshungs ldan pa//rnal 'byor pa yi tshogs gsum 'gyur//bsod nams ye shes dang ldan na//skad TI
36a2(rgyud): tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//dper na 'khri shing las byung ba'i//me tog 'bras bu dang ldan ltar//skad ci gra gcig gis rdzogs byang chub//tshogs gnyis las ni yang
36a3(rgyud): dag byung //sa ni bcu gsum dbang phyug du//de ni the tshom med par 'gyur//sa ni rab dga' zhes bya dang //dri med de bzhin 'od byed dang //'od 'phro ba dang sbyang dka' dang //
36a4(rgyud): mngon gyur ring gyur mi g.yo ba//legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin//kun tu 'od dang de bzhin du//dpe med pa dang ye shes spyan//bcu gsum zhes bya 'di rnamaso zhes
36a5(rgyud): pa ni dpa' bo cag pa nyid du gsungs pa'i khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/spyod pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o////de nas 'khor der byang chub
36a6(rgyud): sems dpa' kun tu bzang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//ci phyir mi g.yo ba zhes bya//dpa' bo cig nyid zhes bya dang /
36a7(rgyud): khrotshan dadam pa zhes pa yang //mngon pa yi bdon du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnga mo dang shes rab mnyom skyong bas//nad rdo ra
36b1(rgyud): gzugs nyid ni//thabs dung shes rab badrug nyid can//de yang chags thul gyis mi gru'o//de nyid phyir na mi g.yor grags//rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin can//zhal gcig
36b2(rgyud): phyag gnyis zhi ba ste//sdig pa dang bral dri med yid//ral gri zhags pa'i phyag dag ni//shes rab mor 'khyud de mchog/sems dpa'i skyil krung gris bzhugs pa//
36b3(rgyud): zla ba nyi gnas la//kun nas 'khor bar gnas pa yin//lce yi bde bso shin tu gnas//de phyir 'dri ni mi g.yor gsungs//sangs rgyas kun gyis sten pa ste/mi g.yo
36b4(rgyud): ba yi mthu nyid kyis//dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis ni//sems can don ni mdzad pa'i phyir//sgrub byed nye byar mtshon pa'o//de nas kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/
36b5(rgyud): yig gis ni ci zhig bstan//tsaM yog gis ni ci zhig brjod//la yig kyang nI ci la brjod//ji ltar ming ni yang dag bsdus//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
36b6(rgyud): a yig lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul//dngos med ngo bo nyid du gsungs//tsa yig dga' dang mchog dga' dang //khyad pa dga' ba nyid dang ni//lhan cig skyes drug
36b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i//dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gsungs//la yig la la na ru rol//shin tu bde bar gsungs pa'o//e yig gis ni shes rab brjod//tsa yog gis ni
37a1(rgyud): thab su bshad//thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor bas//la yig bde ba'i lak+Sha NaM//de nyid dpa' da cig pa nyid//cig phyir gcig pa nyid du
37a2(rgyud): gsungs//chags bral 'joms phyir dpa' bo ste//dpa' bo cig pa zhes gsungaso//gtum po 'di ni shin tu no//de ni khro bo chen por gsungs//khro bor shes bya ro Sha
37a3(rgyud): Na//bdud kun rnam par 'joms par byed//tshags bral tsaN+DA zhes bya'o//shin tu chags chen bdud sogs las//de la khro bo ro Sha Nas//gdul dka' chags bral
37a4(rgyud): dgra bo la//g.yon pa'i long bus mnan par bya//tshangs pa'i tshig lo mnyam gnas nas//khro bo'i mche bas mchu bsdam bya//phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pas//
37a5(rgyud): 'bad pas shes rab la 'khyud bya//chags bral kun+da nas gzhom byas na//dngos grub sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i
37a6(rgyud): dpal khro bo gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/e tsa la'i don gyi rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rje mas gsol pa/
37a7(rgyud): dpa' bo gcig pa ji ltar 'grug/dbang phyug mchog gis bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/a
37b1(rgyud): yig las sbyor skad cig gis//mi g.yo nag por bsgom par bya//de nyid bstan pa'i stobs nyid las//rnal 'byor sangs rgyas the tshom med//mi g.yo dkar po sgom pa dang /
37b2(rgyud): yang na se ro po 'am dmar po 'am//yang na ljang ku sgom byas nas//zhe sdang rdo rje ma sogs ldan//dbu su mi g.yo lnga rnams kyis//gzung nas gcig tu rnam par sgom/
37b3(rgyud): shes rab de yis rigs can ma//yang nu gzhin yang bsgom par bya//de yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor pas//myur du dngos grub the tshom med//yang na shes rab dang bral ba'i//
37b4(rgyud): shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgom par bya//mi g.yo sgom pa yongs rdzogs na//byang chub rgyal srid yang dag thob//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/lha yi rnam par
37b5(rgyud): dag pa gang //'dren pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal//sngon du gsungs nyid dkyil 'khor rnams//gtso bo bdag la rnam dag gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
37b6(rgyud): stsal pa/de nas kun gyi sbyong byed pa'i//rnam dag bdag gis rab bshad bya//de la gru bzhi pa ni tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi'o//skyo bzhi ni bden pa bzhi'o//rta babs bzhi
37b7(rgyud): ni bsam gtan bzhi'o//ko ba brgyad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadado//'phar ma gcig pa ni sems rtse cig pa nyid//pad+ma ni skye gnaso//kha dog sna tshogs
38a1(rgyud): pa ni sprul pa sna tshogs pa'o//lha dgu ni grwa sung rab yan lag dgu'o//phyogs dmar po ni 'dod chags chen po'o//mtsham su dkar po
38a2(rgyud): dang /ser po dang /ljang ku dang /nag po rnams ni bram ze dang /rje rigs dang /rgyal rigs dang /dmangs rigs rnams nyid//zla ba dang nyi ma ni/khu ba dang rdulo//
38a3(rgyud): dbus kyi ral gri ni mi g.yo ba nag po'i mtshan ma'o//gri gug ni zhe sdang rdo rje ma'o//shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams ni mi g.yo ba dkar po la sogs pa rnamaso///
38a4(rgyud): me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'o//zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa'o//sgom pa'i rnam par dag pa brjod par bya
38a5(rgyud): ste/dang po mchod pa ni/bsod nams kyi tshogs khyad par 'phags pa'i laso//stong pa nyid ni ye shes kyi tshogs 'chi ba khyad par 'phags pa dri ma med pa'i lus te//
38a6(rgyud): kl-i ba'i lus//gzhal yas khung gi mthar thug po sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//pad+ma ni skye gnas//zla ba nyi ma ni dkar dmado//hUM yig ni ma dang phra'i dbus dri za'i sems so//
38a7(rgyud): mi bskyod pa ni pha'o//mA ma kI ni ma'o//phan tshun du rje su cha gos pa mthong nas pho la rnam par zhe sdang zhing /ma la rje su tshogs nas gti mug pas sems can bzhin du
38b1(rgyud): 'jug go/pad+mar zhugs pa'i bu yI pha bskyed nas de'i go 'phang 'tho'o//ma bzung nas skye ba mtha' med pa'i bag chags kyi bde ba khyad par 'phags pas de yang bur skye bar byedado//
38b2(rgyud): bu mo ni yang mi g.yo ba dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang /gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa yangango //bu rnams kyang pho bsad nas gzhan la bgrod par byed de/'odi nyid dgra/
38b3(rgyud): bo zhes de gsod par byed//bu mo rnams kyang skye ba mtha' med pa'i bag chags kyi bde ba khyad par 'phags pas 'dod par byed//ral gri shes rab la zhugs pa ni thabs///
38b4(rgyud): yang na zhags pa shes rab yaM ral+ya gri thab so//gnyis ka ro cig tu gyur pa ni bsdigs mdzub//g.yon pa 'og tu bltas pa ni sa 'og bdun skyong bar byed pa'o//g.yas pa
38b5(rgyud): steng du bltas pa ni tshangs pa'i sgo de bdun skyong bar byed pa'o//pus mo g.yon pa sa la gtsugs pa ni sa skyong bar byed pa'o//g.yas pa rkang pos yang dag par bsnun pa ni
38b6(rgyud): bdud thams cad skrag par mdzad pa'o//phung po'i bdud tshangs pa/nyon mongs pa'i bdud dbang phyug/'chi bdag gi bdud khyab 'jug/lha'i bu'i bdud lha'i dbang po'o//sa ni
38b7(rgyud): sa steng mtha' dge gi gzhon nu ma la longs spyod pa'o//gzhon nu ma la yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir pad+ma'i gad no//skye gnos la skyes pa ni zla ba dang nyi mo'i gdano//khu ba dang
39a1(rgyud): rdul las skyes pa'i skyes du ni dngos po'o//bud myed ni dngos po med pa'o//nag po ni rnam par shes pa'o//dkur b+ho ni gzugaso//sor po ni tshor ba'o//
39a2(rgyud): dmar po ni 'du shesngo//ljing ku ni don yod grub pa'o//yang na mthon khaM ni na mkha'o//dkar po ni chu'o//ser po ni smra'o//dmar pa ni me'o//ljang ku ni rlung //bcom ldan
39a3(rgyud): 'das ji lta ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'o//yang na mthing khwa ni chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye sheso//dkar po ni mAM long lta bu'i ye shrI sa//ser po ni
39a4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye sheso//dam re bo ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes//ljang gu ni bya ba sgrub pa'i lce shesngo//ston pa rgyal ba cig pu nyid//hU~M yi tshul gyis yang dag gnas//
39a5(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin nyid kyang //rnam lnga'i tshul gyis yang dag gnas//zhes pa ni dpa' bo cig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las
39a6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/'jig rten ji ltar skye ba dang //slar yang skye bo de ltar mdzad
39a7(rgyud): dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur ba yang //dbang phyug mchog gis bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mo rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed//'du
39b1(rgyud): byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shos pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/mi dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mchod drugaskye mched drug gi rkyen gyis rog pa/reg pa
39b2(rgyud): rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred po'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye bo/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang //
39b3(rgyud): smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngalnga ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnamaso//de lta bu nyid las 'dir sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa kun nas
39b4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du mi rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed 'ag go/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gago/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzur
39b5(rgyud): 'gag go/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gago/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gago//reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gago//tshor ba 'gags
39b6(rgyud): pas sred pa 'gago/sred pa 'gags pas len po 'gago/len pa 'gogs pas srid pa 'gago//srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gago//skye ba 'grags pas rga shi dang /mya ngan
39b7(rgyud): dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du 'dir sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
40a1(rgyud): po 'ba' zhig 'gug par 'gyuraro//rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'jig rten skye'o//de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas 'gag
40a2(rgyud): tshul gnyis po 'di rtogs shing yang gnyi su med pa bsgoms pas 'gru'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ma rig pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bshad
40a3(rgyud): du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'das pa la sogs rab dbye bas//'di ni gsum gyi 'khor mor 'jug/'dir ni rgyal bas chos rnams kun//
40a4(rgyud): rnam pa bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsungs//de la ma rig pa ma spangs pas len pa dang 'chi ba'i nang du gzugs nub pa'i sems kyi lus can zhes pa'i dono//de las 'du
40a5(rgyud): byed du 'gyuraro//de yang rnam pa gsum ste/de la lus kyi 'du byed dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag dang /ngag gi 'du byed dag dang /rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go//yid
40a6(rgyud): kyi 'du byed 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug+na rnamaso//de rnams dang ldan pa ni de ma rig pa ste/dbugs 'byung ba dang /dbugs rngub pa ste/rnam par rtog pa ni rags
40a7(rgyud): par 'dzin par byed//rnam par dpyod pa ni phra mor 'dzin par byed//rjesu chags pa dang zhe sdang ba yang yin no//de las rnam par shes par gyur pa rnam pa drug ste/
40b1(rgyud): mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par
40b2(rgyud): shes pa ste/de rnams dang ldan pa ni ma rig pas lta bar byed//nyin par byed//snom par byed/za bar byed/reg par byed/rnam par rtog par byed//de las ming dang gzugs
40b3(rgyud): te/tshor ba ming bzhi la sogs pa rnamaso//gzugs po gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zhes gnyisu mngon par bsdus shIng bsdoms nas ming dang gzugs zhes gsungaso//
40b4(rgyud): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i gzugs kyis ma rig pa yongasu gyur pa zhes pa'i dono//de la tshor ba rnam pa gsum ni bde ba dang /sdug bsngal dang /sdug bsngal yang ma
40b5(rgyud): yin bde ba yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o//'du shes ni dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gzung ba'i mthar mngon par brjod pa ste/'du byed ni spyi'i khyad par gyi gnas skabs la
40b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa can gyi sems dang sems las 'byung ba rnamaso//rnam par shes pa ni sngon du gsungs pa bzhi no//'byung ba chen po bzhi'i bdog nyid kyi gzugs ni/sa ni lci
40b7(rgyud): ba nyid dang /chu ni gsher ba nyid dang /mngon par 'dzag pa nyid//me ni dro ba nyid//rlung ni bskum brkyang ba dang /yang ba dang /g.yo ba nyid//de las skye mched drug po
41a1(rgyud): rnams ni mig dang /rna ba dang /sku dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid do//de rnams dang ldan pa ni/sngon bzhin du blta bar byed pa la sogs pa'o//
41a2(rgyud): de las reg pa'o//gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos kyi khams yang dag par thob pa'i//de las sred pas bde ba mngon par 'dod pa'o//
41a3(rgyud): las len pa'o//de las thob pa'i laso//de las srid pa mngal du 'jug pa'o//de las skye ba rab tu gsal bar byed pa mngon par rgyu 'thun par byed pa'o//mngal gyi
41a4(rgyud): phung po lnga 'thob po//de nas mngal nas skye bar 'gyur ro//'chi ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'gog pas/de nas rga shi'i sems mya ngan dang 'khrug pa med
41a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//grol na bdag gis smre sngags 'don pa tsho lnga bar mi 'gyur ro zhes//nad la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pas 'gyur ro//de nyid la yang dang yang du yid
41a6(rgyud): sbyor bas yid myi bde ba can yin//yid mi bde ba can gyis bar du gcod pas 'khrug pa can yin//'di'i don ni ma rig pa la de la son pa skye mched drug gi mthar
41a7(rgyud): zlog pas bar do'i sems can gcig nyid du gnas pas/'jig rten gsum po lta zhing lta bar byed//pho mo rjesu chags pa la de las 'das po'i skye ba'i las gang
41b1(rgyud): sa 'angangs nas gang TIg tu skye ba tsun par 'gyuraro//de'i skye ba ni phyi mo dag gi dga' ba dag la lta bar byed pas/de'i shin tu bdag gi reg pa spyong //de la gal tu
41b2(rgyud): skyes bur 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdog nyid skyes bu'i rnam par lci bar byed//sems mye lce mchog tu tshugs par 'gyuraro//yang pha la sems zhe sdang chen por 'gyur/'dod
41b3(rgyud): tshogs dang zhi sdang dag gi bde ba dang /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba l-i/de las 'di yis lhan cig byed pa gang gis dga' bar byed//zhes sems par byed pas/sdug
41b4(rgyud): bsngal yang ma yin badri ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor bya'o//de yis gdong phyir ldog pa'o////de nas sngon gyi las kyi rlung gis 'phangs pa'i skyed pa chen po
41b5(rgyud): de le bdag nyid dga' bar bya'o zhes zhen pa'i cha yiso//gang zhig skyes bu yin ni rang gi ma la 'dod par bya'o snyam nas/sems skur mdo' bzhin du pha'i mgo bo'i lam
41b6(rgyud): nas rab tu zhugs nas/de'i khu ba la gnas nas sems gnas po'i phyir rnam par shes pa bde ba la tshugs pas bdag nyid lta bar byed//bde ba'i rgyus nye bar len
41b7(rgyud): par byed//de nas khu ba dang ro gcig tu gyur pas chags pa chen pos rje su chags pas a ba d+hU tI'i rtsa ba'i rdo rje'i lam nas ma'i pad+ma'i bu ga'i gnas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang
42a1(rgyud): phyug ma'i rtsa mangs gyi skyo ba'i rtsal gnas nas 'dzag pa'i sems na du de las sbyab na//du yang ngom pa bzhin mor mer pa dang /klung
42a2(rgyud): glang po dang /tAr tAr po dang /'khrung 'gyur dang /yan lag gi lag tu gyur pa'i bu ni zla ba dgu 'am/btsu nas lam gang nyid nas rab tu zhugs pa de nyid kyi lam
42a3(rgyud): nas skye bar 'gyur//gal te yang bud med du 'gyur na/de'i tshe sems pa la rje su chags par 'gyuro//ma la sems zhe sdang bar 'gyur//de nas bdag nyid ma'i/
42a4(rgyud): gzugs la lci bar byed//rnam par shes bre ma'i mgo blo'i lam nas pad+mar rab tu zhugs nas pho'i khu ba dang 'dres par gyur nas de'i skye ba'i rtsa la gnas nas/

42a6(rgyud): de bzhin du de rnams kyang /sdug bsngal lnga 'khor zhing 'jug pa'i phung po lnga po rnamaso//thar pa don du gnyer ba rnams la/ma rig pa li sogs pa phung po'i rang

42b1(rgyud): drahA//de phyir thar pa'i bsam pa med cing /med pa'i bsam pa yang mod pa'o//de'i phyir dngos po med pA dang bral ba'i thabs dang shes rab yang dag par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen
42b2(rgyud): bo'i gzugs ca ni/dpal ldan mgon po mi g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can dga' ba bzhi'i sku cana?/srid pa de mya ngan las 'dres pa la rab tu mi gnas pa'i thugs can//

42b7(rgyud): rab tu 'phel bar byed nus dang //nod dang rgas pa 'joms pa dang //bud med yid ni dbang gyur dang //mo sham nyid du bya ba dang //khu ba bcing dang khrag 'bab pa'o//
43a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yang ni bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan+da 'das kyis bka' sprul pa//lA m+bo legs legs par byas//khyod kyis du la bstsal/

43a3(rgyud): ni dkar byas la//tshon gyi kha dog mchog 'bar lhur//'bras bu gsum gyi thang bzung nas//yAM bak+Sha ra ba lA Shau ka/bza' bye bu ram dang bcas btung //srin
43a4(rgyud): bu ma zhu rob sbyangs nas//ke ta kye khu mar khu dang //hi la mo tsi tsis sun d+ha ba//btung bya byugs nas nyi ma se bdug/shig dang srin bral lu su 'gyur//ke ta kya khu
43a5(rgyud): til mar dang //lanu tshwa dang byas btung byas nas//nyi mi la 'chag sbyor ba yis//lan tshwa rnams ni nyams par 'gyur//hi li mi ci khu cung zad//swen d+ha ba dang
43a6(rgyud): yang dag ldan//gli ga ma la ni gnas byos na//mkhris pa rnams ni sel bar byed//ke ta kye khu te la dang //kr-i tsam+b+ha la b+hu 'o ma//btung ba'i sbyor ba 'di
43a7(rgyud): nyid ni//tshil ni spyod par the tso med//pheM tha saM myug khu ba dang //lan tshwar bcas pa po tung byas na/srin bu phra mo 'joms par byed//'u sus bad kan sbrang snas
43b1(rgyud): 'thung //re ra'ang nyi ma gnyis bya//nyes pa sbyangs nas phyi nas brtsam//de yis de nyid 'bras bu ster/dga' ma gzhan du de 'bras med//mon tsar shun phyi mya yi//thug pa
43b2(rgyud): tsha mo btung bar bya//lan bdun du ni bsngagros byas naso//snga 'am ni zas du su//nyin re ji bzhin ji srid 'tsho re//shu kra sho Ni 'phel bar 'gyur//au tsaN+Da ma hA r-i Sha

44a1(rgyud): ma ho yaM//mar gsar byugs pas lang ga 'phel//d+hu tu ra khu rta dri'i co//ma nurarA nas ma he'i mar dang bsros//d+hA tu ra yi 'bras nang du//nyin mtshan
44a2(rgyud): du ni bzhag par bya//de nas ling gA ma he yi//mar gyis lan gcig brtan par nyed//sngon bzhin du ni zhag gsum du//byugs shing mnyes pas 'phel bar byed//
44a3(rgyud): in tra go pa'i phye ma dang //ma he'i mar gyis bsgrub par bya//yo ni'i nad du byugs gyur nA//yo ni lhod pa dam par 'gyur//pad+ma'i ze 'bru ud pa la 'bru//pad rtsi u
44a4(rgyud): shri ra drang ni//mon lug til mar nang du btso//de yis b+ha ga ling ga dag/dri dran dang ni lhod pa dang //nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed//nim pa'i shun pa'i thang

44a6(rgyud): shul sh+thak+ShA ra Na cig yA bak+Sha ra cha tsog dang //chu shing kA ra cha cig dang //chu rlung mnyes nas byugs tsam gyis//b+ha gA mtshan dang skyes gnas kyi//spu ni ltung bar byed pa yin//
44a7(rgyud): de nas hi la ha la'i sbrul//mjug ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas//che be til mar zhag bdun bzhag/de yis ling ga sogs mnye//slar yang spu ni 'byung mo 'gyur//
44b1(rgyud): mai hai phag dang glang chenA dang //karko Ta yi zhag dang tshil//nu ma la sogs nyed byos 'phel//sna ma'i me tog til dang btags//b+ha ga la ni grul byas na//steng du mtho bar byed
44b2(rgyud): pa yin//ma he yi ni mar gsar dang //shu thag ru rta ba lA dang //nA ga ba~M las nyed byas na//nu mo 'phel bar byed pa yin//chu dron gyis ni khrus byas la//ling go sngon//
44b3(rgyud): bzhin 'phel ba nyams//dAr+N+Na ud pa la rtsa ba dang //ba yi mar da btung byas na//dus ldan dus la sbrum par 'gyur//d+he dri'i rtsa ba mar btungs na//sbyi ma nyid du
44b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin//ba la a tI ba laM dang //ka ra dang /til dang /ma kI ka'i sgong drang bcas pa be tungs na sbrum par 'gyur ro//ba bla'i rtsa ba chu dang btags nas btungs na/

44b6(rgyud): rtsa ba dung tsAn+da ma'i rna ba la btags na sbrum par 'gyur ro//ka laM byi'i lo ma zlos na khams 'phe lo//sbrang dang zho zos na khams 'phe lo//dkar mar zos na khams 'phelo//
44b7(rgyud): bud med kyi dri chen dang chu mnyes nas btungs na khu ba 'phel lo//s+phu ru ra'i phye ma chu'am mar dang sbrang dang phyi dro zos na/mig gno nu dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed//sgyur
45a1(rgyud): ra'i bye ma til phye ma dang mnyam po mar dang sbrang bza' bar byas na yang 'bras bu de ji lta ba bzhi no//ga ra kha tan nu lI rtsa ba dang /ta dI dang /til dang /
45a2(rgyud): nas dang /bu ram ro mnyam por byas nas bza' ba zos na/gzhon nur 'gyuraro//a rdzu na'i shun pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang nyin re zhing bza' bar byas ne lo gcig sbyor bas tshe
45a3(rgyud): lo sum brgya'o//skyu ru ra'i khu bo srang gcig dang /ba ku so mar dza'i phye ma zho gnyis tho rangs btungs na/zhu ba dang ma'i bza' ba zos na/zla ba gcig byas ni tshe lo lnga
45a4(rgyud): brgya 'tsho'o//bA gu tsi zho gnyis dang /dar ba dang /tsa ba mo 'o ma dang /gang dang yang rung ba dang btung ba nA zla ba drug gi sbyor bas gzhon nur 'gyur ro//muN Da ra'i phyi
45a5(rgyud): ma mar dang zos ni/zhag bdun phrag gsum gyis lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam par 'gyur ro//sa na bi dza'i phye ma srang gcig dang rak+ta shA la srang gcig dang /ba kha~M
45a6(rgyud): dog gcig pa'i 'o ma kham phor do btso bar bya'o//dang por 'o ma kham phor gang zad pa dang blangs nas/sa na la sogs pa de la byin nas btso bar bya'o//de nas bza'
45a7(rgyud): bar bya'o//sman zhu nas 'o ma dang bza' bar bya'o//rlung dang nyi ma spangs te zhag bdun phrag gsum du ji srid ji lta ba de bzhin du phyin nas bya'o//de nas skra la sogs pa
45b1(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyuraro//slar yang skyo bar 'gyur ro//de nas skra dkar dang gnyer ma bral nas lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//ruk+ta uts+tshu Ta'i rtsa ba dang /mar dang /sbrang rnams zhum bu'i
45b2(rgyud): lag pa tsam bza' bar bya'o//'di'i 'bras bu de bzhin nyi//skyu ru ra dang /a ru ra dang /b+h+ring gI bla dza dang /pi pi ling dang /bo ba ri sa dang /lcags kyi phye ma rnams spyang
45b3(rgyud): dang /ka ra dag dang /u dum pa ra'i 'bras bu'i ched tsam ril bu byas nas/de nas ril bu re re nyin re zhing bza' bar bya'o//zla ba gcig gis lo sum po rgya 'chi'o//gzhon
45b4(rgyud): nu ma srang gcig dang /mar dang bcas pa bza' bar bya'o//zhag bdun gyi tshe lo brgya'o//nas dang /til dang /rta dri dang /nA ga bi la dang /bai ShA dang /bu ram dang
45b5(rgyud): bza' bar bya'o//stobs chen por 'gyuraro//b+ha dra la'i phyi ma sum 'gyur dang /a ru ra dang /de bzhin du chu la sogs pa dang bza' bar bya'o//stobs chen por 'gyu ro//
45b6(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid lha'i rnam par bsgoms nas gtum po'i sngags kyi sman yang dag par byin gyis brlab par bya'o//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs
45b7(rgyud): pa'i dpal gtum po chen po'i rgyud las/khams la sogs pa 'phel ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
46a1(rgyud): oM rAN+Da'i rtsa ba rang sgyur la btags nAs spyi bo mnyes na/mgo bo'i zug rngu zhi bA rA 'gyur ro//ra dang ba dang mi'i chu bsres nas rgya ma tshwa dang bcas
46a2(rgyud): pas rna ba bkang na rna ba'i nad zhi bar 'gyuraro//sdom skam po til mor du bcug nas/kra Ta ki dra nga?/pi pi lI dang /skyu ru ra dang /yung ba dang /zil pa'i chu la ril bu
46a3(rgyud): byas nas de yis mig sman byas na/mig nad thams cad sel bar byed//sbrang dang pi pI ling gi mig sman gyis kyang //rna lpags dang sbrang gis mig sman byas na srong
46a4(rgyud): ling sel bar byed//g+ho ShaM pha lAM gi dri ma snon zhing /kaM ko laM ko'i rtsa ba dang /sbrang gi chu dang /sna yis btung bar byas na mkhris nad mig ser sel bar byed//le
46a5(rgyud): brgan rtsi'i khu bo dang /dur ba'i khu ba dang /se 'bru'i me tog gi khu ba dang gcig tu byas nas snar blugs na sna khrag 'dzag pa 'chad//kASh+Ta u dum ba ro'i rtsa ba
46a6(rgyud): dang /'bras kyi chus kha nas khrag 'dzag pa 'chad par byed//se pha lI ka'i rtsa ba ldad ni mgula'i grags sel bar byed//ra ti'i rtsa bas so 'tshang ba sel bar byed//
46a7(rgyud): ba'i mar dang /ba'i 'o ma dang /sdig pa'i rkang pa btsos nas rkang mthil la mnye bar byas na/so 'cha' ba rnam par sel bar byed//la pu gi sa bon dang /pri yang
46b1(rgyud): dang /tsan+dan dum rU ba dang /nAt+tha dngad+ya /gtag+sas nas dril phyis b+h+yas na/ rdal sogs pa 'joms par byu//tA rA Na'i sha skam pa srang gcig dang /ring 'o ma dang btung bar
46b2(rgyud): byas na/zede byed kyi nang sel bar byed//ma he'i zho dang 'bros zin gyi bza' bas btsun thab su 'khru ba stsol bar byed//'bras zan chu deng bcas pa grang mos kyang de bzhin du
46b3(rgyud): stsol bar byed//ru rta'i shun pa tshe gnyis dang /pho ba ris dang /bu ram dang /sgog gya rnams cha re ba'i dar ba dang /'thungs na lto 'gyings pa selo//skyu ru ra dang /pi pi
46b4(rgyud): ling dang /tsi tra ka dang /skr-i ga sher dang /bu ram rnying pa dang /mar dang /sbrang dang /cha mnyam du dgongs ka zos na blo dang dbugs mi bde bA sel//A ru ra'i phye ma dang
46b5(rgyud): sbrang gis kyang de bzhi no//seng ldeng gi lo ma dang /nas dang /nas kyi myug bca' bar byas na lto ba'i nad sel bar byed//sgre gsher dang /zir dang /zho'i thug pa lan tshwa
46b6(rgyud): dang bcas 'thungs pasna rab tu chi ba'i nad rnam par se lo//ka ra dang /ya bak+Sha ra dang tsho mnyam du bza' zhing /sho b+ha dza na'i rtsa ba'i chang 'thungs na/chu so'i rje'u 'byin par
46b7(rgyud): byed//a ru ra dang /tsi tra ka dang /sge ga shair dang /dar ba 'thungs na mcher pi skrangs pa'i nad se lo//zi ra dang bu ram bza' bar byas na chi ba sel bar byed//ya bak+Sha
47a1(rgyud): ra dang /zho 'thungs par byas na bo snangs 'khru ba'i nad sel bar byed//tsha ba gsum dang /byi tang ka dang /rgya ma tshwa dang bcas pa'i thug pa dron mo
47a2(rgyud): 'thungs na me 'brar ba dang /srin bu'i nad sel bar byed//a ru ra dang /bu ram gyi bza bas 'brumA na g+ni nad sel bar byed//a ru ra dang /sga kya'i bza' bas be
47a3(rgyud): snabs 'khru ba'i nad se lo//dur ba dang yung ba btogs nas byugs na rdu shu sel bar byed//'di yis de bzhin du mau dpal dang /phol mig dang /khyi rma la soDa
47a4(rgyud): pa'ang sel bar byed//ka sha ma ra d+ha'i rtsa ba rang skyur la btags nas kyang de bzhi no//buM ram dang tsha ba'i mar khu 'thungs na/glo dang dbugs gdugs pa sel
47a5(rgyud): bar byed//a na'i shun pa dang /mar la sogs pa zos na snying gi zug rngu sel bar byed//ka phed bsregs la bu ram dang bza' bar byas na khrag tu 'khru ba sel
47a6(rgyud): bar byed//ma tu lung+ga ki'i khu ba bu ram dang btung bar byas na zug rngu sel bar byed//bu ro ma dang bca' sga snar blugs na cham pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed//
47a7(rgyud): ka to ka dang /sbrang gis mig sman byas na mig nad thams cad sel bar byed do//rong skyur dang /'bru mar dang /rgya ma tshwa dang /ngur ba'i rtsa ba mkhar ba'i nang du mnyes
47b1(rgyud): nas mig sman byas na zug rngu sel bar byed//bu ram dang /mar zla bar byed na/rlung dang /'khris pa dang /bad kan dang /mdze la sogs pa sel bar byed//'bras bu gsum gyi
47b2(rgyud): phyi ma myur dang /sbrang dang bza' bar byos ni nad thams cad sel bar byed//e ru ra'i phye ma dang /mar dang /sbrang dang /phyi dro'i dus ldugs no//rlung dang bdakan sil
47b3(rgyud): bor byed//ba sha ka'i yan lag lnga dang chu thag dang /tshangs ma dang /pi pi ling rnams bskams nas phye mar byas te/rgyam tshwa dang /sbreng dang /ril bu byas te/de nas

47b6(rgyud): bapar byas na/ma zhu ba thams cad sel bar byed//sle dros kyi khu ba dang /skyeng 'thungs par byas na chu nad thams cad sel bar byed//'o ma dang /pi pi ling gi phye mar dang //

48a1(rgyud): par bya'o//rjes kyi rtsu ba bza' bar byas na rtsa nang gi rma 'tsho bar byed//bcu'i sku dang /ya bak+Shar bka' bar byas na lcogs pa sel byar
48a2(rgyud): khyod/dzA yan+na ti'i swa bon dang /bro ba rIs nyi ma gsum 'thungs par byas ni/sdig pa'i nad 'brum nag sel bar byed//'bras zla ga sum dang /rims dang /sA nag+sa
48a3(rgyud): dang /b+h+ring gIr dza'i khu ba dang /aM praSh+Ti sa bon dang /lcags kyi phyi ma rang sgyer dang bsnyil nas blaso bar bya'o//de nasna gu grul gyis sku la bdugs nas de yis
48a4(rgyud): zer bya'o//de nas zhage bdun bcings nas bzhag par bya'o//sgra kha bo sgyur ba'o//rma bya'i 'khris pa dang /b+h+ring gi re dza'i khu ba dag pa mar la btsu s+ye nas b+hUR+Sha
48a5(rgyud): rmugs na dog 'dun gyis sgra'i mdog nag por 'gyuraro//bu nu na raN+Da dag gau thong bcu drug 'gyur gyi bar du cha gcig lus kyi bar du 'askol bar myi
48a6(rgyud): denAs b+h+rUMn+da dka bo'i ts+tsho ma thugs nas dkrug por phyug/de nas 'dri mar khyam b+h+yo gang dang btso bar bya'o//'dis sgra dang mnyes pas sgyu kha dog drug por 'gyur/
48a7(rgyud): b+hU me b+hI dI ri dang /cha ba gsum dang /mu zo dang mnyam po phyi mar byas nas sdong bu'i nang du bcug nas/sdong bu'i khe thur du bstan nas/mi sbar nas rim pas kyi
48b1(rgyud): 'bru mar blangs nas/rtag tu thigs pa gnyis sna yis 'thungs na/skra dkar dang gnyer ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro//de'i khu bas mdze la byugs shing mnyes na mdze nad sel

48b7(rgyud): khyo'o mo che bo du ba'i nang du bsregs nas 'o ma dang mar dang bcas pas mnye bar byas na skra ma skyes pa yang skye bar 'gyuraro//na ri ki la'i chu la skyes bu'i dbang po cung zad
49a1(rgyud): bar du bzhug nas su ru s+yA n+yA m+b+ha byin na skyes bu'i dbapung po shu zla'i nad sol bar byed//rgyal gyi zla ba lA b+h+r-ing gi rA de'i rtsa ba rang gi khu ba dang sbyar
49a2(rgyud): nas byugs na de bzhi no//ka ra bi raM dkar po'i 'khri shing dang /rtsangs pa'i khrag gis mnye bar byas na/sh+ma thi dang /b+h+r-ing gi r-I dza mnyes nas rab tu byugs na yang de
49a3(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyur ro//zhes pa ni dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/nad thams cad 'phel ba gzhom pa'i rim par phye

49a5(rgyud): med dbang du 'gyur ro//brah+ma daN+Di dang /shu thag dang /ru rta dang /sbrang ling ga la byugs nas mnyes nas bud med la 'dod pa byas na dbong du 'gyur ro//bong bu'i khu ba
49a6(rgyud): dang /chu skyes kyi ge sar btags nas/rgyal mtshan la byugs te daN+Tha ud pa la dang /ru rta dang /go la byin na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro//brah+ma da~MN+Ti dang /byi taM kA dang
49a7(rgyud): ru rta dang /nA ga ge sar dang /go la byin na dbang du 'gyur ro//byugs nas 'dod pa byas na dbang du 'gyur//bu chung so ma skyes pa'i lce blangs to//gi baM dang /b+h+ring ga ra
49b1(rgyud): dzA dang /skar ma rgyal la ril bu byas nas thig le byas na dbang du 'gyuraro//gri buM ga rang byung gi me tog lu sbyangs nas thig le byas nA dbang du 'gyu ro//dur khrod kyi du bas bud//

49b3(rgyud): gi brun btigs nas bza' ba dang btung bar byin na dbang du 'gyuraro//biSh+Nu krAn ta'i rtsa ba ling ga la byugs nas dga' b.raro byas par de bzhi no//rgyu skur rgyal la d+hU tu ri'i rtsa
49b4(rgyud): ba dang 'bras bu blangs nas/rgyu skar skrag la shun pa blangs/tam+b+ha la lo mo blang ste/nag pa la mye tog blangs/mA la la rtsa bo blangs la/rgyu mnyam par phyi mar byas nus/

50a1(rgyud): daN+Da u pa la yi rtsa ba dang /dri ma lnga dang byin na dbang du byed par 'gyuraro//bai DaM ga dang /tA gA ra dang /ru rta chang dang byin na mi 'dod pa nyams par

50a3(rgyud): ba dang /rnams kyis thig lai byas ni/'jig rten gsum po dbang du bye'o zhes te/oM tsa la tsi t+te/tsi li tsi l-i/tsu lu tsu lu/ri ti muny+tsa muny+tsa swA hA//rangadwa gi ling ga'i

50a7(rgyud): la dur khrod kyi srad bus bcing bar bya'o//yang na rtsangs pa'i 'jug ma bcings na khams 'dzin par 'gyu ro//mchog tu bde ba'i yid gcig pus mi thun bya ste
50b1(rgyud): brtun pa'i sbyor bso//rtag tu sems med pa bzhin du gyur nas/khams mchog tu 'ching bar byed//mu lo sit+ta ka~M ka~M lu k+Shu sa/yang na d+hu tur gos dang dral zhing 'doms

51a2(rgyud): lan gnyis sam gsum du'o//chu dron mos bkru sna zhi bar 'gyu ro//'gron du'i nang du ri dul chus bkang nAs khaM ra bcug na khamAMs 'ching ngo //ra'i chu dang /oMN+Da/

51a6(rgyud): yang smin pa dang /la si gaM dang /rgya ma tshwa dang /bsres nas rang gi mdzub mo la byugs nas/de'i b+ha ga'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa la ji srid bskyod pas

51b1(rgyud): 'o ma dang bcas pa lang ga la mnyes nas mi thu na byas pas bud med 'dzag par bye'o//dzaM yaun+ti'i rtsa ba dang btags nas 'bras kyi chu dang bsres nas rdul dang ldan pa'i skye gnas 'a

52a1(rgyud): rAng bshad bya//oM dzA la kru rA lA ba da ne/ha s+ya ha sa/ha la ha la badz+ro/su badra/s+phA ra s+pha ra/skA ra ya/skA ra ya/sarba mo g+ha ba to/biSh+Ti stAm+b+ha
52a2(rgyud): ya s+thAm+b+ha ya/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/yau myA sar+b+ba pA Ni/yaM sho Sha ya sho Sha ya hUM phaT/sngags 'dri bzlas nas na mkha' li khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya'o//rlung dang sprin
52a3(rgyud): lA sogs pa 'dzegs par byed//o peT ka raM pheM pheM hUM hUM ha hA hA paT/dur khrod du rol pa'i sngagaso//oM sar+b+ba bi Sh+ya d+hi pa tA ye/pA rA yAn+ta/nA sha ya sar+b+ba DA ki
52a4(rgyud): nAM/trA sa ya trA sa ya/ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ye/mu khA kI l-i yi kai li ya/hU~M hUM phaT/zhes pa ni grong khyer du 'jug pa'i sngagaso//oM hi li hi l-i ha phuHphuHzhes pa

52a6(rgyud): pa 'dis glang po che 'bros pa re 'gyuraro//te la li a te lA li A/zhes pa 'dis bse 'bros pAr 'gyu ro//oM h+ni ba Tu nA ga thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU phaT/zhes pas
52a7(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa'i bsdigs mdzub kyis brdungs pas khyi 'bros par 'gyuraro//oM ya mAn+te ka hrIHhUM hU~M phaT phaT/tAM sa ya trA si ya/tsaN+De pra tsaN+Da hU~M phaT/zhes pa/
52b1(rgyud): /'di mya he 'bros par 'gyuraro//oM ya ma marda n+de mdza ya marda yA/oM tsar+N+Na ma hA roSh+TA Na hUM phaT/zhes pa 'dis sdig pa'i nad 'brosa? par 'gyu ro//oM kro d+ha ne saM kro Sha Ni be d+ha/
52b2(rgyud): nA yA hUM phaT/chu la mngon par bsngags nas byin na zug rngu 'byin par 'gyuraro//oM sa nai trA sa ne mo hA nA ya hUM phaT/zhes pa 'dis spyi bor bcings nas srung bar 'gyuraro//
52b3(rgyud): oM a tsa le si tsa le che ge mo kI la ya hUM phaT/spra tshal los gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa byas nas/gro ge la pa blas bris nas do'i khar bcug nA phur bus 'debs
52b4(rgyud): par 'gyu ro//lam gyi bzhi mdor brkos ni sa sbas ni phyir rgol gyi khwa phur bus btab par 'gyuraro//oM sar+b+ba mA ra b+hany+dza ne che ge mo rkang pa la kI la ya hUM phaT/sngon ma bzhin
52b5(rgyud): du snying khar bcug nA rkang pa dag phur bus btab nas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par 'gyuraro//oM baM kr-i tA na na pra b+hA laM b+heny+dza ne/b+hany+dza ya b+hAny+dza ya/sta me b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/badz+ra
52b6(rgyud): pAM sha na/che gI mo'i dmagi sde ban d+ha ban d+ha/sta ma b+ha ya sta ma b+ha ya hUM phaT/khaHgaHhA hA/hI hI/hU tU hUM hI/oM tsaN+Di ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaTe/sngon ma bzhin du rab tu bcug na
52b7(rgyud): dmeg dpon gyi yan lag brgyad la phur bus btab par 'gyur ro//me thob kyi 'og tu brkos nas mgo thur du bstan nas sbas na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ongs pa rengs
53a1(rgyud): byar 'gyur//oM da ha dA hA/ba tsa pa tsa/ma tha mA tha/dzA la dz+wA la/dzA la yA dz+nyA lA ya/sh+lo Sha ya sho Sha ya/gr-ih+Na grIh+na/dz+wa la dz+dzA la/oM tsat+ta ma
53a2(rgyud): ro Sha Na hU~M phaT swA hA/dur khrod kyi bris la dug drang smre tshes gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa'i tshad kyi lha sbyin bris la/phreng ba'i sngags kyis bskor nas/spra tshil gyi gzugs
53a3(rgyud): brnyan gyi snong khor bcug nas/shI ri khaN+Da'i shing gI rang bzhin gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o//de nas oM tsiN+Da ma hA ro Sha che ge mo dzA ro na grih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/zhes bzlas nas
53a4(rgyud): dur khrod kyi mo la bdug par bya'o//yang nA seng ldeng dang rabu chung gi me la'o//dgra bo rims kyi zin par 'gyur ro//oM dza ya dzi ya pa rA dza ya ni ra dzI te yan tre hI hI/
53a5(rgyud): hA hA s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ut+pA dau ya/ts+tshe da shI g+h+raM karme ku ru/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/dur khrod kyi gos la bris nas+ya skud pa sngon pos lan brgyad dkris nas dpung pa
53a6(rgyud): 'am/mgul pi 'am/mi go 'am/rked pa la btags na pha rol gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi mthu med par 'gyu re//oM tsaN+Da ma hA se nA gra sa gra saM/khaM kha/khA hi khA ti/
53a7(rgyud): sho Sha ya/sho Sha ya/ma ra ma ra/mA ra ya mA ra ya/che ge mo hUM phaT/dur khrod kyi ras la sngon bzhin du bris nas gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug nas/mi'i rus
53b1(rgyud): bya'i phur bu sor gcig pa'i tshad dam/yang na lcags kyi phur bus btab nas/dur khrod du sa brkos nas mgo thung du bstan nas sbas na zhag bdun gyis 'chi bar 'gyuraro//
53b2(rgyud): oM tsiN+Da mya hA ro Sha na a mu kaM uts+tshu Ta ya hUM phaT/nim pa dang /bya rog gi tshul bu blangs nas/dur khrod kyi me la bsregs nas thul ba la mngon par bsngags nas sgo lo gtor
53b3(rgyud): nas rnga mo'i steng du bskyon nas+ya mgul pa zhags pas bcings nas lhags phyogasu khyer bar bsam par bya'o//skrod par byed//oM dwe Sha Ne dwe Sha badz+re/che ge mo dang che ge mo rnam par
53b4(rgyud): zhe sdang bar gyis shig/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/khyi gnyis 'thab pa'i rdul blangs nas lag pa g.yas pas gzugs brnyan gnyis la bsnun na phan tshun du zhe sdang bar byed//
53b5(rgyud): oM tsiN+Da ma hA ro Sha hI hri hri b+ho ra ru be/tsa Ta tsu Ta/pra tsa Ta pra tsa Ta/ha na ha na/g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ka ha ka ha/pra s+phu ra pra s+phu rA/pra sA ra yi pra smA ra ya/kI lA ya kI lA yau/
53b6(rgyud): snum d+ha ya stem b+hA ya/che gre mo hU~M phaT/gro ga la rus sbrul leb rgan rtsis yang dag par bris nas/sor drug pa'i rkang pa bzhi po rnams la hri yi ge dang /khi'i nang du piM gI yi
53b7(rgyud): go dang /lto ba ra tri gnyis bris nas rgyab du dbang du bya ba'o//phyi nas phreng ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bskor nas mchod pa dang bstod pa yang dag par brtsam par bya'o//
54a1(rgyud): so bgi stong du bzhag nas rus sbrul gyi khog pas dgag par bya'o//srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya'o//rkang pa dag byis pa'i glos gzhugs par
54a2(rgyud): bya'o//rkang pa g.yon pa bsnun zhing /che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis shig lan bdun gyis dgra bo kha bcings par 'gyuraro//oM tsi li mo li la li ti hUM phaT/mig
54a3(rgyud): zim bur lta bar byed//oM ts+li ts+tshis+yAM sho Sha ya sho Sha ya d+ha raM baM d+hi baM d+h+ya/oM tsaN+Da ma hA r-i Sh+Ta Na hUM phA Ta/bra'i rus pa'i phur bu sor bdun gyi chud la lan brgya rtse brgyad
54a4(rgyud): mngon par bsngags nas baying g+ha su brkos na saM s+thAsa? na 'o ma med par 'gyu ro//oM badz+ri Ni baMdz+ra pa ta ya su ra pi ta rA dz+nyA pa ya ti/dz+wA la ya dzA la yA/au
54a5(rgyud): tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Ne hUM phaT/grog mkhar gyi s+ya'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsdigs nas tshong 'dusu swas na pa NaM nyams par 'gyuraro//oM hrIHkle
54a6(rgyud): traM mr-i ya ma ma tha na A ka Da D+h+ya A kaDa D+h+ya/k+Sho b+ha ya/sarba kar+m+ma pra sA d+ha ne hUM hUM phaT phoT swAhA/pro ga le lha zhal gcig phyog gany+dzis pa gur gum gyi mdog lta bu/zhags
54a7(rgyud): pa dang lcags kyu phyag na bsnams pa/'dod pa'i mdangs can 'jigs pa'i yin leg la/chel dang /chang dang le baM rgan rtsi dang /khrag dang bud med kyi rdul dang
54b1(rgyud): rnams kyis bstod pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams te/oM shi r-i sau tri di kr-i nAM bo traM me Te/de nas phreng ba'i sngags kyis bskor nas/srad bu dmar pos yang dag par dkris nas/
54b2(rgyud): bud med dang /skyes pa'i phod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug nas/mar dang sbrang gis bkang nas spra tshil gyis dril nas sad bu dmar pos dkris nas sa la spras te/mgo bo'i
54b3(rgyud): gnas la rkang po g.yon pas mnana? nas bzlas pa bya'o//stong phrag nyi shu rdza lngas grong khyer bskyod par 'gyu ro//o A ka Da D+hA A kad n+yA/mo ha ya mo ha ya/che ge mo
54b4(rgyud): ba shi ku ru swA hA/lto ba'i srin bu zhib mo phye mar byas nas/shu kra dang /ming med kyi khrag dang /ril bu byas nas mngon par bsdogs nas bza' ba dang /btung bar byin pa
54b5(rgyud): dbang du byed par 'gyuraro//'phur pA'i sbrang ma'i bshog pa dang /so'i rgyal po gnyis dang /ro'i me tog snying po'i phye ma'i phye mas yan lag dang /rkang pa la byugs na 'gro 'phro
54b6(rgyud): lha brgyal bar 'gyuro//oM shI ta gri d+hi ni kha hi ba Shi tsu ru Sha Ni ShaH/ba kha hoHhaHhaHtsiN+Da ma hA se nA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/yong na au si kA ri Ni d+h+waM hAM hUM hA/dug thams cad sel bar byed//
54b7(rgyud): oM nA shwa ri b+h+ra ma ni ha ra phaT/mngon par bsngags nas khang pa'i sgo gang du gos kyi ras ma btsongs na sbrul kheng par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro//oM a ne ka ne che ge mo ba sh+tsa
55a1(rgyud): ku ru swAd+hA/me tog dkar por dri zhim po d+hin na dbang du byed//nA mo bi taR+Sha gA ya/ma twe ya si ha~M lo tsa ne swAhA/tshul mngon par bsngags na mig/
55a2(rgyud): bkrus na ra ba ri pra se lo//u~M swA hA kha tsur+NaM kha da nau na pra b+hA ba ti/u tI t+yaR+ya thaM bai khe Na ba su di baM ba laM nA nAM gA ru DA pak+Sha pa te naini b+h+ra mau gats+tsha tu bi ShaM swA hA/sbrul dang /
55a3(rgyud): bri shAM ka ta dang /sdig pa la sogs pa'i dug thams cad spel bar byed//oM tsa muN+Da a dzi tAM/a pA rA dzi te kli kl-i rak+Sha rik+Sha swA hA/lan bdun du sa gai de la mngon par
55a4(rgyud): bsngags nas phyogs bzhir 'phang zhing rang gI gan su gcig bzhag par bya'o//oM dza ma b+ha ni staM b+ha nI ma hA nA/sad+d+h+ya duSh+Ta pri shaM mu ni swA hA/oM tsi ra mi 'byung //oM
55a5(rgyud): tsar+t+ti ma hA kro d+h+r-i ya hu lu hu lu/tsu lu tsu lu/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Te/ban d+ha ban d+ha/mr-i ha mo ha/ha na ha na/oM mr-i te hU~M phaT/mi tig la sog pa li yongasu bzlas nas byin na
55a6(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro//nA mau rat+na tra yA ya/oM traHsu bi smA re swA hA/ke tA kI mdab ma bshags pa la bris nas bcangs na che ba thams cad sel bar byed//zhes pa mi
55a7(rgyud): dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/'khrul 'khor dang sna tshogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba gsungs pa'i rim par phye ba ste/
55b1(rgyud): shu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sar+b+ba ma yang rA ka/sar+b+ba ma ya daR+sha ni piM ga ne nA hU~M phaT/zhes pa 'dis gtum pa
55b2(rgyud): khro bo chen por bsams nas thams cad bya'o//u dum ba r-i'i 'o ma ras la byugs nas bug pa myed par byas te/'bru ma dang bcas pa'i spos dkar btags nas/der
55b3(rgyud): bcug la sdong bu byas la/chu'i nang du mar me 'od dang bcas pa 'bar zhing gnaso//mtshan mo rdo dkar po'i dum bu gnyis bzung nas ni/g+hiSh+Ta hUM kA re Na glog gi 'od
55b4(rgyud): 'phro ba snang bar byed//dza lu ka she ba'i bye ma dang bcas pa/rgya skyegs kyis kha bsgyur nas/sdong bus me s+pha ra na s+t+rI yang de gcer bur mthong bar ba //mur gyis rna ba
55b5(rgyud): dang mig la bsgos nas bdag nyid srung ba byas nas/ha la ha la'i mjug ma bcad par bya'o//gtsor bur skya grol bas ji srid gar byed par 'gyuraro//de'i phye ma drug rnam
55b6(rgyud): bzhi dang /d+hU tu ra'i yan lag lnga so sor drug nam re ro dang bcasra pa/rgya skyegs kyi kha bskyung ba'i gos kyi sdong bu byas na thams cad gar byed par mthong //sngon bzhin
55b7(rgyud): bdag nyid la bsrung bar bya'o//sha kho Ta'i rtsa ba dang /ba ru ra'i rtsa ba gcog tu byas nas/khyim du bzhag ni 'thab mor 'gyuraro//d+ha tu ri'i me tog gi nang gi bye ma dang /
56a1(rgyud): su b+hAn d+ha'i me tog nang gi phye ma dang /su g+han d+ha'i nang du bcug nas bsnams pa tsam gyis man zug ngur 'gyuraro//skyur po sngar blugs na grol
56a2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//khyi ku skyes pa'i ma la stan gyi dud pas bdugs nas/rma bya'i sgras graya su bskor na rtsig pa'i ri mo mi snang bar byed//gi yon du bskor byas slar
56a3(rgyud): yang snang byar byed//bya rog gi snying gi khrag gis a mr-i lo ma la de'i gau shog pa'i smyug gus sngags bris nas/gang gi zag po'i nang du bcug na de bya rog gis
56a4(rgyud): za ba ri byed//oM ka kau ku hi de ba dang ta ka kre nA bak+Sha ye swA hA/b+ha ga'i rnam pa'i drong byis nas/bud med kyi bshang ba la za'i lo ma khri phrag gcig bcug nas sgra
56a5(rgyud): bar bya'o//de'i lam zug du ru 'gyur ro//shi ri khaN+Da'i 'o me le spangs pa'i til gyi 'bru mar skra la mnyes na skra dkar por 'gyuraro//ske bzhar nas sangs par 'gyuraro//
56a6(rgyud): zhum bu'i phru gu bcas pa'i mal stan dang /bud med kyi bu tsha btsas pa'i mal stan gyi dud pas bdugs na rtsog ngos kyi ri mo mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma kI kas
56a7(rgyud): gdugs ni grol bar 'gyuraro//rnga mo'i 'gram pa'i rdul dang dri chub bla dang lan mang du spangs nas/lag pa la mnyes nas reg pa ni ri mo mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lag
56b1(rgyud): pau Ti dus na grol bar 'gyur ro//tro gang+gA'i mal stan gyis bdugs na/ri mod te/gu gul gyis bdugs na grol bar 'gyur ro//b+ha ga'i tshil gyis mig sman byas na khang
56b2(rgyud): pa'i phyi ma rnams sar par 'gyur//mA ra~M mye bsngal nas b+han d+haka'i phye mA blugs ni sled yang 'bar bar byed//mUt+kA rI dang /saM bI la dang /dza lo kA dang /sprul pa'i tshil
56b3(rgyud): gyis rkang pa drug mnyes nas chu shing gi lo ma dkris nas me drag 'bang ba'i steng du phyin na tshig par mi 'gyur//shi ri khaN+Da dang /bu ram zos na gnyid du 'gyu ro//ka ma
56b4(rgyud): ci'i rtsa ba spyi bor blangs nA gri nye du 'gyuraro//na gaM da ma na ka'i rtsa ba dang /gro naM puSh+pa'i bil dang /yung ba dang /'bras dang /btags nas dril phyis byas na/chu'i brtag pa
56b5(rgyud): lasa? rgya'o//shale mA ri'i rtsa bar bres nas/shing kun bcug na me tog rnams ltung bar 'gyuraro//sa skyur mo dang /chang byin nas go la byin na 'khru bar byed//shi ri
56b6(rgyud): N+Da'i 'o ma dang /arga'i sa bon dang /srin bus zos pa'i shIng bye dang /bu ram zos na khrag 'dzag par 'gyuraro//spang byo'i phye mas rta'i sna la mnyes na ts+li za bA mi 'gyuraro//
56b7(rgyud): tsun gyis bkrus na dag par 'gyuraro//ka ta'i ka'i rtsa ba spyi bor bcing bar bya'o//khang dzu ra'i rtsa ba dang /ha te ta la'i rtsi ba mu rgyal gyi zla ba la byang phyogasu gnas pas
57a1(rgyud): btsir zla sgra grol bar byas nas ston nas/gsum po dang /cung zad maltos nas tu spyan mtshon gyis bod par mi 'gyur//shon ka ros bon gyis
57a2(rgyud): mchil lham gnyis ri dgas kyi lkugs pa lo byas nas nang bkang tshul phyin na 'byin par mi 'gyuraro//oM ShA Ni bzas nas lce 'og tu bzhag par bya'o//thong lcags bsrer
57a3(rgyud): nas ljags na tshig par mi 'gyuraro//dngul chu dang k+Sha ra dang /ldan pa'i he sti shur+t+ti phungs na mngal ltung bar byed do//sha ra pung ga dkar po'i rtsa ba rgyu skar rgyal la ston
57a4(rgyud): nas pa'i mar la spangs nas/mgo bo'am dpung par gdags par bya'o//mda'i dang chom pa'i 'jigs pa las skyob par byed//bya rgod kyi zhag dang /'ug pa'i zhag
57a5(rgyud): mchil lham la byugs nas/steng du gnas nas shin tu ring por 'ong nuso//nyungs kar gyi 'bras bu mtshon gyis bcad par bya ste/nyi ma bzang po'i dgongs mo'i
57a6(rgyud): thun mtsham su lhag par gnas pa byas nas gcer bu skra grol bar byas nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas sa la ma lhung ba rau/bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyis
57a7(rgyud): bsrungs nas/phreng ba'i sngags kyis gang dang gang gi khrag gis spangs nas/mtshon cha mang po'i khrag gis gtor nas/kha bkrus pa'i chu dang /de'i rus pa'i
57b1(rgyud): sud dang /zhag dang /de'i thal ba bskyed nas/de'i thod pa'i nang du zhag dang rwa la sogs pa bsams nas/bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs pa 'bad pas byas nas/yang dang
57b2(rgyud): yang du bsrung ba dang gtor ma bya/yongasu gyur pa'i 'bras bu khar bcug na bdag nyid de 'dra bar 'gyuraro//lcags gsum gyis dkris na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de la 'dir
57b3(rgyud): lcags gsum ni phyed dang btsos pa'i drug nam bdun dang /phyed dang bcas pa'i gnyis dang /bzhi dang /drug rnam lnga rnams te/nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /me rnams mi'i
57b4(rgyud): thod pa gi wang dang /lte ba rmAnA dag gi bsgrub bya'i ming sngags kyis bsten nas/bris nas dri'i chus byugs te/thod pa gnyis pa yang dag par sbyar bar byas nas/ro'i
57b5(rgyud): srad pus dkris nas pra tshul gyi dril bar bya'o//dur khrod kyi me la bdug bris/ji srid mtshan mo sgra tsholi mu zhu'i bar du'o//lha'i bu mo 'gugs par byed//oM A ka Da n+ya
57b6(rgyud): A kaiDaD+D+h+ya/mo te ya mo ha ya/che ge mo Akar+N+Na ya dzaHswAhA/ka pI ta tha'i 'bras bu phyi mar byas nas ma he yaM zho la spangs par bya'o//rdza gsar pa naM gnas nas dir
57b7(rgyud): cung zad blugs par bya'o//skad cig tsam gyi zho ru 'gyur//ka pi ta tha'i 'bras bu btags nas rdza gsar pa la byugs par bya'o//de la 'o ma bskol nas srub pa dang bral
58a1(rgyud): rmunan du 'gyur//rnga som tang ba'i bum par 'ams bsgon nas btso bar bya//dum par rgyugs nas bstan pa dang /bum pa bcagungs nar bum par
58a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro//arga' 'im bum po gus dper lan mang du bgros nas/der shre gas na dang babazhin du 'gyur//bud med rje che skye sa nas zhag bcu lon pa'i mesna dug pa'i
58a3(rgyud): thal ba blangs nas//khu tshur gnyis steng 'og tu rnam par ru dkod nas chus bking nas/de la thal ba'i ri mo'i snying du khrid na bum pa'i chu bskams par 'gyur//rig tu
58a4(rgyud): thal bse ri mo byas na gong bar 'gyuraro//gza'i nyi mu'i sbyin mo she liny+tsi rtsa ba dang /a pa marga'i rtsa ba bton nas/saM so dbyug pa'i rtse mo la byugs nas rkeng par
58a5(rgyud): bzung na de dag 'thab par byed//bi hU a ra'i sa bon gyi khu bas ras bzang po mnyes nas chu blugs nas ltung bar mi 'gyur//mr-i k+Shi kA bum pa la de yis de bzhin du
58a6(rgyud): byugs nas zhon na chu la 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//b+ha la ta dad srin bu me khyer gyi phyo bas rtsig pa la byugs ni mtshan mo 'bar bar mthong //zangs kyi snod la
58a7(rgyud): dang skyu ru ras mnyes nas phyogs kyi snod la rgyud rten zangs mi bzhin du mthong //ba lang gi rus par sregs nas mu ze'i phye ma byin na me lce 'bar bar 'gyur//dwe N+yA ka'e
58b1(rgyud): sa don gyi steng du me tog bzhag nas chu byon nas me tog yar+yA nas 'gro'o//kun TI ra las byas pa'i byi'u'i nang du/dung ba bcug na na mkha' lha 'gro bAr byed//sha skam po la
58b2(rgyud): b+hA la tA kwa'i mar khus swang+ga nas chu'i stong du bzhag nas 'gro bar byed//zhes pa ni dang 'ablo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dang lce gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las/ngo mtshur
58b3(rgyud): sgyu ma'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/snying khar srog rlung thur sel bshang/mnyam gnas lte
58b4(rgyud): bo'i phyogs na gnas//gyen rgyu mgrin pa'i phyogasu gnas//lus kun la ni khyab byed gnas//de rnams nang nas gtso bo yi//srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas/'byung
58b5(rgyud): 'jug dbugs kyi dbye ba yis//skye bo kun gyi srog phu gnas//'pho ba bcu drug sbyor ba yis//so sor dbyug gu re re'o//dkyil 'khor bzhi ni 'bab pa yis/nyi khri
58b6(rgyud): tshig stong drug brgya lo//g.yas lo reg nas 'babye pa ni//me yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod do//g.yon nas reg nas 'bab pa ni//rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod//g.yas
58b7(rgyud): g.yon mtshungs por reg pa ni//sa yi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o//de nyid 'dir ni dal 'bab pa//chu yid dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o//la la ni g.yon gyi dal//ra sa nAM g.yas rnaM
59a1(rgyud): 1/kun su/a bad+hUt+taM bus b+h+yogs nas//lhan cig /dgang skad cig 'ab//'byung dang 'jug pa gnyis gyur pa//m-i gA pa'i tshul byos rnam par
59a2(rgyud): gdas//ji srid srog ni rab 'jug pa'i//rlung gi 'gro 'a nyams paso//'jug pa kum b+ha kar shes bya//pUr ka na bzung bar bya//kan+ti dbyung bar shes//mi g.yob
59a3(rgyud): rangs par 'ad//gtum pi khu ba'i ting 'dzin gyis//shes rab dang b+h+riHsna pornam par bya//rlung gi 'jug pa bzung po ste//brgya stong la sogs grangs rnams
59a4(rgyud): kyisad+ma skad cig rnyed lnga'i thub 'gyur te//mnan po sangs rgyas gsung ji bzhin//'bad pas she mi rab la 'a khyud nas//rlung gcig pu ni 'byung bar bya//gtumu tha
59a5(rgyud): khro bo'i gzugs kyis ni//zla ba phyed tsam gyis 'grub byed//lha yi ye shes yang dag ldan//mngon par shes pa skye bar 'gyur//gtum po khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis//
59a6(rgyud): rang gi bud med nges 'khyud nis//snying kha dang ni snying khri dang //gsung ba dang ni gsang ba dang //zhal dang zhal ni yang dag sbyar//sems med bde ba'i mchog de nyid//
59a7(rgyud): zla ba snying gi nang du song //de ni nyi ma'i mthu yis//de nyid brtan pa'i stobs de las//mi yi kun mkhyen thob par 'gyur//bsam pa tsam gyur nyid kyis ni//'das
59b1(rgyud): dang ma'ongs da lta yang //pha rol snyoms no shes 'gyur to//bu dgra gos 'don don par smras//de btsun du nyid sbyor ba yos//rna ba'i nang du sgom byas nas//rtog surnams
59b2(rgyud): kun na gnas pa'i sgra//drung na mo ni ji bzhin thos//de bzhin mig gi mthu yis ni//'jig rten gsum po mthong bar byed//de bzhin sna yis bsnams pas kyang //dri rnams
59b3(rgyud): thams cad shes par 'gyur//de bzhin lce yis myangs pas kyang //ring gnas raM yang rab tu skye//de bzhin rang rtags rtser bsams pas//reg bya ma lus shes par 'gyur//
59b4(rgyud): de bzhin mgo yi dbus bsams pas//kun gyi nus mthu 'phel bar 'gyur//gang du sems ni gnas de la//rlung gi ro ni yang dag mnyam//de dang de la de 'gog pas/
59b5(rgyud): de nyid 'di ni gzugs brnyan 'gyur//zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni//dgug dang de bzhin bsad pa dang //bskrad dang thams cad shin tu sgom//de nyid gang bsgoms rab tu
59b6(rgyud): 'grub//kum b+ha ka sogs rab sbyor bas//lto sbyangs bzhi po dang sbyor bya//ga yon+da du lte ba'i lta stangs kyis//bum pa can gyis dbang du byed//pU ra ka nI des sbyong bas/
59b7(rgyud): g.yas kyis dgug par shes par bya//gang zhig dpral nas lta stongs kyis/de ni ri tsa ka yis bsad//sna rtser gnas nyid lta stangs kyis//rengs pa nyid kyis rengs pa
60a1(rgyud): nas nan t+yAn m+b+ha n+ta hA /mam na napa marbu na r+dz+dza kA tAn y-i/smrangasangos sbyor lan/ rdza
60a2(rgyud): d+hI mas par bya//kun mi nub pa dang ldan papa ni b+h+ri pas Sh+T+rI ba 'thopa/ ni gags pas na/ blugs nga ma
60a3(rgyud): dbyug/phan tshun 'gags par 'gyur ba yi//gnas la sems ni gnas pa'o//rdo rje daMng+ga many+dzum sbyor bag/bzlang shis rab gcig tu myur//'gog pa'i de
60a4(rgyud): longs spyod pas//khyun dag ma~M pA yo 'gyug/rdo rje sams sogs grangasu rgya sa rnaMms//sngags pa d+hi y-i g+han cig na//bde byed la si sa grags pa yi//'jig
60a5(rgyud): rten lha rnams smos ci dgos//rgyud rnams kun tu rape sres pa//bdag gis de nyid mi g.yo gtso//gang zhig de nyid brten byas paso//namakha' lta bu'i sangs rgyas gyur/
60a6(rgyud): gang+gA'i bye ma dang mtshungs pa'i//chen po rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur//da ltar gyi yang rnams sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas ye shes dang ldan nyid//de phyir rtag tu rnal 'byor
60a7(rgyud): bde khyab bdag mi g.yo bsam par bya//gang zhig mi g.yo mi shes par//de yi skye ba 'bras med yin//de nyid med la dngos grub no//phra mo tsam yang thob pa tsho/
60b1(rgyud): zhes pa ni dbang ba gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las rlung gi rnal 'byor gyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom
60b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rkang mthil lte bar 'bugs byed na//zhag gsum nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur//rkang pa'i mthil du 'bugs pa dang //mig tu zug rngus zla
60b3(rgyud): gAsum na//rkang pa'i mthil du 'bugs pa dang //sna yi zug rngus zla gsum na//bshad pa 'dzag pa'i dus ni//sbrid pa mnyam byung zla ba na//lte ba dang lto ba'i zug rngu
60b4(rgyud): yis lo ldana'o//mdzod spu'i zug rngu yis nyi ma gcig na'o//lce'i rtsa ma mthong na zla ba phyed na'o//sna'i rtse mo'i zug rngu yis zla ba bzhi na'o//'khrig pa'i dus kyi sbrid pa yis//
60b5(rgyud): zla ba na'o//mthe'u chung thams cad mnyam du zug rngur gyur rwa zla ba nA'o//mnyam du snying kha dang /migrin par zug rngur gyur na zla ba phyed pa gsum na'o//mnyam du tA
60b6(rgyud): lu ka gsum zugra rur gyur na nyi ma gsum na'o//su ra b+he'i rna ba'i dril bu'i sgra yaMs zla ba gsum na'o//rna ba'i rtsa ba dang /smi nI mI'i dbus dang /mgo'i dang po rnamasu
60b7(rgyud): zug rngur b+hair na nyi ma gcig na'o//rkang pa'i mthil nas tsams nas/sngo pa'i mthar thub pa'i zug rjes zla ba drug na'o// rtse'i sha zhim ni zhag 'dren no'o//'gram/
61a1(rgyud): ba'i sha'i mtshams bye na zla dwa lda na'o//mig 'jog pa ma mthong na zla ba lnga na'o//sna'i 'khor lo las zhag bdun na'o//snying kha zhomya na zla ba byed
61a2(rgyud): na'o//lce'i dkyil du ri mo nag po byung na zh-ig+sa gnyis na'o//sen mo la khrag ma mthong ni zla ba drug na'i//sngo skams na zla ba drug na'o//a ru Na ma mthong na zla ba
61a3(rgyud): drug na'o//grang mo la sogs pa'i dus phyin ci log pa las thams cad du bug par mthong na zla ba phyed na'o//ha yig brjod pas grang ba dang /phuHyig brjod pas dri bar
61a4(rgyud): gyur na nyi ma bcu ne'o//ming med kyi rtse bor ri mo nag po mthong na nyi ma bco brgyad na'o//lus mnyes pas skra thos pa dang /lus thams cad las klu nyid kyang nyi ma bcu
61a5(rgyud): tha ma pa na'o//khrus byas pa tsam gyis snying kha dang rkang pa skam nA/rta d+hi ma ni lus la dri ngan pa byung na zhag gsum na'o//lus staHnyi ma gcig na'o//dri chu g.yon du
61a6(rgyud): 'khor na zla ba drub na'o//lte ba phyin ci log na nyi ma lnga na'o//sna'i rtse mo ma mthong na de zla ba ldana'o//mIg sor mos mnan pas 'od ma mthong na nyi ma brgyad na'o//
61a7(rgyud): ba'i d+ha ni thos na lo gcig na'o//pha rol gyi mig le gzugs brnyan ma mthong na zla ba byed na'o//de nyid shes phyir 'chi ba slu dang //'jig rten pha rol bsams par bya/
61b1(rgyud): zhes pa ni dpa'o gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud lngas 'chi ltas kyis mtshan nyid rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas
61b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ba dang ma yi mnyam sbyor las//'byung lnga'i bdag can zla bA dang //'byung ba lnga yau bdag nyid can//nyi ma'i sbyor ba 'jom pa
61b3(rgyud): las//de la sems can skye bar 'gyur//thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can//slar yang rus tshigs zla ba lngas//nyi mas sha la sogs par 'gyur//bdag nyid
61b4(rgyud): sdong pa'i lus gyur la//sems can rnams ni las kyis sprul//sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin 'di//dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang //dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs pa 'di//
61b5(rgyud): chu nang zla ba lnga bur 'dod//zhes pa dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud las lus kyi rang bzhin gyi rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi
61b6(rgyud): pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba//gzhan yo bdag gis nyan par 'tshal//shin tu rgyas min mdor
61b7(rgyud): bsdus pa//mgon po bdag la bka' drin mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba//de nas yang dag rab bshad bya
62a1(rgyud): bcu drug la yi gzugs can ma//lha mau sems dpa'i skyil krung mdzad//su mdog sngon mo skal chen ma//mi bskyod pa yi dbu la rgyun//phyag g.yas
62a2(rgyud): pad+ma daM mar po bsnams//ga yin pa'i phyag na rol ba'o stabs//'dod pa'i bston bcos kyis gnas pa//pad+ma zla ba'i steng du bzhugs//nu ma rgyas shIng lci baus NI ma///
62a3(rgyud): sbyin yongs dga' ma khyod la smras//lho nu skyes mi g.yo'i ting 'dzin gnas//lha mo 'di ni sgom par gyis//hUM yig ye shes las byung ba'i//sna tshogs rdo rje'i
62a4(rgyud): rnornal 'byor ma//rnal 'byor 'khyud pas sgom byas na//dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur//yang na d+hIHyig las byung ba'i//kha dge dkar po sgom par bya//rtag
62a5(rgyud): pA yi ni dbu brgyan cing //rdo rje dbyings kyi dpong phyug ma//sor mo rin dbang dbu rgyan dang //dmar paM ku ru ku l+le'i kaM/lA mo dbu rgyan 'od dpag med//hU~M yig
62a6(rgyud): ye shes las byung ma//taM yig ye shes las byung ba'i//sgrol ma sku mdog ljang ku ni//don yod grub pa'i dbu rkyen maM//sngon mo'i gzugs kyis skyes bu rna mas//
62a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas nas//zhi ba'i gzugs kyis yang dge zhugs//dpal ldan ral gri zhigs pa bsnams//mngon par 'khyod pa'i tshul
62b1(rgyud): madz+nyAd mo//rang rigs yang na gzhan rigs kyi//bu mo bzur nas bsgom par bya//phyag rgya 'dri yin+da rnal 'byor pas//the tshom med par dngos grub 'gyur//yang na sa
62b2(rgyud): sogs las bgyis pa'i//gzugs brnyan byas nas bya sgrub par bya//lhan skyes gtum po'i ting 'dzin gnas//rtse gcig yid kyis bzlas par bya//de la bzlas
62b3(rgyud): pa'i sngags nI 'di//oM bi shwa badz+rodz+ri A gauts+tsha hU~M swAh+ma/oM badz+ra sa ra swA ti a~M gots+tsha A gats+tsha d+hIHswAhA//oM badz+ri d+hI tAM shwa rI A g+hats+tsha A gats+tsha bAM swAhA//oM kU ru kul+le A
62b4(rgyud): gan+d+ha s+t+rai kr-Its+tsha swA /oM tA ri A gagan+thid+hI swAd//de nas yang dag ba b+h+yo/depa'igacig po'i dkyil 'khor lo//rgyuni bre la skyo bani po
62b5(rgyud): byabs pa ni yis rgyun pa la//kha dog ser por byis ladabu su pad+ma 'dab bzhi lo//de yang me yi mdab ma dkar//bden bral du ni dmar por mtshungs//rlung du
62b6(rgyud): dog ser po ste//dbang ldan mtsham su ljang gu'o//dbus kha dog nag po ste//de la mi g.yo rtag par bya//yang nany+tsi mu'i steng gnas pa'o//dkar po ser po dmang pa 'am/
62b7(rgyud): ldeng ku sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyi//skyu ru rnam par 'asim par bya//me yi mtsham su spyan ma ste//ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs//g.yon dang g.yas pa'i phyag dag
63a1(rgyud): ///rlu byu na nod nga mas//bad+mon tha mo //gaT dang mdang ni phyug byasnams sor//rlung mtsham samaman
63a2(rgyud): sku mdog dmar mor gyur pa ni//bum pa 'bras kyi sku mA pyeH//dbang ldan mtshom su sgrol ma ste//ljang klu'i g.yas blo mchog sbyin dang //g.yon pa ud pe la ston pa//
63a3(rgyud): bsnams//de rnams zla ba'i gdan la nI//thams cad skyil krung phyed phyes bzhugs//shar sgro brgya byin+da gAdan la ni//'dod tshogs rdo rje dgod par bya//ral gri zong
63a4(rgyud): bstims sku mdog dmar//lho ru gshin rje'i gdan lo ni//zhe sdang rdo rje sku mdog nag/gri gug dang nI sdigs mdzub phyag/nub tu rma bya'i gos can gyi//chu dag
63a5(rgyud): ste nas ljang ku yis/pa rgyal rdo rje zhes bya ba//rdo rje rgyas pa phyag ni bsnams//byang du gti mug rdo rje ni//desdigs mdzub a sho kA bsnams pa//lus ngan sder
63a6(rgyud): po la gnas pa'i//nyi ma'i gangadan la dgod par bya//thams cad g.yon birkyang rkang stabs can//khro zhing sgra ni gyen du brdzes//kha dog ser por mtshungs pa yi//
63a7(rgyud): mtshams bzhi la ni bum pa dgod//rnal 'byor ma brgyad dang ldan pa//'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni//'jig rten gsum gnas bud med kyi//bdag po dbang
63b1(rgyud): phyuzla dam par bca//de nas gzhan yang rang Ta shadU d+ha//gur+N+Nam pa khro bo dasgom pa ni//sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du lta//btsum po khra ba brtag par bya//rnamya de ba
63b2(rgyud): kha dog dmar//me ste bden bral mtsham su ni//'dod pa'i lha ste kha dog ser//mu hI NaM zhes/bla dog ljang //rlung sti lha mr-in ko ki la//zhes pa gri gug thong ba'i lag/
63b3(rgyud): nag po dbang ldan mtsham su gnas//thams cad g.yas brkyang stangs kyiso//lha mo per+Na shA ba ri//bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs gnas//'di nyid bsam gtan
63b4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//nya sogs bsregs pas mchod par bya//lha rnams kun kyang 'chi byed na//mi rnams gzhan pa smos ci dgos//de la 'di'i sngags ni/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na//
63b5(rgyud): bano d+ha ban d+ha che ge mo hUM phaT//shes rab dang ldan bsgoms par bya//g.yon pa'i phyog na pad+ma dkar//gtum po khro bo sngon po 'am//dmar po yang nu nag pos kyang //
63b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor bsgom pa yongs brtan pas/skad cig gi ni 'grub par 'gyur//de ltar mi g.yo dkar po sogs//'bad pa drage pos sgrom byed na//sems ni rtse gcig mnyam
63b7(rgyud): gzhag pas//sa bon dang bral nyid kyang sgom//za dang 'thung dang nyal ba dang //'dug dang 'gro dang 'chag par yang //gnas skabs kun tu rnal 'byor pas//lha yi rnam
64a1(rgyud): par+ya sgom par bya//yang na 'ad 'badu nag na//na tshun dun da rnal 'byor ma//dza srong rab tu gas pa dU pa/dasrod blang du 'ab pas na/
64a2(rgyud): rAng gas pa gyur narnal 'byor pa'i//phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grugo/zhes pa ni dpe'i bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs po'i dngul gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud lus lha myo rnams//
64a3(rgyud): kyi snrubs thabs kyi rim por bye ba y-i//bcom ldan 'dus dang la rdo rje 'i rjes de da/skyes paka'i stsal pa dang /khyo na khyo ma tsho shes
64a4(rgyud): rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po d+h+r-i gso///theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i dge ba'i
64a5(rgyud): gis gnyen mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dang drin las dpag tu med pa mnga' ba zlum chen po rin chen rgya'o mtshan gyi sku dz+nyAn la brten nas bla ma dus 'khor ba chen po shes rang
64a6(rgyud): slong gis bskul zhing sbyin bdag mdzo sa sbyin nas dpal ldanas s+ya'i gtsug lag//khang chen por /paN+Di ta d+yatrUM shrI'i zhal mA ni si len+d+ra ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi sgras
64a7(rgyud): na rgyun gi ts+li dag pa 'tshas dzugs par //na du na tu /'dun dadu/da mags
66a1(rgyud): par+ya bsgom par bya//yang na bde ba 'ba' zhig ni//phan tshun byede ba'i rnal 'byor ma//ji srid rab tu gsal gyur pa//de srid blang du 'bad pas sgom/
66a2(rgyud): rAb gsal gyur narnam 'byor pa'o//phyag r+b+ha chen pa'i dngos gru'o//zhes pa ni dpe'i bo gcig nyid du gsungs pa'i dngul garnam po khro ba chen po'i d+hI lces lha mams
66a3(rgyud): kyi sbubs thabs kyi rim por phye ba ste nyi shu lnga pa'o///bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dengs de skad ces bkanga' stsal pa dang / khyod de khyor ma'i tshogs
66a4(rgyud): rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so////theg pa chen po yang dag pa'i dge ba'i
66a5(rgyud): dashes gnyen mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dang phrin las dpag tu med pa mnga' ba bla ma chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi sku drin la brten nas/bla ma dus 'khor ba chen po shes rab
66a6(rgyud): sregleng ges bskul zhing sbyin badrug mdzod pa la sbyin nas dpal ldan sa s+ya'i gtsug lag khang chen por/paN+Di ta rat+na shrI'i zhal snga nas lo ts+tsha ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi sbrul gyi
66a7(rgyud): sprin drug gi zlaba'i dkar pa'i tshes bcul rdzogs par //myig pa du sa ma ngam ta tan rje ngan ma/bdi skad du//dang legs
66b1(rgyud): ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpa par rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa duH gaN+DI gA na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa
66b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga l-i bzhug so//brjod kyi mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyi mi ldang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab
66b3(rgyud): snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66b4(rgyud): chen po sku rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa'
66b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po tIng 'dzin rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang /byang chub
66b6(rgyud): sems dpa' so la chen po chu rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo dang /byang chub sems
66b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang
67a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
67a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang /de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
67a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi la dra ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang
67a4(rgyud): mnyam pa la 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rngu rin
67a5(rgyud): chen dpal dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba dang /de dag la sogs pa na mkha'i dbyings
67a6(rgyud): thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/dper na/til gyi gang bu bzhin du/de bzhin gsheDa
67a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis na mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu gang 'gyur te///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pa/
67b1(rgyud): dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod maklas chen po'i tshus zhes byu 'i ting ldadzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa de dag thams
67b2(rgyud): nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad//dA nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
67b3(rgyud): bdag pa yongasu mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugasu mngon par sprul nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur//
67b4(rgyud): to//de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu/la lo ni mA ma kI lU bu/la la ni gos dkor mo lta bu/la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma lta bu/la la ni gzugs kyi nga bai lta bu/la
67b5(rgyud): la ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu/la la ni dri'o ngo ba lta bu/la la ni rwa'i ngo bo lta bu/la la ni reg gri ngo bo lta bu/der yang dag par gnas par gyur te//de nas de bzhin ga
67b6(rgyud): pamI bskyod pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa bla
67b7(rgyud): bzhin byin gyi sa brlabs pa ni/gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyas//sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab//'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'a khrag/gsol
68a1(rgyud): ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
68a2(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbusu bzhag par gyur to//de nus de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod
68a3(rgyud): pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang /de bzhini
68a4(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang
68a5(rgyud): chub kyi sems rdo rje/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
68a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de nas na mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to//
68a7(rgyud): de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
68b1(rgyud): bde ba drang yid bde pa thob par gyur to//de na sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa shegs pa byang chub kyi sar+b+ba sa rdo rje/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs/
68b2(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs 'dri/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin
68b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlang so//byin gyis brlabs ma phrag tu/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta buro//
68b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
68b5(rgyud): thugs kha nas byung ste/ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//byang chub sem ni rab byung ba//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
68b6(rgyud): rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang
68b7(rgyud): chub kyi sems rdo rje la/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/phyag 'tshal nos
69a1(rgyud): 'das tho gas /sa dag 'ang sa rgyung zla kun pa shags na sdug du/du stsu du sma du rga /
69a2(rgyud): shid du gsal//de nas ma ldan 'das de 'azhin she pa b+hUng min+ma / zhin ni shugs pam la 'di skad ce 'i
69a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bya mas kyid leg so leg so//'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye byer byedanan
69a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams m+b+ha ni smros/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams capa mtshar du gyur/rmad du gyur te the tsham thams cad
69a5(rgyud): per mdzad pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi badrag po lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par
69a6(rgyud): can du gyur pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsing buM sngon por mo s+t+rai drA ste/
69a7(rgyud): ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlas pa midzad//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam chog 'a tshog gis/
69b1(rgyud): grwashegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba bgyi ba nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang /mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar
69b2(rgyud): gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/de bzhin
69b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ye shes kyi sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog
69b4(rgyud): gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //badz+ra d+h+r-ika/de nas 'di phyung ma thog tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
69b5(rgyud): dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyed pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyi/nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
69b6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje la zhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/gti mug gi
69b7(rgyud): rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //dzi na dzi kaM/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
70a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/dkar po nag po dmar/
70a2(rgyud): po'i tshul du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
70a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi/rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i tI nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog snying po'i snying po 'di/nyid
70a4(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //rat+na d+h+r-i ka/rI nas 'di byung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
70a5(rgyud): rig pa'i skyes bu rin chen dpal gyi phyad rgya cheni por sbyor bas na mkha'i gnas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
70a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i lho phyogasu bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
70a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/'dod chags kyi rigs kyi mchog snying po'i snying po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //a ro li ka/de nas
70b1(rgyud): 'di byung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe byas pa thams cad kyi/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag
70b2(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya chen por skor ba'i thabs kyis/dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs
70b3(rgyud): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa gdon mi za ba'i mchog/dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
70b4(rgyud): dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byungango //pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan
70b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa gdon mi za ba'i phyage rgya chen por sbyor bI'i thabs kyis/ljang ku dang
70b6(rgyud): nag po dang dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogasu bzhugs so//zhe sdang ga ti mug 'dod chags dang //yid
70b7(rgyud): bzhon nor bu dam tshig ste//rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis//'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub po'o////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
71a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin/rjes mnyes par byed pa'i dam chug ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la rnams par zhugs nas/rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun
71a2(rgyud): mo'i mchog 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byungango //dwai Sha ra ti/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
71a3(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/shar phyogs kyi bAr bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
71a4(rgyud): pa thams cad/rjesu mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/nyid
71a5(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //mo hA ra ti/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
71a6(rgyud): rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/lho phyogs kyi grwang bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod cha
71a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa/rje bu chags pa byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo
71b1(rgyud): mchog 'di/nyid kyi sgra dang gsung drang thugs rdo rje las phyung //rA ga ra ti/dri nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsu
71b2(rgyud): dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te//nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
71b3(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/
71b4(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //badz+ra ra ti/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes
71b5(rgyud): bu de nyid/bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/byang phyogs kyi grwa ri bzhugaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog dam tshig phun sum tshogs pa'o//
71b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khong byin gyis
71b7(rgyud): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //ya mAn+ta kri ta/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
72a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca bsgrengs par byed pa'i tshul du shar phyogs kyi
