72a2(rgyud): sgor bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//de bzhin
72a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i khro bo chen po 'di/nyid kyi sgo dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //pradz+nyAn+ta krita/de nas 'di phyung ma
72a4(rgyud): thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid//rdo rje'i dem tshig bsnyengs pa'i tshul du/lho
72a5(rgyud): phyogs kyi sgor bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo zhe bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//
72a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo las
72a7(rgyud): phyung //pad+ma mAn+ta krita/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi reg pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin
72b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi tshul du/nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya
72b2(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di//
72b3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //big+h+nAn+ta krita/de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
72b4(rgyud): kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi tshul du/byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
72b5(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyes par byed pa dang /dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnamaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
72b6(rgyud): ba 'dus pa las/de bzhin gshegs po thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byon gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de
72b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te/phyag 'tshal nas 'di/
73a1(rgyud): skad ces bsol to//sku dang gsung dang thung chog/de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyo gsang /bla nu med pa'i byang chub rloms//coMmaldan
73a2(rgyud): snying po bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/de bzhin gshegs pa
73a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cir+ya/byang chub side thams cad kyi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa yang thugs kyis mkhyen nas/byang chub sems
73a4(rgyud): dpa' de dag le 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang /lus sems lta bu dang /sems tshig tu brjod pa lta bur bskyed cig/de nas
73a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs na mkha' lta bur sbyar nas/tshod du brjod pa 'di
73a6(rgyud): tshochod du brjod do//e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi//sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can//skye ba med pa'i tshul gyi su//skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags//de nas bcom ldan 'das
73a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
73b1(rgyud): pa'i chos rdo dz+haiM zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub kyi sems 'di gsu so//dngos po med pas sgom pa med//bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min//de ltar
73b2(rgyud): dngos po dngos med pas//sgom pa demig mu med pa'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
73b3(rgyud): bas gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
73b4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so//dngos po thams cad dang bral ba//phung po khams dang skye mchod dang //gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangasmra pa//chos
73b5(rgyud): bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas//rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa//stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin//zhes bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs
73b6(rgyud): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mo bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
73b7(rgyud): chub kyi sems 'di gsungs//dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa//chos dang chos nyid med pa ste/na mkha' lta bur bdag med pa/byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o//zhes bcom ldan
74a1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa
74a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhe bya bI ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso//chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing //chos kyi
74a3(rgyud): mtshan nyid rnam par spangs//bdag med chos las kun tu byung //byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal
74a4(rgyud): gyis gsungaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'odad zor 'bar ba rdo rje skon ma zhes bya ba'i tong 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
74a5(rgyud): byang chub kyi seMs 'di gsung sngo//ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la//ngo bo mede sgom pa'ang med//na mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis//dngos po dag tu rab tu bsgrags//
74a6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za ba de bzhin
74a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso//chos rnams rang bzhin 'od
74b1(rgyud): gsal ba//gdod nas dag pa na mkha' bzhin//byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med//byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa
74b2(rgyud): gradon mi za bas gsungs//de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs/
74b3(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/rmad du gyur te/ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod//e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'i chos//ches bshad
74b4(rgyud): pa ni ngo mtshar che//yang dag don ni dag pa'i don//byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha lo//bdag med pa yi chos las byung //sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mjed pa//rnam par mi
74b5(rgyud): rtogs dmigasu med//byang chub sems la phyag 'tsho lo//kun tu bzang po thams cad don//byang chub sems ni rab bskor bya//byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che//byang chub sems
74b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//dag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs//sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa//byang chubo sems la phyag 'tsha lo//de bzhin
74b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/byang chub sau sa kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das de
75a1(rgyud): nan tu gnas gas ts+tsha dzA s+'u d+hA baspyang dang nanan du rAHts+tshan+dan gas pa da sbyin smra gags pa byasas A d+hA smod dang/
75a2(rgyud): nas bya ba 'dzin la snyoms par blugs te/de rje ninyid pazhes na ti 'i ladu 'di gsungs/shUn+d+ha d+hA dz+nyA na bad+h+waMs b+hA bA smrad kauH//ni bai
75a3(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//'od zor sbyin gyi bkod pa che//sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam//'od zer sna lngas kun tu
75a4(rgyud): byeb dkun nas yongasu zlum po ste//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab//mchod pa rnam pa lngas rgyan pa//mdor na de ltar bsgoms nasu//gzugs ni dbus bsgom par bya//
75a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che//sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi//phyog rgya chen po bsgom par bya//tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis//bsku
75a6(rgyud): dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis//myi bskyod pa yi rgya mchag dang //dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang //tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang //thogs med grub pa'i rgya chen rnams//
75a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom por bya//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra//rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams//rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs
75b1(rgyud): 'dzegs lha//shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba//thor tshugs cod pan gyis rgyan pa//rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams//sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan//'dzam bu chu
75b2(rgyud): bo'i gser 'od 'dra//sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu 'khrigs//de yi phyag na rdo rje che//rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom//marba ta yi 'od 'dra ba//rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par rgyan//kun tu
75b3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab//phyag ni rin chen bsnams par sgom//pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba//gtso bo 'dod chags 'bar ba mnga'//rab 'bar phyag na pad+ma bsnamaso//'dod chaDa
75b4(rgyud): rdo rje can bsgom bya//'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dra'i sku//gdon mi za ba rdo rje can//zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//de nas bcom ldan
75b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
75b6(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungaso//oM d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko hiM/rin chen chen po kha dog lnga//yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam//sna yi rtse
75b7(rgyud): mor nan tan du//rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu sgom//rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro//brten par ma gyur yang mi spro//sangs rgyas 'bang ba 'dra ba'i 'di//mchog rab sprin
76a1(rgyud): rnam // du rgyun nan drung nan ldan na/byung chu snyom na tunanas/ da
76a2(rgyud): //rnam kyang rjes gnas par//rgyu la/sa pa bya dkyil sgra da dus gnas pa
76a3(rgyud): pa n+ti/ dkyil 'a khor 'dra bar ni//pad+ma sgom pas bsgom pa bya//rin chen dkyil 'khor 'bru ba ni//rin rten btsun pas bsgrim par g+ha//spyod pa'i dkyi
76a4(rgyud): sa b+h+ya /mau dU ba skye ba ste/'di dgas sa rgyas kyis 'o//gas zlags ni rnams pa yis//dkyil rje la d+h+ya~M g+d+ha/rnams nga
76a5(rgyud): mkhyen de'i tshul 'thob pa'o//de cin gshegs pa rnams snod kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs phyogs pa nga ba rgyu lardo rje bklod pa zhes bya ba'i tid 'dzin gyi la
76a6(rgyud): gsum pa na//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin kau shegs pa rnams ts+tshed yang 'dus nas/btsamA ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
76a7(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos//bskyed pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btas po//de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni ba/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas/ sa
76b1(rgyud): kun bdag med pa yi mchog/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol//mtshan rnams thams cad yang drug rdzogs//mtshan min thams cad yang dag sbyangs//kun tu bzang ba
76b2(rgyud): sku yi mchog/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol//zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba//kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/dkyil 'khor
76b3(rgyud): dam pa bshad de gsol//sems can kun gyi sems chen po//rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med//kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur//dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du
76b4(rgyud): gsol//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa//'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso//'jig rten gsumo mchog ston pa po//de bzhin gshegs
76b5(rgyud): pa kun gyi gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba//dkyil 'khor rab tu nyams dga' bshad//de nas thugs kyi dkyil
76b6(rgyud): 'khor mchog/thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba//sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi//dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya//lus ngag sems ni bsgoms pa yis//shes rab can
76b7(rgyud): gyis thig gdab po//thig skyed sar po legs bkal ba//tshad ma rab tu mdzes pa yis//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//khru ni bcu gnyis ched du bya//ngos bzhi dang ni
77a1(rgyud): grwa bzhir ldan//sgo bzhi pAr ni rab tu brtag/de yi dbus 'khor lo no//rab tu zlum po bro bar bya//de nus las kyi cho ga ni//mthong byas phyad
77a2(rgyud): rgya dgod par bya//de'i dbus rdo rje bri ba ni//in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra//'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa//'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed//'khor lo chen po shar
77a3(rgyud): phyogs su//rdo rje 'byar bas rnam par brgyun//rin+da chen chen po lho phyogasu//'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs//pad+ma chen po nub phyogs//pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra//
77a4(rgyud): rol gri chen po byed phyogs//'od zer mang blo rag 'khrigs/dbus na sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od//spyani shar gyi g+hu ru gri//mA~M ma ki yi ri gros 'byung ba'i//rdo rje de bzhin
77a5(rgyud): phyogs su//pad+mo khro bye sdong bur bcas//nub phyogasu ni bri bar bya/ud pa la mdzes pa byang phyogasu//mthing kha sprin dade 'dra bar bri//tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba
77a6(rgyud): shoshar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya//rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang bya//be con lho yi phyog su bri//pad+mo 'bar ba 'od byed pa//nub kyi phyogasu bri bar bya//rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje can/
77a7(rgyud): byang gi phyogasu rdo rje dri//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de//yongasu gsal bar shes byas nas//lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis//nan tan du ni mchod par bya//bud
77b1(rgyud): mod ba tu mdangs bad ga/lo grangs bcu drug yon pan+de// dang me tog thong rgyan to//yon tan sku rags mA mA //shos rab can gyis byin rlabs la//do yi dngas mas
77b2(rgyud): par bya//sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas spros pa sa//na mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu rgyu no//shang gA ci/tshu khrag la sogs//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//de ltar byas nis sangs
77b3(rgyud): rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/de bzhin gshegs
77b4(rgyud): po thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni//kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi//rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni//
77b5(rgyud): gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis//spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don//spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to//rnam par mi rtog don las byung //'dod chags zhe sdang gaN+DI
77b6(rgyud): mug rigs//theg pa mchog ni bla med pa'i//dngos grub rab mchog sgrub par byed//rigs dran smrig+ni ma mkhan la sogs//gsod don do na gnyer sems pa rnams//theg
77b7(rgyud): chen bla na med pa yi//theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur//sems can mtshams med la sogs po'i//sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho che//theg pa
78a1(rgyud): /mchog ni 'di la 'gyub//snying nas slong dpon spyod pa dag/bsgrubs cad 'grub par yong mi 'gyur//srog gcod pa s+yai sems can gang //sman
78a2(rgyud): du spru la dga' ba dang //gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang //rtag tu 'dod pa spyod gang dang //ga shang gci zasu za ba ste//de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur//ma dang
78a3(rgyud): rme bu mo la//'dod pa bas ni mnyes byas na//theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi//dngos grub rgya che des 'thob//sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la//rnam par mi rtog blo
78a4(rgyud): can gyis//mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te//de ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur//de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dang
78a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshur du gyur rmad du gyur te//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi badrag po ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
78a6(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig dran pa gsung zhes gsol to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs
78a7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu rnams thong de
78b1(rgyud): skad ma thor cig/snying po ye shes can rnams kyi//sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di//snying po chos kyi don las byung //byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin//de nas yang brjod kyis
78b2(rgyud): mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing /ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs skrag nas rgyal bar gyur to//de nas
78b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
78b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol/de nas bcom ldan
78b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyisu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
78b6(rgyud): zhugs so//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'angs sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis rig pa tsam gyis/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
78b7(rgyud): chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur te//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/rmad du gyur/dbyes ngas khyab par gyur nas/chos kyi dbyangs
79a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs//oM ma'o chos e ma'o chos//e ma'i chos kyi don 'byung ba//chos don dag pa bdag med pa//rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshag
79a2(rgyud): 'dud//sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dang //na mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas//rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med//rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud//thugs ni de bzhin
79a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gtso//dus gsum drag gi lam du byung //na mkha' chen po dbyings gyur pa//na mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dod//na mkha'i sku las yang dag byung //
79a4(rgyud): namakha'i li la gnas pa po//na mkha'i thugs te chos kyi mchog/spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal 'dud//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang tha
79a5(rgyud): kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/kun tu spyod pa mcho gri le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa
79a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsod ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsung so//oM sarba ta
79a7(rgyud): thA ga ta tsid+ha badz+re swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad/rdul dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
79b1(rgyud): /snyoms par zhugs te/sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsung so//oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin kags pa che dpag
79b2(rgyud): tu med pa/mnyam pa nyid mi gau nyes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsung so//oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba
79b3(rgyud): At+ma ko&haM//rdo rje gsum po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang //gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya//sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshon byas la//mchog rab
79b4(rgyud): 'di yis bsgrub pa nyid du bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal/yo shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
79b5(rgyud): sngags 'di gi sungaso//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba/rdo rje gdan mi za
79b6(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/sngags 'di gsungs//oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas//sangs rgyas
79b7(rgyud): tshul bzhin mchod par bya//mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis//myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
80a1(rgyud): dang thugs du sa ga /sa so mardzun dus smon gnas mas //rgyu dang gsung da gas na
80a2(rgyud): rje 'dzin gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi speT gyi gsang ba 'di gsung so//sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni//ngag dang yid kyis bskul nasu//yid ni dga' zhing
80a3(rgyud): mgu ba yis//dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par bya//sems lnga dmigs pa bdag med pa//ngag dang lus kyang rnam byar sgom//na mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas/
80a4(rgyud): sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya//lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na//ngo bo nyid ni dmigs med//sngags kyi lus sbyor ba la//byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med//sku
80a5(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni//'di ni mdor na rnam dpyad nas//sngags kyis brtags pa'i ting 'dzin//byang chub sbyor ba sgom par bya//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/
80a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod//sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis//sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//zla ba'i
80a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas//phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam//sA yi rtse mor yungs kar bsom//'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar
80b1(rgyud): la/yo shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba//gsang ba'i po shos kyis brtags sgom//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus glanas par//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas
80b2(rgyud): sku yi gnas bsgoms te//de yaM skyeng du gnas bzhago/hUMn mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas por//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//sman gyi tshul du sbyor ba la//
80b3(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma rnam par sgom//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//rin tshon dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//mchog sbyor ba nan tan gyis//de yi steng du yongasu sgo mo//na mkha'i
80b4(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro//'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro//ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba//rtse
80b5(rgyud): mo lnga pa khyad par du//nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis//sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam//tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la//'dab ma brgyad pa go sar bcas//sna yi rtse mor 'di
80b6(rgyud): shes te//bsgoms pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur//'khor lo la sogs khyad par du//sgom pa der ni brtag par bya//dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas//nyams
80b7(rgyud): dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni//de ru mdor na spro bar bya//sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa yi//chos kyi tshig rnams rab
81a1(rgyud): tu brjod//de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//de nyid don kun ston pa pos//spyod pa kun mchog legs dag ga/gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to//zla
81a2(rgyud): dang sgra dang ror ldan pa//shes rab can gyis zla drug rlom//gsung ba'i de nyid mchod chen gyis//legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya//dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa
81a3(rgyud): yis//za su bshang gci zos na ni//sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa//yang dag bla med grub par 'gyur//za su sha rnams za ba dang //shwa chen dag ni rab brtags na//
81a4(rgyud): sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yi//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha/zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya//zas
81a5(rgyud): gzhan dag ni ma zos na//byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang //sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur//'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//
81a6(rgyud): 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten na//go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur//gtso bo gzi can stobs dang ldan//mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong //mthong ba tsam gyis
81a7(rgyud): bskul med par//'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste//yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di//lus ngag
81b1(rgyud): sems las 'da' ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung drang thugs kyi gsang ba gasdang ba 'dus pa las/sgyu dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob bya'i le'u sku
81b2(rgyud): drug pa'o///de nas bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos/dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mtsha
81b3(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsung so//'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la//ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni//'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas myur du
81b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni//ji ltar 'dod par ngot+ten bya ste//rang bri lha yi sbyor ba yis//bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya//dka' thub sdom pa mi
81b5(rgyud): bzad pas//bsten kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi//'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la//bsten na myur du 'bru lnga 'gyur//slos mo za zhing mi bzla ste/slongaso mo'ang dga' bar mi bya'o//
81b6(rgyud): 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas//lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni//bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob//gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang //
81b7(rgyud): dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams//chos mchog mi g.yo brnyas pa yang //'dod pa
82a1(rgyud): /rnams cad bston pa'o//chags can 'a shes 'dod pa mas//rtag tu 'dod man m+b+ha rnams banan//nga chub sems da margyas pa dag
82a2(rgyud): chub nyi ma tshugs par bya//gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas//mchod par byed pas mchod par bya//de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//sangs rgyas rnam par
82a3(rgyud): mdzad pa ni//sgyu sa rnam gsum shes byas nas//sku rnams la ni dngul bar bya//de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//sang ste rgyus rin chen 'byung gnas gci//dri la rnam
82a4(rgyud): gsum shes byas nas//sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya//de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso//ro la rnam gsum
82a5(rgyud): byas nas//lha rnams pa ni dbul bar bya//de nyid ljongs rgyas sna tshogs pa//sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin//reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas//bdig gi rigs
82a6(rgyud): l-i dpral ba bye//de nyid bcom ldan rdo can//mi bakhyud pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o//gzugs sgyu rol sogs pa lta//rtag tu sems ni sbyar bur bya//'di de sangs rgya
82a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi//gsang ba'i snying po 'i dus pa'o//gzugs sgra d+hi sogs sdigs pa yis//sgra nyid du ni rtag tu sgom//yang ni de la sbrum pa ni//rigs kyi tshul du rnam
82b1(rgyud): par sgom//sangs rgyas rjesu dran par sbyor//chos ni rjes dran snum pa//rdo rje rjes dran zlum pa//sgra dang gsung dang thugs rnams sgom//rigs ni rjes dran par sbyar//zla /
82b2(rgyud): dAn sgom pa//lha ni rjesu dran par sbyor//bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur//bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba//lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la//byin gyis brlabs
82b3(rgyud): kyi gnas gsum gyis//dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar
82b4(rgyud): bas//sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang //AHdang phaT kyang rab brtag bya//'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi//pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya//'byor
82b5(rgyud): bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar//yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bA//sangs rgyas rjes drin sbyor la sogs//byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya//de la sangs rgyas rje su dad//dran pa ji
82b6(rgyud): ltar sgom zhe na//b+ha ga pa ni ling ga bzhag/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya//ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas//mkhas pas sangs rgyas sbyin rnams spro//de la rje su dran pa/
82b7(rgyud): ji ltar sgom zhe na/b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya//ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas//mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro//de la rdo rje rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom
83a1(rgyud): wAn/b+hA ga lA ni ling ga bzhag/rdo rje sems dpany+dza rnam par k+kos//da smA rnams kyi bu ga nas//rdo rje sbyin+da rnams spro bar bya//de la rigs
83a2(rgyud): rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gA bzhag/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu sgom//ba spu rnams bu ga nas//mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro//de la khri
83a3(rgyud): su na pa dzaM ltar sgom zhen/b+ha ga la ni lang s+ye bzhag/khro bo'i dbang po rab tu sgom/ba spyi rnams kyi bu gaM nAs//mdzes pas khro bo'i sprin rnams s+ho//de la dam
83a4(rgyud): tshig NAM su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/bdag gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar to//rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod//
83a5(rgyud): de la dkyil 'khor rdzasu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/dbade po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste//mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung //dkyil 'khor dkyil
83a6(rgyud): 'khor tshul du bya//de la sku rjesu dran pa ji ltar sgrom zhe na/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin//phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas//sangs rgyas sku yI rang bzhin gyis//bdag kyang
83a7(rgyud): de dang 'drar gyur cig/de la gsung rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin//gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs//bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra ste//chos
83b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/de la thugs rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa//kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin//rdo rje 'dzin pa lta ngur ni//bdag gi
83b2(rgyud): sems kyang de 'drar gyur//de la sems can rjesu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/sems can kun gyi sems gang yin//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan//de ni sangs rgyas thams cad
83b3(rgyud): kyi//mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig/de la sngags thams cad kyi gzugs dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rjesu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin//
83b4(rgyud): gsung gi sku yang rnam sgom pa//bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar//sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig/de la dam tshig rjesu dran pa ji ltar skom zhe na/dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin//
83b5(rgyud): 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na//dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur//de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjesu dran pa ji
83b6(rgyud): ltar sgom zhe na/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba//thams cad ma skyes zag pa med//byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med//khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med//de la ma skyes
83b7(rgyud): pa rjesu dran pa ji ltar skom zhe na/thams cad rang bzhin 'ad gsal ba//mtshan med mi 'gyur na mkha' bzhin//gnyis med gnyisu med min bzhin//shin tu dri med na mkha'
84a1(rgyud): /bzhin//de la zhe sdang gi rigs pa sogasdu pa'i mchod pa rjes sA dAn pA dza stAR+Sha sgom zhe na/bud med sems nI rab brtan pa//lo grangs bcu
84a2(rgyud): gnyis lon rnyed pa//rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te//bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya//'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni//chos
84a3(rgyud): 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang //tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub//gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams//rdo rje mi phyed gsum
84a4(rgyud): bsgoms te//bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/sngags kyi spyod pa
84a5(rgyud): mchog le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
84a6(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po//dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo//rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che//na mkha'i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba
84a7(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che//rdo rje theg pa rab ston ya/na mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs
84b1(rgyud): pa'i mchog/rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol//thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa//theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas//sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/mi mchog mchod
84b2(rgyud): pa bshad du gsol//byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan//chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba//sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o//de nas rgyal po rdo rje
84b3(rgyud): 'dzin//thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur tshe//thams cid dbang bskur kun gyi don//kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/rdo rje mi phyed gsum
84b4(rgyud): gnas pa//sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog/rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad//na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa//gzugs bzang bzhon pas rgyan pa ni//lo grangs nyi
84b5(rgyud): shu lnga lon rnyed//byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am//rgyal nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams//bshang gtso chu la sogs pras
84b6(rgyud): byug pa 'am//rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya//nu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar//cho ga shes pas yang nA rkang pa'i bar//lte ba rked pa gsar bar rgyal ba'i sras/
84b7(rgyud): rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya//bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par//mkhas pas snying khar
85a1(rgyud): bsgom par bya//zhing rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na//brtsu ba dag kyang rab tu bya//rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la//'od zer phreng bas rnam par rgyun//ye shes
85a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi//gnas de yin par rnam par bsam//bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas//mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro/mkhas pas ud pa la dag dang //pad+ma rnam
85a3(rgyud): bo lngar shes bya//dA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//me tog kar+t+ti kA ra dang //mal+li kA dang yU thi kA//me tog ka ra bI raM bsam//mchod pi
85a4(rgyud): thams cad rab tu brtag//dpagra ched brgya yi khyon tsam du//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sgom byas la//rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni//rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya//
85a5(rgyud): de bzhin pad+mo rdo rje dang //ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas sgom//dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du//gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi//mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa//gsal zhing
85a6(rgyud): rang bzhin dri ma med//rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir//shes rab can gyis gan su bsgom//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis//de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam//
85a7(rgyud): rin chen na bza' la sogs pas//byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod//mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis//rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya//rin chen 'byung gnas
85b1(rgyud): nachung mchog/tshon rnatsho/mdzob bro brgyan//sgrub che rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rnyan la dngul bar bya//de dang de rin chen sna bdun gyis//mkhas pa dag gis yadzA/
85b2(rgyud): bkang la//dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir//nyan re shes rab can gyis dbul//bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyamo gzhag la//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu//'ad
85b3(rgyud): chags blo can sangs rgyas la//reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi
85b4(rgyud): lus//bla ma bshang dang gtsa bas mchod//bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi//na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa//byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te//sangs rgyas mchod pa
85b5(rgyud): /rab tu brtag/mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas//khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste//ye shes rdo rje can
85b6(rgyud): gyi gsang //sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thabs kyi gsang ba gsung ba 'dus pa las/gshang gci'i
85b7(rgyud): dam tshig gi li'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur che//thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/dbang phyug dam pa
86a1(rgyud): kun don gyis//sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa//rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor//sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi gsang //nyu sa dga' mchog ni rab tu
86a2(rgyud): bshad//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas//lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya//'od 'phro mang
86a3(rgyud): po 'bar ba dang //'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang //dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams//bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag/sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni//rdo rjes phyir
86a4(rgyud): brlags med gyur pa//bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni//thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus//sems can thams cad bsad na ni//mi
86a5(rgyud): bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu//rgyal ba'i sra su skye bar 'gyur//'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste//rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par shes par bya'o//
86a6(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa//ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med//byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas//sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa ni/yang dag dam tshig bka'
86a7(rgyud): stsal to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te//sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom/
86b1(rgyud): na kun rtswa spyong bas yid//rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag/nor rnams thams cad sgrogs nas//rdo rje gsun du rnamangs rgyas na//nor rgyu sa gdu byas//yod
86b2(rgyud): bzhin nor bu 'dra drir 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang //thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur//'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad laso//gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig
86b3(rgyud): yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa//gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas//dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to//nam
86b4(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnos par//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te//sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang //bud med lci bur sbyar ba ni/
86b5(rgyud): dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis//thams cad de ru bsgom par bya//'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas//de dag thams cad nye bar spyad//'dri ni rdo rje thams
86b6(rgyud): cad kyi//mi phyed sgo gsum sgom pa'o//'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje
86b7(rgyud): sngags kyi ngan sgrub pa//bdag med ye shes las byung bas//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
87a1(rgyud): gas sa /sa su rgyas thams cad pa ma ldan// dag smra na rdzun rdzu dang/rgyu
87a2(rgyud): da su rnams dang//rdum du thams da dun sa r+b+ba r+m+mA mA sa rba m+b+hi/nama'a'i gsung b+h+rU~M dr-i mi drug/shes cin kun rgyun nga/
87a3(rgyud): kyi dngos gru thob par //'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dpe tshig gi de kho na nyid/don d+hi lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o//de nas rnal b+h+r-i rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje ma
87a4(rgyud): spyod gsum tshul gnas/rdo s+yai b+heDU rab ston dang//bzung ni 'di ska bkang stsal to//na mkha hU~Mm+b+ha kyi sa gnas por//dam chog dkyil 'khor ba sgom pa
87a5(rgyud): /nyin mtshan dpal ni rab bsgoms te//ga zugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang //rgyu ba de'i dbu lo sogs pa ni//bstan na ye shes thob pa 'gyur//bcom ldan
87a6(rgyud): don ga sheg pa pa rnamapa rgyad ste sa sa paka skyes te//de nan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmargyun ka rdo la la sogs
87a7(rgyud): byang chu'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam/ri mtshar du byur cing rjed du gyur nas che 'di skad ces spyas/com ldan da de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
87b1(rgyud): bdag po/khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad lus 'das byas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor
87b2(rgyud): nang du/'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig lAm/rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/brjod kyis
87b3(rgyud): mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul bya mo rnyed kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byed
87b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang /smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu yang ma skyed cig/de ci'i
87b5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog/'di lta ste/sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper
87b6(rgyud): na na mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba ste/chos thams cod kyang na mkha'i khongasu gtogs pa'o//chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/gzugs kyi
87b7(rgyud): khams na mi gnas/gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnaso//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjesu rig par bya'o//de bzhin
88a1(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing /sems can rnams kyi bsdam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad//rigs kyi bu de ltar
88a2(rgyud): na mkha' tshig nges par brjod pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rje su rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na btsu ba stan dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i
88a3(rgyud): rkyen gyis du ba 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi//me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/me'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi
88a4(rgyud): gnas so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa rjesu rig par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
88a5(rgyud): dag ngo mtshar du gyur/rmad du gyur nas/ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smraso//rmed byung chen po'i chos rnams ni//nA mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang //rnam
88a6(rgyud): par mi rtog dge ba las//kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/
88a7(rgyud): don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshigri le'u ste dbu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/bcom
88b1(rgyud): ldan 'das dpe tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ste/'di skad ces gsol to//
88b2(rgyud): de nyid sngangs snying kun bsdus bya//sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar bsgrags//dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/yang dag bcom ldan pa shing du gse pa//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin
88b3(rgyud): nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso//'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas//gsung ni 'di skad bka' sprul to//lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni//rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa//gang na/
88b4(rgyud): dang mi gnas muny+tsAm pa nyid//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sbom//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul
88b5(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyems par zhugs nas/de bzhin bshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
88b6(rgyud): cad/mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu/sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par
88b7(rgyud): mdzad de/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas bklas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing /dgyes par yongasu spong ba yod kyang /de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon
89a1(rgyud): na mas rna 'dunan dang nan na du na ma na du rmA mardzun pa
89a2(rgyud): kyis mi 'chaste/de bstan skyes bu dam pa de dag la sbyin sa phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi sgra dang gsung drung bra /
89a3(rgyud): sdugs thams cad kyi skyeng po na bsgril bar byed pa zhes byu ga ragA tu gsang bye de ban gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsu deng thugs kyid chen po ma
89a4(rgyud): rdorje dzin pams cad ky-i m+b+ha dang gi spyang dang thugs kyi mchog la dmigs pa/chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung de dregs kyi mtshig sa dmigs pa de/nyi
89a5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje la ma tshig gi la mdzes par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsus so//oM A hU~M/de nis 'di ni gsungs tsam+b+ha gyis//sa sa d+ha sa sa
89a6(rgyud): sus pa kun//rab tu 'dar zhing brtul bar gyur//rdo rje sems dpa rjes dran//de nas phyi ba na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos//dam rjeg 'dig su
89a7(rgyud): mtshan nam kha'i dbyis kyi dbus gnas par//kod pa'i dkyil 'khor ba sgom par bya//de yi dngos gnas yi ga hUM//rang gi gzug su rab tu bte//rdo rje'i 'od zer che 'dzir
89b1(rgyud): bra rnam par 'bri ba bsam par bya//sangs rgyas kyi ni sgyu gsung thags//drangs pa de yis rnam bsgoms na//de ma thag tu dang 'gyur ba//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin//rdorje
89b2(rgyud): sems dpa' rgyal po che//kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog/rang gi dkyil 'khro rang rdo rjes//bskyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//snying po rdo rje
89b3(rgyud): bsdus pa yin//rang sngags skyes bur bsgoms nas ni//gnas bzhi rnamasu gzugs kyi tshul//zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis//kha dog gsum du rab tu sgom//bcom ldan
89b4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skrod ces bka' stsal to//de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog gi gsang ba'o//snying kha'i dbus phra mo yo//dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya//yi ge mchog tu
89b5(rgyud): gyur pa'i tshig/de yi dbusu bsam par bya//rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa//rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya//rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya//de yis snying
89b6(rgyud): khar brdab byas te//lha rnams ji snyed bskul bar bya//'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o//rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs//rdo rje kyo ba rnam sgom zhing /
89b7(rgyud): snying kha ru ni bskul bar bshad//'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste//rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di//zhag bdun bar du byas na ni//ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang //sku dang gsung thugs/
90a1(rgyud): na'agrub par 'gyur//mchog stsol ba dag rnam par gags//yod na 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas//yod la mgu zhing dbang byur ba'o//dngos
90a2(rgyud): grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams//sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas//rmongs pas 'da' bar byas na ni//de yi srog ni der zad
90a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mchog/'jig rten gdu mo mchog rdo rje gtses//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/
90a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//dngos po thams cad brtag par bya//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sngags kyi dam tshig sgom pa'o//
90a5(rgyud): ri'i ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la//rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab sgom zhing //chags la chags pas blta bar bya//'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//de bzhi
90a6(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi sras//thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtses//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//'jig rten khams ni thams cad na//bud med ji snyed yod pa
90a7(rgyud): kun//phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba yis//de dag thams cad nye bar spyad//bye grangs med rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas gnos ni der spro bya//bcom ldan 'ad byang chub kyi dam
90b1(rgyud): tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'o//byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho//rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe nges 'thob//de
90b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bskul pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
90b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs rjod bzhin gshe gde bzhin bshen pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin
90b4(rgyud): shegs pa tha~Md kyi sdug kyi rdo rje rig pa'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di gsungaso//rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom pa//byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/
90b5(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//oM nI ye shes snying po ste//rdo rje'i sku ni thob byed pa'o//AHni byang chub bdag med pa//rdo rje gsung ni thob byed pa'o//hU~M ni sku gsung thugs nyid de/
90b6(rgyud): rdo rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha' rdo rje'i
90b7(rgyud): dbus gnas par//dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam//rdo rje'i sprin ni 'phro bskyed pa//de ru yi ge b+h+rUM bas mo//de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o//b+h+rUM/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
91a1(rgyud): dbus gnas par//d+hU zhes bya ba rab tu m+b+ha//dang la dwa'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pad+ma//yi ge oM na rnam par ngas ma//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dngu
91a2(rgyud): gnas par//yi kye AHni rab tu sgom//yi gi dz+haiM g+h+r-is gnas bsgoms te//rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya//snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi//sku gsung thugs ni
91a3(rgyud): mnyes byed pa//oM ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/oM AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam//AHhU~M ni ye shes thugs kyi 'jigs//hUM/byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te/
91a4(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa//ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste//sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung //'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste//sma
91a5(rgyud): kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags//rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'o//dam tshig drug gis rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dong thugs kyi
91a6(rgyud): dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis brlob pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar//sbyor ba 'di ni kun brnams na//rdo rje sku dang
91a7(rgyud): gsung dang thugs//zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te//rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed//yi ge
91b1(rgyud): ni skyong khur bzhag/'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po//rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu sgom//'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku//rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur//ye shes lnga ldan
91b2(rgyud): bsten na ni//sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog/rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas//zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka'i sprul
91b3(rgyud): to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//rang gi
91b4(rgyud): sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed//AHni dag gi lam bzhag ste//kha dog lnga yi pad+ma che//'jig rten dbang mchog bsgoms pa yis//dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te//tshig gis
91b5(rgyud): dam tshig lnga yi mchog/chos kyi tshi gi lam gnas pa//rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur//ye shes lnga ldan bsten nu ni//rdo rje skul pa gsum du gnas//bcom ldan 'das
91b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dmyi pa
91b7(rgyud): ni/na mkha' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la//sems la yi ge hU~M gnas pa//dam tshig chen po'i de nyid ni//kha dog rnam sder bsgom par bya//rdo rje
92a1(rgyud): kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba//ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur//ye shes lnga ldan bston
92a2(rgyud): nA ni/da rdo rje skal ba gsum du gnas//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung deng thugs
92a3(rgyud): kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//ye shes dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya//lus rnams kun la kham dmigs na//rdo rje ye shes mkha'
92a4(rgyud): mnyal 'gyur//kha sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis//yang dang yang du mchod pa dang //skal pa gsum du dam tshig gnas//sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur
92a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das na mkha' rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//sku dang gsung dang thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//rdo rje'i
92a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus ni//rang sngags skyes bu rab bsams nas//snying kha ra rdo rje ha zhes pa//bzhag ste 'od zer rnam par sgom//hed 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la//sku
92a7(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//sa cu dag la gnas pa yi//byang chub sems dpang de 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//
92b1(rgyud): 'od zer 'bor ba'i yI ge b+h+rUM//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam//mtshan mchog rdo rje'i lus ngag gis//rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur//b+h+rUM/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig go bkod pa'i
92b2(rgyud): gnas zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to//sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur//'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog/
92b3(rgyud): sgrub pa'o//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgoms la//ye shes oM ni bsgoms par bya//oM/
92b4(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas//mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang /
92b5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin//'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du//mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par
92b6(rgyud): mngon par 'byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbusu ni//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam//na mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms la//rin
92b7(rgyud): chen oM ni bsam par bya//oM/rdo rje dmo tshig gsum bsgoms pas//rdo rje gsum dang gi med 'drar 'gyur//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis//dkon mchog dpal gyi 'od
93a1(rgyud): dang //don pa dag maud pa d+d+ha r+m+ma dang //shes dbyung 'du kA smra 'gyur//ma n+ta 'dus de bzhin ga nags parjo // ga dang /
93a2(rgyud): sa de skad ces ba la stsal te/ne ba che'i dam la spyod bu rdo rje'i rgyal zhes b+hA ba dzin to//nam kha'i sa hU~M san//sa yA r+g+haM sa
93a3(rgyud): dam pa bsam//'jig rten dbang phyug rab bskams la//chos kyi a ni bsgom par bya//oM/rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas//rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur//
93a4(rgyud): lus dang ngag semA rdo rje yis//'od dpag med dung 'dra bar 'gyur//de ni sems can thams cad kyi//phrag chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rdo
93a5(rgyud): dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//yon tan dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dbul zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus ni//sangs rgyas dkyil
93a6(rgyud): 'khor dam sde bsam//rdo rje pad+ma la bsgoms la//dam tshig oM ni rab tu sgom//oM/rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas//rdo rje gdon mi za bar 'gyur//lus dang ngag
93a7(rgyud): sems rdo rje yis//rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba'i 'od//de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho//sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de ska
93b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to//gdon mo za ba'i dam tshig 'od zer gyi ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o ting 'dzin to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus ni//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
93b2(rgyud): dam pa bsna maM//rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la//sku gsum uM ni rab tu sgom//oM/rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas//rnam par snang mdzad mnyam por 'gyur//lus
93b3(rgyud): dang ngag yid rdo rje ye//rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od//de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub//sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi de
93b4(rgyud): sprad ces bka' stsal to//lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//rnam par dben pa'i ri bo dang //klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni//dur
93b5(rgyud): gyi khrod la sogs par yang //bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag sgom//mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs//rdo rje na mkha'i dkyil du bsam//mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis/
93b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchog gi gan su sgom//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal te//rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa//'bar ba lnga yis rnam
93b7(rgyud): par brgyan//gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis//rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur//me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi//rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya//rdo rje lnga yi sbyor ba yis//
94a1(rgyud): rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje na mkha'i dkyil nyid du//'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra//sangs rgya sgo 'jug par rab bsgoms na//sangs/
94a2(rgyud): rgyus gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//bdag gi lus la snang mdzad bzhag/snying khAr yi ge oM bsams la//sngags la rnam par
94a3(rgyud): shes pa sgom//'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du//gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa//yid bzhin dpal ldan lta bur 'gyur//sangs rgyas
94a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rdo rje mi bskyed rab tu sgom//snying khar yi ge hUM dusgoms nas//sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus
94a5(rgyud): gnas par//tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom//snying khar yi ge AHbsams te/rdo rje thig ler gyur par bzhag/'di ni dam tshig mchog mchog/rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom
94a6(rgyud): pa//'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te//sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba//rdo rje na mkha'i dbyangs ban+d+ha par//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//lus ngag sems la
94a7(rgyud): yi ge oM//bsams na de ni skal par gnas//rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings gnas par//chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//lus ngag sems la yi ge AH//bsams na de
94b1(rgyud): skal par gnas//rdo dz+nyA na mkha'i dbyings gnas par//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//lus drug sdoms la yi ge hUM//bsams na de ni skal par gnas//bcom ldan//
94b2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi//rnal 'byor 'dire gyur phyin chad ni//klog gam yang na sems
94b3(rgyud): kyang rung //de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang po 'dus pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa
94b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//bskyed pa ye shes
94b5(rgyud): mchog sgrub pa//dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum//rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa//mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa//rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid//chos rnams rang bzhin
94b6(rgyud): dag pa las//rol mo 'di dag rab tu gom//dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogasu//me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan//ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogasu//dngos grub thams cad bsdus
94b7(rgyud): ba sgrug//maud lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la//rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu rnam//lus dang ngag sems la spros pas//rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur//dpag tshad brgya yi khyon
95a1(rgyud): tsam du//rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dag gis//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi//dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur//tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas///
95a2(rgyud): nams kyang mthong bar mi nuso//rdo rje 'jam pa mchog dam tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to//rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung //bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni//
95a3(rgyud): lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te//khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi phyed pa'i//thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms na//rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od
95a4(rgyud): 'dra bar//de ma thag tu de 'gyuraro//'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can//rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms nas//sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas//
95a5(rgyud): bsgoms nas sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur//ri rab sum cu rtsa dragi/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi//rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun//de yi rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur//'khor lo'i
95a6(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyi//dkyil 'khor dbusu rab bsgoms nas//rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par//bsam na rdo rje 'dra
95a7(rgyud): 1ra 'byor//r-i rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi//de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams//yon tan can gyi gan su 'gyur//drag po dag gis phyag byas pa//
95b1(rgyud): khams gsum rna chen por 'gyur//rdoHdam tshig ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la/rang sngags rdo rje bsnams nas//tshos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par
95b2(rgyud): bsams na chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur//ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi//rdul phrin ji snyed yod pa yi//sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du//dge ba'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed
95b3(rgyud): dad+mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//mi shes lnga ldan rab bsten na//bskul pa gsum du yun du gnas//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang
95b4(rgyud): gsum la bsnyen bskur byed//'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od//rang gi sngags kyi ral gri sgom//mig yangs lag ni thogs na ni//rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur//khams
95b5(rgyud): gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing //tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa//stong gsum na ni gcig pu pa//mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur//gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag/
95b6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje'i thugs las rab tu byung //de lta bu yi dngos grub ste//ral gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//oM ni ril bu tsa na ka
95b7(rgyud): 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni//dbus rang gi lha yi gzugs//bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na//de ni de ma thag tu yang //byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/
96a1(rgyud): /rmAdunyim shar ba'i 'di 'du na // rgyu po'i gsor rgyu mngo/ ni rob naHnA kak+kA/Shad+hAr+thadAts+tsham+b+ha du bsnams nas na//m+WA dang na rgyu yon du
96a2(rgyud): bsnam N+De khar bcug rnam bsgoms na//de ni de ma thag tu yang //byang chub ye shes 'di 'drar 'gyur//nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //dzAm+b+ha chu bo'i gser gyi mdon
96a3(rgyud): hUM ni ril buM can ka'o//'bru tshad tsam+ba du bsams nas ni//dbus rong gi lha yi gzugs//bsams te khur bcug rnam pasgom skye na//de ni de ma thag tu yang //rdo rje
96a4(rgyud): hU~M dang 'od 'drar 'gyur//mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbus gnas par//rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom//lkog tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na//'khor lo rigapa
96a5(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur//'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te//sangs rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing //ye shes 'di ni rab sgrub pa//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//mkha'
96a6(rgyud): dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te//lag tu rdo rje rab bsgoms na//rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms
96a7(rgyud): te//rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing //rdo rje'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gan bapa rin chen rdo rje rab tu sgom//phas
96b1(rgyud): ron chen rab bsgomaldan//rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rin po che yi rigs bsgoms nas//rin chen skur na rab sbyor zhing //rin chen mchog 'di sgrub pa ni//
96b2(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes dag gis bya//mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par//tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom//lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na/pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//
96b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs chen bsgoms na su//chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing //pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bye//mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas
96b4(rgyud): pa ri//gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom//lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms ni//ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas//thogs med dam
96b5(rgyud): tshig rab sbyor zhing //dam tshig mchog 'di sgrub pa ni//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs//rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na//sku gsung
96b6(rgyud): thugs kyi sgrub pa yis/bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//lam gyi bzhi mdo
96b7(rgyud): 'am shing gcig drung //mtshan mo gcig dang zhi ga na su//rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis//sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub//sbyor gsum rdo rje tsan rnams kyi//sbyor gsu
97a1(rgyud): sngags kyi skyesmra bu bsam//sbyangs rgyas ye shes blo sngun gyi// gsung thugs kyi kyo bA bat+tAd//rlung gi N+Di 'khor mchog gan sa ga//sangs/
97a2(rgyud): rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin//dum tshig lus byung phyogs bcu pa//rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyod//nA mkha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig dkrug pa'i cho ga'o//rnam par
97a3(rgyud): snod mdzad 'khor lo che//rdo rje pad+mo la sogs paso//rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni//dam tshig dgugo mchog kyi byas bya//khams gsum gyi dam tshig
97a4(rgyud): dgug pad+mo/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//sangs rgyas su ni rnam bsgoms la//lag tu sku dang gAsung thugs kyi// ba la sogs rab tu sgom//'di
97a5(rgyud): dag lta bu'i sbyor ba yis//de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'o//rdo rje'i spu ni rnams bsgoms la//rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom
97a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//sangs rgyas sgyur ni rnams bsgrims la//lag tu bsgru b+ha ba sams na ni/
97a7(rgyud): dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur//gsang gsum de che'i mchod bri mchog/mchod pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang po'i snying po bsdus pa yin/
97b1(rgyud): bcom ldan+da 'dres gsong ba chen po'i dam tshig gi de skad ces gsungs//sha tshun dam chog mchog gis ni//rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya//gra shang gci dmatshig
97b2(rgyud): mchog gis ni//rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur//glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis//mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur//rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis//mi snang
97b3(rgyud): ba yi bdag por 'gyur//khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//be lang sha yi dam tshig gis//rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur//
97b4(rgyud): sha rnams thams cad med na yang //thams cad bsams pas rnam par brtag/rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na//sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob//rnam pa'i mchog
97b5(rgyud): rnams kun ldan pa//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can//snying khAr ye shes dam tshig dang //dbu rgyan rdo mchog 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa//dmu
97b6(rgyud): tshi ga mchog gis bya ba ni//dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya//dam tshig thams cad ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting
97b7(rgyud): 'dzin to//lce yi dam tshig rdo rje mchog/rdo rje can gyis hUM sgoms te//bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis//zos ni rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur//aHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang
98a1(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste//'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje mi byed 'dra bar 'gyur//rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting
98a2(rgyud): 'dzin to//rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur//phyogs bcu'i sems can tha~Md kyi//nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur//'jig rten
98a3(rgyud): khams ni thams cad du//rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed//'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa'i mchog/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur//gang ka'i bye snyed
98a4(rgyud): thams cad du//grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod//dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi//rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur//rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas//thams cad dam
98a5(rgyud): tshig mchog tu 'grub//mi srung gyur pa thams cad la//stong khams dag ni snang bar byed//sangs rgyas kun+da las 'phrog pa dang //lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod//gang+gA'i
98a6(rgyud): bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams//rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa//rang lag skyu ri rA bzhag bzhin//rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur//prang+gA'i bye snyed zhing rnam sa na/
98a7(rgyud): bsgrags pa ni ji snyed pa//mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni//rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin//gang+gA'i bye skad zhing dag gi/sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni//sku gsu
98b1(rgyud): thugs kyis mtshan pa yi//rol mo las byung sems rlig 'gyur//bskal pa brad+d+ha'i bye snyed du//'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi//sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshig rnams//zhag
98b2(rgyud): gsum lon pa bzhin du dran//gang+gA'i bye ma skyed kyi lus//sangs rgyas srin la sogs brgyan pa//skal pa gad+hA'i bye snyed du//rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gi 'gengs//bac+doMm
98b3(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni/rdo rje'i spyan dang rdo rje'i snyan dang /rdo rje'i thugs dang /rdo rje'i
98b4(rgyud): gnas dang /rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrulo//sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub//sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur//gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i//'khor gyis yongasu bskor
98b5(rgyud): nas su//rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis//'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur//bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang //nye bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang //sgrub pa'i den
98b6(rgyud): gyi dam tshig dang //sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi//rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la//de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya//bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba//byang chub mchog ni
98b7(rgyud): bsgom par bya//nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la//rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyad//sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis//sgrub pa'i tshe ni bskul bar gsungs//sgrub pa
99a1(rgyud): chen po byed pa'i tshe//rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs//dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam//ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur//bsnyen pa'i ye
99a2(rgyud): shes bdud rtsi dag/thams cad du ni rtag par bya//d+hi ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//sngogs kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o//dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang //rab tu rnam par
99a3(rgyud): dben pa dang //ngo bo nags 'dab chu ngogasu//rtog tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//yang na rdo rje
99a4(rgyud): bzhi dag gis//brtul zhugs brten pas bsnyen pa bya//sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa//bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas//
99a5(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar ni//ye shes rdo rje yi ge oM//bsgoms na sdom pa yin par bshad//zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang //zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis//rdo rje
99a6(rgyud): dam tshig bsgrub na ni//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul ba//nga yis rgyas par rab tu bsta nu//gsang ba mchog las byung ba la//zla
99a7(rgyud): ba byed kyis 'grub par gsungs//de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul//sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan//rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa//byin gyis brlabs
99b1(rgyud): kyo gnas byas te//rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya//mi phyod rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas//phyogs bdur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//de la sku yis mtshan pa yi//byin gyos
99b2(rgyud): brlabs kyis gnas mdzad//de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa yul la//chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan//rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa//byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas
99b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsung dang ldan par bya//rdo rje myi phyed gsum pa sgoms pas//phyogs btsun bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams//de la gsung las byung ba yi//byin gyis brlabs kyis
99b4(rgyud): gnas mdzad//de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yulo//rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan//rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa//byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te/
99b5(rgyud): rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya//rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas//phyogs bcu ni bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams//de la thugs las byung ba yis//byin gyis brlabs kyis
99b6(rgyud): gnas mdzad//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am//yang na chos kyi sems dnga'ang rung //rmongs pas 'da' bar byed na ni//chal par 'gas par gdon mi za//de bzhin
99b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i mtsha
100a1(rgyud): bsnun pa'i lo'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'ad gshegs kun//ye shes rdo rje mtshon 'dzin pa//sems can kun don
100a2(rgyud): yang dag 'byung //byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis//thub pa don kun rdo rje can//ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas//dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la//mchod de rdo rje
100a3(rgyud): dbyangs 'di gsungs//e ma 'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang //e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog/e ma'o chos kyi tshul re zhi//e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan/
100a4(rgyud): ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni//ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can//rnam paro mi rtog yang dag rig/ye shes 'byung ba rab tu bshad//yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus//
100a5(rgyud): pa//rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che//sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor dang //sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba//rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms pa'i//rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor
100a6(rgyud): sa//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlog/rigs dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan//gsang sngags zlos pa de ring gsungs//
100a7(rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho gsad pa dang //sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams//rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgoms pas//ye shes mnyam med
100b1(rgyud): thob 'gyur ba//bcom ldan 'das kyi bshwad du gastalA//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//na mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung //byed spyod dam pa mchog gtses//rdo rje bzlas pa 'a
100b2(rgyud): gsung so//sngags kyi don kun bzlas pa ni//rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan//rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar//bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya//sku gsung thugs kyi gnas
100b3(rgyud): rnams su//spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya//rdo rje bzlas po 'di yas ni//rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs//bsgoms nas mchod
100b4(rgyud): pa'i mchog brtag pa//ye shes rdo rjes byas ni ni//rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs//bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag
100b5(rgyud): pa//ye shes rdo rjes rab tu bya//'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o//yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis//so so dag tu spro bar bya//sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa//
100b6(rgyud): shes sems kyis yang dag spro//brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni//rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya//'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'o//sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yin//sku yi
100b7(rgyud): rdzogs byang chub//dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa//sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad//de ni sku ye bzlas par bshad//gdung gi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub/sgra dang
101a1(rgyud): smra ba na rnam dpyad pa//gsung ba rdo rje zhes bshad//de ni brapung gi bzlas par bshad//thugs kyi dam tshig bas byang chub/gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam
101a2(rgyud): dpyad pa//thugs ni rdo rje zhes bya s+ho//de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad//don gyi rjes 'bri bzlas pa ni//ngo bo nyid med bzang po yis//dus ba sum sangs rgyas rnam
101a3(rgyud): dpyad pa//de ni rin chen bzlas par bshad//sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du//sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang //bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje don//de ni thogs med
101a4(rgyud): bzlas par bshad//khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis//rang gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grags//sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa//da ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad//
101a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa//kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'//sems can gti mug gnas la 'jog/de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad//'dod chags
101a6(rgyud): rdo rje las byung tshig/lus dang dgra sems la gnas pa'i//sems can 'dod chags mtshar gnas bzhag/de ni 'dod chags bzlas bAr bshad//zhe sdang rdo rje
101a7(rgyud): las byung sems//lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i//sems can zhe sdang gnas la bzhag/de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad//dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum//dbu
101b1(rgyud): sodapa ma mam//nyid dam rgyan rdo 'o//ras byam nang ts+tsham+b+ha/chag myu god don dum+b+ha ga/ po rnams cad ni//ses can na na dod pan/
101b2(rgyud): chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad//reg pa chen mo spyan la sogs//rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa//'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis nI//ngi m+b+hir 'dod pa bstan nu
101b3(rgyud): gti mug dam tshig las byung ba//rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can//mya nad dag gi gnas grub pa//dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster//zla ban+d+he sdang gnas les skyes//zhes
101b4(rgyud): rtag tu brtson pa dag/sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la//gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
101b5(rgyud): maM shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi//'khor lo snying khwa'i dbus sgom//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//dbusu 'khor lo'i don sgom mo//ye shes rdo rje can
101b6(rgyud): rnams kyi//rdorje snying kha'i dbus sgyum//rdo rje'i dkyil 'a'adi dbus gnas par//rdo rje'i sngags doni bsgos par //rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi rkyen skyid
101b7(rgyud): dbubu sgom//rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus brnas par//rin chen sngabs don bsgom par bya//pad+ma ye shes can rnams kyi//pad+mo steng khe'i dbus sbom//chos kyi
102a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//pad+mo sngags don bsgom par bya//ral blo shes can rnams kyi//ral gri snying khwa'i dbus skom//dam tshig
102a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya//dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnamasu//sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya//'od zer lnga yi
102a3(rgyud): bye brag gis//spros nA byang chub thob par 'gyur//sngags rnams thams cad spro ba nI//bye brag rnam pa gnyi su bsgrags//skye gsum rdo rje bye brag gis//spro ba dang /
102a4(rgyud): ni brtsub bya//lus kyis sku yi ngo bo nyid//sems kyis thugs kyi ngo bo nyid//ngag gis gsung gi ngo bo nyid//mchod nas mchod pa'i gan su 'gyur//dkyil 'khor
102a5(rgyud): chen pa'i 'khor lo yis//rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya//dbusu bdag po bsnams nas ni//sgra bsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs//rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis//
102a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu//kha dog rnam bzhir kun birtags la//snying khar sngags kyi don bsgoms na//rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las//bsam gtan rdo rje
102a7(rgyud): rin dag byed//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//gisang ba rab tu bzang po yin//zhi ba la ni sbyin gyi tshul//rgyas la rdo rje pad+mA can//dbang la rnam par smra
102b1(rgyud): mdzad gnas//rdo rje khro mo mngon spyod la//'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi//gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba//sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste//bya ba'i rol mos mtshan
102b2(rgyud): pa'o//ma dang smra ba'i sems can dang //rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang //rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ye shes
102b3(rgyud): chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnarmA//sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgrims la//dgra bos bsad par bsams
102b4(rgyud): nasu//de nas las rnams brtsam par bya//ni mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//rdo rje rtse lde khaM bzhi pa//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan//rdo rje sems dpar
102b5(rgyud): rnam par sgom//dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba//sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la//sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che//lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o//phyogs
102b6(rgyud): bcu nas byung sems can rnams//sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis//bsdus te grong bu'i tshul gyis//rang gi lus la de dag gzung //sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo can/
102b7(rgyud): slang yang spro bar rab tu bye//khro bas 'khrugs pa'i khro bo rnams//mi sdug 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs//mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa//gsod pa'i don gyis don/
103a1(rgyud): sems pa//rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam//gdug pa chen po gsod par byed//sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol ba'o//rdo rje gsum gyi
103a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnas//nyi ma bdun du 'di byas na//sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur//rmongs pas grub pa mi ster na//'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za//rdo rje'i dam
103a3(rgyud): tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus ni//'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan//rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan//
103a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom//dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba//rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni//rdo rje me stag 'phro ba tsan//de yi phyag na bsnams par
103a5(rgyud): sgom//phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams//rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis//'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni//de dgra bdag gi lus la gzung //spro ba rdo rje
103a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi//ye shes mchogi gnyen gyis bya//sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can//sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson//bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//bka'
103a7(rgyud): yi 'khor lo rab sbyor ba//gal te dam tshig las 'das na//rdo rje rab tu 'obar ba yis//sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi//zhig par 'gyur bar gdon mi 'chel//
103b1(rgyud): lakha lce'i dmachog ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo dzaHn+da//na mkha' rdo rje dbusu bAsam//bu shin rje ga shed kyi 'khor lo ma/
103b2(rgyud): rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams//sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dag/gshin rje gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba//slar yang
103b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas spro bar bya//dus gsum la bzhugs sems can dang //gdug sems can gyi dgra bo rnams//khros pas thams cad gsod par sgom//'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil/
103b4(rgyud): 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gA shin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'am//rang sngags don gyi
103b5(rgyud): yon tan nam//yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis//bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya//sngags kun srung phyir ye shes mchog/rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste//'di ni rdo rje
103b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi//byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog
103b7(rgyud): las//byung ba'i sgo gsum dam tshig dag/mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//bsams nas gdan du de rab brtag/mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
104a1(rgyud): /yongasu gang bar rnam par sbom//rang sngags yi ge'i gnas ye shes//thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du//
104a2(rgyud): bsgoms nas slar yang rab tu bsdu//thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir//sku gsum la ni de dag gzud//rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
104a3(rgyud): 'dzin to//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu sgom//sangs rgyas rim bzhin bkod nas ni//chu yi steng du btsog par bya//rkang pa
104a4(rgyud): mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis//spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa sgom//bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pra gnon pa zhes bya
104a5(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin to//dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni//dbusu khro bo rnam bzhag la//las kyi rdo rje rkang pa yis//de yi spyi bor gnon par sgom//mu stegs
104a6(rgyud): can dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//rdo rje gsum mchog khro bo'i tshul//ge sor ser po'i mchog 'dra ba//thams
104a7(rgyud): cad ri yi rgyal po ltar//bsams nas spyi bor rab tu sgom//sangs rgyas dpung sang gnon byed na//mi dbang la ni dogs pa med//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
104b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to//dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig gi
104b2(rgyud): bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di//sangs rgyas dag gisnga 'das na yang //'bas par 'gyur bar gdon mi za//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad
