104b3(rgyud): ces gsungaso//hUM las phur bu bsam pa ni//rtse lnga pa yi ched du ste//rdo rje phur bu de yis ni//snying khar de ni rab bsgoms ni//khros pas sangs rgyas dpung dag kya
104b4(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za//dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram//ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyor ba//nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba
104b5(rgyud): yang //'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya//rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni//bar snang dag la rab tu sgom//sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na//slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya//spro ba dag
104b6(rgyud): kyang de nas bya//rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od//chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang //dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya//rdo rje'i bsaM gtan 'di yis ni//dgang dka'
104b7(rgyud): ba yang rab tu 'gengs//sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab tu sgor//yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur//sangs rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang //rdo rje sems dpa' der spro bya//bskal
105a1(rgyud): pa gsum gyi kun gnas shing //sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlag/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o//nAng
105a2(rgyud): thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin to//bsam nas las byung dum bcas pas//gnas gang du ni yang dag smad//bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis
105a3(rgyud): ni//gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob//rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che//rdo rje phur bu rab tu sgom//me stug 'bar ba 'dra ba yis//phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya//
105a4(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba zhi bya rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbusu bsam//rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas//
105a5(rgyud): rang gi thug khar 'dod pa bzhag/spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis//mkha' dbyings yongasu grang bar sgom//bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis//nad pa la ni dbang
105a6(rgyud): bar bya//ba spu'i bu ga nas sangs rgyas//sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro//sangs rgyas sprin rnam de yi tshe//de la dbang bskur rab tu rtsol//nad pa rdo rje dam tshig
105a7(rgyud): gis//skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur//sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig bkod pa'o sprin zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//dbang chen dkyil
105b1(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bsam//chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsams nas//snying khar 'dod pa bzhag par bya//mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar//dkar mo zhes byas rab tu
105b2(rgyud): dgrang //'od kyi gong bur bsdus nas ni//yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od//lus dang ngag dang sems gnas la//'dod pa la de dbab par bya//ba spu'i bu ga nA rin tshon//sprin
105b3(rgyud): /rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro//chos kyi sprin rnams bsgoms nasu//dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya//rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni//dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs//
105b4(rgyud): sbyin pa'i dz+haiM rje sgrub pa de//yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur//chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to//namakha'i dbyings kyi dbu su ni//rdo rje'i zla gam
105b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam//rdo rje na mkha' chos mdun gzugs//'dod pa snying khar bzhag par bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis//na mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongasu gang //
105b6(rgyud): 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis//de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya//de ni de ma thag tu yang //sangs rgyas kun gyi thugasu byon//'jam dpal gyi ni mdog dang 'dra//gnas las
105b7(rgyud): byed par de 'gyur ro//dbang bskur ba ni dga' ston che//dgyes pa'i bdag nyid de rtsol bas//bltas tsam skyed pa nyid kyis kyang //'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur//
106a1(rgyud): /rin po tshwa'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i t+ye de 'dzin to//na mkha' rdo rje srin po nAM//drag cing khro la rab gtum par//wa dang bya
106a2(rgyud): rog sna tshogs dang //bya rgod khyi yis gang bar sgom//me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//dgra dro rnams ni skrag par sgom//sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa/
106a3(rgyud): bsams nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya//mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas mnan//rgyu ma khrag dang rkang la sogs//thams cad drangs par rnam bsgoms te//bsgoms
106a4(rgyud): na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur//gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang //zla ba byed ni tshun chad kyis//'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za//
106a5(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa//skyon ka'i sprin gyi mdog 'dra bsam//dkar po nag po rab tu dmar//
106a6(rgyud): ther tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan//rdo rje ca ni zhal gsum bsim//nag po dkar po dbyar po'i zhal//'bar ba'i thor tshugs dbu rgyan can//'jig rten khams
106a7(rgyud): rnams 'khrug byed pa'o//'dod chags cani zhal gsum pasam//dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal//thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can//bsgoms na nges par
106b1(rgyud): 'grub par sgyur//'khor lo rdo rje pa \u0f7f//g.yas pa'i phyag rgya bsnams par sko//rdo rje phyag drug mtshan chen//bzang po sna tshogs bsnams par sgom//sems can dun ma
106b2(rgyud): rtag par slob//gau bya dang dkar dang dmar ba'i tshul//mdzes pa'i gzug pu rnam par sgom//chu skyes sbyin ni rgyal mo che//zhal gsum du ni rnam par sgom//dmar dang gnag
106b3(rgyud): dang dkar ba ste//kha dog mdzes par rnam par sgom//rig ma rdo rje ud pal desnams//zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs//ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal//bsgom/
106b4(rgyud): na ye shes thob par 'gyur//khro do chen pogashin rje gshed//zhal gsumi drag po'i bod bzung ba//rnon po 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed//kha dog nag po rab tu sgom//
106b5(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che//drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin par/zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/rab tu 'phro ba rnam par bsam//khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni//skal pa
106b6(rgyud): me bzhin rab tu 'bar//zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis man de//sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu bsgom//rdo rje mi 'chi khro bo che//'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug/drag po 'khor
107a1(rgyud): lo 'bar ba 'dra//'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed//'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che//zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed//phyag bzhi 'jigs
107a2(rgyud): par byed pa'i mchog/Tak+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom//stobs po che ni rdo rje che//'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba//gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed//zhal gsum
107a3(rgyud): par nau rtag par sgom//khro bo chen po dbyigs smon can//khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed//zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung//'bar ba rnon po can du
107a4(rgyud): snyom//rdo rje mi ga yo khro bo che//rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba//zhi ba la gyi zhags pa bsnams//brtul zhugs can gyis zha'i gsum sgom//gtsug tor chen bro yi ga
107a5(rgyud): gcig/'od zer dag ni kun tu 'phro//zhal gsum 'bar bya 'khor lo can//bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa/
107a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dge byed//zhal gsum 'bang ba rjod 'phro canu//bsam gtan dkyor bsgom par bya//gzi borjid phung po gtsub tor rgyal//gang gzhan
107a7(rgyud): sngags kyi 'khor lo can//dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyis//so so dag tu bsgom par bya//ting 'dzin ni dpag med pa//sngags rnams kyi ni bshed pa yin//
107b1(rgyud): khro bo dag ni re ra yang //na mkha'i steng du shin tu 'phags//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs
107b2(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms lnga//rnam par snang mdzod rnam par bsam//gsal zhing zho ba zla ba bzhin//'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od//me long lta bur yang dgra byung //khams
107b3(rgyud): gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/bsams na de yis byang chub mthong //bsam gtan rdo rje rab sgom pa//'di yis sangs rgyas chu
107b4(rgyud): ba'i bdag/'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa//tshe 'di nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur//rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
107b5(rgyud): to//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkho'i dbyings kyi dang su bsdam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam//khros pa gsal
107b6(rgyud): ba'i lus dang 'dra//'byur ba sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//zhi ba'i ye shes gnas
107b7(rgyud): bsgoms na//myur du rdo rje nyid thob 'gyur//bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba//'dis ni rdo rje'i bdag nyid che//sems can thams cad dbang byed pa//tshe 'di nyid la
108a1(rgyud): /thob par 'gyur//dam tshod thams cad 'byung ba mdzes bya'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//ts+tshas kyi dkyi dri dam pa nI//nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus pasam/
108a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par sgom//gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi pa ni//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//'od zer
108a3(rgyud): sprin gyi 'khor lo che//rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom//'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che//sku gsum mi phyed lngas byung ba//ye shrIs rgya mchos rnam par rgyan//tshe 'di nyid
108a4(rgyud): la thob par 'gyur//chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//no mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus bsam//sangs
108a5(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//sbyin gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom//zhon bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//mtshan rnams
108a6(rgyud): thams cad rab tu rdzogs/bud med sgyu ma ri mchog ldan pa//khams gsum dag ni ngobadu byed pa//ye shes thams cad grub par byed//'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu
108a7(rgyud): ster//phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya//spyad gyi dam tshig phyag gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'ang mchog can//mkha'
108b1(rgyud): dbyings rdo rje'i dbus bsam//sangs rgyas bzlabs ni rab bsgoms nas//na mkha'i rdo rje rab mchog sbom//zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yungs//ut+pal mthing ka'i myadog 'dra ba//
108b2(rgyud): mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs//na mkha'i rdo rje mchog rab sgom//khams gsum dag gis phya ba byas pa//sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog//dngos grub rdo rje can
108b3(rgyud): gyi gsang //ut+pal sngo dmar phyag na bskams//na mkha' yum gyi rin po che//'od kyi skyon rdo rje tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni
108b4(rgyud): namakha' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni ra bsgoms la//rdo rje chos mo rag tu sgom//zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs//pad+ma d+ha ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i//sgyu mas
108b5(rgyud): mtshan pa'i mchog las byung //'dod tshogs chags pa 'dzin sdug pa//mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi//sangs rgyas
108b6(rgyud): thams cad rab bsgoms pa//chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mtshig/dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang //ut+pal dmar po phyog ni bsnams//chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid
108b7(rgyud): mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i rdo rje dbus su bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni ra
109a1(rgyud): rnams la//sgrol ma mjug ni bskam paraH//sprul bdang spyan ni rlub tu yang // rgyun gyis rnam par brgyan//kha dog ltung dang //
109a2(rgyud): 'dra ba'i 'od//bud med sgyu ma rab tu myos//rdo rje ting 'dzin las byung //sems can kun gyis phyug byas pa//ut+palo snyir po'i mdog 'dri ba'i//gsal ba phyag
109a3(rgyud): na bsnams par sgom//dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pA ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//sangs
109a4(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par sgom//'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro//'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros//spyan
109a5(rgyud): dmar mchi ba rnam par gtsigs//phyag na ral gri bsnams par sgom//snang mdzad dbu rgyan rnams bsgoms na//rdo rje can ni dgyes par 'gyur//'di ni ye na
109a6(rgyud): rdo rje can//gshin rje gshed kyi spro ba'i snang ba bkod ba sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus bsam//sangs rgyas
109a7(rgyud): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//gzhan gyis mi thub rab sgom pa//'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can//sbrul gyis rgyan zhing ska rags can//rdo rje dgyes pa 'jigs 'jigs lha//
109b1(rgyud): 'dod dka po rab tu sgom//mi bskyod dam tshig dang rgyun la//bsnams na rdo rje can dag mAny+dzaswA//'di ni ye shes blo can gyi//khro bo kun gyi dam chog/gzhan gyis ma thub
109b2(rgyud): 'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin to//nyi mo la dkyil 'khor da pe be ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//rdo rje d+ha ni rab
109b3(rgyud): tu sgom//khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag/thams cad du ni rnam par 'phro//gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis mnan//kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam//rdzogs sangs dpan/
109b4(rgyud): med dbu rgya nI la//sgoms na rdo rje can+da dag mnyes//'di ni rdo rje ye shes can//khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yid//rta ts+tshed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhis bya ba'i ting
109b5(rgyud): byin te// ma dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbusu pas ma//sangasu rgyus gzugs ni dbyu bsgoms //rdo rje mi'i chi rab tu skom//'bar ba'i 'od zer mang
109b6(rgyud): bo 'phro//rdo rje'i sprin rnams kun tu 'khrug/khros shing khro bac+doMs gi rlag pa dang //mche bo rnon po rab tu sgom//pi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la//bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin mnyes
109b7(rgyud): 'gyur//'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi//'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig/mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//nam
110a1(rgyud): mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//rban-i rgyal po rab tu sgom//khro bo 'jigs pa'i ma sngags gtum//'jigs pa
110a2(rgyud): dag kyang 'jigs par byed//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya//mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la//bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par
110a3(rgyud): 'gyur//'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi//'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig/bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/
110a4(rgyud): dam pa ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//stobs po che ni rab tu sgom//'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro//rdo rje gsum gyi gnas//
110a5(rgyud): dkyil 'kho//khros shing khros pa zhugs pa 'byin//rdo rje stobs chen bsgom par bya//mi dI skrod dam tshig dbu rgyunA la//bsgoms nA rab tu mnyes par 'gyur//'di ni khro na
110a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi//'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshigo/rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//sangs
110a7(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//rdo rje sngon po rnam par sgom//khro bo 'jigs pa'i tshe lugs can//'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed//gzugs ni rab tu gnas
110b1(rgyud): na//rgyu mtsho nag po skyed par byed//'bar ba'i 'od zer myung blo 'gro//rdo rje'i dbyig zlogs bya sgom par bya//mi bskyod dumatshig dan+ta dz+nyAnA la//bsgoms na rab tu mnyos par 'gyur
110b2(rgyud): 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi//'da' bar dkar ba'i dam tshigo/rdo rje dbyig pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i
110b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbus bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par sgom//khros shing 'jigs pa'i rngur gyis lta//'khrugs pa ral gri zhags pa
110b4(rgyud): bsnams//'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro//mi bra yo rdo rje can tu sgom//mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la//bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur//'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi/
110b5(rgyud): 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshigo/rdo rje na mkha' dbyings kyi dam tshig zhabs kyi sgo gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//na mkha'i rdo rje'i
110b6(rgyud): dbusu bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu sgom//mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//'khor lo 'bar bas yongasu bskor/
110b7(rgyud): bcug tor 'khor lo sgyur dam tshig/rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom//mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la//bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur//'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi//'ad/
111a1(rgyud): dka' ba'i dam tsha//gtsug+sa tau g+ha~M dam chog rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya bah+ma trI ljon to//ts+tsho ma di kyi 'khor dam pa no//na mkha'ad
111a2(rgyud): dbusu bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la//rdo rje sum+b+ha rab tu sgom//me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku//rdo rje'i sprin ni rab tu 'phro//phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba//bsgom
111a3(rgyud): na dngos grub thob par 'gyur//mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la//bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur//'di ni khro ba thams cad kyi/'do' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go//
111a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig sum+b+ha rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//'dog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni//sangs rgyas 'khor lo bsten pa yis//ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams//rdo
111a5(rgyud): rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang pa 'dus pa las/rdo rje dam chig bkod pa de kho na nyid
111a6(rgyud): kyi don sgom pa mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bdag po//
111a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin chen po zhi ba'i dom tshig mchog ces bya d+hi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/nyid kyi sku dang
111b1(rgyud): /gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //oM ru ru s+phA ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+hA ni swAt+ma/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//'byor bA kun la dgyes pa rnams//mnyes
111b2(rgyud): shi rab tu dgyes gyur nas//sangs rgyas rdo rje rje su dran//sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi 'byung ba//lus rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing //rdo rje'i dam tshig bskul mdzad ma/
111b3(rgyud): bsos par byed par gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig rdo rje kho bo//dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
111b4(rgyud): par zhugs nas/rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lngas byung //oM shaM kA re shAn+tiM kA re//g+hun+d+ha g+hun+ta g+hunr-i ni g+hA
111b5(rgyud): ta ya nI g+hA ta ya g+h+nA nI nI swA hA/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//sgyu gsum dpyir med rdo rje can//mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdangs nas//rdo rje'i thugs ni na/
111b6(rgyud): srung ba'i sbyor ba lo//las rnams rtag tu rab sgrub pa//rdo rje chen po 'jigs nyen la//rtag tu stobs ni byed par bri shad//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen
111b7(rgyud): po'i dam tshig la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/chos kyi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo //
112a1(rgyud): oM ka tsa bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams//mnyes nas bsamu gtan thob
112a2(rgyud): gyur nas//rdo rje'i chos ni rje su dran//rtag tu chos rgyas stobs mdzad pa//rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan//rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du//bzlas pa tsame gyis byed par
112a3(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di//
112a4(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//sangs rgyas kun bdag che las skyes//mnyes shing
112a5(rgyud): ye shes thob gyur nas//rdo rje'i sku ni rjesu dran//sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang //sems can khams na ma lus pa//skad cig gis ni bran bzhin du//thams cad g.yo//
112a6(rgyud): med dbang du byed//ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
112a7(rgyud): pa/dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang /
112b1(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las byung //na maHsa man+ta kA yA wAka tsit+ta bar+d+haH/au khyA khyA khai ti/nAn+ti/s+yArba duSh+Ta sat+su dA paka/A sa sa? sa la par shra/pU sh+ma hastA/rbAR+Sha b+hu dza/tsa tur pu Sha/
112b2(rgyud): Shin+du rAH/Ah+mats+tsha s+yA gain+ta/sad+d+he Sh+mAp+sA.a pa d+hAramad+hA bib+d+ha b+hUt+tha ka/kr-i trU na naM/sar+b+bA d+hA ta/yuM kA R+Sha/an+d+ran+tud+b+ha san+na dadaM ni/b+hUb+d+haHr+m+ma nI bas na/kAR+Ya kA ru
112b3(rgyud): kr-ir+b+baMH/tshaMn+da tshin+d+ra sing+ge mnau tAn/b+h+r-in+da b+h+r-in+ne pa ra mu drA ne/Ak+Sha ye A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+be b+h+re tA ni/mA thi ma tha niR+Wa tha ni drA tha saMr+b+r-i duSh+TAn/pra be she yai byA baM sha yu maN+Da la ma d+h+yA/
112b4(rgyud): bai bi sU ta/dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ma mA sar+b+be kar+yaM ku ru ku ru/da ha da he/pa tsa pa tse/mA bi laM bi mA bi laM ba/sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/hUM hUM phaT phaT/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Te ya/saur+b+ba
112b5(rgyud): shrA pa ri pU ra ke sad+d+hi nAM nA shA ya ri b+hun/ka ra ka ra hai hi b+ha g+ha ban/kany+tsi rA ya si/ma ma sad+d+ha ar+d+ha na/sa d+hA ya swA hA//de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//sangs rgyas grags
112b6(rgyud): pa chen po kun//'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas//rdo rje sems dpa'i rjesu dran//thod pa mchog ma gsang ba//gzugs mdzes yid 'od rnyed pa la//rkang pas mnan pa'i
112b7(rgyud): tshul byas nas//sngags 'di rjesu dran par bya//mA ma ki 'am spyan yang rung //rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba//lan dasum dag tu brjod na ni//de ma thag tu nges par 'gug
113a1(rgyud): ma ldan 'das thugs rdzas da ces gsungs/rnapa bcom ldan 'das dro btsun dA shogs pa rnam par snang mdzad/dam tshig 'od ze
113a2(rgyud): stug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i tau 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/khro bo mi 'chi ba'i dam tshi ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //nA maHsa
113a3(rgyud): mAn+ta ka ya wAka tsit+ta dadzAM NAM/na mo badz+ra kro d+hA yaM/mahA dr-iSh+To taM ka Tu b+hai ra bA ya/A si mu sa la pa ra shu pA shwo tap+tA yai/A~M A mr-i ta kun+d+ha li/kha kha khA hai khA hi/tiSh+Tha
113a4(rgyud): tiSh+Thi/bAn+d+ha ban+d+ha/ha na d+ha ne/da ha da te/gar+dz+dza badz+ra/bi s+pho Ta~M yA bi swai Ta ye//sarba big+h+nAn/bi nA ya kAn/mu ng+ku gai Na pa ti d+hI bi tAn+ta kaR+Sha ya swAhA/de nas 'di ni gsungs
113a5(rgyud): tsa ma rgyas//sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun//brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas//rdo rje'i sku ni r+d+he su dran//sngags rnams kun gyis sbyor ba dang //rdo rjes
113a6(rgyud): bskrad pa'i las rnams la//sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dag kyang //tshul bzhin byas na skyod par 'gyur//dA nas btsoldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/
113a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las
113b1(rgyud): /nam do/k+Sha pa b+hU / /oM pA d+hAhA//de nas 'dun gas //sas rgyan dadang nyid sa ldan// gang
113b2(rgyud): n+na tu sgrub gyur te//byang chub sems ni rje sna dran blon po ma tshungs gnam pa dang //'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang //rdo rje sems kyis rab sgyur na//las rnams
113b3(rgyud): na du byed//de nas com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa che dbyug tu med pa/dpag tu med du rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lnga snrums ra blugs nas/pad+mo kyang
113b4(rgyud): 'i chen po di nyid kyi skye dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjelas byu //nu maHsa man+tak+Sha saH/tsad+d+he bad+d+ho/oM ts+tsha hU~MhU~M/t+tA ru la/dI ru la/sUHha~M
113b5(rgyud): tA la ga/aHd+hAs/kaM saR+She sa /nr-ikU/dri khur ni g+hA ta na tsa l-i tA bsud+d+ha tishwAsa? k+ShI tA d+hA ra trIt+sI /d+hI
113b6(rgyud): mi ti ba lA pad+hAk+Sha ma~M/Ar+yA byA Na/d+hIts+tshi tar+dz+nyA twA ga N+Da/d+hA Shit+ti/bud+d+ha t+pA d+hA/hAy+YA b+h+yAMH/khyAd khyud/ri man+dan/n+da/bauts+tsha bin+ti/pa raM mu d+h+r-in/sid+hi mi dzini
113b7(rgyud): sarba dz+wa ra bi shA tsI dIn/sarba pra tI Sha oM br-i tsi ta tar+dz+dza ga~M badz+ra ga rgya la so/oM da du tha ho duSh+Ta ba dz+ra glai d+hu na d+hu ne/me the meH/ma med de/Ta ye tA Ta ya/mdzams
114a1(rgyud): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/bud+d+had+hAr+m+ma s+yai g+hA A nud+b+ha tAM karma/ku ru/hA ya gr-I b+hU ya phaT/dad+hA ya phaT/badz+nyA gU d+hA ya phaT/badz+rA na twA y+ya phaT/badz+ra daMSh+TA ya phaT/dudz+dza khru R+Sha sA/
114a2(rgyud): baT/badz+ra khu ra nir g+hA tAM na yaM dzawa~M/trai lo kyA b+hU ya~M ki rA yAM phaT/s+yArba karme Sh+ye a pra ti ta tA ya phaTe/badz+ri kuM la~M sanA d+hi sa nA ya hU~M hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA//de nas 'di na
114a3(rgyud): gsungs tsam gyis//chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes//'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur//ye shes rgyal po rje suM dran//mi khri'i dbyings dug gis yongs gang gi/
114a4(rgyud): rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od//khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis//dug rnams thams cad med par byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa
114a5(rgyud): gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
114a6(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung //na maHsa man+t+ri kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ai e h+ye hi/b+ha ga ban nI la badz+ra daN+Tha/tu ru tu ru/hu lu hu lu/hA hA/gu lu gu lu/gu lU pa ya gu lA pa ya
114a7(rgyud): kre me kra mo/b+ha ga d+han/d+hA yu ba~M gi na/b+hUtAn shI b+h+rU~M/data data/dar dar/ba hi ba ta/pe tsi ba tse/ma tha ma tha/pA ta ya b+hU ta ye/ma nr-i miT/mi nA pa ya ma~M nAM pa ya/sa
114b1(rgyud): kan tsam+ba b+hak+Shaya b+hUk+ShA ya/mo dam a s+yA mo dmut+taR+sha b+h+yor/prI ya Ar+g+haM hi b+hU gu ban/sarbar+b+ba big+h+nA ni/sarba bin+d+ha ni/sar+b+ba man+t+ra ni/sarba mU la kar+m+ma Ni/kr-i tri ma Ni Sha ng+kan/
114b2(rgyud): sarbaM gra hA na/ha na ha ni bAny+dzi b+hiny+dza/mA ra de maR+Sha dau/i dam+be kIr+yaM sAM d+hA ye/hUM nI lA ya/nI lA badz+re dar+t+ta ya/tu ru tu ru/big+h+nAn bi nA ya ka nA sha ya nA sha yAM/h+ya ru hu ru/dIb+d+ha
114b3(rgyud): tsar+N+Na ya/sar+b+ba shaud+d+hi hr-i daM ya~M nai pi Da ste/tshon+de tshin+d+ra pa~M ri bod+ha nAM ts+tshed kau ni hU~M 'ing+ka nA maM shiSh+Ti kaM/sa ma yo nr-i smA ra/dz+ra d+hi ra bats+tsha nAMH/mar+g+haMNi nikrIn+nan+do/ha na hA na/da hU~M dat+ta/
114b4(rgyud): ku ruM ku ru/tu ru tu ru~M/hu ru hu ru/phaT phaT/hUM hU~M kr-i tan+t+ra ya/daM bi ri Sh+Ti bi dwI pa kA ya/ha ne hA nA/badz+ra daN+Do na~M swA hA//de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//gdug pa'i mchog
114b5(rgyud): las byung ba kun//yid ni 'jigs shing rab sgeg nus//sems dpa'i rdo rje rje su dran//khro bo'i rgyal po grags chen 'dri//brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang //cho ga'i tshul
114b6(rgyud): bzhin bskul ba yis//gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/kun nas sbyin dpal zhes bya ba'i ti
114b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nis/de rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //na maHsa man+ta ka ya dz+nyAn ts+yai d+hInI/oM hrI hUM hUM badz+ra bcwo dz+ra
115a1(rgyud): s+thA rba shwA paSh+Ta/d+hAr+b+hu/ rAT/oM dz+yA d+hAni rA rAd//5Ta T+Ta Ta/u mahA pA m+mu ya swAH//de nas 'di ni gsungs ma pa ka/rnams
115a2(rgyud): yis klu rnams kun//yid ni 'dzegs shing rab sgeg nas//sku gsum rdo rje rje su dri ni//bzlas pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yis//lus rnams thams cad sgrub par byed//than pa
115a3(rgyud): byung ba'i dus na yang //chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin
115a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi Tak+ki'i rgyal po khro bo chen po 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //na moHsa man+ta kA ya wA ga tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/Tak+ki hUM dzaMHdwe nas 'di/
115a5(rgyud): ni gsung+ga tsa gyis/sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun//'jigs shing dam tshig ldan gyur nas//rdo rje sku gsum rje su dran//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bI yis//ling gi rkang pa
115a6(rgyud): g.yas pas mnan//rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis//sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phreng ba'i chu'i rdo rje zhes bya
115a7(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje gdum po'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje las phyung //na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta
115b1(rgyud): / /na la/\u0f7f/n+d+ha \u0f7f/b+hU tA/ta ra tA na/da twA dat+ta/ma ta moH/mr-i \u0f7fk+kA pAt+ta sa tas/badz+rad+has ku ru/ta sa twas+ya/mdzad na
115b2(rgyud): 'greg ka bi main+ta pa/sa k+ShIN+DaprA/Ta ya dz+dza Ta ya
115b3(rgyud): shAtu sa pa gyu// dz+dza/la y+ya/dzA ai d+hA ma swA//de nasu /
115b4(rgyud): na pa gyis//ste rnams la bar du na// ni ma ma ni ba smug nas//rdo rje sa dzad//na 'a chen po'i sdugs di las//rkyen dag la sog
115b5(rgyud): /bcu rkyen dag kya sgrag gyur nas//bsgyur 'i 'gugs par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshig rnam par 'du rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
115b6(rgyud): skyoba'i par zhugs nas/ dzin thams kya kyid ma chog khro bo gad sa 'di/nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs ni rje las byung ngo //sa su spyon su mya sa sri sa
116a1(rgyud): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/A na yau b+hA ga ts+tsha bi d+yAR+YA dza hUM phaT/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//bu mo mthu tshon thams cad ni//smra ba shig gos
116a2(rgyud): dang dral gyur nas//rdo rje sems dpa' dz+haiM su~M dra na//rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan//de bzhin gshegs bya kun bdag pa'o//rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa
116a3(rgyud): yis//bu mo rnams ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
116a4(rgyud): zhugs nas/dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //sangs
116a5(rgyud): rgyus rdo rje sku gsum la//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom//zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin//sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o//sangs rgyas skye gsung sbyor ba yi/
116a6(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//rtag tu nges par khugs par 'gyur//mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas//'khor lo ba
116a7(rgyud): rdorjeche//rdo rje kyo bo'o khyad par gyis//sngags rnam sa thams cad dgugs pa'i mchog/thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhi ba//rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni//
116b1(rgyud): mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyi//snying khyer rdo rje kyo ba sbyor//rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//des par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/
116b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad gzugs tshon sgom//de na shA tso gnas par bsam//rdo rje mi mchi'i sbyor ba yis//lanA grangs lnga bcu badz+rod na mi/nges par rtag tu 'gugs par
116b3(rgyud): 'gyur//rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po//'bar ba rdo rje 'dra ba'i 'od//rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni//na mkha'i bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog/khro brdo rje dam tshig ni/
116b4(rgyud): sna 'ag gnas pa dag/shU la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas//lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i gnas//btsug gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung //rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis//zla ba gzas ni
116b5(rgyud): zin pa'i tshe//khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya//tshangs pa drag po la sogs sgra//rang gi ming rnams bris nas ni//rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhon du//'jigs shing skrag nas
116b6(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyur//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa//rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom//khro ba chen po gshin rje gshed//rdo rje kyo bai rnam par bsam//bskul pa'i sreg pa'i
116b7(rgyud): lo che//bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dag spyad//kun gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang //yang gsungs pa/gcer bur bu de de zla ba shig la//'jigs pa'i tshul rug cing kyi
117a1(rgyud): sngags kyi khyad par thams cad du//dgug pa dag ni thabs su gsungs//gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//yang dang yang du bskul par bya//de nyid sngag
117a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyi//rgyal po mchog tu brtag pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun du rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje thor tshugs gcig ma
117a3(rgyud): dam tshig chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsung rdo rje'i mchog 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM shU li ni swA hA//de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams//tshig
117a4(rgyud): par gyur cing gos dang bral//sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran//sngags kyi rig pa 'di yis ni//klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur//klu yi bu mo mig bzang dag/bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya//de nas
117a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/chos chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro gnyer ma 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //oM sarba
117a6(rgyud): b+hUb+hA ya/na sha ya/tA sa ni/trA sa trA sa ya/b+he ra Ti b+hi ku Ti/ta Ti/bI ra Ti shwe ta shwe ta dza Ti ni swA hA//de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo kun//rab tu 'dar bar gyur nas kyang //ya
117a7(rgyud): shishes rdo rje rjes su dran//rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba rnams//sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni//dam tshig la sogs pa yis dgug/'gog pa'i rdo rje rgyal po ni//yongs su rdzogs pa
117b1(rgyud): mdzes mchog gis//ye shes rdo rje gsum las byung //kun nas de ma thag tu 'gugs//yang na khro bo thams cad ni//dben pa'i gnas ni chen po ru//sngags pas 'bum du bzlas byas na//las rnams thams cad byed par
117b2(rgyud): bshad//rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //theg pa chen po smod pa dag/nan tan du ni gsad par bya//yang na gnas nas spo bar bya//'di yis byang chub mchog dang ni//sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das
117b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so//yang gsungs pa/phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi//lus dang ngag sems gsad par ni//gdug sems ldan pa'i dgra rnams la//cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya//khrag dang
117b4(rgyud): chu yis gsher ba 'am//bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos//bgos nas ling ga rkang pas mnan//khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya//brgya rtsa brgyad ni yongs bzlas na//sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/yang
117b5(rgyud): gsungs pa/chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas//khro bo mchog gis bcings pa yis//lha chen rkang g.yon gyis mnan na//sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/
117b6(rgyud): ngan pa rul ba dri mnam pa//bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na//skad cig gis skams 'chi bar 'gyur//thal ba'i skyo mas gsher ba'i gos//bgos nas khro bas 'khrugs bzhin du
117b7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'jig par 'gyur/yang gsungs pa/gcer bur phud de skra bshig la/'jigs pa'i tshul du gtsigs
118a1(rgyud): shing 'gyur//rkang pas ling ga mnan na ni//na mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur//ma mo'i gnas sam dur khod dam//khang stong dang ni ban
118a2(rgyud): mdo dang //mtshan gcig dang ni shing gcig drung //mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya//mi rus las byas phur bu ni//sor brgyad pa yi ched dgu la//brgyartsa
118a3(rgyud): brgyad du bzlas byas te//dgra bo'i sgo khar sbas na ni//sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa//shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa//zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis//
118a4(rgyud): bskams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur//yang na thod pa gang ba dag/khyad par du ni mkhas pos btsal//der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te//rdo rje'i tshog gis bzlas pa bya/
118a5(rgyud): dgra yi sgo 'am grong drag tu//sbas na nges par skrod par 'gyur//ta la'i lo ma 'am gzhan la'ang rung //khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la//dgra yi grong nga mi sgo
118a6(rgyud): dgra tu//sbrus na 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dpal rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
118a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje khams gsum pa thams
118b1(rgyud): da kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM b+hA g+ha/g+hA ta ya b+hU tA ya/sarba duSh+TAn phaT phaT/kI la ya/
118b2(rgyud): kI la ya/sar+b+ba pA paM phaT phaT/hUM hUM hUM/badz+ra kI la ya/badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA yA hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/de nas 'di ni gsungs ma theg/sangs rgyas rdzu
118b3(rgyud): 'phrul chen po kun//de rgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas//ni mkhya' rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur//mi rus la so byas phur bu 'am//yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes//lha
118b4(rgyud): las byas pa'i phur bu dang //rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed//'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdengs bzang ba'i//rdo rje sems dpar mnyam bzhag la//rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mthar
118b5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bsams nas sbyar bar bya//rnam par snang mdzad rgya cheni nam//yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can//gshin rje gshad kyi rgya chen drag/bsams na rdo rje gsum
118b6(rgyud): yang gnon//rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis//gdug cing khro ba tshur bcad la//sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang //rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin//snying kha nas ni rkang pa'i
118b7(rgyud): mthar//rdo rje phur bu rnam par sgom//gong du'ang dam tshig de nyid bya//'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul yin//bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas dag kyang nges
119a1(rgyud): 'phrul smra zhes bya ba da 'dzin ma snyoms pabe 'ug ni/ ma ma gyis nan ni b+hU b+ha'i sa 'di/ mu dang gi sung dang smra
119a2(rgyud): / d+hA rjem+bu hrIn d+hanA/dat+ta ts+tsha/ na rkun da de'i tshul du rgyu/seMn 'o nan rnyi bsdum//rnam par byung mi
119a3(rgyud): d+hi/ ra skyes sa pa ga ma thag gi /de na spyong / kyi ga gis sna par 'gyur/na
119a4(rgyud): nas ma nas seM ur+b+ba ng+gAs 'din rgyun dang sa spyod dem skye du sa 'i na sa par glegs na tshig rnam
119a5(rgyud): du nga rdo // buM sh+le/ shes rdo rje ni mdzes pa 'azhig/da
119b1(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i gnas 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po//thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/thugs kyi dam
119b2(rgyud): tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM badz+ra rA dza hU~M/rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni//'dadi 'phro mang po 'khrigs pa
119b3(rgyud): sgrom//rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te//rdo rje myur dus ngesde par gra ga//bta ba tsas kyis rdo rje tshe/rdo rje dri med gsum las byung //btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur//yadun
119b4(rgyud): 'chi ba'i gnasu 'gyur//sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis//cho ga legs par byas nas ni//mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par//phur bus 'debs par gdon mi za//
119b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/sems can khams la phan mdzad pa//mnyes shing rab tu dgyes
119b6(rgyud): gyur nas//gsung ni 'di skad bka' sprul to//e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/i ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa//e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhig e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'jom
119b7(rgyud): pur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te//sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje rnams//phur bus gdab yang dag shad//'di ni sngags rnams/
120a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi//bur gdab de nyid las byung ba//sgra gdung blugs na mchog sbyin pa'i sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o//de bzhin gshegs
120a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/sku drang gsung dang thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i
120a3(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//thams cad nu mkha' mi 'gyur che//thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas//
120a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa//skye sha can gyi bdag nyid che//bu mo lo glengs bcu gnyis pa//dben pa'i gnas khyad par du//sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrug/gsha
120a5(rgyud): gi ci dam tshig la sogs pa//de ru cho ga bzhin du ni//dkyil 'khor gyu bzhi rnam par bya//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa yis//mtshan nyid thams cad yongasu dag
120a6(rgyud): rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes//rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/pad par bzhag nas rnam par sgom//dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis//
120a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnamasu rnam par sgom//sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang //mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' sgom//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjecan//rnam par snang
120b1(rgyud): sku rkyen po//bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas rgya ni 'od 'drar 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//gra tso khrag mkhan ni bdag nyid cha//bu mo ud pa la//
120b2(rgyud): mthing ka'i mdog/'dra ba dag ni rtag tu sgrub//sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni//byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//dam tshig shin tu
120b3(rgyud): 'da' dka' ba'o//de ni de ma thag tu yang //rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur//rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs//'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa//rdo rje chos ni
120b4(rgyud): rnam bsgoms pas//gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing //bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba//sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub//de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag/sa bcu la ni
120b5(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur//rgyal po gsung gri dam tshig 'dzin//mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog/bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u yi rigs//dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni/
120b6(rgyud): rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya//'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o//rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni//sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya//skya reng 'char ba'i dusu ni//sgom pa'i mchog
120b7(rgyud): gis 'grub par 'gyur//rgya ni rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//spos dang me tog rnams kyis rgyan//rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog bsgoms na//grub pa myur du 'thob par
121a1(rgyud): gyur//'dun phywa smram mchog d+hIn pa//sangs rgyas mtshan rnaMs mthun par gyur//dpan tshad du rgya lo rgyun tsam do//de la khyod kyang
121a2(rgyud): snang bar byed//dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis//sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya//'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi//dam tshig shin tu 'dar dka' ba'o//rdo rje
121a3(rgyud): can gyi grub 'dod na//gu shang gaN+DI'o dam tshig bza'o bar bya//'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi//dam tshig shin tu 'dra' dka' ba'o//ga shang ga ci'i dam tshig lnga
121a4(rgyud): sogs pas//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas byang chub gnas lci ba//de nyid bla na med pa 'grub//bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig
121a5(rgyud): rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dmau tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa
121a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu sgeg par byed pa'i rdo rje khro ba 'dri/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM hrIHSh+T+rI wi kr-i ta An na/sarba shud+d+hA na nA sha ya staM b+ha
121a7(rgyud): ya hUM hUM phaT Ta swA hA/dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar//len tshe ske tshe yungs mor te//khro zhing cher ma'i me la sreg/bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas//nyi ma gung ngam nam phyeng na/
121b1(rgyud): 'di ni yong yo rab tu shis//shes rab can gyi gru gsum du//stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin srog/bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir//'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya//bskal pa grangs
121b2(rgyud): med gsum du yang //de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur//sangs rgyas sum ni ches 'dzin pa 'am//yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni//de yi
121b3(rgyud): tshe ni der zad 'gyur//bcu bzhi 'am yang na chos brgyad la//dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni//cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na//de ni rtag tu steng bar 'gyur//sngags
121b4(rgyud): shes pa yis gang rung ba'i//dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas na su//bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni//'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za//tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis//
121b5(rgyud): pabyan nges par ltung bar 'gyur//hUM ni rab tu 'bar dang bcasra//rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu sgom//phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te//gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed//rdo rgyus
121b6(rgyud): sol ba la sogs pas//skyes pa'im bud med gzugs bris la//lag par ste ra bsams na su//ming pa bcad par rnam par sgom//sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen
121b7(rgyud): mchog/sems can kun la phan 'dod pa//'di yang snad par 'gyur ba 'am//shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za//lus kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba//mau smyig mang po 'khrigs
122a1(rgyud): pa can//dbus rdo rje bsams na ni//chu rnams mnan pa'i mchog yino//dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na//rlung la sogs pa byung na ni//ma
122a2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bcings na suM//gdug pa'i dgra ni dran par bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis//gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang //mthong ba tsam gyis
122a3(rgyud): 'gag 'gyur te//gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang //sngags 'dis skrag par
122a4(rgyud): byas na ni//'chi bar 'gyur bar gdor mi za//de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o//phoT/ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//dbusu gzugs
122a5(rgyud): nr-i bsgom par bya//sngags shes pa yaH gnas bzhi ru//bud med rtag tu bzhag par bya//rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//mtshan rnams thams cad
122a6(rgyud): kyis mtshan cing //pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas//sngags 'di rnam par bsgom par bya//hUM 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i//rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba sgom//rang lus ngag
122a7(rgyud): sems rdo rje la//phab ni byang chub theb par 'gyur//de ni de ma thag tu yang //rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing //rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//sangs rgyas sku
122b1(rgyud): gsum rdo rje 'dzin//sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//bzhin bzang phyid par 'dod pa yi//bud med d+ha na cho ga bzhin//dngon par mchod pa
122b2(rgyud): brtsam par bya//gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya//de ni de ma zag tu yang //'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam//mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan//'ja mU gsar/
122b3(rgyud): gyi mdangs 'drir 'gyur//gshang pa 'am yangon bza' ba 'am//shaM dag kyang ni gzhug par bya//cho ga bzhin du bsngags nis ni//zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong //
122b4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ldan byos de skad ces bka' stsal to//gshang ba tshig bzhin blangs nas//kham por sbyar mar bzlog par bya//brgya rna bAr+m+mad du
122b5(rgyud): bskul na ni//sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo //khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang //shA tshun dag ni cho ga bzhin//blangs nas sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni//rjes na de yis mo mthi //
122b6(rgyud): gshang dang lhan cig sbyor ba yi//ril bu lcag gsuM gyis dkris pa//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong //khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi//
122b7(rgyud): bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong //sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi//zil bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa
123a1(rgyud): dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo //ba lang sha dang sbyor ba yi//ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa//dab
123a2(rgyud): po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun gyis myi mthong ngo //gshang ba las byung srog chags las//dartul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya//dbang po gnyis kyi
123a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo //ga bur tsan ngan sbyar ba yi//ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yi//sangs
123a4(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo //ge waM a ga ru sbyar ba'i//r-iril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje stobs po rgyur 'gyur ro//
123a5(rgyud): go bur gur gum sbyar ba yi//ril du lcagaso gsum gyis dkris pa//dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong //rdo rje 'dzin pa gang
123a6(rgyud): yang rung //phyag rgya chen por byin rlabs nas//da ni de 'dra'i dpal ldan pa'i//stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur//dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi//steng du rdo rje
123a7(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur//stong gsum bgrod pa'i dpal ldan pa//sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur//'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang //lha yi longs spyod rigs
123b1(rgyud): brtul zhugs//yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la//stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka'
123b2(rgyud): stsal to//de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag/sems 'khrul yid la dbang ba rnamaso//ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nis//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//
123b3(rgyud): e mA'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che//e ma'o gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba//e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ai ma'o shin tu dri med chos//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//skyed pa
123b4(rgyud): byed pa mi 'gyur che//sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos//rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa//sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par 'gyur/
123b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye ba//sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur//rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs//gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad//khro bo'i nang
123b6(rgyud): na nge mchog ste//sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o//rig pa'i rgyal mo chos mchog rnams//dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par sgom//rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la/
123b7(rgyud): tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom//thams cad lnga byed sngags rnams la//gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom//sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par
124a1(rgyud): smyon//zhes gsung sa//gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la//gshin rtog na na stug par b+ha//nas rnams rnams cad nyid pa na
124a2(rgyud): spyib nas ni bskul pa shos//com ldan 'das da mchog chen pos de srid ces bka sprul te//byasam gtan 'a la de yin ni//sdug sa mnyes pa
124a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag/dam che chen po sgrub byed pa//sgrub pa po la ngan par gsung //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug/sku dang
124a4(rgyud): gsung thugs yongs drug pas//ye shes rdo dza bka stsal to//ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang //nags tshal rab tu dben par ni//bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba//bzlas dang
124a5(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor byas so//rdo rje sems dpa'i lha sogs kun//sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas//gsung gi las kyi bak+Sha bzhin sgra/las rnams ste tshogs byed
124a6(rgyud): byer 'gyur//rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po//pad+ma rA ga'i 'di 'dra ba/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la//glan sa gsum du ni rigs ba r+d+ha//dbabri pa'i tshig thams cad
124a7(rgyud): ni//byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub//bskul dang rings dang lha chen po//'iphags lam bzhi pa dge kyang ni//rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya//de ltar byas na rtag par 'gru
124b1(rgyud): bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'am//khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa//mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//gzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag/cho ga thams cad byas nas ni//
124b2(rgyud): las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya//rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni//khams gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur//dri la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig 'di rnams//hUM haH
124b3(rgyud): AHd+hIHna mkha'i khams ni sems med cing //rtog po thams cad rnam spangs dang //rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang //cho ge bzhin du byas na 'bab//hUM ni rdo rje sems
124b4(rgyud): dpe'i bdag/haHni sku yi rdo rje can//AHni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste//'di ni gsang tshig bstan pa'o//dz+hiHni bskul bar byed par bshad//'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin//
124b5(rgyud): 'di ni bskul ba thams cad kyi//gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad//khru gang tsam mAmA khru do 'am//khru brgyad tsam mom lnga tsam du//rdo rje sems dpa' rab bskul na//
124b6(rgyud): 'jigs shing bsgrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur//snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur//'di ni gsang ba thob pa'o//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//de bzhin gshegs pa kun
124b7(rgyud): bdag/sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang //brtul zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya//sbyor ba gzhan
125a1(rgyud): man pas bya ba//gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o//dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las//dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni//skra ba shig
125a2(rgyud): gcer bur byung nas ni//khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed//dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis//dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni//stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas
125a3(rgyud): bas kyang //'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za//dkyil 'khor gru gsumi byas pa la//ba lang sha 'am rta yi sha/khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyis//rdo rje 'ong gdoni mi
125a4(rgyud): za bar 'jig/sha chen gyis ni thams cad kyi//rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad//'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi//'jigs pa shin tu mi bzad yin//dgra yi//
125a5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas nas ni//gshang gci dag gi chos mchog can//tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs//sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/chu bo'i 'gram
125a6(rgyud): gnyis sa yis kyang //dgra yaM gzugs brnyan byas nas ni//til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun//dug las byung ba'i tsher ma yis//bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas
125a7(rgyud): pas dgang //sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang //dug dang da du ra dag ni//sangs rgyas thams cad bsod pa la//'di dag mchog
125b1(rgyud): tu gyur par bshad//sol khus gshor ba'i gos dag ni//b+h+yon te sems ni khros nas//rkang pas ling gu mnan nang no//srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za//rus phye khra
125b2(rgyud): dang dug rnams kyis//gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni//rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang //myur ba drug tu 'khyer bar 'gyur//ske tshe gshing gci sbyar ba yis//ling ga yongs
125b3(rgyud): su gang bar ni//blugs la rkang pas rab mnan na//che ba chen pos btab par 'gyur//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i snying
125b4(rgyud): bo'o//na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+Sha tsit+ta badz+rI NAM/oM hu lu hu lu/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ban d+ha ban d+hA/ha na ha na/da ha da ha/pa tsA pa tsa/gardza gar+dz+dza/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho TA yaM/sarba bIg+h+nAn gyi
125b5(rgyud): nA ya kAn/ma hA gA naM pi ti dzI bI tAn+ta kA rI ya hUM phaT//sbyin sreg yang ni bsam gtan dag/lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste//ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya//'di ni bsod
125b6(rgyud): de'i mchog yino//rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo che//rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta//sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams//bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya//de la
125b7(rgyud): 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go/mkha' dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis//yongasu gang bar rab tu sgom//gdug pa de yis bsad par ni//bsams na
126a1(rgyud): de ma thag tu 'chi//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis//yongasu gang dang bsgoms nas ni//gadrug pa'i sems pas gsang+kan ni//rdo rje 'dzin
126a2(rgyud): pa nyid kyang 'chi/sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams la//skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni//sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams nA//'chi bar 'gyur bar
126a3(rgyud): gudon mi za//srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa//gtum zhing khro ba mi bzad pas//der ni skrag par byas bsams na//rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi//'ug pa khA dang bya
126a4(rgyud): rgod dang //mchu ring ba dang wa rnams te//de yis zos par bsams na ni//sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni//'jigs pa
126a5(rgyud): dag kyang 'jigs par byed//dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni//dpral bar bsams na khyad 'phags pa'i//sbrul de zos par bsams na ni//sangs rgyas dag kyang nges
126a6(rgyud): par 'jig/phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la//yams sem gnod par byed pa rnams//'jigs pa nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog/'di ni bskul pa'i
126a7(rgyud): mchog yin//tho ba rab tu drag po yis//brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar bajog/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du//dgra bo'i srog ni med par 'gyur//rdo rje
126b1(rgyud): stor la sogs pas//gshog cing gtub par bsams na ni//sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa//rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'adra 'chi//srung ba la sogs sngags rnams dang /
126b2(rgyud): lha rnams kyang ni phur bris gdab//'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog/dam tshig shin tu 'dra' dka' ba'o//rdo rje'i phung pos ji tsAm+ba du//sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa
126b3(rgyud): lo//gsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni//mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min//ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can//rdo rje thugs kyi bka'
126b4(rgyud): bzhin du//bsam gtan sbyor bas 'che bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//thams
126b5(rgyud): cad na mkha' thub chen po//thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas//ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa//e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/rdo rje theg pu bla na med//ma skyes
126b6(rgyud): b+ha yi chos rnams la//rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan//de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsong ba'o//sbrul ni mI stu gA 'jigs byed pa//nag po 'bar ba 'khrug
126b7(rgyud): cing khro//lce gnyis mtsho ba'i phreng can no//rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bri//de la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po'o//khaM ni mi bzad par ni 'gyur ba'i dug/rdo rje'i dbus
127a1(rgyud): nA 'dug pang banan//dushAnI t+pa la d+ha ma mo ngas//srog par na ma da/banon//rnams na 'jubya bar gdon mog//do la 'don dun
127a2(rgyud): thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po'o//hrIHrnam pa sna tshogs las byug dug/khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun//de yi sa khyer bar bsgoms nas ni//'bab par gyur pa
127a3(rgyud): rnam par bsam//de ni de ma thag ci yang //mi bzang drug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur//dgu ma thag tu skye bo kun//'jig pa 'di lta b+h+rUM tshom med//sdig pu ru swA sprul la
127a4(rgyud): sgyogs dang //sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang //sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis//cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya//de la 'di ni drug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o//
127a5(rgyud): oM lte ba rdo rje'i duge la sogs//gzhan yang mi bzod pa yi dug/na mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du//bsnams na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren//bcom ldan 'das rdus
127a6(rgyud): gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//de la 'dri ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o//hUM/rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di//kha dog dkar por rnam
127a7(rgyud): par bsam//'od kyi sprin ni shin tu 'bar//zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil//gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis//de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur//lan gsum
127b1(rgyud): lo rasngo par sgom pa ni//spyug sa pA dag tu rnam bsams na//na mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang //de ma thag tu dug mod 'gyur//zhes de skad bka' stsal to//de la 'di ni
127b2(rgyud): nye ba'i drug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o//AH'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang //gang bzhan nad du bshad pa rnams//phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du//bsam+ba pa
127b3(rgyud): tsam gyis med par 'gyur//pad+ma chen po 'deb ma brgyad//zla ba bzhin du dri ma med//de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa//'od zer lnga ni rdzogs pa'o//sdud pa nu ni dam
127b4(rgyud): tshig gnag/bskul ba nAM ni dkar po 'dra//bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di//ye shes dri med gsang chen yin//de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snyid
127b5(rgyud): po'i sngags kyi yAM ge'i tshig rnamaso//dzI na dzi ka/A ro li ka/badz+ra d+h+r-ika/nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis//yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa//dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba/
127b6(rgyud): de 'drara'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya//dam tshig spre'u dang 'dra ba 'am//yang na khyi las byung ba'ang rung //rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las//byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam//
127b7(rgyud): 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung //bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas//lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams//des ni phye mar brlag par sgom//de nas brtsams te rdzogs
128a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams//byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol//'di skad ces kyang
128a2(rgyud): bka' stsal to//rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la//sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam//rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po//nad las thar par rnam par sgom//phyogs bcu'i
128a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang //blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/de la khros par bsams na ni//'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin//bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di
128a4(rgyud): dag gis//las skye su yang gang grags pa//brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis//nyi ma bdun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur//yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis//
128a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam//'di ni nad rnams tha~Md kyi//dam tshegra shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//ye shes kyo ba 'od po che//'dod
128a6(rgyud): dang thar pa rdo rje ches//gsum ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//chos rnams rmi lem lta bu ste//ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing //rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la//'khrul pa'i rdo rje//
128a7(rgyud): rab tu gsung //bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson pa'i//sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong //sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams//dbye ba rnam pa gnyisu mthong //
128b1(rgyud): de la 'dan rmilamatshan pa'i dam tshig gi gnas te/byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas//sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong //sangs rgyas rtogs longs spyod pa yi//skur
128b2(rgyud): yang bdag nyid myur du mthong //sems can chen po khams gsum pas//mchod pa byed par des mthong ngo //ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra'i gzugs//sangs rgyas byang
128b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' yis//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis//rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong //rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang /grags pa chen po rdo rje tshos//
128b4(rgyud): gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher//rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong //byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can//sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i//rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong gyur pa/
128b5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste//rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i//lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang //khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na//de ni dngos grub 'thob par
128b6(rgyud): 'gyur//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong //thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang //chos mdzad yid du 'ong ba stsol
128b7(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus//sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba//bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i//dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur//kun dga'
129a1(rgyud): ra ba skyed mos chal//lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyan//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas//ngas mya gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong //
129a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'u yis//de ni mngon par dbang nga skur mthong //rigs 'dzin rgyal phye chen po yis//mchod pa byas par nges mthong ngo //yang
129a3(rgyud): gsungs pa/rdo rje las byung sna tshogs bya'i//rmi lam dri ma med mthong na//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur//gdol pa khyi yi/
129a4(rgyud): sbyor la sogs//gal te rdo rje blos mthong na//blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi//sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur//de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i
129a5(rgyud): dom tshig gi snying po'o//rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la//chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas//na mkha' rdo rje'i gnas sems 'di//chos med tshos nyid
129a6(rgyud): med pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
129a7(rgyud): dang thugs kyi dam tshig ji tsom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa//bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags//chos rnams ngo bo med pa la//chos kyi de nyid
129b1(rgyud): kun bshad pa//e ma'o ngo mtshar las byung ba//nam mkha' la ni na mkhar sgom//de nas bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs phyag na rdo rje
129b2(rgyud): de shin ni shegs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsung so//bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ts+tshed/na ma kha'i nA chas gang dang
129b3(rgyud): yang mi ldan te/mi ldan pa yang ma yino//na mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/thams cad kyi rje su ban+d+ha'i snyam du yang mi sem so//de bzhin du bcom
129b4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin de shegs pa thams cad rmi lam lci bu dang /rmi lam gyi dam tshig las byung bar rje su rtogs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
129b5(rgyud): thams cad/'di lta ste/dper na na mkha' brtag tu med cing briltar mi snang ba thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams
129b6(rgyud): cad kyang rje su rtogs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/dper na lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad rdo rje'i gnas
129b7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig ni//tham cad kyi rjesu song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir te 'di lta ste sems kyi ngo bo nyid do//lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang //nama'
130a1(rgyud): khams de dag gnyi su med cing gnyisu byar medo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/dper na sems can thams cad
130a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams la gnas te/na mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin/gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa yang ma yin/gzugs med
130a3(rgyud): pa'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin te/chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba medado//gang la skye ba med pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi
130a4(rgyud): nuso//de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o//kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
130a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas byed pa ste/byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi
130a6(rgyud): gnas ngag la mI gaunas sems la mi gnaso//chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas bI de la skye ba med//'di ni ye shos 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yi no//kye btso
130a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o//snyam du mi sems so//mi yang
130b1(rgyud): bdag gis rmi lam mthong snyam du mi semaso//khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang /rmi lam lta bu/rmi lam dang 'dra ba/rmi lam las byung ba'o//de bzhin du
130b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang /sems
130b3(rgyud): can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang /rmi lam bdag med pa'i gan su rjes su rtogs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/'di lta ste/
130b4(rgyud): dper na yid bzhini/nor bu rin po che ni/rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad
130b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/sems can gang dag gis gser ram rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/gang bslangs pa de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam
130b6(rgyud): gyis 'byor par byed de/rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la yang mi gnas/yid bzhin gyi nor bu la yang gnas bya ma yino//de bzhin du bcom
130b7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjesu rtogs par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
131a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de drug thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
131a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang na mkho'i khams kyi rje su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjesu
131a3(rgyud): 'byung ba de ngo mtshar to//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
131a4(rgyud): gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//gang bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/sngags
131a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'
131a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad lo legaso zhes bya ba byin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungaso//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
131a7(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub thams cad ni/sku dang gsung dang thugs la mi gnaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
131b1(rgyud): sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la ni gnaso//lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang //
131b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/sems kyang lus la mi gnas/lus kyang sems la mi gnas/
131b3(rgyud): ngag kyang sems la mi gnas sems kyang ngag la mi gnaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
131b4(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas gnas byung /dpal rdo rje sems dpas
131b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems las byung //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/sems gang na gnas bka' stsal pa/nam
131b6(rgyud): mkha' la gnas gsol pa/nam mkha' gang na gnas/bka' stsal pa/gang na yang mi gnaso//de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/rang gi
131b7(rgyud): sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cad mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/
132a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
132a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dreng gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
132a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi
132a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod pa byaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/rdo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes
132a5(rgyud): bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khro 'di sangs rgyas thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //de nas sku yI dkyil 'khor
132a6(rgyud): mchog/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba//dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog legs par rab tu bA shad paru bya//khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya//gru bzhi lham pa rab
132a7(rgyud): tu mdzes//sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ste//sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas//de yi nang du 'khor mo ni//rdo rje'i tshogs bri bar bya//sngags rnams kun gyi gsang ba
132b1(rgyud): mchog/bya rgya rdo rje'i gan su bya//dbus rnam par snang mdzad gnas//mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri//sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/grwa rnams kun tu dgod par bya//stom
132b2(rgyud): chen pha rol gnan pa yi//khro bo rnams kyang sgo ro dri'o//rdo rje gsang bar rapo bsgoms pas//mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bye//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/dam
132b3(rgyud): tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o//grwa shIng dang gAN+DI ba la sogs pa//bye brag tu ni nges par dbul//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/sku yi rdo rje las dam tshig/de bzhin
132b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya
132b5(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/thugs kyi
132b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba//dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/legs par rab tu bshad par bya//khri ni nyi shu'i tshod du bya//gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin//gru bzhi
132b7(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi par//rdo rje bsgoms pas thig gang po//de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni//zlum por kun tu bri bor bya//mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni//cho ga bzhin dri bro ba
133a1(rgyud): /bya//tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che//de yi dbusu bzhag par bya//rdo rje gnas mchog de nyid du//thams cad yongasu dgod par bya//yongasu gsal bar//
133a2(rgyud): cho ga bzhin//dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni//de nas gasdang ba'i mchod pa bya//'on ting rdo rje can dag mnyas//gshing gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis//mchod na
133a3(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dam tshig shin tu dang dag pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor//de
133a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rab tu gsung ba'i dkyil
133a5(rgyud): 'khor gsang ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i//gzugs ni dbus legs bris pa//de yi dkyil 'khor
133a6(rgyud): gnasu 'gyur//sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung //'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas ye shes gsang ba yin te rab
133a7(rgyud): tu gsang ba'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/dkyil 'khor
133b1(rgyud): mA nAd kyi sgra dang gsung drung thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las d+ya //de la 'dun rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying ngo'i thig gdab
133b2(rgyud): pa'i yi ge'i gnas rnams so//oM UHhUM/rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang //tshon rje dag ni dbye bya dang//sdug kyi sems lces mi bya ste//byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'//ded ngas
133b3(rgyud): dam tshig tshul shes pas//sngags kyi lha rnams phab na su//byin gyis brlabs kyis blanas bsgomapa la//dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par brtog/rgyal chen rnam par snang
133b4(rgyud): mdzad dang //yang na spyan ni dbab par bya//sku yi dkyor gnas yid 'ong //rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob//rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che//rang gi chos mas dbab par bya//'di ni
133b5(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad kyi//gsung bu rab tu rtag pa yin//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//mA ma kI yang dbab par bya//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//gsang ba rmad
133b6(rgyud): du byung ba'o//de ltar byas na byin rlob cing //yid la dbang ba nyid gshegs te//rab tu dgyes par gyur nas ni//gsang ba dag gis mchog kyang stsol//'di skad kyang gsung so///
133b7(rgyud): sngags kyi sems pas bya ba ni//rdo rje gsang ba rmad po che//khro bo'i rgyal pos bkug nas ni//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya//rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi//dam tshig
134a1(rgyud): mchod pa dus gsum pa//rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya//sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed//'di skad kyang gsungs//sngags rnams thams cad
134a2(rgyud): nyid la yang //rmad du byung ba'i gtor mA dbul//gsheng go ci sha dang 'bru mor dang //sems las byung ba'i tsan dan dang //khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun//tshim
134a3(rgyud): par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad//'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te//sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o//thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di//bdag nyid gang tshe spyod pa na//
134a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nasu//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu skom//yang ni rdo rngom 'char grag so//slob ma rdo rje 'ong po che//sangs rgyasna kun gyis bstan pa yi//las
134a5(rgyud): kyi go 'phang bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni//rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o//
134a6(rgyud): rnam pa nyi shu rtswa lngar ni//tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par sgom//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gsang ba byang chub dam pa yin//sngags rnams thams cad nyid la
134a7(rgyud): yang dang rdo rje hU~M ni bsgom par bya//sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog/gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya//de ltar rtag tu byas na ni//rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes/
134b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa//'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad//rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa nA//sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/
134b2(rgyud): brten pa'i blos ni brtag par bya//dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'dod pa'i//sngags shes pas ni sbyin bsreg bya//gshang gci 'bru mar sha la sogs//sbyin bsreg tu ni
134b3(rgyud): dngul byar bya//rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag l+le//rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul//dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs//bsnams te zhal du dbab par bya//'di skad kyang
134b4(rgyud): gsung so//dbang po gnyis kyi dam tshig gis//sbyin sgeg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o//rnam snang mdzad kyi
134b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung //AHni lus dang ngag sems la//bsgoms nas rdo rje bzung bar bya//rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang //grags chen rnam par
134b6(rgyud): snong mdzad dag/su gsung zag kyi dam tshig tu//byin gyis brlabs ni rasu gdog//de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig/AHkhaM bi ra dzA/'di ni dam
134b7(rgyud): tshig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i snying pa'o//de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o//sangs rgyas kun gyi son pa
135a1(rgyud): khams//yongasu gang bar rab tu sgom//rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis//sil snyan dri yi sprin rnams rlom//'di skad kyang gsungaso//rdo rje sku gsum
135a2(rgyud): sngags kyis ni//nyung kar dag gis brdeg par bya//dri la de yi tshe na ni//bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis//yang na sangs rgyas
135a3(rgyud): bsgom par bya//bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis//bzung bar mkhas pa dag gis sgom//rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam//slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la//lus
135a4(rgyud): dang ngag sems rdo rje can//sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya//de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsing ba slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar byar
135a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi//rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung //khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa//rdo rje dbang bsrur chen po sbyin//de la 'di ni slob mo
135a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gzeng ba'o//byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la//mchod chen ji ltar sbal ba bzhin//bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i
135a7(rgyud): phyir//na mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag stsal//de tshe de la dbang bskur ba//rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad//lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis//snying khar bdag po bzhag
135b1(rgyud): na na /na pa nanaldan / du smya ste// unan rgyas gangs na/ ga na
135b2(rgyud): bye \u0f7f// kyi na shes bsod pa kyang smrab / ba maung myud kyis meng//da med dkyi snang bste p+s+ya b+h+ya/
135b3(rgyud): dzid na /na dzin pas rgyas cad kyi//de tshig tu tu/
135b4(rgyud): snul bu skyes mas//de la smra smA shA ng+ge b+h+rU~M nAM byu sa hU~M dang //gsong ba sbyin pa ma du dab+ha//3 yang na gshe
135b5(rgyud): sa kyi 'a ba 'i phreng med gzugs//sems can don spyod Sh+Ti nas pag/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang sngags sde mnyes par b+ha hA gsung
135b6(rgyud): 9/blang ba'i shang m-i /gi chen dag kyi sbyi na // rnaM rkyen la dbye bar bya//de ltung byas na men na po mnyi'o//na rdo rje sleb pa//
136a1(rgyud): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya//gshang gtsi shwa yi bya ba dang //rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis//sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge au//bab+h+yo
136a2(rgyud): na de ma thag tu 'bar//bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rigs po'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//dngos grub thams cing sgrub pa dang //dam tshig chen pa
136a3(rgyud): sgrub pa dang //sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang //nan tan du no bsgrub par bya//mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang //rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang //rdo rje sku yi/
136a4(rgyud): bka' bzhin du//dkyil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'grub//gshing gtso dang ni shi tshon rnams//cha ni mnyam par byas na su//kham por sbyar mar bzhag nu no//
136a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod//'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag bzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchogo/hrIHni 'bar
136a6(rgyud): ba'i 'od bzang po//nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//sangs rgyaste kun gyis na mkha'i khams//yongasu grang bar rnam par sgom//da yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas//der ni
136a7(rgyud): sngags kyi dbab par bya//de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o//AHkhaM d+hI/phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang //phyag na pad+ma
136b1(rgyud): chen dang //gzhan gyis yi thub gzugs chen dang //bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhu go//de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gan so//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/
136b2(rgyud): mi bskyod pa ni rab tu rtag/tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che//rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te//'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis//thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya//
136b3(rgyud): de la 'od ni rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul ba'o//AMHmdung rtse che dang rdo rje che//lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis//rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul ni//sangs rgyas
136b4(rgyud): byang chub rab tu 'grub//'di skad ces kyang gsungaso//nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang //chu gling rnam pa sna tshogasas//zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis//sangs rgyas thob/
136b5(rgyud): pa gdon mi za//rI rab sum cu rtsa drugi/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi//de yi 'khyor tshogs lhan cig tu//'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub//phyogs bcu'i sangs
136b6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur//zab mo'i chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing //spangs rgyas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ngam
136b7(rgyud): tshig rdo rje bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o//rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che//de bzhin
137a1(rgyud): gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches//mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul//de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi
137a2(rgyud): gnas so//dam tshig bskul ba dang /dam tshig gi tong ba dang /dam tshi ge bod pa dang /dam tshig bcing ba'o//mkha' dbyings rgya chen drag pa ni//chos rnams thams
137a3(rgyud): cad rnam par spangs//gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni//rdo rje rmad byung gzugs cano//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen
137a4(rgyud): pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //gal te dbang du bya 'dod na//rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che//gsang ba chen po 'di
137a5(rgyud): bsam mo//rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che//na mkha' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//mnga' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni//dbu rgyan rtse mo yang dag spro//gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas//
137a6(rgyud): rdo rje khro bos rab tu dbab//sngangs shing brgyal bar sgom pa ni//byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis//bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du//gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis sgom/
