137a7(rgyud): sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba//rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni//nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam pa//sngag
137b1(rgyud): kyi rdo rje hU~M la sogs//rdo rje gsum la sogs pa sgom//oM ni mig gi dbus bsums nas//'di dag cho ga banin du bstan//sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs
137b2(rgyud): dag ni//sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong //bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs tshe//sbyor ba 'di ni rnam pas ma na//rdo thugs kyi bka' bzhin du//sdug bsngal thams
137b3(rgyud): cad byang bar 'gyur//rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po//bsam na don rnams thams cad 'byor//baM ni kha yi nang du sbom//oM ni lce la 'dug par bsam//
137b4(rgyud): bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas//yid bzhin nor bus rgyan pa ste//zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad stsol//ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o//bcom ldan 'das yid
137b5(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas//rdo rje
137b6(rgyud): sgom pa'i tshigi mchog/rdo rje'i gsung las phyung //bIHsangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po//na mkha' rdo rje'i dbusu bsam//rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis//bskyed
137b7(rgyud): de 'di ni rnam par bsam//rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs po//cung zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying //zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can//bsams na thams cad brtsam pa dang //
138a1(rgyud): rdo rje pa' bo blarlabs m+b+ha rung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//de nas b+hinas+t+ya wAn+da 'das kun nas dbyus rdo rje zhes bya ba d+hA 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
138a2(rgyud): nas/rdo rje chen po sgom pa'i tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //hU~M/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khyor dam pa ni//mkha' rdo rje'i dbu su byasam//sa sa
138a3(rgyud): rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yas//rdo rje gsum gyi grags tsho ni//lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab//bskul byed rdo rje ma sgom mo//rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa//kha
138a4(rgyud): dog dkar mor rab tu sgom//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//bsams la sngags kyi tshig dgod do//rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shos kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//de
138a5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/bsam pa thams cad rdo rje longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ting 'dzin gyi 'khor lo
138a6(rgyud): tshul 'di/nyid kyi sku dong gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //dzaM/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dag/na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog yis/
138a7(rgyud): rdorje sgom pas dbab par bya//dzam+b+ha la ni nor sgrub pa//gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya//zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa//thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can//sangs rgyas
138b1(rgyud): lnga yi cho ga yis//gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya//rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis//bsam gtan gnas lha 'dug la dbul//rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis//dbu rgyun de la rnam
138b2(rgyud): par bsam//de ltar byas ni gnod sbyin dbang //gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen gnyis//rdo rje dam tshigi phyag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//
138b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/rdo rje 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/gnod sbyin mo'i
138b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig gi tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lasu phyung //k+ShiM/mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//gru bzhi lham pa rab tu bzang //thams cad
138b5(rgyud): rin chen bzhi las byas//me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs//gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis//na mkha'i dbyings ni gang bar bsam//gzugs kyi sprin dgra rnam
138b6(rgyud): bsums lnga//rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bras dbubu//gzugs ni gcig tu byasim par bya//lus gsum rdo rje bye brag gos//de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya//rdo rje 'jam
138b7(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin gnas//dbu rgyan la ni khro bo sgom//snying khar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la//rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya//gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du
139a1(rgyud): /gnas pa sgom pa'i rdo rje zhus bya bo'i tI 'dzin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/rdo rje'i sngags thams cad kyi dngas
139a2(rgyud): grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas/dngos grub phra mo 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //sku dang gsu
139a3(rgyud): thugs yang dag 'grub//sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'di bzang po//'dzam+bu chu byo'i gAser 'od 'dra//dngos grub phra mo dag lnga gnas//mi snang la sogs yang dag/
139a4(rgyud): grub 'jam pa'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur//gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che//reg 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur//de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyis
139a5(rgyud): gzugs gsang ba'i dngos grub rnams//sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi//mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni//'jig rten khams ni thams cad du//
139a6(rgyud): mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur//gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni//yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/sangs
139a7(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//de nas phyag na rdo de bzhin gshe
139b1(rgyud): bde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i
139b2(rgyud): pa 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //sku gsung thugs kyi rdor+N+Na rnams//lus dang drug sems sgom pa ni//rang tshul nyid kyis de byas te//
139b3(rgyud): de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur//de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i reg pa'i brtul zhugaso//thur tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs//tshon po khwa
139b4(rgyud): dog dkar po 'dra//sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams//cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya//la grangs bcu drug lon pa ni//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs//bzhin
139b5(rgyud): sdug migI dkyus ring ba//rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad//spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing //rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom par bya//phyag rgya sngags kyi cho gra shres//
139b6(rgyud): stegs kyi rgyud rnams legs par bsrabs//de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya//sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas//brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni//
139b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya//sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi//bza' dang bca' ba spyod par bya//'on tong myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur//bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che/
140a1(rgyud): /zla ba drug gis de dag kun//gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur//rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing //bsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba dang //'dod chags rdo
140a2(rgyud): rje'i gnas spyad pa//sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams//'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo//yon tan yug rgyud mA ma kI/gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la//'di ni rnam pa
140a3(rgyud): kun tu rigaso//bsam gtan yige gsum rdo rje can//rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi bsam//de ltar sang sa rgyas kuni mkhyen pa//mnyes par 'gyur pa gdon mi za//
140a4(rgyud): sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas//nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang //kha zas bzang po bltar ba dag/de dag skrag nas ster bar 'gyur//rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum
140a5(rgyud): 'odas nas//rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur//lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo//lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung //rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya//rdo rje gsum gyi yaM
140a6(rgyud): shes bsten//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//de nyid gsang ba'i tshul chen yin//rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung //sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o//bcom
140a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhen gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams
140b1(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug
140b2(rgyud): pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
140b3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che//rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che//rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum//gsang ba'i
140b4(rgyud): dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo//rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che//rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che//rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog mchog/ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshalo//rin chen rgyal po
140b5(rgyud): rab tu zab//rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med//rang bzhin dag pa gus pa med//rdo rje sku la phyag 'tsha lo//rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che//mi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin//'dod chags
140b6(rgyud): pa rol phyin pa brnyed//rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tsha'o//don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyaste//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa//dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung //rdo rje sems
140b7(rgyud): dpa' phyag 'tshalo//sangs rgyas kun gyi bskul ba yi//bstod tshi ge zhi ba 'di rnams kyis//rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni//de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur//de nas ston pa
141a1(rgyud): /rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba//rdo rje gsang ba bla sung dag pa//rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal to//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//chos rgya/
141a2(rgyud): dbyings ni yi ge che//rang bzhin 'o gsal yongasu dag/na mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/swa
141a3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi//dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya//shA chen
141a4(rgyud): rtog tu bza' bar bya//'di ni dam tshig mchog yin//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam
141a5(rgyud): tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //dom tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya//gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches//gshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'//'di ni gsad
141a6(rgyud): bya rmad byung ba'o//de nas phyag ni rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //
141a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya//khrag dang khu ba sbyar ba dag/brtul zhugs bstan pas rtag tu bza'//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//dam
141b1(rgyud): tshig 'di ni rmad po che//sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'di//rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya//gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba//rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che//de yi sku gsung thugs
141b2(rgyud): rtogs pa'o//de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pas/rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang
141b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //de yi lus kyi ston pa ni//rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas//sems can gzung ba'i ngang tshul te//dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o//de nas
141b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ba'o//dge ba bcu'i las
141b5(rgyud): kyi lam//byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams//dman par mos pa thams cad kyi/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
141b6(rgyud): pos/tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byungo //gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams//byed pa 'jigs shring mi sdug pa//sangs rgyas byang
141b7(rgyud): chub ston pa te//sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/drag po'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi spyi dang gsung dang thugs
142a1(rgyud): /rdo rje las byung //khams gsum dag na gnas pa yi//bud med rdo rje las byung rnams//sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa na//dam chag mchog tu rmad byung /
142a2(rgyud): ba'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //sems can
142a3(rgyud): las byung ji skyed pa//dbyer med sku gsum la gnas pa//rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang //bsam gtan rdo rjes bsad par bya//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
142a4(rgyud): bA tha da hU~M bdag pos//rang gi dam tshig rdo rje 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur//gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che//
142a5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul tshe//de nas phyag ni rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshi
142a6(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus phyung ngo //khrag dang sha ni zla ba dang //rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod//dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis//rdo rje chen
142a7(rgyud): mnyes par bya//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin ni shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
142b1(rgyud): byung ngo //'o mo 'thung ba bra ma can//de dag 'dod dang dri la 'bad//dam tshig 'dis ni bsgrub par bya//gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur//de nas phyug na rdo rje de bzhin
142b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/lha mu srin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //khro zhing nga rgyal gsod pas non//spos dang mi
142b3(rgyud): tog spyod la dgyes//rdo rje sa 'og dam tshig skye//gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed pa'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi
142b4(rgyud): dmachog 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //thod rus bdug po'i 'bru mar dang //zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste//dag byed//
142b5(rgyud): 'di ni don chen byed//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
142b6(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung //gshing gtso dang ni khrag dag bza'//chang la sogs pa'ang rtag tu btung //rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis//gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsad bye//
142b7(rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba//khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod//sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i//dam tshig mo lus spyad par bya//khams gsum pa thams cad
143a1(rgyud): snro ni dam mig gi rjes 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i tid 'dzin to//de nas phyug na rdo rje dang nin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos//lus kyi dngos
143a2(rgyud): grub kyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni//rdo rje las ni byung bar bya//sems can khams ni thams
143a3(rgyud): cad du//rtag par sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ngag gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku
143a4(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //tshig gi lngas lam ma lus par//khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te//tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di//dam tshig
143a5(rgyud): shin tu 'da' dka' bya'o//de nAs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdage pos/sems rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang /
143a6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung //yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun//rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pas sgom//rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi//dam tshig bshud pa 'di yin no//bcom
143a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rje sems dpa' de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/sngags thams
143b1(rgyud): cad rdo rje'i snying po'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //rlung rgyal nyan thos de bzhin to//sku gsung
143b2(rgyud): thug su sbyar ba na//phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung 'gyur//de nas yang phyeg na rdo rje de bzhin gro shogs pa thams cad kyi bdag bros/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
143b3(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi//sku gsung thugs
143b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lo//bsam+b+ha gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas//sngags zlos pas ni byasam gtan bya//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
143b5(rgyud): bos/sngags sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //mdor ni sems can khams rnams ni//bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul
143b6(rgyud): bar bya//rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchog/dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o//de nas byug na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa
143b7(rgyud): dang /nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //rdo rje gshang gcis na mkha'i dbyings//yong bu gang por rnam
144a1(rgyud): par byas ma//dus gsum rdo rje dag la dngul//dam tshig rab tu rtag bya'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshugs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/
144a2(rgyud): mi snang ba thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje l-i swA byung //dus bzhir ji ltar mchog bzhin du//rdo rje mA nI nyinar skyed//yang /
144a3(rgyud): ni rjes kyang rtag tu dbrog/dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/na mkha'i rig 'dzin gyi ma
144a4(rgyud): tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni//dbu rgyan dag la bsam gtan bsam//rdo rje gsum gyi dam
144a5(rgyud): tshig ste//khros pa rnams kyis mi thub po//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam
144a6(rgyud): tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyu //sku yi rdo rje kha zas la//phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //mdo gdon cho ga'i bya ba la//rtag par rdo rje
144a7(rgyud): chas su bya//bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/rdo
144b1(rgyud): len pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug kyi rdo mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i/
144b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab kyi rdul rab tu phye ba dang /mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/de bzhin gA shegs pa thams cad la
144b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
144b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/byang chub sems
144b5(rgyud): dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po 'di/sku dang
144b6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid dmigs med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la/ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas/cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin
144b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa ni 'di snyam du gyur to//sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa//gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan mi med//nam mkha' rdo
145a1(rgyud): rma/sa rgyu//na chung bad ston sas+ho/ yadalal gas smras sa sa soms shArgyun stonams /rbAn/
145a2(rgyud): gshegs pa d+ma dag la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams da /gsung rdo rje'i tshig la byin+de lag kun 'thung byed ma
145a3(rgyud): rtag tu gapa 'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de baN+Din gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'din/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje da sa bonyid/
145a4(rgyud): spyod parar 'gyur ba gshegs po dang byon pa'i rjesu 'gre'o//dAN+Di'i slad du nyon/tshangs pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems da chen po/mngon par shes
145a5(rgyud): chen po'i ye shes zlob pa rnam rlos thams cad kyi mtshan sbyi snyam du rnam par rtog ste/hU~M rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams hA
145a6(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dri kho na nyid yongasu ma shes nas//gsang rje m-i ga rnams chid du ma snum hUM sems pa yang mchis//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
145a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams kyi ci spros tede de bzhin ge she
145b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba rnyed pa'ang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi byang chub mi shes//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon
145b2(rgyud): par byang chub pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o//rigs kyi bu sems can chen po'i khongasu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la
145b3(rgyud): gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kye ma sems can de dag ni sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi phyir/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o//de nas
145b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
145b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungaso//rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas med pa//rtog pa rdo rje las byung ba//smra bar byed pa sgyu ma yin//de nas bcom
145b6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
145b7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug/gang na gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
146a1(rgyud): ba rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang /thams cad mkhyen pa dang
146a2(rgyud): khams gsum ji snyed pa dang //rang bri sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud kyi rdo rje la gnaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de
146a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang /khams gsum thams cad gang na gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
146a4(rgyud): bdag po ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos gsungs pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub dang /khams gsung
146a5(rgyud): pa thams cad ni nam mkha' la gun so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/nam mkha' gang na gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
146a6(rgyud): gsungs pa/gang na yang ma yino//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/oM ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/e ma'o rdo rje yi bshad pa//gang du lus
146a7(rgyud): dang ngag sems med//de ru gzugs ni rnam par sgom//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas nas//rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog/
146b1(rgyud): gsum gyi dbang phyug mchog/rig pa'i skyes bu sgom pa yi//dngos grub kun ni bshad par mdzad//mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom
146b2(rgyud): par bya//rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms naso//spyi bor rdo rje rab tu sgom//zhal gsum sku gsum las byung po//rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya//rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pasam+ba
146b3(rgyud): na/byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur//thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis//gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam//gzhan du rnam par bsgoms ni ni//de dag dngos grub mchog mi
146b4(rgyud): 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to//khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che//mnyes par byed ma rnam bsams nas//rdo rje
146b5(rgyud): sku gsum gyis mtshan pa//khyu mchog des ni mnyes par 'gyur/gang zhig 'di dag sgom pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams//zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che
146b6(rgyud): ba'o//sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gasdang ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
146b7(rgyud): las byung //sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni//phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa//cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na//skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob//de nas phyag na rdo rjes
147a1(rgyud): srub pa pa thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems gsang ba 'di/nyid kyi sgyu dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus byung //gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na//
147a2(rgyud): lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo //sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di//rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da'o//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di//
147a3(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyungango //gshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni//smad pa dag du yong mi bya//cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'//gsang 'di rdo rje gsum
147a4(rgyud): byung yin//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyungango //khams gsum dag gi lam
147a5(rgyud): mchog na//bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams//thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad//gsung gi rdo rje mi smad//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes thugs kyi dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang
147a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //rdo rje sku gsung la gnas pa/dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun//rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis//mgu zhing tshim pa dag tu bya//thugs kyi
147a7(rgyud): rdo rje mi rmad do//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
147b1(rgyud): bdag pos/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyungango //mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni//sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu
147b2(rgyud): bsgrags//rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang //byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
147b3(rgyud): rdo rje las byung //sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin//chu yi khams ni mA ma kI/dkar dang sgrol maM zhes bya ba//me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags//mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam tshig ni//rdo rje
147b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa de nyid yin//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan
147b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
147b6(rgyud): tI nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
147b7(rgyud): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
148a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba gsang ba 'dus par/mngon par dbang bsgyur ba'i slob dpon la/de
148a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub
148a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/slob dpon ni byang chub kyi sems dang mnyam zhing rnam pa gnyisu dbyer med do//
148a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mdor bstan no//phyogs bcu'i 'dzin gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod cing 'tshel skyong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum du
148a5(rgyud): byon nas/slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang 'gro zhing ngag rdo rje'i yi ge yang 'di
148a6(rgyud): skad du 'byin to//bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o//bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o zhes bya ba nas/bdag cag de bzhin
148a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//'di lta ste/dper na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu ni ji snyed bzhugs pa dang /sangs
148b1(rgyud): sa ma ldan 'das du drun du b+h+yormA dang klu srung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i busod nams kyi spang ba dri med pa d+mo bad+ma klung thob pa ni ga sgra thug gtsug gapa 'dun ma
148b2(rgyud): da par du drega'i/ ci'i phyi ni ni/rigs kyi blo byang chud sems ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'o//shin nu gyur pa nas rnams
148b3(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gonas yin pa'i bar du'o//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yid 'jigs shing smug nas cang mi spro bar gyur te//de nas de bzhin gshe
148b4(rgyud): pa mi bskyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dngul dang /de bI nin gshegs po 'ang dpag tu myed pa dang /de bzhin ga shegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang /
148b5(rgyud): rdo bzhin zhe shegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams/rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshi ge la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khyang
148b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum
148b7(rgyud): gya rdo rje'i ye shes las byung ba de rnams kyang /gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon dang brad na/mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshalo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de nyid ston pa yin bcom ldan
149a1(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad
149a2(rgyud): kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub
149a3(rgyud): rnams ci la gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/sku gsum gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni/rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang
149a4(rgyud): sems rdo rje la gnaso//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas/gang la yang mi gnaso//de nas byang
149a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mchir du gyur rmad du gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas ngo ba'i
149a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i ting 'dzin las bzhengs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa
149a7(rgyud): thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' khyed thams cad/de bzhin go/gas pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi dkyil
149b1(rgyud): 'khor nyon cig/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
149b2(rgyud): ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa//gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes//sangs rgyas
149b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya//rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis//'khor lo can kun bzhugs par bya//mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid
149b4(rgyud): kyis//blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya//slob dpon snying khar rab bsgoms nas//dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya//sangs rgyas kun gyis na mkha'i dbyings//yongasu gang bar rnam
149b5(rgyud): bsgoms la//dbang bskur ba yau gnas gsum gyis//thams cad cho ga bzhin du dpab//sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'o//byang chub 'di yis 'bab 'gyur zhing //dzi na tshar
149b6(rgyud): chen po'i dngos grub kun//sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/bsam gtan gyi
149b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro//de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo sbyor ba nye bya ba//sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
150a1(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung //hU~M hU~M khaM/sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni//na mkha'i dbyis kyi dngu skabasam//sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po//rdo rje sems
150a2(rgyud): dpa' bsgom par bya//drag po mi sdug khros pa ni//ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra//phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga yi//phyag na thod pa bsnams par sgom//'od zer lnga rnams
150a3(rgyud): yang dag byung //rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis sgom//bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis//khrag drang ba ni mchog yino//rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang //phur bu drag po
150a4(rgyud): mchog dag gis//sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang //rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab por bya//de nas yang phyeg na rdo rjes rdo rje'i kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang cu
150a5(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung //bza' ba 'am btung ba gang cung zad//brtul zhugs can gyis gang bza' ba//gshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis//cho ga bzhin du yongasu brtag/de nas
150a6(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //mchod
150a7(rgyud): pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yi//mchod pas de dag mchod par bya//'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi//dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o//de nas yang phyag na rdo de bzhin gshegs
150b1(rgyud): ngo thams cad kyi mu dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug gi rdo rje las phyung //dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//bdag gi khu ba la sogs pa/
150b2(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na//sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa/lus dang ngag dang sems
150b3(rgyud): kyi sdom pa 'od/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi//dam tshig 'dzin pa'i ma rnams la//dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje
150b4(rgyud): spyad//sdom pa 'di ni rmad po che//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i rdo rje 'dri/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //lus dang ngag sems
150b5(rgyud): longs spyod kyi//gsang ba gsum phra nas rdo rje skyes//bzang po bdag gi bsgrub par bya//'dir ni yong ye 'jig par 'gyur//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi rdo rje
150b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i sdom pa 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //mtho gang tsam gyi dpags par ni//spyi bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//oM ni dbusu gnas bsam
150b7(rgyud): nas//bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya//rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//skad cig dag gis gzi can 'gyur//lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par//'byur bar 'di ni dogs pa med//
151a1(rgyud): /do sgra sna du kun rdo rjes rnabs 'dzin pa thanasarbad /sus dang dab dang sgyus s+ho/gsung ba 'ad/ srud du gasmang dang thugs rdo rdul su byu na
151a2(rgyud): mchod rten dag gi las mi bya//glebs bam klag pa'ang mi bya zhing //dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya//rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya'o//de nas yang phyeb ni rdo rje de bzhin
151a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/dug thams cad 'byin pa 'am gnon pa dang 'dren pa'i gsang ba 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung //oM/'di zer
151a4(rgyud): dkar po'i phreng ba can//'khor lo'i dbus chud par bzhig//'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa ni//ser po lta bur bsgom par bya//rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis//sa
151a5(rgyud): bon gsang gsum las byung ba'o//de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/lus dang ngag dang sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje
151a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //oM hu lu hu lu/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ha na hA na/da ha da ha/a mr-i te hUM phaT/gre ga la sogs 'khor lo ni//
151a7(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje la gnas par//haM ni dbu su bzhag nasu//ming ni dbusu bri bar bya//sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis//rgyan te rtag tu bzhag par bya//'di ni sngags rnams
151b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi//gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o//de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/rdo rje any+dza na'i dam tshig 'di/nyid kyi sku dang gsung
151b2(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las phyung //lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung //ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gan su//de ru rdo rje any+dzan//thod par rtag tu dbab par bya//tshil chen po dang khrag
151b3(rgyud): dang gshang ba dang /pad+mo'i skud pa dang /arba'i skud bas me mar gyi snying po byas la/tshes nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed ni/rdo rje any+dza na dbab par bya'o//de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa
151b4(rgyud): brgyad btab na/dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro//zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis//
151b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsang bI yi ge du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
151b6(rgyud): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de
151b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsung so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na byang chub semos dpa'//de bzhin
152a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsel pa/gsum po gang
152a2(rgyud): zhig lags/rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
152a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsumo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
152a4(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cade dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/bcom ldan
152a5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa
152a6(rgyud): yang 'das nas/gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas/thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon
152a7(rgyud): par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don bshad pa de/de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la
152b1(rgyud): skal pa myed pa'i phyiraro//'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la//skad cing thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs
152b2(rgyud): par byed//gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing brtsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de/gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon
152b3(rgyud): par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdzo
152b4(rgyud): rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu nguso//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byang chub
152b5(rgyud): sems dpa' khyed rnam ma du shig/sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgom shig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tham+ba nA la/byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
152b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi sgom par bgyi/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam
152b7(rgyud): thos pa'i skal pa yang ma mchis//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/de skad ma zer cig/yi ge ni thun mong ste/rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar
153a1(rgyud): mi shes pa dang ma thos d+ma de bzhin du/da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad dang byung chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang /rigs kyi bu gsang du'i ma
153a2(rgyud): 'di dag ma thos shing mngon par sangs ma rgyaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar

153a5(rgyud): chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs//dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol//mgan
153a6(rgyud): po gAl te da ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na//sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol//de nas de bzhi do gshegs pa thams
153a7(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mor mA ma kIs/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i
153b1(rgyud): mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i cho ga 'dis yang dag par bstod do//rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rjesu phan ston
153b2(rgyud): pa//mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed ni//'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan
153b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis/rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la
153b4(rgyud): nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa//khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse bo//'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag

153b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos/bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/de bzhin gshegs pa
153b7(rgyud): thaMd kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod//khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshib mchog gi phan don che//yang dag rdzogs sangs rgya skyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa//
154a1(rgyud): mgon bo gal te de ring bdag na gson par mchis bzhed na/yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur padrug la dgyes par mdzad du gsol//de nas
154a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad nye bar longs spyod de'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin
154a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing tsong mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas na mkha'i dbyings 'di dag thams cad la de
154a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshigi khu bas yongasu gang s+t+wa~M/bum po rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to//de nas rdo rje nam
154a5(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam chogA lus/yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg nas/thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dge
154a6(rgyud): bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i snang mi rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can dugyur to//da na sde ba mas te sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes
154a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag ni rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de
154b1(rgyud): dag thams cad la 'di skad tsAs bkA' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos byams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/
154b2(rgyud): thams cad kyis/phyag ni rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes
154b3(rgyud): gyi spyod pa mthong logaso//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun
154b4(rgyud): mo'o b+ha ga las mdo pa byung nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag ni rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to//gang 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas
154b5(rgyud): kyi byang chub rjesu rtogs po de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
154b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/'di skad ces gsung so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do skad ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni rnam
154b7(rgyud): rdo rje dem tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/gzugs kyi phung po ma yin tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/'du shes kyi phung po ma yin 'du byed kyi phung po ma yin rnam par shes pa'i phreng ba ma
155a1(rgyud): yin//khams ma yin skye mchod ma yin/de bzhin du 'dir 'dod chags ma yin zhe sdang ma yin gti mug ma yin/chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma/
155a2(rgyud): yon//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/de bzhin gshegs
155a3(rgyud): pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
155a4(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal pa yod pa'i
155a5(rgyud): phyiraro//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na
155a6(rgyud): nyid 'di zung shig/khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskuro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos
155a7(rgyud): kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o//zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung
155b1(rgyud): dang thugs zhugs par gyur tu//de nas de bzhon gshegs pa sa dza rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi dus rdo rjel gnas shing/de bzhin gshegs pa tham
155b2(rgyud): kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing /de bzhin ga
155b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing /
155b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
155b5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun
155b6(rgyud): pa'o///de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogaso///rgya gar gyi mkhyen
155b7(rgyud): po shrad+d+ha ka ra wa R+Ya dang /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/rgya gor gyi mkhan po shrI dz+nyA na ka ra bas bshad nas/zhu tshon gyi lo ts+tsha ba
156a1(rgyud): 'azhes smras bcas kyis zhus btugs pa yang khrul du 'tshul pa//'dus pa na r+m+ma pa chen gyis bsgyur ba mang du byung na nga /'bros kyis
156a2(rgyud): 'gyur bcos mad pa nyung bar snang la/'brelA~M pa'i bshad pa 'gros 'gyur gyi byed nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'bros 'gyur g.yo che bar mthong nas bris pa'o//de nas
156a3(rgyud): byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
156a4(rgyud): bo bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang /dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing bos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
156a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to//em+b+ha d+ha kun tu bzang po yi//sku gsung bugs kyi nges po dag/rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni//rdo rje gas ma la shAts+tsha tu
156a6(rgyud): bzhugs//sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi/rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung //sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'i//e ma'i 'dir ba
156a7(rgyud): ngo mtshar che//e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das//e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun/e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
157b1(rgyud): 'azhes smras bcas kyis zhus btugs pa yang khrul du 'tshul pa//'dus pa na r+m+ma pa chen gyis bsgyur ba mang du byung na nga /'bros kyis
157b2(rgyud): 'gyur bcos mad pa nyung bar snang la/'brelA~M pa'i bshad pa 'gros 'gyur gyi byed nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'bros 'gyur g.yo che bar mthong nas bris pa'o//de nas
157b3(rgyud): byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
157b4(rgyud): bo bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang /dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing bos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa

157b6(rgyud): bzhugs//sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi/rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung //sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'i//e ma'i 'dir ba
157b7(rgyud): ngo mtshar che//e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das//e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun/e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
158a1(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhi no//sems dpa' chen po de de bzhino//de nas byang chub
158a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang /phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag
158a3(rgyud): par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba//byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin//rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa/
158a4(rgyud): gsang ba 'dus po zhes bya ba'i rgyud//sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang //sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas//yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa//mgon po khyed la gsol bar
158a5(rgyud): 'tshal//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de//de dag thams
158a6(rgyud): cad 'dre 'dod pa//sems dpa' chen po legaso legs//yon tan 'byung gnas legaso legs//de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun//rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te//
158a7(rgyud): yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas//'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur//gsang ba zhes 'di bang la bgyi//'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod//rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu//rnal 'byor rgyu
