159a1(rgyud): bdag kyang ji lta bu//ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi//bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu//dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar phu la//de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang //bdud rtsi lha rnams ji ltar bzang
159a2(rgyud): de bzhin dpa' bo lha gang lags//dngos grub thu ma la ji lta bu de ba mchog kyang ji lta bu//de la thabs ni rnam pa du//de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu//rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi//
159a3(rgyud): bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi//las kyi mcho gi tshogs rnams ni//sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
159a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to//
159a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshe//snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs//mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul//dri nas de bzhin
159a6(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lus ngag yid ni rdo rje yis//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//skye gsung
159a7(rgyud): thugs ni rdo rje la//gzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po//zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad da
159b1(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjesu gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so//bde bar gshegs pa
159b2(rgyud): legaso legaso zhes gsol nas/rang rang lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs
159b3(rgyud): te cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'//
159b4(rgyud): chen po dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/sku gsung thugs na rnam pa gsum//gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin//sangs rgyas thams cad
159b5(rgyud): ces bya ba//tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad//lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang //bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa//sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis//bstan pa dag ni
159b6(rgyud): sgrub tshun yin//bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa//brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa//slob dpon spyi yi lus dang ni//dngos grub bo rtul zhugs sdom pa yin//drug pa dang ni
159b7(rgyud): gnyis pa dang //bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa//drag spyod rjesu chags pa dang //nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o//bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang //bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa/
160a1(rgyud): dngos zla sho dang mnan ma no//bskyon pa sgrub par ma pa/na pa sh+lenas d+makun gyi lus//rlu gcod pan 'das snod bya dang //dul dang da la da// ba s+ho//nga
160a2(rgyud): chen rnams kyi 'jug pa'o//bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel ma yi//bsnyen pa de tshig pani//skyon mod dngos kyu'i 'brel bu yon//me chog tu gyur ba'i gzhung nyid de//dkyis
160a3(rgyud): brtul zhugs 'brel pa yi//gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o//bla mes sngags kyi lam gyis ni//slob ma yongasu smin bya ba//brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bsgyu rAb/
160a4(rgyud): rang gi slob me bdag nyid che//sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi//ston b+he s+ya yongasu grol ba yin//thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa//rnal 'byor zhes ni
160a5(rgyud): bshud pa yin//gang zhig dngas med shos rab ste//thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid//rgyud ni rgyun zhes bye bar glags//rgyun de rnam pa gAsum 'gyur te//zhi dang
160a6(rgyud): bzhini rang bzhin dang //myi 'phyogs pa yis rab phye ba//gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te//de bzhin mi 'phyogs 'bras bu'o//gzhi nI thongs zhes bya ba ste//gsum
160a7(rgyud): gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o//rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang //ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o//byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa//de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod//de nyid
160b1(rgyud): rnam pa lnga rU pa shad//gAs dru ba rnam pa gsum du bshad//lhag pa'i sgra ni gu sang chen te//dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya//thogro ma tha ma myo na
160b2(rgyud): gla/dngos dang drangos med mi zad gtso//stong nyid snying rje mi phye ba//byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid//
160b3(rgyud): rig dang lhan cig ldan byas na//rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do//rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga//rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin//'chang ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste//
160b4(rgyud): rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod//badz+rA d+h+r-ika ni rnam shes yin//yod dang ming dang dbus las 'das//'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung //sems can kun gyi lus
160b5(rgyud): yin te//skye las rgyal bas dzI na dzi ka/don rnams thams cad 'byung bas ni//sems ni rin po che zhes bya//tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas//tshor ba rat+no d+h+r-ik+Sha
160b6(rgyud): brjod//mtshon gzhi mtshan nyid dngos po yis//kun la kun gyis thams cad du//dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni//A ro lik+ka ces bshad pa yin//rnam
160b7(rgyud): shes rab mthar phyin byed pa//gang yin de ni shes rab ste//'du byed sems pas 'dzin pas na//padz+rA d+h+r-ika ces bya bar bshad//rigs kyi rgyud ces bya bar bshad//
161a1(rgyud): rgyud ni tho ba ma zhes brjod do//mi 'jigs skye ba med gang yin//mgon po de ni yin par bshad//rgyu 'dras gnyis la sdang des na//rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad//
161a2(rgyud): bems po bcings pa'i rang bzhin pas//gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad//bdag tu slob pa'i ngo bro bas//tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad//dngos la chags
161a3(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid can//'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid//rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can//'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin//byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid//srid//
161a4(rgyud): pa kun 'byung thams cad du//'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'o//sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad//dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yi//mngon phyogs las las skyes
161a5(rgyud): 'bras bu//gnyis med ye shes cho/sa rnams la//nga rgyal byed pa rmongs zhes bshad//de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni//zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad//mtshan nyid 'dod chags
161a6(rgyud): zhen pa yin//ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad//dga' bo rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog/bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs//gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang //rdo la dga'
161a7(rgyud): rtag par gnas//de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs//rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad//mi 'jig bdag nyid chos rnams ni//ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid//dngos po kun gyi dam tshig s+ho/
161b1(rgyud): de nyid gshin rje mthar byed//rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni//don dam mo 'gyur dag gyur nyid//sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste//des na rgyal du
161b2(rgyud): shes mthar byed//brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni//ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med//chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste//des ni khyab bdag pad mthar byed//mi rtog
161b3(rgyud): bdag nyid chos rnams ni//rang bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dngas//rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste//des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed//mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa//brjod du med
161b4(rgyud): dang rtog bral ba//sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di//shes ni bde ba thob par 'gyur//gti mug gti mupA longs spyod pas//gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed//nges
161b5(rgyud): na lus mthar byed pa ste//des ni shes bya mthar byed 'gyur//nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas//nyes pa zad phyir shes mithar byed//des na sems ni mthar byed de//des ni nyon
161b6(rgyud): mongs mthar byed 'gyur//'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas//'dod chags zod pas phrad mthar byed//des na 'dod tshobs mthar byed te//de bzhin snyoms 'jug
161b7(rgyud): mthar byed 'gyur//nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang //de bzhin las ni thams cad zad//sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni//bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad//nyon
162a1(rgyud): mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na//las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas//las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur//gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni//rnam
162a2(rgyud): pa de bzhin ma g.yo dang //rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste//drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung //'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug/khro bo'i dbang por rnam par grags//dam tshig
162a3(rgyud): rdo rje la sogs drug/sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga//'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags//rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bshadado//gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/rdo rje bdag po zhes
162a4(rgyud): bshad do//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung //thabs dang shes rab los byung ba'i//phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
162a5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la//thams cad dag par mos pa yis//'jigs pa thams cad spangs na su//dogs pa mod pa'i sems kyis ni//sngags pas seng
162a6(rgyud): gi bzhin du spyong //'di la mi bya ci yang mod//de bzhin mi bza' yod ma yin//smra bar mi bya cung zad med//rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med//mnyam par ma bzhag skor ba
162a7(rgyud): yis//rtag po nyid du mnyam por 'jog/gang gis sems kun la spyod pa//kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad//dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi//rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yod//yid
162b1(rgyud): de mAna? zhes bya bar bshad//tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don//'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar//gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste//rdo rje kun gyis
162b2(rgyud): bsrungs pa ni//sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do//rang rong gi ni ngo bo nyid//snying po yid kyis rnam bsams te//bsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis//zlos par byed cing
162b3(rgyud): spro zhing bsdu//sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu//byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis//brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med gzung //sna tshog/
162b4(rgyud): bzhin du sna tshogs spro//dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla//bzlas pa smra bar grags pas na//ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la//sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad//de nyid/
162b5(rgyud): bskul bar smra ba'o//ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa//ting 'dzin kyang de bzhi no//de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang //de bzhin kun tu mched pa'o//rdo rje 'chang ba gang
162b6(rgyud): yin pa'i//rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang //bdag byin rlab sogs de bzhin te//de yo longs spyod bzhir shes bya//dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi//spyi bor dbang dkur ro
162b7(rgyud): re ste//snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dag/rang rigs rims kyis rgyas gdab po//'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing //rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdob par//sgom gyi
163a1(rgyud): kun du dngas rnan//na sa na rgyub/nangs spyod n+do dang nga ga wA// 'o sas bu du nam+b+ha// ga sung thugs b+h+yog so//rgyugasgyum du ma
163a2(rgyud): sgom/kun nus seng ba'i 'khor lon//rlobs banid debus rnam par skem//rtsibs kun men zhe slo 'du//mi shes bdag nyid tsul byung //'gog pa ba sgom byi zhing/
163a3(rgyud): mchog tu 'dus pa bsgrub par \u0f7f//dzA 'byur ba'i sbyin skyes byas//TI g.yo ba da mthu m+b+ha bar 'dzur/de/ma'i byung yu~M shes ni//rlung bzhi ni dri ma me n+na
163a4(rgyud): 'i rim pa//sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang //dmachog de bzhin sdom pa rnams//mU ni da kun rgyas par ni//rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin//gzugs dang sku sogs 'did pan
163a5(rgyud): bAd+ma sdug ga sa ka'i ba nyi //'dod chags ni sda gaN+DI muge stsogs//rtag tu byung la m+bu bar 'gyung//gas la 'dod tshogs rdo rdzu ni//rdo rje 'di rje sbyin chen 'byung
163a6(rgyud): rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes//'dod pa de rnams dam tshi ga mtshungs//rnam btsas dang ni rnam pa med//kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid//bye ba dang ni dbrog pa de /
163b1(rgyud): b+h+yo dang rang po bzlas pa bya'o//de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag/sa gsum du ni bskyed par bya//gsang ba dag la rgyu sa gdab cing //rdo rje can rgyu don byed/
163b2(rgyud): zhe sdang sbyor bya'i rnal 'byor pas//zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed na su//rdo rje drug pos bcom nas ni//ye shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu//de ni sto bas bsdu byas la//de bzhin spong yang //
163b3(rgyud): bsdu bar bya'o//'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na//zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur//khams gsum po ni me lus pa/bsad dang de bzhin gso bo dang //skad cig tsam gyis
163b4(rgyud): byed par ni//mngon du nus por the tshom medo//gaN+DI mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas//gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni//rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung //de dag thams cad
163b5(rgyud): rtag tu smra//gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho sgrom//rin chen kun gyi rab tu dgang //gti mug 'khor lo tsAn kun gyis//sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'bebs//rdzas rnams thams
163b6(rgyud): cad ma lus par//rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid//sems kyi rdo rje brtan po yis//skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur//'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas//'dod
163b7(rgyud): chags 'khor lo bskyed nas ni//lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su//'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod//dga' sdug bde ba rangs pa yis//'dod pa'i rtse do mor rnam par
164a1(rgyud): 'phrul//de nas 'khor lho can kun la//lha mo rab tu dbul bar bya//khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi//b+hU dang lha min chung mA meng //skad cig sdom gyis 'dod spyod na/
164a2(rgyud): mi yi bud med smos ci dgos//dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dong //las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag/nyam su len cing byin rlob pa//grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yin//
164a3(rgyud): b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang //byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang //lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa//gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs//
164a4(rgyud): phung po skye mched khams rnams ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o//de ni rtag par rgyu dgod pa//dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin//'dod rgyal dbyig sngon
164a5(rgyud): stobs mi g.yo//lcags kyu dbyig pa rtse gsum dang //ral gri mtsham su rnam par dgod//stong du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes//rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi//'khor los
164a6(rgyud): bsgyur ba drug gi rgya//sA la sogs pa'i sems dpa' yi//phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor po//me long pi wang dung dang ni//de bzhin slod dang sna tshogs ras//chos 'byung
164a7(rgyud): ba yi phyag rgya drug/rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab po//de nas gzhan yid dpa' bo gcig/rigs/
164b1(rgyud): ni kha dog dag gis brtag/lha mo dgu dang na mkha'i khams//me tog ce pa ni bshad pa yin//bu gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis//rigs kyu
164b2(rgyud): kyis dpyod par bya//mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad//ye shes sems dpas gang rig pa//ye shes 'khor lo zhes
164b3(rgyud): bshad do//mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad//sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni//sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad//phyogs bcu'i
164b4(rgyud): 'jig rten khams rnams//'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o//rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren pas//rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o//rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi//'od zer gyis ni
164b5(rgyud): rdo rje kun//bsdus nas gong du'i tshul gyisu//bcings pa bcing pa yin par bshad//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du//sku gsung
164b6(rgyud): thugs kyi rgyas btab ste//ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du//rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag/bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/
164b7(rgyud): gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba//shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste//bzhi pa de yang de bzhino//mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung //me tog bcas shing sa bon b+h+ya
165a1(rgyud): blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bsgyur ba//sngags pas sgrub ma dag la sbyin//namakha'i dbyis kyi dbus gnas par//dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan//rdo rje pad+ma'i sbyor ba yis/
165a2(rgyud): can kun yang dag bste//sku gsung blugaste rgyu rdo rje yis//de dag thams snying kar bsdu//rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas//slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya//'di ni glas
165a3(rgyud): sngags de kun gyi//dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog/las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang //gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//mchog tu dad cing
165a4(rgyud): shes rab che//gzugs bzung sgrub pa po la dga'//sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms//dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can//bla ma la ni slob ma yis//yon rnams rab tu
165a5(rgyud): pul nas ni//bla mas de ni byin rlabs te//sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya//rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor//gti mug dag drang yang dag ldan//gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na//
165a6(rgyud): gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur//zhe sdang spring ba'i bdag nyid sbyor//zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan//zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na//zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur//
165a7(rgyud): chags la 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor//'dod chags dga' dong yang dge ldan//'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na//'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur//shes rab
165b1(rgyud): ye shes bdag nyid skor//rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan//ye shes rgyun+da gyis dbang bsgyur na//shes rab yo shes bdag nyid dmyur//ran/
165b2(rgyud): ba'i lha mo de nyid ni//rdo rje can gyi slong mas drang //leg par lag pa bzhig nas ni//de nga ni nA ga shegs rnams dpang byas la//slob ma'i mgo bor lag
165b3(rgyud): bzhag ste//b+h+rUM me rdo rje cane d+hi sa sgo//thabs gzhan gyis ni 'chung mI rgyu//de bas rlig pa 'di mchog yin//chos kun gnyisu med pa la//dngos po gnyis
165b4(rgyud): brtags pa yin/de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba//rtag tu khyed kyis mi bya'o//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o//rmongs
165b5(rgyud): pa gang zhig 'das gyur na//de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub//tha ma la lus kyi chos la ni//dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni//ye shes lnga yos byin brlabs pas//
165b6(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad//skar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang //snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba//sngags kyi lus rab sbyor bas//bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bang
165b7(rgyud): bya//rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni//bar snang la gnas bsam par bya//aHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni//de mi rog tu bsgom par bya//maM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni//rdo mi
166a1(rgyud): da sunanag pa \u0f7f//dzA m+b+han man+tas sbyar //'gyur bas rnas 'byur chom pa na/nas dang mtshungs par smad gyur cing //ma nas ts+tshom dAn+tas dA 'gyur// sa
166a2(rgyud): 'dzig rten khams rnams kyi//mtshon rgyu mchog gis drungs nas no//bdud rtsi daM ru labA nAs kyang //ba ba'i spyir bas bza' bar bya//bsku bya'i dngos sgra tshig yin/
166a3(rgyud): de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza//yig gsums bon las bskyed bya//gzhan du de ni 'grung mi 'grub//myi snang la sogs dngangos grub ni//tha mal pa zhes bshad pa
166a4(rgyud): sa nyid/ se s+yAt+mas rnaMs//de sa grub mtshan ces yin/bas ni rnam pa yin blo dag/byung chu rdo//can gyisu gasmra sa//rnal 'ad d+hA
166a5(rgyud): mas du/rnal pA yis brtag par sngags//bsnun pa'i chog dang / sgru phywa gnyis pa yin//sgrub ya gas mr-i prA yan+tu/ na
166a6(rgyud): 'o//then mang mchog gi b+he blag gis//bsnun pa rnam bya gnyis 'gyur//rdo rje dI hUM bo blun ming /ye shes padu hU~M mi ts+tsha k+Sha yin//dang ba stong nyid du ste/
166a7(rgyud): gnyis pa sa bon brdzus pa yon//gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa s+ho//bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o//rdo rje rnam bzhi 'di dag gis//tha ma la bsgrub la bsnyen ma /
166b1(rgyud): mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi nyid//sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yin//bsnyon pa yan lag drug gis ni//byas pas sgrub pa mchog tu 'gyur//gzhan du
166b2(rgyud): bsrungs par gyur na ni//dngos grub mchog ni 'byung mi 'gyur//so sor sdod dang ngesam gtan dang //srog stsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // su dran dang ting 'dzin te//sbyor ba'i
166b3(rgyud): yan lag drug tu bshad//dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang //rang gi 'jug nas thams cad du//'dod pa so sor sdud pas na//so sor sdud pa zhes bshad//'dod pa lnga
166b4(rgyud): ni mdor bsdus nas//sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor bA yis//brtag pa bsamA gtan zhes bshad//bsam gtan dri no rnam lngar 'gyur//rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang //
166b5(rgyud): de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang //sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste//lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu//gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du//rnam pa du mar yongs bshad
166b6(rgyud): pa//gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste//de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o//dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste//bde bsdus pa ni bzhi pa'o//shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i//
166b7(rgyud): rang sems lnga par shes par bya//sangs rgyas kun dngoso zhi ba ni//'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs//'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid//
167a1(rgyud): gong bu'i gzugs kyi phyung nas ni//sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/rlon chen kha dog sna lnga pa//srog dang stsol ba zhes byar ba shad//rang sngags snyid kar bsams nas ni//
167a2(rgyud): srog ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi//gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad//sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur//mtshan ma nyer 'dzin
167a3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur//mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar//byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin//smig rgyu 'dru ba dang po ste//du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin//mkha' snang
167a4(rgyud): 'dra ba gsum pa ste//mar me lter 'bar bzhi pa'o//sprin mod na mkha' lta bu ra ni//rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o//brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni//na mkha'i kham su spro
167a5(rgyud): bar bya//rjes dran gang zhig rnam sgom pa//de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya//rjesu dran pa zhes bshad//so sor snang ba de la skye//thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas//
167a6(rgyud): dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa//gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni//dbus gzugs ni rnam par sgom//yid kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa//ting 'dzin ces bya bar
167a7(rgyud): gnas//so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na//sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob//bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na//mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur//srog
167b1(rgyud): dang stsol byas des par ni//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs//rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug/rjes dran
167b2(rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba yis//'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur//ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni//sgrib pa rnams dang dral bar 'gyur//snying po de ni thugs ka ru//
167b3(rgyud): zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta//mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni//sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya ste//sngags kyi dazugs kyi tshul gyis ni//byang chub tshigs bcad brjod
167b4(rgyud): par bya//cho ga yang dag sbyor sgom pas//rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te//sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni//sgom pa nye bar sgrub pa'o//ji srid mthong ba de srid//
167b5(rgyud): rnam gnyis zla ba drug du sgom//'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas//thams cad du ni rtag tu bya//gal te zla ba drug gis ni//ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na//ji skad bshad de///
167b6(rgyud): cho ga dang //sdom pas lan gsum brtsam par bya//de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos//mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing //gang tshe byang chub ma grub na//drag shul sbyor bas
167b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni//'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung //rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni//rdo rje pur bus phur bu gdag/de nas dbang du bya ba dang //
168a1(rgyud): rlung ngo'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya//'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni//ye shes 'khor lo can rnams byasmra//lha mo dbu ni spros nas//bsgrub par dbya ba'i lus la dgod//yongs su
168a2(rgyud): gyur las byA/rgya ba ni//dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par bya//bdag nyid dbus gnas bya la//'kho ro lo tsan kunr-i du smai bar bya//thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la//de 'on
168a3(rgyud): byang chub bsgom par bya//bskul ba'i glu dbyungs pA ni yuMs ni//lha mos snying po bskul ba yis//dus gsum rdo rje'i rong bzhin sems//ye shes lta bur lus sgom//ban
168a4(rgyud): yis kha dog rnam par dbye//de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste//dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu//bzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin//sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la//rig pa'ang
168a5(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgyaso//'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po drug/gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags//rdzu 'phrul chen po'i longs spyod bzhi//rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags//
168a6(rgyud): de bzhi na rdo rje'i bdag po rnams//'dod pa thams cad cisu byur ba shad//bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cad la//dbang bskur po ni rab tu bsngags//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yi
168a7(rgyud): ni/ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis//gnyi su med par byed sgrub pa//sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni//rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can//bdag dang /
168b1(rgyud): 'dru bar kyil 'khor bstod//sgrub pa chen po zhesapa da //brnyan dusu bcug tor che//sbyor bu nyid kyi gzugasu dmigs//nye bar sgrub pa'i dusurmA
168b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs kyi bar//sngags po cho ga shes pa yis//sgrub pa ring lha'i sbyor bas bya//sgrub pa chen po'i dus ni//gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku//
168b3(rgyud): ni rdo rje can kun dang //rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che//de lha'i rnam byis shes byas nas//dngos gru'i mchog ni bsgrub par bya//gzhan du bskal pa bye bas na//
168b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyis kyang //dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag/nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//bsgrub bya sgrub por yang dag sbyor//gang yin de ni bsnyen par
168b5(rgyud): bshad//rdo rje pad mnyam sbyor ba//nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do//yi ge hU~M dang phaT ldan pa//bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad la//ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba//sgrub pa chen po zhes
168b6(rgyud): bshad do//bcom ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung //de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do//lus dang rjes
168b7(rgyud): 'thun gang gang gis//rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs//dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas//dam tshig mi zad bsgom par bya//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//
169a1(rgyud): dam tshig dang po bsrung bar b+ha//de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni//cho ga rdzi skad gsungs lus byung //las dang glang dang rdzas 'thun pas//rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo//bsgrub bya
169a2(rgyud): lus gang yin pa la'ong //dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas//de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la//de yi nyes pa bsgrag par bya//de nas de rnams de bcom nas//byung bar gyur
169a3(rgyud): par rnam par bsgom//dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas//dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni//de ni rang gi 'khor lhor gzhug/ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis//de yi
169a4(rgyud): gzugs brtan byas nas ni//khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni//rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya//de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni//sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams//
169a5(rgyud): rtsusgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni//bsgrub bya bsang phyir btang bar bya//khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas//da ni bcings shIng brdeg pa drang //de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur pa//sgrub pa pos ni
169a6(rgyud): dgug par bya//rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyi sa ni//de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas//sngags pas rdo rje dag gis ni//spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha ru//phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gang ba/
169a7(rgyud): yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun//sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams//gzugs de la ni phab nas//de rnams kyi ni pur bus gdab//de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis//cho ga ji skad
169b1(rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin//'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs//las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya//mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa 'i//khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin srag/
169b2(rgyud): gam//bsgoms pas gdugs pa'i sems can ni//zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya//rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te//dbang la chags po'i yid
169b3(rgyud): du bya//khro ba gtum pas rab tu sgrub/zhes pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams
169b4(rgyud): kyi the tshom thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang gsung dang thags rdo rje la zhugs te/de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs
169b5(rgyud): nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i
169b6(rgyud): rgyal po 'dis bstod do//thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshalo//thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud//thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshalo//thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal
169b7(rgyud): 'dud//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi//sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas//sems can sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam//bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang //sgrub paM dbang po bdag nyid
170a1(rgyud): tshe//sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis//ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur//gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub
170a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legaso legaso zhe bya ba byin te/sems dpa' chen po legaso legs/bdag nyid chen po legaso legs//gsung dbyangs chen po legs so//
170a3(rgyud): legs//mchod pa chen po legaso legs//slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can//dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin//bskyed dang bsdud par
170a4(rgyud): mdzad pa po//des na de yi sdig mi 'byung //bsod nams drag kyang de bzhin te/gang la sdog dang bsod nams med//de ni byang chub yin par gsungs//mgon po de yi slu ba yis//lus
170a5(rgyud): can thams cad 'jog mdzad kyang //ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing //byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'//sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas//gal te dmyal ba rnamasu na//skye bo skye 'gyur/
170a6(rgyud): de rnams kyi//dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che//byang chub rdo rjes bsgrub bya 'di//ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas//sems can rnams kyis sbyor ba des//mchog tu phan btags
170a7(rgyud): shes par bya//tshar gcod pa dang rdzas bzung las//bdag nyid chen po de yis bya//sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par//byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya//de nas byang chub sems
170b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs zhes gsol
170b2(rgyud): to//mgon po chen po leg so legs//thub pa chen po leg so le//chos rnams chen po legaso legs//thugs rje chen po legaso legs//e me'o kun tu bzang po yi//
170b3(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dri ma med//gdug pa mi bzad las kyis kyang //sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems
170b4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par
170b5(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing skrag par yang mi bya'o//de tsa'i phyir zhe na/byang chub rdo rje las byung ba//zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs//sngags kyi rgyud ni bsdus
170b6(rgyud): pa dag/yongasu spang bar mi bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin gcig tu
170b7(rgyud): tshig su bcad pa 'dis mngon pa bstod//dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang //zhi zhing sgrib med na mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid//sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang
171a1(rgyud): chub dbang phyug rdo rje can//de la lus ngag yod kyi rtag tu phyag 'tshalo//gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang //rnam par shes deng skye mched drug dang dbang po drug/
171a2(rgyud): sa chu me dang rlung dang na mkha' thams cad ni//byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tsha lo//gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang //rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag
171a3(rgyud): tu rab 'brel par//rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur pa//byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshalo//smyo dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang //rgyu dang
171a4(rgyud): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin semasu rjes thogs chos//rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste//byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshalo//gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam
171a5(rgyud): dge 'di sgom pa//thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral//gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba rtog/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag
171a6(rgyud): 'tshal//gang zhig dngos grub mchog thabs ni 'di sgom zhing //bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang //sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur ba'i sgrub dbang po//byang chub rdo rje 'drar//
171a7(rgyud): blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal//gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa//mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman 'grub cing //bla ma'i drin gyis 'di ni mnor lam
171b1(rgyud): rtogs pa//byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal//gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang //'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems pa da
171b2(rgyud): mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri 'am 'drir 'jug pa//byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal//gang du zhi sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis//'khrul
171b3(rgyud): 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i//bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni//byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal//gang gis gtso bo sgrub
171b4(rgyud): pa po mthong reg pa dang //legs par dran dang ming tsam nges par thos pa dang //dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag/byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag
171b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal//bstod pa'i tshig ma zhi ba 'dis//'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang //byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la//mgon po de dag rjes yi rang //'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba//
171b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yi//rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /byang chub sem
171b7(rgyud): dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la
172a1(rgyud): dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dul ba lasra/gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i ye shes

172a3(rgyud): bsgyur cing bcos te ga ta nau la bab pa'o//rgya gar skad du/shrI badz+ra mA la a b+hi d+h+we naM ma hA yo ga tan+d+ha sarba tan+ta hr-i da yau ra ha s+ya b+he da kam i ti/bod skad du/

174b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon par rtog pa la mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa/gnyisu med pa'i bde ba chen po nyamasu myong bas/dgyes pas
174b2(rgyud): mchog tu pad+ma dgyes pa/chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin nyamasu myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'o ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/rdo rje

175a1(rgyud): brgya stong la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang /byang chub sems

175b4(rgyud): ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das de yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/sangs rgyas mdzad pa shin tu

175b6(rgyud): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzigs nas/de nas snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub
175b7(rgyud): 'i dzi theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi dri ba chen po bkye ste bzhugs//'od zer gyi dra ba chen po
176a1(rgyud): des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la reg par mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po

176a3(rgyud): dusu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to//bsdus pa de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar byung
176a4(rgyud): bapar gyur pa des brgyal ba de dag la reg nas rdo rje phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs nas gnaso//slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

177a1(rgyud): nyi ma kye//phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad//bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid//phyag 'tshal gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'//dgra'

178a1(rgyud): mantshams masamasamatha thasamam nathas ma a ma as mamam pas mala' sa mas ma malan yam
