178a6(rgyud): lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod//snyigs ma lnga yi dus na ni//ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams//brtson 'grus chung zhing bsod nams chung //lta ba ngan pa mang po dang //
178a7(rgyud): tshe thung ba yi sems can rnams//go 'pha mchog ni theb phyir zhu//rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang //ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams//'khor bA las ni pha rol tu/
178a8(rgyud): gang gis myur du thar par 'gyur//btso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la//'di ltar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs//'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod drin gyis//de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal//
178b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi//rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa//bla na mod pa'o rim pa gnyis//rdo rje phreng ba mngon rtags pa//cung zad 'dre bar
178b2(rgyud): 'tshal lags kyis//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ni//khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gistsol//dpal ldan 'dus par brda' tsam gang //rnal 'byor bla na med rgyud du//thub pa
178b3(rgyud): chen pos chos phung po//brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong /de skad smos nas mdun 'dug ste//lus kyi phyag ni byas nas kyang //ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje sems dpa'
178b4(rgyud): 'gro ba'i bla//rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don//de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang thob//rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don//bdag la bstan par mdzad du gsol//rdo rje phreng ba'i
178b5(rgyud): ming ni ci//'dus pa ci zhig stong pa ci//thig le'i dbye ba dang ni sgra//gsang ba dang ni dam tshig dang //sdom pa dang ni sgra tsam dang //rlung gi de nyid bde chen ci//rdo rje pad+mo
178b6(rgyud): mnyam sbyor dang //sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pa//rlung rnams dang ni 'khor lo dang //grangs ni ci tsam gang du gnas//rnal 'byor lus la rtsa gang lags//rnam pa sna
178b7(rgyud): tshogs sogs skad cig/dga' ba bzhi dang rdzas dang ni//sngags dang rlung dang thig le zhes//yi ge gsum gang de nyid gsum//de bzhin sna yi rtse mo gsum//lus kyi
179a1(rgyud): stong nyid ye shes dang //lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas//de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci//'char ba dang ni nub pa ci//mngon po dpung rnams ji ltar ni//yang dag skye ba gsal bar
179a2(rgyud): gsungs//sngar bshad rtsa rnams rtag tu ni//rdo rje'i pus la ji ltar rgyu//mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni//gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs//rlung rnams ji ltar ldang ba dang /
179a3(rgyud): gtso bo de rnams ji ltar thim//de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa//gtso bi ji ltar yang dag 'thob//rnam rtog rlung gi rab bcad nas//rnam rtog med par ji ltar 'char//rtsa rnams/
179a4(rgyud): ji ltar nub pa dang //sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom//dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu//gsang pa'i yung ni 'bras bu ci//chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang //rigs kyi dbye ba ji lta
179a5(rgyud): bu//phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig/phung pi la sogs skye mched dang //phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci//ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang //bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnaste//stong nyid
179a6(rgyud): dbye bo bsdus pa dang //stong pa nyid ni gang du skye//nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang //a li ka li brda' dang ni//mtshams kyi 'char bI ji lta bu//rgyud gsungs sngon+de ni bsnyen pa/
179a7(rgyud): sogs//tshig nyi shu'i las dang ni//rgyu mtshon ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci//mchod pa'i tshe ga ji ltar gsungs//de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dong //lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar
179b1(rgyud): gsungs//rgyung du thog mar gsungs pa yi//'di skad bdag sogs ji lta bu//'di skad ces sonas dang po'i drug/ngan rgyas par ni dzI ltar 'gyur//
179b2(rgyud): nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg ci//bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba dang //rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'dus pa dang //de bzhin gsang ba'i brda' dang ni//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//
179b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnamos ni ji ltar gsungs//sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun gyi//ming rnams bshad pa ji lta bu//bla ma ston pa slob dben dang //rdo rje 'chang ni bshad
179b4(rgyud): pa ci//slob ma'i yon tan gang ldan na//rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur//de yi dpyod pa'i dbye ba du//de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu//zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang ni//de bzhin//
179b5(rgyud): bsad dang bskrad pa dang //rengs par byed pa nyid dang no//bsgrub bya la ni mngon spyod drong //sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang //mgon po khro bo'i bzlas pa ci//dngos grub/
179b6(rgyud): brgyad ni thob pa dang //mngon shes lnga ni ji ltar thob//rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthong //skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub//lus brten pa dang rgas pa
179b7(rgyud): med//bcud kyis len gyis sbyor ba dang //gser 'gyur sogs kyi sbyor ba dang //rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che//'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob//lus kyi rang
180a1(rgyud): bzhin gzhal yas khang //de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu//'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas//thim dang longs spyod bdag po dang //rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci//de dag 'jig par ji
180a2(rgyud): ltar 'gyur//de ltar dri tshig rdzogs pa dang //lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te//'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas//lus kyis phyag byas de nas ni//gtso bos rdo rje sems dpa' la//
180a3(rgyud): le gso bya ba byas nas ni//tshangs dbyangs zab mo sbyin pa yis//'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin//rnal 'byor tshon po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa
180a4(rgyud): las gsol ba gdab pa dang /dri ba dang /slob ma'i las nyid la sogs pa rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//
180a5(rgyud): de nyid gsung gi 'gro mgon gyis//lag na rdo rje la bos te//yang dag dris pa nges bshad pa//snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa//dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun//khyod kyis dri bar
180a6(rgyud): byas pa rnams//rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen bdag/bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang //rnal 'byor rgyad ni gang du yang //mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa//rdo rje'i dbang phyug de nyid
180a7(rgyud): mchog/dris pa'i len rnams gsal por ni//nges par ngo yis rab bshad bya//skad cig gis ni spyan phye la//mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la//thugs rjes khyab par de skad
180b1(rgyud): gsungs//de phyir khyod ni legs par nyon//de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rdzas thugs brlan cing je tshom thams cad gcod pa la phyag na rdo rjes gas
180b2(rgyud): ba btab ste michog tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni/dbang bskur ba ni gtso bo ste//dngos grub thams cad rtag tu gnas//nga yis ji bzhin don bshad kyis//
180b3(rgyud): de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon//thog mar slob ma gang gi tshe//blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la//de yi tshe na snod du 'gyur//yang dag
180b4(rgyud): dbang bskur gyis dben na//sgrub pos rgyud kyi don shes kyang //slob dpon slob mar mtshungs par ni//mi bzang dmyal ba chen por 'gro//de phyir yang dag bla ma ni//rab tu
180b5(rgyud): gus pas bsnyen bkur bya//dbang bskur thob cing de nyid shes//blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can//zab cing rgya che dri mi med//gnod dang 'tsho ba rnam par spangs//skal bzang lus
180b6(rgyud): ni rdzogs pa dang //mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par rgyan//chags pa che la gcig tu dka'//yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs//bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang //rnal 'byor ma yi mngal
180b7(rgyud): nas skyes//rdo rje theg la gcig tu mos//theg pa dman la rgyab kyis phyogs//de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan//bla ma slob mas bsnyen bkur bya//yang dag bla ma rnyed nas ni//slob
181a1(rgyud): lanmas sasamamathasamamathas ma.aH/yam ma/ma paH ma na ma
181a2(rgyud): ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams//dag dang rtogs dang smin byas nas//ji bzhin ye shes dazang dang ldan//ji ltar rin chen badrar ba dang //gsor ni bskyegs dang bcad pas brtag/de bzhin du ni slab
181a3(rgyud): ma yang /da lo ni bcu gnyis bar du brtag/de phyir phan tshun de lta bus//dus kun tu ni de ltar brtag/gzhan du bgegs ni 'byung 'gyur te//dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal che//dug
181a4(rgyud): ni sngags kyis 'joms pa bzhin//sngags kyis dge byas bcud len byed//de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//sngags kyi slob ma rtogs byas nas//bla ma dbang bskur la sogs kyis//
181a5(rgyud): dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don//de phyir dbang bskur slob ma ni//ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen la//de la lag na rdo rjes zhus//dbang bskur ji ltar rgyud
181a6(rgyud): du ni//gtso bo ru ni gsungs pa lags//rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen/the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa//de kho na nyid mkhyen pas ni//lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa//den
181a7(rgyud): de ji lta ba bzhin du//nga yis yang dag bshad kyis nyon//dbang bskur ba yi dbye ba ni//dang po'i dbang ni gtso bo ste//gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming cano//gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba
181a8(rgyud): ste//bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o//gtso dbye ba bcu gcig ste//bcu gnyis pa ni gsang ba'o//bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor//bcu bzhi pa ni don dam ste//dbang bskur re re sa re'o//
181b1(rgyud): rnam pa gsuman rgyu yid pang //ngan pa 'bras bu shes par bya//dka' ba la sogs rim pa yis//thams cad la nAM da yis khyab//mar ngo yin chos gsum
181b2(rgyud): drung //de bzhin ches bcu tshes bcu bzhi//yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la//bla mas tshi ga bzhin dbang bskur//lus pra lo ni bcu drug lon//gzugs dang skal pa drag gis rkyen//
181b3(rgyud): sngo ba sangs mig ni yangs pa dang //snying rje'i bsam ldan yang dag mos//ngag snyan dbang bskur thob pa dang //rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos//yang na lo ni nyi shu lon//
181b4(rgyud): nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste//de las lhag pa skal med 'gyur//de ni dngos grub ring du byed//lhag par 'jam pa'i bu mo la//chung ma 'am yang na srin mo 'am//yang na bu mo//
181b5(rgyud): 'ang dad pa yis//bla ma la ni dbul bar bya//gser dang rin chen gos dang ni//me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pas//mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas//slob ma yis ni 'di skad
181b6(rgyud): brjod//deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du//gtso bos bdag ni mchod pa bzhes//de lta'i rnam pas mnyes nas ni//bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod//bla ma'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang //
181b7(rgyud): daphyir yang dag bla ma mchod//de nas bcom ldan yum phyag rgya//yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya//bsten pa las ni gang byung ba//ltung ba skal bzang kha la ni//sbom
182a1(rgyud): nam/ mas sgyu/ na pa ga //da // /na da// na spyo //
182a2(rgyud): sa ni nor smra //dga' rnams ba bzhin du//skad cig lnga skyes gyur pa//dga' ba sems sa 'dre / dun
182a3(rgyud): ya ni//gtad na suM gsol ba d-i s+yAd brjod//dri ltar pa mar+g+had byu ba na// m+b+ha la e pa mdzag gi gdong //bung byed rdo rje dbyi sa dang bya
182a4(rgyud): 'das thugs kyis ni sa sa m+b+ha / byir ma /kIn+da ts+tsha b+hU das byer ba
182a5(rgyud): nga sa ngan pa gas pa ni dang u A sa nasri nyid shAn //de rje da
182a6(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun tums pa ni//dri ba gzhan la brjod mi bya//rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ming //de yongs ni dran gsum pa//dada'abadzin yidan gyi gnas//dmas cad ti ba dan/
182b1(rgyud): ba ste//dag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das//gnyis pa thams cad rnam par sbyangs//skal pa zlang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'//rnal 'byor ma yi dag/
182b2(rgyud): gi yul//stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang //rdo rje phreng ba zhes bshad//stong nyid rdo rje gsang pad+ma//rtsa ni rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ye shes mchog tu bde ba che//lhan cig skyes/
182b3(rgyud): dga' rmad byung ba//rdo rje de yang rnam rtog rnams//'bigs par byed par yongasu grags//phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun//byang chub sems kyi rdo rje rnams//mi phyed pos
182b4(rgyud): ni rdo rjer gsungs//rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni//grang yang rung bas brjod mi bya//de ni dbug su yongasu grags//phreng ba rgyun ni mi ma chad par//dga' ba rab 'bab
182b5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis//rnam rtog rlung kun 'bigs par byed//rlung la 'bigs par mi nuso//nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni//brgya dang brgyad lhag gsal bar yang //rnam
182b6(rgyud): rtog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni//'char ba dang ni 'joms pa dag/ji lta ba bzhin rab dbye yis//rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyon cig/btAng bzung dang ni dung phyur dang //myos pa
182b7(rgyud): dang ni blo ngan dang //bsil byed dang ni g.ya' ba dang //ngar rnams dang ni sta re dang //gzigs pa chu srin dza sha dang //rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus//'dod myos chu
183a1(rgyud): ba chu srin dang //sna tshogs skyed dang 'dud pa dang //snyoms dang rnga dang sgra sgrogs dang //rlung lha dang ni gnang 'bigs dang //me dang dus dang tsa bgyi dang //rdo rje mchog sbyir nu ta dang //
183a2(rgyud): sbrang me dang ni zla ba'i 'od//kam po dza dang ral pa can//yungs nag rab bkram drus 'gugs dang //sdig pa dang ni g.yon caru rten//grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang //kun sel
183a3(rgyud): mchog ster smre byed dang //nga rgyal mtsho dang tshogs bdag dang //rtsangs pa dang ni sa yi blo//theg pa bzeng dang mchog tu skyes//dri med phrag gu nyi ma dang //gsal byed dang ni nyi ma
183a4(rgyud): gnon/stobs bzhin nga ro dang ni dus//sdom pa dang ni mchongs nas 'gro/sbrang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang //thod dang sgur po drang po dang //sa dang sa la 'gro ma dang //bram ze dang
183a5(rgyud): ni sna 'gyur gnas//ma mo'i rigs dang lci bskyod pa//mi smra dang ni rnga sgra'i sprin//dga' bar byed dang mig yangs dang //dri med 'od srung ne tso dang //sna tshogs mchu dang mig
183a6(rgyud): mnyam dang //mdzes dang chos kyi dbyig pa dang //'gro kun snying stobs bstan pa dang //za phod bung bu snyom las dang //kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtse//rtsa bran dbang byed
183a7(rgyud): g.yo sku can//gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'//glog phreng dang ni dga' byed dang //dbugs 'byung ra ga lci dang ni//bde mchog u dum bar rmongs//pad+ma'i dra ba pad+ma bskor//dgra
183b1(rgyud): /ma dru dang no//rdo rje dadang phyug rlung med//de myur ba yis bstan pa yin//bcom ldan dus pa'i rlud rnams kyi//gnas rnams ston do ba las/
183b2(rgyud): de dag gang las ldang ba dang //mched pa rnams bai byed pa lags//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni//'khor lo drug lo khyab pa
183b3(rgyud): rlung //chos kyi 'khor lho rtag tu gnas//srogs ces bya bas 'gro la khyab//rnam d+h+r-ig med pa mtshan byed na//na mkha' mchog las shar nas ni//rlung gi ring bzhin 'jom/
183b4(rgyud): par byed//rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu//chos kyi 'khor lo'i cha na gnas//mchin phyed dus nas brtsams nas ni//'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid//nyi ma byed kyi mtha' chu
183b5(rgyud): ni//rnyeng rnams kyang ni ldang bar byed//nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni//'khor lo drug las dgu bdag nyid//mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mthar//rlung rnams gasngal bar rgyu
183b6(rgyud): ba dang //de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yis//sna tshogs pa yi rtog par 'gro//rnam par rtog pa rnam phye nas//de dag ming rnams bshad par bya//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
183b7(rgyud): rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon par zhen//phrag dog phro dang ser sna dang //g.yo dang rgyu la cha lugs ngan//blo rgod brkam chags gnyis dang ni//the tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang //dga'
184a1(rgyud): yal ma mtshamamatshamasamamams mtsham/amamam thamamacamasamasam yab sa malan 'as lam sams lams kha mam ma 'thal na yamasas
184a2(rgyud): dang chags bral dregs pa dang //'chab dang sred dang bag chags dang //sgyu dang rmongasu dang 'dod chen dang //rjod dang rje 'jo spyi brtol dang //tshul 'chos reb dang kun nas gdungs//rnam
184a3(rgyud): 'gyur ma zhi shes bzhin med//bems po log pa'i nga rgyal dang //'gyod dang khrel ni med pa dang //gus pa med dang ches pa med//blo dman ngo tsha med dang 'ching //ngo tsha shes dang ngo che
184a4(rgyud): dang //mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang //yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems med//bsgrims dang the tshom ngal ba dang //dbang dang 'khrul pa'i snying stobs dang //snyam sems pa dang brgyal
184a5(rgyud): ba dang //thim pa dang ni mi srun dang //gya gyu snyom dang mos pa dang //rig byed min dang bag yod dang //gnas ngan len dang nyam chung nyid//yid mi bde dang lhag par rtog/skrag dang //
184a6(rgyud): rmugs dang gnyid dang ni//brkam chags rol pa khrung khrung dang //'tshe ba le lo yon po nyid//bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang //kun rdzob de nyid don yod dang //ster dang dga' ba'i
184a7(rgyud): 'dod pa dang //'jigs dang 'dar dang phra bdag nyid//gasngal dang rnam gsal lhad 'jug dang //'brel dang rtog pa'i de nyid dang //ru sbal ngoms med gnod pa dang //mi gsal ba
184a8(rgyud): dang yid du 'ong //gnas med mang du smra ba dang //bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang ni//ya mtshan dga' dang skye ba ngan//dman pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum//'khor ba la ni chags pa
184b1(rgyud): na par rtogs pa ltas nga tshig gas dugasum pa'i//nga nas rdo rje ka ma nyi ma~M// khyu pa/de bcan
184b2(rgyud): bzhugs//'dus pa'i mchog don ra gsungs pa//'dus pa dres pa zhes ni bshad//'dres pa nga yos khyod la bshad//'khor lo bzhi dong tha mi dang //sngags ni wAn
184b3(rgyud): cig cho ga bzhi ni//dpa' bo rnal 'byor mi sbyor ba//gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni//yang dge sbyong ba reg gyur pa//de tshe na mkha' rnam rgyas nyid//na mkha' las ni skyes pa'i
184b4(rgyud): rlung //de yis me ni rab tu 'bar//\u0f7f ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis//rtsa rnams rab sad gzi brjid kyis//bde ba kun gyi go 'bang mchog/bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo
184b5(rgyud): kyi gan bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems//rnam par zhu nas rtser gnas pa//rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir//khams rnams ro gcig gyur pa dang //phung po rnams
184b6(rgyud): ni yongs zad dang //nga la gso ba la rlung rnams ni//dge' ba rnams de yang dag skye//de nas byang chub sems kyang no//gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas//ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa dang
185a1(rgyud): rtsa ni gcig 'bras bu ni//ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la//'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs//phung pa khams dang dbang po dang //yul rnamasu ni smras pa rnams//rnam rtag kun nus zad pa lnga//
185a2(rgyud): bde ba chen po yang dag skyes/ro gcig pa ni ngal bso ba//de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste//de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba//rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsum//rnal 'byor chen po
185a3(rgyud): rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon//stong nyid do ni rab rgyub/
185a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun//nang du khyab pa'ang chos nyid//de nyid yang dag shes pa ni//de bzhin nyid dang na mi rtog/bdag dang gang zag chos rnams ni//bdag med rang bzhin
185a5(rgyud): gcig pa nyid//stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang //thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa//rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs pa ste//rtog pa yi spyod yul min//chos rnams thams
185a6(rgyud): cad mdor bsdus pa//'khor lo drug tu rnam par brjod//de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni//rtsa yi 'khor lo legs rgyas pa//do nI na mkha' khyab cing phra//khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan
185a7(rgyud): nyid can//dmigs pa med cing rten pa med//gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang //rnam par mi rtog mchog tu zhi//rang bzhin med cing dri ma med//gnyi shu med cing bya ba
185b1(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par sbyangs//dus da dpe lngas 'das pa ste//dgro lam gyi snod yul bral//chos da chos ni thams cad kyis//dz+hi sgrub dang/
185b2(rgyud): mngon par brjod//dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral//dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol//de ni kun nus bsgribs pa med//na mkha' lta bur mchog tu khyab/chos rnams
185b3(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin ste//de ni de bzhin nyid ces brjod//gang nas kyang ni mya 'ongs shing //gang du yang na 'gro ba mod//rmongs dang 'khrul pa gcig pu lngas//de ni rab tu spro bar
185b4(rgyud): spang //bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs//'dod chags zhe sdang sogs mi gos//'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel//rtog pa dang bral dri ma med//bdag dang srog
185b5(rgyud): dang skye ba po//skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang //shed las skyes dang shed bu dang //byed pa po dang tshor ba po//shes pa po dang mthong ba po//sgro 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs//
185b6(rgyud): phung po skye mchod khams la sogs//rnam shes dang ni gzung ba yis//sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra//na mkha' mchog la yang dag gnas//de ltar ma lus stong nyid//
185b7(rgyud): ngan//brjod dang brjod bya'i don dang bral//ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang //rang byung mchog tu rmad byung ba'o//brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob tu//da ni nga yi yang dag bshad//
186a1(rgyud): rlung rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir//de kho na nyid mthong ba med//bdag nyid rang gri dro dor rig/pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul mAn//do ni rang rig par bsha do//chos kun gnas ni khro ba'o//rnam rtog
186a2(rgyud): gis 'khrul rtog dang //mi shes pa yi rmongs pa rnams//don dam par ni myi shes shing //kun rdzob dgra yi mdzod 'dzin pa//ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing //rtog stong nyid smra bar
186a3(rgyud): byed//rnal 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas//de ni mchog tu phra bar spyod//stong nyid yang dag ni mkha'i che//shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs//rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang
186a4(rgyud): bral//stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lor brjod//phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus//'khor lo drug phug nang na//zla ba phyed pa'i cha lta bu//stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas//phyed min gdu ba med
186a5(rgyud): pa dang //ji ltar bag chags chu zla bzhin//rlung gi 'khor lo srog tu bshad//mtshan phyed skad cig me la 'char//de ltar yang dgra sgom pa ni//'dri ni steng nyid sgom byed pa'o//don
186a6(rgyud): dam gnyis med rnal 'khor gyis//yang na rgyu 'bras sbyor ba'i phyir//de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom//don dam rang gi ngo bor ni//kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du//bsgoms pas
186a7(rgyud): 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur//ji ltar til la til mor ni//gnas pa nyid la mthong mo 'gyur//de bzhin lus la stong pa nyid//gnas kyang bsgrings pas mthong ba med//bla ma'i
186b1(rgyud): zhastsalas 'di shes par//yang dag reg pas klan rdzob spangs//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang la rdo rje phreng du'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa cu
186b2(rgyud): don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///denas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyen//thig la'i da bA bla nA med//'jig rten thib le dbye bas dben//'khor bar yang
186b3(rgyud): ying du la ba//me d-i 'i san gnas pa ni//thig la rlung du yang dag bshad//sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed//rnal 'byor mdzod pa bkrol nas ni//rlung gi de nyid rin
186b4(rgyud): pa mchog tu 'dred pa'i sbyor ba yis//sbyor ba da yang mo shes par//rlung dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis//brjid dang brjid bya'i dpe las 'das//mi gas la leg pa
186b5(rgyud): rnams kyis/ma d+han ma nas //s+yA sa d+g+has rnam snyan thob pa /lA R+R-i lA T+TA pa drin ni smi ni//zhal nas nas du rgyud nas ldan/
186b6(rgyud): ma ldan 'di 'a chen po la//rdo rje sems dpas slar nus pa//gr-i ba'i myu gon gyis bsnyen du gsol//thig 'a'i da ba rig bcas pa//rnal 'byor mchog ni da
186b7(rgyud): sa shes//sbyar bas mdud pa'i byid par byed//khams gsum ba mi 'bri ba'i'o//myur dri dengs grub mchog tu 'gro/ rmang nus nas rdo ma//rdo rje dbang phyugs
187a1(rgyud): gsungs pa/mchog tu gsal ba 'di nyid ni//gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa//thig le'i dbye ba de yang na//nga yis bshad ces sbyin nyom//slong gi pad sngags na mkhu' la/
187a2(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs//stang dang 'og la basbyin nas ni//srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas//de la'ang dbye bar dka' ba yi//dbus mdud pa gsum rnaMs dkri
187a3(rgyud): mchog dang bcom byas pas//stong du 'gro ba thob mi byed//des bcom slar yang rnam lnga rgyu//srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang //khyab byed dang ni menya ma gnas nyid//rtse mo lnga
187a4(rgyud): lasA rgyun du ni//rtso lnga la ni yang dag bAd+d+hin//rgyags dang rnam par rgyas pa dang //myos dang gtung dang mdza' bo ste//de dag rtsar ni lngar shes bya//rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyeg
187a5(rgyud): steng gi srog dbus nu yang //rdo rje'i lte ba'i mkha'i dbyings 'gro/srog ces bya ba'i rlung chen po//lci ba mdud pa dang phrad pas//bcoM me nas kyang ni rnam lngar rgyu//rna mo rnams la
187a6(rgyud): rtse lngar ni//zla ba'i cha dang sna dang ni//bsnyen bkur lkog shal mchin pa ste//rtsa ni l-I yi ming yin//rtsa ni wA las rgyu ba'i rlung //klu dang ru sbal rtsengs pa dang //lha sbyin drang ni
187a7(rgyud): bzhu las rgyal//de ltar rtsi de dang bcas pa//lus kyi thur du 'gro bas ni//sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni//yang dang yang du bskul byas nas//bskul bas kyang ni rgyas
187b1(rgyud): pan//gti mug chen pos dbang du byed//de stong chas kyi 'khor lo no//gnas par rtsa ni bskul byas nas//de rnams ldan cig rtsa de dag/zhe sdang gis
187b2(rgyud): dbang du byed//yang dag bskul nas de steng gi/longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye//rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu//chags pa chen pos dbang byas nas//bskul ba dang ni
187b3(rgyud): de stong gi/spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i bde chen du//rtsa de rnams drong lhan cig tu//byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed//rnam rtog rnam par rgyu byed cing //sna tshogs dbye ba thaMd las/
187b4(rgyud): steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro/srog rab tu bcom nas ni//de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rtser//zhugs nas thur du kha bltas pa'o//de yang thur du mi 'gro ste//ma rig mdud
187b5(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo ni//rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung //de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas//mig dang rna ba de bzhon sna//lce ste rnam par shes pa bzhi//rtse mo bzhi nas phyung nas
187b6(rgyud): nI//bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas//rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu//do ni rab tu rgyas par byed//slar yang lam de nyid nas ni//ji lta ba yi rim pas 'jug/de yi dngos
187b7(rgyud): nyid de sbyor bas//rnam shes bsten pa'i skad cig la//de yi chags bcas kyis slar 'phel//'khrul byas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las//de ltar bag chags kyis bslad pa'i///
188a1(rgyud): rnam ma shos las kyi ngo bor 'gro//de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas/khams gsum par ni 'khrul pa'o//byeng po las kyi 'bras bur myong //gzhan nyid du ni 'khor ba med//de phyir 'khor ba byanapa
188a2(rgyud): don du//thig le po 'phang gangal bar dbye//skam pa la ni 'bad par byed//ma rig gzhan ni mi shes pa//dbus kyi mdud pa de yang ni//de phyed na ni dngos grub 'gyur//rnal 'byor
188a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor grub pa ste//ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni//mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang //mchog tu gsal ba thob nas ni//blo bzang ji lta ba bzhin gnas//phreng ba mi dgos sgomi dgos//
188a4(rgyud): bya ba mi dgos dgag mi dgos//sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis//yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob//las chos dam tshig phyag rgya ni//dbye ba 'di ni ma gsung so//'khor lo
188a5(rgyud): dbye bas ma yin zhing //de bzhin dge' ba sogs kyis min//phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang gsal//sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni theb//stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang //gnyis med bdu ba de nyid
188a6(rgyud): dang //gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang //rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po//ma rig sgo nga'i sngags 'byed cing //'jig chags lta ba'i ri bo 'joms//phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
188a7(rgyud): dang /rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad//sngags kyi de nyid nges sbyor bas//rigs shing yan lag gsol ba gang //rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang //bla ma'i zhal las nges rtog
188b1(rgyud): 'gyur//mAn drag med pa'i bzlas pa ni//sngags kyi rgyal po blo rmongs byed //du yi dka' ba gtsug pa dang //chu bsrubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar//dri bzhin man
188b2(rgyud): drag dang bral sngags//skyes bus ji srid 'tsho yi bar//bzlas kyang de yi 'bras bu yi//cha tsam thob par mi 'gyuraro//mi shes pa yi mi 'da' zhig/rgya mtsho'i gzhi yi pha mtha'
188b3(rgyud): yi//sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa//lam ni gang yin mi 'dri gang //de ltar bdag nyid 'gro bar byed//de bzhin dga' ba cher byed pa'i//man ngag dang bral sgrub pa po//'bras bu
188b4(rgyud): med cing mkhas pa yang //sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye//khong khro skyes pa'i skad cig la//'bras bu med cing du 'bod 'gro/de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//dad pas bla ma brgyad
188b5(rgyud): pa las//man+da ngag dag ni bslab par bya//gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab//brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas par byed//de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang //bla ma'i zhal las 'bad
188b6(rgyud): pa yis//de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya//sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung //de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang //rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//the tshom thams cad gcod pa la//phyag
188b7(rgyud): byas nas ni zhus pa ni//khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni//sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med//gang bslab skad cig dngos grub 'gyur//de nas
189a1(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba//de nyid mchod tu drasang ba ni//gang du'ang ba yis ma bshad pa//rnal pa med pa bsam pa'i rgyus//rgyud+ma rnams kun tu sras byas
189a2(rgyud): la/dade ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon//sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med//sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis//gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur//thog mar aSh+ma'i tha mi dri//dbyangs yig drug pas
189a3(rgyud): rnam par rgyun//sde mtshan m+bu'i mtha' deng ldan/dbyung sna myed pa yi tshe dang bcas//uSh+NI mtha' mi dbyungs yig 'di//dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldan//mabur ni tshig drug mchog skye
189a4(rgyud): sngags kyi gtso bo btu bar bya//de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming //sngags kyi brda' ni rmad byung ba//'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir//sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas//rlung gnyis
189a5(rgyud): kyis ni phye nas ni//ma rig mdud pa 'byod par byed//phyag rgya chen po mchog rgyu//mchog tu zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis//man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don//gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na//thig le'i
189a6(rgyud): sgra yi go 'phang gsal//'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed//skye bos dben pa lha yi gnas//sgra yi tshe ra ma rnams dang bral//bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba//bskyed mos tshal
189a7(rgyud): zhi bde ba che//'dod pa lnga la yongs spyod pas//sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur//'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas//gang gis dngos grub
189b1(rgyud): mchog na 'gyur//sgyu na gnas//rigag N+DI ra dbyas nas/nan+ta sar+b+bad /ga slong smras sul m+b+hanan d+ha/
189b2(rgyud): so dang mchu ni bde bar bzhag/dbugs kyi 'byung rngub klod nus ni//cung zad cung zad rdol dril nas//ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngub ni//rdo rje skyil kyang legs gnas pas/
189b3(rgyud): phyag rgyu dang ldan pas//yi ge gnyis ni rtag tu bzlas//thig le'i dbye bas bde ba che//zla ba drug rnal 'byor mchog/thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//rtsa ba'i rgyun ni dang po
189b4(rgyud): 'di//a ba d+hU to dri med gnas//rlung gi de nyid ye shes che//rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni rgyu//ri lu ral gri ro langs dang //rgyal po mig sman bcud kyis len//dmig dpung rang
189b5(rgyud): dang rtsig pa 'bigs//rig 'dzin gyi ni go 'phang mchog/mi snang ba dang gter mthong gi//'dod dgur sgyur dang gzugs mthing dang //gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal//
189b6(rgyud): yi nang du 'jug pa dang //mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang //ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur//de ltar skad cig gcig la ni//byang chub mtshan nyid go 'phang //dka' ba spyod
189b7(rgyud): ba spangs nas ni//shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan//bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster//sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min//phreng ba mi dgos bgrang mi dgos//'di ni bskyed rim
190a1(rgyud): dbye mi dgos//gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgros//sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis//bla ma'i zhal las brgyad pa dang //zla ba drug gis mngon sbyor bas//go 'phang mchog ni
190a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las thig le'i dbye ba dang /rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i lo'u ste dreg pa'o//
190a3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon//bla na med pa na de'i don//gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni//tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur//sgra yang mi gshegs par ni bshad//rang bzhin 'od//
190a4(rgyud): gsal dri ma med//rnam pa kun las rnam par grol//lte ba sprul pa yang dag gnas//sbrul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni//gnyis mang ye shes rmad byung ba//tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang //
190a5(rgyud): dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba//de dag de ltar rin po che//skyed pa po yi pha dang mas//yi ge med cing gong bu med//'byung ba chen po rnam par spangs//dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol//
190a6(rgyud): skye med zad med rmad du 'byung //'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs//spangs shing lhag ma med pa dang //mchog mchogs zhi ba med//dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas//rnam rtog med cing
190a7(rgyud): rten pa med//kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa//nyon mongs can gyi yid kyis ni//bems po rnams kyis sad par byed//mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis//thob par
190b1(rgyud): 'phang bla nA med//gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang //rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten//yi ge hoHyis bskul nAs ni//ma yi 'khor lo sad par byed//
190b2(rgyud): de lta'i na de'i go 'phang don//bla ma'i zhal la yang dag gnas//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las na de'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u
190b3(rgyud): bdun pa'o///de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don//bla nA med pa bshad kyis nyon//gsang ba b+ha ga zhesu gsungs//b+ha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba/bde ba chen po'i go
190b4(rgyud): 'phang rten//dga' ba bskyed par byed pa'i rgyu//rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal//ye shes chen po spros pa med//rnam par rtog pa thams
190b5(rgyud): cad spangs//bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu phra//lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas//dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas//phra ba yang dag byang chub sems//srog la
190b6(rgyud): pan par 'tshe ba ste//srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas//dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste//snying nyid skye med 'chi ba med//sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang //bde ba chen
190b7(rgyud): po'i 'khor lo skyo//bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste//chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas//bde ba thams cad ster bar byed//rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis
191a1(rgyud): rtsa yi dbusu 'dzin par byed//gang de skyo ba nyams myong bar/gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags//de nyid gsang ba yi ni mchog/bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas//phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim
191a2(rgyud): pa yis//bla ma bzang po'i zhal nas shes//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
191a3(rgyud): ste brgyad pa'o///de nas gzhan yang rngo mo pa'i don//de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon//sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang //de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod//rdo rje'i rtse mor sems
191a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa//de ni srung pa zhes ni grags//dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la//'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa//de ni sdom pa srung ba dang //dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin//
191a5(rgyud): gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo rgyu can//rmongs dang sems khros g.yo can dang //dad med rtog pa lhan cig/rtag kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang //nyan thos nor la brkam chags can//de la
191a6(rgyud): na nyid sun 'byin cing //don dam pa ni mi shes pa//med par lha dang tshul khrims 'chal//gtam dang tshig ni rkyal pa dang //'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing //se gol gtogs pa tsam
191a7(rgyud): du yang //de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya//las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba//gal te byas pa'i skye bo dang /de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni//mi bya rnol 'byor nyams par 'gyur//skyed
191b1(rgyud): /na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang //pad snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang //brkam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang //dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya//snod dang cung taru
191b2(rgyud): gri gug dang //glegs bam dang ni bgrang phreng dang //dam tshi gi mod pa gzhan dag la//glang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o//dge slong sdom la gnas pa la//rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya
191b3(rgyud): ba dang /man ngagra rnams ni bstan mi bya//ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing //glang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu//ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod//bla ma lo yang smra min na//
191b4(rgyud): gzhan rnams la ni smras ci dgos//dbang po yul la spyod pa ni//grar nas de ni bsdams nas ni//steng nyid gnyis mod sgyu ma las//sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na//
191b5(rgyud): shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs//nyam su myong ba'i bde ba yis//bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis//dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog/bdag stong gzhan la smod pa
191b6(rgyud): dang /ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa//blo ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi/yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin//de lta bu sogs dam tshig ni//rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung/
191b7(rgyud): bya//gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur//rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can//bgrang phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang //rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang //glegs bam bsam
192a1(rgyud): gtan ras ris dang //thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma//thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir//bla ma la yang sba bar bya//sngags ni tshig du brjod mi bya//mchu 'gul byar yang mi
192a2(rgyud): mngon zhing //cung zad mgrin par brjod bye yis//sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas//gsang lus dngos grub mtshungs pa med//gang phyir de ni sdom par ba shad//snod min nor ni
192a3(rgyud): chen po dang //ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs//bla mas bla mod dngos grub phyir//'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya//bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang //nor ni chen po la chags
192a4(rgyud): shing //skyed ma subam min dag mchog/tshad du byung ba sgru byu gang //rnal 'byor shes pa tshe 'di la//de ni dmyal ba du 'bro 'gro/rnal 'byur chen po rgyud dngu la rdo rje phred ba rlung na pa tsam
192a5(rgyud): pa las sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon//dam tshig don ni bla na med//bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang //de ni de yi //
192a6(rgyud): bshad bya//bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang //de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod//rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis//zhu nas ro cig slar yang ni//rdo rje lam nas steng song ste//gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o//
192a7(rgyud): dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis//de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang //'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang //bde ba nyam su myong ba gang //de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa//rtag tu spyod pa
192b1(rgyud): bza' ba'o//byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog/bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim//zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis//bza' ba bsdam gtan bzang po'o//spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas/
192b2(rgyud): ni/de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu//de la snying rje btung ba ni//byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che//snod mchog gsang ba'i pad+ma blugs//rte ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed//sems kyis bdud
192b3(rgyud): rtsi 'thung byed na//bdud rtsi lnga yi ro rdzas 'thung //de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang //glang po rta khyi ba lang mi/byang chub sems dang bcasI pa'i khrag/bsres nas skad cig ngo la bza'//de ni bdud rtsi//
192b4(rgyud): lnga zhes brjod//rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog bIs//stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod//rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'//stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro//dge' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni//
192b5(rgyud): lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni//rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'i//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas//rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni//zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por//rlung gi de
192b6(rgyud): nyi shes pas bza'//rnam rtog med pa'i glo 'phang gnas//phyag rgyu gsum dang yang drug sbyor//b+hag rgya chen por ba shud spyod du//rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'//srog dang
192b7(rgyud): rtsol ba'i go 'phang gnas//rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis//sgom dang sgom yin so ges 'khrul pa//srog chen po yi snod du ni//rnam rtog dri ba'i sa bon tshegs//phung po'i mu shing
193a1(rgyud): mamtshams sasamasamatha thasamamasa.ama.a mamam ma[।]sa kham 'a ma ma
193a2(rgyud): snod pa dang por//ye shes chen po me yis min//sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bu ral//bdud bzhi khro do chen po yi//stobs kyi rig pas sgrub bya po//sgrub pos legs par man+t+ra ma gun ga//
193a3(rgyud): nas//rtag tu rnal 'byor stong du bza'//rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi//thig le gsum ste bla na med//mi shig go 'bang snod du ni//zlos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro//stong nyid ye
193a4(rgyud): shes mtshungs med po//snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni//ye shes chen po'i mnyam gzhag nas//datung zhing rtag tu btung ba'i//phyag rgya'i dam tshig zhisu bshad//rdo rje pad+ma yang
193a5(rgyud): dag sbyor//de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang //de ni skal ldan snod la ni//rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba//sgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog/nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes//phyag
193a6(rgyud): rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya//de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs//gzhan ni gang du ngas ma bshad//rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs//rnal
193a7(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyud de bal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dam che ga don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//sgra tsam don ni//
193a8(rgyud): bshad par bya//gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni//'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang 'thob//chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad srugasu//sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni//chags med snang ba med pa dang /
193b1(rgyud): gnyisu med cing dri ma med//dpe bral g.yo ba med pa dang //bzhi med bla gab med pa dang //g+ha yI dbang phyug ye shes mchog/'byung dang rngub pa rnam par
193b2(rgyud): spangs//rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'//mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che//gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog/rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis//
193b3(rgyud): rgun chang ro yis myos pa ltar//mchog tu nang du song gyur nas//de bzhin rnam pa kun gyi gnas//sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten//rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas//de nas ston/
193b4(rgyud): pa bla med pa//rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa ni//bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen//sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba//gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis//de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur//
193b5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs//sngags kyi de nyid bla na med//mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang //ye shes chen po mchog chen po//snying po yi yang snying po mchog/yang dag
193b6(rgyud): bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams//gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med//lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog/sgra tsam du ni yang dag gnas//stong nyid/
193b7(rgyud): chen po'i dbus thim//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal//gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang //snang ba med cing kun rdzob med//gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis//sngags kyi de//
194a1(rgyud): spyo ba gastsal pa//pog ma med ci zhi ba dang //dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid ga//nga kyad snying rde ltar med pa//byang chub sems kyi dad panan//du br-im+b+ha mar spyong nyid smon//sbyang ba
194a2(rgyud): med pa'i bo 'bang zhing //rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba//rnam rtog med la mchog tu rten//stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med//byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni//yi ge hUM las/
194a3(rgyud): yang dag byung //rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che//de nyid gsum ni ro gcig don//A ba d+hU ti'i go 'phang gnas//slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis//'jug pa la sogs rnam par
194a4(rgyud): spangs//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni//byang chub sems ni dri ma med//sna tshogs skad cig dbyer med pa//rjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs brob ba//rtag tu gnas pa'i rgyun gyis kyang //
194a5(rgyud): byung rngub sems ni 'bab pa ni//sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob//spyi med zhi ba'i thig le tsam//sngags kyi spyod pas spyad pas ni//ye shes mchog ni rang dag pa'o//rnal 'byor//
194a6(rgyud): che pi rgyud pa ye rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sgra tsam don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste ban+d+ha gartog pa'o//de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog//don dam pani
194a7(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon//rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na//myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur//rlung gi thig le la shes che//phra zhing de gnyis go yang gsal//dngos grub du na/
194b1(rgyud): byed nyams dga' ba//gnyis med rnal 'byor mi zad pa//skyo med kun 'gro zhi ba dang //lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang //ma bam stong pa bsam mi khyab//dza
194b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//skom dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor gyis//thig le rang gi ngo bo shes//chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas//sngags kyi de nyid kyi no rgyu/
194b3(rgyud): bgo chags kun las rnam par grol//kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba//sna yi rtse mor de nyid mchog/'od zer thig le bsam par bya//srog dang rtsol ba yang dge sbyor//
194b4(rgyud): rtog pa rnams kyi grangs skyer ga/skal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni//rin chen lnga yi sbyor ba'i gzugs//'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam
194b5(rgyud): thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos//ngagi glangs kyi zlos mtshan nyid//yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhe na//sgom pa'i go 'phong mi bzad pa//dbugs kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang /
194b6(rgyud): rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang //gnas kyi dbye ba rtsa rnams kyi//dus kyi dbye ba rtogs pa dang //rlung rnams kyi ni bzlog pa dang //rtog pa dang bcas spangs pa ste//de ltar mdor
194b7(rgyud): bsdus rnams drug gis//'byung dang rngub pa zhesu brjod//thog mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams/nyi khri dang ni tshig stong dang //de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug/nyin dang mtshan mo
195a1(rgyud): nges pa ni//ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas//nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du//grangs kyi rjesu sbyor ba yis//grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag/dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas//de nas rjes zlos//
195a2(rgyud): par 'gyur//thun tshod so sor srog rnams dang //rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste//nyis skyong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni//yang dag par ni nges bzung med//yongasu gsal bar bcad nas ni//na/
195a3(rgyud): zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la//'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis//nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni//rdo rjes gnas ni rtsol ba yis//tha dad du ni rab tu brtag/rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis//'byung /
195a4(rgyud): dang rngub pa nges par ni//nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las//rtsa yi 'khor lo spyad par bya//de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas//nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las//de rjes gnas kyi sgrol ba'i sa//
195a5(rgyud): gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya//gnas ni so sor brtags pa yis//brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu//rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can//dngos
195a6(rgyud): po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag //brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu//'di ni yang dag rnal 'byor mchog/nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis//mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa//ji ltar gnas
195a7(rgyud): par rang ngo bo//rtog dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa//de rnams rnal 'byor logs nas ni//rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po//rtse yi 'khor la rnam par rgyu//de thob nos ni lod pa dang //kun
195b1(rgyud): nas nyon mongs rnal 'byor pas//nges pa la ni don dam pa//nyin thAg nyi shu rtsa bdun las//las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis//blo dang ldan pa log pa las//
195b2(rgyud): de nas dgag pa de dag kyang //yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni//srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam rtag rnams//kun nas rab tu spangs nas ni//rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu//rnal 'byor
195b3(rgyud): mchog ni bsgom par bya//gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi//nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la//rlung gi de kho na nyid rten//'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor dag pa ni//de la rtse gcig
195b4(rgyud): sems kyis ni//rtog med kho na nyid kyis//rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal//khang bzang byed pa bzhin du ni//thog mar sa ni yongasu sbyar
195b5(rgyud): de stengs bgegaso dang bral byas la//gnas ni ler ngar dag par bya//khang bzang skal ba nyams dga' ba//blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya//de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas mchog/
195b6(rgyud): rlung gi de nyid rnam par sgom//snga ma bzhin du mnyam gzhag nas//srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang //rnal 'byor mchog ye shes tshe//rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya//
195b7(rgyud): thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang /de nas sngags kyi de nyid gsal//de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga//de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin//phung po lnga yi
196a1(rgyud): /rA //de ni ye shes lnga dag pa//rlud lnga ru ni rgyu bar byed//mngon par byang chub rnam pA lnga'o//de nyid mtshan nyid go 'phang mchog/sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog/rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo ga//rlung
196a2(rgyud): thig le zhes na bshad//yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang //sna yi yungs kar de yang ni//rgyud gzhan rnamasu gsungs pa ni//sna rtse yungs kar de yang ni//srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag pa ste//
196a3(rgyud): srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa//'od la sangs rgyas rnamasu sgom//steng gi sna las ngas 'byung ba//g.yas drang g.yon dang gnyi ga yang //dral bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur//nang gi
196a4(rgyud): dus ni yin par bshad//lkog ma snying khA lta ba dang //gsang ba'i pad+ma ri 'gro 'ong ston//thun byed kyi ni dus dag tu//go rims ji bzhin gnas pas bstan//g.yas pa nas ni 'byung
196a5(rgyud): ba'i khams//me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid//pad+ma'i mgon po rgyu ba'o//g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams//rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes
196a6(rgyud): ga ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste/las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o//gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams//gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste//dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid//rin chen mgon
196a7(rgyud): po rgyu ba'o//dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams//dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni//chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o//lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung //bya ba kun la
196b1(rgyud): 'jug pa'o//'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste//'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur//rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can//rnal 'byor
196b2(rgyud): byis pa'i yul min zhing //rtog pa yi mi shes//dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa//rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa//de nyid kun gyi go 'phang gsal//rnal 'byor
196b3(rgyud): kun gyi don bsdus pa//rdo rje sems dpa'i blo 'phang gsal//thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//de nyid mchog ni shin tu phra//bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par 'gyur//
196b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis
196b5(rgyud): nyon//bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i tshig/rdor sems go 'bang mi byed pa//rang rig pas ni mchog mchog/kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa//bde ba chen po zhes 'di brjod//
196b6(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i dusu ni//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par spangs//zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bral//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag//
196b7(rgyud): bdi chen zhes ni 'di la brjod//rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos//sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can//lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun//stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal//rang bzhin
197a1(rgyud): med cing rton pa med//gnyis med dngos po rnam bral zhing //cha med chan rnam par spangs//rtag tu rtog pa kun las blol//'gro ba med cing zhi ba dang //zag med bde ba thams cad
197a2(rgyud): gsal//nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba//bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa//stong pa stong pa chen po dang //shin tu spyod pa mchog mchog/stong pa gzhan stong bI gnas//na mkha'
197a3(rgyud): lnga yi ngo bo nyid//mi chod mi 'gyur ngo bo nyid//mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs//sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog/rang bzhin rdo rje zhes ni brjod//snying rje rnal 'byor yang //
197a4(rgyud): dge 'das//mchog tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di//de nyid gsum po ro gcig pa//brjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs//bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor lor gnas//dbang po rnams kyi spyod
197a5(rgyud): yul min//mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis//zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyis thob//rnal 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang bsal//stong
197a6(rgyud): nyid lnga yis kun nas grang //cha bzhi yi ni rnam bkag pa//rdo rje rtse mor 'dzin pa ni//sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbang //na mkha' lnga yi cha yisra gang //'di na rdo rje
197a7(rgyud): sems dpar brjod//de nyid bad chen go 'phang ste//bzhi pa dga' ba kun la khyab//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes//mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs//de yi ngo bo de nyid de//rang
197b1(rgyud): nyid tshor ba rig pa'o//pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min//dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang //rang gi zla la yang dag gnas//rang rig pa zhes bshad
197b2(rgyud): pa'o//gzhon nu mu yi rab dga' bzhin//mchog tu gsal por nyam su myong //de nyid mchos dang pha rol 'gro/mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs//rtog pa gsal ba'i
197b3(rgyud): go 'phang ni//de ni mchog dang bde ba che//de nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcog/dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni grol
197b4(rgyud): bar rtogs//gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blo ni zhi ba'i bdag nyid can//gsungs pa'i nyon mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun rtog dang ni bral ba
197b5(rgyud): zheso//shes dang shes bya'i rnartog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang //mthar gyur kun khyab zhi pa mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde lo stsol//dus ni
197b6(rgyud): dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod//bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba//'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtogs spangs shing //mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs//mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por
197b7(rgyud): phyis//mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid cani//gzung ba rnams yul rnams kyi zhes//kun nas gzugs la sogs pa las//'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams//mig
198a1(rgyud): la sangs pa'i rang bzhin gyis//bad dang dral zhing mchog tu phra//ye shes dang bya kun gyi bdag/sdupA bsngal kun las rnam par rgol//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/
198a2(rgyud): bde ba sems na zhi ba nyid//sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des//de las rnam grol 'dzegs pa med//mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po//stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/'khor ba
198a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing //thugs rje zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir//mya ngan 'das pa'i bde mi gnas//nyan thos ye shos zhi ba nyid//gnyis med mchog dang bse ru'o//de dag bde ba stobs
198a4(rgyud): bo yi/de dang bral ba'i bde chen po//dgang phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus//nyan thos ye shes zhes brjod do//de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni//rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang /de ni
198a5(rgyud): banyis med ye shes zhi//'dre ba yis ni bye brag byas//dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che//byang chub sems kyang 'dzin par byed//rtsa rnams kun la bde ba ni//'dri ba chen po ga
198a6(rgyud): traphang gnas//de yi 'dag nyid de nyid ni//bde bo chen po zhes ni brjod//rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni//rtog pa rnam rtog bdag nyid min//bskrun nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min//
198a7(rgyud): bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs pas min//bya ba ma yin phreng bas min//sgyed po'i rim pa bsgoms pas man//cung zad zhi ba'i dbang bskur gyis//bla ma dam pa'o zhal nas 'tsha
198b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni//mchog ye shes bde ba che//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las bde ba chen po'i tshig
198b2(rgyud): rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bai shA kyi nyon//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor//gang gis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur//tshe'ang
198b3(rgyud): nyid la rnal 'byor pa//mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod//de ni rlung du yang dag glags//yi ge a ni phye ba yis//rnal 'byor shes pas rtag mchog stsol//de rten snying kha'i
198b4(rgyud): pAd+ma yis//'drub ma brgyud kyis rnam par brgyan//chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang //thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa//rnam shes brgya
198b5(rgyud): ni kun rdzobo//mig la sogs pa yang dag rten//'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod//de dag 'joms pa rlung rdo rje//bgegs mthar byed pa zhes ni brjod//rnam shes rnams dang grang //
198b6(rgyud): de la//'jig rten skyong ba rnamasu brjod//'jig rten gsum du kun nas khya'o//'jig rten pa yi lha rnams gnas//skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis//yul la sogs pa'i
198b7(rgyud): 'bras bu gnas//de la rlung 'i yang dag sbyor//dze n+do nas ni brjod//rdo rje snying rjes shes par bya//pad+ma yang ni stong pa nyid//de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam
199a1(rgyud): mtshanmas sasam thasamacathas ma.a ma pa ma a malan mas
199a2(rgyud): sbyo ga//rdorje nyi ma zhes ni gsungs//'od zer tshogs kyi bdag nyid can//de rnams kyi ni 'byed pa gang //de ni pad+ma zhes brjod//de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor
199a3(rgyud): /byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur//de chen 'khor lo pad+ma'o//de la 'di de mi sbyor po gang //sbyor ba mchog de rma du drung //bla ma'i grasung rI //slob mi bzung gis rdzas
199a4(rgyud): pa'i sted//pad+ma de yi gnas de la//de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tu gsal//zhi gnas pad+me zhes gsungs la//de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o//de gnyis gcig gyur rnal 'byor ni//sgom pa
199a5(rgyud): yis na de nyid mthong //rnal 'byor ma zhal pad+mar gnas//rdo rje 'dre chen bla na med//pad+ma slob ma bzang gi kha//man ngag ni don gyi snod//de gnyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid//yang
199a6(rgyud): dag de nyid don mthong byed//blo ldan rnam rtog brel ba yi//rdo rje ling gzhes ni bshad//rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis//b+ha ga pad+ma zhes ni brjod//dam tshika gis brlan rnal 'byor/
199a7(rgyud): yang de gnyis dngos gcog yang dge sbyor//gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed//stong phrag gnyis dang bdun khri yi//rtswa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod//byang chub sems ni 'bad pa'i rtse//pad+ma
199a8(rgyud): zhes ni yongasu grags//da ni kun tu sbyor ba des//dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi//rdo rje yi yang nyams dge'i stan//rang gi rdo rje 'chang pad+ma//de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba//sangs rgyas yo
199b1(rgyud): skyes pa 'bang gdul//dab smra mtshanan duH!//ng+ga skub ma snad pa 'ang //dganyis mchog tu yang dag rgyu //yang dag doganyis nr-id+b+ha//spyan bad+hAn
199b2(rgyud): su brjod//yi bre ba ni rdo rje nyid//thag la de nyid mi shigs pa//de nyid sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni//de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes//rdo rje pad snod sdom pa ni//rnal 'a ma yi mun pa
199b3(rgyud): dang dbye ma'i drin gyis yongasu shes/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/rdo rje pad+ma yang dag pa de sbyor ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu zhi pa'o//
199b4(rgyud): sdigs kyi de ts+tshed ye shes mchog/bshad kyis rdo rje cani nyon//sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa yis//gang gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams sas ni
199b5(rgyud): bzungs bzhi ni bzlas brjod bya//de yAMs myur du dngos grub 'gyur//rlung gi de nyid pa mthar phyin//rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phad+ma'i//phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don//mchogro de nyid ye
199b6(rgyud): sa ma/sngags kyi de nyid bstan pa yin//dmyigs med pa'i po 'phang gos pa//rdo rje sems do'adris pa'i rgyu//sngags ni yon tan kun gyis pas le/lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o//
199b7(rgyud): de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog/de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa//snying kha'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal//de nyid ye shes bla na med//zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni//'gyur te gzhan du
200a1(rgyud): ma yin//rna mchog thabs dang ni//rnal 'byor pas ni yongasu grabs//dmigs myed zhes ni gang gsungs pa//de ni don dam par ni brjod//sbrul sogs pa yi dbye ba yis//sngags na
200a2(rgyud): bzlos pa gnyisu med//'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum//sngags kyi don bsdus pa'o//bzlas pa'i dngos grub mtshungs pa med//yang dag mnyam par gzhag bzlas na//dngos gru'i mtshul
200a3(rgyud): pa med par 'gro/rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal//gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla//sngags don sngags de nyid dang ni//sngags kyi man ngag kha brgyud pa//sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal pa
200a4(rgyud): gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla//de nus rdo rje sems dpa' ni//kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la//rdo rje sems dpas yang nas yang //phyag byas nas ni yongasu zhus//sngags kyi mtshan nyid
200a5(rgyud): ji lta bu//bcom ldan 'das kyi mid dang don//rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba//sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni//sngags kyi sdom don ji lta bu//de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs/
200a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid//sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang //gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can//de kho na nyid bshad kyis rton//snying po snying po'i don bsdus pa/
200a7(rgyud): thog ma med cing zhi ba dang //dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso//stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa//sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni//nyon mongs med cing mi gsal ba//rang bzhin
200b1(rgyud): med pa'i mchog gi mchog/meng med rang bzhin med pa dang //rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog/klan+tis bya zad rnam par srungs//blang ba yang dga'atsha//
200b2(rgyud): dang byed//bskal bzang bde ba 'brel bar byed//rnams car shes shing tshe dang bral// N+DI mang ye shes rnama'i byor skyes//de nyid de don das yang //de nyid de bzhin nyid gzha byen//
200b3(rgyud): denyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i dngos//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid//khyab pa kun 'gro stong pa nyid//nyon mongs thoms da rab tu 'joms//dri med dri bra'i dgar ba dang /
200b4(rgyud): pa yi go'i 'phang mchog/dang po'i lha ste nyams dga' bzang //cha yaM tshogs rnams rgyas par byed//man+da ngag gnas kyi bye brag gis//'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya//rtse dang mgrin
200b5(rgyud): pa snying kha N+Dan//rtsol ba ji bzhin brjid pa yi//de bzhin du ni las bye ba//lci ba la sogs go rims bzhin//de bzhin dngos zlab ye shes dang //ji bzhin nyam su myong mtshan nyid//
200b6(rgyud): m+b+ha bu//rgyun gyi dbye bo ngas /ga pa nan sbyor nga bzhin//bras bu lta ba bzhin gnas//yang dag pasam gtan phyug rgyal rim//gzugs rdzog pa
200b7(rgyud): bram brgyad pas yang dag gnas//rab tu 'bad pas bslab par bya/gser dang do shal gos ring ni//rin chen sna tshogs yon tan mchog/bran dang las byang grangs med dang //
201a1(rgyud): tsidagus pa la sogs kyis//ji ltar bzhed pa stan pa lta/rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis//sngags kyi na ston blam na//dgongs pa yong su rtags pa byA//phyag byas dra rdzas sngags
201a2(rgyud): pa yis//yang dag gzungs nas 'bras bu'i don//mi yi rus pa'i smyug gu dang //sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba//yang na dur khrod thal ba ni//rab brdal dngos grub ster bar byed//
201a3(rgyud): thog mar dbang bskur blangs byas nas//mdun du dkyil 'khor la sogs bya//bges mthar byed la gtor ma ni//chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin//sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byeng
201a4(rgyud): pa'i//mtshungs po med pa'i sngags btu bya//dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri//dbyangs yig lnga pa yang dag ldan//sde chen tha ma'i mtha' cha ldan//sku yos bon du ni brjod//thog tshe'i
201a5(rgyud): yi ge nyis 'gyur la//uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang ldan//mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya//gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/uSh+ma ShA yi cha dang bcas//dbyangs yig drug par yang dag
201a6(rgyud): ldan//sde tshan mtha' yo mtha' chur bcas//thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gis la//sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gsum//'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed//rnal 'byor pa
201a7(rgyud): yi de nyid mchog/sngags btu ba ni bla na med//de nyid dngos grub thams cad byed//sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa//sngags kyi theg pa kun yin//rgyu dang mi rgyus nyid la//
201b1(rgyud): dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog/rnal 'byor ye shes blun med//rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni//ye shes blan med pa'i mchog/man ngag ji bzhin
201b2(rgyud): sngags zlos pa//dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis//de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro//tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes pas//ye shes chen po zhes bshad pa'i//sku gsung thugs kyi
201b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor che//rab gsal sngogs ni mtshungs pa med//'dod pa kun lo longs spyod de//gang zhig sngags ni mgul pa ru//rtag 'chang de kho na nyid shes//rtog pa kun
201b4(rgyud): yang 'grub par byed//dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang //dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang //blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
201b5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//grangs kyi rim
201b6(rgyud): pa bla na med//ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi//rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du//gang gis thob pa skal pa bzang //srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas//gang gis yang
201b7(rgyud): dag yongasu shes//rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed//rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa//'jig rten gsum du rnam par 'khor//doms 'thob pa de yang ni//bla ma rnam
202a1(rgyud): mamanmas samasama.am thasamasa.am ammam mas pa khan yam
202a2(rgyud): 'byor de shes brgyad//rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu//lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya//sprin gyi dpal las gsal ba gang //mdor bsdus nas
202a3(rgyud): ni dus ni drug/lo tshig su ni yongasu grags//sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te//dus de nyin zhag drug cu'o//nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la//nyin zhag gcig ces yongasu grags//nyen
202a4(rgyud): mtshan tshu tshod drug cu ste//de bzhin dbyu gu rtsa sho'o//'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la//tsa shra zhes ni yongasu grags//skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs//de nyid se gol gtogs pI
202a5(rgyud): tshad/thang gcig gsum la skad cig/de la yungs kar bskor ba tsam//dbugs gsum la ni thang cigo/thang cig de ni yud tsa mo//thang cig gsum la mig btsums te//ngo yang
202a6(rgyud): mig ni mdzums pa yi//tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te//tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o//bde ba 'tshar ba de gsum tsam//de ni thig le 'pho ba'o//sngangs pa gsum la bde bar
202a7(rgyud): gnas//de ni rab 'gyed 'jigs pa brjod//dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad//dus ni pra ba skad cig bdag/'das pa dang ni de ltar dang //ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid//'das pa'i
202a8(rgyud): skad cig gsum du gsungs//da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum//ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad//de las slar yang skad cig gsum//de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha//de las cha
202b1(rgyud): /gsum de las cha//du skyid grangs nide snyed du//rnyog pa skyeng bag sgra med//nal 'byor mchog ni zlob par 'gyur//srog gnas ni thun med//phyugs drung
202b2(rgyud): dus kyi rtog pa sprul//rigs pa'i mtshan ny-id sbyangs pa dang //de yi skrag ni shar nas b+h+ra ma//gnyis mad de ni bsdus pa'o//gzhan yang ba sh+thad par bya mas nyon//sgrog na tho ma
202b3(rgyud): dang 'char ba ste//gang tshe skad cig la sogs rtogs//kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba//de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas//stsol ba'o gnas ni mi sheso//bshad sgro gas dpa'i dbus na
202b4(rgyud): gnas//ming ni ma skyes cha chen po//de yang rnam shes dang bral ba//ye shes lus ni bdag med pa//der ni skye ba mchog mchog/srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod//rnam par
202b5(rgyud): shes pa'i ngo bo ste no//thob mar 'byung ba bzhi po la//sgro 'dogs skyed pa'i ngo bor byed//de tshe rang gi gan su thim//rnam shes las ni skye ba rlung //de las me ni skye bar 'gyur//me
202b6(rgyud): las chu ni 'byung bar byed//de las so ni yang dag skye//de dag rnams las phung por 'byung //de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni//de las rnam shes rang bzhin med//brgya dang brgyad
202b7(rgyud): kyis lhag pa'i rimo//ji ltar skye bo de yi lhan sa//thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du//rgya gos po bskyed pa'i drung chen po//nyon mongs yi ni 'das nas ni//sngags thob nas ni rnam
203a1(rgyud): rgyas te//skye mchod rnams ni sdud par byed//de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung //rgyags pa bskyed pa za ba'i phyir//phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid//rim gyi lus chen sgra sgrogs byed//de las
203a2(rgyud): rgyags pa'i tshe ni 'byung //rgyags pa'i chu ni sdud par byed//'byung ba rnams kyis bsdus nas kyang //go rims ji lta ba bzhin du//dri la rlung ni btang bzung 'byung //rgyags pa'i cha ni za
203a3(rgyud): bar byed//de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud//khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed//de las mi bzang btang bzung dang //rnam shes skad cig sgrib par byed//bsgribs nas de las rnam shes kyang //
203a4(rgyud): bems por spong nas brgyal bar 'gyur//skye mched cha ni sgrib par byed//dag pa'i ye shes mchog mchog/de las thim par gyur pa'i srog/rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan//
203a5(rgyud): de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad//srog ni thi mo zhing 'char ba dang //ji lta ba bzhin yongasu shes//bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung //rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya//rdo rje'i sku
203a6(rgyud): ni sgrub pa'i phyir//'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni//gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni//thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten//gang phyir sems can tshe thung pas//'chi med go 'phong sgrub mi
203a7(rgyud): nus//de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//'chi ba med par rab bsgrub bya//bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog/rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon//rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus//'chi
203b1(rgyud): ba med gnyis rigs par ni//ji ltar yang dag khyim pa lags//de nas bcom ldan rnga rjes gsungs//bya ba kun sgrub go 'phyang ni//'tsho ba med pa'i na
203b2(rgyud): che//yang dag de nyid rnam nges pa//sems can tshe ni thung ba yis//dngos grub 'grub pa gang yang med//de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams//tshe ring ba ni dge ba'o//de la thog myor
203b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog/blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid sgrub//lha ni rkan gyi dbus sbyar ba//byas nas de kho nyid tshim bzla//sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni//yang dag rnal 'byor/
203b4(rgyud): rjes dran bya//sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing //khA nI gsal bar dgag par bya//skad kyi gnas son zla ba ni//sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu//zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis/
203b5(rgyud): rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung //mtshan phyed kyi ni dus tshod mthar//ji srid thun gcig ma chad par//de srid rnal 'byor pas sdigs bzla//rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur//sde
203b6(rgyud): mtshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la//dbyangs btsos pa dang yang dag ldan//yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla//sgrub po po yi srog ni 'gugs//rdzas kyang rtog tu bsten par bya//
203b7(rgyud): de nyid lnga yi rims pas skye//bzlas pa rdzogs nas rtag tu ni//lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med//lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni//bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni//'char kar
204a1(rgyud): do nas do la yang //yoSh+NI rak+to bdo ba ni//blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchog/bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can//nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na//rdzas kyis tsho na 'phel blar byed//
204a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM//de nas lan bdun bzla bar bya//lag g.yas ba dan gyis mtshan la//snod bzang de la bka ba na su//yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyi ni//lon gas
204a3(rgyud): du ni dag par bya//de phyir bud med gzhonu ni//rtag tu 'khur ba bkang zhing btung //de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang //mar la bstegs pa'i 'bras dang ni//ma sha dang ni nyi dga'
204a4(rgyud): dang /dar yi 'o ma kha ra kar//til rnams cha mnyam byas nas ni//myos pa yis ni sprin bsreg bya//nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin//bla na med pa'i bza' ba'o//de ltar rigs
204a5(rgyud): pas chog shes nas//su la'ang sla bar mi bya'o//thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni//myur du dngos grub ster bar byed//zla ba drug tu'ang gang bsten pa//de ni rdo rje'i lusu 'gyur/
204a6(rgyud): bcud kyis len dang gser 'gyur sogs//tshe dgug pa ni bla na med//rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya//phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos//rgas pa med cing srin nad med//snyoms
204a7(rgyud): las med cing lkugs pa med//glo skams rlung mkhris nad sogs med//nang dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang //shu ba gaM yan pa 'brum phran med//mdze nad mtshan par
204b1(rgyud): rdol ba med//dud dang brad dkar dpal lus ldan//'dzam bu chu bo gser ltar 'bar//rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu bo mchog/de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed//de yimaju
204b2(rgyud): chen lha rnams te//rnal 'byor ma rnams sems dper byed//lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni/phyag bya ba dang mchod par 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon/
204b3(rgyud): par rtogs pa yis rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas bston pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o///de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni//grangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa te ni//'khor lor
204b4(rgyud): grangs kyi dbye ba yis//ji bzhin rmad du byung ba'i mchog/'khor lo drug pa rten bcu drug/lus la lha yi gzhal yas khang //rnal 'byor ji bzhin gnas ji bzhin//mdor bsdus
204b5(rgyud): nas ni bshad par bya//rlung gi 'khor l-i gInas pa'i rtsa//'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod//'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor bshad//rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char//de
204b6(rgyud): bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang //rtswa ni bcu drug yang dge brjod//chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtse//brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o//de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor lo yang //drug
204b7(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhir 'tshor bar bshad//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo cher//rtsa ni sum cu gnyi su bshad//de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yod//brgya dang sum cu gcig lhag par//rgya rnams
205a1(rgyud): ni yang dag bshad//gzhan dag tu nI rgyas par yang //rtswa n+ya bdun khri nyis spyong du//bAnas kyi dbye bras phye ba ni//nges par brjod pa 'dum sngar gsus//d+har ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du//
205a2(rgyud): bo las ni snying por gsungs//sgren mo'i dbus nas rlung 'khor lo//bye ba 'khyi lnga pa mI bzod/mi bzong brtan dang mtshan nyid can//rtsa thung drugi mtshan nyid//'dzin pa rtog mang gang //
205a3(rgyud): ni//rtsa gsum gru gsum me dkyil 'khor//mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad pa yin//dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang //drag po dang ni gsum yi na//yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs//shin//
205a4(rgyud): tu bzang dang bzang por 'gro/stobs chen dang ni mi bzang che//mdzes chen mdun du skyes pa che//rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i cha//rgyags pa'i chu dang rgyags smyo byed//rgyags dang rgyags
205a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyu 'thun dang //rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa chang //rtsub dang mkha' dang 'byung brlung dang //dbugs mi bde dang g.ya' mkha' 'gro//'dab chags yan lag khyA yi gdong //za phong
205a6(rgyud): mi bzed sgra sgrogs dang //dri ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang //dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni sbyin//chu ba mthong dang rgyun ltar sngo//yud tsam gtso bo yud mi skyes//rgyab du kha bltas dbyug

205b1(rgyud): rgyud//dul byed dud 'gro gzi brjod dang //dri med dul ba'i snyoms pa dang //chu 'phyang lho dang chu 'phyang chags//rkun 'phyang chun 'byung phyed spyang bu/

205b4(rgyud): pad+mar yang dag gnas//longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang //ce 'gro gsal dang skal ba dang //skom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong //bzang ster bzang dang bkres pa dang //bcud
205b5(rgyud): khyin ro ni sgyur ba dang //ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang no//khrung khyud longs spyod 'khor lor gnas//grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod//de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can//'dod na da ma dang
205b6(rgyud): srog lus//zla 'thung zla ster mdzad dang ni//'dod chags man sma ku shi dang //sha pi spo dang dag pa dang //mi dang me ro ne tse dang //gang la gnyis ro ldan pa dang //gis ring chu
205b7(rgyud): steng bdud rtsa dang //dung can dang ni dung rna dang //dug mig dang dugo sde//rgyags dbang rgyags pa brkam pa dang //rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags//snyems pa dang ni tshogs
206a1(rgyud): kyi rten//sum bcu rtsa gnyis zhes ni brjod//bde bya chen po'i 'khor lo tshe//mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed//pra dang reg bya mchog tu dra//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//rang nyid bde tshon
206a2(rgyud): rang bzhin dang //gzhan dag la yang ster bar byed//de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim//bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya//rtsi yi rim med nges par ni//phung po la sogs mi 'byung //phung po med
206a3(rgyud): na ye shes che//rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur//phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus//mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags//de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni//ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas//de
206a4(rgyud): byir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//rtsa yi 'khor lo shes par bya//ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing //myur du yang ni 'phel bar 'gro/de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa//sbyar ba 'di la the tshar
206a5(rgyud): med//de bzhin phung po shing bre bya/rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni//'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed//lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis//rtse rnams rang
206a6(rgyud): bzhin bsgom par bya//gnyis phrad pa las reg bya gnyis//gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na//de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar//de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus//'khor lo ming can ba
206a7(rgyud): rnams//rim gyis rim gyis bye bar 'gyur//'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las//byang chub sems ni bde ba che//sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob//ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni//'bab pa
206b1(rgyud): nyi ma zla ba'o//mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbu su yang //bung phyir srad bu'i rnam par gnas//rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni//de gnyis 'bras bu rnam pa danyid/
206b2(rgyud): g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang //da yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung //gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni//de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o//gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal//bde ba kun kyang
206b3(rgyud): lta bu'o//de gnyis khongasu chud pa'i me//yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas//sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni//brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul gyur na//pha yi mkha' la mtshungs par gan+da//
206b4(rgyud): dongo tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur//gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa//me dang nyi ma 'char bA na//de tshe lhag par chags pas non//chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur//rdo rje
206b5(rgyud): pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong //'jug pa pa yi khA yi rlung //de che sa bon du ni 'gyur//sa bon las ni sems can 'byung //de phyir rtswa las yang dag 'char//'bras bu ngo mtshar can skye//
206b6(rgyud): de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni//'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o//ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog/mchog tu bde ba rmad byung che//ye shes rnal 'byor thob pa yis//mchog tu
206b7(rgyud): bde ba bla na med//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng nga'i mngon par rtozlas pa las rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas tsho per bstan pa'i le'u ste ben bdun pa'o////de nas
207a1(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya bya/rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin//rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni//brgyud pa yi ni rigs kyis s+ho//dmyal bu rlon ma gsungs pa//dud paji bsam pa rnam spangs/
207a2(rgyud): pa//skye bo skal ba med don du//gang du'ang gsal par ma gsungs pa//rnyibasam lnga zhes bya ba'i rjes//seM ni myur du dngos grub don//snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis//rang byung ye shes rmad/
207a3(rgyud): byung ba//rnal 'byor lus kyi 'di chen po'i//'khor lo'i rtsa ni sum cu gnyis//byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab pa'i//rtswa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya//de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas//
207a4(rgyud): de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya//ka tsa Ta tu pa'i sde tshan//ya ra la wa Sha sha sa//de dag rim par shes par bya//skur yang de dag bsdus nas ni//sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro/de yang TI
207a5(rgyud): ye shes mchog/byang chub sems la thim nas 'gro/kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni//bde ba kun gyi bzhi yi mchog/shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs//thams cad bdag nyid//
207a6(rgyud): rtag tu bzhugs//de las 'khor lo gsub dbye bas//rtse ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las//sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni//gsum byed bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal//de ni stong du ras
207a7(rgyud): bye gnaso sor 'bros pa'i bdag nyid ca //stong phrag bdun nu ma gnyis kyis//rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya//rlung drung mkhris pa bdaka ni//khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis///
207b1(rgyud): phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni//'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni//nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas//phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid
207b2(rgyud): mchog/lha yi rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni//rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis//bla ma'o zhal las shes par bya//de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar//song nas phan tshun nos rton pa//slar yang
207b3(rgyud): bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro/bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas//rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis las//de yid 'khor lo sdom par 'gyur//'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa//brgyad brgyad du
207b4(rgyud): ni 'gyur bar gsal//rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mchog ces//rmad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis ni//yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas//rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob//phung po kham/
207b5(rgyud): dang don yul nyid//dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o//sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid//gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/lus kyi gzhal yas khong du yang //de nyid kyi ni na du
207b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa//de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang //gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams//khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi//de nyid mchog ni yang bzhugs//slar yang khro
207b7(rgyud): rgyal sras la//nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro//rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sog pa//lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni//de rnams kyi ni sa sogs 'gro/de dag de bzhin ga
208a1(rgyud): lnga la//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la//de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro/de kho na nyid bde gcigro pu//de lnga yang no po ma nas 'gro/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol//bde pa kun rten pa
208a2(rgyud): ye mchog/de yang nyams myong tsam lAs slar//de ni yi ge tsam la thim//yi ge tsam ni thig ler thim//thig le yang ni sgra la thim//sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o//'od gsal po/
208a3(rgyud): 'phang yang dag par//smre dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid//rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang //don dam pa dang bde ba che//gzung dang 'dzin pa lus grol ba/byang chub sems ni dri ma med//rdo rje
208a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i zhi ba che//gnyis med ye shes rmad du byung //dbang bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang //bzhi pa'i dga' ba go 'phang mchog/de la sogs ming bye brag gis//go 'phang mchog ni gsung
208a5(rgyud): ba yin//spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis//rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du//de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi//rim dron bla ma brgyud las shes//zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid can//rnal 'byor
208a6(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtag pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtse bsdus pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//sna tshogs
208a7(rgyud): la sogs skad cig bdag/yang dag gzung lugs mchin nyid ni//de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon//rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin//rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid dribral//skad
208b1(rgyud): cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs//rnam par phye nas slar bshad bya//rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod//de yi skad cig dbye bar bya//a lig gu dang /tsum+ba nA dang /
208b2(rgyud): tsu ma sha na dang //ku tsa gra ha dang /bu la tra tra ha na dang /da sha nr-i dang /de kha da na dang /do la dang /pu tsi tsi dang /kur pa la sogs pa'i ka rau na da /rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig/na li
208b3(rgyud): stong phrag bdun cu gnyis//lus ni bde ba rgyas pa na//mgrin pa dag tu gang phyin pa//rnam smin zhes bya skad cigo/lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni//rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid
208b4(rgyud): can//thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i//rnam pa med pa'i skad cigo//na li las byung shu kra 'das//rnam pa dang bral skad cig/ye shes bzhi dang stong pa bzhi//skad cig ma ni
208b5(rgyud): bzhi las rtogs//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i lo'u ste bcu dgu pa'o////
208b6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni//lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi//dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste//mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang //dga'
208b7(rgyud): bral zhes pa gsum pa dang //bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par bshad//sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang //mchog dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas//long spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang //
209a1(rgyud): lhan cig skyes dang da ba che//lugs bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs//rdo rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya skye//bde tshon 'khor lo spyi bo la//de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin//ljongs
209a2(rgyud): spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang //dgra bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas//sprul pa'i 'khor ldor lhan cig skyes//dga' ba nyam su myong bar byed//blta dang dgug dang de bzhin
