209a3(rgyud): brda'//kha la tsum pa byed pa yi//dga' ba nyamasu myong bar shes//rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog to//de bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang //rdo rje pad+mar
209a4(rgyud): bzhag nas ni//nyams myong sa ni skad cig mchog/rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid//de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes//rtsa yi dbus na rab gsal gnas//gtu mo yang ni rnam rtog 'dzeg//
209a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che//mchog cha ni zhu bar byed//bral dga'i gnasu myong ba na//rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid//de la ro gcig rang bzhi ni//rtsa ni gcig rgyun la rten//
209a6(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi//lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni//rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs//stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/chos kyi 'khor lo de las steng //rnal
209a7(rgyud): 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba//nyamasu myong ba mchog dga'o ste//rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid//ling spyod 'khor lo de las ni//steng du byed pa'i skad cig la//nyams myong bral ba'i
209b1(rgyud): dga' ba ni//rnam 'joms mtshan nyid skad ce'o//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che//de thob mtshan nyid skad cig ma//lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong gA
209b2(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang bral skad cigro/rtsa gsum kun gyi na mkha' che//rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzung //de las rab sad nyams myeng ba//mtshan nyid dang bral skrod cig
209b3(rgyud): rtsa gsum kun gyi na mkha' che//rnal 'byor mchogs yang dag gzugs//de la rab sad nyams myong ba//mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs pa//rnal 'byor chen pos nyam su
209b4(rgyud): myong //slar yang mtshan nyid med par 'gro/rab tu sad pa nyam su myong //stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do//bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa//gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas//
209b5(rgyud): de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba//gzhan du gsal bar ma gsung so//rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis//bla ma targyud pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon
209b6(rgyud): par rtogs pa las dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//thig le gsum ni bla na mod//gang gis shri
209b7(rgyud): btsam gyis ni//rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub 'gyur//rtsa rnams kun tu 'bab pa dang //byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa//rdo rje 'am ni pad+ma'i rtse//rlung ni bzung ba'i skad cig la//8/
210a1(rgyud): dbugs pa yi sbyor ba dang //krI gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis//rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed//bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog/snying kha'i pad+ma'i
210a2(rgyud): lte ba la//dbu su hUM ni bkod cinas ni//thad stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni//dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol//de kho na nyid lus skyob pa//phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral//steng dang 'og
210a3(rgyud): ni rnam par spongs//sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas//nga gi dra ba yongasu spangs//rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing //rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral//gnyis pa kun las rnam par
210a4(rgyud): grol//mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o//rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/kha dog lnga pa gsal ba che//sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//kun nas kyang ni bsgom par bya//yi ge oM ni sngags
210a5(rgyud): kyi mchog/rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya/snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga//zhi ba la sogs de bzhin sgrub//bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni//sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis//rtsa ni gsuM
210a6(rgyud): po 'di ni mchog/bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni//phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro/rdzas kyi thig le khong chud pa//thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung //sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog/thig la
210a7(rgyud): gnyis ni 'od dang rjes//slar yang rlung gi thig le yang //thag le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro//sngags dang rdzas kyi bdag nyid can//rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes//zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa//gsum/
210b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid//la la nA dang ra sa nA//a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'i ming //sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang //de nyid ni yongasu grags//steng dang 'og tu khyab pa nyid/
210b2(rgyud): so sor lu bu brgyud tshul du//rtswa rnams kun la khyab nas ni//yang dag man ngag rim pas gnas//de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra//shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs//dngos grub thad
210b3(rgyud): kyi ni gzhi//rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad byung che//gso sbyong gis min bzlas pas min//phreng bas ma yin 'gog pas min//blangs min dus min+da sbyin smig min//'byin byed 'gog byed/
210b4(rgyud): kyis ni min//ye shes chen po'i go 'phang zhi//rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs par byed//mngon par shes dang lnga dang ni//de bzhin ye shes lnga yi mchog/thig le gsum ni rnam sgom
210b5(rgyud): pa//zhi sogs bya ba yang dag ni//rnal 'byor mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur//stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni//ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems//dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs//
210b6(rgyud): gnas kyi grangs kyi dbye ba yis//bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa lngas/thig le gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u
210b7(rgyud): sde nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon//de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang mchog/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni//yi ge gsum
211a1(rgyud): mamamamamamatshams mamamapasamamasamams thamamacacamamamamama.am yam mam/malas mam ma sa mas ya mamasas yang thams ya mal sa yamasas
211a2(rgyud): nasgra gsung drugs//stong ba yadun shA byu //ni rnam spyod /rgyud na rgyobla/de ni rngo na ba na bshA //oMn+d+ra su y+YA rje maM//skyong bdu na yang dag bshad//ma~M go a dang yi ga u/
211a3(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba gsum//AHni chos 'khor pad+ma la//rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyi //d+hA med sgrub pa'i rlu chen po//srog kyi gsungs pa thams cad bsdus//cha med cha dang bral ba dang //dngos pa
211a4(rgyud): dngos mdo dbus ni gnas//thig le 'khor lo'i che la khyab//na mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog/sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas//sngags rnams thaMd rab sa dbyed//sngags rnams kun
211a5(rgyud): gyi phan byed cing //dge 'khor lo rab sad byed//dngosu lan gsum gyi ni bAni//'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed//zag med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas//byang chub sa boni bde ba che//ga
211a6(rgyud): med kham su yang dag bshad//'khor lo bzhi yi doni bsdus pa'i//u ni long spyad 'khor long gnas//maM dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi//mgrin pa'i mtha' nas spyi gtsug mthu'//khyab pa gaN+DI
211a7(rgyud): brjid kyi ni lus//gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes//gnas ris bcu bdun zidag nyid can//bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad//yi ge ma nI thig lo tsamAM//gdong chud mthu'
211a8(rgyud): sor bzhi tsam//dga' ba'i gtsug tor granas na gnas//zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni//rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po//mi phyed lus kyi go 'phang ni//'dod pa'i
211b1(rgyud): khams zhes bshad pa yin//bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o//de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi//rtsa gsum gyi ni gan su 'dus//yi ge oM gyi bder shes na//khams
211b2(rgyud): gsum rnam par sad par byed//rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs//spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu//rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni//sna yi bu ga nas ni byung //yang dgra nyi ma zla ba/
211b3(rgyud): gnyis//sbas pa nang nas rgyu bor byed//me ni 'bar ba rtse mo la//smin ma'i dbu su srog rlung //de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad//gtan la phab tAM de nyid gsum//zhi ba kham+ba/
211b4(rgyud): gsum la khyab pa//skye ba'i sa bo ni rgyas pa'o//yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM//ring por byas te dbye ba gsum//chos kyi dbyings
211b5(rgyud): kyi don bsdus pa//yi ge A ni sngar bshad zin//gnyis pa yang ni sreg rlung //stong nyid ye shes ming can te//srog dang rtsal ba gnyis rigs//yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o//kun go ni
211b6(rgyud): dang ni nyon mongs yid//gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid//ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni//gsung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog/aHni chos 'khor pad+ma las//mgrin par yi ge AHnyid 'gyur//
211b7(rgyud): srog nyid dang ni thur sal dang //yi ge ha yis kun nas ni//mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas bcings//A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod//ro 'bab pa yi khrung khrud ni//ro sbyar ba zhes bya bar
212a1(rgyud): gsungs//bkug nas rtag tu khyab par byed//gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o//ha drang de bzhin yi ge u//de ni yi ge ma dang gsum//rkang pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar//'khor lo bzhi yi don
212a2(rgyud): bsdus pa//ha ni thur sol ming can rlung //bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas//yi ge U ni khyab byed rlung //mgrin pa pad+ma'i dbus na gnas//yi ge ma ni srog rlung yin//dpral ba rlung gi
212a3(rgyud): 'khor lo la//de dag gcig gyur snying kha nas//thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod//mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag/gzugs med khams kyi ming cano//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//snying po gsuM
212a4(rgyud): du rab tu bshad//lag na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas//slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus//rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang //gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na//'di rnams dbus na bdag
212a5(rgyud): po gang //ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsungs//btso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che//bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa//gsang ba'i mchog pa gsungs pa yi//sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba//rgyud
212a6(rgyud): rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa//rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste//kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med//gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni//sgrib dang de bzhin
212a7(rgyud): 'phrog pa dang //rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni//lus kun la ni khyab par byed//sna yi bu bA las ni rgyu//lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed//'gro ba drug 'khor lo'i lam//gang gi stobs
212b1(rgyud): kyis khyad par byed//dasum pa rnal 'byor pa yas rtog so//rnam rtog med par rmad byung che//rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na//skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o//rlung na
212b2(rgyud): thams cad 'gog pa yang //yang dag rigs par nga yis bshad//sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus//rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyi su gsungs//drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis//steng dang 'og tu
212b3(rgyud): kha ltas nas//slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas//srog dang thur sel rgyu bar byed//de nyid rtob pa dang bcas pa//rlung gnyesu ni gsal bar gsungs//sku dang gsung gi snying po gnyis/
212b4(rgyud): la la nA dang ra sa nA//a ba d+hU tI mchog gnas//de gnyis dbus ma mchog mchog/rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung //rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab//rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni//las kun
212b5(rgyud): byed cing mkhas par 'gyur//rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni//brgya dang brgyad la gang rgyal ba//dus kun+d+ha ni 'phel bar rigs//rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa//skad cig gcig mngon
212b6(rgyud): rdzogs byang chub//de yis thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs//de ni gang tshe skad cig thob//de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs//de yang ji ltar thob par byed//de la rigs pa ru ni brjod//thog mar
212b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa chen po//blo bzang gis ni zhi gnas sgom//bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang //dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la//thams cad du ni kun rdzob pa//hUM
213a1(rgyud): bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med//mchog tu rgyun po 'chad par ni//zla ba bcig tu bzlas byas na//de rjes ska cig de la thob//gang phyir de ni bzlas byas na//d+hi kha'i pad+ma'i 'ang steng bltas 'gra
213a2(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i pad+ma las//kha sbyor bas ni de bas kyang //rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni//de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro//rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po//sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni//rnam
213a3(rgyud): rtog med pa'i bde ba ste//sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob//a ba d+hU ti'i rgyun la gnas//smon dbus rlung ni phye byas pa//de thob byas pa'i dga' ba ni//rgyun tu 'chang zhing mi zad pa//chags so
213a4(rgyud): bral zhing zhi ba dang //rang rig bde ba chen po'o//'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya//sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas//'dir dang rdul dang ba spu langs//rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang //
213a5(rgyud): gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong //kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang //gra lhags chad pa la sogs dang //'jog rten chos dang de bzhin gnas//rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni//gnod pa nyi /
213a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o////de nas blazhan yang bshad kyis nyon//
213a7(rgyud): de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan bya//bdag nyid sngags sogs byed pa yis//ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams//bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu//sangs rgyas kun gyi
213b1(rgyud): rang bzhin padag/sangs rgyas na sa cig pa/na mkhyen no 'gang rmugs pa byud// ba bugs pa byed//rigs ni lnga nam pa dang //don du
213b2(rgyud): po'i mtshan nyid//phra rags la sogs dbye pa yis//thogs bcas thogs med mtshan nyid dang //'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos//'di ni gzugs kyi phung por gsungs//der ni
213b3(rgyud): rnam snang ngo bo dang //thams cad spros par byed pa'i//bde dang sdug bsngal mchog tu zhi//gleng dang dro ba mchog mchog/gang gis shin tu rig pa ni//do na tsher ba'i phung po ba shu
213b4(rgyud): rin che ni 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan//de bzhin ga shegs pa'i spros bdag nyid//glang po bang du sbyang dang //rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag/pha dang ma dang pa yi spun//mdza' bo snani
213b5(rgyud): tshan sogs//gang gis yang dag shes pa ni//'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med//de ni spros pa kun nas gsal//'gro ba khyab par yongasu shes//
213b6(rgyud): dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu//gzhan yang lung du ma bstun myin//de yi 'du byed du ni bshad//don yod spro ba'i rang bzhin can//'khor ba dngos dang dngos med so///kun rtog 'byung
213b7(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid can//rnam shes nas ni rnam par shes//mi 'dod spro ba'i bdag nyid can//de ltar phung po yongs shes na//lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye//dzin dzi ka dang rAhA dz+dza
214a1(rgyud): ro lIkadang pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/drA d+h+r-ikaces bya ba'i sngags//ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes//spyan la songs pa bzhi po gang //de ni khams gsum yongasu brtag/sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas//
214a2(rgyud): sa yi khamasu yongasu brtag//gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod//de yi spyan du yongasu grags//zhu ba ci mchi khu ba sogs//rdzas kyi bye brag yang dgu bsten//chu yi khamasu rnam par/
214a3(rgyud): shes//mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can//dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang //gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad//me yi kham su shes par bya//gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can//'byung ba
214a4(rgyud): rngub pa rab tu 'phel//rlung rnams kyi ni tshogs kyi mchog/brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang //steng dang 'og tu byed pa dag/de ni rlung gi khamasu shes//sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can//de ltar/
214a5(rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi po yang //rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes//mo ha ra ti dwe Sha ra ti//rA ga ra taM badz+ra ra ti//de ltar rim pas sngags rnams ni//de dag mngon sum cho ga yis//gzubral
214a6(rgyud): sogs pa yul gyi tshogs//lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du//rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes//stong nyid gcig pu rgyu gcig pu//sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang //ring deng
214a7(rgyud): thung ba'i rnam pa yis//lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma//phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can//mkhar rnga sil snyan spugapha rol mo//de bzhin rnga snyan pi bang dang //bstod dang smad sogs sgra
214b1(rgyud): dag ni//sgra yo rdo rje ma zhes bya//gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/rnam par shes pa sad par byed//dri nga dang dri bzang dang //sbyar ba'i dri yi mchog rnams
214b2(rgyud): ni//dri yi rdo rje mar shes bya/gzung ba'i rnam shes cher dmar ba//ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni//lan tshwa sgyur lnga sogs dbye yis//rdo rje ro mar de shes bya//kun kyang gzung
214b3(rgyud): ba'i rnam pa'o//mig sogs dbang po la brten pa//rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni//rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du//byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shos//byang chub sems
214b4(rgyud): dpa'i bdag nyid che//mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs//gzugs la sogs po ci rigs par//rang gi ngo bo spro bor byed//sgra yI rnam pa thams cad nasA//bye brag so sro
214b5(rgyud): ci rigs par//sgra yi rnam par shes pa ni//phyag na rdo rjerarwa yang dag pa shAng+ga//dri yi bye brag la spyod pa//so sngor ji ltar rig po ni//sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni//na mkha'i snying
214b6(rgyud): bopor rnam par shes//ro yi bye brag la spyod pa//dbye ba so so'i blo rims bzhin//lce yi rnam shes marnyan nyid ni//'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes//reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa//
214b7(rgyud): drag so so'i go rims bzhi no//reg bya'o rnam shes mtshan nyid ni//sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shes//yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa//dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin//yid kyi rnam shos
215a1(rgyud): /zhes gsasu /nga ma dang lags rnan na no//sa tsun la yang dag sgyur//dbye bas pa ga ma sa//bag chugs sum gyu dran//rnams par du
215a2(rgyud): rnams seM sa mtshan nyid can//bde bkun rgyun na yi mchog/dngas ni smin gyi rang bzhin can//'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad//de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mi dag ma
215a3(rgyud): dag de nyid bla na med//mig sonas dbang po'i rnam shes ni//gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin//rje dang dpung pa bad+ma thal gang //sgra gnyis dang ni thams cad kyi/
215a4(rgyud): du mo mtshan nyid ni//khyab pa rnams songs shis//shin rjem thar byed shes mdzar byed//dud+ham par byed dkrugs mthar byed//dod pa'i rgyal po me ge ts+tshe //
215a5(rgyud): rjes gtsug 'kho ba spyod//de ltar de nams gnas // shes ga yod su gas+ho/ kau gyur nasani/ dag de'i
215a6(rgyud): nyid cen//gang gis de nyid cho ga bzhin//bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya//sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ye shes chen po legs rgyas pa//skye med zag med mi gsal dang /
215a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa med//gnyis meng 'jig sa bral zhi ba dang //bde bo chen po'i 'phang mchog/sbrul dang bcus dang mtha' mid dang //mdo med yong su dbye ba yis/
215b1(rgyud): dang hUM phaT swAhA'i mtha'//sbru lA zhes bya ba mngon par brjod//rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs//btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming cano//au la sogs pa
215b2(rgyud): zhabs med pa//mtha' med ces bya'i ming ca no//skr-i'i mtha' can oM med pa//mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin//thams cad yod la au med pa//mgo med ces ni bshad
215b3(rgyud): pa yin//de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni//sngags kyi de nyid bla na med//rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs na//'di yi rgya chen don shes bya//ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/gnyis pa cad
215b4(rgyud): rnam par spangs//dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor//dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus//dragi rnam rtog kun tu spangs//rna ba thams cad rnaM par spangs//bdag byin rlab pa'i rang bzhin
215b5(rgyud): tsAn//kun la khyab pa rmad du byung //rang rig pa yi rnal 'byor mchog/skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni//cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang //rnor byis pa mi shes shing //kun dz+nyA ba yongasu
215b6(rgyud): mi shes pa//don dam rang gi ngo bo ni//rdzogs pa'i rims pos dbye ba dang //sngags de nyid ni rab tu gsal//a ni de nyid mtha' thig ler//yang dag thim par rnam par sgom//thig le yang //
215b7(rgyud): ni a la thim//a ni mtha' yi ha tsa maM la'o//ha yang yi ge hUM la'o//yi ge U ni haM la'o//yi ge haM yang oM la thim//yi ge a ni thig le tsam//thig le yang ni sgra la thim//sgra yang
216a1(rgyud): skyom la rnam/AHma mtshananon mkha' la'o//ya 'du ga la bal ma//'od gsal sa 'byung gAs ba //kun rnam dag rgyas dpyas / mang du sa gas ma rnyog
216a2(rgyud): tusad cing rab tu 'char//dgi spring rnams dang breg//gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs//rlung po sngan gcig dog ni//b+h+ya bas+thA ni yad drug bstan//rnam shes brgyad
216a3(rgyud): dbyin pa//b+h+rU~M ya~M yul drug brdzus pa ni// brjes shes pa ban+d+ha bzlum pa//de ltar mtshan nyid kuni bsdus pa'i'o//kun nas ba'i rnal 'byor gyiste//nga gi spyi nags gnas srid blugs
216a4(rgyud): des na de la dang na/ kun la na du mas// da dang /N-i / dus la /da sa
216a5(rgyud): kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal dang //sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can//sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gAni//kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni//rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med//ye shes de nyid
216a6(rgyud): gsal ba ni//rtog pa med cing gnas pa med//ches dbyings 'pho ba zhes pra shad//bsrud drang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag/sgra yi rtse mo brgyad skyong 'dra//shin tu gsal zhing 'od gsal //
216a7(rgyud): lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis//bla ma brgyud pa las ni shis//de ltar de nyid gsum dam tshig/zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa skye//gsang po ya~M ni ye shes mchog/bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ma/
216b1(rgyud): cig mchog/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las de kho na nyid gsum gyi dmachog gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o///
216b2(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyan//sna rtse gsum gyi mtshan nyid ni//gsang bsgying kha gdong sna'i ming //gsum po rgyud las gsalnga ba ni//'khor lo ga sum gyi dbye ba yis//rnal
216b3(rgyud): 'byor pa yi sgom pa'i rim//shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i//sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed//rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis//rtsa yi la khor lo sang bar byed//bde ba chen po kun nas
216b4(rgyud): skyo//khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni//dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya//byang chub sems ni bde ba che//lhan skyes skad cig mtshan nyid ni//rdo rje rtse mor bzung bar bya//de nyid bde
216b5(rgyud): po chen po ste//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhi can//kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs//gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig lo//yang dag gzung ba'i bdag nyid can//chags chen sems ni
216b6(rgyud): gcig pa yis//rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya//pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la//rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char//de yi lte ba slar ni bshad//gsang bar bde ba thams cad
216b7(rgyud): ster//snying kha'i pad+ma mdab ma brgyad//de yang lto ba snar ni brjod//zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni sbom//gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems//yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu//rab ni/
217a1(rgyud): rtog pa kun spangs pa//rbad byung chen na yo gas man ga/rtag tu sdugs nond 'byung //nam rtog med pa'o 'do ba tsho//bdam gtan la sbyor bad pa'o mchog//man ngag thob sto da drug
217a2(rgyud): snang myur du dbang phyupa na//zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni//zla ba nyi ma ma dang gsum//lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab//gdong gi sta na zhes byar bshad//rlung rnams gnas kyi mtshan nyid
217a3(rgyud): dri la gnas de'i ye shes che//thig lA mr-i tA~M g+ha gis gnan yin//bsam gtan gti mug mchog la s+yai n+d+ha la//dngos po tha~Md rnam par sbyangs//ye shes yi bdag nyid bsngal//de khon
217a4(rgyud): nyid lnga brten mchog/de yi 'od zer thig la tsam//gdong gi sna ra yang dag brten//rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya//gti mug rgyal tsho las ni rgyal//de nyid dam tshig sems da
217a5(rgyud): yi/ming can du ni yang drag bshad//sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni//ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can//rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni//gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms pa//kun
217a6(rgyud): mkhyen rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni//sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na//sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing //rlung lnga steng du yang dag rgyu//kun rdzob lngar ni rgyu ba yi//sgo de las ni rnam par byung //
217a7(rgyud): g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang //dol bar rgyu dang rnam pa ba ni//g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams//me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te//kha dog dper ba bzang po 'di//'ang+ga
217b1(rgyud): mgon po rgyu ba'o//g.yon bA nas ni 'byung ba'i khams//rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa//ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste//dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid/
217b2(rgyud): rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o//dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams//dag pa'i shel ltar snang gA ni//'di ni chu yi dkyibra 'khor te//rdo rje mgoni po rgyu ba'o//khams gsum las ni yang dag
217b3(rgyud): byung //rten dang brten par bzung ba ni//rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te//'chi ba'i mthur ni 'byung bar 'gyur//dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni//minyam par gzhug pas rtag tu zlos//
217b4(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa yi grangs kyis ni//nyin mtshan rtag tu zos pa yin//de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni//kha dog lnga par rna bar sgom//gnyis med mchog rnal 'byor gyis//'od zer tshogs ni
217b5(rgyud): dri ma med//de yis zhi sogs bya ba ni//rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpar 'gro bar 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpar 'gro mgon la//de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus//thig
217b6(rgyud): khaM gsum gyi gzhung lugs ni//khyod zhabs bsnyen bskur gyis 'tshal na//'di la cung zad the tshom mchis//srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad//rjes dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung
217b7(rgyud): thig le gsum ni bsgoms pa ni//rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni//yang na rnal 'byor so sor sgom//de la the tshom kun gcod gtso//bcom ldan rdo rje sems depas gsungs//yun
218a1(rgyud): ring chags chen dbang song bas//smad pa gsum du skyob pa rnams//de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni//rdzas kyi thig ste gsungs pa yin//zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba//mo gang mi srun pa yi lus//de rnams
218a2(rgyud): myur du grol don du//sngags kyi thig ler gsungs pa yin//gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul//srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang //de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu//thob par ye shes rgyu
218a3(rgyud): mtsho no//rlung gi thig ler gsungs pa yin//yang dag de nyid spros pa ni//de ltar yang dag thig le gsum//bsam pa ji bzhon sbyor ji bzhin//tshe 'di nyid la grub don du//sgrib pa thams cad dag
218a4(rgyud): pa'i phyir//rtse gcig pa yi sems kyi ni//ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba//me tog 'bras bu chu yis rgyan//skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser//dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni//'bad
218a5(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgrub par bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sna'i rtse mo gsum gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas yang dag
218a6(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon//stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni//lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/thaMd bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//chos rnams thams cad snang bar byed//mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod//
218a7(rgyud): ye shes bde ba che//'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa//gang phyir atA d+hU tI ra zhugs//yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod//chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched//rtog pa thaM gcod par byed//rnam rtog
218b1(rgyud): rlung gi m+b+ha sa pa//doni stong pa nyid duHshad//natso po chen po mi baspyod pa'o// rnon khams ni dot+to//da~Mr ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'is//drag ma shos mong
218b2(rgyud): gzugs med drag po chen po yi//zhi ba'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/de la ye shes bde bo che//byang chub sems kyi sa gang nyid//de nyid badri chen go 'phang gnas//ye shes yang dag byed
218b3(rgyud): chub sems//de la sogs pa ming gi sgras//brjod bya gcig pu bde ba che//dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid//stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod//bde ba can zhes de la bshad//bde ba
218b4(rgyud): dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid//gang de bde bar gnas pa ni//de ni bde ba can zhes brjod//tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na//bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/byang chub sems ni tshe dpag
218b5(rgyud): med//de las byung ba'i skye ba'i 'od//de phyir 'od dpag med du shes//bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni//stong nyid ye shes
218b6(rgyud): zhes ni brjod//shes rab pad+ma la la nA//zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na//de yang stong phyir rnam par shes//gnyis pa rjod rnam par spangs//thabs kyi rdo rje rA sa nA//zla ba shu kr-i rab tu 'brab//
218b7(rgyud): de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu shes//stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa//zla ba nya dang de nyid yin//rnal 'byor ma yi zhal//
219a1(rgyud): lngas shos//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa lus stong pa nyid kyi tshig bshad pa'i lo'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//lus
219a2(rgyud): ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas//lus ni gang gis shes pa ni//lha rnams kun gyi pho brang mchog/long spyod chos dang sprul pa dang //'di ba chen po yi ni rten//'khor lo yang ni gang po shud pa//rim
219a3(rgyud): pa ji bzhin ma lus pa//de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs//thim dang long spyod bdag po ni//lha nyid mchog tu gnyi su med//yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten//ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir/
219a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i yang dgra rten//zhe sdang che dang gti mug che//phrag dog tshe dang chags dngos kyis//khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog/'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa//sa dang chu dang de
219a5(rgyud): bzhin me//rlung dang na ma khI dbye ba yis//gzug dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni//chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang //rna ba sna dang lce dang ni//lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni//
219a6(rgyud): kun bzhi nyon mongs can gyi yid//dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin//shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis//dad stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni//dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs/
219a7(rgyud): shes rab stobs ni bla na med//ji bzhin gnasu yang dag sheso//lus kyi lha ru gsal ba yin//sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis//sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang //sngags dgos pa yi rnal
219b1(rgyud): 'byor gyis//rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yob//lung gi rnam par nges byasla ba'i//yang dgra gnas kyi dbye ba dang //lha mau rtag tu rnal 'byor pas//bdag la byin
219b2(rgyud): brlabs go 'phang danas//'dod pa lnga la ying spyod cing //rab tu 'bad ti mchod pa byas//rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi//phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya//bdag la byin rlabs rim de nyid//
219b3(rgyud): gzhan du srid pa gsum na med//de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog/bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa//sngag dang phyag rgyu'i rim pa stsogs//phyi yau dngos po mi bsgreng ste//de nyid thob pa'i
219b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni//'bad pas byin gyis brlab par 'dod//bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan nyid//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
219b5(rgyud): pa las lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o////de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi//de rnams kyi ni maung bshad bya//'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis//rtsa yi
219b6(rgyud): rim pa'i grangs kyis ni//las dang rdo rje pad+ma dang //'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas//rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba yis//rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs//'dir ni rip+pa ni lnga par
219b7(rgyud): yang //de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog/tsher ba nyam su myong ba yi//thaMd la ni khyab par gnas//sprul pa rang gi rigs las skyes//lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs//mkhyen me gtum
220a1(rgyud): ma dpa' mo ma//las sgrol ba dang yid bcugs ma//'khrul 'khor ma dang 'dud ma dang //snying stongs yang dag sangs rgyas ma//ra bA dang ma dang yid 'ong ma/grub ma sprul 'tsho sgyu ma dang //gtur
220a2(rgyud): 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma//ge sar pad+ma dri med ma//rlung gi lu gu brgyud byed ma//bzang mo dang ni khra yi gdong//gnyid log ma dang mi 'phel ma//'phar ma sngo sangs dus mtshan ma//rtse 'jom
220a3(rgyud): ma dang skal bzang 'phel//na ga dza na byi gdong ma//chags ma dga' mo rnam sgeg ma//brtson 'grus dang 'phel dkar mo dang //bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma//dngos 'bebs shin tu
220a4(rgyud): dpa' mo dang //pad+ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang //sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza' mo dang //skyur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma//mi bzad che dang las skal bzang //me tog bzang mo gdug rmongs ma//steng
220a5(rgyud): gzigs zhal dang rtsi gsum mtshana?//mdze sa ma dang ni ldang bskyod ma//rtag bim ma dang gar ma dang //ri dgas mig dang chags dga' ma//sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa mo//dkar mo
220a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum pa mo//ro bla na dri med 'gro bsnun ma//ril ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs//rtag tu brgyad dang spel ba'i grangs//zhal gsum phyag drug dri ma med//rigs kyi phyag
220a7(rgyud): rgyang bye ba yis//mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag brgyad//de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas//g.yon pa 'gying bas ud pa la//g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang //de bzhin rab
220b1(rgyud): ni chos 'byung ni//bayon b+hi phyag gnyis lan+ti 'gyur//sems dpa'i spyil klung gis leg sku bzhugs//zhal ni ljang gu spyan gsum pa//don yang grub pa
220b2(rgyud): cod pan can//zhal rnams bzhed par sbom po dang //'di bya thaMd 'phel bar byed//rang gi mong gi dbye ba yis/yi ge bsum+ba dang rnam par spe la//sngags kyis kyang ni yang
220b3(rgyud): dag mchod//'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol mdzad//chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dbus/sgra 'di dag ni yang dgra bzhugs//rdo de dbyings dbang phyug lngam dang //rdo rje phyag rgya stobs
220b4(rgyud): chen mo//rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong //rdo rje chos ma rdo rje bzung //rdo rje rol mor shes par bya//chos kyi 'khor lor dgu bdag nyid//zhal gsum phyag drug rnam po dang //sem
220b5(rgyud): dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs//rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang //g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin//g.yon ni ral gri pad+ma dang //dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med//sku mdog
220b6(rgyud): sngon po spyan gsum pa//zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs//rang ming yi ge gsuM dang spe lo//sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod//longs spyod mdab ma bcu drug la/pad+ma'i dbus
220b7(rgyud): na lce rnams bzhugs//pad+ma'i sgrol ma par dkar mo//pad+ma ku mu da 'phel ma//pad+ma'i spyan dang bde gtsug pud//pad+ma'i phreng ba pad rgyas ma//pad gdan pad+ma'i dra ba ma//de bzhin//
221a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'od dang ni//pad+ma'i spyan dang pad bzang ma//pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pad skyes ma//pad+ma'i go sar pad+ma ra//de ltar 'di ni yang drug bshad//zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can//sems/
221a2(rgyud): dpe'i skyil krung gis logs bzhugs//g.yas ni pad+ma 'khor lo dang //rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad//g.yon ni ral gri dril bu dang //rin po rje yoM rnam par smrig/spyan gsum
221a3(rgyud): rnam par 'char ba dang //pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing //sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs//rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas//
221a4(rgyud): 'di rnams sngags ni bla na med//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che//pad 'drab sum cu rtsa gnyis la//rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs//rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can//'khyer lo'i shugs
221a5(rgyud): mya rdo rje ldan//rin chen sgrol ma pad+ma zhugs ma//sna tshogs las ma gti mug dga'o//zhe sdang rdo rje dga'i tshogs ma//rdo rje las chags gzugs rdo rje//sku yi rdo rje ro rdo rje//reg byu rje/
221a6(rgyud): chos dpyis ma//spyan 'dim dang tha~Md dbyas ma//sna yi snang ba ro dga' ma//sku yi rgyal mtshan yid dga' ma//khams bcas ma dang rgyu bab ma//gshin rje 'joms pa'i blo yin
221a7(rgyud): zab rnam par rgyas mi dang //pad+ma'i ral po gyen du brdzis//bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo//sbas pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma//shin tu bstan ma stobs chen ma/
221b1(rgyud): byung ma dang 'khor lo'i g+hatsug+h+ra/de ltar rtswa yi dbus nas shar//slar yang l+h+wa mu zhal gsum dang //phyag drug 'bye ba 'phel ba tsAn+da//zla da'i dkyil 'khor
221b2(rgyud): la yang bzhugs//dri med pad+ma dkar mo'i mdog/zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa//g.yas pa'i phyag nu bsnams bya ni//'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim//de bzhin g.yon te//
221b3(rgyud): phyag gsum la//pad+ma zhags pa rin po che//'char dang 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad//pad+ma dkar po 'dri ba'i 'od//spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang //rang gi ming dang yig gsum
221b4(rgyud): ming //'di dag sngags ni go rims bzhin//de nyid mchog ni rab tu gsal//sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni//de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/rtag
221b5(rgyud): tu gnyid log lus la gnas//'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten//mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes//rdo rje pad+ma'i bde bas myos//rdo rje sem dpa'i go 'phang mchog/mnyes nas
221b6(rgyud): slar yang gso bar byed//de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang //sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni//dgos med
221b7(rgyud): mchog tu cung zad ni//bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes//de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni//'bad pas dngos grub kyis mnyes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
222a1(rgyud): lca nga lo dAna'i l+h+wa mo na rom du rnam par blo'i hU~M zla na klu /de na brnyan yang shad byu//char dang ldan pa can no//na rnams kyis na ma
222a2(rgyud): byod mchog/dngos grub thams cad rte ni zhen //mdun gnas pa 'i sgral rnam sa las//'a la byed pas da myi 'gro/na ni rla chags na nywa pa/de 'i ba tus s+ho/
222a3(rgyud): yis de ni rab tu sad//de rnams rtsa la rim bzhin gnas//rab sad de yis sad byas nas//lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las//de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs//nub pa yang ni bshA
222a4(rgyud): par bya//yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med//yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas//bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad//rtsa rnams 'char bar myi 'gyur zhing //b+hi rnams yang dag pad par ni//
222a5(rgyud): deyi phyir ni mi 'gyur te//snying gi dbus na bde ba'i dngos//sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal bya'i 'od//gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang //de ni 'od zer bcu gnyis te//'od 'phel 'od zer ga/
222a6(rgyud): brjid ma//gsal ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma//mig la sogs pa la brten nas//phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o//mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo//gsal mdzes gsal 'od nyi ma gsal/
222a7(rgyud): phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o//drug po 'di dag 'og tu 'dod//lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba'ang //ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin//de yang yang dag nub pa ni//de yang mchog tu nu
222b1(rgyud): pa'o//'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa//go 'phang mchog tu 'dres par bya//rnal 'byor chen po legs par sado//sangs rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o//'di ni rnal 'byorang
222b2(rgyud): de nyid mchog/'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid//rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas//bla ma brgyad pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
222b3(rgyud): lnga 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//dga' ba bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni//gad gis yang dag shes pa yis//rdo rje sems
222b4(rgyud): dpa' go 'phang mchog/de ni rtse yi 'khor lo la//slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis//'khor lo bzhi yi yA dog sbyor//rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa//mtshams kyi rtse yi
222b5(rgyud): rim pa yang //rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten//bzhi dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab//de rnams dga' bu'i rim pa'o//chu khams khong du chud pa can//pad+ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis//de ni de
222b6(rgyud): yis khyab byas shing //bde ba chen po phan par byed//'khor lo so so'i dbye ba yis//cha bzhi pa yi yi ge ta//shin tu phra ba'i cha rtag tu//khyab pa brtan gyi tshul du gnas//rim pa
222b7(rgyud): bzhi yi dbye ba las//rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thob//'phro ba'i bdag nyid rmad byung ba'o//ro gcig pa yi go 'phang 'thob//rim gyis so sor nyams myong las//sna tshogs chu yi sbyor
223a1(rgyud): ba las//rims kyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du//sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus//dga' ba bzhi ni de la brjod//rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las//go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen
223a2(rgyud): po'i rgyud dpal rdo phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang yang dag nyon//rdo rje bstan pa'i lus kyis ni//rtag
223a3(rgyud): tu rtsa rnams kyi ni rgyan//de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya//stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni//rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba//byang chub sems ni 'bab par shes//bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel//rtag tu/
223a4(rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i rtse//stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni//khrag 'bab pa nI shes par bya//nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can//rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa//stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni//rlung rgyu bar ni/
223a5(rgyud): shes par bya//rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni//lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis//de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod//thim dang long spong bdag po nyid//grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjid//
223a6(rgyud): re re'ang 'khor lo stong stongango //thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor ba//gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las//gnas rnams kyi ni grangasu 'gyuraro//slar yang bsdus nA gro ba ni//gsum po brgyad brgyad
223a7(rgyud): dbye ba'ang ni//nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang //thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis//rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni//nang du 'gro bar shes par bya//g.yon pa byang chub zla ba 'bab//g.ya
223b1(rgyud): pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab//dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni//mAM sad byed par shes par bya//la lA nA dang ra sa nA//a ba d+hU tI zhes bya'i ming//de rnams spro ba'i sbyor ba yi
223b2(rgyud): re re'i rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad//gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'phro/tha myi dang longs spyod bdab po'i phyir//rim gyis grangs ni bdun cu gnyis//slar yang de spro sbyor ba
223b3(rgyud): yis/da re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yis//rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni//stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis//gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni//sbyor bar gcig pa nyid du 'gro/dang po las ni/
223b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas//phra ba de ni shes par dka'//bsam gyis mi khyab mchog tu ni//thig le nA da rni par spangs//bde ba kuci gzhi gsang ba//srog rten gyi mtshan nyid dang //rdo rje dbyi/
223b5(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug dang //dus kyi rtsa ni rnam par bshad//ro gcig go 'phang bdag nyid can//rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud las shes//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
223b6(rgyud): pa las rtswa'i 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//mtshams kyi rtse yi ngo bo nyid//rtsa rnams sdom pa
223b7(rgyud): 'char ba ni//gang gis shes na rtag tu ni//mchog tu dga' ba nyams myong ba//lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed//lha yi sngagasu yang dag sbyor//lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa//de
224a1(rgyud): da sa byung mad//dgasum gcog car bdag nyid stos//'dzag rten gsum su byabachod //yum dun la na yang dag /pan//po gros sems dnga'adun sems//gang sno ngam rnyog nga /
224a2(rgyud): dpa' bde//rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya//khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung ba//mchog rab mchog dang phra ba dang //rang byung ye shes mi zad pa//byang sems sum gnyis 'bag/
224a3(rgyud): mchog tu rgyas//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas//cha kun bdag nyid rtsa ba ni//de yi dbu su rtsa gsum ste//gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad//zla ba nyi ma me rgyu bo//'byung ba thams cad la ni/
224a4(rgyud): khyag/ji ltar shing rtsa cung zad cig/sa la brtan par gnas pa na//sdong bu yul ga 'dab phre'u//sogs pa yis ni kun nas khyab//de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas//phung po khams la so
224a5(rgyud): tshogs la//mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos//de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum//
224a6(rgyud): mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams kyis kyang //dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum//sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'du ni//gsum phye dam tshig mtshan nyid dang //stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni//rnam
224a7(rgyud): gsum de nyid mtshan nyid//rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni//rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid//rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni//gsum phye khams gsum bsdus pa'o//'dod khams gzung
224b1(rgyud): khams gzugs med khams//'jig rter gsum pa'i mtshan nyid//rtsa ba du su ma dang 'bras bu gcig/rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro//de ni sprul pa gsum du/
224b2(rgyud): gsal//sku gsung thubs kyi rang bzhin gyis//gang tshe de lnga rab sbyor ba//de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do//gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na//de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid//gang phyir srob ni rlung /
224b3(rgyud): bcom na//datshe'i che bo'i mtshan nyid yin//rtswa yi gtso bo'ang nyid rnams ni//gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya//rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las//rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes/
224b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sumya nu gcig pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis
224b5(rgyud): nyin//rlung skye ba yi mtshan nyid ni//dus kyi glags ni brtul ba na//ji ltar dngango su yang dag shes//bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid//rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan bathong //do ni sme
224b6(rgyud): par mi shes shing //rlud tsam gcig pus rmongs pa'o//kun gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni//bag chags nang du rnam par spyod//bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung //
224b7(rgyud): dang 'dres rim pa las//nang gi bag tshogs bgos pa yis//de rnams zla mchen du su ni//mngal gyi rtsa la 'jug pa na//rdo rje khu khrag zhu thig le//'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang /
225a1(rgyud): na gan las ni rnam shes s+ho//ji ltar chad ngas myos pa bzhin//kun gzhon ma shes pag chags las//rnam par shes pa'i rgyun na ste//na ngas can+da srog rlung ci //skad cig gcig la yang
225a2(rgyud): dag /thog mar 'pho ba'i dus ni//hA yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur//'pho bo gnyis pa'i dus mi/slar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni//skyong dang 'ogi dbye ba yis//srog rlung ni gnyis 'gro/blar sel
225a3(rgyud): rlung mi 'gro 'ong la//ru sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur//de nas 'pho ba gsum pa la//khrag dang khu ba zos pa na//zur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshigs//bskams nas gyen du rlung na 'byung //sted
225a4(rgyud): khaM bawAs+tha nas ni gnas//theg rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur//slarar+ya yang 'pho ba bzhi pa la//khrag dang khu ba bsgos pa ni//gyen tu rgyu ba'i rlung bkrug nas//'og tu khro ba ltas nas ni r+g+hA
225a5(rgyud): seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni//khyab byed rlu ni spro bar byed //de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la//khAg dang khu ba 'phel nas ni//mnyam gnas rlung ni 'drar nis ni//me yaM gzugs rang rim bzhin 'gro/
225a6(rgyud): mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab byed do//gang gis 'grel dang 'dur bar 'gyur//phung po lnga ni rdzogs pa na//de ltar gsungs pa de las slar //'pho ba drug pa'i dus tshod la//sa yi khams dang migs
225a7(rgyud): gnyis dang //khyib byed rlung gis klu rlung spro//rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed//de nas 'pho ba bdun pa la//chu yi khams dang sna drug dong //klu yi rlung gis rul sbal rlung //spos nas gnyis
225b1(rgyud): 'dapa'i byed//de nas 'dre rgyad pa y-i//me da m+b+ha yi Sh+mA' byud//du pa rlung gtsongasarmA m+b+ha//rlung sho rang non shos par byed//danas na rlu ts+li pA /d+hA/
225b2(rgyud): gi khams dang ran tshor//ngas pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos//rtswa smyon rtswa ni spro bor byed//de rjesa'i pho ba bcu pa la//sbyin rlung ki gtsu rtul s+ho// kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid du ni/
225b3(rgyud): dgu 'i drungs nA sbyin bya khams//brazhi thogs me ma can//da skye ma rgyas pa'i sgrubs//sbyin da ts+l-i par byed/sa kyim chog N+DI rib da //gcig tu na
225b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dzin//rab sa mchog ni rnam par la//'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas//sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa ban+da//de lta bu nyid bshad par gyi/'thob bcu ni sa cwa ste
225b5(rgyud): rim pa yis ni rnam par shes//ma ni shes rab pa rol phyin//b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjid//byim pa yong dag rdzogs sas rgyaste//thams cad mkhyen cing bdugadags//na
225b6(rgyud): ni bregs pa dang //b+ha na'i chos chos dmar po bsgos//de la dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar//skye bos la gcugs pa bya/mnan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dzad //de khyad bzang po
225b7(rgyud): ky-i mi gos chen pa lags par /nga byed kyi la grol dang sa/ ni rnam na dang //spyod byung shin ga par bya //ra ljini 'i shes /
226a1(rgyud): lnga myang byed//dngos pa thams cad rnam spangs la//rnal 'byor song ge bzhin du spyod//'di nyid mchog ni bas ba ste//glang du yang nim gsungs//rlung skyes pa yongs pa ni//bla ma brgyud pa las shes//
226a2(rgyud): bya//rnal 'byu chen po'i rgyud dpa la rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gis bskyed pa skyes du skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum nu gi ny+dzes pani//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya//
226a3(rgyud): rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni//gang gis yang dag shes pa yis//'chi ba'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni//phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud//skye ba'i rim ltar thim par 'gyur//rlung rnams yang dag
226a4(rgyud): skye ba ni//phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin//thog mar lo bcu pon nas ni//rgyugs pa'i myos pa'i rlung skyes nas//gzhu las rgyal po'i rlung zos te//rim gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhini//de rjes la
226a5(rgyud): bcu phyin pa ni//rgyags chu rlung gis yang dag skye//lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni za//rlung gi rim pa snga ma'i zhen//gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa ni//rgyags pa'i chu rlung skyes par 'gyur//rtsengs pa zhes
226a6(rgyud): bya'i rlung ni rba//de nas gzhon yang lo bcu phyin//praM los skyes pa'i rim pa yis//btang bzeng rlung ni chen po yis//ru s+pha pA R+YAd ni za bar byed//klu yi rlung dang btang brdang rlung //stobs dang
226a7(rgyud): brjid ma tshungs pa'i phyir//dus gzhan la bcur phyin pa na//gnod pa byed par mi nus te//stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir//gang gis gang la gnod pa ni//byed pa nyid du mi nuso//bcu pa
226b1(rgyud): gzhan du phyin pa'o//long ba btang bzung stobs chen thob//klu yi rlung ni rim gyis pa//de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na//khrag dang sha ni rnam par 'bal//rgyugs shing
226b2(rgyud): myos pa'i rim pa yis//bting bzung rlung ni za bar byed//de rjes po bcu lon pa na//myos chu rlung ni bkun nas ni//tshil dang khaM chu rnam par 'phel//de yis btang bzung klu za byed/de
226b3(rgyud): nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa//lo la btang bzung rlung skyongs skyes//myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed//me dang rlung ni 'phel bar byed//btang bzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas//long spyod chen po 'phel
226b4(rgyud): gyur nas//de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas//rlung gis lus rgyas lci bar 'gyur//chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa ni//khyab cing sgri ba byas rim pa las//de las lo bcu gzhan du phyin//chu shis
226b5(rgyud): 'bras bu bzhin du med//rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur//las kyi rnam smin mtha' yis ni//de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis//zla ba 'am ni nyin zhag gzhan//tshe ni nyung ngur byas nas ni//
226b6(rgyud): srog zad par ni shes par bya//mkha' 'gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni//shin tu rgyas par shes par bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi rim
226b7(rgyud): pas srog zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u sti sum cu gsum pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon//chen po'i chen po ye shes mchog/bsdu ba'i mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor mchog
227a1(rgyud): na sgru//dang sar+dz+dza /byu ma par ma tho su na dun ga tus stong dang mdus //du rgyu
227a2(rgyud): pa'i rnam rtag ni//de rjes da ni slar yang spyad//de ltang dang la byel ba banon//'ching 'thams cad drug byer byed/ hrI de nyid mngon sbyor byas//sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis//rnam
227a3(rgyud): mi/sbyin du chem med //mnga' 'ogro srung du'i rgyud las //rnal shA thi gas ni// rlol shes rgyas pa //
227a4(rgyud): bA Sh+tsa /rnal na pa'i da yul la ma sa 'i skyes na/dad pa nyid ma
227b1(rgyud): gang phyir mdud pa 'joms byed cing //badro ba skyo ba sbyor bar byed//de yis rnam rtog thams cad ni//skad cig gis ni gcod par byed//rnal 'byor rjesu rnal
227b2(rgyud): 'byor dang //shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//de yi dbye ba bco brgyad kyis//dang po sbyor ba bsgom par bya//bcu bdun rje su rnal 'byor sogs//de las dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni//
227b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga//de las kyang ni las rgyal mchog/rnal 'byor dbye ba bcu gnyis//de nyid dbye ba bzhi bcu dgu/bskyed pa'i rim pa sdus pa yis//mngon sum byed pa'i/
227b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor//de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog/rdzogs rims rnal 'byor yan lag ni//rnam par rtog pa 'joms byed pa//phra ba'i de nyid bla na med//tshe ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa//blo
227b5(rgyud): dang ldan pas sngon bzhin sgom//srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed//rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che//nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni//rnam rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed//
227b6(rgyud): don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa yis//dngos med ngo bo gcig pa dang //stong nyid brten pa mngon par zhe na//sgom pa nges par brtan par byed//sgrub pos yang dag sgom byas na//
227b7(rgyud): rdo rje bzlas rim bla na med//de yi rim bzhin ye shes mchog/tho ba 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtog pa las rnam
228a1(rgyud): pang rtog pa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//rnam rtog med pa'i rlung shashwar na//nga shos rdo rje sems dpa' yi/
228a2(rgyud): rang dngos go 'phang bzang po 'thog/rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po//gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs//dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/sgom dang sgom min go 'bang dral//rnal 'byor
228a3(rgyud): chen po'i ye shes che//gnas pa med cing dri me med//phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas//thig len da rnam par spangs//kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang //bdag byin pabarlabs pa'i mtshan nyid
228a4(rgyud): gcig/mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol//bag chags rnam rtog rnam par spangs//tshig dang mdud pa'i cha yi lam//sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs//stong nyid ye shes
228a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid//stegs dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha//rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs//bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor gyi//rgyud rnams la yang bklag mi bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po//
228a6(rgyud): bshad par bya ba dam tshig mchog/man ngag ji bzhin cho ga bzhin//thog ma nyid du bshad par rigs//de yi rim pa rjes 'gro shes//bla ma brgyad pa'i go 'phang mchog/rnal 'byor
228a7(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtog pa las rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs//rtsa rnams nub
228b1(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor ni//de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon//yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor//rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur//shar nas sngon bzhin song nas ni//
228b2(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim pa bla na med//rnam rtog skye ba de yi phyir//brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim//de la so skye dang rga dang na//'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur//yul rnams dngos
228b3(rgyud): po med pa yis//sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir//de nyid do la spyod pa'i phyir//dngos yul rnams dngos med phyir//dbang po rnams ni skye ba min//de las gnyis gnyis yang dag
228b4(rgyud): sbyor//dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid//de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te//'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rten//de rnams bsdus pa las no zhi//stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni//kun
228b5(rgyud): kyang rtsa'i 'khor lor 'gyur//de nyid kun chas nang du khyab//stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las//yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid//nges pa ru ni shes pa zhes//rigs pa'i rdo rjes rnam
228b6(rgyud): par 'joms//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas gzhan yang
228b7(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon//sbyor drug go 'phang mtshan nyid no//ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor//ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten//rnam pa drug po de las phyed//de bzhin brgyad brgyad de
229a1(rgyud): las lhagra/brgyad gnyis brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni//de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal//zla ba byed pa'i cha lta bu//stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas//phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min//chu yi zla
229a2(rgyud): ba lta bur snang //sgyu ma chen po 'gro ba'i ma//thams cad rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni//rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad//mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min//me yi 'khor lo sto
229a3(rgyud): nyid khyab//dbus ni thig le lta bu ni//mi 'gyur kun tu 'gro ba dang //rang byung kun la khyab pa dang //bde ba yang dag 'phel bar byed//dbyings dang gsal byed rnam par spangs//
229a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa//gcig tu byas na bskyed par byed//mi shigs nA da'i go 'phang can//rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs//sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang //tshangs pa la
229a5(rgyud): sogs pa mes dang //'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ba min//yi ge dang ni tshig ma yin//'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs//grangs bral zad med skye ba med//lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor
229a6(rgyud): gnas//chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa//sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba//chags bral chags pa ming ba dang //bya ba byed dang gnas med pa//dpe med gnas pa med pa dang //srog
229a7(rgyud): dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs//lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/de lta bu med rnyed par dka'//longs spyod 'khor lo mchog tu gnas//'ching ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog/mchog tu
229b1(rgyud): khong du chud gyur pa//rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs//rten cing 'brel 'byung rung bzhin gyis//chang pi ro yis myos pa bzhin//mchog ni dang po ma lus pa/
229b2(rgyud): dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas//thog ma tha ma lhag par gnas//mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med//mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs//zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod du med//rang bzhin/
229b3(rgyud): nyams myong rang ngo bo//bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas//bla ma brgyud pa las ni thob//de ltar ye shes bye brag che//rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug/steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor//
229b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o///de nas
229b5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom po ni//rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes//grangs kyi rnal 'byor bla na med//dus ni dus chod zhes ni bshad//bsam dang
229b6(rgyud): bsam bral rang dngos ni//dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang //rnam pa gnyis la yang dag gnas//sna yi bu ga las byung nas//phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char//nang du sdud par dus bzang
229b7(rgyud): gsungs//'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod//dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog/dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni//rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang //gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po//
230a1(rgyud): rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste//de ltar gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid//dbu' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang //lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste//dgra'u dang bral bu ngan dus so//dus kyi mtshan nyid
230a2(rgyud): de ltar bshad//'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus//dus bzang por ni yongasu glags//ldang ba yang ni dus ngan to//de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid//dus ni khams rnams thams cad de//ma
230a3(rgyud): par gcig go 'phang mchog/ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te//dus ni gcig ni brjod pa yin//dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba//bzhi pa'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni//brjod bya brjod
230a4(rgyud): byed las grol ba//dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin//chags dang chags bral nges grol ba//bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs//phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi gzhi//dus gcig zhes ni brjod
230a5(rgyud): po yin//mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med//grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spangs//de nyid dus su ngas bshad//bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje
230a6(rgyud): phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dus dang dus ched rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o///de nas gzhan yang ba shwad bya ba//gsang ba'i 'bras bu
230a7(rgyud): mchog nyon cig/gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro//phyag rgya chen po yang dge bston//gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad//rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes shing //bzhi pa'i dbang zhes
230b1(rgyud): bya ba'i mong//zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim pa rnams//mchog tu na da gas no//rnam d+hag rnams cad rnam par spangs//g+hu rkyen meng du sa d+ha
230b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa//rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslab pa//mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid//ye shes chen po'i ro 'bebs pa//de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan//rnam
230b3(rgyud): mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa//rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo//bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed//bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das//shes dang shes bya rnam par bral//skom dang
230b4(rgyud): bsgom bya rnam par spangs//sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong //kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangaso//dngosde po kun gyi go 'byung gsal//'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi//chags
230b5(rgyud): dang chags bral rnam par spangs//dam tshig chen po la gnas pa//grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos//dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud//de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu
230b6(rgyud): gsal//gzhan ni gang du'ang ma gsungs pa//rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog/rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon
230b7(rgyud): bar rtogs pa las gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang mchog/chos kyi
231a1(rgyud): dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams//chos kyi dbyings kyis de la brjod//kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang //kun 'gro rtag tu 'char ba dang //phung po lnga nyid 'byung ba lnga//yul dang skye mched
231a2(rgyud): rnam shes dang //de dag yang dag ldan chos kun+da//bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug skye//de dag dbus na gnas pa'i khams//khyad cing spyod yul ma yin pa//ji ltar ti l-i gyi til
231a3(rgyud): mer dang //ji ltar shwang la me bzhin du//de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la//khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no//nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med//chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi
231a4(rgyud): mchog/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis//khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no//stong nyid ye shes rnal 'byor gyis//rnal 'byor pa yis gsal bar mthong //chos dbyings b+ha ga
231a5(rgyud): zhes ni brjod//b+ha ga rin chen za mo tog/gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan//ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod//b+ha ga chos rnams su yang bshad//dbyings ni byang chub semasu
231a6(rgyud): gsungs//khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yis//rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar bshad//dbyings ni yang dge sbyor dngos kyis//chu zla bzhin du yang dag gnas//don dam gcig pu'i
231a7(rgyud): de nyid shes//lag mthil skyu ru bzhag pa bzhin//mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang //rang rig shin tu dri ba med//dngos dang dngos med zad nas ni//rtag tu de nyid mthong zhing
231b1(rgyud): rlung //chos kyi dbyings kyo ba 'phang gsal//de ltar shin tu rgyas par bshad//gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas//slod bral shes pa rmad du byung //
231b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen pa da pa la rdo rje byed ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las chos kyi dbyis don bshad pa'i len spyi bani bcu gcig pa'i///de nas bcom ldan rdo
231b3(rgyud): gsungs//rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/de yi don du bshad kyis nyon//ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya//rdo rje mi byed zhes na gsungs//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog
231b4(rgyud): rtsa lnga yi ni na mkhar rten//rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo//sa dang chu dang de bzhin mi//rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni//rtsa yi na mkha'i cha yi gzugs//bla ma brgyud las shes pa bya/
231b5(rgyud): oM re la la yaM swa bon//brjod pa rtsa ni lnga rnams te//'bad pa yis ni shes par bya//rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni//pad+ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa//thig lor ba shad pa 'gro
231b6(rgyud): ba med/dam tshig gnas ni shes pa dang //bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang //rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med//de ni rdo rjer yongasu grags//me long mnyam nyid ye shes
231b7(rgyud): dang //so sor rtog dang bya nan tan//rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhi no//de yi ngo bo yongasu shis//rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog/nam
232a1(rgyud): mkha' cher banas zhi ba dang //rtog pa med cing nyon mongs med//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi//bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i
232a2(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom lnga ni rdo rjes gsungs//rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdus pa//de tshe rigs ni rnam
232a3(rgyud): palnga//rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs//rnal 'byor spros pa dbye ba yis//rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go/rgyud du grags par dbye ba yi//mthar thug de ni yang dag gsungs//
232a4(rgyud): de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang //rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs//sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ni brjod//gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong //
232a5(rgyud): sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no//sems n+dan mos pa sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis//sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni//'gro ba'i bla mas grol ba'i
232a6(rgyud): phyir/gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni//sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo bo nyid//grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis//dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis//don dam rigs kyi dbye ba
232a7(rgyud): nyid brgyad gzhan rnams su gsungs pa yis//sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis//de ni bsngos na dbye bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i rim pa yis//stong phrag bdun na
232b1(rgyud): rtsa gnyis pa'o//de la stong phrag sum cu drug/lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis//rim pa'i dbye ba de las kyang //stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o//de d+hA
232b2(rgyud): brgya yis mchog tu gang //bdun cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi//sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa las//nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang //sum cu dang ni dgu yang ngo //de las lnga dang de phyir
232b3(rgyud): gsum//gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid do//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//gzhan yang gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro//de yang 'od gsal go 'phang la'o//rnam rtog med pa'i
232b4(rgyud): bde ba che//gnyis med ye shes dri ma med//chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rigs kyi dbye ba'i don
232b5(rgyud): bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'odas kyis gsungs//phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med//chos dang las dang dam tshig dang //
232b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mngon par brjod//las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis//kun nas rgyas btab lta bur gnas//gang yang 'di ni las gang gi/de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin 'gyur//chos rnams/
232b7(rgyud): rang bzhin med pa nyid//rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas//dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos//rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyas btab pa//stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa//sangs rgyas
233a1(rgyud): zhing ni rnam sbyong ba//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ni//yongs su dag pa'i mdzad pa yis//de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med//phyag rgya chen po zhes nI brjod//las kyi phyag rgya yongs
233a2(rgyud): shes na/de sngags pa las na thob par skye//bla mas shes rab dbang bskur na//ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos don//snying rje'i bsam pas gsol ba ni//
233a3(rgyud): de las nges par thob nas ni chos nyid sgo nas nges pa byed//de ltar de nyid de ye shes//de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid//dam tshig la zhe na mkhas pa dang //rlung gi de nyid pha rol son//dpal
233a4(rgyud): ldan 'dus pa'i don bslabs pa//ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang //mig yangs ma yi bu mo rnyed//gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par rgyan//ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la//phyag
233a5(rgyud): rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed//de nas de nyid thob pa na//phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do//de nyid bde chen go 'phang ni//kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs//stong nyid ye shes dri ma
233a6(rgyud): med//chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal//de nas gzhon yang bshad bya ba//phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med//rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye bas//phyag rgya drug tu yang dag bshad//
233a7(rgyud): yaM raM laM baM aM ho dang //lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las//mchod pa'i rim pa ro gcig po//rtog tu yang ni mchod par bya//gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan mo//sme sha can dang
233b1(rgyud): gar mkhan ma//ro bsregs mo dang bram ze mo//grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas//bdag nyid rol cing gnas par bya//khrus mkhan rin chen rigs las
233b2(rgyud): skyes//gdol pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes//de bzhin par mkhan las kyi rigs//ro sreg ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs//sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs/ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo//
233b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su brjod//'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur//bram ze mo ni ma yin te//khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod//gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes//sme sha can ni chung
233b4(rgyud): mar grags//ro bsregs mo ni mna' ma ste//sgyug mo gdol pa ma zhes bya//shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis//rnam rtog med pas brjod par bya//gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na//
233b5(rgyud): dngos grub kun la dus kun tu//sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni//sring mo dag tu yang dag bshang//lus ni bu mor shes par bya//srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal//mna' ma thur du
233b6(rgyud): sel ba'i rlung //dbu ma'i rlung ni sgyu gra mor brjod//ma ni rgyags pa'i rtse mo cha//sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog/sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa//spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas//bu ma
233b7(rgyud): khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa//de ni phyed phyang lhag par gnas//chung ma gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa//de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas//mna' ma mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa//mgrin pa'i gnasu lhag par
234a1(rgyud): zhonas//ma ni sa ru yaung dag bshad//chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod//mo ni bu mor shes par bya//rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags//mna' ma na mkha' ru ni bshang//sgyug mo na mkha'
234a2(rgyud): chen po'o//mngar bar gyur pas na mkha' ni//skyur ba sring mo ru ni brjod//kha ba rang gi bu mo dang //lan tshwa chung ma ro yongasu grags//ska ba sgyug mor shes par bya//tshwa ba mna' mar
234a3(rgyud): yongasu grags//de dag 'bad pas 'dod bya zhing //dngos grub 'dod pas bsten par bya//las kyi phyag rgya dbye ba 'di//de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog/dam tshig de dang rtog par
234a4(rgyud): 'jug/phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che//rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi//ye shes mchog ni bla na med//de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'bang gsal//rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yulo//rnal 'byor
234a5(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa wa phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad//phung sogs
234a6(rgyud): skye mched mtshan nyid ni//rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad//rdo rje 'dzin ni rnam shes dang //rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs//'khor ba las rgal 'du shes gsungs//
234a7(rgyud): shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang //de ltar phung por rab tu gsungs//sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad//de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'//me ni chags gsal dga' ba dang //de
234b1(rgyud): bzhin rlung ni rdo rje dka'//na mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang //smr-i ni sgra yi rdo rje ste//dI nI dri yi rdo rje dang //ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad//
234b2(rgyud): reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur//chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma//mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang //rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang //sna ni na mkha'i snying po dang //lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang /
234b3(rgyud): lus ni slob pa rnam sel brjod//yid ni kun tu bzang po dang //rtsa nI byams pa ru ni brjod//ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid//khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad//de bzhin lus kyi
234b4(rgyud): chos rnams ni//khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad//de ltar lus kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs//phung po la sogs skye mched sogs//rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni//bla ma
234b5(rgyud): brgyud pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshon nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o///
234b6(rgyud): denas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid//rnal 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi//ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa//bde ba chen po'i skal ba che//ro mchog
234b7(rgyud): chen po'i bdag nyid can//sgyu mchen mo mchog tu phra//chen po'i chen po na mkha' che//phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes//rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang sten//mi phyed do/
235a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas//rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che//na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med//rang bzhin med cing gzhi dang bral//gnyis med bdag med brjod du med//rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa//
235a2(rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched cha'i//kun rtog tshas ni yongasu spangs//skam dang bsgom bya sgom 'jug dang //rim pa gnyis ni rnam par spangs//rnam sh+ma yis dang bral po//sngags dang bzlas
235a3(rgyud): brjod bsnyen pa sbyangs//dngos po kun gyis gnas las rgal//ye shes chen po rab gsol pa//dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya//phyag rgya chen po bla na med//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
235a4(rgyud): rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//nyams kyi mtshan nyid
235a5(rgyud): dbye ba ni//gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa//rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par//gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che//de nyid rnal 'byor kun las bsgyings//ldang dang rdul dang ba spu langs//
235a6(rgyud): dbyangs 'byur ba dang ldibs pa dang //mdog 'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang //snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams//dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi tshe//rgyags pa'i tshe yi rtse dga' na/
235a7(rgyud): khang skyong 'dar bar bskyed par byed//rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sad na//rab tu rdul byed bskyed par byed//de bzhin rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa//khong stong ba spu ldang bar byed//de bzhin
235b1(rgyud): na sa ra yi rtsa//khong stod tshig ni ldib par byed//rus sbal chen po'i rtsa rgyus na//kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed//mgo bo chen po'i rtsa rgyus na//brgyal zhing sdug
235b2(rgyud): bsngal bcas par byed//'ur 'ur chen po'i rtsa bye na//ba spu langs pa bskyed par byed//dge' 'chen po'i rtsa rgyas na//khong stong mchi ma 'dzag par byed//myos pa chen po'i rtse bye na//
235b3(rgyud): srog rlung ni thim par byed//brgyal dang sems med bde ba che//de nas dran pa nyams par 'gyur//sgeg pa la sogs nyam su shes//sngar bshang rim pa sad par byed//dzaHhUM baM hoHde bzhin//
235b4(rgyud): du/a la le la la to sngags//rab tu bskul bas rgyas nas//nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes//de ltar de ni dbye rgyud pa'o//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par
235b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa las nyams kyi dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten//gang gis yang dag shes pa yis
235b6(rgyud): srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid ni//a haM 'khor lo'i 'ching ba dag/de ni yongs zad grol ba'o//e ni dngos po kun gyi mchog/lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas//rnam pa
235b7(rgyud): kun gyi mchog dang ldan//kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med//thogs med snying stobs zhes bya ba//thabs cig tu ni skye bar byed//srid dang srid rtse brtse ba med//sprul pa'i sku yi mchog/
236a1(rgyud): dang ni//don kun byed pa la mkhas pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o//hi ni dngos po dang bral ba//lus la gnas kyang lus bskyod min//dbang po las 'das mi bsal ba/rnam pa
236a2(rgyud): thams cad rnam par spangs//dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing //gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa//dngos po thams cad nub pa dang //chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid//sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbug/
236a3(rgyud): byung //don kun byed pa dang bral ba//stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das//ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid//rdzid dang brjod bya rnam par grol//de yang yi ge haM du grags//thaM a haM kun la khyig/
236a4(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs//A haM dngos po thams cad la//khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas//a haM dang bral skyes bu ni//rtsa ba bcad pa'i shing bzhino//hi ni dpral ba'i sku ma
236a5(rgyud): na//a ni lte bar yang dag gnas//'dir ni a las zla bar bshad//'od zer stong 'gyed pa ye haM//'dir yang a yi mang la brten//brte pa'i haM du rab tu grags//a ni srogi rlung du
236a6(rgyud): bshad//de bzhin thur sa la haM du brjod//de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste//des na a hi zhes par grags//rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni//oM hU~M gang du gnas pa med//gzhan 'ga'
236a7(rgyud): zhig 'di la yang //don daM par ni dmigasu med//de ltar a ti nga yis bshad//rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed par dka'//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phrang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
236b1(rgyud): las+ya A hA gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni//rnal 'byor/
236b2(rgyud): pa ni gang gis shes//stong nyid de na shes par 'gyur//mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir//stong nyid sgom par yongs su gsungs//nang go bdag nyid chos rnams ni//
236b3(rgyud): kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang //phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa//phyi nas stong pa nyid du 'dod//phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba//nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang //phyi rol du
236b4(rgyud): yang mi rtog pa//'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni//stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad//snod kyi 'jig rten dang bral ba//chen po stong pa nyid du brjod//ye shes gang gis de stong par/
236b5(rgyud): mthong ba de yang stong par brjod//me long ye shes rdzogs pa la//rjesu dmigs par byed phyir ro//de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa//dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid//don dam/
236b6(rgyud): bar ni brdzun pa'i dngos//shes pa don dam stong pa nyid//'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyi//dge ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir//rang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod//'dus
236b7(rgyud): byas stong pa nyid du bshad//yang dag byang chub 'dus ma byas//rgyu mtshan yang ni dmig su med//dngos dang dngos med rnam por spangs//'dus ma byas pa'i stong nyid gsu
237a1(rgyud): sorgyas can dun du spyan lam sogs//rang ga sngags pa dmagasmra pa med//shod tu byung ba rjod du ba shas//spyan rtag thams ca rnam da sa//mtha las sa skad da gyu
237a2(rgyud): zlog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyis//'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid//rlom sems med par de brjod de//dzig nA tha' med pa'i stong pa nyid//mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med/dge ba'i
237a3(rgyud): nyid mi stong pa//rlom sems med pa zhes byagado//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid//'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni//bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i//de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa rang bzhin ste/
237a4(rgyud): nyid du gsal//mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa//sku gzugs de yi ston ni//gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid//byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams
237a5(rgyud): nyi//spyod pa la yang rlom sems med//chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad//bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni//sgro gtags dngos po med pa'i mcho go//'ching ba thams cad
237a6(rgyud): rnam par gcod//dngos med stong pa nyid du gsungs//ji ltar sngon gsungs stong pa nyid//de ltar dngos po med shes pa//rlur yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni//dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dro//
237a7(rgyud): de ltar stong nyid dbye ba yang //bag chags rnams kyi gnyen de'i phyir//sgyu yi gnyen po mi mthun phyogs//bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i
237b1(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu//rnam/
237b2(rgyud): pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos//lus rnams la ni khyab pa dang //phung po lnga ni rang bzhin lus//'khor lo drug la khyab pa dang //chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir//ring ba ma yin
237b3(rgyud): nye ba min//da ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med//stong pa nyid ni don dam mo//rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad//srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid ni//sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa//skyon gsum po la phyag
237b4(rgyud): dradrug mchog/rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yos//g.yon pa dril bu pad+ma dang //ral gri shin tu rnon pa dang //phyar ba go rims bzhin du bsnams//a li ka li las byung ba//zla ba nyi ma'i
237b5(rgyud): gdan la bzhugs//sna tshogs pad+ma rgyas gdan la ni//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs//hUM gau sa bon rdzogs pa dang //rdo rje chen po'i rigs las byung //kun rtog rnams ni
237b6(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rlung //rnam par gcod cing thim par byed//gnod byed de dag sol bar byed//gnyis pa thams cad rnam par gcod//sgyu ma chen mo stong pa che//sangs rgyas sa ni rmad du byung //
237b7(rgyud): sa sra rgyas nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o//'di yi sngags ni brjod par bya//oM dang badz+ra mA le dang //de bzhin AHdang hUM dang ginyis//phaT dang swA hA yang dag ldan//sngags mchog btus//
238a1(rgyud): pathun mod//rlung 'brog de kho na nyid kyus//yid kyi rnam rtog stsol bar byed //zhi ba'i gnas dang rgya 'gram dang //shing gcig lam gyi bzhin dang //yang na sum do 'bum phrag brgya//
238a2(rgyud): gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya//de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//de yi skyon gsal bar 'byung //zhi ba la sogs 'dod mi dgos//skad cig
238a3(rgyud): la mngon par rtogs//de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes//dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga 'di//dpal mo gcig pu nyid sgrub pa//de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang //rnam rtog spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/
238a4(rgyud): shin tu rnam dag na mkha'i dngos//rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng bya'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid
238a5(rgyud): kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya//'byung po thams cad thim nas 'gro//mtshan ma'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur//zla ba mya ngan 'das
238a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid//kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi//shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya//kun rdzob shes byar shes par bya//don dam reg bya rnam par spangs//reg bya dang bral bde ba grang //bde ba mchog
238a7(rgyud): de thob bor dka'//nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad//thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang //gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma//rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur/'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur/nyim
238b1(rgyud): s+yAb+hU rgyusade sku gnyis mdang bor bsha//'bar bde phyir ni ny-i nar 'gyur//rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam+b+ha dang //chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang //me snang ba dang stong pa'i rdzas 'ang
238b2(rgyud): gsal ba yi go 'phang zhi//gang du yang dag mi gnas so//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshan mo nyin mi rgyas par bshad pa'o le'u ste
238b3(rgyud): lnga bcu gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//oM li ka li'i ngo ma tshig ni//rgyud rnams gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i//rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa
238b4(rgyud): yi//'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa'i//snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni//gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan//ka li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o//snang ba mched pa'i
238b5(rgyud): go 'phang ni//snang ba las byung zad pa med//dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa//a li'i dkyil 'khor brgyas pa'o//de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba las//dbusu skyes pa'i bde ba/
238b6(rgyud): a li kA li'i dam tshig ces//dgongs pa'i chog gis bye brag byas//shin tu phra ba'i ye shes mchog/bla ma brgyud las shes par bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo
238b7(rgyud): phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las A li ka li rgyas par bshad po'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//mtshams kyi mtshan nyid
239a1(rgyud): bla na med//snang dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams//shes rab rdo rje las byung ba//gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas//'bags shing gos pa rnam par spangs//rdo rje pad+ma 'tsho mod
239a2(rgyud): skyes//zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres//mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro gang //mtshams med 'khor ba dag par byed//rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam mi khyab
239a3(rgyud): sems can kun gyi mtshams kyi ni//rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang //'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad//dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs//mdud pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu
239a4(rgyud): zhi//tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam//mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba//gang phyir steng gri go 'phang gnas//la la thig le'i ring ngo bor//rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas//lnga lar thog ma
