239a5(rgyud): la sogs spangs//la lar dri yang dmigs su med//gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can//de phyir brjod du med pa'o//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
239a6(rgyud): pa las mtshams kyi 'char pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//rnam po nyi shu'i ming tsam ni//slob dpon las su
239a7(rgyud): yongasu bshad//sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa//sngon du snyen pa sa sbyang dang //'byung po bskrad pa nyid dang ni//sa bzung nyid dang thig skud ni//spyan dang lhag par gnas pa
239b1(rgyud): dang //bgegs bskrad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi//thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang //phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang //dum pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
239b2(rgyud): kyi lhag gnas dang //khrus dang rab tu sbyangs pa dang //mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang //slob ma lcug par gnas pa dang //me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin//dbang bskur ba
239b3(rgyud): dang gshegs su gsol//de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las//gang gis de shes 'gro ba'i za//dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya//bdud las bsdogs mdzub de ni mchog/yi
239b4(rgyud): gsum bzlos pa la zhen//rdo rje theg pa lhag par grol//zhi ba la sogs las gang gis//rtag tu lag pa'i mthil la gnas//de yi yang dag cho ga yis//cho ga mchog
239b5(rgyud): nI bya ba yin//rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor sogs//cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya//bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags//yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi mchog/stong phrag bcu
239b6(rgyud): ni yongs su bzla//thog mar mkhas pa ji bzhin du//bgegs rnams thams cad gsal ba'i phyir//sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad//de 'og yi ge gsum khrar ni//bsam
239b7(rgyud): pa kun gyis bzlas byas na//yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster//slob ma rnams kyi dngos grub rgyur//skye bos dben pa'i phyir bcas//sa bzung chu ni nye bar bcas//grong dang /
240a1(rgyud): nya ning //ring por yang ni brnam mabya//shan tu 'jam zhing srog chags med//rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu ring //gang khyimachod dus las rgyung ring //yang na bde gshegs rten lan//
240a2(rgyud): thog mor ser mo rnams la nI//bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgong bya//khru gang sor ni bzhi pa yis//seng ldeng phur ba byas nAs ni//yi ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru//yi gI brgya pa lan
240a3(rgyud): bdun dang //yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis brko//sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa//yang na khyu ni byed dang gsum//yang ni sems kyis sbyangs par bya//de la gnas pa'i 'byung ba ni//yang dag
240a4(rgyud): 'brir ni 'jug par bya//oM ma hA k+Sho d+ha dza wA ga/hUM phaT mtha' dang yang dag ldan//de ltar log mthil sngags bkod la//'byung po rnams ni bskrad par bya//sa la thal mo lan gsum du//
240a5(rgyud): brdab pa byas nas sngags bzlas te//ud gar+b+ha daM lanA gnyis brjod//sarbe b+hU ta gr-i hA ud gAn+d+he//yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru brjod//badz+ra sa dra ba bshad de//lus ni thams cad par
240a6(rgyud): gsungs pa'i//gtir ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug/sa ni yongs su bzung rjes la//rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya//tsha mo med cing mags la//mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang //
240a7(rgyud): mi long lta bur 'jam pa dang //mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya//ba yi lci ba la sogs pa//rnam pa lnga yis byud par bya//byugs nas de rjes khrus byas /
240b1(rgyud): khro ba'i sku dang ni//dkyil 'khor 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis//mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni//'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis//ras sam yang na
240b2(rgyud): gso ma yis//yi ge gsum gyis rnam par sbyang //thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam//gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang //rdo rje can gyis khru gsum gsum//gru bzhi par ni bzung
240b3(rgyud): bar bya//de yi dbus su lte ba'i cha//sgrib pa'i skyon ni spang bar bya//sku gdung dang ni rin chen bzhugs//legs par bsangs nas byi ni gyis brlab//yi ge gsum yang swA hA'i
240b4(rgyud): /mtha'o//phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar//sngags 'di yang ni bzlas par bya//brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal//tshangs pa'i thig ni btab nas ni//yi gre brgya pa bzla bar bya//
240b5(rgyud): de rjes de la me tog char//sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya//oM dwang a mo g+ha pad+mo//de bzhin du ni phyi nas su//ba su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis//d+hA ra Ni maN+Da li hUM//yI gaM brgya
240b6(rgyud): pa'i sngags dang no//lan gsum bar du thig skud la//zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya//yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya//zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rdo rje can gyis mtshom
240b7(rgyud): bzhi pa//thog mar shwar dang byang dang ni//ji srid lho dang nub dag dang //mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang //slar yang yang dag gdab par bya//shar dang lho yi mtshams dang /
241a1(rgyud): ni/nub dang byung gi mtshams sun//thig spyod kyis ni tshad gzhal bya//zur ba ni dang ni thig skud bya//sgor thig gsum ni blo bzhi pa//rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes//rnangs pa
241a2(rgyud): gnyis ba nas me//de la skye ba mdzo ba bra ni//rnam pagron gyis yang dag g+sa kun gyi bzugs kyinas shes pa//de lce ga pa 'dzin pa ste//tha yang na che
241a3(rgyud): ma'am//tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang //rdzas sam las kyi sbyor ba las//rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs bri//mi bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs//hri ni
241a4(rgyud): dbus dgod par bya//rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang //'a khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang //rim bzhin sku mdog dbye ba yis//shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu dgod//gti
241a5(rgyud): mug zhe sdang chags pa dang //rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin//me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su//ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya//sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi//gdan bdun gzhan/
241a6(rgyud): gyo nyi ma gnyis//'khor dga' ni sdang dka' bar bcas//ka yis phreng gis rnam par rgyun//zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can//g.yon na shes rang ral gyi bsdams//gtsu
241a7(rgyud): dang dbyings rnams ji bzhin du//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya//phyi rol gzugs kyis rdo rje sogs//mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dgod//sha la sogs pa'i snam du
241b1(rgyud): byams pas yi snying po shar//'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje lhor//mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyub ni//kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya//sgrib pa rnam par sel//
241b2(rgyud): ba dang //kun tu bzang po byang du dgod//zhal gsum phyag drug rnam po can//g.yon na ral gri dgod pa dang //phyag ni rdo rje dri med pa'i//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gad na//lha mo rnama?/
241b3(rgyud): la zla ba'i gdan//sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gsal//rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung //mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod//shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su//gshin rje
241b4(rgyud): gshed la sogs pa dgod//zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can//de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin//mi g.yo la sogs mtshams rnams su//gshin rje gshed kyi rang ngo bo//
241b5(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drag rnam pa can//g.yon na ral gri rnam par bsam//gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon//de bzhin g.yon na ral gri brjod//gnod mdzes de bzhin gtsug
241b6(rgyud): tor ni//'og dang steng du rnam par dgod//khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs//de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan//de bzhin phyag rgya dbyug la sogs//nye bar mtshon nas dgod
241b7(rgyud): par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i//rim lnga ni rnam par dgod//de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng //ra ba gnyis ni yongs su bskor//rin chen dra ba rnga ma dang //lha mo rnams
242a1(rgyud): kyi snam bu yis//ka brta babs 'khor long mtshan//ri dgas rnams kyi mchan pas rgyun//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs//rnga yab mye long la sogs kyis//rgyun pa ru ni
242a2(rgyud): rnam par bshad//sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag brten//slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni//rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no//rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba//bgegs
242a3(rgyud): bskrad pas ni sngon song bas//suM b+hU'i sgra dang ni sur+b+ba//thA ga mar oM dIng ngo mtshur rgyu//hU~M gnyis paT gyi mtha' dang ldan//shar b+hi sgo ru dag bar bya//oM dang br-idz+nyA gr-ih+Na nos//rgyu gnyis pa
242a4(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan//blo dang ldan pas lho ru dgod//oM dang br-ih+NA ba ya gnyis//hUM gnyis phaT kyo mtha' dang ldan//nub tu yang dag spro bar bya//oM A na ya hU~M b+ha ga bAn dang bid+ma rA dza dang //
242a5(rgyud): hUM gnyis dang ni phaT mtha' dgod//de rjes yang ni byang du dgod//'di yis gdugs pa bkug nas ni//de nas sngags pas phur pa gdab//seng ldeng las ni byas pa yis//phur bu
242a6(rgyud): soR+Sha ni bcu gnyis chad//zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis mtshan//yi ge brgya pa so sor bzlas//sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas ni//phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya//oM dang
242a7(rgyud): ya~M ga b+ha lan gnyis//de bzhin g+hA ta ya ni gnyis//sar+b+ba duSh+Ta~M phaT zhes dang //de bzhin kI la ya gnyis dang //sarba pA pa~M phaT dang ni//hUM gsum badz+ra kI la ya//badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa
242b1(rgyud): ya ti//kA ya wA ga tsit+ta badz+ra dang //kI la yA hUM phaT ma ga'o//mtha' can gyi ni bur bus gdug//oM dang badz+ra mud ga ra//badz+ra kI lA ya A ko Ta/sa dang
242b2(rgyud): hUM gnyis phaT mtha' dang //sngags dang phur pus brdung ba brjod//rdos bgegs ni 'jug la sogs//bskrad don rdo rje ra ba dang //steng du mda' yi dra ba dang //'og tu sna tshogs//
242b3(rgyud): rdo dang //gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni//byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis//bum pa bcu 'am yang ni drug/rin chen las byas rnam dag pa//sman lnga dang ni 'bris bu
242b4(rgyud): lha//'bru lnga la sogs kyis gang ba//rin chen lnga dang sna mra sogs//lo mA lnga yisna rnam par rgyan//gur gum gla rtsig bur dang //tsan dan chu yis gang bar bya//me
242b5(rgyud): /tog la sogs kyis mchod bya//rang rang sngags kyi byin gyis brlab//badz+ra d+h+r-ig dang dzaM na dzi ka/rat+na d+h+r-ika dang A ro li ka/de bzhin pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika sngags dang //lcags kyi'i rnam
242b6(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer gyis//'og min 'jig rten khams nas ni//bum pa rang gis bskur byas pa//de nas spyan drangs nas ni gzhugs//de na sde lha mo'i gzugs spros nas//de rjes
242b7(rgyud): gzhan la dgod par bya//oM dang ru ru s+phu ru dang //de las dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gas pa de bzhin sid+d+ha lo tsa no//sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ne//pA hA zhes ni de la bzlas//spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs
243a1(rgyud): ni/bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya//mi dang shaM kra re dang yang //de las shAn rti ku ru dang /de zhin rgyu kyi dang /b+hU to na dang g+hu tI no//g+hA ta ya nA~M lan gnyis brjod//swAt+na'o mtha' can rdzogs
243a2(rgyud): brjod bya//mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs//bum pa'i dbus mchod par bya//oM dang ka Te bi ka Te/na kai TI ka TaM ka TA//ka ri Ta b+hIr+ye swA hA//gos dkar rnam par rdzogs nas ni//bum pa'i
243a3(rgyud): dbusu mchod par byi//oM dang tA re tut+tA re//tu re swA hA dgod par bya//sgrol ma'i rnam pa rdzogs nas ni//bum pa'i dbusu mchod par bya//gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams la//gcig
243a4(rgyud): la las ni thams cad pa//i na maHsa man+ta kA ya wIka tsit+ta badz+ra NaM/ne maHbadz+ra kr-i d+hA ya//ma hA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA yaM//a si mu saM la/pa rA shu pA sha hastA ya/oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li//
243a5(rgyud): kha kha khA hi khA hi/tiSh+Tha tiSh+NA/bar+N+Na ban+d+ha/ha na ha na/dA ha da ha/gadz+ra gaMr+dz+dza/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/sar+b+ba bim+l-i pi nA ya kAn//ma hA ga Na pa ti//dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swa hA//sngags
243a6(rgyud): 'di lan bdun bar du ni//las ni thams cad pa yin te//snying po'i sngags ni bzlas byas la//rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya//yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni//lin bdun par
243a7(rgyud): du bsgom par bya//brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis//yi ge gsum yang bzlas pa ni//de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis//mchod yin snod du mchod par bya//de nas du gul
243b1(rgyud): ras ni//ga bur a ga rus gdugs pa//bkab nas rang rang sngags dang ni//de la rimya bzhin lhag gnas bya//zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can//sprin bral//
243b2(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bu'o//de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag/rAng snang ba yi sku la 'khyud//a li ki li las byung ba//sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan l-i bzhugs//gzhol yas khang dbus nyams
243b3(rgyud): dpa' ba'i//'og min zhing khams na bzhugs pa'i//dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa ni//sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can//bsgoms nas de las 'od zer spro//kha dog lnga dang
243b4(rgyud): lcags kyu yi//de yis spyan drang slob dpon gyis//sngags brjod nas ni spyan drang bya//ai h+ye hi dang b+hA ge bAn//sa ma ya ma nu sma ra//tiSh+Ta gnyis dang sa mra ya//de la
243b5(rgyud): a nu smra ra gnyis//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang //sneh+Na yi mtha' yan gsum brjod//'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya//dkyil 'khor pa dang yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor dbu su
243b6(rgyud): spyan drang ba//rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba lnga//bzhugs shing yang dgra mchod par bya//rAng rang sngags dang rA ma rdo bzhin//lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod//'khor la
243b7(rgyud): mchog ni mchod par bya//bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di//chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong //yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni//dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/thugs
244a1(rgyud): no brtsa 'byor dgongs te//mgon pas mchod pa 'ad nas zhag/oM sar+b+bat+ta thA g+hA d+hA na/pU dz+nyA bas+thA nA ya At+mA naM ni rAt+yA yA me//bla mas yi glu gsum ni brjod//sna yi rnam par
244a2(rgyud): byas nas no//de rjes bdag la mchod par bya//oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta//pU dza~M badz+ra sI b+hI dza/At+ma ko&haM zhes ni brjod//ring lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni//ji ltar bskyed pa'i yum rnams
244a3(rgyud): dang //gnod byed kha na ma tho med//zhe sdang chen po'i rigs las byung //dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod bye zhing //de las lha rnams lhag gnas bya//yid 'brug sna tshog
244a4(rgyud): lha yi gos//ga pur a ga ru yis bdug/sngags kyis dag byas dgab par bya//oM dang tiSh+Tha badz+rI hoH//brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o//oM dang sgra
244a5(rgyud): badz+ra ho//blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod//me togu s+phA ra bso gtor nas ni//lhag gnas der no gshegs par bya//rnam pa kun dang yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor/
244a6(rgyud): mchog ni mthong bar bya//rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis//bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgoms nas ni//me long sogs la khrus bya zhing //de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma so/
244a7(rgyud): ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa//de bzhin bdag gi sku khrus gsol//cad pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems//dbumu yi ge gsum dang sgra
244b1(rgyud): sAt+thaSh+Ti mtha' can brjod par bya//las kyi de nyid cho ga shes//de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya//oM sAr+b+bA A ba ra Na//shud+d+ha sar+b+ba pA pa dang //bi shud+d+ha badz+ra hU~M phaT/
244b2(rgyud): swar+b+ba mtha' can sngags brjod bya//pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang //yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas//nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed//'khyud cing bskor bas dor bar bya/daM nas
244b3(rgyud): tshi ga bzhin legs mchog/sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang //bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya//rang rang sngags dang ga rims bzhin//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA//puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha dang
244b4(rgyud): sa mu dra dang s+pha ra Na//sa ma ya dang shri yi aHhUM gi sngags ni rjes su brjed//rdzas rnams kun la rang ming ni//gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin//cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod//
244b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' lags bsgyings pa//rdo rje slob dpon chog shes//sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya//oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang //badz+re swAhA'i mtha' can bzlas//yi ge gsum gyi
244b6(rgyud): snying po ni//sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni//me tog char ni dbab par bya//slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas//glu yis yang dag bskul nas ni//sad pa na ni phyag kyang
244b7(rgyud): byas//las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag/gter ma don kun grub par byed//las la byang shing mkhas pa dang //cho ga bzhin du bsgyings bcas dang //chang dang sna tshogs sha dang
245a1(rgyud): nga na lda dun ma dang //zlas rgyun cu khur ba dang //snyam nur b+h+yo d+ha mang bya dang //mad yo pa sto sags rgyam mchud//snod ma gang bulag//gsungs pa /
245a2(rgyud): bAcu sngags kyis//snga ma bzhin du cho ga yiste//de dbus 'byung ba kun lho ni//ngo mcher chen du'i gtar mi sbyin//snga ma bzhin du tshig yis//tel bsregs pa bris khyad
245a3(rgyud): sa de skar/ kr-ih+Na/sa tu maM b+h+yAm r-iSh+Ta/au dzaiH/ma/manr-i Sh+TA na
245a4(rgyud): b+h+yaH//oM mai / yAn+d+ra nA ma ts+tsha/sId+ham m+b+ha n+ta/sa su~M \u0f7f/rgyunad+ha nA/s+yA /
245a5(rgyud): par ma//slob ma lhag par gnas pa pyod//mtshan nyid yon tan gyis rkyen pa//tsan dan ga pur gyuN+Di lo//hU~M m-i ni kyang ni khrus byas te// ni'i chang ba yi//mas
245b1(rgyud): kyi dri ma rnam par 'khyud//bdog pa thams cad gtong bar byed//gos gtsang ba ni mchog tu bkau/khang pa brtsegs ma byas nas ni//ras kyi yol ba
245b2(rgyud): kun nas bri//yi ge gsum dang yang dag ldan//rdo rje can gyis sngags chu ni//lan bdun gdong la gtor ba yis//las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed//de nas sa yi snying po
245b3(rgyud): sogs//mig la sogs la rnam par dgod//sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni//dbang po so so la reg pas//sngags brjod bya zhing byin gyis brlab//lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal
245b4(rgyud): 'byor gyis//oM dang tsak+Sha tsak+ShuHtadA sa man+ta dang tsakUHbzlas/mai tri sa twa lo ts+ya ni//sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni//swAhA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod//mthe bo gung mo yang dag sbar
245b5(rgyud): zhabs bsil chu dang ma nyi sre nas ni//sngags de leni gsum bzla bar bya//slob ma'i mig la so sor ni//mthe bo'i phyag rgyas reg par bya//khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i//skud pa
245b6(rgyud): zhags pa 'dra ba la//yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum//bzlas nas zhabs bsil chu snga bsad bya//sgung po lan gsum dkris pa nI//rdo rje gsum ni mdud par ldan//
245b7(rgyud): dpung pa g.yon par bcings pa ni//sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya//oM dang lo tsa ne yi sgra//yau ta tAti taM saM pra taM//maM b+ha bi Sh+yan+ta yi sgra//raM dang rat+na ra yA ya/sid+d+ha na ni deR+sha
246a1(rgyud): dang //ya sAd yoM sngags 'dri ni//theg pa bla med lan+ya bdun bzlas//slob ma la ni me tor+ya gtor//de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni//snor ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yis//zur ni gsum du
246a2(rgyud): yongs su byi//yi ge gsum gyis byin rlab sgom//slob ma'i lag tu gted par bya//oM dang pra ti badz+ra dang //sa man+ta dang I sh+ma ri//AHhUM sA hA'i mtha' can sngags//bzlas nas
246a3(rgyud): slob mas dor bar bya//sar bab po yi phur bu ste//phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid //slob dpon dang ni slob mu yis//de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya//nam nangs yang dag bla
246a4(rgyud): ma la//ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu//de la dmigs nas spyan sreg ni//zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas/las ni thod pa nyid dam//bgegs zhi ba'i don du bya//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings
246a5(rgyud): bcas pas//rnal 'byor ji bzhin cho ga bzhin//sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni//bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya//de nas gsol 'debs slob ma ni//rdo rje slob dpon thugaso rjes
246a6(rgyud): khyab//thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni//mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te//dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas//slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol//byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa//mngon
246a7(rgyud): po chen po bdago 'tshalo//dam tshig de nyid srul du gsol//sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol//thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu//mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal//den
246b1(rgyud): thams de la yang //byu dang mi byu ga sungs pan//sems can las kyu slad dusu gdag//rdul chen dats+tsha ba'i rimo da dub+h+yo//'gro ba 'di dag dkyil 'khor na/
246b2(rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o//theg mar dkyil 'khor rnyil 'byor ba dag/rdo rje slob dpo ni ra nyid spyom//sgrib ma dag nyid 'drar dmigs nas//de 'og sems cad rabang sgyu
246b3(rgyud): //d+ha ma bzang la dbang bskur byir//slosmod mas de rjes gsal ba~M gad ga//'di nas 'khor ba'i rgyu mtshol//nyin mongs chu srin ne k+Shas khyub//las kyi rlung gis dpa' blo
246b4(rgyud): ngadag bying thubs rje'i rgyu mtshor skye//mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig/nyon rmongs dbang du byu ni/dade ba sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyog/thugs d+hA'i rgyu margyas
246b5(rgyud): bdage bas mdzod//de 'dra tshig gastan rdo rje can//thugs rje'i thugs ni yong su gang //slob ma lo ni yongs su gsungs//bre khyod dus 'di nas bzung ste//rdo rje thog pa'i ga
246b6(rgyud): lugaso bstan//rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis bzung //rdo rje sems dpa'i spyad pa'i gnas//bu khyod 'di ni bdud rtsis+t+wa~M//baisbyangs shig mA bsgyings na ni bsreg/
246b7(rgyud): bsrungs na dngos grub kun grub 'gyur//nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i rlung //oM dang pa N+ya a mr-i tau/u da ka dang AHhUM thaM//slong mas bdud rtsi lnga bcung bya//rdo rje yas/
247a1(rgyud): rlud byung bang //bskrad bdun+dan sgron 'gyur phyur//rdo rje skrod mA lu ni dang //dri chen dri rdul spobs pa//mtshal 'bab pa yu ru mo bris//khrag dang lu ngas yang dag bsko/rku
247a2(rgyud): tshul dang ni rnam par bsres//yaM dgos ma ni blangs nas su//pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni//der ni thams cad gzhug par bya//khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid//g.yas brkyang pa yi
247a3(rgyud): bas gnas//rdo rje 'ching dbang slob ma la//rmad byung chen po'i bdug pas bdug/'bab par 'gyur ba the tsom med//oM tISh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha//de bzhin A be sha ya hUM//rnal 'byor pa yis
247a4(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod//slob ma la ni gsal bar dang bI//badz+ra sa twa hi ma he//bid+yA rA dza ya bid+yA ma hA//de ltar sngags ni 'di yis kyang //slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas//rang bzhin
247a5(rgyud): gyis dag rang gi lus//dkyil 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba no//de bzhin gshigs dang lha mo dang //rgyal ba'i skyes kyis yang dag gzhi//khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog rdo rje
247a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rten drung ni//phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni//gnyis po de la bstan par bya//slar yang slob mos gsol ba gdab//bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol//rnam rgya
247a7(rgyud): bum pa blangs nas ni//pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la//de yis dbusu blo bzang ngo //hUM rdor las byung mi bskyod bsgom//rang nyid ye shes sa bon gyi//'od zer yang dag bskul/
247b1(rgyud): bas byung //slar yang ye shes sems dpa' sgrom//mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog/mi bskyod ngo bo dri nyid kyis//rnam par shes pa'i phung po sgom//slob ma'i
247b2(rgyud): mgo bor lag pa bzhag/rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab//oM dang ma hA sa ma ya//de bzhinu I shwa ratAM do //a b+hiSh+Tiny+tsA mriswA hUM//oM sar+b+ba tab+hA bA tA//a b+hi She ka sA ma ya/
247b3(rgyud): shri ye AHhUM de nas bzla//chu yi gting nus slob ma la//dbu rgyan dbang bskur dron du ni//cod pan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po//sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/snying rjes
247b4(rgyud): khyab pa nges byin gyis//rdo rje sems dpa'i yon+d+ran gnas//sa bon tAM las byung ba yi//rin chen 'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni//ri mo dang sogs cid pan dang //slob ma'i mgo
247b5(rgyud): lo sbyin par bya//oM sar+b+ba ti thA ga ta/rat+na mu kuM Ta sgra dang //de bzhin sgra dang pU dzA ya//a tISh+Tha dang AHhUM dang //sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni//me tog mgo la sbyin par bya//
247b6(rgyud): skyoslob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir//slar yang b+h+ra ma la gsol gdab/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos//rdo rje bai tub zhugs ngas byin gyis//glang gis ma rig sgo nga 'byed//yos//
247b7(rgyud): thob 'gyur de yis byes//hrIHlas pad+ma rdzogs par ni//'od dpab med du rnam par sgom//rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin//slob ma la ni 'di skad brjod//ngas khyod de ring
248a1(rgyud): dbang bskur bya//'did sangs rgyas thams cad do//kun tu bzang po'i rortul zhugs brtan//dngos grub bzang phyur rdo rje long //kham las byung ba'i rol gri 'am//dran yod krung thA
248a2(rgyud): rang ngo bo//rdzogs par lag pa g.yon pa ni//slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod//khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad
248a3(rgyud): byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i bzhi//rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes lA//rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo//rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang //bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur//rnam par
248a4(rgyud): snong mdzad rang ngo bo//slob ma'i mgo la leg bzhag ste//rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur//gzugs kyi phung po rnam par bsgom//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/che go mo zhes badz+ra sa tI//a b+hi
248a5(rgyud): /Shiny+tsa mi swA hA//phung po lnga yi rnam drag pa//thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar//dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes//rmad byung chen po bshad par bya//sangs rgyas lnga ni dag pa 'di//dang
248a6(rgyud): bskor lnga ni thob par 'gyur//ma rig pa ni gsal nas ni//ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi//slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang sbyin//sngags kyi dbang
248a7(rgyud): bskur ye shes mchog/nges byin dngos grub ster bar byed//de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT//swA hA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum//kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas//sngags kyi sku yis/
248b1(rgyud): dag pa dang //bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod//blams dngos grub sbyin byar phyir//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//snying po yI ni ye shes mchog/spangs
248b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad bsdus pa ni//khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //de nas slob ma spyod brtul zhugs//sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis//gang gi spyod pa rnam dag pa//'dodapa
248b3(rgyud): thugs rje'i gtso bo yis//sems can don ni byed pa'i thabs//nga yis spyod pa'i 'dul zhugs sbyin//de nas glegs bam dung la stsogs//mda' gzhu ral bri 'khor lo dpe/
248b4(rgyud): sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed//slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin//'di ni kun bzang spyod brtul zhugs//bsam pa sna tshogs rnam dag byed//khyod kyis kyang ni
248b5(rgyud): rtag tu bcang //sems can kun gyi don gyis byos//oM sar+b+ba tA nA gau ta//de bzhin d+haM Ta ra traM dang //de ltar sngags 'di dgod par bya//de nas lung bstan thob don du//
248b6(rgyud): ba dang bas bla ma la//da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug/khyed kyis bdag la lu pa bstan gsol//don yod rdo rje zhes bya khyod//rigs kyi dbang phyug lung bstan bya//
248b7(rgyud): de nas slob ma dbugs da byung 'dod//bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni skyo//mgon pa yang dag bdag dbugs phyung //byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs pa na//de nas rdo rje ches pa/
249a1(rgyud): ma//g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni//g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la//dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba//nga yis rdo rje gsung bdag khyod//sangs rgyas kun d+ha na
249a2(rgyud): mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par brjod//khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che//dpal ldan ston 'byung gnas bdag/bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgya'o//gleng khyer mcho
249a3(rgyud): tu khyod zhugaso//de nas slob ma don 'dod la//phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya//phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che//rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag la stsol//de nas yis rdor dbang
249a4(rgyud): phyug/ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyis//sbyin dA se sangs rgyas lnga la sogaso//lha mo'i 'khor lo rim bzhin 'byung //de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i//bum pa phyag bsnan
249a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba rgyal//rin chen 'dzin dang 'khor ba sgrol//shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin//gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la//de bzhin rdo rje dga' mi
249a6(rgyud): sogs//gshin rje mthar byed shes rab byed//pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed//'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas//rdo rje slob ma rnam par bsam//dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che
249a7(rgyud): khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa//gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin//de nas de bzhin gshegs lha mo//khro bo rang gi gnas su//
249b1(rgyud): dbod//'jam dang la rnam par bsgoms nas ni//ye shes rdo rjes rnam par rgyan//oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang //badz+ra swAhA zhes ni dgod//blo bzang gis ni sngags
249b2(rgyud): brjod nas//slob ma la ni me tog gtor//de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod//slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'dra//thugs rjes khyab pa'i bla ma yis//de nas slob ma rjes gnang
249b3(rgyud): bya/de nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas//mi bya ba ni ci yang med//dpa' chen khyod kyis dka' drin gyis//da ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod//sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas//rten 'brel las
249b4(rgyud): byung chos rnams ni//gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni//sems can don ni mnyam med byos//bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni//ci bang bar ni sgrub par bgyis//de nas bla ma la yon dbul/
249b5(rgyud): bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang bya//skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu//de nas bla ma gsang don gnyer//thur du kha bltas kha sbyar te//ji ltar bdag nyid chen po khyed//bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar
249b6(rgyud): mdzad//de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i//las dang chos sogs dbye ba yi//sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol//skal ldan bud med phyag rgyar bshad//skye bos dben pa'i mtshan phyed
249b7(rgyud): na//ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas//thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi//rdo rje slob dpon yon tan 'byung //de ltar ji ltar rnyed phyag rgya//snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i//bla ni med/
250a1(rgyud): b+ha'i rang btsun gyi//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni//rnal 'byor ma yi yang dang ltung //kun rdzob byang chub sems gang ldan//gsung ba de yi dbang bskur bya//'di du sangs rgyas thams
250a2(rgyud): kyi//dam tshig chen po rnam byung ba//khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len//bde ba chen pos myang bar gyis//slob ma rtog pa dang bral bas//pad+ma la gnas de myang gyis//'das pa'i rje
250a3(rgyud): 'chang ba yis//rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur bya//byang chub sems kyi chu yis ni//bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya//de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir//bla mas don 'dod slob ma
250a4(rgyud): la//dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni//bdag la khyod kyis dbang bskur stsol//de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che//phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob//mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir//de
250a5(rgyud): 'og slob ma la ni sbyin//lha me phyag rgya chen po 'di//dpag med bde bar ba ster ba//bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni//bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis//de nas shes rab ye shes de'i//sgrub/
250a6(rgyud): nga'i mchog tu 'dod pa'i de na//lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog/dngos grub den du nga yas sbyin//lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba//dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med//dpa' ngo khyod ni spro 'am ni/byang
250a7(rgyud): chub sems ni za nus sam//yang dag de ni nges par ni//ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smes//ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog/lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus//de nas b+he me de
250b1(rgyud): nas//skad krol gos na bya nas kyang //pad+ma dag na 'byed byung cang //badz+ra mo k+ShatsI zhes gsungs//b+ha ga ri pad+ma dbus gnas pa//bde ba kun tu rgyu ba'iH//
250b2(rgyud): sor mos bskul nas dga' ba b+h+yo//dzaM hras kyang na rol par bya//lhan cig skyes pa'i bde byed pa//'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten no//mchog tu dga' bas nyams myed nas//lha
250b3(rgyud): ba'i bde bas de myang bya//de nas bcom ldan ma dgyes nas//b+hany+tsa mo k+Sha'i sngogs gsung zhing //rkang pa g.yon pa mgo la bzhag/bka' yis de nyid yang drag bstan//de ring /
250b4(rgyud): chang bu khyod kyis//ji sring byang chub snying po'i bar//rmi lAm bzhin du sems can gyi//bla na med pa'i don byos shig/bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi//'di la man drag/
250b5(rgyud): la mi shes//rig pa 'di ni dor byas nas//thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya//brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog rig ma'i brtul zhugs bu yis spyod//de ltar 'di ni byang
250b6(rgyud): chub mchog/rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma//rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang brten//bdag la go 'phyang mchog sbrul logs//ting 'dzin
250b7(rgyud): kun gyis 'bras bu gsal//sems can kun la ci 'dod par//dngos grub blo na med par gsol//slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i phyir//rang gi gnas gshegs badzu mu
251a1(rgyud): zhes lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin//'khor lo lhag par 'byeng pa'i rim//u tsiSh+Ta k+She tra pa la//a ti tsakra u tset+sa//su d+ha dzan+na bi ba gnyis//b+hak+Sha gnyis dang sar+b+ba dang //sid+d+haM pra yAts+tsha me dang //o sngon/
251a2(rgyud): AHhU~M phaT swA hA//de yi rjes la brjod par bya//rdo rje dril bu 'cha ba'i gyur gyi/g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pos gnas//khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin dang //rdo rje slob dpon
251a3(rgyud): bzhon ni//khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang //de ltar cho ga nyi shu las//bskyes pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bstan//de nyid mang du shes pa yis//bla ma dge ba'i las bzang
251a4(rgyud): po//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i las rgyas pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//de yi
251a5(rgyud): rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni//las ni cho ga nyi shur bshad//dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshon ci//de yi 'bras bu ci zhig 'gyur//chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs//de nas bcom ldan rjes
251a6(rgyud): gsungs//las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang //sngon du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni//rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad//ser sna la sngogs bsal ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas mchod
251a7(rgyud): pa rnam sgom zhing //sbyin pa tshul khrims bzad po dang //brtson 'grus pasam gtan rab tu rdzogs//shes rab ye shes dbang ba skur gyis//shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs/ga
251b1(rgyud): ba la sogs la gnas pa//skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan na//kun tu spyad pa'i chos rnams kyis//mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni//bla ma dad pas mchod pa na//rnga
251b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i go 'phang dran//chu sogs ming ni mthor thug pa//ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir//spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mtha'//sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir//shes ra
251b3(rgyud): brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'//dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i phyir//dkyil 'khor sa tshon phra rab dang //mtshungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun//mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang //
251b4(rgyud): de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni//las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur//shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings//dbang bskur ba ni thob pa dang /
251b5(rgyud): dngos po'i ngo bo ji bzhin du//shes rab ye shes kyis ni thob//bla ma yis ni sgrub pa yang //mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog/de ltar yun mi ring bar 'thob//dge pa'i
251b6(rgyud): spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu
251b7(rgyud): rtse lnga pa'o////de nas rdo rje sems dpa sa gsungs//mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med//gnyis med mnyam po'i rnal 'a byor gyis//lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i ri mi//
252a1(rgyud): do shings dang gAsnur hrI nA~M//sku gzugs la ni phyug m+b+ha b+ha//rab gnas dkyi khrur sbyin sdug dang //rabu bla nas nam yang me byu/ts+tshin dan mya ma tshug sogs//bdag cung
252a2(rgyud): lnga ni rtag tu mchod//de phyir de la mngon zhugaso pa'o//thugs ni rdo rje rang nyid gtso//sems de yang ni de dngos med//gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni//stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa
252a3(rgyud): med//de phyir thams cad na mkha' 'dra//deste rje drug rnam shes bya//rtswa ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya//gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun//sems las gzhan pa yod ma yin/
252a4(rgyud): nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang //sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gnas//lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa//sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med//de phyir de ltar rnam dpyod pa//rang lus gcig pu
252a5(rgyud): rtag tu mchod//rigs lnga dag tu rtag spyod pas//rigs gcig tu ni rnam par rtag/'dod dang mi 'dod dbye ba dang //btung dang mi btung rnam par spangs//rnal 'byor skal yod
252a6(rgyud): skal med ces//nam yang smra bar mi bya'o//phyag rgya'i rnam pa sngon po sogs//de bzhin gzugs la 'ang dbye ba gsum//gzugs rdo rje ma bkug nas su//sa snying la ni dbul bar/
252a7(rgyud): bya//yang dag klu dang brjod bral dbyangs//de bzhin sgra pa'ang dbye ba gsum//sgra rdo rje ma yang dag dgug/phyag na rdo rje la ni dbul//ga pur a ga dza ti sogs//de bzhin
252b1(rgyud): dri yang dbye ba gsum//dri rdo rje ma yang dag dgug/na mkha'i snying po la yang dbul//'o byed pa dang 'jib pa dang //ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum//
252b2(rgyud): rom yang dag dgug/'jig rten dbang phyug le ni dbug//rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor//gos dang 'khyud pa'i dbye bo gsum//reg bya rdo rje yang dag dgug/sgrib sel lo ma
252b3(rgyud): dbul bar bya//phyi yi chos rnams 'di dag kun//brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'ang //chos dbyings rdo rje yang dag dgug/'jim pa'i rdo rje la ni dbul//de bzhin
252b4(rgyud): phyi dang nang dang ni//gnyis ka yang ni mi dmigs pa//gzugs la gsum du byas nas ni//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//yul ni lnga ni nges gnas te//rgyud lngar nges
252b5(rgyud): par 'byung ba ni//rmi lAmA rlung dang ldan pa ru//'dod pa lnga rnams spyod par byed//dbang po gang dang gang lam gyis//sgrub pa po ni yul 'thob//de dag thams cad thugs
252b6(rgyud): rje che//mnyes pa'i phyir ni dbul bar bya//yang dag dga' ba'i me tog gis//rdo rje nyi ma pad+ma 'byung //me tog bdag nyid la mchod pa//rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mtsho
252b7(rgyud): rnam rtog tshul yul ma yin zhing //de ltar gtum mo'i me yis ni//nges par bsregs pa de ni spros//thugs kyi rdo rjel ni dbul//rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par/zhugs pal//
253a1(rgyud): sogs ma las byung //rdul 'byor pa yi mi shigs sgra//thugs rdo rje la dbul bar bya//yaM gr-i h+na las yang dag byung //sngags kyi 'od zer shin tu gsul//mar mo 'bar
253a2(rgyud): yang dag 'od//thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya//bde ba chen po na mkhar gnas//byang chub sems ni sad pa dang //de nyid kyis kyang byugs pa ni//thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya//'dir ni/
253a3(rgyud): gang dang gang longs spyod//dbang po thams cad yang dag brten//de dag thams cad thugs rdo rje//bza' ba'i snod du mchod par bya//dgod dang sgeg dang rtse 'jo ni//sna tshogs
253a4(rgyud): kyis ni sems dga' byed//rnam par thar pa'i sgo dag dang //thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las ning gi bdag
253a5(rgyud): nyid mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//lha mo yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/rnal 'byor bde lnga rtogs pa
253a6(rgyud): rnams//rtsa dbye ba yi rang bzhin gyis//rtag tu lus kyi rtse 'jo bya//de yi lha rnams su ni bshad//rtag tu bdo ba kun gyis dga'//kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus//
253a7(rgyud): bde ba chen pos kun tu khyab//lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod//dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang //bral ba lhan cig skyes skad cig/'char ba dang ni rtse 'jo dang //kun nas lhag par sgeb
253b1(rgyud): pa dang //brtul dang smad par gyur pa dang //de rnams sgyu ma ru ni bshad//phyi rol du ni byung ban//gang phyir yang dag sgyur bar 'gyur//su tu
253b2(rgyud): rnams yang dag sad//de phyir rnal 'byor mar ni bshad//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyu dang la rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rdzogs pa las lha mo'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa du
253b3(rgyud): /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//e baM zhes bya yi ge danyis//oM ni stong pa nyid du bshad//de bzhin baM ni thugs rje dang //thig le de gnyis sbyong las byung
253b4(rgyud): de ni rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung //e baM gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang //mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o//rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis//rgyud rnams ni thog mor gsungs//
253b5(rgyud): aM ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do//pad+ma'i rten du shes par bya//rten pa rdo rje zhes ni gsungs//brtan pa rdo rje 'chang ba yi//de la gnas pa'o thig le'i gzugs//sna tshogs
253b6(rgyud): sprul pa ston par byed//bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas//rdo rje sems dpa' bdes te//a ni gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings sam//b+ha ga chos 'byung pad+ma la//rnal 'byor
253b7(rgyud): seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs//mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad//rdo rje seMs dpabaM rdo rje//rdo rje 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang //he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo//dang po sang+yas
254a1(rgyud): lal sogs man+tan//e bI de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu//gnyis su med pa'i bde mchog dang //stong nyid snying rje dbyer med dang //gang la de nyid mngon par brjod//de la dra ban
254a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rgyu//gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni//rgyud kun gyi ni gleng gnir gsungs//rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa//stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa//gang la de nyid man
254a3(rgyud): brjod//oM baM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gaN+DIs//gang la 'di nyid med pa ni//de la du dam/ga nyid yongs shes pasu ma'i gso lta gsal bar mi/rgyud//
254a4(rgyud): ni legs bshad de nyid shes//sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par//de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog/a baM ngan ni rnam par nges//chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis//da
254a5(rgyud): ngag tu yang dag bshad//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las oM baM zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa dang rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa
254a6(rgyud): brgyad pa'o////de nas gzhin yang bshad kyis nyon//oM bI la sogs don rgyas pa//gang gis yang dag yongs su shes//chos kyi do ni yang ngag rtogs//e oM ni shes
254a7(rgyud): rab dam pa ste//'dod chags dral sogs skad cig bdag/srid pa gsum na yongs shes pa//'di ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan//be 'od ma spring ba ltar mdzes shing //chags pa
254b1(rgyud): /sogs pa rab bskyed ldan//snang ba gsal ba rnam par shes//ming ni thabs shes bya ba yin//ma rig chen rang nyid rtsa ba skye//ma rig pa ni bzlog pa yin//
254b2(rgyud): ma rig pa las 'di 'byung bas//de bas snang ba 'byung ba'o//yA/'gro ba rnam shes gsum dang po'o//de ming snang ba gsal ba ste//de ni stong pa cher 'gyur la//de yang
254b3(rgyud): 'od gsal bar 'gro'o//shru/snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can//gang 'di rnam shes gsum thob pa//sems can khams na ma lus pa'i//rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin//
254b4(rgyud): taM/de ni re re'i don snang ba//rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed pa//la/rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni//kun tu 'gro la gnas par 'gyur//e 'di ni rlung khams chen po ste/
254b5(rgyud): rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin//de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni//dzI lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyu//ka/sra ba'i sa khams chu nyid dang //de bzhin mo dading rlung dag ni//
254b6(rgyud): par shes par blangs nas su//srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur//smi/'di na phung po lnga rnams su//'byung ba 'dus bya mtshan nyid ni//gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed
254b7(rgyud): dang //rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o//sa/mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang //bya ba sgrub pa nyid dang ni//mo long dang ni chos kyi dbyings//'di ni ye shes lnga pa yin//ma//
255a1(rgyud): yid kyi skye mchod nyid dang ni//mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang //sna dang lce dang lus rnams te//'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o//re/gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams//srog dang
255a2(rgyud): stsol ba lo brten pa//gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas bzhin du//mi shes bsdam gtan klog pa spangs//b+h+rUM/'di las rang bzhin chags pa dang //chags med la sogs par
255a3(rgyud): yang 'gyur//de las dge dang mi dge'i las//de las skye ba 'byung ba yin//ga/'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams//sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de//mngon par byang
255a4(rgyud): chub rnam lnga zhes//ming gis rab tu bskul ba yin//bAnaHrlung drang chu dang me dang swa//spyan la sogs pa bzhi pa ste//ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du//shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub
255a5(rgyud): ster//sa/thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur//phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing //mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der//sa snying la sogs rgyal sraso//rba rol pas dga' ba
255a6(rgyud): gang yin pa'i//khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams//de yi phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru//dpung pa yan lag rnamasu brtag/ta/de dang de yi rig las byung //lha dang lha mo tha dad pa//da ni yod
255a7(rgyud): min de dag kyang //'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin//thA/'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi//rnal 'byor pa ni ye shes gsum//mthong phyir dman dang par ma dang //dam pa'i yul la
255b1(rgyud): /bzhag par bya//ga/dang ra nyid ra yul la//dkra bar 'gyur ba de da do//da spyod yul dang dang gang //de dang de sna tsam nyid///dang
255b2(rgyud): yis lam nas ni//sgrub pa bstan yul thob pa//de bzhini de lasam gsungs par/tshim par bye phyir dbul bar bya// sku gsum dag ni tha dad par//sgru pa yis ni yang dra/
255b3(rgyud): bstan//rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis//gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin//ya/grang zhig sa ng+yas rgyus sgyu mtshan nyid//kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa ni//de nyid rdzogs
255b4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//'od gsalnga bar ni rnam dag 'gyur//bAka/tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid//gtso bo ye shes sku rang bzhin//sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//'ja' tshan
255b5(rgyud): bzhin du snang ba yin//tsita/sems dang sems byung ma rig pa//shes rab thabs dang nyer thob dang //stong dang shin tu stong pa dang //stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod//ta/rang
255b6(rgyud): bzhin snying ba'i dbye shes na//de nas spyod pa rab tu bya//las kyi lus ni yongs sbyangs nas//rdo rje sku nyid thob par 'gyur//hri/thugs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyi//don spyod bzhag
255b7(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs//kun rdzob du ni sprul skur gnas//ji ltar ji ltar 'dod pa spyod//de/yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du//'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur//
256a1(rgyud): mammas samasamama.amamatha thamasama.am as yasamamam mas pas ma sa ma yab
256a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi dun tshogs kyang //stobs kyis blangs nas spyod par 'gyur//ya/rnal 'byor dbang po gang yang 'dod//de ni sgrib pa med par bya//mnyam par ma gzhag rnal 'byor
256a3(rgyud): gyis/rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur//ba/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas//ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa//sgrol gros dang mo gos pa//der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas//dz+ra/sgyu ma//
256a4(rgyud): lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis//dngas dag kun las rnam par rol//sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du//gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas//yo/rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
256a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur//rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro ma//gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid//ShI/dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na//bya dang bya min rnam spangs te//
256a6(rgyud): b+he/pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis bzhin//ngo bo nyid zhes gos mi 'gyur//b+ha/yon tan+da brgyad dang nyer ldan pas//sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing //'jig rten khams ni ma lus
256a7(rgyud): bar//bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spyod//gi/gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi//de yi khyim ni na mkha' nyid//bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis//de nyid du ni rtag tu rol//Shu /'di la
256a8(rgyud): snang ba dbye ba la//thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi//'jog rten tha snyad byas pa yis//ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir//gi sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag/'jig rten pas ni yongs
256b1(rgyud): brtags pa//lan gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis//ye shes gsum las 'byung ba'i///smyo dang gnas dang 'jog pa dang //srid pa bar mar gnas pa ste//dza da
256b2(rgyud): rten gyis brtags pa//sems kyi rlung ni rnam 'bru'o//ha/rgod dang rtse mo byed pa dang //grwar gyi nyams dgur ldan pa dang //sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa//rdo rje sems
256b3(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa'o//ra/bdag byin brlabs chen mo gtogs pa//rin chen gzhan dag 'din med//mo yis skyengs pa'i nor bu bzhin//rang bzhin 'ad gsal rnam pa'o//
256b4(rgyud): 'di skad la sogs dang po'i ngag/mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa//gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo//de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni//rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shes/
256b5(rgyud): sgrub pa'i de nyid shes pa ni//ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis//gang du gsal bar ma gsungaso//rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor pas//dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas
256b6(rgyud): gtab pa/de ltar rim pa 'di yis shes//sems can kun la phan bskyed pa'o//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las e pre ma yAM zhes
256b7(rgyud): bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nye na//nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog/nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams
257a1(rgyud): gang gis rnam par myur pa dang //rnam rtog bag chags sA bon+da no//phung po lnga yi bud shing dang //rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mas//rtag tu sbyin sreg rmang byung bya//lha dbus gnas pa'i sku
257a2(rgyud): tsam ni//sgra tsam phyi rol gsang brdzi//de la rang rgyud rlung gis ni//yongs su bskul ba'i me yis ni//dadang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor//blo zo brjid gsal byar rab tu 'bar//gang tshem
257a3(rgyud): gang gsang pad+ma//de la 'di ni snod du brjod//ho rno blo gas gzang zhes byar gsungs//rdo rje dgang gzang du ni brjod//thA ga thab khung zhes ni bshad//dbang po lnga yi srog rdzas dang //phung
257a4(rgyud): po yam shing du ni gyur//mar ni byang chub sems su bishad//gnam stong nas brtsams nya' bar//ji srid byed pa gshegs su gsol//me thab thig le tsam du gsungs//blugs gam
257a5(rgyud): nam yang mi 'be bo//sangs rgyas gti mug dgu' la sogs//gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal skyes rnams//khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni//rtag tu sbyin sreg gis tshim bya//rdo rje sems
257a6(rgyud): dpa' mchod pa gang //de yang dgang blugasu ni brjod//hUM phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis//tshi ga bzhin du sreg blugos dbul//de yis lus gnas mnyes 'byur //lha yi dran
257a7(rgyud): tshig bla na med//yid la ji ltar 'dod rnams//de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni//sbyin sreg 'di ni mchog tu gsungs//dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol//rnal 'byor chen po'i
257b1(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug cu tha ma pa'o////de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//bdud
257b2(rgyud): rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni//dngos grub kun byed de nyid mchog/ji ltar rigs pa'i rim po bzhin//rnam snang mdzod dang mi bskyod dang //den yod grub dang 'di dpag med//ri na
257b3(rgyud): chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni//bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid//khrag ni rin chen dbang phyug dang //byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med//de bzhin don yod grub pa sha/mi bskyod de/
257b4(rgyud): bzhin rdo rje chu//dri tshan rnam snang mdza du bshad//de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog/bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben//sgra yi tsher ma rnam par spangs//de la khang pa
257b5(rgyud): bya ba ni//khang pa nyes brtseg sgo dang bcas//sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing //gzhan dag de yi steng du bya//gzhan ni gsangs nas bya ba ste//'jig rten pa ni gcig tu sh+le/
257b6(rgyud): sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing //sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba/brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang //yul la phra dag rnam par spongs//sgrub po gtso ba'i stan gang //
257b7(rgyud): de lta du nyid sgrub bregs mchog/chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs//brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang //khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang //mang du thos shing yang//
258a1(rgyud): da///g+h+ra d+ha gAHsa ka yi na las//zlas bu sos kyis dag byug//gnad mangs sgyul 'jam phrag gcog/rdzu sngags pas bzla bad+ha ng+tha/A s+sa d+hAn satwA d+hAn
258a2(rgyud): phaT/oM brih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pA ya hUM hUM phaT/oM m+b+ha nA ya ho b+haM ga bAn bid+d+he dza~M hUM hU~M phaT//de nas zla gcig yi ge gsum//sgrub pas mi skye bzlas pa
258a3(rgyud): bya//kun tu bzang po 'gro ba'i gtso//de ni skad cig rmi lam mthong //des ni bka' yas bsgo ba ni//ka nI mchog ni rten gyis la//sems can dan ni mtshungs med byas//ji ltar de
258a4(rgyud): nyid rdo rje 'chang //bu mo skal ldan mig yangs ma//gzugs dang lang chos rnam par rgyun//brkam tshigs med cing chags bcas sems//sdig pas myos shing bsgyings dang /
258a5(rgyud): bcas//nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba//rnam rtog med cing mang du thos//sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya//ji srid khu ba dang bcas gyur//de nas gdong ni pad+ma gnyi sa///
258a6(rgyud): gnyis ka 'byung ba blings nas ni//pad+ma'i snod dAr bzhag par bya//mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du//glang po rta khya ba la dri mo//dpying zla tha chungs gnyis ka shar//skye gnasanA
258a7(rgyud): tun+da ni/de bzhin da ru rim pa bzhin//bde snod de nyid la ni der//zhag bdun bar du bzhag par bya//nyin zhig nyi shu rtsa gcig tu//yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya//'du 'jo mer
258b1(rgyud): cing dben pa'i gnas//tsAn dan bzang po byugs nas ni//dzaHhU~M baM hoHye sngags bkod pa'i//pad+mo'i snod la banag par bya//ra ya 'o mu til gyi mur/
258b2(rgyud): mar dang li kha dkar po dang //chu bsnyams bskol ba byas nas ni//de dang lhan cig snod zhig bsgre//rgya shug tshig gu ched tsam gyis//blo dang ldan pas ril bu bya//grib me
258b3(rgyud): la ni brkam byas nas//rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bor bya//rdo rje ming sring spun dang ni//rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'//zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag/mdzo' bo rnams
258b4(rgyud): dang yang dag bsgo//mar ngo'i tshes brgyad ches bcu'am//yang na bcu bzhi nas brtsams te//de la gtor ma bya ba ni//las kun la ni bla na med//de las kyang ni dngos
258b5(rgyud): grub skye//phyag rgya chen po mngon rdzogs dang //dngos grub rgyas dang zhi ba sogs//de yis 'brad mi dgos por thob//rlung gi de nyid yang dge slog/mkha' spyod nyid
258b6(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas
258b7(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon//tshogs kyi 'khor los chog ma chag/gang gis mchod pa las byung ba//rgyal sras rnams kyi dngos grub mchog/rnal 'byor tshe dang /
259a1(rgyud): lhan cig tu//sgrub pa'i phyir ni yang dag gnas//phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing //de dang dam tshig la ni 'jug/de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang //tshogs kyi 'khor lo zhes ni
259a2(rgyud): brjod//kun kyang dam tshi go la gnas pa//rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs//bla ma la dang dam tshig gnas//gtong sogs yon tan+da rnams kyis rgyan//thabs shes bya ba bgegs///
259a3(rgyud): med na//tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug/gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te//'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur//shes rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs//mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu
259a4(rgyud): mkhas//lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon//lhag pa yongs su spangs nas ni//thabs dang so sor shes rab dang //kun la gcig ni phan yon med//thog ma yid 'ong nyams dga' bar//me
259a5(rgyud): tog gi ni dkyil 'khor bya//de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni//legs par mnyam par gzhag nas mchod//gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod//
259a6(rgyud): tshogs kyis mchod pa byas rjesA la//dkyil 'khor lu 'byung lugs bzlog pas//dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni//mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni//bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig/
259a7(rgyud): rten dang //'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya//gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa//mtshan phyed na ni dgug par bya//slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod//ji ltar gangadan stengs
259b1(rgyud): gzugs gsol nas//gdun ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi//phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan//rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang //mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs//
259b2(rgyud): 'khor ba ni gzhan rnams dang //de bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa byazhig/dkyil 'khor ba bzhin shes par bye//tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang //rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang /
259b3(rgyud): mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang //rkang pa la sogs skyong ba dang //yang dang yang du ldang ba ni//de la dus kun du mi bya//phyag rgya brda'i tshogs rnams kyis//bya zhing byab
259b4(rgyud): shes par bya//shes bzhin du ni gar dang glu//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya//gtso bo la ni snod kyi mchog/dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang //de mod dum bugasu
259b5(rgyud): pa la//me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod//lha yi chung la sogs pa gang //legs par mnyam par bzhug ste dbul//tshogs rnams la yang so sor snod//me tog
259b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis yongs gang ba//thog mar glator ma chen po sbyin//sngon bzhin bzang ba la sogs ldan//gang gis dga' ba rnams nyams pa//de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o//yang
259b7(rgyud): dang yang du phyag byas nas//phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya//de nas bza' ba thams cad ni//sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyangs//oM dang AHdang hUM gis ni//sbyang
260a1(rgyud): dang sad dang rtogs par bya//gur gum tsan dan dpa' bo dang //gangs dang ri dgas lte ba dang //'di ni dag byed dadud rtsi lnga//bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod//sbom po ming med sbyor ba
260a2(rgyud): yis//dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin//gang gis lce rtses myang bar bya//pad+ma'i dbus dus kun tu//kho la sems ni rnam par bkod//bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya//pad+ma'i lte ba'i
260a3(rgyud): dbus la ni//dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod//dpa' bo'i don gyis mtshan nyid rnams//gal te dpa' bo mi shes na//dngos grub thams cad gsol ba yi//'khor lo de
260a4(rgyud): yi 'bras bu med//de lta'i rim pa cung zad gang //phyi nang bdag nyid yang dag spyod//de cis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur//tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ster//rnal 'byor ma dang
260a5(rgyud): lhan cig 'dres//rab tu bshad kyis de nyon cig/gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro mo 'ga' zhig/sems rtogs pa yi phyir 'ongs nas//de la de tshe smra ba yang //sgrub pa pos ni
260a6(rgyud): mi bya zhing //tshig tsam gyis kyang lan mI gdab//bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgya bya//de la cung zad bya smre gang //slob dpon rang nyid kyi ni bya//yang na bya ba thams cad
260a7(rgyud): kyi//las kyi rdo rje yang dag spyad//gang phyir gang nyid rdo rje sems//las kyi rdo rje gzhan 'go' med//sna tshogs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma//yang dang yong du dgug par bya//de la
260b1(rgyud): g.yo bar spyod pa med//slob dpon dpa' ba bzhin du spyod//gang yang skyon gyi spyod pa ni//de yi lus ni ltung bar 'gyur//shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes//
260b2(rgyud): bka' bsko gar gyi spyad pa bya//rdo rje bcing bas de yang bya//lha rnams ji ltar mnyes pa nyid//ma myo sring mo bu mo 'am//gal te mchod par 'dod pa na//shes rab thabs kyi
260b3(rgyud): cho ga yis//rtog pa med par bstan par bya//rab mchog de yi dngos grub ni//thob par 'di la the tsom med//lhag ma gtor ma blangs nas ni//dgon pa chen por song nas
260b4(rgyud): dor//k+ShaM uts+tshiSh+Ta k+She tra bA lA ya swA hA//sngags brjod bya//gal te de la rab byed pa'i//rnal 'byor ma ni slar yang mthong //de ltar de ni yongs shes nas//rnal 'byor pa yi/
260b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid mchog/gang gi gdong nr-i 'bar ba'i 'od//zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes pa dang //smin ma ring ba de shes bya//'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung //de la pad+ma'i phyag/
260b6(rgyud): rgyu bstan//rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin//mchu slo mgo dkyus ring ba dang //kha dog ser po yid 'brog pa//'od yi dpral bar yi ge gsum//ji srid skra mtshams bar du
260b7(rgyud): gnas//g.yul du 'tsho ba rnams kyis ni//'dzum dag la ni rtag tu nyan//'di 'dra'i mkha' 'gro mthong na ni//mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya//rkang pa g.yon pa bskum
261a1(rgyud): pa dang //de yi bar byed rab tu ston//g.yon pas yongasu bskor nas ni//phyag rgya lan gyis bstan par bya//sna tshogs pa yi gos la'ang dga'//rin chen 'byung ldan rigs lus
261a2(rgyud): byung //kha dog gnag tsong gos kyang gnag/skra ni 'khyil cing der gyis bcings//dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yis//de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni//rtag tu de ni sems g.yo ba//
261a3(rgyud): ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags//dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya//de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya ston//mi bskyod rigs las byungany+dzal+le/mtshan mo'i sa nas 'gro ba'i mchog/thung ngu lto sngon/
261a4(rgyud): kha dog dkar//byin pa sbom zhing shin tu mdzes//sa spyod mar ni shes par bya//dung gi phyag rgya la ni yino//rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung //mig yangs rdzi ma stug
261a5(rgyud): pa dang //yan lag kun la ba spus rgyan//sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang //yan lag phra zhing dpung pa ring //de ni mkha' 'gro ma ru grags//don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung /
261a6(rgyud): de 'dra ba yi rab mthong nas//bu den gyi ni phya ge rgyu dang //g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'i lan yin no//de ltar 'bad pas shes nas ni//mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni//de la cung zhig
261a7(rgyud): 'jigs mi bya//gang phyir de nyid gang mchod bya//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtog pa las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i chog dang //rnal 'byor ma dang 'dre ba'i
261b1(rgyud): le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang ba shad kyis ton//gsang ba'i tshig gi bshad pa dang //rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams//
261b2(rgyud): rigs kun las byung rnal 'byor ma//mtshan ma 'du ba'i dam tshig ni//'di 'dra ba yi tshig rnams dang //de lta bu yi gsang ba ni//bshad kyis dang pa'i sems kyis nyon//sa po te//
261b3(rgyud): kaM changad 'thung ba//be ra sha ru mngon par brjod//na li ni pa taM thod dang //ku laM laM mi'i rus pa'i rgyan//kun du raM 'dod yang dag sbyor//tsa r-i ro drug bza' ba'o//saM pu taM
261b4(rgyud): dbang po gnyis sbyor ba//a li gang yod pa yi ming //shang rim ga kaM skal yod shes//tse tra kaM ni skal mang shes//ru sha raM ni zhu bor shes//me ga ma dam bla rtsir brjod//
261b5(rgyud): tsan dra ma ni khrag tu bshad//ga naM bshang bar yongasu grags//g+ha nAM sha chen du ni bshad//ni dza da du ra ru brjod//b+hA ha naM ni chu ru bshad//bak+saM yan lag rab tu bshad//shu paM
261b6(rgyud): bzang po zhes ni brjod//ho ni tshim pa wA naM grags//marga ltogs pa ru ni brjod//g+hi taM laM du bshad pa dang //byo ma go naM pha rol dpung //ka ma ya ni gyis shig brjed//na ga rI ni
261b7(rgyud): bdag lus brjed//ba ta ka ni nyos shes brjod//a dzaM ya ni me zhes brjed//sha khaM za ba zhes ni brjod//r-i gam 'dor ni cho ga brjod//sha ta kaM mi bza' ba brjod//ci 'dra
262a1(rgyud): shA sngags zhos brjod//sha m+b+hi 'tshong sha zhes 'arjod//ro ba kun tA par bshad//kA ya 'di na myu rigs brjod//rag rje rigs zhus ni ba shad//bai d+han dmangs rigs nga
262a2(rgyud): tsab rigs dran zhes ni brjod//shau ri sle sha can du brjod//b+hU ba tsakr-i ki la lcags mkhan//khad+ma ko mo ro sgeg ma ru bshad//sa mAn tra ni rgyal por brjod//mi ro ma'i ring du brjod//
262a3(rgyud): gang zhes ni bshad//dim+b+ha pag ces brjod par bya//pa la shA minya zhes brjod//di na mAr skyes bu ni bshad//nag tu sbyin skrag tu ni bshad//mar+d+ha a hA 'dab chags brjid//
262a4(rgyud): ni me tog brjod//shi drul la ni sngo su bshad//mU la trI nr-i dr-iR+sha bshad//sha ku ni kau m+barar+ya mar bshad/shaM kaun gsu bshad//ka sa ra ni gdod du brjod//bau d+hI dril bzhes
262a5(rgyud): zo shad//ma la sprin mar yang dag glegs//ko ba la yin mgo tu shes//UM dar ni so brjod//phel la ba ni margyu ru shes//pa shwa mgrin pa ni grags//hUM saM phrag pa chu
262a6(rgyud): bshad//a gu ro ni dpung par brjod//so so runi lag par bshad//shrI pa ya ni nu mar brjod//dze ti pa laM rkang par brjod//da la naM ni lte bar brjod//pad+ma dza lam gsang pa'i nga
262a7(rgyud): ka ti ba ka ra ng+ka gnyis//bi sa rje nga dun bshad//tshwa gan ni rkang par brjod//bar oM ka ke sa ra//sen ma zhes ni yang dag bshad//pad+me gar ni ga ni snang //shakra ku su lan
262b1(rgyud): /stan//shag tu bu shes bya bar brjod//na la ni nA la ston med//go bgra Sh+ma lam thams cad brjod//sa ga raM ni rgas par bshad//a laM ro ni zhim por
262b2(rgyud): brjod//a k+Sha raM rim mi zhing bshad//mI gai mau smra bar ni bshad//pa go la mu daM glu len//mi tri gar zhes bya bar brjod//shap+ta tshul 'cho su ni bshad//s+phar sha zhags
262b3(rgyud): par rab tu grags//rangs sgeg mo yi ro 'bebs ma//ru paM ri yi rtse mo'o//tra ne ha ni bsad par bshad//pA rA pa ta 'chi bar brjod//ta ma lA ko se ma yul//pha laM gong
262b4(rgyud): khyer du ni brjod//pra na grong du bshad pa yin//th+ya n+ya srog ces bya bar bshad//ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad//na ya na ni rnam shes brjod//a b+hi na ba dgod par
262b5(rgyud): bshad//ru d+hi ra ni 'ching bar brjod//ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad//kan nya mtshan mor rab tu grags//des nyi ma phyed du bshad//da pi mtshan gyi cha ru grags//rnal
262b6(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon///
262b7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyis dkyil 'khor ni//sku ni mgo bor gnas pa ste//sum cu rtsa gnyis byang sems 'bag//de ni so sor rab phya bas//sku yi 'khor lo ru zhes bya//yi
263a1(rgyud): phyi mo'i dbye ba yis//gsung la gnas par rab tu shes//rmugs sogs bar chags dbye ba yis//thugs kyi 'khor lo ru ni shes//sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni//sdud
263a2(rgyud): chen po khyod nyon cig/rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la//rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas//dang po sku yi rdo rje ni//gzugs phung la ni yang dge bzhugs//de rjes na mkha' rdo rje ni//
263a3(rgyud): tshe ra ba yi ni phung por bzhugs//bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni//'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs//las rnams kyi rdo rje ni//'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs//bcom ldan thugs
263a4(rgyud): kyi rdo rje ni//rnam shes phung por yang dge bzhugs//yang 'di'i sha sogs khams la//bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhug so//khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni/bac+doMs
263a5(rgyud): yum mA ma bzhugs//dro ba la sogs me khams la//bcom ldan 'das yumi gos dkar bzhugs//mi bskyod la sogs rlung khams la/bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma
263a6(rgyud): bzhugs//de mig dbang po gnyis la ni//de bzhin gshegs pa sa snying po//de yi rna ba'i dbang gi nyes la//bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o//de yi sna bug gnyis la ni//de
263a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i mdzod//de yi lce yi dbang la bzhugs//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang //de yi yid kyi dbang po la//de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyang
263b1(rgyud): bzhugs//khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu na//lus shes bya bar brtags pa la//sgrib pa thams cad rnamasal ba//de bzhin gshegs pa de bzla
263b2(rgyud): so//lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la//de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o//ldag po g.yas pa'i rtsa bar ni//de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed//lag pa g.yon//
263b3(rgyud): pa'i rtsa bar ni//de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub//kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no//gsang ba'i gan su bzhugs pa ni//de bzhin gshegs
263b4(rgyud): pa bdud rtsi 'khyil//dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bya//dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal//
263b5(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni//de bzhini gshegs pa dbyug pa sngo//dbus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che//rang gi mgo stongs
263b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor las bsgyur//rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te/lus ni 'dri nyid kun la 'dir//de bzhin//
263b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs//sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku//rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'a
264a1(rgyud): u pa med pa sangs rgyas sgra//smyol+la'adi la rnal 'byor//mya ngan 'das pa myur du yon// dge ba yongs sbyin nu//de blas da //dpon gyi// ma pa tham sa cad/
264a2(rgyud): mthong na rderte ni yod pahU~M/ phyi mo'i dus na sems dpa' rgyu//dngas sems can thams cad kyi//lha yi mchod mi byed kyis//rab tu 'byed /m+b+ha bsten//de nas mthod
264a3(rgyud): yod bcas//byang chub sems dpa' glags pa che//dga' zhing mgu bas phyug byas te//bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blugs//gsung dang thugs kyi dkyi pa'i khar bzhugs//leg sa
264a4(rgyud): bya ba byin nas ni//bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs//oM A i s+yAM u s+thA dang //re rA ma lpA e ai//e oM a iHdbyangs zhes bya/ka tsan ta pra sne tshan/
264a5(rgyud): ro la shA Sha sa//ha dang gsung gi dkyil 'khyer shes//dag kun rab tu s+t+waM dang sbyin//'dad chags la sogs byug chags kyang //glangs n+niny+tsi shu brgyud kyis//thug
264a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pas//dpal mchog lus ni shes par bya//de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//rdo rje gsum nr-i dam tshig mchog/mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa
264a7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa los sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste d+ha cu rtsi bzhi pa'o//
264b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang //bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang //rdo rje 'chang dang skyob ma yi//mtshan nyid thams cad
264b2(rgyud): bsdus pa ni//dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur//chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs//sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste//byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gnas//sangs rgyas yi//
264b3(rgyud): ge hrI du bshad//gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod/dge 'dun zhes bya yi ge au//kun nasde 'phro ba'i bdag nyid//sangs rgyas a ba d+hU tIr 'gyur//chos kyang la la nA ru
264b4(rgyud): brjod//dge 'dun ra sa nA ru brjod//'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid//gzugs med khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur//gzugs kyi khams ni chos dang ni//'dod khams dri
264b5(rgyud): bzhin dge 'dun te//de ltar khams gsum mtshan nyid mchog/snying por gyur pa rang srog las//khams gsum na ni gzhan med de//sgyu ma rlung gi khams gsum pa//rmi laM/
264b6(rgyud): rmi lam bzhin du mthong //khams gsum bdag nyid de bzhin du//gcig pur myur ba mthong bar 'gyur//byin gyis brlabs nas dri bzhin nyid//dngos grub myur du thab
264b7(rgyud): par 'gyur//sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//dam pa'i chos dang chos kyi sku//dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur//de ni sku gsung bdag nyid can//snang ba
265a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs//chos ni snang ba thob pa'o//dge 'dun snang ba mchod par 'gyur//de nI snang ba gsum mtshan nyid//zhi ba la sogs lus la byung //sngags dang rnal 'byad
265a2(rgyud): cha rnams shes//cho ga nyi shu bya ba bslabs//de ni bla mar mngon par brjod//tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong //bzod dang brtson 'grus mchog tu ljon//nyin dang mchin du
265a3(rgyud): sgrom la zhe na//shes rab ljon zhing bzo la mkhas//bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshigs//dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod//nang gi gsang 'dus la rab dga'//phyi rol nyan
265a4(rgyud): thos la spyod pa//de lta'i min ngag rim pa yis//slob ma rnams la rjesu bslab//de ni ston par yongasu gsungs//de skad smras pa de bzhin byed//rtog pa rnams dang dkyil
265a5(rgyud): 'khor cho gos//dam pa'i don gyis bya ba dang //slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni//rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la//slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug/de ni slob dpon zhes bya'o//
265a6(rgyud): de nyid bcu ni yongasA shes nas//dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes//slob ma rjes sdud nus pa dang //gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang //shes rab ji snyed yang dag ldan/
265a7(rgyud): rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs//zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan//rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog/tshar gcod pan 'dogs pa la mkhas//de ni rdo rje 'chang du beshad//
265b1(rgyud): dad cing bla ma la yang gus//rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas//gnyis med sgyu yang med pa dang //rtog pa dran pa rnam par spangs//lung ni mang du thos pa/
265b2(rgyud): dang //gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs//sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos//kun tu brtson dang yang dag ldan//de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan//dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang
265b3(rgyud): stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa//gang la de nyid nges shes bya//gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog/sngags dang rnal 'byor ri pa sogs//yis lnga ni rnam dag dang //sangs rgyas lnga
265b4(rgyud): ni rang bzhin nyid//mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis//snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang //chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang //sku gsum rnam par bsgom pa dang //bde chen /
265b5(rgyud): yon tan mtshan nyid ni//dgo' ba la sogs dbye ba dang //de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni//rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang //shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cha///
265b6(rgyud): dang po sbyar ba mdor bsdus pas//de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog/'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni//rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor
265b7(rgyud): dang //bde gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis la sogs//gang la rgyas pa shad de nyid rgyud//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod//yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud//thos sogs yon tan
266a1(rgyud): mchog gi ni//rten drang snod ces bya bar gsungs//mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyan pa dang //ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni//sa yi snod du bzhag mi bya//de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/
266a2(rgyud): snod min dag la sbyin mi byi//slob ma skad cig de la 'chi//'di dang pha rol du ni phung //snod min man ngag rab bshad na//slob dpon dang sa grub nyams par 'gyur//rnam
266a3(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpa' rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga bapo//
266a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs//slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni//zhi ba la sogs bya ba yang //sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi//lham dang gdugs drang gtsug tor dang //so rtsil
266a5(rgyud): sogs myang ba dang //snabs kyi gong bu mchil mo sogs//'dor zhing rkang pa skyong ba dang //gzhan du blta dang spyi btol smra//nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang //rgyan la sogs pa
266a6(rgyud): blta ba dang //bag med par ni smra ba dang //bra ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang //de la sogs pa skon gyi tshogaso//bla mo'i mdun du rnam par spangs//'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni//
266a7(rgyud): spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod//rab bdag kun gtong dam bcas pas//ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pas//slob mas bla ma'i mdun gnas bya//gal te dngos gru bo mchog 'dod
266b1(rgyud): bla mA'i mdun du slob ma rnams//de lta bu sogs spyod zhes bya//dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa//de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o//de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni//
266b2(rgyud): khri mas bstan par bya ba'i rigs//de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya//thun mong tshi ga'i mtshan nyid ni//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis//zla ba yor gyi ngo la bya//dbang dang mngon spyod
266b3(rgyud): kyi ni las//zla ba mar gyi ngo la brtsams//byang du kha bltas zhi ba la//de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta//drag po'i las la lho phyogasu//dbang gi las lo nub du blta//gsod
266b4(rgyud): pa nyid la ma yaM phyogs//sdang bar bya la bdon bral du//gnas nas bskad la rlung gi phyogs//rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs//zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste//rgyas pa la ni ser
266b5(rgyud): po bya//dbang dang dgug pa la ni dmor//kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o//byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la//dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la//chags pa'i sems kyis
266b6(rgyud): dbang dag la//khro ba'i sems kyis gsod pa'o//zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya//de bzhin rgyas par snga dro bya//dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi lus//nye mgung dang mtshan
266b7(rgyud): phyed la'o//de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad//sngags kyi rgyud gsungs mtshan nyid kyis//zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad do//blo ldan cho ga bzhin du sgrub//rnal 'byor
267a1(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan po ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas gzhan
267a2(rgyud): yang bshad kyis nyon//khro bo bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid ni//gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub bshad//thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//khro ba'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni//khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes
267a3(rgyud): ni brjod//yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams//sngags bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis//khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya//dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu stsol//'jig su rung ba'i dur khrod du//
267a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pA'i gnas//skyes bu thod pa khrag gis gos//rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blangs//skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang //bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni//de na bsgrub/
267a5(rgyud): bya'i rnam pa dang //gsal dang 'jigs bsgrag pa dang //g.yon brkyang pa yis mnan nas ni//zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du//gshin rje gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni//dngos gru
267a6(rgyud): rgyur ni bzlas par bya//na maHsa man+ta kA ya bag tsit+ta badz+ra NAM//oM kha kha khA hi khA hi//sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa twa da mra kA/a saM mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hasta/kha Da ga bA ma ta rA tsa ni haSh+Ta/tsa tu r-i mu
267a7(rgyud): ko/ t+ye cu po//Ta tsiraH/a gats+tsha A gats+tsha/sarba duSh+Ta pra NA a bi tIr /ma hAHd+hI g+h+nAM ta ka/be kr-i ta A naM/sair+b+ba b+hUta b+hA ya ke ra/adzaT saT Ta tres rbA din hU~M b+h+yan+da na no//
267b1(rgyud): /T+Ta//sa na ku ru ku ru/s+yAn+ma kar+m+ma Ni/ts+tshan+nats+tshin+da/sar+b+ba man d+hau/b+hin+da b+hiny+dza/pa ra mu dA na/A kAR+ShA ya A kAR+ShA ya/sar+b+ba b+hU tAM/ma tha ma tha/ni ma tha naR+Ya tha/sarba duSh+mA
267b2(rgyud): pra be sha ya pra be shwa ya/maN+Dal ma d+h+ye/bai be sh+tsi tA/dzI bi ti en+ta kA ku ru /daM ha de ha/pra tsa bitsaM/mAM bi lim+ba mAM bi laM gas mo yaM ma nu sma ra hUM hUM/tardza ya khe bA na/
267b3(rgyud): phaT phaT/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/kA ra kA ro/sar+b+ba A na na bI ra pU rA ya/hi hI b+ha ga bAM/kin+ti rA ya si na/na maHsar+b+ba at+man se twA ya hUM phaT swA hA/thog mor khro bo wa~M bzlas pa 'di//dang/
267b4(rgyud): du bya dang dgug pa mchog/bskrad par rab tu bshad par bya//khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa yang //skye tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang //dug dang da du rA khu ba//bsdigs mdzub//
267b5(rgyud): khrag dang bsres nas su//dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni//zla ba phyed pa lta bu mchog/rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya//da de bus sgrub pa'i ming
267b6(rgyud): dris la//g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni//sngags ni yongasu bzla bar bya//sngor bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkug nas//mtshan phyed kyi ni dusu ni//kun nas zhag bdun bar du
267b7(rgyud): byabyebya//bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur//na maHsa man+ta ka ya bAke tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/na mo badz+ra kr-i d+hA ya/ma hA daMSh+Tota ka Ta b+hai ra ba yaM//a si mu se la pe ra shu pA sha hastA ya/
268a1(rgyud): au a mr-i ta kur+d+ha laM//ga ga bA hi khyA hi/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/bAn+tha ban+d+ha/hA na ha na/da ha da hA/gar+dz+dza gar+b+hA/s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/sar+b+bA bib+hA bi nA lA kA na/mA hA ga NA pa ti/dzI bi ta an+ta
268a2(rgyud): ra ya hUM phaT swA hA//sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni//bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yi//zhi ba'i las ni bshad bya//gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ni//khro bo gsum pa
268a3(rgyud): /bzlas nus ni//me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed//lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis//de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya//bsgrub bya'i mgo la lag gnyis kyis//rlabs la de la zhags/
268a4(rgyud): nas ni//bsgrub bya'i snying la de gnyis kyi sgo//'byung po sreg par bsam par bya//myi dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i//'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya//na maHsa mAn+ta kA ya b+h+ya/
268a5(rgyud): kA tsid+d+ha badz+rA NAM/oM A baR+Sha dzI rI ti ri tI r-I dza~M hUM Ta/che ge mo 'byung ba'i gdon las grol bar mdzad cig/d+hIHdrug sel ba'i sngags kyis ni/bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig ni khro /
268a6(rgyud): rta mgrin bzlas pas ni//yang dag mi mtshungs pa yi mchog/bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum rtseg sgom/snying khar zla gnas ye shes sems//de yi 'od zer gyis rab ga /
268a7(rgyud): bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam//rab tu 'bar ba de yis dug/de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni//zla ba haM gis rnam par rgyan//kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod//
268b1(rgyud): de ltar sgrub pa po la bya//hU d+hI dzik+ShAM sA d+ha dgod//las rnams kun ni 'grub par byed//bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te//rkang pa'i mtha' yi bar du/
268b2(rgyud): bsgom//chu rgyun rgyun mo 'chad pa ni//drug ni 'ag bat+l-i rim pa yis//'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste//rta mgron du ni mngon par brjod//na maHsa man+ta kA ya b+hA ka
268b3(rgyud): tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/oM hwA hUM hUM/ta ru lA bi ru lA/sar+b+ba bi ShA g+hA ta ka ta ka dz+wa li ti bi s+phu li ka/aT Ta hA sa nA da sa hI tA/kaM sa ri sa ho pa taM ad de badz+ra khu ra g+h+r-i ti na/tsi ta
268b4(rgyud): pa su d+hi te la ni shwA sa ma ru ta u ta k+Ship+ta d+ha ra Ne d+hA ra//bi ShA nr-i aT+Ta hA sa a pa ra ma ta wa la pa rA kra ma Ar+ye ga b+hi ti/bud d+ha bud d+ha/ha ya grI ba kha kha ts+tshin+na ts+tshin+da/A be
268b5(rgyud): sha ya/sar+b+ba gre hai l+ya/a pra tI hA ho b+hU wa/badz+ra da maSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA yaM si I daM duSh+Ta gra haM daM Sh+Ta/sar+b+baM pA/d+hu ne d+h+yA naM/ma tha ma tha/mAr da mar daM/bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma ra d+hai/bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM
268b6(rgyud): b+he a nu dz+nyA na kar+yaM ku ru swA hA//che ge me'i dug la sogs pa sil bar mdzod cig h+na zhes bya ba dang sngags spel//rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te//lhag ma rgyas por shes pa
268b7(rgyud): bya//rnala'i'abyor chen po'i rgyu de dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las khro bo'i bzlas pa dang zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgya dkyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o///
269a1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya//dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/dngos grub la srogs mtshan nyid ni//sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang /
269a2(rgyud): dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang /byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang /yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel//mig dang rna ba yid dang lus//rtsa'i 'khor lo byin gyis brla'o//mtshan gsum nyin
269a3(rgyud): mo de dang 'dra//mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed//bzhi pa yis ni dbang bskur bas//blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur//snang ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur//nyin mo snang ba ma
269a4(rgyud): pa'o//mchims ni snang ba thob pa'o//de ltar snong la sogs mtshan nyid//mchin min mtshams dang nyin mo min//kun tig rlung ni spong bar byed//de ni skad cig mngon byang
269a5(rgyud): chub//mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod//tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am//dbus min 'byung ba 'ang dbusu 'byung ba 'am//mtha' min 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung
269a6(rgyud): ba 'am//de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs glang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing //zad med 'phel med dngos med min//ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo
269a7(rgyud): mtshar min//gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min//gang zhig yod deng med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral//bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin//bsod/
269b1(rgyud): sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa//de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs//skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub//mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig
269b2(rgyud): mcho ga/rdo rje rtse mo byung sems ni//'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid//de yis de nyid byang chub sems ni//rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas//rigs pas steng du byed pa ni//rgas pa med
269b3(rgyud): par the tsom med//hU~M ho rim bzhin shes pa ni//'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel//sngar bshad pa yi bdud rtsi lnga//'di ni bcud kyis lan du brjod//'di nyid kyi ni grub par
269b4(rgyud): byed//lcags kyi gser 'gyur byas nas ni//rdo rje phyag rgya dngos grub che//zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyur//bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang //de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim
269b5(rgyud): po yang //gang la de gnyis gtsog 'gyur pa//de ni zug du 'jug par bshad//'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das//rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni//grang du dngos po
269b6(rgyud): gcig 'gyur ba//zung du 'jug ces de la bshad//kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral//gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa//de ni zung du 'jug par
269b7(rgyud): bshad//rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas//rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni//rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod//sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur//ra dag la byin/
270a1(rgyud): rlarlobs rim pas kyang //dngos grub brgyud ni thob par 'gyur//rAdru ba la sogs dbye ba shes//mngon par byung rgyu'i rim pa thob//rlung 'jug rim pa lnga gnas pa//dngos phra thad
270a2(rgyud): rjes pa ni//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor pa yis the tsom ming//phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tsher//zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis//rnam rtog med par nu/
