270a3(rgyud): nas ni//thob pa 'di la the tsom med//lus ni gzhi la yas khang du 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyis yang dag brten//zur bzhi pa ni mdun rgyab dang //g.yas dang g.yon gyi byi
270a4(rgyud): bso//steng 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis//sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin//sna rtse ba ni yis dbyibs kyis ni//rta babs bzhi ni brjod par bya//dri ba rgyu mar yang dag bshad
270a5(rgyud): rgyas par gyur ba dra ba phyed/tsha ni zla ba byed pa dang //bum pa lto bar yang dag shes//rje dor brla dpung lag ngar ni//ka ba brgyad
270a6(rgyud): du yang dag bshad//mig ga rnam shes mi lcong stsog+sas//U yI rnam shes ral mo dang //sna yi rnam shes me tog phreng //rin chen po guste rnams shes/lus
270a7(rgyud): shi lnga pan dang //yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so//mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang //rna ba kuni nas rdo rje rnams//sna ni bi dan du ni bshed//lce ni dril bu muM ni gsongs//
270b1(rgyud): ba la sogs rnam drug pa//wam+b+ha tshogs zhes bya bar bshad//yod na dbus kyi madrar ga sungs//rnam rtog rlung ni yang dgra brten//yo shes lnga/
270b2(rgyud): nonam dag pa//re khA ltar ni yang dge brjod//phung po ldani rnam dag s+ho//rnam dag kha dog ni dan+d+he//de dag gzhal yas khang du ba sgom//dang po sbyor bar shes pa /
270b3(rgyud): //mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga//rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo gi//de nyid phyi rol gnas par brjod//dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o//khams bzhi'i rong bzhin bdag nyid
270b4(rgyud): ni//gzugs kyi phung po mding bsdus na//gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni//mig gi rnam shes sde snying po//phyi ro la gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad//byams pa rtsa rgyus dbus na/
270b5(rgyud): brlugs//de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis//shar dang lho yi mtsham su ni//me ljo ye shesu ni bshad//rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag nyid//bde dang sdug bsngal
270b6(rgyud): 'jigs dang skyo//tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod//chur ba chu yi khams dang ni//phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang //rna ba phyag ni rdo rjer bshid//rigs ni gaN+DIs po 'dris pa ni
270b7(rgyud): dri yirdo rje phyir mi 'gyur//sna yi rnam shes mkha' snying go//khro bo gnyis po rnam por shes//mi nya ma nyid chen tshon 'byung ba dang /des dang dngos med sogs 'du shes//
271a1(rgyud): snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can//'du shes phung po me khams dang //phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang //lho yi rnam shes 'jig rten mgon//de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis//de ni so
271a2(rgyud): rtog ye shes//'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung //dge dang mi dga'i las rnams kyis//bag chags 'du shes mtshan nyid ni//'du shes phung po rlung gi khams//phyi rol
271a3(rgyud): ro yi rdo rje dang //lus kyi rnam shes sgrib rnam stsol//kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs//de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis//bya ba nan tan grub yis//don yod grub pa'i/
271a4(rgyud): rigs las byung //dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni//ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod//rnam par shes pa na mkha'i khams//yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje//de bzhin khro/
271a5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po gnyis//shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings//mi bskyod pa yi rigs las byung //mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga//gzhal yas khang ni 'di dag bzhugs//
271a6(rgyud): de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis//rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya//skra rus phyi sa mchil ma snying //so ni rnam snang bdag nyid//spu dang gnag dang nye ba'i snying //sen mo chu
271a7(rgyud): yi kham su shes//rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi//rigs kyi rten du shes par bya//so dang lpags pa sha dang snying //me yi khams shes bya bar brjod//'od dpag
271b1(rgyud): med kyi rang bzhin dang //rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya//rgyas pa sha dang rtsibs logs snying //rlung ni don yod grub pa'o//dri ma rgyus pa mkhris pasnang
271b2(rgyud): de ni na mkha'i khamasu grags//mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin dang //snying ni rnam shi sa lnga zhes bya//re re la 'ang so sor ni//rnam pa lnga ni spro ba shes//de bo zhin gshegs pa'i
271b3(rgyud): phung po lnga//rlung gi bdag nyid rdzus phye ba//sha rtsa rgyus pa sha kham tshang //klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang //rus pa rkang dang snye ma dang //mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang //glo ba mcher
271b4(rgyud): ba gcin dang ni//bshang ba pho ba long ka dang //zho ga dang chu ser gnag dang ni//khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang //ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang //sen mo spu dang lpags pa
271b5(rgyud): dang //lag pa rkang mig yan lag sogs//mtshogs ma dpung pa zhes ni brjod//de dag rim par shes par bya//gzhal yas kheng ni rnam dag pas//de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni///
271b6(rgyud): mdor bsdus nasa? ni bshad par bya//pu lI ra ni mgo bor shes//spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra dang //rna ba g.yas po ur+yan dang //spyi bo'i rgya ba ni arbu da//gro dA ba ri rna ba g.yon//
271b7(rgyud): rA me shwa ri smin mi'i dbus//mig gnyis di bi ko Ta dang //mA la wa ni dpung pa'i rtsa//kA ma rU pa mchan khung gnyis//o dre nu ma gnyi su grags//ko sa la ni lte bar shes//tre sa/
272a1(rgyud): ku ni rna ba'i rtsa//kha yai pad+ma ka lIng ka/mAgrin pa le pra kArA ni brjod//snying ni kAn tsir shes par bya//hi ma la ya mdom su shes//mtshan ma br-i ha de ba dang //pyeta pu re bshang bar lam/
272a2(rgyud): brla gnyi su war+N+Na dwI pa//sau riSh+Ta ni byin pa gnyis//rkang pa'i rol ni sin du'i yul//ser mo rnams lan gA rA//mthe bong gnyis ni ma rung zhes//ku lu two nI rkang pa'i mtho la//de ltar gnas kyi rnam
272a3(rgyud): ngag dang //sa bcu rnam par dge ba nyid//de nyid dang ldan shes par bya//zhes drang longs spyod bdag nyid//'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis//rims kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid//de na/
272a4(rgyud): gzhan yang rab bshad pa//rlung rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid mchog/srog gi rlung ni snying khar gnas//mi bskyod bye brag rigs las skyes//mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni//rin chen
272a5(rgyud): 'byung ldan bye brag skyes//stong du rgyus pa lkog mthar gnas//'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no//me dong mnyam gnas lte bar gnas//don yod grub pa'i rang bzhino//khyab byed yan
272a6(rgyud): la ga ku ne la gnas//rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs//dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni//srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang //dus kun du ni rgyu ba ni//srog ces bya ba yin par bshad//
272a7(rgyud): srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang //de bzhin du ni khu bo sogs//'og 'dren 'di ni thur sel rlung //rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya//rgod dang za dang ldog pa dang //kun tu 'thung dang 'jib pa
272b1(rgyud): pa dang //bang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa//mnyam du gnas pa zhes byung brjod//gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang //bzla dang myung bral sogs pa/
272b2(rgyud): dang lhan cig 'byor pa dag/gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya//khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni//de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs//tshigs kun du ni khyab pa'i phyir//khyab byung zhes
272b3(rgyud): bya bar bshad//rlung gi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni//de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod//snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs//phan tshun du ni genod par byed//gzhan ni gzhon la 'a
272b4(rgyud): pa yin//stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis//gcig ni gcig la thim par 'gro//ji ltar zla ba bzas bzung la//rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba/snga ma bzhin du gang /
272b5(rgyud): nas gong //rang gri bdag nyid la thim par//btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed//ji ltar mos bsregs dngos med dang //rgyu med par ni thim par 'gro//slar ying srog gi sha
272b6(rgyud): ba//las kyi rlung ni sna tshogs pa//de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang //slar yang 'jig rten gsum du gnas//de la sna las dring de las skyes//de las chags sogs bag changs
272b7(rgyud): dang //de las slar yang 'chi dang skye//de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dre//sngon bzhin rdo rje zlas la srogs//rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur//de nas sems dpa' chen po kun/
273a1(rgyud): de nyid mig sman b+hur mya yis//thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba byas la//yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong //de nas yang yang phyag byas te//mtsho bcas mig gis bcom ldan la/
273a2(rgyud): lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas//rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod//oM ma kun 'gro kun dbang phyug/na mkha' dang ni mtshungs po brnyes//e ma 'o dam tshig de nyid gsum//ma
273a3(rgyud): tu rmad byung ston par mdzad//khams gsum las ni rnam par grol//chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid//'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa//dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshalo//phung //
273a4(rgyud): po rnams dang khams rnams dang //skye mched rnams la mi rten cing //srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol//dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//de ltar na mkha' gnas med cing //
273a5(rgyud): spros pa med cing gos pa med//mkho' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba//dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku//'jig rten gsum las rgyal
273a6(rgyud): gyur pa//'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos//bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni//'jig rten gsum gnas lha las rgyal//khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni//'jig rten gsum rgyal
273a7(rgyud): gtso bo yis//'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur/sa yi cha ni gang na 'di//rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i//rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud//dus kun tu ni spyod 'gyur nang //
273b1(rgyud): rgyun du de nyid rlung nyid kyis//khro bo cu yi swA dI las ni//rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la//spang ba'i don du yul 'khor de//rang rang phreng ba'i sngags kyi
273b2(rgyud): ni//de rnams la ni gtor mi dbul//sems can yongs gzung ba'i phyir//sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun tu//nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par
273b3(rgyud): 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//rnal 'byor tshun po'i rgyud
273b4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzog so////thugs dam sa'i snying po tha ling snying po dpal
273b5(rgyud): dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza nA shrI dz+nyA na dang //sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal
273b6(rgyud): snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa////rgya gar skad du/san d+hi b+hi ki ra NA nA ma tan+na/bod skad du/dgongs pra lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/bcom ldan
273b7(rgyud): 'das dpa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos//shin tu gsang ba'i dus gcig na//gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das//dam tshi ba mche ba ni
274b1(rgyud): rgyun du de nyid nang nyid kyis//khro bo bcu yisna de las ni//rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la//srung ba'i don du yul 'khor de//rang rang phreng ba'i sngags
274b2(rgyud): ni//de rnams la ni gtor mi dbul//sems can yongasu gzung ba'i phyir//sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dus kun tu//nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par
274b3(rgyud): 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa la//rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
274b4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogaso////thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal
274b5(rgyud): dpe med lhan gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shrI dz+nyA na dang //skra bskur gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po bod kyi lha btsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal
274b6(rgyud): snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa////rgya gar skad du/san d+hi b+hi ki ra NA nA ma tan+na/bod skad du/dgongs pra lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/bcom ldan
274b7(rgyud): 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos//shin tu gsang ba'i dus gcig na//gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das//dam tshig mchog ni
275a1(rgyud): rdorjegasam//do zhon /shogs kun ye shes no//yan tan na/tshogs bsam mi khyuH//yod ming mtha gnyis las 'das smras//gnas med pa la gnas zhes bya//m+b+ha 'a/
275a2(rgyud): bzhin gcog pa 'dre/kun ma sbyi ye shes rnam sgom pa//'gro snying rnam drag rjes bya'o//rtsub pa chen po bzhugs pa sbyin/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang //rnam par shes pa med
275a3(rgyud): gzugs//skye mched drug dang rog pa dang //tshor ba dang ni smad pa dang //nyir len srid po skye ba dang //rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin// rgyal che ba ring rgyal dang //nga'i snyam du rgyal mngon pa skye/
275a4(rgyud): gzhan yang de rgyal las nga rgyal//cung zad nga rgyal log pa bcas//'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i drang //
275a5(rgyud): da kyis mi lang nyid du gyur//sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i//ri ga rdul phran grangs mnyam pa//byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen//hrIl gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang //de bani
275a6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyi/namakha khams kuni gang bar snang //de nas dri la ldan rnam sna mdzad//A gi smang thugs kyi rdo rje na//'khor gyi la 'angar la gzigs nas/de nyid
275a7(rgyud): skyes skur mdzad/tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang //'dod dang rig byed de bzhin dru //chongs spyi de bzhin zla bste//phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam//sgra sgrogs de bzhin dag byed /
275b1(rgyud): skya bseng skem byed thub pa dang //sna yon drang ni dkon mchog gsum//de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid//de tshe phyung la gsol ba yi//gsang sngags glang /
275b2(rgyud): ba dang po nyid//thub chen byang chub sems tshul du//mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad//rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i//phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin//dbang bskur ba ni rnami//
275b3(rgyud): pa bzhi//gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa//srung ba'i bslab bzhi rnam bzhi dang //spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste//drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi//ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor///
275b4(rgyud): bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad//gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad//phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bsten//dmi tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin//rnam pa bcur phye yang dag
275b5(rgyud): rtog/bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin//bcu gcig ming du byung ba ni//phyag rgyas gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor//bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku//nyan thos byang
275b6(rgyud): chub ston par mdzad//de bzhin rig pa spyod grub pa//mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa//bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang //phreng spags bla ma ston par mdzad//phyogs dang sgyu
275b7(rgyud): bseng nyid 'gyur ba//dngos grub dkyil 'khor blo med pa'o//sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o//slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag/chags bral
276a1(rgyud): sna tshogs nyid gyur pa//sna tshogs tshigs gi don gyi brda'//sna tshogs ming can ming gcig bu//de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o//so sor sdus pa rab tu bstan//gcig dang du ma
276a2(rgyud): lis grol ba/yang dag mthong nas yongs su sgom//yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag/rten 'brel du yang mi bstan par bya//de nas mo skyes sbyor ba la//thub pa rnam par
276a3(rgyud): snang mdzad che//rten 'brel yan lug bcu gnyis pa'i//ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad//'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs//gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs
276a4(rgyud): 'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i//ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi//rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad//byang chub senga'i sede'i chi//rgyun de
276a5(rgyud): ni sbyor bar gyur//de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang //de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams//de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir//de rnams zhugs nas byang gyur pa///
276a6(rgyud): srog dang gyan rgyu thur sel dang //mnyan/gnas khyab byed ces bya dang //kla dang rul sbal rtsangs pa dang //lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba//'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad//dud
276a7(rgyud): med gzugasu skor skul te//rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du//de yi sku los byung bar gyur//de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las//rang gi gsang sngags de dge sgom//yin lag kun
276b1(rgyud): las ngos grol zhing //shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur//dbu gos mid las byung ba ni//TI gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste//dngos ma drang ba nyid yin pas//8/
276b2(rgyud): kyang ni mi she so//'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la//de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs//bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa//chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol//lceng
276b3(rgyud): bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams//dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud//'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pas//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes//gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na//'jig rten
276b4(rgyud): pa dang rtsod med cing //de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang //'jig rten shin tu 'dis de bzhin//gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos//zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba/byang chub sems dpal
276b5(rgyud): thos na yang //de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed//de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//mgon po rnam snang chen po la//de dag gis ni zhus gyur
276b6(rgyud): pa//gang shes bla med byang chub ni//mi 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i//gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba//rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol//lan gnyis gsol
276b7(rgyud): yang mngon po ni//me gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs//rdo rje can gyis de shes nas//de nas slar yang nus par 'gyur//gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i//rnal 'byor zab
277a1(rgyud): mo bla med pa//de ni 'di ltar bsngags pas bsngags//'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs//bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang //rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang //lung ni yang dag
277a2(rgyud): gang yin pa//de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs//zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//gsang sngagaso tshul ni mchog gyur 'di//gsang ba khyod lnga
277a3(rgyud): bstan par bya//'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che//gsang sngags kun den sngar ster ba'o//der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing //sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi ba dag/lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni//
277a4(rgyud): gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar//rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa yin//bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'dir//gsungs pa'i don de ma
277a5(rgyud): shes pas//sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag/de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur//don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni//sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang //'gro ba'i don ni rab
277a6(rgyud): sgrub pa//gsang sngags rig pa michog rnams byed//bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar//yi ge a ni steng du gnas//phyi ma zhes bya gnas byas la//sngags pas sems/
277a7(rgyud): tsan don rnams bya//yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gong //a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur//steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid//gang zhig 'di las//
277b1(rgyud): gsungs pan//bsam+b+ha mo khyab pa'i thabs rgyas nyid//bdag gos zhes rtogs do 'gyur ba//thogs myod rtogs pa 'di gnas//ston pa po dang bsta
277b2(rgyud): dang gnas//phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med//kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig la//sngags pa rnams kyis thos de 'gyur//shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru//sangs rgyas
277b3(rgyud): rnams kyis grang mkhyen pa//sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig no//skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob//kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa//gsang sngags ston pa'i chos
277b4(rgyud): tsan+da te//de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog/sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes//mi rtog nA mkha' ji bzhin de//gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra//sA la rlung bzhin sngags
277b5(rgyud): pa ni//'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod//thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin//de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur//de bzhin sbyor bu de mthong bas//kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs//
277b6(rgyud): de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa//de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur//'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung //mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur//na mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang //bas
277b7(rgyud): mi khyab par spro bdag nyid//de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la//thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag 'byung //sems can kun gyi sems gang yin//nam mkha' yongasu brtogs pa ste//de yang/
278a1(rgyud): doru kun+da gnas pas//bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs//spangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa//sngar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa//de ni bud med ces bshad do//de bas chos
278a2(rgyud): b+ha ga yom//bye bA la sogs ji skad bshad//dam tshig gsum po gcig tu gyur//dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru//'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur//dam tshig sku gsung thugs
278a3(rgyud): dang ni//ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang //sa dang chu dang de bzhin me//rlung dang ni mkha' nyid dag dang //gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro//reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings//'di
278a4(rgyud): rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung //byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che//de ltar brjid mi lang zhes pa//brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams//sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi//rdul phran gyi ni grangs
278a5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i//byang chub sems dpa' sems cheni dang //na mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs//mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen//dpag med che dang gdon myi za//
278a6(rgyud): 'di dag na mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i//rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs//dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis//na mkha'i khams ni yongs khong
278a7(rgyud): pa//de rnams der ni yang dag snang //de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad//de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur//gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang //sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyis//byang chub/
278b1(rgyud): 6//sems dpa' sems chen dang //don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs//'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags//zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las bya ba/
278b2(rgyud): ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni//'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur//'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
278b3(rgyud): bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur//de na sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang //mA mA kI 'dra sbyor ba dang //gos dkar mo 'dre'i gzugs dang ni//sgrol ma'i gzugasu yang dag gnas//
278b4(rgyud): sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang //dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni//de bzhin ri yi ngo bo'i gzugs//reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang //le la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis//de bzhin
278b5(rgyud): nas bde ni rnaMs thogs//de nas rnal gsum don ga dang //spyi spyod pa sung nga //'jig rgyu na ga ng+gA/rdzun du/jig sbyin 'das pa'i
278b6(rgyud): gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor//rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du//de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri//zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ga/sbyor ba
279a1(rgyud): gcig tu sbyor ba nyid//dri ma med par byin rlabs pa//kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs//sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab//'bur ba mang po'i rnam par 'khrug/gsal ba la
279a2(rgyud): sogs dkyil 'khor ldan//de bzhin gau shegs pa kun gyi gnas//de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das//de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di//dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbusu yang //rnam
279a3(rgyud): par bzhag ste bzhugs par gyur//mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang //don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs//de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i//thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur///
279a4(rgyud): de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir//de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems//dngos med ngo bor gcig par ni//mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs//shes rab ting 'dzin pazhi
279a5(rgyud): gcig pu//de ni grib ma ltar thugs chung//rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas//'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad//ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis//'gro ba gnyid log/
279a6(rgyud): snad par byed//de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun//byang chub sems kyis smad par byed//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig/de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yis//byang chub sems
279a7(rgyud): kyi de bo yis//rdo rje'i sngagasu mdzad par gyur//rig pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni//sngogs kyis byin rlabs bla na med//der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur//de bzhin go shigs pa
279b1(rgyud): gis gzigs//de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyis//thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste//byang chub sems ni rab bskor la//lam gsum chad du
279b2(rgyud): brjod pa mdzad//bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang //de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //rdo rje byang chub sems gcog las//spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin//de nas/
279b3(rgyud): gsang tshul thos pa dang //de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni//khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la//ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus//phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos/
279b4(rgyud): 'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams//rten 'brel la skyes yin par ni//khyed chos sbyin par mdzad pas khums//dman pa'i tshes rnams 'di dag ni//zhe sdang la sogs rkyen
279b5(rgyud): dang ldan//'dri dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang //rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags//byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de//lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur//gang zhig phyi
279b6(rgyud): dus skye bo yis//'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyuraro//de na sI bcom ldan rdo rje can//'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa//ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni//gang zhig khyod kyis
279b7(rgyud): nga dris pa//legaso leg so sems dpa' che//gsang de'i bdag pa khyod lag so//smras don ji lta ji lta bar//de ltar khyod la lung bston bya//ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni//
280a1(rgyud): 'jig rten rgya pan mchog gzhol 'gyur//log par lta ba la gnas te//ci dga' bar yang spyod par byang /la la glu dang gar la dga'//dgod dang sgrog la mchog tu gzhol//
280a2(rgyud): dang phreng ba lo dga' zhig/de bzhin 'khrog pa la dgar 'gyur//rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang //de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol//la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhe na//shes pa ga
280a3(rgyud): dag 'dod par 'gyur//nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang //gshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni//skyes bu glen pa za byed cing //med par smra ba cho su sgrogs//ma dang sring mo la sogs pa//
280a4(rgyud): bgrang min la ni bgrod pa dang //pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang //de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod//brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang //khyad par du yang brku ba dang //gzhan gyi
280a5(rgyud): chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing //smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur//la la dam chos spong ba dang //de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste//sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang //sngags pa
280a6(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur//gzer nang dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad pa//'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas//zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur//'dor bar byed
280a7(rgyud): ba rmongs pa de//mi bzod sdig pa byas pa dang //log par lta la mchog gzhal rnams//ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur//de rnams rjesu gzu ci phyir//gsang ba 'di ltar
280b1(rgyud): bstan pa yin//gang zhig yang dag thob pa nyid//'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur//gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis//tshul mchog
280b2(rgyud): 'di ni rnyed gyur nas//don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang //de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung //de nams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang //shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring //rab tu dga' dang ldan
280b3(rgyud): pa yis//rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces//mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dge 'a//rgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan//mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba//phan tshun dag ni
280b4(rgyud): sun yang 'byin//gsang sngags smra ba la rten nas//gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur//de rnams bdud kyi byin rlabs kyis//gal te dngos grub phra thob na//des ni mngon
280b5(rgyud): par nga rgyal pos//mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur//tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang //khye bzhin kha zos la spyod yul//rang las 'bras las byung ba yi//phan pa la ni
280b6(rgyud): gnod pa byed//de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams//bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer//mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi//slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bkur med//skad
280b7(rgyud): cig gcig gis sdang byed cing //de la skad cig gis rjes chags//khyi dang phag dang kha rnams kyi//spyod pa dog ni ston par byed//de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar//
281a1(rgyud): mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur//gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par//dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur//gsang ba srung bar mi byed par//thams cad du ni ston par byed//
281a2(rgyud): 'jig rten la ni slad byas nas//gzhan dag la yang rab gusal byed//bdag nyid rtsa ba med par ni//dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur//sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskur bas//
281a3(rgyud): rang la rang gi glags rnyed med//de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi//ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur//nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir//mngon spod rab tu byed par 'gyur//rnal 'bor
281a4(rgyud): rab sbyor dman pa yi//sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur//phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'//de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhos//rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas//lcags/
281a5(rgyud): kyu med pa bzhin du spyod//sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis//de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur//gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar//dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed//de rnams yang
281a6(rgyud): drag sdud byed pa'i//gseng ba dgongs pos bshad pa yin//dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams//'dri yis thams cad dgug par bya/de dag rjes rig mi shes na//de rnams//
281a7(rgyud): zhi b.ri gau la 'gyur//de bas rje su gzung don du//tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin//de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//gcig tu 'dus par gyur na su//de bzhin gshegs//
281b1(rgyud): kun badrag po yA//rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sbyin//lung dag 'byung bsna legs mchod//phyag 'tshalnga nas ni 'di skad gsol//de bzhin gshegs
281b2(rgyud): pa gsang ba mchog/de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa//'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i//nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di//de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/de nyin
281b3(rgyud): bcom ldan bshad du gsol//de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la//bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa//gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa//de bzhin gsheg
281b4(rgyud): rnams legaso legs//'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang //the tshom skye bar byed yin na//byang chub sems gzhan ci smos shes//de bzhin gshegs de rnams
281b5(rgyud): le gsungs//de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas//the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i//bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus//bcom
281b6(rgyud): ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang //gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par//ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur//byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad//
281b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs//ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir//de ni yang dag bshad du gsol//de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni//de rnams zhu bar mkhyen ma
282a1(rgyud): ye shes sgron ma rdo rje glags//ting 'dzin zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba//gtso bos mi bskyod snang pa ni//sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas//de nas yang dag phyung ba ni//badz+ra d+hag ces byad
282a2(rgyud): sngags//de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa//de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur//mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor//zhal gsum gnag dang dkar
282a3(rgyud): dang dmar//bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin//rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs//bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po//dam tshig 'byung
282a4(rgyud): rdor zhes bya yi//tong nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni//snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad//de nas dzi nA dzika ces pa'i//snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung //de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang /
282a5(rgyud): gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa//rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni//rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs//dkar dang gnag dang dmar bcas pa'i//zhal gyis mdun du bzhu/
282a6(rgyud): bar gyur//de nas rin chen byung ba yi//dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la//snyoms par zhugs nas bde gshegs kun//bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir//yid bzhin nor bu
282a7(rgyud): rin chen rigs//de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di//de nas rat+na d+h+r-ika ces byi'o//snying po dpal ldan de tshe phyung //de ni phyung ba tsam gyis ni//rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur
282b1(rgyud): /g+hur//ser da dka dang gnag pa yi//zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni//rdo rdzogasam gyi badrug pa yi// phyogs logs bzhugs par gyur//
282b2(rgyud): de yang byung du gzigs gyur to//mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan pa dge po de//rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag 'dod chags chen po'i las byung gi/
282b3(rgyud): zhes ni bye bA yaM//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//'dod tshogs chen po'i rigs las byung //A re loka ces bya snying po//rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung //dri ni sa phyung ba
282b4(rgyud): tsam gyis ni//de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni//rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur//'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs//dmar dang dkar dang gnog pa'i zhal//dpal
282b5(rgyud): ldan rigs chen po yi bdag/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi//nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur//de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//don yod dam tshig ces bya/
282b6(rgyud): ba'i//ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag phyung //gtso bo de la snyoms zhugs nas//snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o//dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs//snying po pradz+rA d+h+r-ika
282b7(rgyud): ces pa//rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba las 'byung //de nas phyug pa tsam gyis ni//don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi//de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das//sku gsung thugs
283a1(rgyud): can//rag dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur//ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag pa yi//byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur//zhe sdang gti mug/
283a2(rgyud): rigs dang ni//de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang //'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba//'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa'o//de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin//'dod chags dam
283a3(rgyud): tshig 'byung ba yi//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//dam pa dag ni phyung bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun
283a4(rgyud): gyi yum gcig pa//yum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad//de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po//gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog/sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung //dwe Sha ra te/
283a5(rgyud): zhes byar grags//rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i//de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin nam//zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni//me yi phyogs su rnam pAr bzhugs//de nas
283a6(rgyud): rjes mnyes rdo rje grags//sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung //ting 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste//rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni//de ni ma tor ti ste//gang phyir de bzhin gshegs
283a7(rgyud): pa'i yang //rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste//zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma//gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas//sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong cig/gsang ba bsdus
283b1(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba yis//bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs//de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes//b+hA ba rdo rje gsum las smyos//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhu/
283b2(rgyud): nas//bde ba chen po phyung ba ni//'di ltar rI ga ro ti phyung //zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can de//gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa//de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur//gos
283b3(rgyud): med ye shes las byung ba//rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcu mo ste//rlung gi phyogasu rnam par bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po
283b4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can//slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i//tinge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//de bzhin gri shogs kun btsun mo mchog/zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can
283b5(rgyud): ma//badz+ra ra te zhes bya ba//rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur//de ni phyung ma thag tu yang //gtso bo rig pa skyes bur gyur//bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te//dbang ldan phyogs
283b6(rgyud): su rnam par bzhugs//de nas bcom ldan mgon po de//rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i//ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms zhugs te//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la//dkyil 'gyu
283b7(rgyud): 'dir ni gshin rje gshed//khro bo chen po phyung ba dang //phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//bsnyungs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs//de nas bdag po ba
284a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//mngon byad rdo rje zhes bya yi//ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//khro bo chen po byung ba ni//pradz+nyAn+ta kr-it+ta rdo rje can//de nas dang ldan phyung ban/
284a2(rgyud): rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung //dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las//'od chen phur bu'i gzugs lta bu//rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa//lho yi sgor ni rnam par
284a3(rgyud): bzhugs//de nas rin cheni 'byung gnas grags//tinge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor//rdo rje gsum las khro bo che//prad+d+hAn+ta kr-ita 'od
284a4(rgyud): po che//bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur//de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir //gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang //gsung gi tshul du rnam
284a5(rgyud): sprul zhing //gos med ye shes blo med pa//nub kyi sgor ni zhugs par gyur//bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa//thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la//kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni//
284a6(rgyud): de nis gtso bos phyung bar gyur//khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba//kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs//de nas
284a7(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang //mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che//de la skur yang zhus gyur pa//mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing //
284b1(rgyud): dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni//ji ltar de rnams zhu bar 'gyur//'di dag thog mtha' yong min na//'di yi
284b2(rgyud): gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur//phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la//'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang //gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces//theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang //so so'i skye bo'i tshig gi/
284b3(rgyud): kyang //spang ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur//gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni//de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'o//zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs//de bzhin gshegs rnams/
284b4(rgyud): bsten mdzad pa//rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i//bya ba de dag phyin ci log/dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni//de bzhin gshegs de rnam mdzad pa//tshig gcig lnga ni dpag
284b5(rgyud): med don//gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni//mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i//skye bos ji ltar 'tshol bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa//phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni//dgongs
284b6(rgyud): pa gsang ba bla med pa//dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya//zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags//lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga//'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni//rdzogs sangs
284b7(rgyud): rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas//pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya//me ni lhag mthong yin par bshad//de bzhin nyid shes lusu gyur//zhi ba rnal 'byor pa yi zas//ji ltar bzo bos
285a1(rgyud): bder gshegs kyi//sku yi gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar//gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku//de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung //thugs kyi rnam pas thugasu ni//zhi gnas la sogs pa las
285a2(rgyud): byung //phung po la sogs chos rnams ni//stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong //ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs//zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed//de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje//
285a3(rgyud): grib ma lta bur byung ba yin//de bzhin phung po khams la sogs//dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas//de nas tshul gsum deni gcig pa/zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung //de nas/
285a4(rgyud): rdo rje tshul yid 'ong //gsang ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis//stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar//rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes//nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni//phung po la sogs
285a5(rgyud): chos byung ba//lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni//phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur//'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar//de las ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur//'di dgu ting 'dzin
285a6(rgyud): gnyis med sbyor//mi phyed rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//za ba dang rgya chenu rtog byang chub/de rtogs pas ni sems par gyur//'di dag na mkha' mtshungs gyur pa//chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o
285a7(rgyud): de la rtogs po mtha' yos pa//rdo rje theg par ston pa yin//ting 'dzin ni de nyid las//rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin//'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing //de bzhini 'jig rten shin gyi
285b1(rgyud): 'das//dgongs don da bzhin nyid gcig pu//gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad//ma skyes pa las byung ba ni//kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin//bdud gyur rtswa ma/
285b2(rgyud): bur bshad de//phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas//'di las dngos med pasgra rgyal byas//rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par byashad//lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad//'byung /
285b3(rgyud): dang 'byung las byur bshad gang //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//'di drug rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur//dngos po gang dang gang dag gis//phung po lnga po brtags 'byung
285b4(rgyud): grwa de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam su 'gyur//ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba//dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can//der ni bdug gis bdag/
285b5(rgyud): nyid mthong //dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa//phung po de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur//de bzhin nyid las spros byas bya//chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi//mchod pa
285b6(rgyud): chen por de 'gyur//'di ni spros dang bsdus pa dag/de ni dga' bar yongasu grags//sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig/de ni gsol 'dengs zhes bshad//yang dag
285b7(rgyud): shes rab thabs gnyis te//mkha'i dbyings dbyer med rab sbyor ba'i//do ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur//rnal 'byor po ni mngon bzhugs pa'o//rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor cher//
286a1(rgyud): bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba grang //dbang po thams cad bde bskyed pa'i//yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur//zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang //mthong zhing de la phung po sogs//lha
286a2(rgyud): bdag nyid rig 'gyur ro//de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin//dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog/mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug/'on kyang so sor 'gyur bya ste//chos kyi sku las
286a3(rgyud): hUM snang gyur//sdom ldan bdag po de nyid ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung zhing //mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can//de nyid bdag po kun byed pa'o//dem tshig la sogs 'byung
286a4(rgyud): ba'i chos//rang gis rig par ma gyur kyang //der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad//de ni gti mug de bzhin sems//gang gi ji ltar brtags chos kyis//longs spyod rdzogs zhes bye byed
286a5(rgyud): ba//de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung //rin chen chen po'i rigs kyis gtso//de nyid bcom ldan 'did chags ni//kun mkhyen ye shes lus byung ba//gnas maud gnas pa'i rgya
286a6(rgyud): myur ba//'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ji ltar 'dum dbus pad+ma ni//de yI nyes pas gos mi 'gyur//de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog/'dod pa kun la nye po
286a7(rgyud): spyod//'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab//de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste//gsum po de dag med ro byas pa'i//zhe sdang gti mug dro bzhin chags
286b1(rgyud): rdo rje dga' ba'i mchod can gtso//ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud myed//gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur//gsum po yang dang 'dug gyur pa//gshin rje
286b2(rgyud): shes rab gyur de bzhin//pad+ma bgegs 'gyur khro bo ste//mthar byed mtha' yi ming can no//'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la//phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs//sgeg
286b3(rgyud): byed gshin rje gshad kyis kyang //thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor//rdo rje dmachog skrag par byed//de bzhin shes rab mthar byed gtso//pad+mo'ang gsung zhes bya ba
286b4(rgyud): gyur//'chi brel rnal 'byor grub pa yin//bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso//rags pa'i bdag nyid rang bdag po//'di ltar rtog spyod rnal 'byor pa//gsang ba'i lus
286b5(rgyud): kyis rnam par spyod//dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par//gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa//des ni de bzhin bya ba dang //de nas gsang ba yang dag 'byung //nu zho zas kyis
286b6(rgyud): bu bas bzhin//srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso//sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du//chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis//
286b7(rgyud): sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las//bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa//bden pa ma yin brdzun pa 'di min//zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang //'dod chagos sna tshogs rigs///
287a1(rgyud): byung ba//dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas//gleng gzhi yin te dang po'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la//slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun//lhag par mchod pa byas na/
287a2(rgyud): ma thub chen de la 'di skad gsol//dgongs pa'i rdo rje dam pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes//byang chub sems ni bla med pa//gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol//bac+doMs kyis
287a3(rgyud): de rnams kyi//zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing //byang chub sems dpa' yongs rtog pa//thub nyid kyi ni rnam mkhyen pa//de nas byang chub sems kun la//bcom ldan 'das kyis
287a4(rgyud): skad gsungs//lus sems de dang 'dre ba dang //de bzhin ngag ni tshig brjod blta'o//byang chub sems ni bla med po//khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya//da ltar byang chub sems dpa' la/
287a5(rgyud): stan pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad//de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis//skye dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung //de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//sku
287a6(rgyud): gsung thugs rdo rje can la//ched du brjod pa che du brjod//A ma kun tu bzang ba yi//rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa//skye ba med po'i tshul gyis ni//skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags//nas
287a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs bdag po//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//dang ldan
287b1(rgyud): byang chub sems 'di gsungs//dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na//dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga'ang min//de ltar dngos po dngos med pas//sbom po dngos
287b2(rgyud): por yod ma yin//de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags//ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//de bzhin
287b3(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi mchog/gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can/byang chub sems ni thams cad nas//de ni yang dag bka' stsal to//dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi//phu/
287b4(rgyud): po khams sogs rnam spangs shing //gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba//chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can//byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa//rten cing 'brel 'byung med
287b5(rgyud): can te//thog ma meng nas ma skyes bdag/rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin//de nas mi bskyod de bzhin semaso//kun gyi gnyis med mi bzad pa'i//ye shes ting 'dzin ston nu
287b6(rgyud): te//byang chub sems ni 'di gsungaso//dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas//phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med//nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i//bdag med byang chub
287b7(rgyud): ces bya'o//de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal//bdog meng rdo rje zhes bya ba'i//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs//chos rnams thaMd
288a1(rgyud): dngos med cing //chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa//bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung //byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o//de nas 'od dpag med mtshan can//ye shes 'dar ba
288a2(rgyud): skyon rdo rje'i//tIng 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/byang chub sems nI 'di gsung so//ma skyes pA yo chusde rnams la//dang po med cing sgom pa'ang med//na mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba'i/
288a3(rgyud): dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad//de nas de bzhin gdan mi za//zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yi//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs//chos 'di rang
288a4(rgyud): bzhin 'od gsal zhing //bzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs//byang chub med cing mngon rtags med//byang chub sems ni yin par bshad//de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'dzin//
288a5(rgyud): byang chub sems ni thos pa dang //dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par//rnam par snang mdzad che la gsungs//dngos po med cing dmigs med pa//byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang
288a6(rgyud): mtshungs//gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas//dang po yi ni rtog pa skye//lus la sogs pa gsung sbyar bas//sems ni de rnams skyed par byed//yong dag byang chub du ma'i mthar//
288a7(rgyud): 'di la so so skye bo sgra//thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams la//rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed//bsam po'i dbang ni ji bzhin du//'gro bo'i don du bka' stsol cig/de nas bcom ldan
288b1(rgyud): ba 'a//rnam p+ta mdzad \u0f88\u0f90 da//'du sa bru/ bsdus sa /lagan d-i/sa sa//myu pa ma na //
288b2(rgyud): bshad par bya//ga tu brjed par migs par ba shing //dang dang drini dam pa yin//sbyin da nyan byas rnams kyis kying //med dang gisuM sngags spyod rnams
288b3(rgyud): gshegs pas gsung pa yi//bying chub sems 'di nan med//de bzhin yang dag byu ba 'di//dgongs pa'i gsang ba blan med//gnyis maud dam tshig rdo rje dang /
288b4(rgyud): las skyed par byed//tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste//sangs rgya sa sminI dmigs can yin//gsang sngags de nyid ces bye brdal//de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'i//
288b5(rgyud): gni glu dbus na//gang zhig sbyin mos ma songasmra pa//de ni ba cing sti med nas de shes pa nI ma tshig gi gnos//smrangs dang gsapa byed yi ge ste/zlas
288b6(rgyud): dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa//as bcings pan+d+ha rgyun sbyong ba las//gang gis shes tI 'gro ba'i blo//gang zhig shes pa rnam bral ba//'bras bu phun tshogs grwa'i 'dod
288b7(rgyud): de ni de nyid grib 'dod pa//gzugs med pas ni gzugs sbangs pa//'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan//chal sogs pa bcu drug gnas//lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/
289a1(rgyud): bzhin gsum du nges par sbyar//yi ge oM bcas ring por bcas//yan tran sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs//thung ngu ma lus ngag tu 'gyur//gcig man du ma ma yin//ya yi don gyi
289a2(rgyud): gang yang rung //bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa//ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis//'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug/yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang //gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnama?//
289a3(rgyud): dud med skyes pa ma ning ste//khams la sogs par rab tu brtag/'og nas steng du bcas par ni//shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar//drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig dngos
289a4(rgyud): med ngo bo gcig las byung //de ni ya sogs don sbyar na//dus gsum shes pa 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur//mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin//'gro ba rnams ni sgyu mthar bya//
289a5(rgyud): brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag/drangos med ngo bo las byung ba//de ni yongasu gyur pa'i gzugs//lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang //brda' yis de nyid gsum gnas pa//rang
289a6(rgyud): bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid//ming med brjod du med pa ste//byang chub sems mchog 'di yin//gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa//'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med//'gag med
289a7(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba ste//rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa//dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i//rtag pa na mkha' dbyer med mtshan//'di nyid kho na don dam ste//sa sor rang rig mtshan
289b1(rgyud): 6snod du// 'di sems can+du k+Shan+d+ha zlos gyu//sa s+yAd+d+ham+b+ha d+d+ha sgrubang ba nyid//byung chub sems bcig yang dgal rgyu//na ci brel 'byung rang bzhin/
289b2(rgyud): gang 'di byang chub sems dag nyid//rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur//'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang //rigs kun la ni 'jug par 'gyur//srog dang skems dang bde can dang //
289b3(rgyud): kun zar 'jug pa'i me bzhi no//'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar//sems can+da kun la rnam par gnas//byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid//'dra ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing //
289b4(rgyud): gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa//byams pa chen po de bskyed bya//byin ci ma log 'di mthong nas//byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung //des ni snying rje cher gyur nas/
289b5(rgyud): des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms//sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag/byang chub sems las ma mthong na//'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa//de las dga' ba skye ba
289b6(rgyud): 'gyur//'khor ba dang po yod min la//sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra//byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni//btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin//de nas rdo rje 'dzin
289b7(rgyud): pa yis//thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing //rnam par snang mdzad che la zhus//'khor dang gcig shos zhes bya ba//'di kun byang chub sems yin no//ji ltar so sor
290a1(rgyud): gyur nas ni//phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas//bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la//gnyi su 'gog byed glang yang med//gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung //mi mthun phyogs dza/
290a2(rgyud): ltar snang //dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog/'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pas//sems can kha cig gzir ba dang //byang chub sems la 'ang sbyar bar 'gyur//de lta 'i rnam
290a3(rgyud): rtog kun rtog par//ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi//rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba//'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyuraro//dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la//byis pa rnams ni
290a4(rgyud): rtsod par 'gyur//de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir//dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol//de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa//shin tu
290a5(rgyud): rad dga' byang chub sems//de ni yang dag bka' stsal to//phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig/sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te//sems de mngon du byas nas ni//ci dga' bar ni bya ba
290a6(rgyud): yin//sems ni de yis ma mthong bas//lta ba so sor gyur pa yin//de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru//'gre ba drug gri ming du gyur//des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang //dbang phyug che lo kun tu
290a7(rgyud): rtan//zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi//kun tu spyod pa de rnams byed//sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang //dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang //de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang //lta bas skad
290b1(rgyud): cig dag gis 'gro//yi dag su yang 'gro ba dang //'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro//gang tsho ma rig kun brten pas//bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes//'du shes can//
290b2(rgyud): dang 'du shes med//sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa//de rnams rlung las byung ba ste//rlung las slar yang 'grag pa yin//nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang //rang gi
290b3(rgyud): rnam par rtog par ltung //de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du//sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro//mi rtog pa yi sems dri ni//'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang //de ni phyin ci la
290b4(rgyud): gyur pas//khyi dang lce spyang glang po dang //sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur//de bzhin du ni phag nyid dang //mi yi rigs ni smig mkhan dang //sme sha tsan dang rigs ngan dang //
290b5(rgyud): bza' dang mi bza' bya kun tu//byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur//bram ze la sogs 'jog rten shos//byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur//phung sogs dngos po med
290b6(rgyud): 'gyur las//rang gi myong ba shes par 'gyur//de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad//'jig rten pa ni byang chub sems//nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas sku ru
290b7(rgyud): 'di 'byung ste//sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid//tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can//rdo rje snying po'i don//gsungs pa//'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu
291a1(rgyud): //phyag 'tshal nas ni sbyar gsal ba//'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni//byang chub sems ni dbu gsungs nas//ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das bya//ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs//lta dA d+ha
291a2(rgyud): rab spong phyir//khyed kyi chos rnams ston mdzad no//ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid//lta ba de ni rib bstan 'gyur//dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams//gsungs pa'i don na mi rtogs
291a3(rgyud): nas//gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes//de ni jo bzhin sgyur 'dzin te//de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas//lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa//khyed gsungs dgongs pa ma rtogs
291a4(rgyud): pa/'dre bar byed pa legs zhes//byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing //na mkha' lnga ni rnam gnas pa//sems can kun gyi srogs gyur grang //lho yi bdag nyid bcu ming can//rten
291a5(rgyud): 'brel bcu gnas zhes grags pa//ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du 'gyur//rlung nis bya ba'i byang chub sems//dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yi ni//ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las//rtag tu ga
291a6(rgyud): bar brjod pa yin//'gro ba yul sogs lus byung ba//'dir ni de la brten pa yin//zhi ba dang ni rgyus pa dang //dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams//de nyid gsum gnas la
291a7(rgyud): nas//de kun byang chub sems kyis byed//ji srid 'jig rten brtags pa dang //de bzhin brtags pa sna tshogs rnams/rnam rtog byang chub sems zhes pa'i//rlung las rtag du 'byung
291b1(rgyud): yin//bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi//sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin//byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di//phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam//shes
291b2(rgyud): rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis//byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur//klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par//bdag por bdag nyid bzlos pa de//nyin dang mtshan me'i dbye ba
291b3(rgyud): yis//nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis//dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa//byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu//dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas//nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur/
291b4(rgyud): ba yin//'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang //ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya//dbyangs kyi thung nyin mor bshad//ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad//dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las//
291b5(rgyud): de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya//e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung //de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal//de las 'jig rten pa yi brda'//myur du mngon por shes par 'gyur//de nas
291b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos ni//byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang //gtso bo rnam snang chen po las//khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa//sems can thams cad skyed pa po//sna tshogs
291b7(rgyud): gzugs can sems 'di ni//de bas dngos po med gyur kyang //srid pa dag tu rab tu grags//byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa//legs par rjes myong mdzad pa//'gro
292a1(rgyud): 'don nur dzad pu'o//sgyu blon chog la dU smyan gsaso//snad pa yAn thabs tsam thog/shes nas rgyud la rgyun kyis phyogs//'di ltar ba dag ni smra ba dang na nas//ma 'ongs spyan smra/
292a2(rgyud): 'gyur//bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/yin zhes sgra ning byis pa 'jig/des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems//ji bozhin don du mi shes//de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni
292a3(rgyud): med chos kun rnam sbyangs la//rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas//de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur//de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi//de ni smra bor rigs pa yin//'brel pa
292a4(rgyud): nyi ma thob pa ni//ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas//grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lngas//byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don//slar yang de nyid la
292a5(rgyud): bsrungs pa//nang nA ma yin phyi rol min//gaN+DI ga ming du 'ang 'gyur ma yin//rtag pa ma yin snyed cig min//de ni so so rang rig yin//mi rtog na mkha' ji bzhin du//byang chu
292a6(rgyud): nirdo rje 'dzin//de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byung //'das dang mu 'angs pa nyid dang //da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang /sangs
292a7(rgyud): sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba//don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin//rig byed dus dang me yi sgra//nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can to//bzhi byed gsum bdag las byung //byang chub sems
292b1(rgyud): gcig dbye ba nyid//don shes rang thabs zung gro//de zhin da byed 'dzin d+ha dang //rnaMs la gnas pa yang //gnas klu/su spyod do na du//rma
292b2(rgyud): ni yod pa ma yin pa//de 'di byang chub semasu 'gyur//rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa//bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin//lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni//tsheg drag bcas po'i rlung
292b3(rgyud): yin no//rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog/de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin//dra rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo//de dang ldan pa byang chub sems//bzhir grags cha las yang dag
292b4(rgyud): yod med rab tu zhi ba can//dngo sa med pa'i sems 'di ni//rang rig gcig pu'i spyod yul yin//de nyid don ni rig byed pa//dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin//de nas
292b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di//chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas//byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//ngo mtshar smad 'byung legs skye
292b6(rgyud): nas//ched du brjod pa ched du brjod//e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos//e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa//dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu//dag pa'i de nyid don dag stong/
292b7(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad//byang chub sems la phyag 'tshalo//bdag med chos las yang dag byung //byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa//ngo bo med cing
293a1(rgyud): dmigs su med//byang chub sems la 'phyag 'tshal//kun gzang gcig las yang dag byung //dgongs don byang chub stor bya po//byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog/byang chub
293a2(rgyud): sems la phyag 'tshalo//dag pa de bzhin gau shegs pa'i thugs//sangs rgyas byang chub rib sgrub pa//rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gci'o//byang chub sems la phyag 'tshul lo//
293a3(rgyud): dgongs pa lung ston la dad par//gang gis yid ni bzod gyur pa//dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las//des ni de bzhin bya ba yin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//rdo
293a4(rgyud): gsum gyi gsang ba las//yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa//le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad////de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje//gsum dang tshul gsum lam
293a5(rgyud): gsum mchog/rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum//de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po//de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa//'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje dang //ting
293a6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te//de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs//rdo rje bkod pa mchog 'di yi//le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon//'di ni de bzhi ni gshegs pa kun//phra mo
293a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor dag pa zhugs//oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan//shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste//dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin//badz+ra zhes bya bzhi pa'o//swa b+hA ba At+ma koHlnga par grags
293b1(rgyud): u t+yA zhes pa drug par brjod//de ltar bad+mod ga shegs drug pa ni//skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin//A~M shUn+ya tA chun po'o//dz+nyA na badz+ra gnyis pa yin//swA b+hA
293b2(rgyud): hU~Mko&hUM gyur//de nyid gsum ni 'drir brtags pa'i//de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par//mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no//mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'kho
293b3(rgyud): ni//da zar sprin gyi tshogs chen po//yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab//kun nas yongasu zlum po'o//'dod yon lha yis kun tu khyag/mchod pa rnam pa lngas rgyan po//mdor na de ltar
293b4(rgyud): bsgoms nas su//dbusu gzugs ni bsgom par bya//rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya mchog/de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan//yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi//phyag rgya yang na
293b5(rgyud): rnam par sgom//mi bskyed pa yi phyag rgya che//tshogs ni gnyis ming sbyor ba dang //dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang //tshe dpag med pa'i 'di byed dang //de bzhin don yod gas
293b6(rgyud): tsin+d+ra n+ya//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu sgom//rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje nAn+da//in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'drab/rab 'bar phyag ni rdo rje bsnams//rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs
293b7(rgyud): 'jigs lnga//'dzo m+bu chu ba'i gser 'di 'dra//sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs//de ni phyag na rdo rje che//rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgo mi//shal dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/
294a1(rgyud): rmugs cad bun dbugs rgyu// 'ab bdag na 'kho slo ba rnams//sna tshogs rgyun gyis rnam pa d+h+yan//myu ga g+h+ra/rdo rje smra sa rnam pa sa//byung /
294a2(rgyud): zhing myu ba'i rgyugs /chen dus rnam par s+ho//da gas chen dz+nyAm+be//bang+gA da/mdog wASh+kaM//khyod chugs rnyed pa ni dag kIs d+d+hi na/ga na pam
294a3(rgyud): par sgom//sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi ze//'di chenI sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba//zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyis ba //phyag na la gri bsnams par sgom//de ltar rnal 'byor ba shad
294a4(rgyud): padugasang bu'i bdage pos thos nas nAM/phra mo'i rnal 'byor na dag kyang //de de zhin gshegs pa dag la zhus
294a5(rgyud): grwa/phung po khams sogs sbyong ba yis//de bzhin gshegs pas dka' stsal na//mkha' dbus srungs rgyas dkyil 'khor do//de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur//gcig shes
294a6(rgyud): phyir la tu sgom pa//dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni//dngos po med pa'i dngos po la//sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag/mgon po bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'di//kyim
294a7(rgyud): gang zhig bka' stsal ces//gang zhig mo 'ongs pa rnams ni//'di ltar mchog du'ang som nyi 'tshal//leg na rdo rje grags ldan pa//bla mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes/
294b1(rgyud): ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis//phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin//rnam lnga mngon par byang chub 'di//ma longs skye ba'i rgyur gyur te//chos ni yang
294b2(rgyud): ngagra sdud 'gyur gang //ji ltar ji ltar ston par byed//phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur//byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung //de yang de bzhin gshi gros bshad pa//de nyid
294b3(rgyud): gnyin ni sbyor bas//ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni//blo yi dngos grub ston pa po//thig mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni//phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag/mi gsal gsal bar yang
294b4(rgyud): dgra sbyor//dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o//bzang ma nyid nas rang grub pa//gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa//rten 'brel choso zhes grags pa ste//dngos po thams cad
294b5(rgyud): gcig tu byung //bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni//chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag dri//dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin ser//dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste//bzhi bzhi gcig
294b6(rgyud): tu sbyor ba yang //gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri//de rnams dbusu lha mur bcas//zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min dang //steng dang thad kA mnyam dang 'og/ji lta ji ltar
294b7(rgyud): goso dkar sogs//me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang //chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la//bco brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad//de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad//ji ltar/
295a1(rgyud): 'o mu khyad par ni//mar sar gnas par gyur pa yin//de bzhin gros dkar lnga sogs la//zhi ba nyid ni dro gan so//gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos//mthong ba de ni lhag mthong /
295a2(rgyud): yin//mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin//rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin//'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag/de bzhin nyid ni zhi zhes bya//de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du//
295a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par bya//rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub dbyung //sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid//shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni//sngags kyi yan lag ma
295a4(rgyud): nyams bzlas//bya ba thams cad nyid du yang //rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs lA//ming med brjod du med pa dang //dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla//gos dkar
295a5(rgyud): la sogs bzlas bshad pa//brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga//bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yi//sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu/dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa//nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i/
295a6(rgyud): rim gyis ni//de ni so sor 'byung ba las//nyi khri gcig stong drug brgya'o//de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis//phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin//klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi
295a7(rgyud): 'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad//de ltar rnam pa mang po yi//'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas//de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la//rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus//gang zhig
295b1(rgyud): bsnams nam 'ongs 'gro/thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba//rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog/snying po bac+doMm ldan bshad du gsol//de nyid gsum gnyis med sbyor ba
295b2(rgyud): de ni phra mo'i rdo rje rlom//myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i//rnal 'byor par yang bdag cig 'gyur/de ni bdag rig yid ches shing //zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur//
295b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gtso spangs te//log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu bsten/ston pa bro yi sbyor ba zhing //phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni//ma 'ongs dus na spongs 'gyur ba//de nyid de ni nges par byed//de na

295b5(rgyud): mdzad/dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas//gsang sngagase 'di ni bkro' stsal to//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad//khyad par du ni byin rlob pa//gnyis med rdo rje gi
295b6(rgyud): /sbyor bas//de ni yang dag bshad par bya//oM ni dang por shes par bya//d+har+m+ma zhes bya gnyis pa'o//d+ha rti zhes bya gsum par bshad//swa b+hA ba grags bzhi pa'o//at+ma ka ni lnga
295b7(rgyud): po yin//a he du gyur drug par 'dod//sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu//sgom pa bdag nyid can gyis sbom//rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa//yungs kar gyi ni 'dra chad cim/nyam/
296a1(rgyud): dga'i ri rab rtse mo ru//rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par sgom//rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro//mAM ga yor ma gyur spro mi bya//sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba/mchog rab sprin ma
296a2(rgyud): spro bar bya//'khor lo rdo rje sprin tshon dang //pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog/byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams//spro bi'i pad+ma pa nyid can gyi spro//phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
296a3(rgyud): par//rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang //pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu sgom//rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du//dngos la brtson pas rin chen
296a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba//na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du pri bya//'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'o//rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba//thams cad mkhyen pa
296a5(rgyud): tshul thob pa'o//dgrongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi//lung ston dam pa 'di la ni//gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa//de ni de bo zhin byed pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //rdo phra
296a6(rgyud): me de nyid las//'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog/le'u gsum pa nyid yino///de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad//gnyisu med par gyur nas ni//slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la//bstod pa
296a7(rgyud): de rnams gsol ba 'debs//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa//chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa//dkyil 'khor mchog 'di be sha du gsol//ying
296b1(rgyud): 6rdzugs par yod kurgyun//mnan rnamasaldan rgyas mtshan pa/rbA r+b+ha dab/mamachog/la la dus byu shud dug//mas nga
296b2(rgyud): don las byung //zhi ba'i chos ni skyong bA pa//kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/dngos mchog dkyil 'khor ba shad du gsol//rang bzhin gyis ni dri mid dag/sems ni kun
296b3(rgyud): tu bzang pa nyid//sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog/dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol//de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das//khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po//
296b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog/'jig rten gsum gyis snyan pa'o//nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas//de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la//thugs de dkyil/
296b5(rgyud): 'khor 'dra ba ste//dkyil 'khor dam pa bka' stsal to//de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchag/rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba//sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi//dkyil 'khor rab/
296b6(rgyud): tu bshad par bya//'di ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid mchog/legs sgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o//sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni//mtshan ma bzang por de bsha do//kun rdzob dang ni
296b7(rgyud): don dam dag/gnyi su med pa mdzes pa yin//shes rab 'di ni thog yin te//thabs ni de yi rjesu 'jug pa'o//shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis//chos dang long spyod rdzogs ma
297a1(rgyud): nI/sems kyi dkyil 'khod thig gang ba s+thA//rgyun 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa//'phags pa'i bden tu ni ngos bzhi ste//tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gA pa ni yin//bsdu dngas pa ni gan+d+ha
297a2(rgyud): yin te//ro ro'ang bzhi yi ming cano//chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda'//'khor lo'i nang gi dkyil 'khor//mi byed ye shes mtshan ma ste//rdo rje in+di nI laM rgyu/rnam pa lnga yis rab byi ba
297a3(rgyud): rtse mo 'khor ba'ajig byed pa'o//shar nas me long ngo bo ni//'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis rgyun//lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin//gcig gi ming can rin po che//
297a4(rgyud): nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma//pad+ma r-I gi'i 'od 'dra ba//byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin//'gro ba'i rnami rtog 'joms byed pa//bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur//'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra
297a5(rgyud): ba'i mdog/shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te//sprin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od//lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba//mA ma kI nI rigs rdo rje//nub byad pad+me zhes bya ba//dga' ba legs
297a6(rgyud): par gnas pa bzhin//byang shar ud pa la ltar snang ba'i//btang snyoms bcas pa sngon pa 'dra//de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni//tho ba mdangos ldan 'od dong bcas//de bzhin snyan
297a7(rgyud): swA zhes grags pa//dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar//nub du don spyod ces bya ba//rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o//don 'thun pa ni rdo rje ste//rdo rje 'khyil pa'i rdo rje can//phyag rgya dgod pa'i mchen
297b1(rgyud): nyid de//'di ni legs par bshad pa yin//ji ltar dbyings kyis mchod pa ni//rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin//dang po chen po yod pa la/
297b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad//de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang //shes nas 'grol phan par 'gyur//rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung //de tshe zla gzer phreng ba yi//
297b3(rgyud): skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas//lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming //ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni//bud med zhing ni dris par bshad//zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa/mdades ba
297b4(rgyud): 'dra ni yin par gsungs//rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te//ye shes khwa phye me tog/dngos po med pa rigs yin te//kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do//chos dbyings
297b5(rgyud): nyid kyi bud med ni//shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par byas//nang na ma yin phyi ma yin//gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min//gonas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyuraro//de bra
297b6(rgyud): mA ma kor bya shad//de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa//byin gyis brlabs pas dri bshad do//nam mkha' drang ni gcig tu gnas//sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnasu 'gyur//dro bas yul du
297b7(rgyud): rnam brtags pa//bsdu ba dag ni gshang pa yin//yis dbang po stong pa gcin//rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ro de bzhin chosu yangs//
298a1(rgyud): brtags pa//de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste//dngos med pa ni dbul ba yin//de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams//khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur//blang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pas
298a2(rgyud): de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid//mi byed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa//sar pa nyid du bkal logs dang //shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi//thig gi mkhas pas thig gdab po blo ldan
298a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba//khru ni bcu gnyis ched tsam la//ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bA zhar ldan//rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya//de yi dadusu 'khor lo ni//dgongs pas dang po bshad ste/
298a4(rgyud): de las bzlog po'i tshul gyis ni//'di na 'jig rten pa rnams rtog/gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas//de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba//dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag/yid ni
298a5(rgyud): rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs//dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das//'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spang //len pa ma yin gtong ba min//mi de ba ma yin gnas mA yin//blo ldan kun tu/
298a6(rgyud): 'di shes pa//rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor leru 'di ni//dris pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad//dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la//gang zhig
298a7(rgyud): yid ni bzod gyur pa//de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni//ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed//gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byi 'u ste bzhing 'o//
298b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/rdo rje gsung bdag 'gro ba'i zla//slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la//sngags spyod don gyis de nyid zhus//sngags kyi brtul/
298b2(rgyud): zhugs spyod pa cig/khyad par du ni srung bslab pa//de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung //spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol//de nos bdag po de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje 'dzin
298b3(rgyud): pa dag go tshig/gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu//gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to//mi rtog don las yang dag byung //zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin//dngos med
298b4(rgyud): la gnas gti mug ste//'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba//'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin//theg pa mchog ni bla med pa//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste//'di
298b5(rgyud): ngag rigasu yang dag bshad//dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub po//rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya//smig mkhan dag ni ngal ba yin//mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste//gsod pa
298b6(rgyud): don gnyer sems pa po//theg pa chen po bla med pa'i//theg pa mchog 'dri 'grub par 'gyur//sems can sdig chen byas pa dang //gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po//
298b7(rgyud): gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis//bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur//'di nyid dad pas myur du ni//zhe sdang dge la gnas pas gnas//gang gis phung sogs dngos med
299a1(rgyud): par//zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas//de ni srog gcod byed pa ste//theg pa mchog la gnas pa yin//nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag/rten 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni//de ni brdzu
299a2(rgyud): sgra dga' ba ste//gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang //de ni rdza su shes bya ste//de 'phrog dang tshul gang yin pa//gzhan gyi nor la chags par//
299a3(rgyud): 'dod//gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa//de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba//sems can de de 'dod la dga'//sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur//de yi stong nyid gti mug la//yul ni/
299a4(rgyud): bshang ba zhes grags te//dbang po gci pa zhes bya la//de dag zhu ba za ba yin//theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir//de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur//de tshe brdzun de 'dod pa dang //gshang gci//
299a5(rgyud): zasu byed pa po//shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab//chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu//gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba//dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa/long spyod rdzogs dang mnyam
299a6(rgyud): gang yin//de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod//rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis//gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya//gshang gci za suM byed po yi//sprul skye'i gzugs can bu mo
299a7(rgyud): de//sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya//ma dang sring mo bu mo ni//'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas//theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la//dngos grub rgya chen des thob//ji ltar mi rtog nas
299b1(rgyud): /mkha' no//kun tu khyab par gnas gyur pa/'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de//ting 'dzin bsum mi khyab ces bya//de nyid 'jig rtun par byung ba/rtog pa dga'/
299b2(rgyud): ba'i ming cano//sangs rgyus yul gyi yos la//'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te//rnam par mi rtog sbyor cig gis//myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan
299b3(rgyud): 'das gsung ni//sgrib kun stsal ba la sogs pa'i//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches//thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur//'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das//de bzhin ga
299b4(rgyud): kun gyi bdag/ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa//de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung //'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang //gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang //zhe sdang bral
299b5(rgyud): ba sdang bcas pa'i//rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing //gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang //'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa//'di ni de byed sems can rnams/snod yin//
299b6(rgyud): zhes ni thub gsung ngam//de nas mgon po thugs rje can//sems can kun la phan dgyes pas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa//
299b7(rgyud): 'dir ni sa khams dang mnyam pa//sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa//chu khams rtog dang bral ba po//sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin//bdag po me yi gzugs can te/thaMd//
300a1(rgyud): za bar nye bar sbyor//de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog/'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu//bcom ldan sna tshogs namakhra'u mtshungs//thams cad snang zhing za ba po//de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin
300a2(rgyud): par/bsgoms ni rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur//snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi//chos nyid dag pa 'dri yin zhing //sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi//byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin//de nas
300a3(rgyud): brjod mi lang zhes pa//brjod mi lang pa nyid gyur pa//sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyan de//sgrib pa thams cad sel lo sogs//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//kun nas 'dzi
300a4(rgyud): shing skrag gyur nas//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad//gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to//de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung //gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//byang chub sems dpa'
300a5(rgyud): brgyal ba ru//gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol//mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar/'di rnams bslang//
300a6(rgyud): bar mdzad du gsol//mi g.yo ba 'di gsang ba ste//zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa//'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin//dngos po med cing
300a7(rgyud): 'khrug pa med//yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu//'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis//bye brag meng par gyur pa yin//na mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis//gzugs la sogs
300b1(rgyud): pa mtha' yas te//de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang //byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur//de lus spro zhing bsdu ba dang //zhi ba nyid las rab sbyar/
300b2(rgyud): bas//ye shes lus can ye shes can//brgya lnga lo zhes ni shes pa ni//yan lagro dbyi ba gang dang glang //'gre dI zhes ni grags bdag pa//de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las//
300b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur//dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa//de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu//'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtag la//byang chub sems dpa'
300b4(rgyud): brgyal bar gyur//des ni bden 'di ma shes pas//dbyangs bcas brgyas la bskul ba nI//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//brgyal bzhis ni bshad pa yin//
300b5(rgyud): de nos gsadra ba rdo rje gsum//dgongasA pA'i tshig gis bshad pa dag/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas//ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad//gnyi su med pa mnyam rdo rje//
300b6(rgyud): 'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'o//'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa ba//tinge 'dzin la snrums par zhugs//mgon pa snyoms par zhugs pa yi/'od gang chen por rgyur
300b7(rgyud): pa yin//byang chub sems dpa' des reg pas//rang gi stan la gnas par gyur//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun//ngo mtshar rma du gyur spyan dang //dgyes shing mgu
301a1(rgyud): skyes gyur nas//chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs//e man chos e ma'o chos//e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba//bdag med chos ni yang dgra dag chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal//rdo rje gsung gas/
301a2(rgyud): dog pa'i don//dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o//mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung //rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshalo//thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs//dus gsum dag gi lam du byung //
301a3(rgyud): dbyings gcig rdzogs long spyod//na mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshalo//sku gsung thugs rten mkha' ste//spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan//de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa//spyod pa'i
301a4(rgyud): gnas la phyag 'tshalo//dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//gang zhig spyod mtsheg 'di rten pa//gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag/de ni ci dga' bar yang byed//de bzhin gshegs po tha~Md kyi///
301a5(rgyud): dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog/sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi//spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin////de nas dpal chen mi bskyod pa//sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can//ting 'dzin la snyam
301a6(rgyud): zhugs nas//thugs byin rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i//gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin//moM zhes bya ba dang po yin//sarba ta thA ga to gnyis//tsit+ta gsum pAr yongasu brtag/badz+ra bzhi pa'i gang /
301a7(rgyud): mar ldan//swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa//a hi dus kye meng can yin//sku drug gsum pa'i ming cano//de nas dang ldan rnam snang mdzad//rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs na
301b1(rgyud): sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung //oM zhes bya ba chungs par bshad//sarba ta thA ga tA gaN+DIs//ka ya chags thogs dbang phyug s+ho//badz+ra gi khyod yin par bsgrags//
301b2(rgyud): swa b+hA wa At+ma ko 'dod lha//a haM skem byed ces brjod//dgongs po yis ni yang dag brtags//shes rab dbyibs dbye bar bya//de nas tshe dpag med ces de'o//kun nA mi gnyis ji can
301b3(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsung //oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin//sarba to thA ga ta gnyis//bAka ces bya ba gsum pa yin//badz+ra dus kyi ming du 'gyur//swaM d+ha/
301b4(rgyud): At+ma ko lnga po//a haM zhes pa drug pa ste//gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams//re re zhing drug gsum du bshud//thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung //rim dang rim pa min pas//
301b5(rgyud): gsum//bdag po las ni gcig pu las//rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung //ston chos 'di rdo rje gsung //de nyid gsum gyi dam tshigra mchog/de bas 'di ni sgom pa mchog/g.yel ba med/
301b6(rgyud): par rdzogs par bya//'di bshad pa yi blo ldan la//rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas//sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing //sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya//de nas dkon mchog
301b7(rgyud): dpal 'di yang //sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs to//de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungaso//oM ni zung gi dang por ldan//sarba ta thA ga ta bzung //de bzhin nyid ni ye
302a1(rgyud): tshogs//thams cad me long ming can no//A nu ra ga skye med//dri na gsum pa yin par gsungs//rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i//badz+ra yang ni bzhi par gyur//dngos ma
302a2(rgyud): bdag nyid can ye shes//swa b+hA ba At+ma ko zhes bshad//ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming //chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid//a haM so so na rdzogs long spyod//dadro bo med pa'i rang bzhi
