302a3(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ma gyur pa//mchod pa drug pa'i ming can no//dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can//de yi rje su mnyes bya'i mchog/de lta'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs//mgon po/
302a4(rgyud): thams cad mnyes par bya//de nas dpal chen gdon mi za//don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs to//des ni gsang sngags 'di gsung so//oM zhes bya ba dang por
302a5(rgyud): /ldan//sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis//pU dza rnam par thar pA'i ming //badz+ra sems ni rnam sgom pa//swa b+hA At+ma ko zhes bshad//a haM pha rol phyin zhes bya//lnga po drug dang gsum du bsha/
302a6(rgyud): gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro//reg bye dang ni chos kyi dbyings//de dag dngos med gyur byas pa//de ni sangs rgyas mchod mochog yin//mig sogs zhes las yang dag byung //
302a7(rgyud): mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes//mchod pa lnga bshod 'di rnams kyis//myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//de nas dang ldan rdo rje 'chang //so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa//rdo rje
302b1(rgyud): gsum rig gsang dbang po//thub pu chen pas yang gsungs pa//sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la//gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa//de nyid gsum la nyer sbyar/
302b2(rgyud): dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur//bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing //lus dang ngag kyang rnar bsgom//mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas sgom zhing //sbyar ba rnam gsum rdzogs/
302b3(rgyud): par bya//rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na//shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin//sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis//sgom pa med cing byang chub med//rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid de//
302b4(rgyud): mdor na rnam par brtags nasu//sngags la sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin//gnas la gnas med bsgom por bya//de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang //de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis/
302b5(rgyud): mchod//kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis//sgom pa'i mchig 'di bka' stsal to//na mkha'i dbyings kyis dbus gnas par//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/sa
302b6(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya//yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam//sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can//rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldar//de ru gnas//
302b7(rgyud): por mkhas pas ba saM/blo ldan yas kyis byen kha'i//gas bI sr-ig na sgon//gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste//de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog/na mkhi'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa//
303a1(rgyud): nyi ma zhes bya 'odakyil 'khar sgom//sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bskams te//da yi sbrang du gnas pan+d+hag+sa//dbang phyug chen pa skas byed de//gzhi phyed na mkha' mtshon pa dag/bdud rtsi nas na
303a2(rgyud): brtags pa gang //de ni hUM zhes bya bar 'gyur//nom kha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong sgyum//sbyin gyi gzug su yang dag sbyor//rdo rje pad+mo gnyis pa'o//rnam
303a3(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis//de yi steng du rnam par bskum//nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/'od kyi dkyang
303a4(rgyud): 'di nyid sgom//sangs rgyas zhi ba'i glanas dgod pa//'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor//ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba//rtse mo lnga pa 'ang po che//nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis//ri rab
303a5(rgyud): rtse mor rnam par bsam//tsa na kra yi 'bru chod tsam//'dab me brgyad pa gi sor bcas//sna yi rtse mo re rab rtse//byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya//'khor lo la sogs sgom pa ni//de
303a6(rgyud): yi khyad par dag tu brtag/yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas//byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o//sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs//mngar na de ni spro bar bya//glang cha chos
303a7(rgyud): ni logs mtshan po//rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya//de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po//dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog/'gro kun don tu ston pa pos//gsang ba mchog ni bka' stsal
303b1(rgyud): to//skud cig thang gcig yud tsam dang //zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus//bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni//skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad//zla ba drug
303b2(rgyud): bshad de nyid yin//dngos med rdzogs par long spyod pa'o//skad cig gau tsi ga tu bsngags pa ste//dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs//gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa//
303b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug sgram//mchod chen dr-i ni byas nas//gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par sgom//yul dang dbang po sems pa ni//gshang gtso za su byed pa po//byas ni de 'drar
303b4(rgyud): dngos grub ni//bzab pa rnam rtog med pa'o//de nyid 'di ni bla med pa//byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o//rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing //mi rtog don ni 'grub pa
303b5(rgyud): 'gyur//ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de//sra ni mngon par byang chub pa'o//bsam gtan de ni dga' spyad pa//sha zhes bya bar de bshud//nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni//shwa cha
303b6(rgyud): de ni yin par bshad//gsang ba bu yi ge 'phyang mchog rdo rje gsum nI myur du 'grub//dam tshig chen po glang chen+dar+N+Na//de bzhin khyu la sogs pa'i sha/phung po la sogs rig
303b7(rgyud): dbye bas//gang gsung mnyam pa'i grangs kyis//gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas//bsam gtan dga' ba'i ming gcig pu//'jig rten rgyang pan 'jig rten pa kha za
304a1(rgyud): ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur//dge ba'i bshes gnyen brtag pa dang //dri bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//'di drug zlas kun tu bshad//de nas
304a2(rgyud): gsum dgongs pa//bcom ldan 'dasA las thos pa dang //de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol pa//nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang //phra mo'i
304a3(rgyud): rnal 'byer sten mdzad cig mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni//'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs//chu dang 'o me gcig 'gyur bzhin//khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad//'jig
304a4(rgyud): rten 'ga' las yang dag pa//dang bla 'o ma ji bzhin len//ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yi//skyes bu lA la de bsres 'thung //de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das//chos kyi brdud
304a5(rgyud): rtsi de rnams 'thung //dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du//gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di//ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs//mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol//drin/
304a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs mchog gris//glags ldan lag na rdo rje la//bu khyed legs tshar legs te//bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya//rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags drang /de bzhin//
304a7(rgyud): mdo sde la spyod rnams//'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams te//bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas//rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas//'jig rten 'das par gyur pa yin//de ni ting/
304b1(rgyud): 'dzin rnal 'byor yang //de dang 'dra bar byung ma yin//gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das//rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa//de ni de bzhin nyid dngos/
304b2(rgyud): gcig/'khor ba dang ni gcig shes sbyangs//brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis//sangs rgyas rnams ni many+dzus 'gyur zhing //blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis/
304b3(rgyud): byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur//'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang //rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur//gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug po dang //mdangs bzung mthong
304b4(rgyud): na dga' bo dang //mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis//'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed//gsang ba'i 'di ni mchog yin te//sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin//de nyid
304b5(rgyud): sngags kyi gsang ba 'di//rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la//skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa//grosad ba yang dag srung ba po//de rnam
304b6(rgyud): ci dgar byed par 'gyur//de bzhin ga/shugs kun dam pa ste//dmA tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlabs pa'o//le'u drug pa yin pAr ba shad//
304b7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje gsum gisang dbang //dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/mngon rdzogaso byang chub 'di gsung so//de nyid dam tshig bzhi pa
305a1(rgyud): gang //'dod pa thams cad c+doMs te bshad//de rnams long spyod ldan pa yI//ci 'dod par ni bston par bya//rang gi lhar ni brlag sbyor bas//bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya//de ni
305a2(rgyud): rten mchod 'gyur ba//'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid//dka' thob myur ba de yin la//sdum pa dam pa yin par 'dod//mi zadang 'i gnyig ste//'dod pa'i long spyad thams cad kyang //gzung
305a3(rgyud): lha rnams yin par 'dod//de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis//sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub//tha dad yi ge slong mo yin//de 'dod pa ni za ba ste//gang zhig zlos la dga' ba //
305a4(rgyud): de dge slongs mo za bar 'dod//dka' thub dag ni mo bya zhing //sdom po mi bzang nyid kyang min//'dod gsum de nyid long spyod cing //sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas//rdo rje gsum dbye ba
305a5(rgyud): gnas nA//sngags rig byang chub thob par 'gyur//gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang //shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //gsang sngags
305a6(rgyud): spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang //mi 'gyur ches ni brnyes pa yang //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/kun mkhyen ye shos chags ldan pas//'dod pa'i spyan lnga rnams
305a7(rgyud): bsten//byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing //byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya//de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas//mkhas pa yis ni mtshad de bya/de nyid gtsang po sa sna cha
305b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad cha//sbrul rnam gsum shes byas nas//sgyu rnams la ni dngul bar bya//'di ni bcom ldan sa rdzogs pa//sa s+yAn+tas rin chen 'byung gnas
305b2(rgyud): gto//dri la rnam gsum shes byis nas//rnams le ni dngus byar bya//de nyi bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso//rol rnam gsum shes bya na
305b3(rgyud): lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//de nyid don yid rdo rje grags//sna tshogs gtso po bcom ldan 'dis//reg lA rnam gsum shes byas nas//rang gi rig su la dngul ba dag/
305b4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can//mi bskyod me long gzugs can//nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang //gnyi ga rjes mi dmigs pa//gzugs la sogs gsum de yin te//lha rnams la ni
305b5(rgyud): bar bya//gi zugs sgra ro la sogs pa la//sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya//gusang ba bsdus par gyur pa ni//snying po snangs rgyas kunas skyed//mkhas pas gzugs sgra la so/
305b6(rgyud): lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgrom//de bzhin rigasu sgom pa ni//sgom pas dar ni sgom par bye//na ma 'i rdo rje skye ga ni//sangs rgyas su dran par bshad//sangs rgya sa rjes
305b7(rgyud): sa kyi //chos ni u dran pa sgom pa//rdo rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor pas//rdo rjerjes dran sgom pa'o//ri nas dpyi ji skad pa shadangos kyang//chos dang la spyod spu sbyor byung /
306a1(rgyud): rmA/ra gyu //de 'dun khro bo rjes dran sh+ma/deny-i gas ma spyos m+b+ha pa g+sa ga/gas /lha rnams rjes dran spyong bas+ho//de sgom byang chubardzob par
306a2(rgyud): bzhi po dag na re ra ba zhi//ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs//de nyid lo yi grangs yin te//bcu drug pa ni yong su bai ngaM//sangs rgyas kun d+has basbyin pa yin//dung mod la glengs bcu drug pa//
306a3(rgyud): gzugs bzang bu dang mchod pa ni//dben pa zhes byar brtsams par bya//byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba//khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yi//de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che//sbyin sgo//
306a4(rgyud): nyid ni bsgom par bya//bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i//dang por sbyar ba 'di bsgoms ni//sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//yi ge hUM dang /
306a5(rgyud): bzhin oM//phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya//de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid//ci rigs par ni rnam par spro//'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'o//rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste//go seng dang
306a6(rgyud): snying kha sA rtse ru//rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya//'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar//shes rab de ni rtag tu sgom//gang phyi yid ni dador gyur pas//de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o//granas
306a7(rgyud): ming gnas pa legs sbyor bar//bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rigs//sangs rgyas rjes dran myong la sogs//byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya//nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun bya
306b1(rgyud): bston//thA ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming //ba shid nyid/nyis mang byung //rdo d+hA de 'angs nyid du spyor//sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste//zlog ling ga
306b2(rgyud): yin par bsgrags//gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste//sangs rgyas gzung u sgom pa'o//de las blo ldan gyis spyi bo//ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse ma gnas//mnyam pa med pas
306b3(rgyud): khyad par du//sangs rgyas sprin rnams der smra'o//chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang //rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas//rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyar//b+ha ga' ling gar brtag pa'o//de na/
306b4(rgyud): bo spu'i bu gA las//'bod pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro//de nyid pas ma kun rdzogs byed pa'o//'di ni chos kyi bdag pa yon//rdo rje rje su dran pa sgom//dngos mod gcig pul
306b5(rgyud): /sbyor la/stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur//b+haM ga ling ga zhes bshad//de nas be spu'i buM ga nas//rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu spro//rje byang chub sems sgom nyid//myur nga dngos grub
306b6(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur//rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyar ba yis//mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las//de bzhin rnal 'byor pas sprob nas//dwags kyi dngos grub 'thob par d+hA ra//
306b7(rgyud): rjes dran sbyor ba la'ang //stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i//khro bo'i ba spyi'i bu ga nas//khro bo'i sprin rnaMs spro bar bya/de nas dang ldan rje 'dzim khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chena'o// dr-i
307a1(rgyud): dgongs pa ni//thub pa rgya la slar nus pa//thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa//b+ha ga'i ling gA'i sbyor ba ni//'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las//sangs rgyas la sogs sgo byur/
307a2(rgyud): gi/tshul 'di ma 'dis skye bo la//phyi dus kun rmongs spyod pa ste//bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni//tso byir gsungs zhes de rnams sgra//'phro bas na mkha' mtshan ma can//rten 'byung
307a3(rgyud): nyid mi shes shing //de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas//ji bzhin par ni rtogs par byed//mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu//sku med sred gsum bdag
307a4(rgyud): nyid can//dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshon dang ljon//de bsra khyod ni chos kun gyi//ljon gsum bdag donyi gsum//dgongs pa bye ba dri med gsum//sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung //
307a5(rgyud): khyod 'dir b+ha gA khyab 'jug ste//ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid//khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags//khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung //dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che//dus dang
307a6(rgyud): su gyur pa nyid//shes dang shes bya rnam par grol//de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis//de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas//dmi tshig rje su dran sgom pa/
307a7(rgyud): babacom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad//rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan//dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las//rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' sgom//dkyil 'khor
307b1(rgyud): rjesu dran bdag nyid//dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las//rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te//rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'bang bya//sku rnam dran pa'i sbyor ba yang /sa
307b2(rgyud): rnams kyi phung po lnga//sangs rgyas de nyid sngogs brtag pa//bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig/gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga//rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs//de yi gsung ci 'dra/
307b3(rgyud): bur 'gyur//bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin//thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang //rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni//kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin//bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba 'byung //
307b4(rgyud): ni rjes dran spro dang yon rjes dran rdo rje nyid//spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du//bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur//sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa//de sbyor dran pa sgom pa ni//rdo rjes
307b5(rgyud): kyi sku gang yin//gsung dang sku ni rnam sgomo pa//de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid//rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi//sngags 'dzin mchogo ni ci 'dra ba//bdag kyang de dang
307b6(rgyud): 'dre bar 'gyur//dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni//de bas tshangs par shin tu dbyung //dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis//mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung //de bzhin gshegs
307b7(rgyud): mchog che ba ni//dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste//blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na//dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur//shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa//rje su dran pa zhes
308a1(rgyud): bshad do//pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa//yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o//thams cang rang bzhin dri ma med//ma skyes pa dang zad pa med//byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/khams
308a2(rgyud): med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o//ma skyes rjesu sbyor ba gang //der ni ci yang brjod man zhing //ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa//dran pa de ni yin par bshad//ji ltar na mkha' 'od gsal ba//mtshan
308a3(rgyud): ma med cing 'gyur ba med//rang bzhin mkho' dang 'drar gyur cing //gnyis med gnyi su yong min zhing //yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang //zho sdang rdzogs legs spyod pa'i ming //
308a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing //de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya//rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs spangs te//bud med lo grongs bcu gnyis pa//brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las
308a5(rgyud): rang gi khro bas mchod par bya//dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang //de ni dag par bshad pa yin//de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags//shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro/'di yis lu/
308a6(rgyud): la mchod pa dang //khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs//chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs//sku gsung thugs ni gang dag grub//tshe 'di nyid la
308a7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa//de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur//de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid//de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag/mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang /
308b1(rgyud): ngag gsapa/na pa pa da pa rgyu 'byu na/ nams / lanas / byung
308b2(rgyud): /de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad k+Sh+ma rdo rje//ma kyigs ba/ga smra ba nam / na pa ga da//de nas du la ldan de zhi gan
308b3(rgyud): kun mchog dpal 'od chen po//de de rkyen gshegs pa rnams cad/blam du rjegasum gyu ba dag/mgon pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po//dbang phyug dbang phyug dpe ba dung //sa rgyus
308b4(rgyud): gyi ston pa la//bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba bat+tam+b+ha/namakha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che//theg pa chen po'i rnam snang gi/kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs
308b5(rgyud): dngos kun dngas po gcig pa'i mchog/rigs mchog/rnams cadade yang dag 'byung//rmyil ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/mchod pa n+d+ha ma d+h+r-ig ba shud du gsuM/'dirgya
308b6(rgyud): rkyen bzhi sdang che//gti mug chen po blo gros che//theg pa gsum po rab ston/rdo rje theg pa ston pa'o//na mkha' gyig bla dngos po'i mchog/ r+g+haM mtsha tha ma /
308b7(rgyud): po chags ming pa//rgyal gnas mchod par bshad du gsol//rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog/thar lam gcig pu ston pa po//sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/mi ma
309a1(rgyud): mchod pa bshad du gsol//dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag/byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho che//chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba//rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba//rdo rje gsum gcig /
309a2(rgyud): ngag don//sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad//bdag med med tshos shin tu dag/phyog 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po//thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur
309a3(rgyud): thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po//kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa'ang //nu chung mig yangs btsal nas na//gzugs dang na chod rnams kyis rgyan//lo grangs nyi shu lnga len pa
309a4(rgyud): rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag/rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi//sa phyogasu ni rgyal badrag nyid//zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong //bshad gaN+DI chu yis byugs nas ni//sangs rgyas
309a5(rgyud): byang chub rab ster ba'o//rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yI//phung pa zhes bya sna tshogs skyes//rdo rje gsum po mi phyeng khams//rgyal ba zhes ni bye bar
309a6(rgyud): bshad//kun mkhyen ye shes lang cho ste//len pa migs lnga la sbyor la//de nyid na chung yin par brtag/'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya//'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa//gang zhig/
309a7(rgyud): dngos med ces bshad pa//mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin//gtsang ba rnam ngag sems yin te//rnam par dben pa dngos med pa//sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin//sa phyogs rgyal ba
309b1(rgyud): ta/'byung ba yin//zhi ba sna tshogs ngos 'byung ba/zhi bar gnas ni myu la sogs//bshad gAtsa yul dang dbyung por grags//thu ni shos rab la sogs drug/'dod
309b2(rgyud): gang byugs gyur pa//rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba//de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa//dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid//mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa mi//bkod pa'i
309b3(rgyud): yan lag mtshan nyid bshad//'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi'o//'jig rten 'das pa'i snying kha ru//rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang /rked pa gsang ba 'jig rten pa//rgyal sras rnams
309b4(rgyud): kyi bkod pa ni//rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin//nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par sgom//bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par//brtul zhugs can gyis
309b5(rgyud): /snying kar skom//chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni//mA ma kir ni yongasu brtag/zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas//bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya//rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni//'od zer sna tshogs
309b6(rgyud): nyid kyis rgyan//yis rgya mtsho dus gsum pa//gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba//blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las//ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhil bas/
309b7(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya//gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod//rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma//me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni//de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas//sgron mar
310a1(rgyud): ud pa la nyid myur pa//rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o//'dug dang gnas dang skye ba dang //de bzhin snang ba'i ming can//de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas//rdo rje gsum blo dam tshig gnas/
310a2(rgyud): bla ldan gyis dbul ba//lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshig/khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las//me tog dgengs pa thos nas ni//rdo rje can
310a3(rgyud): /thub chen zhus//me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang //chu ru yongasu brtags pa yin//re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya//me tog de lnga gsum du bshad//bya rgod me tog za ba dang //bung ba sha za/
310a4(rgyud): zhes zer zhing //me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni//ma 'ongs skye bos mi shes//ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi//dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur//'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes
310a5(rgyud): smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod//de ltar bdag nyid kyis smad pas//sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas//mi las 'das nas gzhan du
310a6(rgyud): 'gro/gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min//phyi rol na min gnyi gar min//tshogs pa las ni ma yin te//rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la gnas//de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas//lus
310a7(rgyud): la gsang sngags 'di nyid las//gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus//des ni bdag dang de dge smod//de rnams rjesu gzung ba'i phyir//dgongs pas de ni bshadadu gsol/
310b1(rgyud): / gA dbu ma 'tshal na//mangs pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur//de nus bcom ldan pa tshogs pas//gsung ba'i bdag pa la gsungs pa//tin+da dang maHnAr+m+ma na
310b2(rgyud): ba yis//me tog don ni bshad par bye//pad+ma ud pa la nyin mor bshad//dza ti mtshan ma yin zhes bshad//lha yi bdag nyid gsum drang gicig/gnyis lnga gcig da
310b3(rgyud): gsum du 'gyur//de yi thabs ni nyin mar ba shad//mtshan mi shes pa ces pashad //nyin dang mtshan ma dbye ba yis//'jug du 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur/de gnyis dades kyi
310b4(rgyud): dgongs pas yingasu gartags pa yin//de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur//de bsku lha chags kyis de min+da//rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams//dgengs pa'i chos la ra na bya'o//
310b5(rgyud): pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni//de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur//gang zhig/rlung ni bcur grags pa//de ni pad+ma ud pal med//de nyid cis grags rdo rje gsum//dza ti gcig pu
310b6(rgyud): gsum du 'dro de//kar ni kaM dang mA li ka/yug ti ka ra ba ra ni//go rims bzhin du sbyin sogs te//si lA sogs par 'dir sbyar//dngos ming go'i phang la bkod pas//
310b7(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas//gcig tu sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i//mchod pa chen po de 'gyur//lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dge bzhag/lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur
311a1(rgyud): de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor la ni//dpag tshad brgyu yo dkyil 'khor//do na mkhas pas rtag par ni//rigs rnams rab tu dgongs par bya//pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang //de bzhin chung
311a2(rgyud): pal rtag tu sdom//dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa//dpag tshad rgya khyon de nyid gsum//byams pa la sogs gru ba nir 'gyur//mdzes phung pos rgyun pa yin//glu ba ni den
311a3(rgyud): gyur//zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming rgyan//mchod rten yis sems rang pozhin//gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med//rigs rnams michod phyir de nyid ni//shes rab can gyis gnas
311a4(rgyud): mi//mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams//de yi mchod pa rgya mtshogs la//rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid//gos ni bsdu ba zhes bya'o//mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis//
311a5(rgyud): byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya//shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las//lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya//sbyor gan gi de las yang dag byung //rin chen byung gnasan chu
311a6(rgyud): yin//dga'i mgu yang dag ljon pa yin//dngos ga shin tu grub pa'i phyir//nga rgyal l-I sogs bdun nas //rin chen thams cad dngul brid d+ha//chos da rdzogs
311a7(rgyud): las byung //rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni//des bkang ba yo zhing 'di ni//shes rab thabs gcig las byung ba'i//dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i byed//zhing de nyin re dbul bar na na/
311b1(rgyud): mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus do//phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste///
311b2(rgyud): 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la//reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sgom//bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
311b3(rgyud): pa'i sku//yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa//dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung //yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i//gshad gci ji lta ji lta bar//de nyid mchad pa rnams kyis
311b4(rgyud): mchod//skal bzang bzhin ni mdzes pa yi//bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang //gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'gyur bas//rnal 'byor ma de byin rlabs la//byas nas gnyis
311b5(rgyud): med sbyor gcig pu//rang gi lus ni nang du gzhug/spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar//byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas bkod//mig bzang dag pa'i bya ba yi//dag byung khu ba blangs nas
311b6(rgyud): mchod//gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de//blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur//so la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang //spyan la sogs pa ro rab brtags pa//de ni 'jug sogs
311b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yang //de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste//rdo rje yis can gsang gi/gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i//
312a1(rgyud): mchog/rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa//dA ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed//de bzhin gshegs pa
312a2(rgyud): kyis//rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las//gshang gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i//le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad//de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso//thams cad na mkha' mi
312a3(rgyud): 'gyur che//sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/gzugs don dpong phyug dam pa yin//rdo rje gsum nyid long spyod pa//rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khord//sangs rgyas yis sbre
312a4(rgyud): gcig pa'o//gsang ba nyams ni dga'i bar bshad//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya//rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang //sgom pa'i bdag
312a5(rgyud): nyid can gyis sgom//'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang //'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang /dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'byung //bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag/rdo gsum gcig
312a6(rgyud): ljong spyod ni//rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa'i//thugs kyis dngos grub byed bsam gtan//bsgoms nA myur du thob par 'gyur//rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi//rdo rje gsang ba
312a7(rgyud): 'di lta bu//rdo rjes rje 'dzin pa ni//sems can thams cad bsad na ni//de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i/rgyal ba'i srasu skye bar 'gyur//zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis//zhing de 'beng
312b1(rgyud): par byed par 'gyur//de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu//gtso bro kun mkhyen thams cad rig/dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi//mgon la byag
312b2(rgyud): na rdo rjes gsol//'di ltar dngos mid mchog gyur pa//khyod ni chos rnams skyon mdzad pa//'jig rten po dang 'gal tshig gis//mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad//gang zhe
312b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams//chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa//ji ltar rdo rjes phye mar brlog/de ni phyir brlags gyur pa las//
312b4(rgyud): ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur//chos sku gcig pu las byung las//lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas//dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams//phye mar brlag par ji
312b5(rgyud): ltar nus//phyir brlag byed pa mdangos med pas//phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du//sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa//nus pa bsdam mi khyab ldan la//de 'dra bar ni phyer
312b6(rgyud): brlag par//sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus//sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyir brlags pas//'di gnyis khyad par med zhes//ma 'ongs
312b7(rgyud): skye bo smra bas 'byung//sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa//min zhes mi rnams nges smras zhing //gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gsungs bzhin//rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur/
313a1(rgyud): thag bzangs bskyabs na 'tshang rgya bla//dgangs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog/de ni bcom ldan m+WAr sbyor bas//mi bskyong zhing du skyes 'gyur ram//sems can 'khor bar la
313a2(rgyud): gyur pa//de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am//snying rjes bsad par bya'o zhes//sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong //'odas che ston par gyur pa dang //da ltar rjesu ston mdzad dang //mnyes bya ma
313a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams//snangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o//mi spyong bzugs can rdo rje yis//de rnams de lta phyinam par bgyi//de nyid sa tshogs don rgyun chug/de rnams kyis/
313a4(rgyud): ni dri ltar rtogs//gang zhig shes pas rgyal smos rnams//dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur//ma 'das skye bo'i don du ni//de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol//de nas rdo rje 'dzin
313a5(rgyud): sgra yi//'gro la phan pa'i tshig gastan nas//de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang //khyab bdag gis ni sgrar gsungs pa//legaso bri khyod tshur legs te//kun tu bzang po khyod leg so//dgongs
313a6(rgyud): pas bshad pa'i don du ni//khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa//gsungs ngon ji lta ji lta bar//de ni dra yis bshad par bya//phreng sogs yan lag ging gyur pa//sangs rgyas so ni
313a7(rgyud): brtan zhing //sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang //dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu brta na//'khor ba mi bskyod med can te//de'i sngags rdo rje ni byed mi gas la rdo rje zhipo pa shad/
313b1(rgyud): med gcig phyung //ngas bya shig pa ni bang ba ste//sang+yas rgyas sems can khyad par du//sman chags kyi dbang po yi//bla ni rang ldanan nyung dug /
313b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa//'gro ba rlung gi ming cano//mi bskyod rdo rje'i sbyar ba nyid//lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni//de che myur la sogs bya ba//klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid/
313b3(rgyud): phung sogs brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//sku gsung thugaso las yang dag byung //de yi yan lag phung por bshad//de ni phyir 'gyur bsad pa yin//'di ni zhe sdang rigs/
313b4(rgyud): yid 'ong //mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid//de'i zhing skyed dam pa yin//dngos grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur//de nas dang ldan bde chen po//yes thar pa rab sgrub pa//rang bzhin
313b5(rgyud): ngag gis gos med pa//byang chub spyod pa rab sgrub pos//phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po//gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la//bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas//sgrub pa'i dam tshig de
313b6(rgyud): nyid gsungs//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnos par//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la//rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing //sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom//rin chen kun
313b7(rgyud): bya sbyor ba yis//rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par skem//rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis//rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya//shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur//rnam smin dngos pa/
314a1(rgyud): med pa gang //de nyid dbrog pa'i rdo rje sa//sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa//rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba//rgyal ba'i sa su 'gyur ba dang //nor gyi rgyu mtshos gang ba yi//yid bzhin na
314a2(rgyud): bu 'dra bar 'gyur//'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid//dam tshig yin par yongasu bsgrags//rigs kun rgya mtsho zhes bya ste//de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur//de nas bdag
314a3(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das//'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa//gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa//dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to//no mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par
314a4(rgyud): rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang //bud med lta bu'i sbyor ba yang //ting 'dzin gyis sbyor ba yis//
314a5(rgyud): de ru bsgom par bya//'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin//dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis//gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyor//chos dang rdzogs long spyod sbyor ba//gas
314a6(rgyud): sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis//sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis//dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor pa'i//snyoms zhugs sbyor ba nga yis ni//de dag thams cad nye bor spyod//sku gsum
314a7(rgyud): mi byed sngags rnams kyi//'di ni sgom pa mchog ngo yin//de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di//'dod chags rigs gcig sgom pa'o//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kye//'dod chags
314b1(rgyud): chen po'i tshul mchog ste//sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing //rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya//de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum//rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa'o//
314b2(rgyud): bdag med ye shes las byung bas//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms
314b3(rgyud): te//sangs rgyas thams cad bsgoms par bya//rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba//rgyal ba thams cad smra ba ste//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//na mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o//gang zhig
314b4(rgyud): brdzun du smra bshad pa//brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste//dpa' bo grang zhig sgom byed pa//de ni rgyal ba'i mchog du 'gyur//gsang ba'i ye shes dam pa ste//sangs rgyas dngos grub
314b5(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/dram tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i//rigs kyi dam chog la 'jug pa'o//kun tu kun nas 'bad pa yis//ji bzhin don du drang byas te//so sror rtog pa'i
314b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//de ni dngos grub rgya chen 'thob//de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//mi phyed rdo rje gsum rgyal ba dag/rdo rje'i drangs grung rab ston pas//gsung ni 'di skad ba/
314b7(rgyud): stsol to//na mkha'i dbyings kyi do bus gnas par//der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'o//dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad//dkan
315a1(rgyud): mchog dpal ni rab sgoms te//gzugs rnams kun gyis sa 'di gang //phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i//sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du//rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni//
315a2(rgyud): sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i//bsgom sran dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes//bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa//sna tshogs gzugs can
315a3(rgyud): 'od po che//bsam bsod dpal ldan gcig pu nyid//dpag tu med par gyur pa yin//de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs//chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni//de bzhin gshegs
315a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis//dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni//tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di//de ni de rnams brjod
315a5(rgyud): par byed//ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdug/gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing //'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa//de bzhin
315a6(rgyud): gshegs pa kun mchog dang //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi/TIkyi dkyil 'khor dbusu ni//ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam//gtso bo'i yang dag rdo rje'i tshig/dgongs bla
315a7(rgyud): ci slad gar gsungs shes//brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang //brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol//de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis//brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang //brjod//
315b1(rgyud): kyis mi lang grangs kyi ni//ri rab rdul dran dang mnyam pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //dam tshig rdo rje dang lnga sogs pa li//byang chub sems dang /
315b2(rgyud): sems chen la//dngos med las byung gsal na gsungs//dman drang dmad pa'i 'du shes ni//rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig/ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs
315b3(rgyud): 'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin//'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di//rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu//sangs rgyas mnyom med 'byung 'gyur 'di//gsung ba'i sngags
315b4(rgyud): don spyod pa nyid//'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu//namakha' kun tu song ba ste//chos rnams kun kyang dreng rtags shing //rab dbyer sbyor bar gyur pa nyid//'dod pa'i khams ni mi
315b5(rgyud): shing //de ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas//de bzhin gzugs med khams na yan//'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas//rigs kyo bu chos thams cad kyang //de ltar don gyi dbang
315b6(rgyud): mkhyen nas//dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams//de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis//chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin//de bzhin du ni khyod rnams kyis//mdo
315b7(rgyud): na khong du chud par bya//yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis//na mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byung //dam tshig rje su rig par bya//'di ltar da/
316a1(rgyud): nangogs kyi bu//gtsub shing gnub bstan bcas pa dang //skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi//rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas me yang 'byung mod kyis//gnub shing la sarba/
316a2(rgyud): re re nas//'di ltar sa stong brtags na 'o/mi gang na'adu mo gnas//drag cha dang ni gzugs brtan dang //sgyu mi dang ni smig rgyu dang //de bzhin chu zla lam ste//chos rnams thams
316a3(rgyud): de dang 'dra//mgon po pi dad+ma sgra lta bu//rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung //de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams//cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin//gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor/
316a4(rgyud): pa yis//gnas pa na mkha'i mtshan nyid yin//des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi//dam tshig rjesu rig par bya//de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces//gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas paso//
316a5(rgyud): rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir//phung po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams//ngo mtshar sma du byung nas ni/rnams pa yis ni mig gdangs te//
316a6(rgyud): tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol te//chos 'ding mtshar rmad byung ste/na mkha' dang dri ma tshungs pa yi//mi rtag rnam par dag pa yong //kun rdzob du ni bshad par mdzad//dam
316a7(rgyud): tshig chen po yang dag gnas//dgangs pa lung sbyin mchog la ni//gang zhig yod 'ang bzang gyur pa//don de bzhin song pa yin//mchog tu dag par de nyid dun/
316b1(rgyud): pa chen po zhes bya ba//dam tshig rdul ni yang dag bshad//le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun//rdo rje gsum
316b2(rgyud): 'byung bcom ldan 'das//slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni//bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das//dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas//mngon par byang chub nged dpon nyid//sku dang
316b3(rgyud): gsung thugs gtsang gtso la//btung de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol//snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pas//gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum//dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi
316b4(rgyud): mchog/de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol//de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes//sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol//gsung gcig du mi'i rnam par rtog/yang dge bsdus
316b5(rgyud): don de bzhin gsungs//de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das//nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso//'bar ba brag po spyan yangs pas//gsungs ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//sku la sog
316b6(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje gsum//sku dang gsung thugs sgom pa ni//mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa//dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o//de nas mgron po bcom ldan 'das//rang bzhir dge
316b7(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs//pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi//rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la//dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te//de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa//
317a1(rgyud): phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//de bzhin gshogs pa kun 'don//mgon po mi bskyong la sogas+t+ra pal+lo bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang //rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni//brgya stong //
317a2(rgyud): du ma zhes bya ba dang //sems can don bya ba ral dang //mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu//'dod pa'i yon tan lder ldan pas//
317a3(rgyud): cing dgyes par gyur pa dang //yongasu spyod pa yod kyang ni//sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams lo//kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs//rang gtsogasang sngags spyod tshul mchog/chos
317a4(rgyud): bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can//'di dgra rdzogs par gyur mAny+dza me nas//spyan ras kyi ni 'tsha mi mdzad//de ltar rnam par spyad pa'i don//gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la//
317a5(rgyud): yang dag par ni byin rlabs phyir//de ni sbyin par mdzod 'di yin//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/thub la phyag ni rdo rjes gsol//mgrin pa de bzhin gshegs de rnams/
317a6(rgyud): skye bar gyur pa la//dngos po mad cing dmig su med//na mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas//'dod pa'i yon lngar ldan nas//ji ltar de rnams rolnga par mdzad//de rnams phyogs bcu'i
317a7(rgyud): 'jig rten du//nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang //sems can don gyi bya ba kun//'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin//mgon pa 'dod pa'i yon rnams//sbyin sogs drug
317b1(rgyud): ces bya bar 'byung //thams cad dag kyang dri nyid 'byung //pha rol byin par mnyam bzhag nyid//de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'o//'dod pa'i ston lnga dang Sh+Tha//
317b2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang //'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad//'di rnams kyis ni mgon 'o 'di//mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams//rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang //
317b3(rgyud): ba'i don kyang mdzod gyur cing //'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams//de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa//dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di//de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur//phyag
317b4(rgyud): byar 'os pa'i rigs pa ni//nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod//yod med la sogs byed pa ni//gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur//phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa//
317b5(rgyud): gogang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga//khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang //gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin//'di ni yan lag thams cad ni//bya ba nyan thos theg
317b6(rgyud): de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste//tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di//gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas//de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin//shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'o//nges par 'byung ba'i
317b7(rgyud): tshul gsum po//chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa//mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa//gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis//'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa//zhi ba
318a1(rgyud): gcig la gnas pa'i mgon//'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs//sngagasA las yang dag 'byung ba de/mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams//dngas me gnas la gnas/
318a2(rgyud): pas na//sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur//gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis//de na rdzogs ling spyod gzigs 'gyur//bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di//don du 'a
318a3(rgyud): bar ma gyur pas//rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las//chos nyid de yis shos mi 'gyur//ji skad gsungs po mi shes pas/phye dus skye ba la la sgra//'jig rten pa rnams drang phyir phyir//
318a4(rgyud): gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsal//de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas//lag+na na rdo rje glags pa che//dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa//bu khyod shes rab chen po ldog so//
318a5(rgyud): gang zhig shes pas mi 'ongs pa'o//skye ba rnam par mi rtag 'gyur//tshig gcig lnga yang sna tshogs don//yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad//de nas dam pa bac+doMs khram
318a6(rgyud): kun mkhyen thams cad rigs//skyes b+h+r-ingam pa da dag la//spyani ras kyis ni 'tsho byu phy-ir//rdo rje gus m+b+ha g+hi gsang ba 'dra//de btsun gzugs pa kun mjug/ sa
318a7(rgyud): rdorje //gsang 'i tshug gi gnas/nga gas rnams thams kyad gyi//sprul pa gr-ic-ig nas bya gro sa shegs kun gis rdzog
318b1(rgyud): /las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa//sku gsung thugs kyis yang dag rtogs//dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs//dam tshig la ni dpan/
318b2(rgyud): pa dang //chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs//dam tshig la dmigs de bzhi no//nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las//tshig lam nges par brjod pa ni//de nyid sngagasu yang dag
318b3(rgyud): bsdus//sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu//yi gu hUM ni sku gsungs la//de nas yi ge saM oM gsungs te//de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AHswa ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin//hA hA
318b4(rgyud): 'dod lhar gyur pa ste//de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga//hUM oM AHswA de bzhin hA//'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni//sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun//rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal//
318b5(rgyud): bar gyur//de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas//rdo rje sems dpa'i rje su dran//zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'o//rnams par mi rtog chos gcig skyes//de nas bcom ldan 'ad/
318b6(rgyud): de yang //de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis//de yi byin rlabs sbyor don du//dam tshigo 'di dag bka' stsal to//na mkha'a'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//dkyil 'kho bkod//
318b7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba//re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis//sbom por sbyar bsgom par bya//bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang //bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid//zla ba'i dbus gnas yig hUM/
319a1(rgyud): /rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag//rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba//rnam par 'phro ba bsum par bya//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs//snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas//la
319a2(rgyud): sngan nyid skad cig de//rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen go tso//'di ni kun mchog chen por skye//rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba//sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o//snying
319a3(rgyud): po rang gi rdo rje sngags//rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad//rlung sngags tshul las byung ba'o//skyes bu'i gzugasu bsgom par bya//sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus//gnas bzhi dag tu de dag do//
319a4(rgyud): kha dog gsum po zhal gsum ste'i//de nyid gsum gcig rnam sgom zhes//bcom ldan 'das mchog na mkha' ni//rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos gsungs//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
319a5(rgyud): mchog/zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che//gtsol phyag na rdo rje yis//gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa//hUM A~M AHdang swA hA/zhes//de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur pas//sangs rgyas srasA dang
319a6(rgyud): bcas pa kun//de nas rab 'dar brgyal gyur cing //rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa//thub chen de 'dor ji lta bur//mgon po de ni phyi dus na//ji skad gsungs pa mi rtog snga la//gcig
319a7(rgyud): pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams//rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal 'gyur ces//byis pa rnams kyis mi rtog so//lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi//grangs dag tu
319b1(rgyud): muni ston mdzad cing //ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang //'dar zhing brgyal bar do ma gyur//ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba//mi ni mkhas pa'i nga rgyal tsam
319b2(rgyud): bla ma'i lung ni blangs na su//rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed//de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi//mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi shes pAr//sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yis//gzhan rnams
319b3(rgyud): la ni mi snyan sgrogs//'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong na//bzhad gang dag ni byed par 'gyur//reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi//mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur//gang zhig yid ni rin chen
319b4(rgyud): 'dri'o//'gre la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams//'di ni ma 'ongs dusu yang //dngos grub mtshig ni thob par 'gyur//de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir//skad cig rjes gsung grub don du//
319b5(rgyud): sbyasbyor bar dgongs pa'i bsams pa can//bcom ldan 'di ni bsha du gsol//de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das//'gro pan phyag ni rdo rje l-i//da ltar sbyar ba yang dag spyir//sgom pI/
319b6(rgyud): dngos po rtogs byed pa//dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid//gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams//sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod gyur//phung //
319b7(rgyud): po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i//lus las skyes te yod pa 'di//stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las//sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod//sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de///
320a1(rgyud): bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor//zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las//zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam//bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing //rang bzhin dri ma med byas la//da la dang myur dang //
320a2(rgyud): gnas pa yi//sna tshogs da gcig dag la gzhug/yid da man rim la sogs byas kyang //sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas//de nas dbang po med gyur pa//gang tshe zhi ba'i bad gcig pu//rang /
320a3(rgyud): bzhin dag pa'i sbyar ba ste//de yi chos ni lta ba pa//de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags//sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung //gang phyir rang ni blo gyur pa//yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags
320a4(rgyud): lngaldade tshe snying las rab 'dir cing //dbang ba thams cad brgyal bar gyur//gang yang phung sogs yan log ni//sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de//de nyid kyi na grangs mnyam pa'i//
320a5(rgyud): 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar//nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni//phung po la sogs bshad pa gang //sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te//de ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur//de gnyis la ni
320a6(rgyud): snyoms 'jug pa//sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te//de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung //de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin//rdo rje gsang ba rlung byung //
320a7(rgyud): baM//phra mo'i snying gong dbus gnas par//dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o//de yi dbus gnas zhi ba yi//go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya//de hUM zhes bya'i 'od po che//de yongs gyur pa'i dzin
320b1(rgyud): 'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa//rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu rlom//rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya//de yi snying khar bsdams nas na/
320b2(rgyud): g+ha rnamasna rab tu bskul bar bya//'di ni sa sa rgyu sa thams cad kyi//rdo rje thams cad ba sgrub pa'o//'khor lo pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang //rol mo 'di ni dag pa ste//rdo rje lcags kyu rnam
320b3(rgyud): nas//snying kha ru ni bskul bar 'gyur//rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di//zhag bdun bar du byas nas ni//ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang //rdo rje gsum po yang dag sgrub/phung po la sogs
320b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang //de ni dngos po med lta ba//de nyid mchog gi gsang sngags kyis//sgrog pa rnam smin mthong ba la//skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste//gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor cing
320b5(rgyud): byung //mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing //'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin//zhi ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las//sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas//yid la mgu zhing dga'//
320b6(rgyud): gyur pa'i//dngos grub rgya cher ster bar 'gyur//phung po la btags sangs rgyas dang //de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams//sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don sgrub pas//rmongs pas 'da'
320b7(rgyud): bo byas nas ni//de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur//zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las//'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog/de las bzlog pa 'jig rten po'o//de nas bdag po bsngos//
321a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa blo//'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso pA//gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to//gang zhi ba sngags kyi skyes bur bshad//rdo rje gsum gyi yis gzugs//de na/
321a2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i//gcig par sgom pa rtag tu byed//bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'o//sngags kyi dbang po rnam sgom pa//dbang pa gnyis sbyor bzang po ste//dngos po
321a3(rgyud): thams cad rnam brtogs pa'o//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sngags kyi dam tshig mchog sgom pa'o//rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor//rig ma dbang phyug po dag kyang sgom//gnyis
321a4(rgyud): med gnyi su med chags pa//lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khoraro//gsang ba zhes pa der sbyar ba//de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid//de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das//thams cad dbang bskur dam
321a5(rgyud): pa ni//mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa//gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to//no mkha' mtha' yas sbyar ba yis//phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa//chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim///
321a6(rgyud): bud med do ni rgya chen 'gyur//rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni//'phro ba'i bud med ces bya ba//gsung sngags de nyid don gsang nyid//de ni gsad bAr nye bar spyod//der ni yid 'ang sangs rgyas
321a7(rgyud): /rnams//bye bo grangs mod rdo rje 'dzin//sngags rig dam pa spro'o zhes//dar ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs//byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni//ston pa 'dir ni tha ma cher/
321b1(rgyud): rten pa la 'dir bshad de//'jig rten 'das pa bzlog pa'o//na mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni//'di yis shin tu 'thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems
321b2(rgyud): mtsho//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob//dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la//gang zhig sems ni dad gyur pa//gsang ba 'bad de yang dag sprul//da ni rtog tu legs par byed/
321b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang //de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba//le'u bcu pa yin par bshad//de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das//rdog su
321b4(rgyud): mchog mchog gsang ba//de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig/nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog zhes bya'i//ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yis//
321b5(rgyud): rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i//le'u 'di ni bka' stsal te//sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che//rdo rje gsum gyi yis sgoms//rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir//rdo rje yAM shes dag gis
321b6(rgyud): kyang //tshangs pa l-i sogs yang dag bshad//ye shes snying po dam pa ste//rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa//sku yi rdo rje'i'athob byed pa'o//a dang zung ni gsung rdo rje//byang
321b7(rgyud): chu ba bdag med 'thob byed pa'o//hU~M ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid//sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o//de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang //ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad/
322a1(rgyud): shu lnga sogs maung can gyi//skyes bu'i gzugs 'di 'gyur//de bas re re'ang gsum nyid//rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du gyur//brjod med sa byon brgyad pa las//da ni na mkha' las brgyas
322a2(rgyud): 'gyur//brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la//de las nges par nyi shu lnga//skyes bu nyid du byung ba ni//mgrin bcu zhes byi'i ming can dang //sgra sgrogaso gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur//de nas
322a3(rgyud): nges pa gcig nyid gyur//tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste//'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad//'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu//de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid//de las kyang ni
322a4(rgyud): yang dag 'byung //long spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o//dri nas sngags gcig sprul pa las//'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur//mtshams dang skye mched nor lha'o//zla ba zung cig rig byed//
322a5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i grangs kyir rnams//de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas//'dri rnams las gcig gzung na po ni//sangs rgyas rol mo bston par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di//na mkha
322a6(rgyud): rdo rje dbus bsame//dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa//yi ge b+hA ni dris pasamo//rdo rje sprin ni sgra bskyed pa'i//de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku//de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor par
322a7(rgyud): sbom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sbom//sngags rnams kun rgya gadrun ta ra ni//sngags kyi skyes bu gseng po pa//gcig pu nyid ni bdag par gyur//sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa go/chos 'a/
322b1(rgyud): lo gcig 'khor lo mchog/rgyal dang rmad byung tshe gtsug tor//lus drang rnam par rgyal de bzhin//bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad//sbyor dang bya ba ga
322b2(rgyud): med bzhin//sbyor ba 'ba' shig nyid la 'di//b+h+rUM ni gtsug tor yin par bstan//ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di//dus sbyor gcig go ming cano//na mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan//
322b3(rgyud): sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol//rdo rje'i dkyil 'i khor dbus gnas par//oM zhes bya ba de ru sgom//phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//yi ge AHni rnam par sgom//chos kyi/
322b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la 'ang //yi ge hUM ni dwe ru sgrom//yi ge bruM ni gnas ming can//rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya//gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid//rdo rje gsum 'byung bka'
322b5(rgyud): stsal to//snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi//rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog/sku dang gsungs thugs thog ma mtha'//oM AHhUM gi grangs dang mnyam//sangs rgyas sku mchog/
322b6(rgyud): gsung gi lam//thugs kyi ye shes 'dzingasu bya//rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni//re re zhing ni yang dag bshad//sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang //rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin//byang
322b7(rgyud): chung tshul mchog 'di yin te//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o//rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste//sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o//sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa//'don
323a1(rgyud): sangs rgya sku skyes bu yin//rdo rje gsum mnyam mi byed pa//rdzogs pa lnga sogs sgom pa yi//de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni//gsum pa ye shes rdo rje stsol//byin rlabs dpal chen na/
323a2(rgyud): bya ba'i//dam tshig ting 'dzin gyu re pe yin//rnam par dbyen dang tsA rigs pa'i//stan dag la ni sbyor ba ba ni//rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor//brtul zhugs can gyis kun tu brnam//thabs/
323a3(rgyud): drang shes rab nyin zla phyed//thun gcig du ni rab tu brtag/de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis//rdo rje grosum ni nges par 'gru'o//'jig rten 'ongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid//'jig rten pa'i yang phyin
323a4(rgyud): ci log/rdo rje gsum sbyor skul dngos grug/'grub par 'gyur ba the tsA mo med//na mA khe'i rdo rje dbus gnas par//phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya//rang gi sngags kyi dam
323a5(rgyud): tshig dus//bskyed pa yi ge oM bsgom bya//sbyor ba bani yi gtan tshigs gang //snying po ying suM brtags pa yin//sna rno dang ni rtsa ba nyid//spyi bo mthu' ni dga' ldan gnas//
323a6(rgyud): gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur//dog po'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba//phyed pa gsum gyi ming can ni//rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum/sna mi rna mo sbyor ba yis//rdo rje gsum sbyor ba
323a7(rgyud): zhugs can/mI me kI dang gos dkar mo//sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan//'a zer snga yi sprin chen po//rnam par snang mdzod gnyis med gnas/rdo rje rnam snod de las ni//dngos grub rgya chen
323b1(rgyud): gsal bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba//skad cig dang 'grub rnal 'byor pa//ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni//rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas//yis 'das dang ma
323b2(rgyud): 'ongs dang //da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum//de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa//grangapo meng rjes bya de nyid//sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di//'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs//zhi ba'i
323b3(rgyud): bde las shes bya ba//rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de//sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs//rdo rje 'od zer bgrod pa yis//ting
323b4(rgyud): yang dag braka'i stsal to//a dong u ni lkog ma'i dbus//rkan gyi steng gi ming cano//i dang tse ni lag g.yon nyid//u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag/ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod//li
323b5(rgyud): rkang pa gcig shes la//dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid//dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa//ha ni lus skyes gtsug tror dang //gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can//ston
323b6(rgyud): bzhi yi bzhi po de//lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyuraro//nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor//de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur//rig pa chen po de nyid 'di//cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags//
323b7(rgyud): dus can bdag nyid spyir dbang po//de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig/oM ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni//dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o//nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas
324a1(rgyud): par//chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa//rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni//Ar+d+ha ni ngag gi lam du bzhag/kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni//
324a2(rgyud): rgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sgom pas//dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya//gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad//
324a3(rgyud): bdag mi zad rtag pa ste//thog mthara' mod pa'i mthar thug pa//zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya//chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang //rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//
324a4(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni//rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas//gsung gI gsang po 'di nyid ni//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs//dam tshig 'byung ba zhes
324a5(rgyud): ba//ting nge 'dzin du yongasu bsgrags//ni mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//der ni rang sngags skyes bu dag/hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya//dam tshig
324a6(rgyud): chen po de nyid can//khe dag rnam lnga bsgom par bya//rdo rje kun dang rgyalta ba'i gnas//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//spyod pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba//yang dag yi shes yon tan mtsha//
324a7(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan bsten na no//rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gi nas//lkog ma rkun dang de nas mchu//spyi ba so yi ming chen to//rdo rje gsu mthugs gsang ba gcig/de nas /
324b1(rgyud): 66///zhugs pa yis//de bzhin gshegs kun+da ye shes ni//dum cho ga rdo rje zhes bya ba//rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung //ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin//yo
324b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khar dbus gnas par//rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni//lus kun la ni khaM dmigs na//rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur//dngos po me don gsal byed pa//khe nyid kyis ni tha~Md
324b3(rgyud): bshad//rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las//khaM du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yos//yang dang yang du mchod pa dang //rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig
324b4(rgyud): gnas//gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid//sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba//so so ru nr-i yang dag gnas//namakha'i rdo rje dam tshig tshe//chos rnams des ni mi gzigaso//sang+yas
324b5(rgyud): kun ni gnyis med rung //mi snang /'di yi dam tshig yin//dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na//sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs//sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung //mi snang
324b6(rgyud): rdo rje gsum 'di yin//de yi bkod phreng zhes bya ba//ting 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs//ma 'dris pa yi chos bdag nyid//sku dang ldan pa'i 'ad 'i che//rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbumig/
324b7(rgyud): pa'i//rang sngags skyes bu bsam par bya//haM ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa//snying kha ru ni yaM mdzes pa//rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni//'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya//skrag
325a1(rgyud): thugs kyi longs spyod ni//'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can//sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni//dgongs dron de tshe kun tu byung //ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'dri//byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can//snang ba
325a2(rgyud): tsan+da zhes bya ba yis//tid 'dzin ni yang dag bya shad//rnam pa'i sbyangs kyi dbus gnas par//b+h+rUM ni 'bar po'i 'dridi bzang ba//mtshon che mchog ni rdo rje yis//rdo rje sku dang 'dre bar 'gyur//
325a3(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor//dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur po//ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i//shrI ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad//sangs rgyas mngon pa re shes gnas pa//dam/
325a4(rgyud): tshig tu ni yang dag bshod//mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di//de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur//sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa//'di ni dam pa yin par bshad//de yi dngos grub
325a5(rgyud): kyi//dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog/na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la//yi ge oM ni
325a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya//rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di//yi ge A~M ni mi zad gtso//'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis//bsgoms pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur//mi bskyod pa yi dram tshig mchog/de sku
325a7(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje can//ting 'dzin du yang dag bshad//de ni skyes bu dam pa yin//mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni//gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa los//'jig rten khams ni tha~Md du//
325b1(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan pa bsam//namakha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te//de nas rdo rje rnam/
325b2(rgyud): bsgom//rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas//dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing //dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi//bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing //
325b3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis//ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur//ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba//rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur//longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba//rin chen
325b4(rgyud): rdo rje gcig tu 'byung //de nyid gsum gsang dgongs pa las//rin rkyen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya//'jig
325b5(rgyud): rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la//der ni chos kyi oM sgo mo//chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang //rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis//rdo rje dpag mad 'dra ba ni//bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can+da/
325b6(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis//dpag med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur//theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa//ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan//'gro don gcig
325b7(rgyud): tu 'byung bar 'gyur//don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog/sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa//'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i/ti nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad//sems can khams
326a1(rgyud): ni ma lus pa'o//long spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yi//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bu shad//'od zer der ni rab tu spyom//
326a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM//'od chen der ni rab tu sgomo//de nas 'di ni rdo rje gsum//rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur//de ni bcomi ldan mgon pos bshad//rnam snang rdo rje can de
326a3(rgyud): yin//rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las//rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od//de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub//rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po//sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub//
326a4(rgyud): de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can//ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba//'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub pa'o//tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs de na//sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o//de nas de bzhin ga
326a5(rgyud): mchog la//de nas gseng ba'i bdag po ni//gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba/thub pa che l-I slar yang zhus//oM A hUM ni gsum la sogs//b+h+rUM sogs thog mar gnas pa yis//sku gsum thugs
326a6(rgyud): kyi rdo rje can//sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur//oM nI rnam snang rdo rjer 'gyur//AHni 'jig rten dbang phyug gaH//hUM ni rdo rje sems dang bshad//skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur//TI ne ga
326a7(rgyud): kyi mchog tu 'gyur//khaM na nges par mi snang ba//ha~M ni 'jam dpal yang dag bshad//k+ShaM ni rdo rje bkod ces bya//rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che//'jig rten dbang phyug dngo'i glu b+h+yom/
326b1(rgyud): de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad//oM la stsogs pa wA las rgyus//oM AHhUM ni de nyid gsum//rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
326b2(rgyud): shin tu rnam par nges par bshad//gsung sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa//lnga po bco lngar yang dag bi shod//khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba//gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba//gsang
326b3(rgyud): sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang //ting 'dzin skyes bu dmA pa yin//sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur//phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te//de dag gsang bor bshad pa ni//dgongs
326b4(rgyud): pa gcig las yong dag 'byung //dga' bo gcig cing dga' ba'i ming //de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur//mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi//pi bang sgra ni mchis ma lags//de bzhi
326b5(rgyud): phyag rgya med pa ni//gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'bru'o//brda' gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di//gang gi don du rab gsungs pa//log pa'i sbyor bas rab sgrub pa'i//phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par
326b6(rgyud): mdzad//sngags dang phyag rgyu sbyor ba ni//phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang //gsang sngags gaN+DIg pus mi 'grub ces//khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad//'dir ni sngags sbyor
326b7(rgyud): cig pu las//phyag rgya bston por ma mdzad na//gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni//'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar sgrob//sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa//lha rnams kyi yang
327a1(rgyud): sbyor las byung //'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur//'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang //yang na shin tu 'jig rten 'das//mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi//
327a2(rgyud): lhor de la 'gro phan 'gyur//spyan drang pa dang gshegasu gsol//'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod//gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub//lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu//'di dag ma 'ong
327a3(rgyud): skye bo yis/gang zhig shes na yang dag par//nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba//me yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs//de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das//dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste//
327a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i nges par 'jig rten pa'i//phyag na rdo rje la gsung so//rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya//nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las//gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis//
327a5(rgyud): de ni mi mchog dag tu 'gyur//gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis//lcags ni gser du byed pa yin//de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis//mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin//nges byas sbyor
327a6(rgyud): ba'i gsang sngags ni//zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur//phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gtsu ga pus//sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin//dngos med pa las yang dag skye//sngags kyi skyes bu
327a7(rgyud): 'byung ba ste//'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste//'gro ba'i di ni ni rob sgrub pa'o//spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis//myur ba yis ni gshegasu gsol//gnas pa yis nod sgrub pa'o//yod stan
327b1(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa yin//de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya che dang gcig sgrub las//myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa//de ni phyag rgya yi snar
327b2(rgyud): bshad//'bad de bla mas slob ma yi//rna ba'i drung du bashrad por bya//myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang //gnas pa'i rjesu sbyor ba rnams//spyan drang ba dang gshegasu gsol//'di dag bya
327b3(rgyud): rgyar yang dag gyur//sgrub pa la ni myur la sogaso//ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar//phung po la sogs chos rnams kun//stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba//mthing zhing de bzhin skye
327b4(rgyud): ba las//chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur//'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor 'gyur med//phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin//de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed//'on te/
327b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig/sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i //spyan drang po dang gshegs su gsol//de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o//nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drung bri//ring nas ldeg por rab tu sbyor//
327b6(rgyud): de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang //gnyi ga la ni yang dag sbyor//rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad//sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni//'jig rten
327b7(rgyud): nirib tu brtag/rang gi mtshon mar yang dag sbyor//rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis//phyag rgyas sa gsu mo la gnas pa//sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang //brtul zhugs can gyi sem
328a1(rgyud): dgug/gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid//dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis//'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya//gzhan yang gsang ba pa yi mchog/sems//
328a2(rgyud): kyi rkyen ni nyid ltos dang //dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la//gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med//'jig rten na ni rtog ci rnyed//dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba//de ni dngos med sems gcig
328a3(rgyud): las//rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtogs//byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la//de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur//gnyi ga las min gzhan las min//mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur//se ni/
328a4(rgyud): bsam pa'i dbang gi sngags//gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te//de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang //rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o//sems can kun gyi long spyod du//sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas//
328a5(rgyud): na mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba na//rnam par dben par rab tu brtag/gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan//klung dang 'grub chu la sogs yin//mya ngan 'das pe gunas sbyor ba//dur khrod las/
328a6(rgyud): pa yi ming //'di ni sngags rigs cho gra rnams kyi//bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o//'jig rten 'das po de nyid 'dir//'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o//mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa//
328a7(rgyud): rdo rje na mkha'i dkyil du bsam//mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas ma tshig gi gnasu sgo ma//rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che//dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsol to//rdo rje chen po ra
328b1(rgyud): mdzes pa//rtso lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar//rang bzhin wA r+yAr+m+ma ba pa//mngon she lnga por 'gyur ba byin//mngon shes lnga si tIng 'dzin la//gnas nas rmAn/
328b2(rgyud): med pa brtag/gtso bo me rtag mang po 'khrug/rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya//rdo rje la rang dgod byas pas//rdo rje tshan shes skye bar 'gyur//na mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas
328b3(rgyud): par//'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra//sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na//sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//lus la
328b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/snying khar yi ge oM bsams nas//sngags la mngon shes sgom por 'gyur//'gog pa rdo rje myur pu'i sems//nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes//sang+yas
328b5(rgyud): kun mchog 'byung ba yi//dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//der ni mi bskyod rab tu sgom//hUM nI stong kha'i zla gnas par//bas
328b6(rgyud): la sems ni de ru bzhag//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor//AHni snying kha'i theg ler gnas//bsams la rdo rje'ang yang dge bzhag/'di ni
328b7(rgyud): nga'i mchog gi mchog/rdo rje mi byed gsum sbyor skyes//'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te//sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o//namakha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas
329a1(rgyud): kyil 'khor bsgom par bya//sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM//bsams na bsgral pa gcig tu gnas//namakha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//lus
329a2(rgyud): drang ngag sems yi ge oMHba sems na bskul pa dag du gnas//mkha' dbyings rdo rje dngus gnas par//rdo rje dkyilnga 'khor bsgom par bya//lus dang ngag sems yi ge hUM//bsams na de//
329a3(rgyud): ni bskal par gnas//bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsum//dam tshig rtog pas de skad gsungs//dbus mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di//sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur//brjod du med cing ming
329a4(rgyud): med la//shes dang shes bya rnam sbyangs pa 'ang //kun rdzob la ni legs gnas ni//tshig gi sngag su 'di brjod//rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can//rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin cang ni//gang
329a5(rgyud): thig klog gam sems kyang rlung //rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur//ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po//dgongs pa lung sbyin 'di gyur pa//sengs rgyas kun gyis de lung bston//khyad par du la
329a6(rgyud): byin gyis rlob//klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni/bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rigs skyes rgyal ba'i srasu 'gyur//khams gsum thams cad
329a7(rgyud): nas ni//myur ba de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing //'khor los bsgyur ba'i bu bzhin du//byang chub myur du des 'thog//khamos gsum sku deng gsung thugs kyi//sngags pa re yang 'ang/
329b1(rgyud): /gyur pa ni//snangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis//do ni dngos po med par 'joms//dngos med gcig pu rdzogs phyongs spyod//phung stsogs yan lag don las byung //bdag
329b2(rgyud): sems can spangs pa ni//sngogs pa sngags las gyur pa yin//ji ltar na mkha' rang mtshan nyid//smre dgacig kyang ni 'dor mi byed//de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //rigs
329b3(rgyud): las skyes la byin gyis rlob//dgongs pa lung ston la gnas nas//gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag srung //mig gzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid//spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur//de bzhin
329b4(rgyud): gshegs kun ye shes ni//gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te//sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang //gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung //de ni rog pa skyes bu mchog/
329b5(rgyud): gcig par ni yang dag bshad//ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung //'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur gyur//de nas dpel ldan rnam snang mdzad//bskyed pa yA shos zlu ma gtso/
329b6(rgyud): nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa//rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to//mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtig la//rang bzhin gyis ni de ma chis can//dngos med shin tu dri myed la/
329b7(rgyud): gcig tu gyur kyang ni//gar dang glu dang rol mo dang //dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas//'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyi//rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom//gzho nus bsgrubs/
330a1(rgyud): pa'i sems can ni//ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin//gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni//myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur//'dod pa'i ston lngar ldan pa//de yi ming ni yid ldan pa//dkon
330a2(rgyud): mchog gsum la skyab su gnas//lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur//sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang //thos shing reg par gyur pa ni//de ni u dum pa ra yi//me tog 'dra ba
330a3(rgyud): gyur pa yin//sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di//gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes//gcig dang du ma lus grol ba//rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin//de ni sa gsang ba'i bdag mchog de/tshe
330a4(rgyud): nyid rab ston pa/thub chen rnaM snang mdzad la/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas thos//mgon po de nyid bsdus pa las//rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang //'jig rten pa de gar byed pa//gsungs te ma 'ongs skye ba
330a5(rgyud): ni/chos dbyings de ni gar min na//gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags//rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar//gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin//chos dbyings de ni glu min+dan//
330a6(rgyud): gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur//rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan klu//gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags//chos dbyings de ni rol mo min//gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur//'jig
330a7(rgyud): rten rgyang pan rmongs rol mo//gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba logs//chos dbyings de dgod mo lags na//gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur//rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pa ni rgad//
330b1(rgyud): gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags//chos dbyings de skrag ma lags na//gtso bo ji ltar sgeg par 'gyur//rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan sgeg/grasa?
330b2(rgyud): mthon myos pas bskul ba lags//de ltar rnam pa mang po la//gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing //bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis//rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yon snyam//rdo rje yi ni//
330b3(rgyud): tshig mchog 'di//yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid//de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag/yong dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog/de nas de nyid yang dag bzung //rnal 'byor rigs mchog
330b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba//sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston//sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas//nor can ming ni nyams la sogs//gcig pu'ang dpag me
330b5(rgyud): dngos bshad pa'i//gar gyis skye dgu dgo' bar byed//rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub//sna tshogs khyed kyis gsungs pa rnams//sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa//de rnams
330b6(rgyud): lhun gyis grub par 'gyur//mgon po shes rab 'di srid du//thabs kyis mchil bar nye bar sbyor//sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis//khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin//bshadu
330b7(rgyud): zin kyang mi rig pa//dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni//gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa//ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o//phyi rol sngags don dngos grub ni//de nyid du ni tshal
331a1(rgyud): mod kyi//'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can//der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin//de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing //sred pa yi ni ston par byed//bcom ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni/
331a2(rgyud): gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed//khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams//sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa//'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur zhing //de rnams 'grub par 'gyur
331a3(rgyud): ma yin//sred pa 'am dad pa dag gis kyang //rkyenA dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams//glasang bre la ni smig rgyu bzhin//rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur//mgron po de ni der gnas shing //
331a4(rgyud): nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas//de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung //tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las//chos kyo tshul 'di thos pa dang //phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur//
331a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ltung 'gyur bar//bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur//de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang //sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba legs//shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba//
331a6(rgyud): gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba//gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis//de tsha tshig gi sngo rlig skyes pa//gsang sngagasA la sngogs chos rnams la//dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed//log pas/
331a7(rgyud): mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni//byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur//a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni//sbyor shes rnams kyi 'di ma yin//de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa//gau ta ma dag yang ni
331b1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur//b+hU nI g.yo yi tshul gyis nA//rgyal po rnams ni smra bar byed//stod du g.yogs pa dag gis no//brgyad gnyis pa la tshul du byed//den
331b2(rgyud): ma skyes pa yi bdag/ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni//AHyi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i//yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na//de ni long spyod la mi skye
331b3(rgyud): de bas skye bo med gcig pu//bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug/der ni mche ba can mi 'gro//de la bsil ba 'ba' shig yin//rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras//bAr chad shin
331b4(rgyud): tu mang po pa//bya ba de ni rnam por 'joms//sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can//de ni tshig de thos pa dang //rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing //dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog/
331b5(rgyud): las//su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed//ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag/de la chad pas bcad par bya//'di la 'jigs pa'i sems bor la//skye bo med par khyed kyis ni//rgyal rig
331b6(rgyud): ngag gam rigs bzangs sam//gang zhig mi srun rigs can rnams//dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa//de dag thams cad brlag par bya//de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni//rgyud kyi slob
331b7(rgyud): dpon bdag nyid che//rin che ni rin thang med lnga sogs//bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o//'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nasu//rgyal po 'bras bu long spyod cig/AHyi ngag pas
332a1(rgyud): ma// s+yAd ste bzhin rgyal po b+h+yaH//n+ti rten drin thang rjod rdzas rnams//'don ltung shAganas//dran pa dam snang ga/rgyun can dus ni dan b+h+yas//do la sags pa /
332a2(rgyud): sa skyes pa lce d+ha rnams /da 'jigs shing gzhin rnaMms byud //sgeg mi med//de nas seM nini blo gas pa ga//'byin paston pa mang
332a3(rgyud): bdag gtso//phyog na rdo rje ga byed pa//sbyin pa'i gsang gis bka' stsal pa//rdo rje rdo rje chen po logs//rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te//rdo rje 'di ni zhus byung ba//de nyid bsdus pa dam pa/
332a4(rgyud): rdul mo donyid 'dri//lung bstan gyi mas de ston cig/de nyid gsum du gyur ba 'o//rdo rnathal ma yang sre ga ng+gA/da gsum ni lcags s+t+wa~M//chang ska da khye'i 'jug
332a5(rgyud): drug che//de rung ni lhag sum 'gyung// Ad+b+ha dang grangs ma da'o//gsung gas 'jug pathams / tshigs na rkyen rlung ts+tshan//ni ba nyid ni gang du sgyun//
332a6(rgyud): dang ni nga yang gnas pa yin//dpral yon de la bzhin mi spyag/de yi skyes bu ming ldan mang //de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni//man+t+ra ba sogs ji bzhin grangs bshad//la
332a7(rgyud): g.yon ni drag par 'gyur//g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste//gnyis po sbyor ba tshangs pa yin//de bas spyan gsum bdag dang //rig dang mchod sbyin sbyin tshig ste//reg byed dang //
332b1(rgyud): b+hu ga sum ba shad//srid bslangs sgrib pa yin te//mthur ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin//lab prAgan+d+hi sa bu 'do dgan//ban pa'i snod pyod rnam brgya dag NA tu/
332b2(rgyud): chum b+h+ye haM mchog ni//rab tu nI bar rab tu bsgregs//nyi ma blung mi rnams der//sa sor yong su bsgrags pa yin//yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur dang //shes bzhi ba skyon mau
332b3(rgyud): ston oM dang yi ge phyed//oM zhes gasngal bar brjod pa yin//sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan//gtsug mtha' dang ni lag par gnas//nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las//yos me
332b4(rgyud): nges par skye//lce dr-I N+Din+da b+hi mtshan ma ni//sbyor las thar bar dri bshad de// 'og tu e dang yang dag ldan//de steng yi ge m+b+ha nyid de//b+hadakA/rA n+ti mi bshad//khyod ni mig
332b5(rgyud): byed zhi ba nyid//yi ge A~M ni tshangs pa ste//AHni khyab 'jug yin par bshad//hU~M nI rlung du gyur pa yin//de nyid dag po zhes bya'o//zhi blo'i phyed phyed zhes bya ba//der rlob dge yongs
