332b6(rgyud): bsgrags pa yin//gnas dang 'pho dang skye ba dang //gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'bo//ye shes rang nyid mi yin te//khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin//ral grwa la sogs dngos
332b7(rgyud): grub dang //byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur//gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi//rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag/tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der//mi 'ongs pa rnams
333a1(rgyud): sgom par 'gyur//de ni mtho ris sogs 'gag pas//de bzhin 'byung ba stsol ba yin//rnal 'byor pa rnams sogs spangs nas//gnyi sa spyad par ni rnam par gnas//shin tu sbyor
333a2(rgyud): gcig gyur seng bas//'jug 'gyur pa ni drag po yin//nam dgag pa yi sbyor ba yang //tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can//mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste//de yi dbus
333a3(rgyud): na dbus bzung ba//spu yi cha ni stong las gcig/zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid//thar pa gcig par de ston bya//thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin//de lta bas na 'di log pa//zhi ba nyid ni///
333a4(rgyud): sgrogs pa'o//ston pa de rnams phye nas ni//zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur//thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag/'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//tshangs la sogs pa'i lha
333a5(rgyud): rnams kun//khyed kyi thal mo dag la gnas//de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing //sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa//'di nyid du ni nyid zla dang //sbyin sreg las can me dang ni//lo dang
333a6(rgyud): zla ba'i sbyor ba dang //rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang //de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di//de nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas//zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor ches la//de yang gcig dang du ma
333a7(rgyud): spangs//khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba//de bas de ni 'da' mi bya//de bzhin gshigaso kun spangs 'gyur bas//de ni spong bar mi bya zhing //'di dgo dngos med la ltos pas//rnal 'byor
333b1(rgyud): 1/na chog tu 'dod//gzhan durnam rtog da lasan//dngas pa dus sno mi 'gyur//do bus bral mo sto ba 'di//sasmras na brgyu pa
333b2(rgyud): yin//ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams//bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya//smad byi 'on pa lkug pI dang //de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang //gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur//
333b3(rgyud): de rnams la ni phan phyir bya//de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa//de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas//de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur//de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can+do//de ni nang mi ni phyi ma/
333b4(rgyud): yin//gnyis min gzhon gyi rgyu las min//phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min//'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min//rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas nau//ming ni rdo rje thal mor
333b5(rgyud): gyur//sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i//snying po brtag par bya ba'i mchog/phyag rgyu 'di lta bu 'di yin//phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no//mi bskyod rin chen dpag/
333b6(rgyud): med de//dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs//'di dag lag po g.yas pa yi//mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas//gnyis blos gcig gyur dge 'dun te//de
333b7(rgyud): ni skyabs ni gsum yin te//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams//gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin//phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid//shes rab thabs kyi gnas
334a1(rgyud): mchog yin//thal mo bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur//skyabs mchog gsum dang de nyid gsum//rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum//zhal
334a2(rgyud): gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang //lha gsum dang ni kha mos gsum dang //dus gsum dam tshig mchog gyur gsum//tshul gsumi dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur//sbyor ba
334a3(rgyud): gsum dang lam gsum ste//ji srid rtogs pas brjod pa rnams//de ni thal mo sbyor 'di yi ni//'dod nor ljon gsum gyi mchog/rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag/mi 'ongs skye bos
334a4(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur//de nyid du ni der 'gyur na//gcig dang du mar rnam par spangs//chos bshad bshud pa drangos med pa//'gro ba rkyen gyis yang drug skyed//'di ni mkha' ltar rang bzhin
334a5(rgyud): gcig/gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba//bsdu ba byas par gyur pas kyang //sku gsung dron gyi chos nyid//'dri ni thog mtha' med pa ste//dngos po med cing gi nas med pa//mtha' med zad pa
334a6(rgyud): med par 'byung //sku gsung thugs kyi rkyen las ni//rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te//de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur//hUM gis sems can yang dag 'byin//sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag
334a7(rgyud): oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste//AHni gnas pa par 'gyur//gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga//gsol dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni//rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te//de nyid kyi ni sngags
334b1(rgyud): bshad pa'o//zlos na bsam gtan rnam bral bar//de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ste//rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te//'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad//rnal 'byor pa la/
334b2(rgyud): de gsal te//byis pa rnams de la phyin ci log/rkyen las byung ba de nyid bsum//dngos po med par de bshad//de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni//yid min pa yi bzlas par 'gyur//yid
334b3(rgyud): ston gcig ni mdor bsdus las//rings dang dal dang gnas pa rnams//zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste//nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim//dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di//rten 'byung chos
334b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba yin//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus te gyur//sprul pa bsam mi khyab ces dben//sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa//de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming //rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar/
334b5(rgyud): sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed//dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni//de nyid kyis ni rdo rje sbyar//sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis//de yi chos rnams ston par byed//rnam pa dgu
334b6(rgyud): po thog mtha' can//sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin//gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas//sems can rnams ni dor 'jog ste//gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang //'jig/
334b7(rgyud): rten rnams la gsol ba dang //rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed//khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin//gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur//de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid
335a1(rgyud): can/gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis//thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas//sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid//mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin//de bu de rnams mgu gyur pa//
335a2(rgyud): kyi de nyid rkyen laso//rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di//khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung //gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i//dngos grub des ni 'thob par 'gyur//AHnyid der ni ma
335a3(rgyud): gsal ba'i//rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin//dog par do ni yong bo shad de//dngos po med par ras kyi ming //'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la//gzhon nu'i gzugs 'ang
335a4(rgyud): bsgom par bya//dog po de yi ras don las//mi snang ba la sogs grub cing //yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog/'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung //AHyi dog ras mtshon
335a5(rgyud): pas ni//'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad//'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod//sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur//byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir//de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur///
335a6(rgyud): tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang //rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa//de yang shin tu ljin sems can//sems can sogs la rnam par gnas//rtag pu ltang ni so sor snang /
335a7(rgyud): 'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig/skye ba med las skyes pas ni//gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o//shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni//'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod//de nas gas
335b1(rgyud): sngags grub 'gyur ba//rnam par mi rtog gcig shos nyid//ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te//sngags ni na ri bri bar bya//rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni//yi ge a
335b2(rgyud): bzhin sngon 'gro ba//so so gzhan po'i bzhi pa ni//i u dang ni ring por bcas//a ai au u ya ste mtha'//bzhi po dang bcus zlum paur bri//bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i//
335b3(rgyud): 'gro ba mnyam gzhag bskyed pa yin//'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi//chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur//de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang //rnam par bsgrims pas skye
335b4(rgyud): b.rI 'gyur//chu bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni//bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur//nA ga yi ni grangs bzhin du//skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa//nyi shu yi ni sngon ma sngo//
335b5(rgyud): de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin//sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni//khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod//'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa 'am//mnyam nyid yis de nyid las//yon
335b6(rgyud): gsum ni brdar byas pa//ston med pa'i ston meng //gzho nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming //lta ba 'di ni bar skyes//de ni sgo glegs mtha'i yin te//A u dang ni ring por bcas//yi ge
335b7(rgyud): gsum bcas thig ler ldan//chog drag mtha' yi ring sngo can//yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang //bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin//de nyid ring po ring po'i mthas//bcu gnyis//
336a1(rgyud): pa yi grangasu 'gyur//de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las//yi ge o zhes brjod pa yane//snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yis//ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyuraro//ci ste a las sngags pas ni//
336a2(rgyud): AHnyid du ni blta bas bya//de bzhin A yaM sbyor bya las//yi ge a ne tse 'dod par//ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta//rI re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo//i re lo u'i chog
336a3(rgyud): las kyang //sngags pa yai ra la wa'i gzugs//lkog ma mkha' dang bA ra dang ni//rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa//gang tshe aM ka'i sde grangs las//A yi kha yi rgyab na gnas//i
336a4(rgyud): phrag pa lag pa dang //tshigs rnams la ni de bzhin no//dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang //lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag/dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang //rkang pa g.yos g.yon de bzhi no//
336a5(rgyud): gzugs de yi ni grangs many+dzam pas//ta mtshan shin tu dngos grub ster//u tshwa na de bzhin dbus dang ni//lag pa ru nI yongasu bshad//rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshwan//'das pa'i tshul
336a6(rgyud): du bzhugs pa yin//de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i//sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong //lhun gyis grub pas dngos grub pa//me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin//rang rgyud kyi
336a7(rgyud): ninang nyid du//lha mchog dag ni bya ba yini//dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun//de nyid las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur//che ba'i bzhi bzhi sde sbyor bas//mkhas pa min sgo rnams
336b1(rgyud): byA/ka tsaT ta ba tshun yang //dbus dang shur la stsogs sngon 'gro//'phro la phran pa'o 'dod pa yang //ma spel por ni mthong ba yin//thams cad kyang na rdzogs/
336b2(rgyud): yi ge/yi ge hA yis mchod par bya//sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing //'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos//yi ge a ni nus su bya//lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas bya//mtshams med
336b3(rgyud): lnga yi sbyor ba las//sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston//sha thog mtha' gnas sngags las skyes//dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skye//gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni//skad
336b4(rgyud): gcig gis nges sbyor gyur//de tshe dkyil 'khor mod byas pa//'jig rten pa rnams chos dgar 'gyur//a ku hA gnas byung phyogs gnas//yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das//
336b5(rgyud): gang dang gang nas byung ba yi//gsang sngags bsam pos mi khyab gsungs//de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa//rang gi mtshan mo gcig shos nyid//gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa//
336b6(rgyud): cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur//steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams//dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas//dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang //'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid//
336b7(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las//smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o//'gro ba don gtogs 'dod pa'i ston gyur rnams la//dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa
337a1(rgyud): mdzod//sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nus ni//thub pa d+mo rje 'tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol//nor bu rin chenu dag gis rnam rgyan sku yi mchog/'gro
337a2(rgyud): don byed sring mo bdag la brten par mdzad//lhag pa'i snying rje lngas byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku//dri dag ni yongasu bzung la chos rnams dod yod mdzod//sring mos kyang ni khyad par du//
337a3(rgyud): de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni//de nas yongasu 'dzin mdzad de//rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du mdzad//shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni//phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'di
337a4(rgyud): snod gyur//bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na//dga' ba las byung chos dga' bdug la dgyes par mdzod//'gro ba dang ni 'od dang go nas pa tsam 'di ni//nam yang
337a5(rgyud): lhod par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags//kun tu song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston//'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod//dgongs pa'i ye shes
337a6(rgyud): rdo rje yis//sangs rgyas ston gcig la bzhugs//bzlas brjod sbyin srog de bzhin lhas//dkyil 'khor yongasu brtags pa mdzad//'dod pa med cing chags la zhi//de yang don/
337a7(rgyud): dam dge gyur yin//spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni//bzlas brjid dngos po med pa yin//bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan//mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang //zung dang zla
337b1(rgyud): //dkyil rnal 'byor pa//dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhag phyur bya//hA yi sde tshan ka sde dang //bcu gnyis phyed byed dag tu sbyar//gshin rjeg shes kyi gzugs 'di ni//nyi ma'i dkyil/
337b2(rgyud): 'khor dag la dgod//de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste//dgongs pa'i don gyis brtag par bya//phung po khoms la srogs lta ba//badz+ra las ji ltar lus yin bzhin//ma byin len
337b3(rgyud): pa byang chub sems//kun rdzob bstan pa brdzun smra ba//phung po srog chags gyur pa ste//tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin//mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste//de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang
337b4(rgyud): ni//dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru//sngags pa yos ni de bya'o//bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad//gci bA zhes ni dbang po yin//de dag za bar bshad pa ni//ma skyes
337b5(rgyud): gtsug pur mthong ba'o//khrag ni lpags par yang dag bshad//sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin//rkang ni sems kyi kun rtog pa//za ba dngos med gyur pa'o//smon lam dbang gis
337b6(rgyud): 'di rnams ni//bi mu ra she pe sa 'di//lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du//bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin+da//dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la//byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog
337b7(rgyud): rdo rje thig la gnas khyod kyang //chos nyid de ying mo sheso//rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas//chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs//de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang phan pa//mthun
338a1(rgyud): po'i glu sang gis rtog par byed//yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/'gro lnga gsal bar rtog byed pa//'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba la//de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong //gang zhig rnam sbyin smin
338a2(rgyud): pa yis//sems ni dngos grub la gzhol ba//rdzogs longs spyod pa'i srur sbyor las//dngos pa med pa nyid byung//bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bzugs//kun rdzob don
338a3(rgyud): gnyen por 'byung //sbrul pa'i lus las bsngags pas ni//sgyu mo bzhin du ston par byed//gsang ba'i dgongs pa de nyid 'di//'jam dpalnga ye shes dam pa'o//rdo rje gsum gnas
338a4(rgyud): bA yis//sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom//nu mkhar brtags pa'i rnal 'byor la//phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod//gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor bu yis//de bzhin nyid gnas sa d+ya hU~M
338a5(rgyud): yin//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsams shing //dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan//sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes//yang dgra rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri//dngos med dben pa nyam/
338a6(rgyud): dga' ba//rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya//phung sogs yan lag thams cad de//sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur//sngags 'don par ni geng gyur pa//bsdus pasngags ni gcig pu pa/
338a7(rgyud): lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni//rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya//lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum//de nyid gsuM mi nas spro bar bya//rdo rje gsum dang legs sbyor les//'jam pa'i rdo rje/
338b1(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur//na mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog/sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin//lnga bcu gnyis byungar gang yin pa//brgya po rgyab nas mngon phyogs la//ci rigs
338b2(rgyud): gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs//sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar cig stsol//dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam+ba du//'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis//sra la sogs pa rgyan pa ni//de ni snang ba zhes bshad//
338b3(rgyud): tshangs pa dbu bo la sogs lha//did pas de la phyag kyang byed//'di ni mi snang byed pa ste//ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid//rnam pararu smin pa ldog gyur cing //ji skad gsungs pa 'grub
338b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par//mau bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag/bshang gci spyang las der gyur pa//gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o//dam tshig ces bya de dge
338b5(rgyud): mchog/mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas//dkon mchog gro sum ni mnyam byas te//bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya//dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsuM yin//bdag med ces bya
338b6(rgyud): kha yin te//gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du//bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi byed pa'i//sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o//de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms
338b7(rgyud): nas//skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur//'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par 'gyur//rang gi sngags kyis rnam bsgoms nas//sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms nas//sangs rgya
339a1(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad//sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i//ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams//de snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams//dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o//gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste/
339a2(rgyud): s+yA nI rIng ba ces bya'o//bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun//na mkhar smai bA bai sA ma mi khyab//'dzom pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste//'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin//'jig rten pa yi ngo bo rdzu/
339a3(rgyud): phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin//dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i//'khor lo'i ting 'dzin ces bya//'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba//skad cig sbyor bas sgrub pa'o//rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis//
339a4(rgyud): /dkyil 'khor dbusu rab bsgoms pa//rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste//thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur//ri raba~M sum cu rtsa drug gi/rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi//de snyed bud med de
339a5(rgyud): yi ni//gsum 'gyur gnasu 'gyur ba yin//khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che//drag po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur//rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i//ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dgra bshad//
339a6(rgyud): pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad pa//rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba//chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na//rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur//sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i//ri rab rdul
339a7(rgyud): phran grangs snyed kyi//sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni//dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog/gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi//rdo rje pad+mo gru bicas sbyin//so sor rtog pa
339b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i//ting 'dzin ni yang dag bshad//shin tu grangs med bskal par ni//grangs kyi ming gis blanas par na//gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin//
339b2(rgyud): ye shes lngar ldan pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni//'jig rten pan phyir gsungs pa rnams//phyogs bcu'i sngangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i//ston gsum ni yongasu
339b3(rgyud): bsten//'od zer lnga yi modog 'dra ba'i//rang sngags las byung ral gri ni//blo ldan lag par de bzhag na//rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rang gi sngags kyi khongs chud 'di//
339b4(rgyud): hohi hUM de khams gsum pa//pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher//rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin//khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing //tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa//
339b5(rgyud): stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu//dbang chen po yI tshangs par 'gyur//thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas//dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
339b6(rgyud): las/de ni de ma thag tu 'thob//rang gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di//dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung //byang grol la yang de mi gnas//ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur//oM na rol bu ci
339b7(rgyud): na ka'i//'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni//dbusu rang gi lha yi gzugs//bsams te khar bcug rnams bsgoms na//byang chub ye shes 'od po che//blo ldan de ma thag tu
340a1(rgyud): 'gyur//'jam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam//nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i//tsa na ka yi 'dru chod tsam//yi gle'i dam pa AHbas ma so//de yi dngu bu lha yi gzugs//khar bcug nas/
340a2(rgyud): ni rnam bsgoms ni//byang chub ye shes 'od po che//de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur//'dzam+bu chu bo'i gsor mdog dang //nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i//na mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi//tsan
340a3(rgyud): yi 'bru tshod tsam//yi ge hUM ni rnam bsams te//dbus rang gi lha bsams nas//khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na//rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che//dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/
340a4(rgyud): 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang //nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i//rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi/dkyil 'khor dbus su rapa bsgoms pa//lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms/
340a5(rgyud): na//'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang //'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o//'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//'dzam chu bo'i
340a6(rgyud): gser mdog gam//nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te//lag du rdo rje bsgoms na ni//rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rdo
340a7(rgyud): mchog gi sgrub pa 'di//rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las//rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgoms pas//ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya//na mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par//rin chen la ni rin chen sbom//
340b1(rgyud): lag tu legs bzhag na//rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rin chen mchog go sgrub pa 'di//rlon tshon sku yi sbyor ba lngas//rin chen rigs kyi mchog sgom da/
340b2(rgyud): rdo rje dag gis bya//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms la//lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni//pad+ma'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur//pad+ma mar+g+ho gi sgrub pa 'di//
340b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las//pod+mo'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni//ye shes rdo rje dag gIs bya//na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la//log tu ral
340b4(rgyud): bri rab bsgoms na//ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//dam tshig mchog ni 'di sgrub pa//sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las//dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa//ye shes rdo rje dang
340b5(rgyud): gis bya//bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis//mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs//sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis//bsom gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur//dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yi//
340b6(rgyud): dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i//mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug/sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//sdug bsngal dang ni kuna'i byung nyid//'gog dang lAm ste bzhi po ni//li/
340b7(rgyud): gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad//sgrub pa po ni gnas ming can/shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog/chos dang rdzogs long spyod ming can/sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgad//
341a1(rgyud): mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs cano//'byon dang rngub pa nyid dang ni//gnas pa yis ni nyor mdzes pa//yod ston pa yi mnyam sbyor la//rar tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas//dus gsum rtog pa gcig las
341a2(rgyud): 'das//rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par dang //sgrub pa po ni rtag tu sgrub//sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/sbyor gsum rdo rje canA bsams pa//sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o//sangs rgyas ye shes
341a3(rgyud): blo can gyi//mi gsal gsol bar yang dag ldan//de bzhin nyid kyi ba las//'bru ba thams cad dgug par bya//rlung gi dkyil 'khor ma chog gnas pa//sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin
341a4(rgyud): gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis//de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas//'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang //mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed//gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni/
341a5(rgyud): mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams//de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni//sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya//na mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di//dmo tshig chen po rdo rje can//sngags kyis de nyid//
341a6(rgyud): gcig sbyor las//lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur//dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog/rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni//rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che//rdo rje pad+ma
341a7(rgyud): la sogaso bya//me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni//sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom//lag tu sku dang gsung shun kyi//lcags kyu la sogs rab tu sgom//de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis//de nyid las ni
341b1(rgyud): /lha rnams dgod//de ni de ma zag tu yang //dngos grub kun sbyor lngas pyod 'gyur//sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni//mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya//
341b2(rgyud): lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis//gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam sgom//brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis//gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod//dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis//ji lta ji ltar/
341b3(rgyud): rab sgrub pa//dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i//de ni yang dag yin par bshad//gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi//dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod//bcom ldan dam tshig tshen
341b4(rgyud): po yi//rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs//de nas phyag na rdo rje ni//go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs//gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i//mnyam bzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ni//
341b5(rgyud): gasdang dbang de nyid dam pa yi//de ni dri yis yang dag bshad//rnal 'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid//na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas//byas na dam tshig yang dag pa//sha chen
341b6(rgyud): lnga ni yang dag sbyar//dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi//dam tshig mchog lo gnas nasnga ni//blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni//rdo rje dngos grub long spyod ster//rdzogs long spyod yul bshang ba
341b7(rgyud): yin//de nyid ye shes dbang po gci//dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni//rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur//long spyod rdzogs phung las byung po//glang po'i sha' ni de rab brtag/dam tshig
342a1(rgyud): gcig tu legs sbyor las//mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur//dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste//dngos med de nyid las sbyor las//dam tshig gcig tu logs sbyor na//mi snang gnas kyi mchog
342a2(rgyud): tu 'gyur//dgongs pos gcig shos bzlog pa yin//phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa//dngos med de ni khyi sha yin//dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor//dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub
342a3(rgyud): pa'o//rdzogs sangs rgyas can ba lang sha/khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur//dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor//rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o//'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las//dgongs pos/
342a4(rgyud): gcig shos bzlog po yis//sha chen dang ni bshad gci dang //glang po rta khyi ba lang dag/mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis//dam tshig gcig tu da 'grub 'gyur//bstan pas 'di ni sgrub/
342a5(rgyud): pa ni//sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa//rdo rje sbyor ba'i gas de ba yis//sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur//de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing //rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang //snying kair
342a6(rgyud): ye shes dam tshig dang //dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i//'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o//dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog/dam tshig mchog
342a7(rgyud): 'dis rab tu bya//dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste//rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin//de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon//gtso bo rnam snang chen po la//gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni//rdo rje 'dzin pas
342b1(rgyud): slar yang zhus//gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni//gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des//ri rab sum cu rtsa drug du//mu stegs rnams kyi sa 'tshalnga mi 'gyur//rang gi
342b2(rgyud): bstan bcos brda' yis ni//phyi rol pa de rnam rtag lo//ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang //'di la rang gi ngo bo med//tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud la ni//ri rab gcig dang bcas par
342b3(rgyud): bshad//byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa//gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis//rdo rje can la slar gsungs pa//legaso rdo rje legs pa che//skyes pa
342b4(rgyud): dam pa khyod legs pa//rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang //'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa//sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag/theg pa chen po mi mthong //tshad yod dang ni yongs
342b5(rgyud): chad pa'o//rang gi lus la gang ba shad//ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod//khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o//na mkha' drang ni mnyam ye shes//rdo rje theg pa zla med pa//mchog sbyin pa
342b6(rgyud): ni khyed bzhin du//rgya chen de yis mi mthong //rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste//de yis yang dag ma mthong bas//rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis//gzhan yod pa ni min zhes sgra/theg pa tshon la
342b7(rgyud): gsang ba rnams//srang la btsal te de smra ba//de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes//nga yi tshig las bltas te sgra//de nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir//rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgom
343a1(rgyud): bar dadu//byung nas nas na rtog mar 'gyur//gsang ba dgangs pa sa gsungs pa ma/sngags kyi de nyid don byang rgyug/sna tshogs dngos klu 'bras bu stod//dag sa smon s+yA
343a2(rgyud): ba/de ni mas yang dashA da/dmuchog rdo rje snre la //rdorje nan gyi hU~M sams te//rnal lcer bas ni 'du na rje gsum the gyu /
343a3(rgyud): dag/'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste//'di lta bu y-i sbyor ba yis/rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyuraro//'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi yi//phreng 'gyur dam nig rje rje ba shad//rdo rje sems dpa
343a4(rgyud): yang dag 'byung /ting 'dzin ni bshad pa yin/rdo rje gsum gyi dam chog mchog/sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur//de nyid sems can thams cad ky-i//de bzhin nor bu'i rgyu mar+d+ha n+tu/
343a5(rgyud): 'jig rten khrims ni thams cad/sangs rgyas sku dang 'dri bar 'gyur//rdo rje dmatshig dngos grib mchig/rdo rje bdag nyid de snad byed//gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed//sbyangs rgyam zhing nu
343a6(rgyud): grub nam 'di ni der skyongar ba'o//rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur//U yi rdo rje sgom bdag nyid//glu bo mchog dam tshig lnga gnas pa//m-i snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog/stong gsum dag ni
343a7(rgyud): bar byed //yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas//sangs rgyasu rnal 'byor mar legs sbyor//gaud+hA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi lus kun//dab de dang ni grangs pa /
343b1(rgyud): pa/sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam srungs pa//lag tu smA rA rA ba khrag bzhin//rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur//sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu//sgra gal
343b2(rgyud): ji snyed pa//rnam pa la gnas ma nor bar//skad cig gis ni de kun thos//gaN+DI bye snyed zhing dag dang //skye la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan//sems zhes bshad pa'i sgom pa
343b3(rgyud): mchog/sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig/bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du//sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gongs//rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro//rang gi rna ba sems bcas pa//
343b4(rgyud): gAng+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi//gnas kyi dngos po bshad pa yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon shes gnas//'di ni yang dag bkra' stsal to//mngon shes drug ni don gag/
343b5(rgyud): do ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur//gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi//'khor rnams kyis ni rab tu mdzes pas//sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni//'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spyod//yang
343b6(rgyud): rten bden gcig bsnyen pa ste//de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa//brten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa//ye shes nyaM bar sgrub pa'o//yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/
343b7(rgyud): sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur//'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba/sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o//rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa//'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags//sems la dam
344a1(rgyud): dang 'dir sbyor ba/skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur//bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang //nye bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang //sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni//sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin//
344a2(rgyud): la yang dog 'jug 'gyur ba//ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs//sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs//lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya//rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po//bsnyen
344a3(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor//byang chub mchog ni rnam par bsgom//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin gri//ro dang reg bya chos rnams la//dngos grub mchog ni rnam dbyed pa//de ni nye bar sgrub par
344a4(rgyud): 'gyur//sngags bdag gong yin bsgoms nas ni//bskul bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin//rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs//de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod//bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi dag/sdug
344a5(rgyud): pas kun tu brtag par bya//dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni//dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam//'dri ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//de nyid gsum gAsang yang dge 'byung //sngags
344a6(rgyud): kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'o//sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsten//sna tshog sde lung gi yang dag rtog/sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod//de yi dpag bsamya shing long spyod//sa phyogs zhes
344a7(rgyud): ni yongasu bsgrags//mkha'i dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni//rnam pa'i dben pa chen por bshad//ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o//de 'dril
344b1(rgyud): dben pa'i mtshon pa ra//dar ni 'od chen rnam gnas te//glunas yod pa yi sbyor ba yis//rtag tu dngos sgrub thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub brdan/
344b2(rgyud): chen pos de skad bka' stsal to//dgon pa chen po'i sa byAgs sogs//'jig rten pa rnams sgri ba gas pa//sbyin pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchog b+h+rUM dang ljin dus rdo rje na
344b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor ba//bsnams na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur//me lcong+ga zhes bya dgan pa che//rin cheni zhes byi dben pa'o//chen po zhes bya 'di dpage med//de na yod
344b4(rgyud): ba ni rI'i ra yin//chu dog sngo dag pa'i chos kyi che//gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag/ji srid don ni sbyar bya bzhis//yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur//ji ltar na mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig
344b5(rgyud): rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed//de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i phyed//yi ge o gcig sdom po'o//gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i//oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab//de nyid
344b6(rgyud): mi gsal sbyor dbang po//gtso bo rang nyid zlog pa yin//la lo glang po spangs nas ni//rjes la dbyibs ni tshal bar byed/de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni//oM las sdom
344b7(rgyud): pa gzhan du 'dod//gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga//dus thub de bzhin nor can dang //phan tshun sbyor gnas brjod pa la//bsam mi khyab pa'i grangasu 'gyur//bcom ldan
345a1(rgyud): gcig kyang du ma ste//tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs//bArda' tsam du na u zhes bya//dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste//sku gsum du na yang
345a2(rgyud): dag bshad//gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas nI//des na oM ni sdom pa yin//dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod//de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin//brdo'i ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa//nga sam+b+ha//
345a3(rgyud): nas sdom pa kun tu bshad//mi phyed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis//bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral//rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung //rjes bcas zhes byi de bsgom bya//rtag
345a4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i ye shes bzhag/mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la//g.yas dang gcig shos zla phyed de/shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o//'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste//rdo rje ming can phyung/
345a5(rgyud): dang gnyis//de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis//dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur//zhag ni thub pa zla phyed dang //zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis pas//'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas//rgya chen
345a6(rgyud): ngas ni bshad pa yin//gasdang ba mchog las byung ba ni//zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs//dri nyid nye bar 'grub bshad pa'i//sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin//gang tsha shes rab
345a7(rgyud): babs ye shes//de bzhin nyid shes las byung po//sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan//rdo rje mi byed gsum bsgoms pas//rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur/'dra dang ma 'o
345b1(rgyud): snangs rgyas dang //gang zhid phyugs bcur btsugs pa rnams//rnaMs sku mchog ga rnal 'ad+mo s+ho//sa rgyus de rnams rkun mos rlo'o//'das pa rnamAH
345b2(rgyud): ni chos sku yis//bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs ni bzugs//sngags mchog bas me gyis mi khyab pas//ma 'o sun ma skyes byin gyis rlog//sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni//
345b3(rgyud): cung zad tsam yid yod ma yin//'on kyang dngos maud las byung ba'i//sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rtog/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//mi byed rdo rjeg
345b4(rgyud): bsgoms la//sgra ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa//de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad//rlig dang mi rig yang dag ldan//srog la sngags te bcu gnyis bshad//des kyi nyis 'gyur
345b5(rgyud): b+hA ba la sa 'a gyur/zla ba la sog grangs mi nyam pas//nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin//khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis//lam rtsom pa'i ni brtags pa yis//de nyid ni sgru ba
345b6(rgyud): pa mchog/sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin//sngags dang dngos mod de byed pa//mgal mi 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs//rtog pa las byung de 'di ni//dngos med pa ni
345b7(rgyud): pas//ma 'angs pa yi skye za ni//lha mi gzugs le 'dud par byed//mi gdong de bzhin rna ba dang //skye dang de bzhin sus dag dang /lpags pa rkang par yang dag ldam lan
346a1(rgyud): des ni mi nus pa//lha dang nyan dang dri dang ro//rnyog bya rnams ni dngos med pa//rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi//'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can to/'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku/
346a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas byin gyis byin rlabs gyis//de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can//dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin//shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs//rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la//rang gi
346a3(rgyud): chos ni spangs na su//tshig gi lam de ston par byed//sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog/tshe 'phral de lag las byung //de nas dad sogs yang dag pas//slar yang de la gsol//
346a4(rgyud): 'debs kyang //gsol ba 'debs pa tsam gyis ni//de dang 'dra bar gA la 'gyur//phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'//lha rnams thams cad sbyong ba yin//de ltar sku las sku byung ba/
346a5(rgyud): dpal ldan tshes 'di'ang gsum gyi lam//byin rlabs pa dag longs spyod na//gsung gi rdo rje can du byed//'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams//phyogs bcun ni gang bzhugs pa//byung dang
346a6(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur de rnams ni//mi phyed gsum gyi lam du 'gyur//yid rton bde ba zhi bdag nyid//de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba//yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di//rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar
346a7(rgyud): brjod do//de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas//rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can//gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang //'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di gyur te//dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas na/
346b1(rgyud): rgyun na nu na su na shA d+hA Sh+Ta du rdzun nan na rdzu na na /
347a1(rgyud): gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yon//sangs rgyas rdo rje tshos dag gam//de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas stsogs//rdo rje gsum po mi phyung brtag/ngo 'dus rmongs pa
347a2(rgyud): bdag nyid can//sri ser rtogs pa 'gas par 'gyur//sku la sogs pa'i grangs mnyam par//sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog gya blo/stong pa shin tu sbyor ba yang //de ni gsal bar ni nam med//
347a3(rgyud): sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni//gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed//'das pa dag ni dri thams cad//rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur//nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi//bya
347a4(rgyud): chub bsdus nos bshad pa yis//'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa//mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin//sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos//yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //rmongs pas 'di las 'das
347a5(rgyud): na ni//de ni 'gas par be tsom med//dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//gsang ba dam pa yang dag srung //lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis//dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya//
347a6(rgyud): sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog/rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i//dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i//le'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin//dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogaso//
347a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyis khan po d+harmA shrI b+ha dra dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa////rgya gar skad du/badz+ra dz+nyA na sa muts+tshA ya nA~M ma tan+t+ra/
348a1(rgyud): gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yin//sangs rgyas rdo rje tshos dag gam//de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas stsogs/rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag/ngo 'das rmongs te/
348a2(rgyud): bdag nyid can//dri ser rtogs pa 'gas par 'gyur//sku la sogs pa'i grangs mnyam par//sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog gyu'o//stong pa shin tu sbyor ba yang //de ni gsal bar ji tsam med//
348a3(rgyud): sna tshogs sbyor byar sngags rnams ni//gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed//'das pa dag ni de thams cad//rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas 'gyur//nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi//byang //
348a4(rgyud): chub bsdus nos bshad pa yis//'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa//mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin//sangs rgyas yang na rdo rje chos//yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //rmongs pas 'di las 'das//
348a5(rgyud): na ni//de ni 'gas par the tsom med//dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas//gsang ba dam pa yang dag srung //lhun gyis grub pa'i sbyor ba yis//dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya//
348a6(rgyud): sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba mchog/rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i//dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i//lo'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin//dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogaso//
348a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyis khan po d+harmA shrI b+ha dra dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha baM dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa////rgya gar skad du/badz+ra dz+nyA na sa muts+tsha ya nI ma tan+t+ra/
348b1(rgyud): /bye skad du/ye shes rdo rje kun las la u pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams cad la phyag 'tsha'o//ji skad du bcom ldan 'das
348b2(rgyud): rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o//byams pa mo sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ma rig
348b3(rgyud): bya dang /sems las byung ba dang /sems zhes bak+Shi bA ci lags/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu nyon
348b4(rgyud): cig/yis gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhi no//byams pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum rdo rje'i ngo bo ji ltar lags/bac+doMs kyis//
348b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa/'gag pa med pa/skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang /sna ba nye bar thob pa dang /stong pa chen po'o//de yang rtogs
348b6(rgyud): par dka' ba'o//'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o//mi rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/de ni snang ba mchod pa dang /shin tu stong pa zhes gsung so//sems las byung ba'i
348b7(rgyud): gyis sems te/de ni sna ba dang /stong pa ste/sems dang sems las byung ba dang /ma rig po'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o//gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin//
349a1(rgyud): do nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas ca mi smra bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
349a2(rgyud): rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cad mi skye bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
349a3(rgyud): pade rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te gdugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/e ma'o ston pa rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyis dbye ba mchog tu zab pa/
349a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pa shu du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang /yid
349a5(rgyud): drang rnam par shes pa zhes bya la//de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de las rtog pa gnyisu gyur te bdag dang /gzhan dag tu'o//rnaM par/
349a6(rgyud): shes pa de'i gzhon pa rlung //rlung las me'o//me las chu'o//chu las sa'o//de rnams las phung po lnga dang /skye mched drug dang /yul lnga ste/de dag thams cad ni rnam par shes pa rlung dang
349a7(rgyud): 'dres pa'o//de nas rnam par shes pa gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjesu myong bar byed/snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung //de las 'od gsal
349b1(rgyud): ba gnas pa med pa/'gag pa med pa/skye ba med pa/dan dam pa'i bden pa/yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o//de'i rang bzhin
349b2(rgyud): lta ba dang /'khrul pa dang /rnam par g.yeng ba dang /brjed ngas pa dang /le lo dang /mi smra ba dang /mi gsal ba'o//ma rig pa las sems la byung ba ste/nyi me'i snang ba lta bu dang /shin tu gsal
349b3(rgyud): bya'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o//de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang /dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /drag po la sogs pa dang /kun rdzogs du mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang /lha'i
349b4(rgyud): tshogs dang /mtshan ma dang /rdo rje'i brda'o//sems las byung ba las sems te/zla ba'i snang ba dang /shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla ba lta bu'o//rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba
349b5(rgyud): la sogs pa'o//kun rdzob du ni mngon sum gyi bud med dang /b+ha ga dang /pad+ma dang /lha mo'i tshigs kyi brda'o//rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las
349b6(rgyud): rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o//me las chu ste/nur nur po'i rnam pa dang /de las mer mer po dang /nar nar po dang /gor gor po dag go//de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i snang ba la
349b7(rgyud): khrag gi gong bu mkhrang gyur rnamaso//de khu ba dang khrag ngag gis bskyed pa'o//de nas dbang po gnyis mnye pa sbyor ba las 'dod chag so//'dod chags las 'dod chags dang dril ba
350a1(rgyud): ba dang /bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste/de'i phyir yus to//lus las byung ba'i sgrol byung ba ning pa la sogs dang /gsung go phyag r+b+ha'i thab su b+hur pa/a li ka li las yang dag par //
350a2(rgyud): byung ba'i sngags dang /sems kyi phyag rgya'i thab su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhor dmigs pa'o//gzugs la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thubs gyur
350a3(rgyud): po'o//rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sdem ste dang sems las byung ba dag gi tha~Md su gyur pa'o//sems dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni bde ba chen po'i to 'dzin gyi
350a4(rgyud): gyur ba'o//de rgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /chu zla dang /mig yor dang /smig rgyu dang //
350a5(rgyud): rmi lam dang /sgra brnyan dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /mig 'phrul dang /dbang po'i gzhi dang /glog dang /chu bur dang /me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis ba
350a6(rgyud): ba chen po'i ting 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin//ji ltar 'o ma bsgrubs pa las mer dang /ji ltar til las til mar te/de bzhin du rdo rjes ni thabs kyi yis nye bar mtshan pa'i phyir dang /
350a7(rgyud): pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyiraro//ji ltar 'o ma dong til yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til mar ma 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags dang phyag
350b1(rgyud): rgyas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nuso//gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag
350b2(rgyud): par sbyor bar mi nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin mi rnyed//bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni lus dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/phyir
350b3(rgyud): mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyuraro//gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu
350b4(rgyud): gnas par 'gyuraro//'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i don ji ltar lags/bcom ldan
350b5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu
350b6(rgyud): btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i tshig thos nas smod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgon+da/
350b7(rgyud): bshad pa de ni spyi'i don du bshad po gsungs pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du
351a1(rgyud): mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams log so leg so//byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon
351a2(rgyud): cig mtha' ni mu ste/'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa la//
351a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phung po dang khrims dang skye mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsu mo//stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gas+ho//
351a4(rgyud): pabacom ldan 'das stong pa gsum 'od gsal ba'i mtha' ji ltor 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ji ltar mes shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes
351a5(rgyud): rab kyi yis yun ring pos rnam par sbyor bar byed//ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyis ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed//ji ltar ras bal gyi mdab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba
351a6(rgyud): thob pa'i ye shes mchog tu myur pos rnam par skyong bar byed//de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang /ras bal gyi mang po ma thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du stong pa dang /shin tu stong pa dang /stong pa chen/
351a7(rgyud): po rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyuraro//'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o//byams pas gsol pa/bac+doMs rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin ga bye ba thams cad kyis mtha' drug gis
351b1(rgyud): //bshad pa ji ltar lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dgongs pas bshad pa dang /dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang /drang ba'i don dang /nges bya'i dran
351b2(rgyud): dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang /sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams//byams pas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thugs brtserje ba nye bar bzhag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/bac+doMs kyis
351b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/'di lta ste/'dod chags ma yin pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang /bar me nye bar mi dmigs
351b4(rgyud): pazhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o//lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang /bdag med pa dang /thaMd stong po dang /dag pa dang 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la stsos
351b5(rgyud): pabardo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa mi yin pas bshad pa'o//ga pur dang //khrag chen po dang /tsan dan dmar po dang /rdo rje dang /pad+ma dang phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don
351b6(rgyud): ste/ga pUr ni khu ba dang /khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang /dz+nyAn dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni tsAn dmar po'o//rdo rje ni mtshano ma ste thab so//pad+ma ni b+ha gA ste shes rab dang /phyag rgya dang /
351b7(rgyud): btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to//gnyi ga dang /spyod pa dang /bya ba'i rgyud rnamasu don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta ste/dkyil 'khor dang /mchod skyon de /
352a1(rgyud): gtor ma dang /sman dang /zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang /de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngas grung chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste/de ni yi ga 'don myo ba sha g+sa/
352a2(rgyud): khyA kon+ta gak+ki nI kin+ti pa sh+tsa/kon+dA ra ga/ko la khA/ko la wA/ki la/ko la ba sh+tsa/ka~M lastA tha//'dis dbang po dang /yul gsungs te/de lta bu la sngags pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni steji bzhin pa ma
352a3(rgyud): pos bshad pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang /gnyi ka'i rgyud dang /spyod pa'i rgyud dang /bye ba'i rgyud dang /rtog pa'i rgyud rnam kyi
352a4(rgyud): tshad ji ltar lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/rgyus par bya ni grangs maudo//gaunyis ka'i rgyud stong breg drug/
352a5(rgyud): spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do//bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o//rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o//de dag ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzho ste/rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' mi'i yig ji snyed pa ni
352a6(rgyud): kau khA ga g+h+ra~M de/tsaM che dza dz+nyA ho/Te dr-i Da n+ta Ni/ta thaM da d+he na/pa pha ba d+ham/yaM ra la wa/sha ShA sa ha/'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sag/
352a7(rgyud): pa/bac+doMs de rnams kyi byed pa dang /cho ga dang /bsgrub bya dang /sgrub pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyi/
352b1(rgyud): langs te 'dod chags byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas rab tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbusu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting 'chi
352b2(rgyud): gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang 'grol ba rma du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gang gi chos rab tu dpyad de sgrub par byed ban+darnal 'byor
352b3(rgyud): chen po'i rgyad la bzhug so//rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyi lo 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dgod pa dang /de las byung ba'i byed pa dang las dang sgrub pa la sogs po de kha na nyid rnam pa
352b4(rgyud): bcu rab tu dpyad sgrub par byed pa gnyi ga'i rgyud la zhugs so//las kyi bya ba sna tshogs phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dpyad pas bslab par
352b5(rgyud): bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ni spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhub so//'jigs par dmigs shing shin tu gcod sbra byed pa dang /yis sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang /bdag nyid lha'o snyems
352b6(rgyud): ba med pa dang /rmang du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang /skyon gyi rgyu'i rtogs pas rab tu spyod pas skyob par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhugaso//sngags dang sman dang /sbyin sreg dang
352b7(rgyud): phyebye ma dang /mig sman dang /rkang mo phyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgya rab tu dpyod pa sgrub par byed pa ni rtog pa'i rgyud pa bzhug so//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
353a1(rgyud): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rgyun rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/blong bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang /mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang /rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
353a2(rgyud): bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang /dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang /gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang /bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnamaso//gleng bslang ba rnam pa lngani 'di lta ste/ming
353a3(rgyud): dang /gang gi don du byas pa dang /byed pa po dang /chang dang /dgos pa rnam so//mtha' drug du bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/dgongs pas bshad pa dang /dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang //
353a4(rgyud): drang ba'i don dang /nges po'i don dang /sgra ji bzhin pa dang /sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnam so//rigs pa rnam pa bzhini rgyud dang /gleng bzhi dang /nges tshig dang /rgyu rnam so//bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni/
353a5(rgyud): yi ge'i don dang /spyi'i don dang /sbas pa dang /mthar thug pa rnam so//dbye ba rnam pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste/tshogs la bshod pa dang /slob ma la bshad pa'o//gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma
353a6(rgyud): brtag pa na 'di lta ste/rin po che dang /n+dan dang /pad+ma dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /ud pA la rnamaso//bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste/kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /deni dam pa'i
353a7(rgyud): bden pa'o//rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o//de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o//don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bco brgyadado//de'i mtha' ni gnaso//byang chub sa de'i rnams
353b1(rgyud): kyis gsol pa/don dam pa'i bden pa lU rab gnas pa rnal 'byor chen pos bus las kyi rgyal blo mchog gi ting 'dzin la brnyan nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab/
353b2(rgyud): tu spyod par bgyid//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro//gang
353b3(rgyud): du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas yang dag par mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par bya'o///
353b4(rgyud): de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgul yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//yis rdo rje kun las 'dus pa zhes
353b5(rgyud): ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o rdzogaso////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur//
353b6(rgyud): slad nas bla ma de nyid dang /dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o//ye shes rdo rje kun las btus//rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin//yis rang bzhin 'khor bar
353b7(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo la//de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste//kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus//de ston pa la der brtags nas//gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin//rgya gar skad du/tsa tur
355b1(rgyud): kyis gsol pa/don dam pa'i bden pA lA rab glanas pa'i rnal 'byor chen pos bus las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab//
355b2(rgyud): tu spyod par bgyid//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur//gang /
355b3(rgyud): du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas yang dag par mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par bya'o///
355b4(rgyud): de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgul yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//yes rdo rje kun las 'atus pa zhes
355b5(rgyud): ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o rdzogaso////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/
355b6(rgyud): slad nas bla ma de nyid dang /dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la phab pa'o//ye shes rdo rje kun las btus//rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin//yis rang bzhin 'khor bar
355b7(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo la//de gnyis dbyer med rdo rje ste//kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus//de ston pa la der brtags nas//gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin//rgya gar skad du/tsa tur/
356a1(rgyud): der bi ti pA ri br-its+tsha/bod skad du/lha mo bzhes yongasu zhus pa/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing //sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer rgyan pa//shin tu
356a2(rgyud): dga' ba'i sbyor chen la//rdo rje sems dpa' char bzhugaso//'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi//gsang chen chos kyi 'byung gnas la//byang chub sems ni 'phros na su//chos kyi dbyings gam
356a3(rgyud): zhu ba mdzad//zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas//lha mo spyan mas yongs zhus pa//bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la//tshig 'di dag ni gsol ba ste//chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro bo ni//gang
356a4(rgyud): las skye bar 'gyur ba lags//dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yi no//de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags//yan lag med pa gang de ni//yan lag dang bcas 'gyur nasu//lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lag///
356a5(rgyud): mig dong rna ba sna dang ni//de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid//dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang //khams rnamasu ni 'jug pa yang //ma rig bag chags sred pa yis//bcings pa'i nyon mongs
356a6(rgyud): 'dod chags sogs//rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa//ji ltar dngos 'dus pa lags//dngos po med pa sgom pa'i gzugs//gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams//rang bzhin med nI//
356a7(rgyud): dmigs med la//dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags//de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni//bdag gi the tshom lhas bka' stsol//de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni//bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsung//
356b1(rgyud): shes rab zab mo zung med ni//nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya//dpyad du med cing shes bya min//de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'//sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang
356b2(rgyud): rmi/namakha' na mkha'i spyod yu'o//mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na//nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min//spyod yul ba'i chags shes mkhan ni//rang sangs rgya su sprul ste//de dag ku ni/
356b3(rgyud): gyis kyad+ma mi shaMs//sa med sa so'i skye gnas dag/me ltos pa dang 'dus pa dang //da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la//khyim song dag chags las byung ba'i//da hU~M yi dgas skye
356b4(rgyud): de kun gyis kyang mi shes te//sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen//snying po shin tu snying ngo'i mchog//gang de kun bdag la gnas pa'i//sangs rgyas kun gyis glasang chen ni//lha mo khyod la
356b5(rgyud): bshad par bya//byang chub sems dpa'od gosal ba//zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i 'dra//de nyid ye shes lnga yi dngos//yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsamo//de yi dbus bzhugs pa'i lha//mi
356b6(rgyud): gsal gsal po'i gzugs can te//phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog/yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzugs//rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa//'od zer chen po'i bar bcan/
356b7(rgyud): snying dgu pa'i bar du ni//dpral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar//thig le kho nar bsdus te//lte ba'i dbusu rnam par gnas//tshe shes lnga pa can yin te//bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la//cha shas
357a1(rgyud): drug gis mtshon pa nyid//nga ro thibi le sapa rgyun byed pa//rdo rje khong nas phyung nas//sa bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste//chos kyi dbyings ni zhu bar byed//de ni rim par bskyed byed na//sgo dgu la nI kun tu/
357a2(rgyud): 'gro/khyab cing khyab dang gnas 'gro kun la//mau gra yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas//tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi/gzhi ni de las gyur pa'o//gang la gtso bor skyes byed la//sa dang ni mkha' da zh-i
357a3(rgyud): gsungs//ji snyed lus la gnas pa'i bar//de yis las drang las yin byed//dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang //bya ba'i las kun byed pa yin//sbyor ba rtag tu ngo gsungs te//mchod pa sgom pa/
357a4(rgyud): gsungs pa yin//gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na//de tshe de yi rang mthu yin//de 'dra'i lusu de 'gyur te//gang gis g.yo dang mi gau ya khyab//na mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba//de ni gnas par shri///
357a5(rgyud): par bya//bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig gi don//gang gis rtag tu sgom byas na//des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yi//rdo rje 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur//so dang mchu dang dkan dang lce//mgul gnas gang la
357a6(rgyud): yod pa ni//gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid//de ni zad dang gnas phyir//brjod pa med cing the tshom med//sgra yig rnam par spangs pa ni//rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid//byang chub sems ni 'dir
357a7(rgyud): /gsung so//lha mo bzhis yongasu zhus pa las lha mo spyan mas yongasu zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas lha mai ma mA ki/rdo rje can la 'di zhus te//byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis//kha
357b1(rgyud): snying lte ba glasang ba la//'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni//rdo rje chen mos bka' stsal 'tshal//cha shes rnam pa du zhig gsungs//gnas kyi rnam pa bskur ba du/kha dog ni/
357b2(rgyud): pa du zhig gsungs//de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshol//rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa//cha shes bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing //pad+ma bzhi la yang dag gnas//snying ki'i pad+ma la gnas
357b3(rgyud): gnag/khA yi pad+ma la gnas dkar/nga ro lte de'i pad+mar gnas//gsang ba'i pad+ma nga ro mtha'//stabs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pas//thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas//bsnam byed pa dang thos
357b4(rgyud): byed pa//de tshe mthong byed za byed pa//reg par byed kyang de kho nas//bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o//gang las gzhad byed bzla byed pa//de bzhin cho nges dang ngu ba//'byed pa gcod pa de
357b5(rgyud): kho nas//cho ga rnam po mang po shes//rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur//dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur//bram ze rgyal po rje'u rigs dang //dmangs rigs smad po'i rigs rnams dang
357b6(rgyud): bud med du ma sprul par byed//dud 'gro yi dag snga skye ba dang //gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang //de bzhin 'dod pa'i srid rnams las//'byung ba thams cad skyed byed pa//de nyid//
357b7(rgyud): kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas//mi gzugs dang ni pho yi gzugs//bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas//de ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa//dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa gang //des ni gsong chen shes pa ste//
358a1(rgyud): gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa//kha dog med cing kha dog dmar//kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi//thig le'i gzugasu bsgyur ba 'dris//'phro dang phyir 'od rnam par bstan//gang de rig pa
358a2(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul che//mtha' yAs bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs/skye dang bsdus dang 'dzeg pa la//thig le'i gzugasu rab gnas//gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos//stong phrag brgya ru shes pa
358a3(rgyud): yang //de yis de nyid mi shes te//de dag kun kyang 'bras modo//bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang //brgyad kyi mtha' ru 'byung ba 'dris//sgra yig dang po yi ge a//lnga pa yis ni yang dag rgyan//
358a4(rgyud): snying rje chen po las byung ba//kha mar bltas pa'i drug pas brtags//gdod mi mtha'i ma med pa'i lho//de ni spyi bor bstan pa yin//de dag gsang chen dam pa yin//lha mo bdag gis rab
358a5(rgyud): bstano//lha mo bzhis yongasu zhus pa las lha mo mA ma kis zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o////de nas lha mo gos dkAr mr-is//yan lag kun gyis btud nasu//thal mo snying khar sbyar byas
358a6(rgyud): te//rdo rje sems dpa' lnga gsol pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdus pa dang //sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags//lha yi dbang phyug khyod la zhus//gang gis 'od
358a7(rgyud): kyi gong bur bsdu//rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lag so//gsungs shig de nyid yi ge 'bru'i tshig/'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags//chu khams dang ni me yi khams//ji ltar ro ni mnyam
358b1(rgyud): /par 'gyur//ma las skyo ba gsum tsam dang //de bzhin pa las skyo ba gsum//de dag drug sogs gong du lngas//ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags//sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag ma
358b2(rgyud): 'tshul//thub pa chen pos bka' stsol mdzod//rdo rje chen gyis bka' stsal po//gsang ba shin tu gsang gyur pa//nyon cig lhama~M bshad par bya//skye gnas dngasu rtsa gnyis ni//g.yon dang de
358b3(rgyud): bzhin g.yas pa ste/g.yon du byang chub sems shes bya//g.ya su de bzhin dak+ta'o//de gnyis phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba//chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin//mun pa sku ste rdul gsung
358b4(rgyud): gzugs//thugs kyi rang bzhin stong stabs te//rdul ni ro//byang chub sems//mun pa de bzhin bskyed pa yin//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas//rang bzhini mnyam pa'i ngoro 'gyu //dri chen chung
358b5(rgyud): shel me tog/de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems//bdud rdzi ldi gang bur bsdus//de las rdo rjer 'dir gsungaso//chu shas gnyis pa dang ldan pa//de bzhin dgu pa dag yin//de skad gsung //
358b6(rgyud): ba bcu dang ni//de bzhin lnga po'i sa bon te//tshwa shas gnyis pa lnga yo ni//drug gi btegs pa des byung ba//de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o//chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge b+hum//skye gnas pad+mal/
358b7(rgyud): gnas pa//de nyi des ban swA hA//'dus pa la ni shes par bya//chu khams pa las skyos shes bya/me yi khams ni ma las skyes//sha dang khrag dang lpags pa yid//mi las skyes pa ni/
359a1(rgyud): bshad//tshil dang rkang dang khu ba ni//pha las smos pas bshad pa yin//gang bur yang dag 'dus pa ni//de dag cig tu bshad pa yin//bzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //de bzhin rung
359a2(rgyud): byed rnam shes rnams//sangs rgyas dngos po lnga yi gzugs phung po zhes byar bshad pa'o//khyu mi bzhis yong su zhus pa las lha mo gos da/mas zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o///de nas bzhi
359a3(rgyud): zhal gyur te//lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas//rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni/gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po//rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal//de bzhin rigs /
359a4(rgyud): sngags rnams kyang //dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtags pa dang //sbyin sreg so sor bya ba dang //de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang //khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal//de ltar lha mos
359a5(rgyud): zhus ma thag/rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi sbubs thabs ni//nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya//gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni//de bzhin raM dang rig la so//
359a6(rgyud): khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang //chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba'o//de dag nyid las byung ba ni//byang chub sems zhes shes par bya ba byang chub sems las gong bu las kyang yid bskyed//
359a7(rgyud): yid las na mkho'i khams kyang ni//khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams//dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams//de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste//bsdu ba de ni bstan byas pa//chos kyi dbyu
359b1(rgyud): /kyi sgrub pa yin//de bas nan tan thams cad kyi//sgrub pa yang dag spyod par bya'o//'di ltar gal po zhes dngos kyis//bsgrub par bya ba rab tu gartan//tshos//
359b2(rgyud): dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su//rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa bshad//ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang //sa 'og ral gri'i dngos grub dang //na mkhar 'phur dang mig sman dang //
359b3(rgyud): 'chi ba mod dang nad 'joms dang //mig drang glang po che dang rta//glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang //rnga mo ma he spyad ki rnams//cha ni mnyam po bya ba'o//mthe bong tshigs tshad tsam du ni//
359b4(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar//dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang //byang chub sems nus tshad tsam ni///sngags bzlas nas ni sbyar byas te//byin gyis brlabs kyang //
359b5(rgyud): bya ba'o//phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge A//dbus su de bzhin hUM byas te//'bar ba'i hrI yig 'bar byed pa//dgu po de ni rab tu sgrub//lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu//sngags
359b6(rgyud): bzlas nas ni phye mar brtag/yungs kar lnga yi ched tsam du//lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya//tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la//ril bu rnams ni byas nas su//pad+ma'i snod la
359b7(rgyud): bzhag byas te//stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya//mtshams bzhi la ni sgom byas nas//nyin dang mtshan du bza' bar yang //de ni bskal pa'i mtha' bar yang //dngos grub rgyas
360a1(rgyud): par 'gro ba ste//gzi brjid mdangs dang stobs brtson 'grus//lbu pA la ni smon lam yang //mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa//dril bu chen po zos phyiro//rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs//
360a2(rgyud): nas//rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsol//yi ge oM dang baM yig dang //laM yig dbus su yang dgra gnas//dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste//gnyis pi yAM ni mdog dkar ga
360a3(rgyud): gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams//b+ha ga'i dbusu bsgom par bya//'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni//nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed la//rig pa de ni rab 'byor na//de ni skad cig kho nar 'grub//
360a4(rgyud): lha mo lha min bu mo dang //mi yi bu mo rnam pa bzhi//sa yi dkyil 'khor kun tu ni//sngags kyis bkug nas spyad par bya//sgom pa de bzhin rigs pa'i sngags//bdag gis bshad
360a5(rgyud): pa zin byas te//dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad par bya//dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon//dkyil 'khor lus shes gsungs pa ste//dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa
360a6(rgyud): yin//dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni//dkyil 'khor gsum du brtags pa ni//brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste//gang du gtso bo bskyed par byed/
360a7(rgyud): phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs//'byung ba rig mar brtags pa'o//chags pa lcags kyu kho na ste//zhags pa pad+mar chu do byed pa/
360b1(rgyud): kha phrad pa ni sgrogs yin+d+ra par//sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bur bshad/spos ni dri chen zhes gsungs te//me tog rak+ta zhes
360b2(rgyud): 'dod do//mar me sha rnams kho na yin//dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod//sgeg mo ling gar bstan pa ste//phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin//dbyangs
360b3(rgyud): ma dbugs su bstan pa dang //gar mkhan mA ni rnal 'byor te//bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang por gsungs//de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin//rtogs
360b4(rgyud): pade rnams byams pa sogs//de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs//dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin//sbyin sreg las ni bshad par bya//nyon
360b5(rgyud): cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi//sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te//phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin//nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni//pad ma bzhi rnams 'byor
360b6(rgyud): pa ni//lus kyi dbus su nye bar gnas//me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni/dbang chen dang ni chu de bzhin//rlung gis me ni 'bar byas te//chu yi sa yongs
360b7(rgyud): su smin par byed//dbang chen dkyil 'khor las byung //gang du me ni bskyed pa'o//ra yig mngon spyod yi ge ste//ya yig dbang gi las kho na//
361a1(rgyud): la yig rgyas par 'gyur ba ste//bzhig zhi bzhes gsungs//glang zhig zas dang btung ba ni//de dag thams cad tshul ste//pad mdaka yig kha mar lta//snying gi pad+mar bcud
361a2(rgyud): par bya//lta ba'i pad+mor 'gro phyi rol//kha sbyor tshul gyi sbyor ba yis//gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro ma theg/thal bar mtha'i rgyu rnam par bstan//de ltar sbyin sdug bdag pad ma nyid
361a3(rgyud): mtshan du bya ba ste//rtag pa rgyun tu zas zos na//tshe 'dri kho nar 'grub par 'gyur//rmis pa med ning nad kyang med//'chi ba med cing 'dres rnams med//de ni blo bur 'chi ba med/
361a4(rgyud): 'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing //rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur//bzang po skal par gson pa ste//sems can thams cad dga' bar skye//mthong ba tsam gyis bskul byed//sbyin sto//
361a5(rgyud): las rnams bshad byas nas//lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya//dri dang phreng sogs gos rnams dang //spos me zas dang lha bshos kyis//dbang po gnyis ni rang 'byor na so//bdog pa/
361a6(rgyud): mchod pa rnams ni bya//bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid//sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te//de bas nan tan thams cad kyis//rnal 'byor pasna ni rtag tu mchod//gang zhig 'ag
361a7(rgyud): yang bya ba'i las//rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par sgom//zas dang btung ba de bzhin gis/de bzhin dri dang phreng kha nas//rig ma bzhi yis rnam gyon pa'i//bdag nyid sgra nyid bsam pa
361b1(rgyud): //de ltar ba shad nAs rdo rje de//cang mi gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs//de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis//phyag ga zal mo sbyar gyur te//dgyes pas rab tu zhas
361b2(rgyud): bzhad nas//rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste//cang mi gsung bar zhugs gyur to//lha mo bzhes yongs su zhus pa las lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u
361b3(rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o///thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhi sa yongasu zhus pa dpal ur+yan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal
361b4(rgyud): 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po smrig ti dz+nyA nak+Shi nyid kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bshad nas gtan la byab
361b5(rgyud): pa'o//rgya gar ska da du/shrI bo dzA hri la a l+yaMk+Sha ra tan+t+ra nA maH/brod
361b6(rgyud): skad du/dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
361b7(rgyud): shenas pa rnams cad kyi sku dang ni sring dang drugs kyi snying kyi drid med bcu'i dkyim nam shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhugs so//brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i la
363a1(rgyud): //de ltar ba shad nAs rdo rje de//cang mi gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs//de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis//phyag ga zal mo sbyar gyur te//dgyes pas rab tu zhas
363a2(rgyud): bzhad nas//rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//rnam par mi rtog pa thob ste//cang mi gsung bar zhugs gyur to//lha mo bzhes yongs su zhus pa las lha mo sgrol mas zhus pa'i le'u
363a3(rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o///thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lha mo bzhi sa yongasu zhus pa dpal ur+yan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal
