363a5(rgyud): pa'o//rgya gar ska da du/shrI bo dzA hri la a l+yaMk+Sha ra tan+t+ra nA maH/brod
363a6(rgyud): skad du/dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
363a7(rgyud): shenas pa rnams cad kyi sku dang ni sring dang drugs kyi snying kyi drid med bcu'i dkyim nam shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhugs so//brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i la
363b1(rgyud): dang pad+mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/dam tshig yongasu spyod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro dang /ye shes kyi lus yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro dang
363b2(rgyud): sgra brnyan lto bu'i rdo rje'i gsung 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' phro da /gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'agro dang /rtse gcig tu 'dris pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
363b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang /gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /rten par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkho 'gro dang /rlan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang /smin par
363b4(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro dang /skyod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro dang /go 'byed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'agro dang /hA ru nu pU ra la sogs pas mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i
363b5(rgyud): rdorje mkha 'gro dang /gI d+ha mgrin la sogs de'i glu mkhan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' d+mo dang /sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pa'i dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang /tshod ma sna tshogs zo ba'i
363b6(rgyud): ro ldan mA zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'agro dang /rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud mkhan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang /gsum rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha go mo la sro
363b7(rgyud): pa'i rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang /rdo rje mkha 'gro tshan mo na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro chen po
364a1(rgyud): dang /tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro chen po dang /'du shes kyi mtshan nyid nub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'agro chen po dang /
364a2(rgyud): 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang /rnar shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro chen po la sogs pa na mkha'i dbyings
364a3(rgyud): dang mnyam pa rnams kyis//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu lta bur gang bar snang ngo //de nas rdo rje mkha' gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas mkha'agro chen po rdo rje 'dzin
364a4(rgyud): pa chen po la mchod pa'i sprin spros pa du ma yid las byung bu lha dang /mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin
364a5(rgyud): gshegs NAM thams cad kyi//gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog/rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud//'dren pa mchog gis bshad du gsol//de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab
364a6(rgyud): pa'i tshig gsan nas/mkha'agro thams cad la rnam par bltos te cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje mkha' gro de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces
364a7(rgyud): gsol te//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha'agro chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor du 'chang
364b1(rgyud): mo bzod pa de bdag cag la dgye su ma mdzad cig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te tshig su bcad pa gsungs
364b2(rgyud): pa/sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs//sa 'og ma yi sangs rgyas kyang //'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na//sems dpa' gzhan ni smos ci dgos//sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di//
364b3(rgyud): byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir//byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad pa ni//stong pa rnams kyi chos nyid do//de nas rdo rje mkha 'gro de dag thams cad rab tu dga' nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis
364b4(rgyud): mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das legaso legaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/
364b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba thun mong ma yin pa bstan cing rnam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol//de nas de bzhin ga
364b6(rgyud): pa thams cad dbang phyug gis rdo rje mkha'agro de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/sems dpa' thams cad byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de
364b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha las phyung //oM AHhUM sa ma ya badz+ra/de nas phyung ma thag tu
365a1(rgyud): de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mar 'gro'i 'khor de dag thams cad bsdus nas rang gi snying kar btsud nas/bud med kyi dkyil na thams cad brgyal ba ltar gnaso//de
365a2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de bslang ba'i phyir mkha 'gro thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs ma thag
365a3(rgyud): tu de dag dngan par slar thob ceng dri lnga ba bzhin du gon so//de nas de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyag gis 'khor lo rnam par dgod pa zhes pa ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par
365a4(rgyud): zhugs nas/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje mkha' gro de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod par gyur te//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i
365a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis na mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang /yid bde bas myong bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
365a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te/
365a7(rgyud): dbugs rngub par mi mdzad/'byung bar mi mdzad/lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/lus gnas par yang mi mdzad/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi
365b1(rgyud): gzigs mi dgongs//nye bar mi 'jig go//thabs dang shes rab stong par yang mi mdzad//shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par 'dzud par mi mdzad//mtho ris la yang mi 'jog/ma dang /
365b2(rgyud): pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad//ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad//nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ma 'gags pa rnams 'gag par yang mi mdzad//ma bskul ba
365b3(rgyud): rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad//me rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad//rnam par rmongs pa rnams rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga'
365b4(rgyud): bar yang mi mdzad/mi dga' ba rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/me khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/mi sdug pa rnams sdug par yang mi mdzad/drag po ma rungs pa chen po
365b5(rgyud): dang /gtum po chen po dang /lha dang /lha ma yin dang /log 'dren dang /gdug pa chen po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /shin tu gdug pa'i
365b6(rgyud): drug chen po dang /tsha ba'i gdon dang /nad dang /sbrul dang /sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad//rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad do//
365b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhings te/brjid pa dang bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa dang /'dor ba dang /bskum pa dang /'gyed pa dang /spyan ma
366a1(rgyud): sa smin gyis brgyu cing bsgyur ba nga/ na sna ma gums gson ga spyod ma rloms ngas la nas 'dzin cing bsgyur ba dang
366a2(rgyud): 'dor zhing bskul ba dang /'jog cing 'degs pa'i rnam pa'i gnon pas nI mdo'i dbyings 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de/rlung gi khams chen por kun tu lhag par mdza/
366a3(rgyud): de la khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad de/de nas chu'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/de nas sa'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad do//de la
366a4(rgyud): yang sngon tu khyab nas bcom ldan 'angs byang chub semasal kun tu khyab par mdzad do//dri dring sems can thams cad dang /sna tshogs phra basbom po dang //zung med gnan
366a5(rgyud): nu rgyan pa dang //skyes pa dang ni me ning dang //lha dang //dang gnod sbyin dang //gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang //chung dag brgya byin la sogs dang //'byung dang 'byung 'gyur thams cad
366a6(rgyud): danas kyi'an 'i shung rgya ma/'gro mchog rnams 'akru bye ba'o//gas ga ni mi yin pa shed par gyi//gags
366b1(rgyud): par bya'o//oM ak+Sha ra mu khaM sarba d+harmA d+hA A d+ya ru yanan twA ta/gtor ma'i sngags so//e A/i I/u U/a e/a o/oM aHbud med do//ra rA/la l-I/man
366b2(rgyud): kAk+Shak+kA d+hA // /byA p+na bad+d+ha ma/ pa'aM//sa la la//shA swA hA/'gas pa la sregs pa'o/nas kyi
366b3(rgyud): kyis bon no//badz+ra d+h+r-ika hU~M/dzi na dzi ka b+h+yAM/rat+na d+h+rik+Sha aM/A ro lIg dz+r-IM/prad+d+ho d+h+r-ika khaM/mkha'agro chen po lnga'o//dre Sha ya ti mAM/mo ha ra ti lAM/rA ga ra ti pAM/badz+ra ra ti tAM/rdo rje mkha' gro
366b4(rgyud): rten par byed pa la sogs pa'i 'o//k+Shi ti gar+t+ti k+She/badz+ra pA Ni dzI/ga ga nai gar+b+ha khaM/lo ke shwa ra ya gaM/ni ba ra Na baSh+Tim+b+hi ni kaM/sa man+ta b+ha dra saM/rdo rje mkha' 'gro dam tshig spyod pa la
366b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'o//rU pa badz+rA dzaHshap+da badz+ra hUM/gan d+ha badz+ra baM/ra sa badz+ra hoH/spar sha badz+ra khaM/d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra raM/rdo rje mkha 'gro mdzes par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o//ya man+ta
366b6(rgyud): kr-ita/pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/pit+man+ta kr-ita/b+hig+h+nAM ta kr-iti/Tak+ki rA dza/nI la daN+Da/ma hA ba la/a tsa le ka na hUM/suM b+ha ni hUM/tsakra brti ni hUM b+h+yAM/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ga shin rje gshed la sogs
366b7(rgyud): pa'i'o//wa ri dzi na b+h+r-i/terdza'i skan+na b+h+yAM/man+t+ri tsakra b+h+yAM/bar d+ha na b+h+yAM/bi sa ra Na b+h+yAM/bi ri dzi na b+h+yAM/ka ro b+ha ba d+hA/rdo rje mkha' 'gro gtsug tor rgyal ba la sogs
367a1(rgyud): d+hA/dra N+DI / gyi//oM dz+dza shAd+d+haHn+dad+h+waM/ //hUM m+bun ///

367a3(rgyud): d+hi/la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i'o//badz+ra sa ma yi n+ta mA t+tik+Sha mats+tshi/thig gdab po'o//badz+rA nr-it+pa sa ma ya hU~M/tshon dbye pa'i'o//hU~M hU~MHA~M dz+haiM da
367a4(rgyud): pa'i'o//badz+rI kI la ya mud gar A kaTa~M ya hU~M phaT/pur dus brdungs pa'ir//de la so gas mtha' yas pa/'jig rten gsum du rnyedad/'a ba'i//sngag sa kyi tshogs rnams ji snyed
367a5(rgyud): pa//dwe g+h+nAn d+hin du rgyas de ru//gisang bdad ni 'jigs byed dang //bde mchog sogs lang yis ni//lus dang btsas par ring ngo shing bya//rdul 'byor rtogs pas shes
367a6(rgyud): dang sa rdo rje sgyeng ba rkyen gyi rgyung las/sngags kyi la'u skye gnyis pa'o///de nas mkha' 'gro grong khyer mchog/dkyil 'bar 'jigs po bri bar bya//las kyi cho
367b1(rgyud): man/chags par ni las rnams bya/! shuHlnga'i srang ngun//sebs med las byung byas nasas//byod rlangs pa brgyad rtab pa dra//byas tu zlaban+ya dang banga'o//grang nu ngal
367b2(rgyud): spro ban pa//d+hAr+yan bzhis brgyan pa ste//da dang me tig phreng bas klubaste//srad bung ni dngor bldan pa//zur gyi tshun thams cad du//zla b.rin chen rdo rje dgod//las kyi bye brag
367b3(rgyud): shes pa yis//blo dang ldan pa sa phyag hU~M dgod//Id+hi nI la lte bu yis//'jigs byed rdo rje dbus su bA~M/sheng du lte brgyad 'khor lo dkar//lho ru rin chen zung dgu ljang //nub du ma dab brgyang pod+ma ma pa
367b4(rgyud): byang ngu ral gri sngon po bri//me yi mtsham su 'khor lo sde//bden bral ud pal dmar pa dang //rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma mar//dbang ldan ut+pal ser po ste//rdo rje thi ba shar gyi sgo//lho yau sgo ru rdo rje dbyung
367b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i sdong bu nub kyi sgo//byang sgo rdo rje kha bye ba//sbyor ba ldan pas dgod par bya//rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni//tshon ci dag kyang bsgom bya ste//rdul chen lnga la sogs pa rnams//rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya//de nas
367b6(rgyud): bum pa bzung bya ba//rtsa ba nag nag med pa yi//zhabs brtan mgrin ring mo chu 'phyang ba//lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas//mgul bar ras kyis yang dag dkras//ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa//
367b7(rgyud): rin chen sman 'bru sna lnga dang //spos chu yis ni rab bkang nas//bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya//rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi//bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi
368a1(rgyud): lha rnams kyi ni bum pa bzhi//sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni//las kun byed pas bzlas byas te//ku shI chun pos sems can che//'jug pa kun la gtor bar bya//yon dang gtor ma mchod phul
368a2(rgyud): nas//de dag phyo gar rab bkod de//g.yasu rgyal ba spyan drang ngo //de nas lha rnams rab gnas pa'i//bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste//phyag rgya bral ba'i sbyor ba ni//lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas//bu mo
368a3(rgyud): gzugs bzang lang chos brgyan//dbang thob lus rgyas thob pa mo//g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te//de yis 'khor lo sprul par bya//de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i//mchod pa phul nas bstod bya ste/
368a4(rgyud): bshang ci khu ba khrag rnams ni//dung chen po ru bzhag bya ste//lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//de nas mkha' 'gro grong mchog tu//slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya ste//rdo rje ye shes rab thob pa'i//de bzhin
368a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi//pho brang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir//bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya//de nas slob ma de yis kyang //me tog sngags 'dis gtor ba'o//pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoH/zhes bya//
368a6(rgyud): de nas tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol//de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni//dkyil 'khor de 'dir blta bar bya//sangs rgyas rigs su khyod skyes so//sngags dang phyag rgyas khyod byin
368a7(rgyud): bcwag/dngas grub thams cad phun sum tshogs//dam chog mchog tu 'grub par byed///rje rdo rje rol pa'i mchog/sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya//
368b1(rgyud): dra/gang dag me tog gsang ba ste//de de de yi lha yang dag/da yi sbyor ba rab sbyin te//de yi nan tan du sgrub bo//dung chen bdud rtsi lnga drud de//dmyal ba'i chu 'dis khyod la ni//dam tshig 'das
368b2(rgyud): na bsreg par byed//dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pa'i//'thung shig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu//badz+ra u da~M ka/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dam tshig dang ni sdom pa rnams//bla mas
368b3(rgyud): slob ma sdig bral la//ci lta ba bzhin bsgrag par bya//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//
368b4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//dbang bskur ba yi cho ga'i mchog/gang gis legs par byed 'gyur na//de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub//slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan//yang dag
368b5(rgyud): shes shing rgyud shes pa//de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi//gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos//bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung //bla ma la gus dang ba'o//dge sgom lha rnams mchod byed pa/
368b6(rgyud): gtong pod yon tan ldan pa'o//de nas slob ma de yis kyang //langs te zhabs la mgos gtugs nas//rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa//gos dang rgyan gyis legs par bgos//steng du
368b7(rgyud): bla re bri bar bya//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //lham dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang //gdu bu dag dang rga rags dang //bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis//slob ma sdig dang bral ba la
369a1(rgyud): slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro//dang po rnam rgyal bum pa dang //de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang //lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po bzhes//bkra shIs tshigs bcad glu
369a2(rgyud): sgra dang //rdo rje dril bu gsal ba yis//skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du//til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i//rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas ni//de nyid la ni dbang bskur bar//
369a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam//de lto bu ni bsams nas kyang //chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya//de nas yid 'ong bu mo ni//legs par gom pa dbang thob pa//rgyan gyis rab brgyan
369a4(rgyud): rang mdzes pa//btsal te bla ma la phul nas//de nas rgya la dbang slob ma//nang ni smras phyi btu so pa yi//gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa ste//sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya//
369a5(rgyud): pad+mo las drang ba//sbom po mtha' lhag rtse sbyar nas//rkan tu rdo bzhag pa bya/kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che//kye ma 'odam tshig de brjod cing //kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya'o//'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ba'i//de dbang bskur
369a6(rgyud): ba'i thabs mchog go//yang na shin tu dang ba dong //gzugs bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang //sbyor goms bla ma la ni dbul//bla mas byin brlabs lha mo dang //sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya//de yis
369a7(rgyud): blangs nas brtson pa'i tshogs//ji skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas//rang gi lha dong sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun//mnyes byed tshogs sems
369b1(rgyud): btags te//mngon sum bde ba rang 'byung ba//gzhan gyis dang du bsgrag me nus//ganga'i yul de dade ba che//dA ma de la dngul bar bya//bla ma gzhan la de bzhin du//ci dga' ba yi yon dang
369b2(rgyud): dbul//slob dpon cung zad ci 'dod pa//yid la bsams pa dbul bar bya//dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa'i phyir//bsgrims te de bzhin dbul bar bya//slob dpon gyi ni yul gyi mchog/
369b3(rgyud): rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga//bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis//yang na gsum du 'gyur ba yin//rang gi mdang seng ge gdan//yon gyi mchog ste sangs rgyas rigs//
369b4(rgyud): gser dang glang po rin chen dang //sring mo bla ma la dbul ba//rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te//yon te yon gyi mchog yin no//shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan//rang gi chung ma dngul
369b5(rgyud): bya ste//rin chen sna tshogs rnam dag pa//yon te rin po che yi rigs//mu tig phreng ba shin tu mdzes//bu mo rin chen dra ba yis//brgyan te bla ma la dbul ba//yon te pad+ma'i rigs yin no//
369b6(rgyud): rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang //chung ma 'phrul gyi bzhon pa sogs//glang po rta na shin tu brgyan//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/nan tan bla ma dbul bya ba//sna tshogs
369b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs yin no//de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang //mi 'gyur ba yi bye brag des//gsum du shes bya bla ma la//blo ldan rdo rje slob ma yis//ci ste de bkun 'dod na//dadi mos sems
370a1(rgyud): kyis dbul bar bya//yid la gang bsams ma phul lam//khas blangs de ni ma phul na//yi dwags dmyal ba rnam gnyis su//nges par skyes te brlag par 'gyur//de bas de rnams
370a2(rgyud): rab phul nas//gsol ba dag ni rab tu gdab//rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi//dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so//sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi//dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugaso//sbyor
370a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi//dkyil 'khor bdag gis de ring mthong //gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi//dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur//de nas bla ma de yis kyang //de la
370a4(rgyud): dbang bskur sprin bya ste//dri dang me tog phreng bas brgyan//bsgrims te yang dag brtag par bya//dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang //gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang //gsum pa shes rab ye shes
370a5(rgyud): te//bzhi pa de yi ye shes te//bla ma las ni thob pa'o//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las phan yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////gang
370a6(rgyud): gis thabs kyis rags lnga'i don//rang gi don gyur kun tu bzang //'di dag gzhan la rab bde'i phyir//rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad//yad 'ong dben pa'i sa phyogs su//ci
370a7(rgyud): bder gnas la nam mkha' kun//sems kyis khyab par byas nas su//rnam brtags e ma'i 'jig rten kun//sdug bsngal chos kyis kun nas gtses//byang chub sems nyams sems
370b1(rgyud): can rnams//kun las 'byung zhes dam bcas pa'i//sngags pas spyi bor bzhag pa ni//AHsems kyi rdul phran cha drug rnams//phyogs ba nu dag tu phye nas su//chos kyi don rnams des bsal
370b2(rgyud): nas//shin tu dri med sems dag pa//'das dang ma 'ongs pa yi sems//da ltar yang ni dmigs su med//gnyis med de la gnyis med med//nam mkha' zhes pa'ang gnas pa med//de
370b3(rgyud): ltar kun tu brtags nas su//'gro ba thams cad shin tu stong //dri med rnal 'byor nyid kyi yin//dngos po med par rang sems bsam//'gro ba 'di ni de lta bu'i//dngos po gang dag yod min na//
370b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang dag lags//sems nyams sems can 'byung por bsgom//'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs//dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan bya//rin chen sems ni rmugs pa
370b5(rgyud): le//bdi gshegs rnams ni bskul bar snang //shU n+ya tA ti yo ga pA daM swA hA//pra b+ha ba'i A kA sha ta mi pa ga ta sa ma ya//u pa ta pa ya yin+ta su gaM ta sr-i ga te gA ti shrI badz+ra sA hA/pU pra
370b6(rgyud): stes+t+waMstehaM/rnam rtog kun spangs dri med pa'i//rnam par mi rtag sgom pa'i sems//sngags kyi de nyid bskyong byas la//hUM zhes pa yi gzugs su brtag/ting 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur na//
370b7(rgyud): gang phyir de ni bsgoms pas thob//dam pa nim mkha'i dbyings la gnas//byang chub sems tshe gos der bcas la//rnal 'byor yid kyis kun bsams nas//rgyas par rnam par
371a1(rgyud): brtag par bya//yi ge drum gyis lha yi gnas//rdo rje rin chen rjes ni brgyan//sgo khyud rta babasA ka bdag/dur gyi phreng bas rnam par klubs//gru bzhi pa la sgra
371a2(rgyud): bzhi pa//dril bu'i dra ba dag gis brgyan//rtag par do shal me long dang //me tog phreng byas rgyan rnams bres//de yi dbus su seng+ge'i gdan//seng+ge brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan//sman
371a3(rgyud): lam dbang gis de dag kun//byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che//shar phyogs pa glang shin tu rgyas//lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzang ste//nub phyogs su ni rma bya bshad//de bzhin
371a4(rgyud): byang phyogs na mkha' lding //mo skyong khro bo bsam pa ni//mthing ka dkar po dmar pi'i zhal//rdo rje phyag rgya thugs ka na//mthing ka kha dog gsol la bzang //g.yas na rin chen laH
371a5(rgyud): lo sto//ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na//'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o//brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum bsam//dang po yi ni stong pa nyid//gnyis pa de bzhin mtshan ma med//
371a6(rgyud): gsum pa smon pa med pa yi//zhal du mkhas pas rig par bya//phyag drug rtag tu 'bar bar sgom//mtshon cha sna tshogs rnams dang ldan//pad+ma la ni mnyam gzhag nas//ye shes
371a7(rgyud): phyag rgya snying kha nang //dbus kyi gnas su bsam pa ni//rdo rje skyil mo krung du gnas//shar gyi gnas su bsam pa ni//sngags pas rnam snang thub pa ste//dkar dang mthing ka dma?
371b1(rgyud): ba'o zhal//'khor lo phyag rgya stong kun//rdo rje 'bor sogs 'od gsal ba//rin chen rdo rje g.yas pa na//rdul gri pad+ma g.yon pa no//rnal 'byor can gyis rtag par bsnam//thor chugs du
371b2(rgyud): rgyan dag gis brgyan//rin chen mgon pa lho phyogs na//ser dang mthing / dkar ba'i zhal//rin chen phyug rgya snying kha na//mer gang lta bu snang ba'o//g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste//rdo rje padre g.yon
371b3(rgyud): no//rtag par rdol 'byor bas bsam pa//na chen ched du 'bebs pa'o//nub phyogs gnas su dgong bya'o//snang ba mtha' yas byas me pa ni//dmya dang mAbi ka da/ bA zhal//pad+yA rAg
371b4(rgyud): lta bu//pang+ga'i phyag rgyu stong la na//rdo rje drin chen g.yas pa na//'khor lo la gri g.yon pa na//pad+ma la ni mnyam gzhig bsam//byang phyogs gnas su don grub ni//ljang gu mthing ka da// ba'i zhal/
371b5(rgyud): ral gri phyag rgya snying ka ni//'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam pa'o//pad+ma rdo rje g.yas pa na//'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//byung gi gnas su bsam
371b6(rgyud): par bya//sngags pas phyag drug bsam pa ni//spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi//rnam par snang mdzad phyag brgya bzhin//de yi don du rnam par sgom//mA ma kI yang bsam pa
371b7(rgyud): //ud pal dang ni mthong 'drag//zhal gsum phyag drug chags pa ste//mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o//chags pas chags pa rigs kyi sngags/
372a1(rgyud): zhal gsum phyag drug dge ba ste//sbyor ba'i sa ni dkar mo bsam//pad+ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o//sgrol ma/kha dog ser mo ste//'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan//zhal
372a2(rgyud): gsum phyag drug rab tu bsam//thog med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o//sgo bzhi ske srang dgod bya ba//sgo rnams su ni khro bo bsam//khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed//gzhan gyis mi thub de bzhin
372a3(rgyud): te//thub par dka' ba rta mgrin dang //khro bo bdud rtsi pa khril pa bsam//de dog kun kyang zhal gsum pa//drag cing drag por gnon pa'o//mthing ka ser po de bzhin dmar//ljang ku dag ni
372a4(rgyud): kha dog tu'o//mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste//thod po'i phreng thogs de bzhin no//gdon rnams thams cad skrag byed pa//gnod sbyin srin po phra men ma//ma he seng ge stag rnams dang //
372a5(rgyud): pa lang zhan pa rnams bzhi'o//rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer can//khro bo spun ni kun nas bsdus//sngags 'di rnams kyis bas mo pa ni//gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o//sngags
372a6(rgyud): kyi de nyid rjes mthun par//sngags pas dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su//so yi snying po la sogs pa//sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas bsam//lus dang ngag dang sems de nyid//
372a7(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/sems ni de ru zhugs par bsam//mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid che//dbang po'i lam du byung nas su//dang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyan//bangag nyid gcig/
372b1(rgyud): cing gcig 'gyur bar//skad cig gis ni brtag par bya//khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya//de la sogs pas bstod par byed//de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs//rang gi snying kar rab tu gzud //gzun
372b2(rgyud): rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du//rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bzhugs//tshor ba rin chen mgon po yin//mtha' yAMs 'od ni 'du shes su'o//'du byed kun tu gdon mi za//mi bskyed pa ni phung
372b3(rgyud): pa lngar//de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams ni//sngags 'di rnams kyi bzhugs par bsam//sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du//de nas spyan ni bzhugs bya ste//rnal 'byor yid kyis bsam
372b4(rgyud): pa ni 'di yang spro bar gnas par bsam//mA ma kI yang chu yi khams//brlan zhing khrag ni rgyu ba'i phyir//rnal 'byor pas ni yid kyis bsam//de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur//me yaM khams
372b5(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin du//gos dkar mo yang bzhugs par bya//kun tu khyab par zhugs pa yi//'od rnams su ni dar 'gyur ro//sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin du//bzhugs par de ni bsam par bya/
372b6(rgyud): rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur//de bzhin yid 'gyogs rdzu 'phrul 'grub//rdo rje dadengs kyi dbang phyug ma//na mkha'i rang bzhin dag tu 'jug/de lus khong stong nyid la ni//rang sems yon tan
372b7(rgyud): sgom pa'i sems//na mkha'i dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis//sangs rgyas skyo ma'i sbyor bas su//dag pa'i bdag nyid ci 'dod par//de nas ri rab phul nas 'gro//sa yi snying po bdag nyid
373a1(rgyud): che//sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag nyid de//mig gi phyogs su zhugs nas ni//'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur//phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che//rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor bas/
373a2(rgyud): na//sgra rnams thams cad shes pa'o//rna ba'i rnam shes de bzhin 'gyur//na mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che//sna yi rnam shes sbyor bas na//sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shos//
373a3(rgyud): de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur//'jig rten dbang por rab chags pa//rdo rje lce yi sbyor bas su//ro yi dngos po myong ba des//skad cig gcig la de ru 'gyur//blo ldan sgrib pa thams cad ni//
373a4(rgyud): rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan//nyon mongs thams cad rnam par sel//nyo bo'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jig/me long gi ni rnam pa ltar//rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni//gzugs brnyan
373a5(rgyud): gyi ni sbyor bas su//skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur//bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal//rnam pa bcu dang drug tu yang //sbyor ba de ni byin brlabs nas//sngags pas de ni sems la gtsug
373a6(rgyud): khro bo lcogs kyu dpung pa yas//zhags pa lta bu gnyis pa'o//lu gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum//rgyal mtshan gzhug par khyab par bzhag de ltar don rnams rab tu zhugs//sangs rgyas
373a7(rgyud): /kun gyi ngo bor bdag/rdo rje phyag rgya dang ldan pa//g.yon pa dril bsnams ste zur brten//rdo rje sems dpa' da gnas 'gyur//rnal 'byod chen po dkar ba'i gzugs//dkar dang mthing ka
373b1(rgyud): dmar gi dbu//stong nyid la sogs bdag sbyor ba//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su smra//rdo rje phyag rgya rjes su chags pa la//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga N+Da badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM//sangs rgyas
373b2(rgyud): mchod pa la//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza bodz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM//rang gi dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin//mdun du bsams nas na mkha' laM//khyab pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te//dkyil
373b3(rgyud): 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams bzlas//bcom ldan mi mnyam gzhug cing bzhugs//rdo rje phyag rgya thugs kar bsnams//g.yas par 'khor lo rin po che//pad+ma ral gri g.yon po'o//de nyid
373b4(rgyud): gsum gyi tshul gyis ni//ci tsam nus par bzlas pa bya//skyo na yid kyis drangs nas ni//de dag thams cad snying kar gzhug/mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na//lus kyis ci tsam
373b5(rgyud): bskyod pa dang //tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams//de dag sdigs dang phyag rgyar 'gyur//rtag tu sgom pa'i sbyor bas ni//de la sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin//rnal 'byor ngo bo gzugs can la/lha mo rnaMs/
373b6(rgyud): kyang de la 'dzin//dbang po lam da gang gyur pa//de dang de yi ngo bo dag/shin tu mnyam bzhag sbyor ba su//bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bya'o//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///
373b7(rgyud): /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshigs pa
374a1(rgyud): thams cad dang //byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi//ye shes
374a2(rgyud): gces pa dri med pa//byang chub sems ni rin po che//bla na med pa bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas
374a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la/lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing sems kyang tshig gis rab tu brjod pa yin no//de nas byang
374a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadasku dang gsung dang thugs sbyor ba thob nas ched brjod pa 'di ched brjod//kye ma kun tu bzang po 'di//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//chos
374a5(rgyud): rnams skye ba med pa ste//g.yo ba med cing gnas med pa//rtog pa'i dri ma spongs pa yin//bskyed par zhes bya rab tu gsungs//de nas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pas
374a6(rgyud): gsung spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo //dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te//chos can med cing chos nyid med//nam mkha' bzhin
374a7(rgyud): du dmigs med pa'i//byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
374b1(rgyud): rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo //dngos po 'di dag dngas med de/
374b2(rgyud): chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin//bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i//byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsungs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
374b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso//dngos po skye ba med pa ste//dngos po ngo bo yod min
374b4(rgyud): pas/nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes//dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin//zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod
374b5(rgyud): grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungaso//chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba//
374b6(rgyud): bzod nus dag cing rnyog pa med//sems can med cing srog kyang med//sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med//rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i//byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin//zhes bcom ldan
374b7(rgyud): 'das don yod grub kyis gsung so//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin
375a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa 'ab nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa'ang tshad du 'arjod do//kye ma'i sangs rgyas kyi ma'o dag/kye ma'ochas na
375a2(rgyud): bstan pa rnams//bdag med chos las legs byung ba//byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshalo//byang chub sems kyi sgom pa yi//mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing //rmi lam la sogs ma skyes pa//byang
375a3(rgyud): chub sems khyod phyag 'tshalo//gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas//dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes//dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas//yid kyis hUM byas
375a4(rgyud): rdo rje can//rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlab//rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya//lag pa stong de bskor ba ni//lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang //byin nas drang por phyogs bcing te//dam tshig mchog
375a5(rgyud): kyang dbul bar bya//gdan rnams so sor phul nas su//mchod yon 'bul ba'i sbyor ba bya//dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs//sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya//rnam pa kun gyis mnyes bya/
375a6(rgyud): ba/rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyi bdag/rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste//byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang //gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag/rnal 'byor yin zhes
375a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas gsungs//sngags kyi byin rlabs nga rgyal bskyed//rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs//byang chub sems ni dag pa dang //gsang sngags sa bon skye bo che//phyag rgya tshogs su
375b1(rgyud): brtags pa yi//rim gyis gzugs kyi rdzogs bya ba//de ni brtags pa brjod pa ste//rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs//bsdu dang spro bar bya ba las//rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang //skad cig ye shes
375b2(rgyud): kyis rdzogs pa//rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do//dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par//rnal 'byor rig pa dag gis brtag/rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad//nyon
375b3(rgyud): mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems//byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste/de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes//brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar//dag gyur de nas blo yis ni//sems la so sor brtag par
375b4(rgyud): byed/sems la so sor brtags nas kyang //phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya//sems tsam la ni gnas nas su//byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des//bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/zla ba'i gzugs su
375b5(rgyud): rnam par brtag/dag pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa//oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi//yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs//rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya//AHzhes bya ba'i spros med gsung //saM mas ni
375b6(rgyud): hUM zhes bya bar sbrul//yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs lus//snyi nga la gnas pa zla ba'i gzugs//de la rang gi yi ge ni//mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te//nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni//rdo rje
375b7(rgyud): ga nyid bang ni nyid brjod//rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang //'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa//cha shas kyi ni dra ba can//ye shes sems dpo'i rdzogs par brtag/de 'ag lag pa'i phyag rgya
376a1(rgyud): rga dmamatshan mal sams //rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bsgyur te//cad phun phreng ba rnams kyis klus//de nas dado//sangs rgyas kyi//sprul pa mdzan pa'i sgyum
376a2(rgyud): 'phrod/yan lag bzhi pa dpung ldan pa'i//phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang //bsnyems ma dang ni tog ldan ma//mtshon tshi ma dang rtsed mo can//sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o//rnam par 'phrul pa
376a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlab//kun la khyab par byed pa yi//sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni//de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas//phyogs bzhi 'khor la khyab bya ste//dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro//ting
376a4(rgyud): 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la//'od par byed pa'i sngags pa yis//'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs//pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni//'khor lo kun la pad+ma yi//ngo bos yis ni rol pa dang //
376a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'phro ba las//mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugasu bya//mdzes pa'i rgyun rnams kun ldan pa'i//nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs par lta//sgeg dang glu dang gar rnams dang //rgyal mtshan
376a6(rgyud): la sogs tshon dgye dang //sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni//sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod pa bya//rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni//bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas//myur ches bya ba bul ba dang //
376a7(rgyud): mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang //rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs//de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya//bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis//sgrims nas rdo rje gsor nas su//
376b1(rgyud): g.yon pas dril bu ma gsil zhing //rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang //bdan tshul du byas pas mchod//bzlas pa yas ni 'jug stsal nas//gshegs su gsapa dang rang nyid 'grub//lus dang ngag dang
376b2(rgyud): sems bsgoms te//brtan por ci bad 'gro bar bya//bar chad du ni gyur nas yang //yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab//de ltar bsgoms pa sgom byed pa//rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i//byang chub de ni/
376b3(rgyud): myur thob nas//zla nyi dkyil 'khor lta bur snang //sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing //rin chen rgyal mtshon rab dga' byed//rgyal byed pad+ma'i gdung rgyud can//gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur//
376b4(rgyud): dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso//dga' tshan 'dod dgur lcags kyur 'gyur//sgyu ma bzhin du kun shes shing //dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las
376b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o///sbyin 'asreg de nyid la gnas pa'i//me ni lha yi zhol yin pas//sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i/
376b6(rgyud): sbyin bsreg las ni rab tu bshad//sbyin bsreg las ni lha rnams tshim//tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster//gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa//thams cad sbyin bsreg dag gis bskongs
376b7(rgyud): daphyir sku gsung chos mchog gis//sbyin bsreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad//gtsub shing las ni 'byung ba'i me//dge ba yi ni las rnams byed//gdol pa 'am dur khrod byung ba yi//me ni/
377a1(rgyud): las rnams rab tu sgrub//thab khung zlum po gru bzhi dang //zlag ma dang ni zung gsum dang //dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer la//rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan//sbyin bsreg de nyid
377a2(rgyud): tshul rigs pas//thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni//pad+ma'i steng gnas gtsug tor dang //rdo rje rin chen pad+ma bzhag/ji ltar dmigs pas bdugs nas su//lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag
377a3(rgyud): ste//dbang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni//blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/sbyin bsreg la dgos g.yas su bzhag/g.yon du chu yi snod dgang ngo //las kun byed pas bzlas na su//
377a4(rgyud): bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya//ku sha rtse mo rnon po yis//thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya//me ni 'dar bar shes pa dang //g.yas pa mi 'jigs thob spyod cing //gsang sngags 'dis
377a5(rgyud): ni cho ga bzhin//me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo //tshur sbron tshur spyon 'byung po che//lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/bsreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang //'di nyi dri du ni bzhugs su gsol//
377a6(rgyud): oM ag+na ye A de bya A bi shaM A bi sha ma hA shr-I ye ha d+yo ka bya bA ha na ya swA hA//phyag g.yon rdo rje gsang gtor te//mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul//me yi phyogs nas bod pa yin//
377a7(rgyud): gsus po tsha la mig gsum pa//gdong ba ni ba la lag bzhir ldan//mdog dmer ral ba'i thor tshugs can//me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan//
377b1(rgyud): lag badrang po mchod spyon pa//gnyis pa na na sngags nar 'brang //gaman pa 'om pa sgo drugs te//gnyis panan bcan nyid//mdog dmar rgyan na med pa la//drang srong rnams kyis yongs pasku/
377b2(rgyud): /'di lha'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang //zab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol//de ma sbyin bsreg la dgos pa//kun la lan gsum bsreg zugs dngus//de nis 'thong 'drung byas nas/
377b3(rgyud): 'bang ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya//rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni//mkhas pas lha rnams tshim por bya//legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te//'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gang ga//bram 'i
377b4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdug sa//pong+gA'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang //me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang //'khyil ba'i mtshan mas/kha lo brtag/ngas ni myur du 'byung 'gyur ro//bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par
377b5(rgyud): bya/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni//oM zhes pa dang sA d+ha mthar//dbyangs kyi rgyud ni sring ba ni//bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar//zhi ba'i sems ni zhi ba la//'byor pas rgyas pa mngon par spel//
377b6(rgyud): dregs bde stabs tshul bcas pa dang //dbang du gyur pas dbang du bya'o//drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pa//hU~M zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas//lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang //'jig rten gsum po
377b7(rgyud): bzang bsams nas//bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi//gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyor//sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis/sbyin bsreg cho ga thams cad la//sna tshogs las dang ldan
378a1(rgyud): pa yin//yang dag yin pa mchod par bya//sbyin bsreg de nyid la bskul zhing //dang po dgang blugs sreg cing dbul//phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel//zhi dang rgyas dang /
378a2(rgyud): dbang rnams la//dge ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin bsreg bya//bshang ga tso khrag rkang rus pa dang //sha chen dag kyang sbyin bsreg bya//ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal//mi gtsang ba yis bkang na
378a3(rgyud): go/ci ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur//gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang //sems can mi shes pas rmongs pa//thongs dang shes rab rnam spangs shing //phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa//rnam rtog
378a4(rgyud): dra bas blugs bya sa gang //de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags//chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste//skye ba med cing gnas med kyang //sems can shes pa spel ba'i/
378a5(rgyud): phyir//sangs rgyas rnams kyis thabs su bstan//dam pa'i don du dge spangs nas//bsod nams min pa ci zhig smos//dper na mi gang chu klung gi/pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/rtswa dang
378a6(rgyud): shing la sogs bsdus nas//tshul rgal ba'i gzengs byas te//de las 'jug ste legs rgal nas//bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar//de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi//chos kyi lam ni bskyed
378a7(rgyud): byas kyang //chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas//byang chub bde ba thob pa ni//de phyir rnam rtog rnam spangs la//zab mo yi ni chos spel te//de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs rnams la//sngogs
378b1(rgyud): rig rnam rtog ma byed cog/rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste//la bar ba rgya mtshor ltung byed pas//namapa' lta bur dri med pa'o//rnam par mi rtog tid 'dzin gnas//dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar to//
378b2(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas//nga'o snyam pas gzi bskyed lus//rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na//rnal 'byor ldan pas tshe 'di la//ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur//las los byung bar
378b3(rgyud): bstan pa yi//skyes pa bud med gzugs mang laM//mnyes pa nyid du mi bya 'di//rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin//ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yi//sems kyis sems can rnams la ni//sna tshogs gdung
378b4(rgyud): bsaM sun mi 'byung //rdo rje dang ldan dam tshig yin//srod pas bskyed rngub phra ma yi//tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing //mnyan na bde ba byed pa 'di//rdo rje dag can dam tshig yin//rnam par snang mdzad chen
378b5(rgyud): 'khrug mchog/sha yaM khams la gnas pa yin//rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyas pa ste//khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso//sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/rus gong la ni 'od dpag med//rtswa yi tshogs rnams
378b6(rgyud): rnam 'brel la//thub pa skyes mchog don yod la//dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni//gsang chen pa yis bstan pa 'di//blo ldan rdo rje rnams kyis ni//rtag tu bsten cing bsgom par bya//'dod chags de bzhin
378b7(rgyud): gto mug rmongs//sred dong 'du byed rnams sel ba'i//chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di//thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs//bshang gci khu chu mchil ma khrag/'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa//sgom par
379a1(rgyud): zla gros rtags pa yis//dam tshig brtan par bya ba ste//rtag tu brdam ning sbyin par bya//dpal rdo rje snang ba rgyan gyi rgyud las spyan bsreg gi le'u ste bdun pal////de nas gzhan/
379a2(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba//'gro ba mi shes mun bsal phyir//ye shes nyi ma shar ba las//dgeg bu mun pa bsal tshul gsungs//gshin rjeg shod la sogs pa yi//mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa//
379a3(rgyud): dgun mngon to rgyas pa ru//bye brag gis ni rgyas por bstan//de ni las kyi khyad par gyi//dbang du byas pa khro batshogs//gzhan du ma gsungs gang yin pa//de dag 'di ru bshad par bya//hUM ga ye shes las
379a4(rgyud): byung ba//gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po ste//zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan//phyag drug nyi ma la sogs pa//'dzin cing skyil mo krung bcas pa//ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan cing //'jig rten
379a5(rgyud): khams kun 'khrug byed pa'i//gzugs kyi spros pas na mkha'i gar//rig mas sku la rab 'khyud pas//chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can//'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la//bgegs kyis gnod pa yongs
379a6(rgyud): mi dgos//skyon med de'i khA ba'i ting nge 'dzin te//yang ni bruM gyi ye shes las//byung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo can//zhalo gsum gser 'dra mdangs po che//phyag drug 'khor lo la sogs pa//ral pa'i gtsun
379a7(rgyud): tor gyis brgyan pa//'dzin cing stag gis smad g.yogs te//thod pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan//rig ma dang ldan chags pa po//'jol sgeg nyams kyi sbyor ba mdzad//'di sgom spro bar byed pa la//nyin dang
379b1(rgyud): du rdo rje sems//'khar bcas gnasu byon nasu//rtag tu srung ba nyid du byed//bka' bzhin byed pas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te//de bzhin nu gyi ye shes las//byung ba khro bo gtsug tIr rgyal//zhal gsum
379b2(rgyud): ser po mdangs dang ldan//phyag drug lcags kyu la sogs pa//'dzin cing sbrul gyis yang dag brgyan//'og tu bgegs kyi gtso mnan nas//gad mo'i sgras ni 'debs par byed//ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis
379b3(rgyud): brgyan pa//khro bo 'di 'dra sgom byed pa'i//rnal 'byor gang la sangs rgyas kyi//sprul pa'i bgegs kyang rlag byed na//gzhan ma rnams ni smos ci dgos//snying 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//bruM las
379b4(rgyud): yang ni byung ba yi//gtsug tor dam tshig sprod pa can//zhal gsum gser zhun mdangs ldan pa//phyag drag ka pA la sogs pa//'dzin cing sna tshogs rab tu 'bar//ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa//zhabs
379b5(rgyud): /rnams bsgyur zhing rnam par 'phen//spro dong bsdu ba'i blo gros can//'di 'dra gang zhig bsgom pa la//bi nA ya ka la sogs pa'i//bgegs kyis skabs ni mi rnyed phyir//ji bzhin rab tu bsgom par bya//gzhan
379b6(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//bruM g+h+ri yi ge las kyang byung //ming gi gtsug tor rnam par 'azir//zhal gsum gser ni bcom 'dra//phyag drug tri shrI la sogs pa//'dzin cing srog song steng
379b7(rgyud): na gnas//rol pa'i stobs kyis bgegs mthu bcings//ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa//sangs rgyas sprin ni spro ba'o//gang zhig de 'dra sgom nying pa'i//rnal 'byor de yis go cha bgos//sr-i'i
380a1(rgyud): ngang tshul can yin pas//bgegs lus gang gis mi ga ma'o//bgegs las rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin to//bruM gyi ye shes mthu las byung //gtsug tor rnam par
380a2(rgyud): 'joms pa'i mchog/zhal gsum gser 'dra'i nyi 'od mtshungs//phyag drug rdo rje la sogs pa//'dzin cing chems kyis sgros mnan te//chags ldan rig mas 'khyud pa'o//ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis
380a3(rgyud): brgyan pa//khrag can lcags kyang 'dril ba ste//bla med byang chub thob 'dod pa//'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la//bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du yang //bgegs kyis gnod pa yod mi 'ong //bgegs kyi stong pa
380a4(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//yang na bruM gyi ye shes las//yang dag byung ba'i skabs dkar po//zhal gsum gser zhun lta bur gnas//phyag drug gdugs la sogs 'dzin cing //skyabs
380a5(rgyud): med phongs pa'i skyabs mdzad cing //ma ning rnams dang za ma la//bu ni sbyin par byed pa po//ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis brgyan pa//rig ma dang ldan sku chen 'di//rnal 'byor gang gis sgom byed cing //bzlas pa
380a6(rgyud): /rtse gcig tu byed na//bgegs kyi gnod pas de mi brdzi//rin chen gyi skabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//rnal 'byor khyad par can gyis ni//'di rnams byang chub bsrung ba'i phyir//'khor lo gtso bor rab bsgos/
380a7(rgyud): na//rang gi bgegs kyis yongs mi tshugs//byang chub snying po don gnyer bas//'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgoms na//bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis//ring po mi thogs 'dod pa thob//
380b1(rgyud): dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gtsug tor 'byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa//de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
380b2(rgyud): dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//'di yi dpal ni gang zhig lags//rdo rje dang ni snying po dang //de bzhin rgyan gyi don ni ci//kye he mchog de bstan du gsol//de nas de bzhin gash+ye
380b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i//gsang ba'i rgyud du rab sbas pa//ji bzhin gnas pa'i de kho na//yang dag bstan gyis rtse gcig nyon//
380b4(rgyud): lus ngag yid gsum bde dam pas//lha mo las ni bskyod bya ste/byang chub chen po bde ba yis//tshul bzhin du ni sngags pas bya/bskul ba'i snying pos 'di smra ste//dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu/rang giH
380b5(rgyud): na gnas pa yis//de nyid lha nyid bskyed par bya//bcu drug tshe dang yang dag ldan//zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la//me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid//rlung gis phul bas bskyod par bya//de bzhin bskyod pas bsgrub
380b6(rgyud): par bya//de bzhin du yang bskul bya ba//rgyud kyi phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin//steng dang mdun du rtsa gnyis las//bcu drug gnas su yang dag gnas//de lta snying dbus rab zhu DoM te//rlung gi sbyor bas phul byis
380b7(rgyud): pas//steng dang mdag rab mdzes rdzogs sku//bdag gi dpal du shes par bya//de las byung ba'i dngos grub che//nor bu la gnas rtog bral ba//thig le yig med bsdus pa'i sku//lhan cig skyes par shes
381a1(rgyud): par bya//de la de yi gzugs kyi sku//namakha' khams kun gang ba yi//bral ba'i shes pas dor byed pa//gzhan gyi dpal du shes par bya//de rnams rgyu las byung ba yi//ye shes shes
381a2(rgyud): rab shin tu gsang //gsang ba rnam par 'grub pa yi//rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya//lha mo las byung bde dang ldan//'ja' mtshon ltar gsal rgyud dag pa//snang ba'i sku de mi shigs pa//rdo rje nga yis yang
381a3(rgyud): dag bsgregs//snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun//bsdus phyir bsags pa'i sku dam pa//rtog bral rgyud du sim gnas pa//'byung phyir snying po zhes su bsgrags//dag dang ma dag thams cad la//'jo
381a4(rgyud): ba ji srid par snang ba//gnyis ka mdzes par byed pas na//rgyan du yang dag bsgrags pa yin//dpal dang rdo rje snying po dang //rgyan ces bya ba bzhi po ni//'brel cing grub par byed pa'i phyir//rgyud ces bya bar bshad
381a5(rgyud): pa'o//chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi//mtshan gyi don ni 'di don du//yang dag 'dus par ngas bshad//gzhan du don ni ma bsgrags pa//bla ma la ni gus pa yi//slob ma la ni
381a6(rgyud): ma rtogs pa'i//rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas pa'o//don 'di yang dag ma shes na//ji snyed don ni bsam yas pa//shes kyang de yi 'bras bu med//de 'dod mnyes byas yang dag blang //dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan
381a7(rgyud): gyi rgyud las ye shes gsum gyi mtshan 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang //bla ma smod byed brtson pa la//dam tshig phyir ni yongs bsgral bya//de yi sha
381b1(rgyud): khrag klang pa nams//dzas te tshugs kyi ston mo//do ltar ma byas sdug bsngal tshogs//gto dug can des thang par 'gyur//dmas cad dang bras can dang //rigs dang nyab so//sgral bzung /
381b2(rgyud): me na ba ru//sdug bsngal chen por rab rtad cing //'dang 'bo ngos skyil gyis brgyan//bstir mod chen por rtag par wa~M/dbus las 'dis rgyas gdag//bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi//khro ba gzugs
381b3(rgyud): na da //u pa la ga /la gsus pa la tig drun pa// shAm+b+ha dang //da pa waM phug/'khor po 'dzin//mi sdug khros pa lnga pa//bsamams pa nam
381b4(rgyud): rgyas par dadamigs nas//rngon srung ba la sogs pa//sems can kyil 'khong gnas pa'o//sgrub pos de mi nyes pa sgom//de nas phyag mtshan tri shul dang //phung bu drug po mchog dgags//mgon
381b5(rgyud): skyong ga ste ba dang //rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa y-i//gnas lnga rab tu chug bya ste// lnga pod gzer rdzitha mas//srin po u /bzhin du//khrag sun sngags kyis drangs nas su//dza pa pa nas
381b6(rgyud): /de bzhin sha rnams yang bsdus nas//ba ba rda ni rab tu ba ga/rus pa rnams kyang chos byas nas//shes pa rdon pad+ma sbyar//di na den gru pa byed pas//rtswa ba byed ni chun dkyis/
381b7(rgyud): na na pa //'tshang gyur ba gdan mig// rdzogasang pa 'di sa bu//bsgrub bya legs por bsgrubs byas nas//las da dag gis demi 'khor//ngas rgyas sun skyeb gyir/
382a1(rgyud): 'byar da yang de yi mthus//khro bo mkha' 'gro zhes 'gyur te//khams gsum bsad dang gso ba dang //sems kyis rdo rje brtan byas nas//skad cig tsam du byed par 'gyur//gsal bar nus pa
382a2(rgyud): gdon ma za//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro khro bo'i sbyor bas dgra bsad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//'dod chags thabs chen po yi rgyud/
382a3(rgyud): gang gis legs par shes na ni//tshe 'dir dngos grub sbyin par bshad//gsang ba 'dus pa stong phrag gcig/rdo rje phreng ba 'bum phrag gsum//dgongs pa lung ston stong phrag bzhi//lha mo bzhis
382a4(rgyud): zhus brgya bdun nu//u dar tan tra nyis brgya brgyad//de yi nye bar bshad pa'i rgyud//dam tshig chen po lnga bcu lnga//rdo rje lnga 'dus stong phrag gcig/kun lnga btus pa 'bum phrag gcig/mnyam nyid
382a5(rgyud): rnam rgyal nyis brgya bcu//zla gsang thig le stong bdun brgya//rdo rje sa 'og brgya nyi shu//cod pan rdo rje bdun brgya lnga//khro zla thig le 'bum phrag lnga//rdo rje rnam rgyal brgya dgu brgya//mnyam nyid gsang ba
382a6(rgyud): stong phrag lnga//rdo rje gsang rgyan stong phrag lnga//rdo rje gsang mdzod stong phrag bdun//nor bu gsang thig 'bum phrag gcig/snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul stong dang brgya//rdo rje gsang rgyan stong phrag gcig/
382a7(rgyud): rdo rje thod pa nyis brgya brgya//de nyid brgya stong brgya stong bdun//dam tshig mngon rgyan stong phrag 'bum//'jam dpal dpa' bo 'bum phrag gcig/gsang chen bsdus pa brgya lnga bcu//rin chen
382b1(rgyud): sdong po dgu brgya bdun//dus kyi min la brgya brgyad du//lha mo bstan chos lnga brgya bdun//'di rnams dgos pa'i bye brag gis//nga yis yang dag 'astan par bya//da na gnyis po 'khyud pa yis//
382b2(rgyud): rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o//de bzhin du ni lag bcangs dang //dgod dang bltas pas shes par bya//de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug gi/rgyud rnams kun kyang shes par bya//mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud kun yang /
382b3(rgyud): 'di yi rim pas shes par bya//byin dbye ba shes pa yi//rgyud kyi da tsa~M shes par bya//nang du bstan pa bla ra'i las//yang dag blangs te sgrib par bya//ci bzhin gnas pa la dgongs te//bdab
382b4(rgyud): gshegs pas rgyud kun bstan//rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud//mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro ba//rgyud rnams kun gyi phyi mo ste//gzhan du ma bsgrabs don gang zhig/'di ru yang dag bstan pa ste//rnal
382b5(rgyud): 'byor gang zhig len pa 'am//sgom par byed dam 'chad pa 'am//klog par byed pa rnal 'byor che//de yang nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las rgyud thams cad kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste
382b6(rgyud): bcu gcig pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad byag/sna tshogs mdo dang rgyud rnams kyis//sdom pa yang dag shes 'gyur na//mkha' gro chen por 'gyur bar bshad//gang gis
382b7(rgyud): nyan thos rab 'byin pa//spong ba srung ba'i bye brag bshad//bslab pa dang ni rjes grags kyis//'di ru shes kyang yongs rdzogs byed//tshug drims kyi ni bslab pa gsum//dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa
383a1(rgyud): dang //snum pa shul sogs dang //sems can da ny-id ljo tshungs//byang chung sangs dpa' pa 'atsun pa//lus pa/yod gsumar 'byung ba//sdom pa das kyang mthar ra//
383a2(rgyud): ye rgyud rnams yang dge sbyong bar byed//zla bsrung dang gtsang sbra bsda mo//grong deng gnag g+has za la pang //ngag zas yid kyis sems can la//gnod pa dag ni yang mi byed//de bzhin gshegs
383a3(rgyud): pa'i sdom pa mchog/than mod pa'i byang chub sems//'gro ba 'dod byed byang chub sems//bdag shegs po byed rab tu gzung //rdo rje mi bskyod shas chen po//rdo rje dang ni dril zla dang //slob da na
383a4(rgyud): yang ni bzung byas pas//de la yon tan zab par byed//rin chen tog gi rigs 'thon po//nyin mo mtshan mo lan gsum du//zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang dbang //byin pas de yi yon tan 'dzag//
383a5(rgyud): pad+mo snang ba'i rigs dag la//phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi//dam tshig rab tu bzung ba yis//bla med byang chub thob par byed//rnga sgra las kyi rigs mang po//dam tshig dang ni sdom par ldan//bsnyen 'a
383a6(rgyud): mchid pa sems can dom/byas po de yis yon tan pog/srog mi gcod cing ga la me bya//ma byin mi blang brjon mi smra//pra ma khyal pa'i tshig rngub mos//smra bar me bya brdab sems dang //gnod sems log par/
383a7(rgyud): lnga ba rnams//nam yang bya ba ma yin no//dkon mchog gsum ni yod mi spang //lha dang bla ma de bzhin no//nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba'i phyir//chang yang rnam par spang bar bya//phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha sogs//
383b1(rgyud): rab na mthun/ sa nga sa sna byas//dpa sogs pa na yas pa//ma pag ga sa pa pas//ma dzung po gas / /na pa co//na
383b2(rgyud): yin pas pa pa pA//bcu ning grags pa ga yang ni//sngags pas don kun 'grub byed pas//srung zhing dor bar mi byer//slob dpon sbyi nas spyod pa dang //bde gshegs dka' las 'dang skyed dang //nasung 'i
383b3(rgyud): nimached sun 'ab+h+rid//byams sems med par sems can spangs//byang chub sems chen 'ad ba dang //bdag gzhan grub pa'i mthar sprod byed//snod mi rung la gsang ba bstan//rgyal ba'i bdag nyid zung ba
383b4(rgyud): spyod//dag pa'i chos lo som ci byed//gsum lngar khrol byams ldan te//stong pa thal byung la rtog pa//dad ldan sems ni sun 'byin byed//dam tshig dang ldan gtso mi byed//shes ldan bud med smod par
383b5(rgyud): byed//sngags pas de dag yongs spangs na//nges par dngos grub thob par byed//de la sngags pa yong 'das na//nges par bdud dang phred par 'gyur//na dang sdug bsngal 'phel 'gyur te//bsrung me
383b6(rgyud): skye'i tshugs dmyal bar 'gro/sbom po lung byed ces dmigs kyang //da dang 'dro ba shes par bya//dam tshig mi ldan cig mang bsten//tshogs kyi 'khor long byed par byed//gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang /
383b7(rgyud): nga ldan dpas la gan du sur//nyan thos rang du lung re gnas//snod mi tshul gsang ba bstam//khan me tho sbom 'gyur //sngags pa de yi dam sngam da //zad pas 'grub par yang mi 'phru
384a1(rgyud): de bas nyan ram gsum du//brtan gyis ni 'drag par bya//rgyal la mamang du dugs pa dang //dbang bskur ba la sogs chun bya//rna rnam par 'gro zab pa ldanan//
384a2(rgyud): chub sems dang nyan thos dang //bya dang gnyi ga rnal 'byor rgyud//dgongs gsungs rnams kyis de lta min//de lta bas na sdom pa'i mchog/nga yis yang dag bstan par bya//dri chen dri chu ra/
384a3(rgyud): dang /shes dang byang chub sems rnams ni//bza' ba'i sbyor bas yang dag bza'//lho yi ye shes mes sbyangs phyir//phyi rol zas las khyad par 'gyur//de bzhin glang chen rta sha dang //ba lang
384a4(rgyud): khyi sha sha chen rnams//ye shes lnga yi ngo bo'i phyir//dga' ba'i sems kyis bza' bar bya//de bzhin sems can bsad par bya//ma byin par yang blang bar bya'o//bud med thams cad 'dod pa/
384a5(rgyud): spyad/brdzun tshig dag kyang smra bar bya//de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang //byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par 'gyur//sems can rnams kyang tshim zhing dga'//de bzhin rnal 'byor
384a6(rgyud): snying po yis//sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems//rang 'dren nyan thos sku gzugs sogs//rang nyid dag pa gsum sbyor bas//phyag byas na ni mi rung 'gyur//kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi//
384a7(rgyud): lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor las//rang nyid bsam gtan gsum sbyor bas//dbyer med blo yis mi bya'o//dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bri'o//glegs bam dag kyang mi bklag go/mchod rten
384b1(rgyud): las kyang yong mi bya//lag pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyang spang //nyin re nang ni dus bzhi ru//bu mo legs par goms pa las//ga pur tsan dam khas blangs te//cho ga bzhin du lus 'khor mchod//ram /
384b2(rgyud): thabs ni sna tshogs pa//nga yi rgyud las rab bstan pas//bcu drug thig le ngal so las//sngags kyi snying po brtag par bya//bla ma dam pa thugs rje ches//yang dag bstan pa la dmigs pas//byin
384b3(rgyud): log khur yongs 'dor te//rdo rje 'dzin par 'drar 'gyur//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las dam tshig dang sdom pa dbye ba'i la'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o///de nas ro langs chen mo
384b4(rgyud): yi//sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya//sgrub pos legs par shes gyur na//dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o//nag po yi ni tshes brgyad dang //yang na bcu bzhi gang yang rung //shing cig dur khrod
384b5(rgyud): ma mo 'am//yang na mi med grong bar du//sngon du sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can//las kun 'grub par byed pa sgrub//mda' mkhan ma dang sme sha can//gdol pa mo dang gar mkhan sogs//mdun gyi
384b6(rgyud): sol lhag yod pa//byad dang mdang ldan cha med ma//lo ni sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags//yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga'o//yang na chu dang dang por skyes//sbyangs nas shi ba ma sbags pa//yang dag blangs te pha bong /
384b7(rgyud): ste/gzhan yang bu mo sgra bzung ste//lha bzhad dang ni dbang po lag/dkar po dang ni risgra dang //gru gnon chu yis bkru bar bya//de nas tsan+dan dkar po yis//bu mo lus byugs rgyan dang gos/
385a1(rgyud): yang dag brgyan te mdun bzhag nas//dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bya ste//rtsa sogs gsang sngags rab tu zla//'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin te//sha na nag po mdangs
385a2(rgyud): dang ldan//myos byed bsregs pa ro yi khar//mtshan gcig thog thag sbyin bsreg bya//de nas the rangs dus su yang //khrag chen phyogs bzhir gter nas ni//mar khu chen po rol sku//de nas/
385a3(rgyud): ro de langs 'gyur to//khri dang ldan pa'i ag car gyis//sa gsum mo yi sgras 'gengs byed//de tshe sgrub po skrag mi bya//mA ma ki yi sbyor ba sogs//srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya//
385a4(rgyud): skrag na da ma thag tu gsod//de tshe srung bas bsrung byas nas//bdag nyid langs te de yi ror//yungs kar gyis ni brdeg par bya//de nas de ni babs gyur te//sgrub pa po yi mdun gnas nas//
385a5(rgyud): bka' nod 'di skad smra bar byed//sems can chen po khyod ci 'dod//bdag la yang dag bka' stsal cig/ral gri mig sman sa 'og gam//rkang 'gyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len//mi
385a6(rgyud): snang 'gugs pa las gang dag/bdag gis gcig tsog spang bar bya//de nas sgrub po de yis kyang //gang 'dod smras nas cang te'u brdung //de nas ro langs kha de nas//du ba thul zhing me 'ag
385a7(rgyud): rin de nas sbrul nag lta bu ru//ro yi kha nas 'byung bar byed//da de sgrub pas kha~M yis blang //byung ste gser gyi ral grir 'gyur//de thogs tshangs pa'i 'jig rten khams//steng du
385b1(rgyud): nges pa po gro ba byed/de baninan kun tu grob byed/de yin rdzas kun gangal bstan//thams cad gser 'gyur ci lta bu//de bzhin thangs sgrub de byas nas//ra ni snga ma kho bzhin 'gyur te//nga yis sbyin
385b2(rgyud): bsreg rab byas nas//dkyil 'khor yang dag tshim par bya//de bas 'di na sgrub pa'i mchog/don kun yang dag 'grub byud pa//las thams cad kyi gtso bo ste//bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas
385b3(rgyud): gsungs//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud las ro langs chen mo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//dan yi sgrub po yi//dngos grub slob dpon las byung b+h+rir//rgyud rnams kun
385b4(rgyud): las gsungs pa yi//skyob dpon bkur ba'i cho ga bshad//slob dben med par gyur na ni//dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur das//slob dpon grangs dang mtshan nyid ni//'di gcig bsdus la
385b5(rgyud): nyan par gyis//ngas sdom rjod gca la//slob dpon mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs par//rnyed 'i dang ba las 'jug par//byed pa rgyuyi slob dpon no//ri bang 'dzin par bskul byed cing //
385b6(rgyud): de yis sgrub po ning dag cing //ye shes sgyu ma'i snod rung byed//rkyen gyi slob dpon chen po'o//lhan cig nyan pang gang gyur pa//de las dga' ba yang dag 'thob//bos pas yang dag rab mthar/
385b7(rgyud): sbyin/snyid cig byed pa'i slo dpon no//mi'i gyung byams ldan shes rab can//sngags rgyung spyong shes dkyil 'khor ma khas//de nyid bcu shes thig chen dga'//gsang ga chus thub sgra
386a1(rgyud): dpon yin//mig pam las bsu drug pa//du lakhrig rtog pa yang dag spangs//bla ma dga' ba dang rgyas cam//shin na tan thos rab brgya pa// stan skyong ba la gams pa/
386a2(rgyud): gzugs bzang 'dod chags kyis myos byed//shin tu dul ba khyad par can//bskul ba'i gan su yang dag blangs//dge dang sgom pa la dga' ba//rtag tu bla ma la gus pa'i//slong mis bla ma 'di ltar ba
386a3(rgyud): bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang //de bzhin gshegs pa rin tshan 'byung //de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che//yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin//de yi yon tan thams cad
386a4(rgyud): gzung //skyon kun sems kyis kyang mi bsam//yon tan gzung na dngos grub thob//skyon gyis dngos grub nyams par byed//mchod rten gshig dang sdig 'dra'i phyir//de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gro
386a5(rgyud): ste stan dong lha ma dang bzhon pa dang //'og ma par bya ba smos ci dgos//rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i//mchog kun de yis spangs par 'gyur//slob dpon smod par byed po do//rma lam du yang mthong
386a6(rgyud): mi bya//de ni bogags dang log 'dren dang //rims dang smyug dang gshin rjes 'dzin//'chi bar rab tu 'gyur ba ste//ngan pa gtum po blun chen te//phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur yang //
386a7(rgyud): blo ldan rnams kyis mi bsrung ba //mdung la sogs pa'i mtshan cha yis//kha rnam po byed pa bsad//mang sogs bstan pa'i dmyal po ru//slob dngo slong pa myed pa ste/gnas par 'gyur
386b1(rgyud): bang yis bstan//de bas bla ma'i zhabs drung du//bag ma bzhin du po che srung //glal dang dgod pa lung pa sogs//kha la lag pas bkab na su//shin tu 'jam par smra bar bya//man nga
386b2(rgyud): bcing dang mtshon byug pa//bla ma'i drung du mi bya'o//bro brdung ba dang brkam tshig dag/thos pa'i yul nas mi bya'o//mdun 'gro ba dang rkang pa brkyang //yang dag nyid du mi byo'o//las ni gar dag
386b3(rgyud): byed pa'am//mnyan pa la sogs 'dod pa la//gzung phyir thal mo ma ba shig par//gnas nas langs te mthong yul du//rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya ste//mtshan mo dang ni rgurga la dang /
386b4(rgyud): gcong rong dag tu gnas 'gyur na//bka' lung gnyer du dbu ma pa'i phyir//mdun du 'gro ba nyes mi 'gyur//de bas thabs ni thams cad kyis//rdo rje 'dzin pa bla ma mchog/rje su mthun pas mnyes//
386b5(rgyud): par bya//de mnyes sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes//gang gis slob dpon yang dag smad//de yis rgyud kun sgrub pa'i mchog/gnyid dang 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te//bskal pa stong du legs bsgrubs kyang //
386b6(rgyud): dmyal sogs sgrub par byed pa'o//de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te//bsam pa 'bras bu smin byed pa'o//sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis//sems can dang dang ldan pas mchod//dpal rdo rje snying brgyan
386b7(rgyud): rgyud las bla ma bkur ba'i le'u sgo banu zhi pa'o////rdo rje pad+mo spang ba las//yang dag ye shes skye 'gyur bas//sgyu mi'i mchog ni dud med//de yi ming dang mtshan nyid bstan//hastaM nI dang
387a1(rgyud): /shang kha nI//ka ma lA dang tsitra nA//thams cad rags na bkar 'gyur te//hasti rak+Shar chag//sbom mo 'dod chags yang dag che//ngad yangs kha nas sha ru la bri//dkar cang mtha' phrago sbom
387a2(rgyud): byedan shang khi rak+ta ro bsgyur ba//rked phra sna legs cung zad khro/kha nAs dung khro 'gros dpe rigs//dkar 'chang dpal gyi 'bras bu 'dra//ka ma'i rak+ta'i ro dmar zhing //shang khi rak+ta ro bsgyur ba//phra sbom
387a3(rgyud): ran pa dmar mo ste//'od de chags mig ni mi 'dzums blta//dkar 'chang a ri sha 'dra ba//tsi tra rak+ta ro mar zhing //thun run khro bag dang bcas pa//chags min lta byed do gnag pa//dkar 'chang g.yas
387a4(rgyud): g.yon dgye ba ste//'di rnams yang dag phrad gyur na//sgrub pa po la tshe 'di ru//dngos grub yang dag bstar ba ste//de bas 'di rnams 'bad pas btsal//yang dag rnyed nas gang rung ngu//ba lang bza' ni
387a5(rgyud): mda' yi nang //btung bas shel khams rnam par 'phel//de ni thabs kyi ster ba yis//yang dag tu ni rang bzhin brtag/rang bzhin namakha' lta bu ste//dngos po thams cad zad pa ste//rnam par rtog pa
387a6(rgyud): thams cad dang //bral ba'i dga' ba yang dag zab//bsam med zad med phra mo ste//dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa//'chi med rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod//gang gi dbusu 'dab brgyad pa//snying po lnga yis yang dag brgyan//
387a7(rgyud): dedabus de gnas cha nas lnga//cha gnyis pa ni brgyad mthar dbyung //sum cu bcu pa lnga yi ni//cha gnyis lnga pa drug pa yi//thig le ru ni gzhug pa ste//skyes bu gang gis de la ni//mig gi 'od gze
387b1(rgyud): sa brtag/nam zhin gnas pa yi//ye shes skyab pom ma med//nam nig/'gag pa'i sems gyur na//sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog badzin pa//dang ldan mang 'gro 'dra bar 'gyur//daring phan chad /
387b2(rgyud): khyod ni//dkyil 'khor yang dag 'dra ba dang //sgrub po rgyu la sbyor ba yi//slob dpon chen po nyid du 'gyur//'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang //dang bskur bar ni rab bsngags te//thams cad sngags ni sgrub
387b3(rgyud): 'gyur te//las mchog khyad par can yang 'grub//bu mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun//sems can khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis//yid du 'ong ba'i rig ma 'di//bde gshegs kun gyis khyod spyod gnas//stong pa la ni sems
387b4(rgyud): sbyar na//khyod ni yang dag dam par 'gyur//'di ni bde gshegs bde mdzad pa//khyod nyid 'di las rab byung ngo //dpal rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud las dmigs pa dang bcas po mi shes rab kyi mtshan nyid brtags
387b5(rgyud): po'i lacu ste bco lnga pa'o///de nas yang ni bshad bya ba//dngos kun chog shes med na//sgrub po dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur//de phyir 'dir ni brtul zhugs bstan//sbyor ba'i rtsol ba thams
387b6(rgyud): cad ni//de nyid rig des spang bar bya//rdo rje sems dang nges 'dug pa//spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o//dag pa de nyid la gnas pas//sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste//bdag med gnas po'i sbyor ba yis//ci srid
387b7(rgyud): bar dus sor brtag/dngos med go 'phang la gnas dang //thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis//rgyud las gang ci 'byung ba rnams//ma brtogs pas ni lung por 'gyur//sgom pa'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni//
388a1(rgyud): grub mtshan nyid gang yang rung //de kun skad cig tsam la no//rang nyid gnas par gyur pa yin//de bas dge slong dngos gnas dang //de bzhin tog dga' rgan po dang //rang gi bu dang rgyal ba/
388a2(rgyud): la de nyid yang dag bshad mi bya//ci ltar mar me bung nang gnas//pha rol tu ni 'dra mi gsal//bum pa de nyid chags par gyur//de 'og mar me gsal bar 'gyur//de bzhin dang lus bum pa nyid//de nyid
388a3(rgyud): mang me nyid lta bu//bla ma'i kha yis legs bcag nas//sbyor ba'i de nyid ston pa yin//sbyor ba de nyid la gnas na//gang che brnyan pa mi rtag la//gnas shing 'jig rten pa spangs te//spyod pa thams cad byas
388a4(rgyud): na ni//de la de tshe sangs rgyas gzigs//kun tu the tsom gcod pa yi//rig pas byis pa bzhin du spyad//gang tshe chags med rnal 'byor pa//de tshe phun sum tshogs 'phel 'gyur//sdig pa ma lus
388a5(rgyud): ldan pa dang //gti mug sgrib pa rab gnas pa//smyon pa'i rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis//zla drug gis nidon yod grub//rang nyid sangs rgyas kun mthong zhing //'dod pa kun gyis rab tu 'gengs//zad med
388a6(rgyud): gzham du med pa dang //dang pa'i sku tshe 'byung bar 'gyur//bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog/'bad pa med par yang dga' bab//'dod pa kun gyis dga' mos rnams//'thad pa bral bas ni 'grub par 'gyur//'gro
388a7(rgyud): dang 'dug dang gnas pa na//mchog tu zab pa'i gnas la brtag/'od gsal ye shes lam mkhan pa//mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i//bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni//sems kyi rin chen
388b1(rgyud): brtan par 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub rab bzhugs pa//byin gyis brlab pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur//da ltar gyur pas zhugs nas kyang //ci srid sems ni mi skyo bar//mnyam pa dag yad ni bzang po dang //da
388b2(rgyud): la 'bad pas bsgom par bya//de 'og la ni ci dga' ba'i//spyad pa yis ni gcig byas na//cung zad spyan phye ba yi mtshan//byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur//dgod dam smra 'am 'gug pa 'am//la lar rab tu gar
388b3(rgyud): byed par//ci srid skyo bar mi 'gyur bar//sgom pa'i sems lo zhen par bya//de lha'i dam tshig ldan gyur cing //rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis//dus kyi nges pas yongs spangs nas//bla med byang chub
388b4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes byed kun tu spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas mkha' 'gro de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje/
388b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin las//byung ba'i lha ste khyod mchog pas//sems dpa' kun gyi phyag rgya che//mkha' 'gro chen po phyag 'tshalo//gti mug thams

395b6(rgyud): par g.yog par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa las//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa//sangs rgyas gzugs ni
395b7(rgyud): rnam bsgoms pas//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms pa//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam sgom pa//chos kyi rgyal/pad+ma'i rnal 'byor cho ga yis//bsgom pa thams
396a1(rgyud): cad brtag par bya//sgom pa la sogs yongs 'dzin las//gzhan du mchod bya min pa nyid//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//shin tu brtan par brtan pa'i sems//byang chub sems ni yang
396a2(rgyud): dge bskyed//rgyun tu bdag nyid rnam bsgom bya//'di ni rdo rje'i tshul zhi ba//rnon po bzhi dang mnyam pa'i 'od//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas//cho ga shes pas dgangs par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das
396a3(rgyud): kun tu bzang pos gsungaso//de nas kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams na mkha
396a4(rgyud): khams thams cad bkang ste/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i sprin rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'dud pa dang ldan par kun tu gnas par
396a5(rgyud): gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chen po la/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis
396a6(rgyud): yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas/byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la rab tu zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer kun tu gang ste/'od zer de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa
396a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yang dag par bskul bar gyur to//de nas kun tu bzang ba rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par mdzad nas/ye shes kyi rigs 'di rgyas par
396b1(rgyud): da la tho ma gas tsud sa nas ga zugs na pa ma nga sa byu / dag shegs pa sa
396b2(rgyud): dmachog bsnang ngo po//ye shes rigs 'dzin gyi gsungs so//denyid mams cang rnyed basbyin pa'i//bsam brtan kun snor mtshan nyid kyis//cho ga~M shes pas rab tu brgyam//'di na de nyid tshu
396b3(rgyud): dag pa'o//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog phyar pas//khru na stong phrag bsam par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//wa yog de la bsgom par bya//kun nas yongasu zlum por ni//mthe chung matsam
396b4(rgyud): bsam par bya//'bar ba de la chog shes//sna tshogs kha dog rnam par sgom//de ni 'bang ba yang dag skyes//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya//phyogs rnams kun tu oM yig ni//kha dog sna tshogs
396b5(rgyud): rnam pasam bya//rnam snang la sogs rnam sgom pas//chog shes pas bskyed par bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o//bdag nyid de la bsam pa ni//dge'
396b6(rgyud): sbyi ba'i cho ga las//snying khri dbus sen phra mon//dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ste//sngags yig phra ma'i gzugs rnams kyis//de de sems la bsam par bya//oM yig 'od zer yang dag sbyor/
396b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od//sangs rgyas gzugs sogs mtshan nyid kyis//cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya//sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrim pa/
397a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i tshig las//rang gyi gzugasu de la bya'o//nyi ma ldan dgod bya ba//rdo rje thug su tshog las//nyi ma ldan dgang bya ba//sngags pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor can//dpal ba ru ni rnam par
397a2(rgyud): sgom//'od zer 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od//sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom//'jig rten khams rnams rim par 'das//slar yang de la rab gzhug bya//khru yi tshad las 'das pa yi//zla ba
397a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//rang gi gzugs nyid bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so//ye shes kyi rigs rnam par rgyal ba
397a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rang gi gzugs ni bsgom bya dge/zur du rnam snang bzhag bya ste//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das
397a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//cho ga shes pas gzugs bcu drug/kha dog bzhir ni rnam bsam bya//snying kha rnams dang thams cad du//lha rnams de la bsgom par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
397a6(rgyud): ge gsung so//rang gi gzugs la bgegs 'joms par//sems la brtan par bsgom par bya//hU~M yig dbugs nas phyung nas ni//'od zer rnam par rab tu gzhug/ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
397a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so//rang gzugs la sogs mtshungs pa'i 'od//lha ru skad cig de 'gyur ro//yi ge rnams kyis tshad kyis ni//wa yig gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya//sngags pas
397b1(rgyud): dbus su yi ge nyid//byin nas las ni kun tu brtsam//sngags pasang bral ba'i steng nas ni//ji srid lte ba zhes pa dran//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po
397b2(rgyud): las rnam par dgod pa'i le'u dang po rdzogs so///shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad du ni//pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//pad+ma'i chu bde
397b3(rgyud): rnam sgom//las kyi rdo rje yang dag bskyed//rang gzugs de la bsgom par bya//las kyi rdo rje rab bsgoms pas//rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
397b4(rgyud): gsungs so//ngo ma dang zho byas nas ni//dbus su pad+ma rnam par sgom//rang gzugs sangs rgyas ltar byas nas//mkhas pas rang gzugs rnams sgom bya//na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang ste//slar
397b5(rgyud): yang de nyid sbyar bya ste//'o ma dang zho mnyam byas nas//sna tshogs kha dog mnyam pa'i 'od//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni//rang gzugs sangs rgyas
397b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa ni//cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya//rang gi gzugs dang thams cad du//lha la sogs pa rnam sgom byed//khru gang tsam las 'das par ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//bgeg
397b7(rgyud): rnams 'joms pa ltar byas nas//'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya//rang gi phyag rgya snying kha ru//bsams nas nyi ma ri dkyil 'khor dbus//sangs rgyas rnam par chag shes//'od kyi
398a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//dadabus yi ge byin nas ni//'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya//gdul ba la sogs can byas nas//slar yang de nyid la sbyar bya//khru gang tsam las 'das par no//zla ba
398a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//rdo rje ral gri yang dag bskyed//'jig rten khams ni yongs bgrod bya//pad+ma dkar po'i 'od 'bar dang //byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan//dbus su rang gi lha ye/
398a3(rgyud): gzugs//gzhogs su btsun mom dgod par bya//chog shes pas de ltar gzung //rang gi rdo rje de la gzhug/'jig rten khams ni thams cad du//sangs rgyas nyid kyis mchod par bya//zhes bcom ldan
398a4(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so//ji srid sang dgra thob sbyor skyes//sngags pas slar ni dasdu bar bya//mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom par de//rang gzugs shin tu
398a5(rgyud): brtan byas nas//lha la sogs pa rnam par sgom//snying kha sngags kyi yig byin nas//sangs rgyas kun ni mchod par bya//mtho bdun tsam las 'das par ni//dkyil 'khor bzhi ni sgom par byed//
398a6(rgyud): lha yig zugs kyi dbus gnas par//snying khar de la bsgom par bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so//rang gzugs can zhes bya bar ni//byas nas sangs rgyas rnam par sgom/
398a7(rgyud): thugs ka nyid dang thams cad du//mkhas pas rang gzugs bsgom par bya//de ru snying po'i tshul gyis ni//sems dpa'i rnal 'byor rnam par sgom//rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni//sangs
398b1(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya//gzugs kyis na mkha' 'gongs par ni//snying po rnams las yang dag bskyed//rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni//gsal ba'i dkyil
398b2(rgyud): 'khor sgom par ni//rang gi rnal 'byor legs brtan byas//sangs rgyas yang dag rnal 'byor sgom//rgyang grags tsam las 'das por ni//byang chub sems ni rnam par sgom//lha ni yang dag bskyed nas
398b3(rgyud): ni sngags kyi yi ge rnam par sgom//mtho gang tsam las 'das par ni//pad+ma'i tshul du rnam par sgom//rang lus dri ma med byas nas//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa'o//de dbus legs par brtan
398b4(rgyud): byas nas//rang gzugs deng nas dang por sgom//'od dkar 'bar ba'i phreng ba sogs//pad+ma lnga po rnam bsgom bya//de yi dbus su rang gzugs dang //gzhogasu btsun mo dgod par bya//rang gi khu ba deng
398b5(rgyud): sogs 'byung //cho ga shes pas spro bar bya//sangs rgyas gzugs kyis na mkha'i khams//kun tu gang bar sgom pa ni//rang gzugs ral gri ltar byas nas//kun gyi snying khar dgod par bya//rang gzugs
398b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas yang dag sbyor//mtshan nyid la sogs cho ga rim gyis//byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i khams//yang dag gang bar rnam bsgom bya//rang gzugs zhags pa yang dag sbyor//khyab bdag
398b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs dgod bya//ji srid na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du//tshig shes pas dgug par bya//rang gzugs sangs rgyas yang dag sbyor//byang chub sems su rnam sgom mo//sngags kyis
399a1(rgyud): yi ge sogs sbyor gyis//de yi rnam par myur bsgom bya//byang chub sems kyis yang dag bskyed//'od zer 'bar bas rnam par brgyan//rang gzugs sangs rgyas mtshungs par ni//cho ga shes pas dbyung //
399a2(rgyud): bar bya//rang gzugs de la gzugs gnas par//'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od//spyan zhes bya ba yid dga' ba//cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
399a3(rgyud): spyan ni snying khar rnam par dgod//cho ga shes pas 'od rnam par//rdo rje sems dpa' ra bo gzhug bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rang gzugs myur ba'i dkyil 'khor du
399a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//lha yi rnam par yang dag sbyor//bsgom bya brngon pa gzhan min no//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bskyed//lcags kyu'i rnam pa
