399a5(rgyud): zhags pa sogs//byas nas slob ma rab gzhug bya//rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bskyed//rang gzugs snying khar rnam dgod bya//dgod pa byas nas la sogs kyis//de nas grangs ni yang dag
399a6(rgyud): brtsam//bzlas pa sogs sam btung bya ba//blo ldan des ni de bya'o//bsgrub po rnams kyis rnam bzlas bya//gzhan du yang dag grub min nyid//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
399a7(rgyud): tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so//rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//dbus su rang gi rigs sgom mo//mthar yang dgra dang bgegs 'joms par//snying po de ru bsgom par bya//'di rnams kyi ni
399b1(rgyud): tshi ga yis//skam pa la sogs cha ga'i rim//nya ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//rig pa'i rgyal ba rnam bsgom bya//'bar ba'i brang ba 'khrugs 'bar ba'o//khro ba'i gzugs bsgom
399b2(rgyud): par bya//kha dag gang ste/khon brjod//de nyid mar shA gang nyid rjod // nyid de yis ngesam par te//gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skyon tu
399b3(rgyud): pos de skad ces gsungs so//rang gzugs dkyil 'khor byas nas ni//dbus su 'bar ba mnyam pa'i 'od//'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du//de nyid shes pas snying khar dgod//de la
399b4(rgyud): bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//de yi rang bzhin der brtsam bya//rang gzugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas par//sdang byed la sogs mnyam pa'i 'od//snying khar yi ge byas nas kyang //rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgo
399b5(rgyud): bya//rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus pa la//sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam sgom bya//rig pa'i tshul du yang dge bskyed//dngos grub thams cad kun thob 'gyur//de phyir sngags pas khyad par gyi//rig
399b6(rgyud): pa'i tshul ni mchog tu 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so//thams cad de nyid bye ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
399b7(rgyud): dbus su ni//gzugs ni rnam snang mdzad bsams nas//snying khar sngags ni rnam bsgom bya//de nyid sngags su rje su dran//rig pa'i tshul gyi cha ga las//slob dpon yid ni dga'
400a1(rgyud): chog shes pas srung ba /rtsupab rnams dang thams cadang //zla ba 'ad la la bar rnam pa'o//rang gi gzugs na yang dag bskyed//de la la grwa las gas rnaMs//chog shes pas yang
400a2(rgyud): dag bskyed//'bar ba lnga ni rnam bsgom bya//gzugs dang kha dog rnam par shes//'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis de skad ces gsung/
400a3(rgyud): so//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o///de nas bcom ldan
400a4(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa rnamasu
400a5(rgyud): rang gi gzugs su bzhag go/bsdus pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis le'u bka' rnams stsal bar mdzad//'o ma dang zhor bsams nas su//'phags pa'i dam tshig bzhi po dang //dbus su'ang
400a6(rgyud): sngags pas ut+pa la//bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsam mo//ye shes dkyil 'khor yang dge sbyor//de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya//khro ba'i rnam pa yang dag bskyed//'od zer yang dag sbyor bsgom/
400a7(rgyud): der ni 'od zer 'dus rnams su//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya//cho ga shes pas der rang gzugs//dbus su yang dag bzhag bsgom bya//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsung
400b1(rgyud): mas rba twathAg tu rnanas m+b+hasaH/\u0f85\u0f7f/gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis no//radag rnam rtog yongs 'di ga//rang gzugs rtswa la gtses brjod pa//byas nas kun tan du
400b2(rgyud): bsgos bya//chog/shes pas de rnams su 'a //rgya mig mapa'i thug rnams pasem pa//rang gzugs la sogs mtshungs pa'i 'od//sta skad cig dul 'gyur//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khar yang dge sbyong
400b3(rgyud): snying por de la rnam pasam b+ha//chog shes pas gsang sngags chog/chog mthong bas bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so//gnas lngar yang dag hU~M
400b4(rgyud): //ce me lnga ru rnam bsgom bya//sngags kyi yi gri thams cad du//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms pas//tshig shes pas sna bar bya//bcom na
400b5(rgyud): 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi gcabs skad cis gsungs so//rang gzugs sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni//sems dpa'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas
400b6(rgyud): shing rnams kun tu ni//chog shes pas spro bar bya//rang gzugs sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni//lha yi snying khar bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs de dbyung bar bya//'jig rten khams
400b7(rgyud): 'dir slobar bya//rang gzugs ye shes shes brjod pa//'bang ba'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan//byang chub sems su dbyung na//'angs rten khams su 'di s+ho //nga gi gzugs so
401a1(rgyud): brjod pa ni//'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od//rang de gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis//zhing 'dir khyab par rnam bsgom bya//rang gzugs lcags kyur bcas byas nas//rang gi gzugs kyi lag par dngod
401a2(rgyud): cho ga shes pas bkug nas kyang //sangs rgyas gzugs la rab gzhug bya//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so//rang gi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni//gas
401a3(rgyud): sngags yi ge rnam par sgom//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms pas//cho ga shes pas spro bar bya//byang chub sems su rang gzugs ni//de nyid sgom pas bsgom par bya//bgegs ni sngags la yang
401a4(rgyud): dge bskyed//'jig rten kham su'ang spro bar bya//mi sdug gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni//bgegs kyi dgra de dbyung bar bya//byang chub sem su de phyung nas//'jig rten khams 'di spro bar bya//rang gzugs nyi ma'i
401a5(rgyud): dbus gnas par//rnon po 'bar bas rnam par brgya ni//las kyi rdo rje shin tu mdzes//cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya//dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dge bskyed//shin tu brtan pa brtan pa'i sems//cho ga nye bar mthong
401a6(rgyud): ba yis//dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam//rang gzugs ud pa lar bsams nas//sna tshogs 'od zer mnyam par ldan//lha yi gzugasu yong dag sbyor//de yi steng du rnam bsgom bya//ji srid namakha'i
401a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//sngags pas 'jig rten gsum du spro//sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//yad dga' ba ni bsgom par bya//rje
401b1(rgyud): pa'i rnam pa yang dag stor//chog+sa ga tu bsgom par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gsungs pas//de ltar rnyog par baTun//rapa gzugs gas pang 'bar ba'i 'ang/A/
401b2(rgyud): k+ShikI sogs rnam brgyan pas//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//'jig rten gsum du yang spro bya//rdo rje ye shes yang dag bskyed//khro bo yang dag sbyor sgoms pas//rang gzugs 'bar ba mtshungs pa yi
401b3(rgyud): tshig shes pas spro bar bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//mkhas pas rang gi gzugs bsgom bya//rtse mo lnga yi rdo rje cho//'jig rten khamasu yang spro bya//khro bo'i gzugasu yang dag bskyed//rang gi
401b4(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ges brgyan//sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam bsgom bya//cho ga shes pas 'khor lo lha'i//'od zer tshul du rnam bsgom bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis de skad ces gsung so//rang
401b5(rgyud): gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni//'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan//rang gzugs sangs rgyas dang mtshungs pa//cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya//rang gzugs 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni//ral gri'i
401b6(rgyud): 'od zer gyis brgyan pa//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs gsal ba//kun nas rnam par 'phro ba'o//pad+ma rang snying dbus gnas par//bram ze tshangs pa rnam par brgyan//byang chub semasu yang dag bskyed//de la
401b7(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge dgod//snying por ud pa lang bsam nas//sna tshogs 'od zer rnam par brgyan//cho ga shes pas byang chub sems//bsam nas sngags gsum rnam bsgom bya//snying kha'i dbus son phra mo
402a1(rgyud): ni//aSh+NI nI la mtshungs pa'i'o//ye shes sbyor ba kun bskyed nas//sangs rgyas gzugasu bsgom par bya//rang gzugs phra mo'i dbus gnas par//sna tshogs dbar nga mnyam pa'i 'od//snying por yi ge bsams nas
402a2(rgyud): ni//rang gzugs de la bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ye shes kyis de skad ces gsungs so//khru gang tsam las 'das pa yi//phra mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//rang gzugs yi ger yang byas nas//
402a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba rnam bsgom bya//khru gang tsam laMs 'das pa ru//ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni//dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya//khru gang tsam las 'odas par ni
402a4(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//bsams nas bzlas pa tsam par bya//khru gang tsam las 'das pa ru//chos kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//bgegs dgrar yang dag bskyed
402a5(rgyud): bsams nas//bzlas pa kun tu brtsam par bya//mtho gang tsam las 'das pa ru//ye shes dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//rnam snang mdzad kyi gzugs bsams nas//'jig rten khams su 'di spro bya//mtho gang
402a6(rgyud): tsam las 'das pa ru//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//dbus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//gzhogasu sangs rgyas yang dag sgom//rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni//phra me'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa
402a7(rgyud): nimidabus su gzugs ni yang dag bskyod//'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis de skad ces gsungs so//rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom/
402b1(rgyud): /pa ni//sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//gnog su btsun mo dgod par bya//btsun mo rnams ni thams cad du//'od zer ldani rnam bsgom bya//me tog yid dgar 'di rnams
402b2(rgyud): kyis//cho ga shes pas mchod par bya//'phrog byed dri yi sprin la sogs//bsams nas sangs rgyas mchod par bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i spyan gyis de skad ces gsung so//cho ga shes pas
402b3(rgyud): btsun mo ni//ser po lta bur bsams nas ni//sangs rgyas sras po 'dus pa ni//rnal 'byor bskyed de bsgom par bya//de dbyung ji lte bar bkod la//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya//rdo rje sems dpa'/
402b4(rgyud): yang dag bskyed//rigs kyi dbye ba bsgom par bya//rgyang grags tsam las 'das par ni//ye shes phra mo rnam par sgom//rang gi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni//dbus su yang dag bzhag bsgom bya//
402b5(rgyud): cho ga shes pas rdo rje'i rtser//rnam pa lnga ru rnam sgom bya//dkar po ye shes rigs rab brjod//nag po bsdus pa'i rig su dra ni//dmar po pad+ma'i rigs zhes bya//ser po 'dod pa'i rigasu dran//mdzes pa'i/
402b6(rgyud): gzugs ni rab gsal bar//r-ig nas sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan//pad+ma rab tu rgyas byas nas//rang gi rdo rje de la gzug/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsung so//de ltar byas pas
402b7(rgyud): gang ldan pa//de ldan ye shes rnyed par dka'//rang gzugs shin tu brtan byas nas//bsam gtan brtson par rab tu gzhug//mdzes ldan mdaga' lta ba na//gzugs dang ldan par de 'gyur ro//
403a1(rgyud): btsun mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni//'thung 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med//rdo rje sems dpas zhing 'dir ni//yongasu gang bar rnam bsgom bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni brtan byas nas//rdo rjes rnam par ltung bar bya//bcom
403a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pas de skad ces gsung so//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rigs bsdus pa'i ting 'dzin gyi le'u gsum pa rdzog so//
403a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes chos kyi rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi le'u bka' stsal to//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//thams cad du ni de nyid bya//chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam sgom pa//cho ga shes pas//
403a4(rgyud): /rab tu brtsam//chos kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyi//rnam par rtog pa yongs dor bya//gsang sngags dbye ba brjod nas ni//thams cad rnal 'byor rnam bsgom bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harmA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/
403a5(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid//cho ga shes pas yang dag brjod//dngos po thams cad yang dag bskyed//dngos med bsgom bya min pa nyid//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gos de skad ces gsungs//
403a6(rgyud): blo gros ldan pas pad+ma bsam//pad+ma rA ka'i dbang mtshungs pa//dkyil 'khor de la bsam bya ba//gzugs brnyan dbus su rnam bsgom bya//rig pa'i rgyal po yang dgra bskyed//'bar ba'i phreng ba mtshungs pa'i/
403a7(rgyud): 'od//'ber bya 'dus pa de rnam su//'jig rten dbang phyug rnam bsgom bya//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsung sa//na mkha'i khams ni kun tu dgang //slar yang de nyid la bsdu
403b1(rgyud): //rang gi gzugs dang zla dbus gnas//snruchags khado mtshungs pa'i 'ong//rnying kha ru ni rnam pa sgoms nas// la gsang sngags sgom pa'o//nga gzugs dam
403b2(rgyud): dbus gnas par//sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par brgyan//'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag bskyed//'jig rten khams 'dir spro bar bya//rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag bskyed//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus
403b3(rgyud): su ni/'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms nas//gzugs kyis na mkha' 'gengs par byed//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms nas//rdo rje sems dpa' yang
403b4(rgyud): dag bskyed//'jig rten khamasu 'di spro bya//bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//ji ltar rig par
403b5(rgyud): gnas lnga ru//khyab bdag 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod//ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gis de skad ces gsung so//snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni//chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa//
403b6(rgyud): chos der yang dag bskyed nas su//'jig rten khamasu 'di spro bya//snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dri med pa//pad+ma de la rnam bsgom shing //sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam
403b7(rgyud): bsgoms nas//sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du//'jig rten dbang phyug rnam sgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos 'chang bas de skad ces bsung so//snying kha'i dbus son phra mo ni//chos kyi dkyil
404a1(rgyud): coM ba gyu /sa margyas ldan pa rnamam sa na yon pa sgom par bya//lto ba ting bus don drangan chub tu gzung gu dang bdugs pas pa sa bsnyomasams// na
404a2(rgyud): byung ba hU~M/ nam yis dis pa na/ma byung kyipa 'i ngas du na/ shes thas tshas bya bsam//rten snyoms su mchod par //com ldan sa chis yang du
404a3(rgyud): dzus po//rgyang grags tsam las 'das par na/sa kyid dkyil labar blom par de/jib rted dang sgom pa yis//rang gigazug so ma sa te//rgyang thabs rnam pas sa
404a4(rgyud): rgyal khor smom pa na//gzhogasu btsun mobs nas smra//sangs rgyas gzugs ni mchod par bya//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//rjes tha~M kyil 'khor sgom pa ni//'jig rten kha
404a5(rgyud): nanas su/ shes pas na nid pa ste/bsal pa'i ra rgyu'i gyis ni/ kyil 'khor smom paste/ dkyil lakhor mchog byas nas/ gig dgas ni dgod par /
404a6(rgyud): sdigs pas steng gi rim par ni//ji srid nom kha' 'ges pa zhes//dad+hA rA gA'i 'od mnyam pa'i/ng+gA wA ni rnam pa sgoms nas//chog shes pas du gzugs ni//dngas su yang dag/nas sgra
404a7(rgyud): ngas rgyas padrigs kun 'byung ba/sheng du rnam par bsgom par bya/sbyir na bsdum pa zhes byas nas/rnal byor rang dag brtsam par bya/nub tu chos cad byas nas mi khyang du 'a pa gyi
404b1(rgyud): 'khor la ya shes rigs nas brjod//la thachos kyi rigs pas brjod//rdo rje bsdus pa'i rigs su grags//rtse gsum 'dod pa'i rigasu bshad//rnam pa'i khams ni kun gang
404b2(rgyud): byas nas khyab bdag chos 'chang ba/lag tu ral gri yang dag bskyed//rang gzugs kyis ni gzhom par bya//'dod mchod kyis ni 'joms byas nas//chos kyi dbyings kyi cho ga rig//lag tu gdung ni yang dag
404b3(rgyud): bskyed//rang gzugs kyis ni phye mar brlag/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//ye shes rigs ni bzlog par byed//ye shes dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//bsdus pa'i rigs ni rnam ltung byed//chos kyi dkyil
404b4(rgyud): 'khor tshul gyis ni//chos kyi rigs ni nges ltung byed//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//chen po'i rigs ni nges ltung byed//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//rigs kun nges par ltung bar byed//bcom ldan 'das
404b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsung so//gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por/chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ste le'u bzhi pa rdzog so////de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
404b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi rdo rje chen po la bzhag nas ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa can de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu bcug cing brtan par byas nas/dkyil
404b7(rgyud): 'khor chen //de rnam su rang gi gzugs kyi rnam pas kun tu gnas pa dang /gzugs chen po lha chen po'i lha'i rnam par yang dag par sbyar nas/'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin 'di gsung so//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
405a1(rgyud): yom no//ma da pa ma na bya//chag shes pas rab rdzus bya/gzhan du bskus bya man pa nyid//'dod pa 'a gas kyichug sa//gsang sngags sho sa dran bya/oM//sadz+nyAnas nA ga na / myur nas/
405a2(rgyud): par brjod nas ni//rnal 'byor 'dis ni yang dag brtsam//kar ni kA ra mtshungs pa'i 'od//pad+ma chen po yang dag bskyed//de nyid dkyil 'khor byas nas ni//rang gi gzugs ni dgod par te//'dod mchod gzugs ni kun skyed/
405a3(rgyud): nas//'jig rten khamasu 'di spro bya//rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni//gzugs kyis na mkha' 'gengs par byed//sna tshogs 'bar ba rnam brgyan pa'i//tshangs pa'i gzugs ni yang dag mnan//'dod mchod gzugs ni
405a4(rgyud): kun bskyed nas//'jig rten khamasu 'di spro bya//cho ga shes pas re re bar//gzugs gsum rnam par bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsungaso//khru gang tsam las 'das par ni//'dra
405a5(rgyud): chen po rnam sgom pa//tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi srid pa 'dir//cho ga shes pas spro bar bya//khru ni brgya phrag 'das par ni//pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya//'dod mchod gzugs ni yang dag dbyung //sangs rgyas de nyid la bsgom
405a6(rgyud): bya khru ni brgyad brgya 'das par ni//pad+ma chen po rnam bsgom bya//khyab 'jug gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//sangs rgyas la sogs der bsgom bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis
405a7(rgyud): ri spro bya//chos kyi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//khyab 'jug gzugs kyis 'di spro bya//sems dpa'i gzugasu brtan byas nas//'dod mchod mtshungs pa'i gzugs rnams kyis//'jig rten khams ni/
405b1(rgyud): kun tu yang //cho ga shes pas spro bar bya//khru gang tsam las 'das par ni//tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam bsgom pa//snying khar de rnams yang dag bskyed//sangs rgyas
405b2(rgyud): gzugasu rnam bsgom bya//tshi ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs//gzugs la gzugasu rnam bsgom bya//bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces gsung so//khru gang tsam las 'das
405b3(rgyud): par ni//khyab 'jug gzugs ni rnam sgom pa//snying khar de rnams kun bskyed nas//sangs rgyas gzugasu rnam bsgom bya//sangs rgyas gzugs rnams thams cad du//'dod pa'i mchod pa mtshungs pa'i
405b4(rgyud): gzugs//sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa//cho ga shes pas dbyung bar bya//ji srid gzugasu yang dag sbyor//de srid du ni btsun mor 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i mchod pas de skad ces
405b5(rgyud): gsungs//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//gzugasu bskyed nas bsgom par bya//cho ga shes pas dang po'i sbyor//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya//na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar//mkhas
405b6(rgyud): pas byas nas/marjod pa'i rnam par gsol ba gdab//mnyam par gzhag pas de ltung bya//cho ga shes pas lha'i rnam pa//sangs rgyas 'od dang mnyam pa'i gzugs//ji ltar rigs par sngags pas sbyin//
405b7(rgyud): gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur//cho ga shes pas lha mo lha'i//rang gi gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya//gzhan du rdo rje sems dpa' rnams//dkar sogs cho ga 'byung ba yi//klog pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan gyung ba'i//
406a1(rgyud): rang gzugs nan de'i tshul gyis ni//chag shes pas lha modar//byas nas mtshon cha rnam pasgom bya//chog shes pa sa rdor pad+ma//kun d+hor chog 'byung ba yis//rigs kyi gzugs ni kun bskyed nas//rang gi khungs/
406a2(rgyud): de ni mtshad//rgyal ba chu skyes rigs kyi ste//gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur//phyag na rdo rje'i rigs brjed pa'i//lha nyid grub pa nyid mi 'gyur//dang po dang mthar thams cad du//'di ni thun mtshams bzhi
406a3(rgyud): ru bya//rgyal bachu skyes rdo rje skyes//gzhan du 'grub po nyid ma yin//ma ma'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas//'od gzer sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'ang //rang gzugs 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni//khams gsu
406a4(rgyud): bar yang spo bar bya//'dod pa'i mchod pa mtshungs pa'i gzugs//sring mo bzhir ni yang dag sbyong//gzugs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gyis ni//mnyam par gzhag pas smra bar bya//ge sar ser po dang mtshungs
406a5(rgyud): ba'i//tshangs pa'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs//byas nas de ni rab bsgom bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsungs//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid
406a6(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las 'dod pa'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga brdzag so///de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi/
406a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nga bzhag nas rang gi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por dngos grub thams cad kyi dam chog gi ye shes mchog gi leru /
406b1(rgyud): bka' stsal to//blo ldan 'dod pa thams cad la//rnam rtog bya ba min po nyid//sangs rgyas thams cad 'joms pa ni//sems dpa' smad bya min pa nyid//dga' dang spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis//
406b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad sru ma dang //gzhan du de la lha'o zhes//sems ni brtan bya min pa nyid//sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzas gang yin//skye ba med pa'i yon tan 'byung //sems ni shin tu brtan byas la//btsun /
406b3(rgyud): mo la sogs rnam par sgom//'jig rten gsum pa'i dbang phyug ma//rig mtshon mo spyan mar grags//de yang btsun mor byas nas kyang //kun tu nye bar longs spyod do//cho ga shes pas ye shes rigs//lhan
406b4(rgyud): cig 'joms par yang dag brtsam//srog chags rnams kyi dge 'joms pa//bsdu ba'i don ni rtag tu bya//chags la chags pas sbyor bya ba//chos kyi rigs la rtog tu bya//'dod mchod rigs ni mtshungs
406b5(rgyud): pa la//rtag tu brdzun yang smra bar bya//kun la rang de ltar 'di bya//gzhan du grub pa min pa nyid//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//snying khar de ni rnam bsgom bya//thams cad de bzhin kho
406b6(rgyud): nar bya//gzhan du de dag mi 'gyuraro//ye shes rigs ni rnam 'joms pas//dga' ldan rnamasu nye bar skye//chos kyi rigs ni rnam 'joms pas//bde ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur//chos kyi rigs sogs dbye
406b7(rgyud): ba yis//bsdus pa zhes ni grags par 'gyur//'dod mchod rigs ni 'joms pa yis//khams gsum pa la sogs par 'byung //gnas mad lus dang bral ba yi//lus dang ldan pas gnas par 'gyur///
407a1(rgyud): de yo gdong rdo gza rgyas par//chos rnams kun tu skye bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsung so//sems can khams kyi mthar thug par//bdag ni rdo rje/
407a2(rgyud): bur brtan//srid pa sgrol bar yang dag sbyor//sangs rgyas bka' yis dgod par bya//ye shes dge ba kun 'byung ba//sangs rgyas chos tshul 'di rnams kyis//sems dpa' bsdus pa yang dag 'byung //
407a3(rgyud): gzhan du mched bya min pa nyid//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs//ye shes chen po kun btus pas//sems la rtag tu'ang sbyar bar bya//chos bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems ni sems
407a4(rgyud): chen po//rdo ro sogs mtshan nyid min pa nyid//de bzhin du ni ye shes kun//snying po kun las btus pa 'di//pha rol phyin pa btus pa 'dir//sangs rgyas rnams kyi btsun mo brtan//de rnams sangs rgyas thob par
407a5(rgyud): 'gyur//kun spyod mtshan nyid 'di rnams kyis//sgra dri ro la sogs pa rnams//ji ltar nus par 'bul ba byed//rang gzugs sangs rgyas tshul gyis ni//de la dbus su rnam bsgom bya//'od gzer 'bar ba 'khrugs
407a6(rgyud): byas nas//snying khar de rnams rab gzhug bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas de skad ces gsung so//bsdus pa zhes rigasu brjod pa'i//grar mkhan chen po yang dag 'byung //de la ngo mtshar gsol
407a7(rgyud): btab pa//de la 'joms par byed par dgongs//phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang brjod//mi rnams rigs ni bzhi po yang //byas nas dam cig tshul gyis ni//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/
407b1(rgyud): sems ni sems can thams cad kyi//rang bzhin phul byung chen po ste//rnam rtog dam tshig la gnas pa//skye ba rnams dang dman par smra//bsod nams bsod nams kyis de'i lus//gos pa
407b2(rgyud): 'am yang na de min nyid//de ltar shes nas ci rigs par//gzhan du bsgom bya min pa nyid//pad+ma ud pa pa la sogs pa//'dam skyes yang dag byung ma skyes//sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang //
407b3(rgyud): de nyid la kun shes par bya//byang chub sems ni brtan byas nas//sangs rgyas rnams kyang yongasu bzung //rdo rje de nyid las skyes te//gzhan du 'byung ba min pa nyid//sems can gyi ni sa rnams kyis//
407b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur bar grags pa yin//de bzhin gang 'di dag pa che//ye shes lcags kyu'i tshul chen no//bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsung so//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam
407b5(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes mchog gi le'u ste drug pa rdzog so///de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
407b6(rgyud): pa de rnams thams cad nges par byung nas kyang sems dpa' chen po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs par kun tu gnas par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rdo rje
407b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dang po'i rnal 'byor dam tshig thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'du bar byed pa bskyed
408a1(rgyud): pra dang bcas pachi gsang chen bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas gzugasu yang dag bskyed//'od gzer sna tshogs mtshungs pa'i 'od//'od gzer snying po sogs tshul gyis//'khor lo dkar po dang mtshungs pa//tsan
408a2(rgyud): ka yi 'bru tshad kyis//kun nas yong su zlum po ru//sngags pa'i dpral ba'i steng du ni//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya//cho ga shes pas zla ba gcig/de yis de ltar 'di spro bya//na mkha' la
408a3(rgyud): sogs rab 'byam du//zla gnyis nang du rgyas par bya//dza ti ri me tog sogs g.yog par//dkyil 'khor de ru rnam bsgom bya//mtshan ma phul byung bcas mthong nas//mtshan nyid brjod pas mtshon par
408a4(rgyud): bya//'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas//gang du dkyil 'khor sogs tshul gyis//nas tsam du ni bsgom par bya//rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che//sna yaM ni ra ni rnam bsgom
408a5(rgyud): bya//in+d+ra nI la sogs tshul gyis//de yi kha dog rnam sgom mo//ut+pal la sogs g.yogs pa la//dkyil 'khor de la bsgom par bya//kun du de nyid bya ba ni//ye shes rigs kyi cho ga las//cho ga
408a6(rgyud): shes pas chos sems dpa'//bskyed nas bsgom par bya ba ni//na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar//byas nas 'od gzer yang dag bsdu//rgya shug tshig gu'i tshad kyis ni//pad+ma yang dag sbyar
408a7(rgyud): bsgom bya//pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs pa'i//'dab ma brgyad pa rnam bsgoms nas//ji ltar rigs par snying khar de//bsgom bya gzhan du mi bsamam//thog ma par ni rnam springs nas//sgrom
408b1(rgyud): bde yid sa dan//ma tog padz+ra sogs g.yogs par// phyog sun rnam pam d+ha//na shos pas 'dod mchod pa'o//sems dpa' 'ang ma tshungs pam pa rmA/
408b2(rgyud): 'od gzer 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa'i//rje gsum shin tu brtan byas nas//chog shes pas nas tsam du//bsams nas lte bar bsgom par bya//kar ni kAr sogs me tog che//ser po 'bar ba
408b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya//bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de skad ces gsungs so//kun tu rnal 'byor bzhi rnams su//rnam pa bzhi po rnam bsgom bya//ji srid na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du//cho ga shes
408b4(rgyud): pas spro bar bya//gang yang sngags pas zla gnyis su//thun pazhir rnam par bsgom par bya//rnam par dben dang yid ring dang //skye bo bral bar bsgom par bya//nywa dang sha sogs can bza' la/
408b5(rgyud): brtul zhugs can gyis mar gser btung //bslus pa dang yangs la 'jigs//de ltar gang 'di brtul zhugs can//cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas gzugs//dngos nyid du de lta bar byed//rang
408b6(rgyud): gzugs rnam shes bya min nyid//sgra ni nyan par byed min nyid//rnam pa gnyis su de yi sems//skye ba min zhing yang yang man//gang zhig kho nar bsgom par bya//gzhan du de dag mi 'gyur nyid//
408b7(rgyud): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor skyer la sogs//bskyed napa de la bsgom par bya//bdag po'i rnal 'byor kun bskyed nas//mnyam par gzhan pas bsgom par bya//'dras bu'i chos su skye 'gyur te//gzhan du
409a1(rgyud): spyod par 'gyur min nyid//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyisems kyi bdoskad ces gsungaso//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rnyog pa'i rgyal ba chen po pas dang pa'i ye shos kun lam
409a2(rgyud): btus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rang gi baspu'i khung bu rnams su rab tu bcug nas dam tshig thams cad
409a3(rgyud): kyiye shes 'byung ba byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//snyoms par zhugs mthug tu yang bcom ldan 'das byig no rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngashe
409a4(rgyud): gzugs bud med kyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pa kho nar ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas mngon par byung bar gyur to//de nas btsun mo de rnams thams cad kyis ye shes chen po'i rin po che de'i mchod pa
409a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi bkod pas yang dag par mchod de/na mkha'i khams thams cad kun tu bkang zhing snang bar byas nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams su gnas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
409a6(rgyud): rna.u sbyin mo sa su myi thA k+Shan sa d+he rje yang dag par spyor ba'i rnam pa yang dag pa sa sa rang gi gi drug pa na ched hU~M b+hin sa kyi pa byeng dus sbyin gyis brdzu san su na
409a7(rgyud): sa 'i cing de ba'i ma khyen poshin du la ngas pa rnams kyis snga meji sna ba'i phyag rdzo rigs thams cad ma chags sa shes de dzin nyid byen kyis rlob pa zhes bye ba'i la
409b1(rgyud): dam tshig bka' stsal to//dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni//dbus su sngags su rnam bsgom bya//snying khar dkyil 'khor byas nas ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya//bcom
409b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje bos de skad ces gsungs so//dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni//rnam snang la sogs rnam bsgom pa//de nyid kyis ni kun bskyed nas//
409b3(rgyud): de nyid mchod par byed par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//de yi mchod pa byed par
409b4(rgyud): bshad//dkyil 'khor bzhi yi tshul gyis ni//rang rigs la sogs rnam par sgom//dbus su gzugs ni brtan byas nas//de yi mchod pa byed por bshad//sna tshogs rgyun
409b5(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa yi//spyan ni yang dag bskyed nas su//gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//dmangs rigs dkar mo rnam sgom bya//kun sbyor lo sogs mtshan nyid kyis//sna tshogs
409b6(rgyud): rgyan dang yang dag ldan//ut+pal sngon po dang mtshungs pa'i//mA ma kI ni rtag pasam bya//me tog chun sogs kyis don bzhin//ji ltar rig par rnam brgyan pa//rig ma chen me dkar mor grags//
409b7(rgyud): khrag dang mtshungs par bsam par bya//yid kyi kun sbyar phun tshogs kyis//bsdus pa yis ni rnam par brgyan//sul+lan mtshungs skal bzang mo//sngags pas rtag tu bsam par bya//bcom ldan
410a1(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzung pos de skad rjes gsu so//marang gas la sogs kun sbyor gyis//yid du 'ong bde sgom bya//chang nyid yid kyis sbyor byed pa//gang de nyid ni sgom bzhin du//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus du
410a2(rgyud): rang gi sngags kyis yang dag bskyed//skrod par byed pas cho ga kun//'dir ni bskyed cing bsgom par bya//lag pas mgrin pa la sogs bzung //rkang pa de la sbyar bar bya//me tog gnyis sogs mtshan nyid kyis
410a3(rgyud): rang gi rdo rje gzhug bsam bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor//khu ba de la ltung bar bya//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsung so//na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar//byas nas de nyid
410a4(rgyud): kyis bsgom bya//me tog bzhi la sogs tshul gyis//de la mchod par byed ces dgongs//nyer spyod lnga yi mchod pa yis//mchod bdag kun sbyor las mchod bya//dri gzugs ro dang reg bya ni//thams
410a5(rgyud): cad du de nyid kyi sbyin//rdor sems rnams ni blo ldan gyi//sangs rgyas kun gyi bskyed pa dang //mnyos dang mchod par rab tu brjod//dgyes par yang ni brjod pa yin//'di yis gsang sngags grub pa
410a6(rgyud): ni//sgrub pa po rnams rnam rgyal 'gyur//gsal byed rgyas pa sgrub don du//sangs rgyas nyid sogs yang dag 'thob//gal te chos nyid mi 'gyur ba//'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do//sangs rgyas sogs kyis
410a7(rgyud): yongs bzung ba//gzhan du thob par mi 'gyuraro//sems kyi mi dge bya min nyid//smad pa'i kun spyod bya min nyid//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//chos nyid mi 'gyur kun las btus//gang gzhan btsun
410b1(rgyud): mo rnams nyid ni//'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'o//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba ni//ji ltar 'os par mchod bya ba//sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod//brtson
410b2(rgyud): 'grus su yang brtan par brjod//'di ni sngags pa mkhas pa yis//cho gas lhag par gnas par bya//rang gi sngags ni yang dag brjod//zla ba lta bur sbyar bar bya//der ni rdo rje la bsdus pas//
410b3(rgyud): slar yang sngags pas gzhug par bya//gzhog su rin chen rnam sgom pa//ze 'bru nyid la bya ba'o//de rnams kha dog bsdus pa yis//rigs kyi dbye ba rtogs par bya//rigs gsum la yang //
410b4(rgyud): thun mong du//rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan 'byung //de yi yi ge yang dag bsgying //gzhug la bsam gtan lhur len pas//las kyi dbye ba sogs rnams kyis//bya ba'i mtshan nyid de rab
410b5(rgyud): grags//ye shes rigs la ut+pal sngo//bsdus pa shes pa la yang grags//'dod mchod rigs la pad+ma dang //chos kyi rigs la'ang dgongs pa yin//cho ga shes pas lo bcu pa'i//btsun
410b6(rgyud): mo ye shes rigs la shes/bsdus pa zhes la brtag bya ba//yon tan mdangs ldan bcu gnyis lo//sngags pas rtag tu chos zhes par//bcu drug lo ma kun tu brtsam//kun tu 'dod mchod
410b7(rgyud): rigs la ni//nyi shu'i lo tsa ne bsten par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyis de skad ces gsung so//ji srid khu ba yang dag bsdus//bcu gnyis lo//
411a1(rgyud): dang ldan par bya//mdor na gang gang 'dod gyur pa//sna tshogs rgyan dang yang dag ldan//me tog chun pa sogs brgya na pa//ji ltar rigs par bya ba yin//rnam par snang mdzad sogs byas nas//de nas mchod pa
411a2(rgyud): yang dag brtsam//rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams ni//tsan+dan gur gum rab tu brjod//bde bar bzhugs shing mdzes byas pa//dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis de bya//thams cad bsdus pa de bya ba//ji ltar dbye
411a3(rgyud): ba mi shes na//gal te dbye ba de yi ni//sangs rgyas kyang ni 'grub mi 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis de skad ces gsung so//mtshan rnams kun gyis brgyan
411a4(rgyud): payis//rgyan du byas pa'i bu mo bdun//bcu drug lo yi rnam pa des//ji srid bco brgyad lo lon par//shin tu ring min thung ba man//phra min rnam par skyes pa'ang min//mtshungs med gzhon nu ma
411a5(rgyud): bsgrub bya//gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro//tshe ga shes pas de bzung la//de nyid sgrub thabs kyis bsgrub bya//'dzam+bu'i gling du dbyangs sogs kyis//mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa//bcu drug
411a6(rgyud): bsgrubs na cho ga shes//'grub 'gyur 'di ni the tsom med//khru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor ni//bris nas rtag tu bsgrub par bya//rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga yis//mkhas pas 'bum phrag lnga ru bzlas//mar ma la
411a7(rgyud): sogs tshad kyis te//gzhan du bsgrub bya min pa nyid//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu snang bas de skad ces gsung so//khru yi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//bdud
411b1(rgyud): rtsi zhes bya'i khra bo che//byin nas yang dag las rnams brtsam//cho ga shes pas de ru yang //mtshan ma bkod nas bsgrub par bya//dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa//byas nas bsgrub bya/
411b2(rgyud): gzhan du min//mtsho dang chu 'gram yid 'ong dang //ri bo dben pa rnamasu yang //cho ga shes pas bsdus pa yis//rang nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//rin chen kun gyi mchod pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa'i
411b3(rgyud): mchod pa ste//spyan ras gzigs kyi mgon po yi//mchod pa zhes ni de la bshad//thun tshod dang po las 'das par//gnyis par yang dag nyer gnas pas//rnal 'byor pa yi sgrub par sgrub//de kho nyid kyang
411b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//thun tshong phyed du yang dag 'byung //lnga yi bar ma chad rnam su'ang //phyag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pas//sgrub po rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur//rigs kyi bdag po ltar gyur nas//'jig
411b5(rgyud): rten khams ni kun tu yang //btsun mo grangs med po Ti yis//dngos grub rtogs phyir rnam par spyod//de yi bya bas sangs rgyas nyid//ri rab kyi ni rdul phran gyi//phyag na rdo rje kun 'byung ba//sems
411b6(rgyud): can rnams kyi byed pa yin//gnyisu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dam tshig thams cad kyi sgrub thabs chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs
411b7(rgyud): /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang yang dag par 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
412a1(rgyud): shegs pa rnams thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags chen po'i dam chog sgrub pa po rnams kyi seng go rnam par rol pas dam tshig gi ye shes byed par myur du bla na med/
412a2(rgyud): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol//de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin go shegs pa de/
412a3(rgyud): rnams kyi tshig nye bar gsan nas/rdo rje de rang gi snying khar bzhag ste de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyu ci'i phyir de/
412a4(rgyud): skad gsung //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gang nges par bstan nus pa ni mang ngo //yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la ye shes kyi 'od gzer yang rnam pa
412a5(rgyud): stong du rnam par zhugs par gyur to//gzhan du na ga la 'gyur zheso//de bzhin du ni de lta bu byas nas de nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tham
412a6(rgyud): cad kyi thugs ka dang spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi gzugasu gnas par byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes kyi dam tshig khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi
412a7(rgyud): dam tshig bka' stsal to//grangs med 'byung po thams cad ni//de nyid sbyor bas bsad par bya//skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid//thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//sangs rgyas bye ba yongs rdzogs pa//ye
412b1(rgyud): shes sbyor bas bsad par bya//skye ba 'dir nyid 'grub 'gyur te//rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur//pad+ma chen po tshad kyis ni//sems can phung po rnam gzhom bya//chos kyi de nyid ting 'dzin pan+da
412b2(rgyud): bcom pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//cho ga shes pas pad+ma'i tshang //'joms byed 'dren pa bsad par bya//'dod mchod de nyid bsgoms pa yis//de yi dngos grub che zhes bya//bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de/
412b3(rgyud): skad ces gsungaso//na mkha'i khams ni kun bkang bar//mtshan nyid des ni bsad par bya//de ltar yang 'dir sangs rgyas nyid//skye ba 'di nyid kho na la//rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag thob//sems can sems ni
412b4(rgyud): cho ga yis//yang dang yang du sbyang bar bya//gsod pa'i bdag nyid sogs 'byung ba//gzhan du sbyor bar mi 'gyur nyid//sems can kun gyi sems gang yin//gsal ba zhi ba 'od gsal bar//sna tshogs dngos
412b5(rgyud): pos ma gos pa//semasu brjod pa'i de nyid sgom//cho ga shes pas sangs rgyas yum//de nyid nye bar longs spyad bya//gsang sngags dge ba 'byung ba kun//gzhan du grub pa nyid mi 'gyur//de de sngags pa ma
412b6(rgyud): lus pas//mchog gi tshogs ni yang dag dbyung //rdo rje sems dpa' dge 'byung ba//gzhan du dgyes par 'gyur min nyid//nye bar longs spyod bya kun tu//nye bar longs spyod kun brtsam bya//gzhan du gal te
412b7(rgyud): bdag rmongs pas//mnar med lta bur 'tshed par 'gyur//thams cad bdag nyid bza' bar bya//chang ngam gzhan yang rang gis btung //sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par 'gyur//myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba
413a1(rgyud): nyid//sha chen rtag tu bza' bar bya//til mar yang rung rang btung bya//cho ga shes pas bshang gci'ang rung //bza' ba'i bdag nyid can gyis bza'//rma yi sgo las byung ba'ang min//sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya//
413a2(rgyud): me tog dri zhim sprin chen po//byas nas thams cad don ji bzhin//sngags pas rtag tu smad pa yis//btung ba nyid ni 'byung bar bya//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//ye shes blo yis dam tshig brjod//bcom ldan
413a3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje su snang bar byed pas de skad ces gsung so//sngags pas rtag tu dkyil 'khor ni//bshang dang gci bas so so ru//nyal bar byed pa la sogs sam//bsam pa shin tu
413a4(rgyud): sra brtan bya//bshang dang gci bas bkang ba yi//gru bzhi kun tu bskyed nas ni//rang gzugs de yi dbusu ni//sna rtser nas kyis dgang bar bya//bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni//des chags bdag po dka' ba min//
413a5(rgyud): gang gzhan gsum po bsdus pa yis//'dir gzhan so sor gnas de min//cho ga shes pas phyi 'dir ni//bya de gzhan rnams dang sbyar bya//ye shes 'khor los bskul ba yis//dngos grub yangs pa der 'gro 'gyur///
413a6(rgyud): rang ngam gal te gzhan yang rung //de nyid sbyor bar mi byed do//ji srid na mkha' kun 'byung ba//sangs rgyas nyid ni thob mi byed//nga ni mnar med nga 'jigs rung //nga ni sdug bsngal du bde ba//zhe sdang nga la
413a7(rgyud): de bzhin rmongs//nga ni 'dod chags so sor gnas//zhes so//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes khong du chud
413b1(rgyud): par byed pa zhes bya ba'i mchog tugs can gyi'i dbu ma rdzogs so///denas bcom ldan 'das byanan rdzu m+WA yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
413b2(rgyud): thob pa'i 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gis rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad kyi bcud kyi ngam ming chen po dka' stsal pa/dgra bcom la bya d+h+ya sbyin tong//dge slong yang rung phyug rgya man//sangs rgyas rnam
413b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid//rdzob pa phyab skye phyag byan//rang gzug su ni rang gzugs kyi//ngas mas nas de nyid cho galas//snying khar rdo rje sogs byas nas//yang dag mtshong byed de sbyar bya//gal to sems
413b4(rgyud): dngadanga'ang rung //kha cig phyis 'di las 'gongs na//rang gi byang chub sems smras pa//mgo bo chel pa bdun du 'gas//b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas//gsang sngags yang nas yang du bzlas rdo rje sems
413b5(rgyud): dpa' yang dag bskyed//rang gzugs la ni bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas slob dpon de nyid 'di//rtag tu srung ba'i khyad par lus//gzhan du slob dpon rnams kyis ni//sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob mi 'gyur//
413b6(rgyud): rang gi gzugasu rnam bsgoms nas//de nyid las ni phra mo'i gzugs//byang chub sems ni yang dge bskyed//slob po na sangs rgyas su bsgo mi bya//sgrub po rnams kyi ye shes 'di//de nyid du ma
413b7(rgyud): tshig byung ba'i//dam tshig la sun spyor ba 'dis//sangs rgyas kyi yang 'bru mo 'gyung// kyi po'i bya ches/nga gi skye ga tsun mi ma bya//de ma rdo yang sa sbyi/nga/
414a1(rgyud): sa tsun /myu smras pa na san/ mas ga pa so//na du ma bas // nga /na su na
414a2(rgyud): srungs so//rang gi gzugs nI yang dgu bskyed//rlung gzugs la sogs mtshan nyid kyis//snying khar bdud rtsir brjod pa ni//de yi sngags ni yang dag brtsame//'di yang ngem tshig ye shes te//kun
414a3(rgyud): tu drim bsal ba nyid//'dod pa'i dngos grub brtan pa ni//brtul zhugs brtson pas bsrung bar bya//sangs rgyas thams cad rnam bsgoms nas//bsgrub bya'i rnam par bsam par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' yang
414a4(rgyud): dge skyed//snying po de la bsgom par bya//chog shes pas 'di rtag tu//dus gsum du ni bsgom par bya//gal te gzhan du bzlas byas sam//sgri ba na de nyid ma yin nyid//rig ma gzugs dang gzugs
414a5(rgyud): sogs can//'bar ba'i phreng bas brgyan byed pa'i//sems dpa' rin chen yang dag bskyed//de yi lag tu 'ang rnam bsgom bya//bsdus pa yos ni sgom bzhin du//ji srid dngas grub rab mthong
414a6(rgyud): byed//gzhan du gral te bdab rmongs ngam//de yi sbyin pa der mi 'gyur//shin tu rnam bkra shin dri med//ye shes rin chen cod pan du//bzhag nas sgrub pa yi ni mchog/sastengs lhan cig
414a7(rgyud): /rgyu bar byed//rdor sems bdag nyid dngos grub //rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs//rtag tu rdo rje ye shes chos//go 'phang du ni bsgral bar bgyi//ye shes rdo rje dngos grub //bdung
414b1(rgyud): rtsi zhes sogs byin gyis brlabs//namakha' mchog tu phra ba yi//bzang po du ni rnam dpyod byed//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chang chen pos de skad ces gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
414b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi gsang sngags yongasu dag pa'i de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
414b3(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig bka' stsal to//rdo rje sems dpa' skye sgom pa//thugs kyi rdo rje zhes rab brjod//sems la de ni bsgoms nas ni//ye shes rdo rje rab gzhug bya//rdo rje rang bzhin dag pa'i don//
414b4(rgyud): gsung ba'i rdo rjer yongasu brtag/dag pa'i ye shes rnam bsgoms pas//sku gsung dag par rnam bsgom bya//rdo rje'i byin rlob shin tu gsal//mi phyed rdo rje'i sku nyid do//sangs rgyas sku yi rang
414b5(rgyud): bzhin nyid//cho ga shes pas byin gyis brlab//rdo rje 'di yis byin brlabs pa//'di yis byang chub thob par byed//cho ga shes pas zla drug gis//sangs rgyas nyid 'drir thob par gyis//chags pa
414b6(rgyud): chos kyis ma gos pa'i//rdo rje de rnams thams cad 'byung //de ltar de nyid cho ga byas nas//dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa yin//de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
414b7(rgyud): shes kyi kun tu spyod pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to//mi slu ba yi tshul gyis ni//rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung bas//de kun nye bar longs spyod pa//sangs rgyas kun spyod nyid du 'gyur//nam kha'i/
415a1(rgyud): nikun gang ba'o//sangs rgyas rnams ni gal te bcom//skye ba 'dir nyid spangs rgyas nyid//rdo rje slob dpon bsdus pa'o//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su no//rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//mkha
415a2(rgyud): khams sangs rgyas gzugs kyis ni//yongasu gang bar rnam bsgom bya//sgying kharang sngags ni yang dag bskyed//mnyam par gzhag pas bskul bar bya//kun tu dgyes pa'i dam tshig gang //rdo rje slob dpon rtag
415a3(rgyud): bsgom bya//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//rang gi sngags ni yang dgage bskyed//mkha' khams gzugs kyis yang dag bkang //snying khar thams cad rnam bsgom bya//de nyid de ni byed bzhin
415a4(rgyud): pas//sangs rgyas bka' nyid go 'phang gnas//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bor//rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed//chog shes pas gzugs rnam par//gnas lnga rnams su bsgom par
415a5(rgyud): bya//byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed//de kun bskul bya brtul zhugs can//chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed//cod pan du de rnam bsgoms nas//mchod par bya zhing
415a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas slob dpo no bde ldan gang //de nyid rnal 'byor ba'i bde de//kun tu skrag pa kun spangs pa'o//sngags pa seng ge bzhin du spyod//skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid//skad cig de la nges
415a7(rgyud): sbyor byed//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsung so//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu'o//
415b1(rgyud): das na ga shegs parnams da sgrubs kyi pa de panan ga shegs pa mams da ga da pa dang /saldan
415b2(rgyud): rnal yang dag pa chod de 'dzin rnams rnams te//de ma thu mas cad byed pasam gtan//bsam gtan pa la lakhor ma chog gyur pa//dkyil la chen po macig gyung ga/ rkyed kyi
415b3(rgyud): sngon du shid dgas //denas sa ga me zhin ga shegs pa rnams cad kyi la 'dabs par byed pa rtsigags rnaM /de shAn shugs pa ma
415b4(rgyud): byin kyis rnaM 'i zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mchig thams cad kyi dngos sgrib kyi ye shes kun tu spyod pa'i phyir dkyil lam chen pa 'di ston par mdzad de//de nas yang dag
415b5(rgyud): ba shang bya'o//dkyil 'a khor chen po ma pa ste//rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste//sangs rgyas byang chub ba gas pa byed//'amadong go bas ma bya zhing //d+ma thams nye bar mdzes//sna tshogs meto/
415b6(rgyud): rkun pas gang //rab tu ba bas bsgom par bya//migs can pa nga zung bzhi pa //ma sems ba tu rtag par // m+bun du byung//de la dang su bskum bad//na rba nga
415b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas slob dpon chog gnas//chog shes pas grwa rnamasu//rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgom bya//ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas lnga ru//zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor brtag/dkyil 'khor rnams ni skem byed pa//lag
416a1(rgyud): pa gcig tu yang dag bskyed//ji ltar rigs pas shar gyi ni//mi bskyod yongs su brtag par bya//cho ga shes pas lho yi ni//deng ni rin chen dgod par bya//nub kyi dpag med ces brjod pa//byang du don yod
416a2(rgyud): grub pa'o//cho ga shes pas ser po'i mdog/de nyid sgom pas bsgom par bya//dbus su khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad//sangs rgyas bskyed nas bsgom par bya//slob ma'i rnam par thams cad du//cheg shes
416a3(rgyud): pas rnam bsgom bya//rig ma chen mo spyan la sogs//grwa rnams nyid du rnam bsgom bya//chog shes pas bdud rtsi zhes//sgo rnams kun tu bsgom par bya//de rnams kha dog bsdus pa yis//sa so so
416a4(rgyud): sor rtog par bya//de rnams kun gyi gzugs rnams su//rdo rje sems dpar rnam bsgom bya//'od gzer lnga po yang dag bskyed//'dod yon lnga rnams bsdus pa yis//khyab bdag la ni dbul bar bya//
416a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga las//mkha' khams sangs rgyas kun gyis ni//yongasu gang bar rnam bsgom bya//de ni khu ba thams cad kyis//mchod pa sgom par grags pa yin//dam tshig thams
416a6(rgyud): cad kyi dngas grub ces bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje slar yang gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi
416a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsungs pa//blo ldan sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis//de bzhin nyid du thams cad bya//phra mo'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//thams cad der ni rnam bsgom bya//shor gyi chos rnams kun gyi mchog
416b1(rgyud): rdo d+hi sems dpa' dgod par bya//sngags pas g+ho ru brtag pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya//nub tu ma shes rdzogs byang chub//sangs rgyas slob dpon dgod par bya//byang du thams
416b2(rgyud): cad kun skrag pa//rdo rje sems dpa'ad god par bya//dbus su khams gsum pa mnyam pa//rdo rje gzugs su rnam bsgom bya//dkar po'i mdog tu rnam bsgoms nas//nag po'i dbus su bsgom par
416b3(rgyud): bya//btsun mo rnams ni kha phye nas//de nyid la ni rdo rje gzhug/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang phyug ma//gnas bzhi rnams su 'bad pas so//ji ltar rig par mdog kun dang //sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam
416b4(rgyud): bsgom bya//cho ga shes pas thams cad du//khro bo'i mchog gi rnam par bsam//sngags pas 'dod yon lnga rnams kyis//sngags kyi mchod pa yang dag brtsam//mkha' khams rdo rje sems dpas
416b5(rgyud): ni//yongs su gang bar bsgom par bya//rdo rje kun gyi khu sogs kyis//mchod pa ru ni rnam bsam bya//gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so//
416b6(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/'dod chags chen po'i chos zhes
416b7(rgyud): bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa/chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//thams cad dor ni rnam pasam bya//chog shes pas shar gyi ni//phyogs chos 'chang bar dgod par bya//
417a1(rgyud): lho ru ye shes chos ni dang //sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom//nub tu pad+ma longs spyod pa//byang du chos kyi dbyings las skyes//ji ltar rigs par bsgoms byas nas//dbus su chos kyi dbang
417a2(rgyud): phyug dgod//dkar po'i mdog tu rnam bsgoms nas//dbus su dmar po rnam pa sgom//cho gas chos kyi dbang phyug ma//grwa bzhi ru ni bsgom par bya//khro bo chen po rta zhes pa//sgo rnams nyid du rnam
417a3(rgyud): bsam bya//chos kyi rnal 'byor thams cad la//'dod yon lnga yis mchod par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//gzhogasu rnar bsgom par bya//khu ba nyid kyis na mkha'i khams//rin chen
417a4(rgyud): gang bar rnam bsam bya//ji ltar rigs par chos kyi sku//de nyid sbyor bas mchod par bya//'dod chags kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan chen po'i gsang chen rdzogs so///
417a5(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/'dod chags thams cad kyi tshul zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor
417a6(rgyud): chen po 'di gsungaso//sku yi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//thams cad der ni rnam bsam bya//shar du dgra rnams nges 'joms pa sna tshogs mdog tu rnam bsam bya//lho ru me tog yang dag sbyor//
417a7(rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyis bsgom par bya//nub tu ye shes yang dag dag/zhi ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsam bya//byang du rnam rgyal zhes bya yang //brtson pa'i bsam pas bsgom par bya//dbusu 'dod mchod yang dag
417b1(rgyud): sbyor//rang gi gzugs kyi sgom pa las//tshogs 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mar//bsam bya sems dpa'i bdag nyid can//cho ga shes pas pad+ma'i phyag/bla rnams nyid du rnam bsam bya//'dod
417b2(rgyud): yon kun gyis mchod pa la//mchod par byas nas mchod par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' de phyung nas//gzhogs su rnam par bsam par bya//khu ba 'dod mchod tshul gyis ni//bskyed nas khyab bdag mchod par
417b3(rgyud): bya//'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis brtag bya//mchod pa la sogs yongasu gzung //'dod chags thams cad kyi dam tshig bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so////'di nyid kyi ni
417b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//sangs rgyas slob dpon rtag tu bya//thams cad du yang dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje'i slob dpon gyis bsgoms nas//'dod pa'i skyob dpon ji gsungs pas//bya'o dkyil 'khor gzhan du min//
417b5(rgyud): denas phyag na rdo rjes slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi snying po kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
417b6(rgyud): gtsug tor thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//zho ru byas pa bsams nas ni//pad+ma mdzes pa sogs brgyan pa//shel de yi ni dbus su ni//
417b7(rgyud): thams cad tu ni rnam bsam bya//logs bzhi pa la grwa bzhi pa//sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam par ni//de la dbus su bsgom par bya//sngags pa cho ga shes pas dbus//
418a1(rgyud): lakhar los baspyar ba dgod par bya//chog shes pas rnam snang mdzad//shar nyid du ni rnam sgom b+ha//chog shes ngas byang du ni//gyen 'phags skyes bya rnam bsgom bya//g+ho ru dpag med zhes byan/
418a2(rgyud): bsam pa brten pas bsgom par bya//ji ltar rigs par nub tu ni//gzi brjid phung po rnam bsgom bya//btsun mo'i rnam pa mtshungs pa yi//chos kyi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//mtshan ma rdo rje
418a3(rgyud): sogs mtshan nyid//cho ga yis ni de rnams sbyin//rig ma chen mo sman la sogs//grwa rnams kun tu bsam par bya//gtan gyis mi thub khro bo che//sgo dang skor ni rnam bsgom bya//rdo rje sems
418a4(rgyud): dpa' yang dag dbyung //de kho nyid gang sbyar bar bya//ye shes sbyor bas thams cad la//'dod yon lnga yis mchod par bya//khu ba de la yang dag bskyed//mchod par byed pa bskyed par bshad//
418a5(rgyud): mkha' khams gtsug tor thams cad kyis//yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya//gtsug tor gyi snying po kun tu bskul bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so///de nas phyag na rdo rjes slar
418a6(rgyud): yang 'dod pa'i khams thams cad mnyam par 'jug pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rigs thams cad kyi thun mang gi seng ge rnam par rol pa
418a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs pa//cho ga shes pas sna tshogs mdog/'o ma dang zhor rnam bsgom bya//rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin dbus//ri bo de la bsgom par bya/
418b1(rgyud): logs bzhi pa la glu bzhi pa//sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/pad+ma ut+pal kun tu bkram//gzugs rnams su ni rnam par bsnam//rin chen kun gyi gdan dang ni//rtag tu
418b2(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid//sangs rgyas slob dpon khyad par gyis//bsam gtan brtson pas sbyar bar bya//sngags pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can//de yi dbus su bsgom par bya//mthe chung maze las
418b3(rgyud): 'das pa las//sor bzhi'i ngos dang bla rnamasu//ngos rnams su ni rtag tu bya//bdud rtsi zhes ni bsgom par bya//'bar ba'i phreng ba la sogs gang //mi sdug mche gtsigs 'jigs par byed//
418b4(rgyud): sngags pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor can//gnas lnga rnams rnam bsgom bya//dbus su rdo rje ral gri ni//shin tu rnam mdzes shin tu mdzes//'od gzer 'bar bas 'khrugs shing 'bar//pad+ma rAg
418b5(rgyud): dbang po mtshungs//'od dkar 'bar ba'i phreng ba gsal//kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes//ral pa'i cod pan kun rdzogs pa//sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan gyur pa//sangs rgyas slob dpon cho ga yis//shar
418b6(rgyud): phyogasu ni rnam bsgom bya//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskyed//sna tshogs rin chen rnam rgyan pa//'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs shing 'bar//ut+pal sngon po dang mtshungs pa//lho ru rtag tu slob dpon
418b7(rgyud): kyigyis//bsgom bya gzhan du mi sgom mo//chos kyi rdo rje yang dag bskyed//pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od//me tog chun po dmar pos gang //nub phyogasu ni bsgom par bya//'od gzer 'bar bas rnam brgyan
419a1(rgyud): pa'o//'dod pa'i rdo rje yang dag bskyed//gser dag gi ni ye shes rdzogs//byang du yang ni bsgom par bya//grwa ru lha mo ri dbang phyug/ji lta'i gnas su gnas bsam bya//bud med mtshan nyid yongs rdzog pa//ma
419a2(rgyud): kyigyis brgyan gyur pa//chags dang chags bral skad cig ma//sngags pas yid 'ong bsgom par bya//sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rig ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma//g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis mnan pa yi//
419a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum 'jigs 'phrog pa mo//de rnams thams cad rang gzugs su//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya//sangs rgyas slob dpon de rtag tu//'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyis//'bul bar
419a4(rgyud): byed pa rtag tu bya//de ltas dgyes 'gyur gzhan tu min//rang gi khu ba yang dag bskyed//mchod pa bskyed par bshad pa yin//gzugs brnyan des ni na mkha'i dbyings//yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom
419a5(rgyud): bya//dpag bsam ljon shing rin chen che//yid bzhin nor bu shin tu mdzes//rigs kyi dbye ba shes pa yis//de rnams kha dog rnam bsgom bya//ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs des ni//dbang bskur
419a6(rgyud): bo ni gzung bar bya//cho ga shes pas de yi tshe//bya ba bum pa bsam par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs sogs thams cad kyis//mchod bzhin par ni rnam par bsam//yang dag sbyor ba'i
419a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'dis//shin tu dbang bskur mnyam pa can//skye ba 'dir nyid sangs rgyas nyid//thob ste 'dir ni the tshom med//rang sngags khro bo mtshungs pa yi//phan pa'i sbyin pa sbyin par
419b1(rgyud): /byed//de ni dus yun mo ring bas//dngos grub skye ba lta bur thong //blo ldan sangs rgyas slong dpon gyi//rtog tu de yi dmachog ni//gang kho na yi rags 'byung ba/'bad //
419b2(rgyud): pa yis ni 'di ltar 'os//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen por bsam gtan chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///de nas bcom ldan
419b3(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang na mkha'i khams thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas yang dag par bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid
419b4(rgyud): bskyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na nod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/sngags 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa brgya stong
419b5(rgyud): phrag g.yos shing rab tu g.yos so//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang kun tu snang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs
419b6(rgyud): so//oM saM gra ha dz+nyA nod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/de kho na nyid snying po chen po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/de nas gang na mkha'i khams thams cad 'od gzer 'bar ba chen pos kun tu snang zhing yang dag par mthong bar gyur to//
419b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang rang bzhin dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so//oM d+harmA dz+nyA nod b+ha bA ya swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis
420a1(rgyud): /da gsus mthag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthang thug par yo shes kyi rjes su 'thun pas kun tu snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sgrar yang rang bzhin gyis dpal ldan 'byung ba
420a2(rgyud): dag par 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di gsungs so//oM kA ma dz+nyA nod b+hA b+hA ya swA hA/de bzhin nyid du kun shes phyir//de nyid du ni sbyar byang
420a3(rgyud): bya//rang gi gzugs kyis bzhag nas ni//de kun de la bsgom par bya//bskyed pa la sogs kun 'byung ba//rang gi sngags nyid kyis ni bya//mang po phan tshun yang dag sbyor//phyag rgya der ni rna mo bsgom
420a4(rgyud): bya//blo ldan ye shes rigs la ni//sor mo'i rnam pa sbyor bar bshad//rdo rje'i rnam pa kun sbyar nas//rin chen rnam pas sbyar bar bya//pad+ma'i rnam pas kun sbyar nas//'di ni chos kyi rigs
420a5(rgyud): su brjod//rtse gsum rnam pa'i dbye ba yis//de nyid du ni bcing bar bya//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyis de skad ces gsungs so//bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba
420a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po bskyed par byed pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig
420a7(rgyud): 'byung ba rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/dmachi ga chen po'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khar chen po 'di gsungs so//
420b1(rgyud): /de nas yang dag rab bshad bya//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa 'di//rdo rje ye shes lta bu ste//dngos grub chen po zhes bshad do//sar pa legs par bkal ba yi//tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa/
420b2(rgyud): yis//thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis//dkyil 'khor la ni thig bdab bo//grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rna babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang //thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan//
420b3(rgyud): bla yi cha rnams thams cad dang //sgo khyud kyi ni 'tshams rnamasu//rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par//phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo//rtag tu bsdus pa'i cho ga yis//rim pa gsum ni bya ba yin//cho ga shes
420b4(rgyud): pas shar du ni//ye shes zhes ni dgod par bya//lhor ni 'bad pas bsdus pa zhes//brjod pa rtag tu bya ba'o//cho ga yis ni byang phyogs//chos kyi rigs ni rtag tu bya//sngags pas 'dod pa kun rigs la//
420b5(rgyud): gsum pa ru yang mnyam par bri//shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar dang //rig ma chen mo spyan dang ni//mdzod pu yang ni nye bar ro//rdo rje 'chang gi lho ru ni//bdud rtsi zhes
420b6(rgyud): dang stobs po che//rdo rje khu tshur mA ma kI//nye ba nyid du bzhag par bya//bcom ldan 'das kyi byang du ni//pad+ma 'chang bzhi pa bskyed//khro gnyer rim par ldan pa dang //rig ma chen mo dkar zhes dang //khro gnyer can ma'ang
420b7(rgyud): mnyam par bri//cho ga shes pas de dbus su//rig ma mi thub can ma bri//phyag rgya thams cad nyid du ni//rtse mo lnga pa rnam bsgom bya//dkyil 'khor gsum pa slob dpon gyis//ya tI ts+tsha ya sa sU traM//bri bar bya//
421a1(rgyud): sgornams thams cad nyid du ni//rdo rje lcags sgrog la sogs dri//ji ltar rigs par phyogs kun tu//'jig rten skyong ba dgod par bya//shar phyogs dbang po lha rgyal dang //'dod pa spyod pa'i lha rnams dang //gnas gtsang ma/
421a2(rgyud): yang dgod par bya//me phyogs kun tu me yi lha//drang srong chen po lnga mngon shes//lho phyogs yi dgas rnams kyis bdag/gshin rje dang ni ma mo bdun//bden bral phyogs su yi dgas kyi//dbang po dang ni 'byung po
421a3(rgyud): kun//nub kyi phyogs su klu yi bdag/chu lha dang ni klu rnams kun//rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha dang //rigs pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang //byang gi phyogs gnod sbyin bdag/lus ngan dang ni gnod sbyin kun//dbang ldan
421a4(rgyud): phyogs su dbang phyug ni//'byung po kun gyi bdag po dang //ji skad gsungs pa cho ga yis//bum pa dgod dang gdan sogs bya//lha rnams kun gyi rgyal po ni//der ni dgod par bya ba yin//mkhas pas me tog dri sogs
421a5(rgyud): kyis//mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas ni//mnyes pa'i rigs pas mnyes par bya//de ltar dgyes 'gyur gzhan du min//'dir ni sngon mthar de rnams kyi//nya dang chang sogs rab sbyin bya//cho ga shes pas gsang ba'i mchod/
421a6(rgyud): bzhi rnams su brtag par bya//khu ba de ni bzung byas nas//thams cad du ni dngul bar bya//rig ma'i tshul gyi cho ga yis//de ni yang yang dgyes par bya//mkhas pas dgo' ba'i rnam pa yis//thog mar gtor ma sbyin
421a7(rgyud): bar bya//chog shes pas 'phrog ma yi//gnyis pa du ni yang dag bzung //sngags pas khyad par gsum pa ru//sangs rgyas rnams kyi sbyin par bya//de nyid brjod pa de yis ni//gang gsungs sbyin bsreg las rnams
421b1(rgyud): bya//de tshe slob ma dbang bskur ba'o//las rnams so sor bsgrub par bya//de gzhan bsam pas bum pa ru//rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor gyis//lhag ma'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar//de
421b2(rgyud): nyid rigs par yang dag bskyed//rtag tu sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis//de yi tshul ni smra bar bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig gang //lam gsum la mi na 'jug byed pa//dbang bskur chen po de yi ni//ni
421b3(rgyud): mkha' ji srid yang dag 'byung //khyad par du yang 'dir smras pa//bdag gi yang 'di yang dag 'byung //yid bzhin rin chen nor bsten nas//de nyid 'byung bas 'dir dbang bskur//gzhan yang
421b4(rgyud): gal te sems can gang //mthong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nyon//skye ba bdun gyi nang du sa//thob cing phyag 'os mchog tu 'gyur//sangs rgyas slob dpon gang nyid du//ye shes rgya mtsho gnas par
421b5(rgyud): 'gyur//thub chen de nyid shes pa gang //rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod par byed//sangs rgyas slob dpon ji gsungs pa//de yi rang gi slob ma de'i//dam tshig lnga po byin nas ni//rab tu 'bad pas slu
421b6(rgyud): bar bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig che//dkyil 'khor de nyid shes dkyil 'khor//sgrub po rnams kyis ci 'dra der//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur blang //dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogaso//
421b7(rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad na mkha'i khams tham du spro ba'i rdo rje byin gyis
422a1(rgyud): rlob pa nas bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de//bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de rnam pa'i khams thams cad du sems kyis gang bar byasapa
422a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la rab tu stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
422a3(rgyud): kyi dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog ces bya ba rig ma'i tshul la sogs pa'i las can gsungs pa//gru ni sum cu'i khyon tsam du//kun nas yongs su zlum por ni//in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//'od gzer 'bar
422a4(rgyud): ba de phyung nas//nam mkha' ru ni 'di bya ba//bsam gtan sbyor bas bsam par bya//'jam+bu'i gling ni thams cad du//'o ma dang zhos kun tu 'khrugs//shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad gyes ni//pad+mas g.yogs
422a5(rgyud): pa rnam bsgom bya//khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed//drag tu rgod pa chen po sogs//rtag tu de yi dkyil 'khor gyi//de yi gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//khro chen khro gnyer rim par ldan//'bar ba'i
422a6(rgyud): phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od//ji ltar rigs par kun bskyed nas//sgom par byed pa de der bshad//khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngo//'jig rten gsum 'jig 'phrog byed pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su//
422a7(rgyud): 'joms pa po ni rab tu gnas//ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis//na mkha'i khams ni kun tu gang //yi ge'i gzugs ni kun bskyed nas//bdag nyid snying khar rnam posam bya//snying khA'i
422b1(rgyud): ni de rnams su//lha yi rnam par sgom par byed//slar ni sngags pas bsdu bar bya//de nyid la ni gzhugs par bya//cho ga shes pas bskal pa'i mer//bsams nas bsam gtan yA/
422b2(rgyud): ngag brtsam//zla 'od lta bur 'bar ba ni//btsun mo rtag tu bsgom par bya//lha nyid yang dag bskyed nas ni//de yi dbus su rnam bsgom bya//rang gzugs snying khar bsams nas ni//de yi dbus su
422b3(rgyud): rnam bsgom bya//rang gzugs snying khar bsams nas ni//ha yig tu ni rnam bsgom bya//'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyis//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed//'di ni dang po'i bsam gtan
422b4(rgyud): brjod//rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya//rtag tu rigs kyi bdag po yis//bskal par bsregs par rnam bsgoms nas//sngags pas de yi rnam pa de//bsamo gtan brtson pas bsgom par bya//
422b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs kyis rab sbyor gyis//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni//rang gi gzugs kyis kun bskyed nas//ba spu'i khung bu 'di spro bya//ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs gsum gyis//na mkha'i
422b6(rgyud): khams ni kun tu bkang //'od gzer lnga yi rab sbyor gyis//rang lus su ni rab gzhug bya//rig ma'i rgyal mo sogs sbyor bas//de rnaMs thaMd yongs brtag bya//sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' khams ni//
422b7(rgyud): yongs su gang bar rnam bsgom bya//rang lus su ni rnam bsgom nas//thams cad der ni rab gzhug bya//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rig ma'i tshul la
423a1(rgyud): sogs pa'i las can gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang chen rig ma'i tshul gyis las gsung/
423a2(rgyud): ba/na mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par//dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa//dpag tshad kyi ni grangs kyi khyon//kun nis yongs su zlum por ni//gsal ba gsal bar mtshungs bsams nas//dbus su
423a3(rgyud): bdag nyid rnam bsams bya//'bad pas gnas lnga rnams su ni//rnam snang mdzad tshan gzugs/bsams nas//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//de rnams thams cad yongs brtag bya//snying khar
423a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ni//yang dag bskyed nas rnam bsgom bya//cho ga shes pas nyi rnam par//na mkha'i khams ni gang bar byed//lha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis//slar yang de ni rab gzhug pa//de nyid tshul
423a5(rgyud): ni dge ba 'di//rigs kyi dbye bas rtogs par bya//gzhan du gsang ba'i bsam gtan ni//rnam par spangs pas 'grub mi 'gyur//gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por
423a6(rgyud): rig ma'i las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi tshul bzlas pa'i cho ga ston par mdzad do//nam mkhar 'bru ni
423a7(rgyud): ston par ram//gang du sems ni rab dgyes byed//dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni//rang gi dkyil 'khor mched bsgom bya//me tog bzang po de dbus su//de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya//
423b1(rgyud): gzugs phyag rgya chen po ni//bsgom bya gzhan du brtson mi bya//snying kha'i dbus son phran ni//dri med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni//gsal ba 'od dkar 'bar la sogs//chu yi rnam par
423b2(rgyud): dgod par bya//de la sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig/dang po gsang ba rnam bsgom bya//rtse mo lnga pa rnams bsgoms nas//slang yang nga nyid la sbyar bya//blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar//gzugs brnyan yang ni yang
423b3(rgyud): dag bskyed//de nyid yi ge'i tshul 'thun pas//bsam gtan 'byung ba bsgom par bya//cho ga shes pas yig rnams kyi//phreng ba bskyed nas bsgom par bya//nas kyi tshad 'di thams cad du//bsam gtan
423b4(rgyud): 'byung po bsgom par bya//rab tu 'bad pas 'og der ni//rtag tu nam mkha' gang bar bya//de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//gang ba de la grags pa yin//yi ge gcig gi gsang sngags kyi//rang gzugs/
423b5(rgyud): rnam par bsgom par bya//rigs kyi bdag po 'byung ba ni//yi ge gsum gyis rtag shes bya//yi ge lnga la sogs gzung bas//ji srid yi ge 'byung ba'o//'od dkar 'bar ba'i phreng ba sogs//'bar ba'i phreng /
423b6(rgyud): ba mnyam pa'i 'od//rigs kyi dbye bas las rnams kyi//thog ma tha ma 'di bya'o//ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab rnam par//in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od//'od gzer 'bar 'khrugs gtso bo'i yum//yid kyi bsaM
423b7(rgyud): pas 'grub par 'gyur//pad+ma rA ga dbang mdog 'od//dam po 'bar ba mtshungs pa'i 'od//'jig rten khams ni kun nas su//tshig shes pas snang bar bya//gi sar ser po dang mtshungs pa//ser po 'od gzer/
424a1(rgyud): 'bang la sogs//sgom pa'i ga 'phang gis bsgom b+ha// tsam med par bsgrub par bya//de nyid 'byung ba gang gsungs pa//rang gzugs yang dag bskyed nas ni//snying khar me tog bsams nas ni//dkyil
424a2(rgyud): 'khor de la bsgom par bya//cho ga shes pas de'i steng du//snying po phyag rgya rnam bsgom bya//ji lta'i go 'phang kun bskyed nas//ye shes de nyid rnam bsgom bya//b+ha gar a yig nges phyung nas//sangs rgyas
424a3(rgyud): mchod pa la sogs bya//'jig rten khams ni kun nas su//cho ga shes pas spro bar bya//thog ma padang tha mar ni//slar yang bsdu bar bsam par bya//zla 'od lta bur yang dag sbyor//rang lus su yang bsgom
424a4(rgyud): par bya//'di ni de nyid tshul dge ba//rigs gsum du yang rtog par bya//bya dang byed pa yang dag sbyor//sgom pa de ni 'grub par byed//sems kyi kun sbyor mtshan nyid kyi//gal te chags la chags par 'gyur/
424a5(rgyud): bsam gtan 'dus la rab zhugs nas//de la gzhug par bsgom par bya//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa po//sgrub po rnams kyi de nyid 'di//dngos grub sgrub la dam tshig
424a6(rgyud): mchog/sangs rgyas gzugs rje bsgoms nas//ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin bzhin pa//sangs rgyas slob dpon yang dag bskyed//snying khar de ni dad da par bya//drag sngags mchog gi phyag rgya ni//bsams nA/
424a7(rgyud): deyi snying khar dgod//'thung dang za ba'i dus rnams su//nye bar longs spyod byed rnams su'ang //dri dang gzugs sogs bya ba rnams//'di ni de kho na nyid brjod//lha sbyor sangs rgyas slob dpon gyi//rang gi/
424b1(rgyud): bde ba rtag tu ni//chog shes pas dbul bar bya//gzhan du 'grub par mi byed nyid//'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed//ye shes rnams ni
424b2(rgyud): kun gyi gsang //sngags kyi dngos grub byed de nyid//rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi//'chi ba de bzhin 'phrog par byed//de bzhin rang gzugs bsams la sogs//bsten dang yon rnams kun dang
424b3(rgyud): ldan//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas ye shes rab sgrub pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pas//rdo rje ye shes sprul pa'o//gnas bzhi rnams kyi kun sbyor gyis//lha yi sbyor ba
424b4(rgyud): mtshungs pa la//cho ga shes pas gzung bar bya//rig pa 'dzin par do brjod bya//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//de nyid bya ba dri med bzang //de yi sngags kyi sku 'byed pa//bsdus pa yis ni bsgom
424b5(rgyud): par bya//thun bzhir bsam gtan 'di nyid ni//de nyid dam tshig gar mkhan no//thams cad du ni rigs dbye ba//bsdus pa yis ni bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//'khor lo
424b6(rgyud): de yis rnam bsgom bya//rang lag tu ni yang dag bskyed//ji srid srog de btang mi bya//rdor sems la sogs sgom byed pa//bsdus pa yis ni rigs gsum du 'am//rdo rje sems dpa' byin brlabs pas//
424b7(rgyud): skab pos rtag tu bsgrub par bya//'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o//sngags rnams kun gyis mnyes pa dang //dngos grub dam tshig ston pa po//de nas bcom ldan
425a1(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad 'byung ba du ldanas
425a2(rgyud): bya'i dkyil 'khor 'di ston par mdzad do//dam tshig dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa//gang de thams cad nyid bya ste//shar du rang gi phyag rgya yis//me bskyod pa ni dgod par bya//lho ru de la cho ga les//rin chen
425a3(rgyud): 'byung ldan bri bar bya//cho ga shes pas nub tu ni//'od dpag med ni mnyam par bri//cho ga shes pas byang phyogs//don yod grub par mnyam par bri//dbus su rtag tu bsdus pa yis//sangs rgyas slob dpon
425a4(rgyud): kun du bri//rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje che//'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam brgyan pa//rnam kun sangs rgyas slob dpon gyis//rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya//phyag rgya rnams ni thams cad du//ut+pal sngon po mtshungs pa'i
425a5(rgyud): 'od//rtse mo bcu gcig chen po yi//rdo rje'i rnam pa kun tu bri//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//phyag rgya thams cad kun tu bri//mkhas pas phyag rgya chen po ni//'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bshad do//
425a6(rgyud): snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnamasu//pad+ma dang ni ut+pal bri//rin chen bzhi yi kha dog tu//de rnams dbus su mnyam par bri//'dod pas lha rnams thams cad kyi//lha gzhan de ni yang dgage 'byung //sgo ru bdud rtsi/
425a7(rgyud): 'byung ba dang //'thun pa du ni mnyam par bri//dkar po nag po de bzhin dmar//ser po ljang ku nyid dang ni//rtag tu bsam gtan gdan la gnas//de la dgod par bya ba yin//cho ga shes pas de re re/
425b1(rgyud): 'joms byed bdag nyid can gyis gzhom//de la rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod//sgo bzhi ru ni rab tu brtsam//slob mas ma dang chung ma mchog/sring mo dang ni bu mo bri//cho ga shes pas
425b2(rgyud): longs spyod bya//dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni//rgyal byed rgyal ba'i rigs de la//phyag rgya dgod par rab tu grags//dzaM rdo rje chen po'i rigs mchog la//dzaHyig rnam par rtag tu bya//dzaHphyag na
425b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs byung la//AHyig dag ni rtag tu bya//AH'dod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga las//ji ltar rigs pa'i aHyig go/AHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
425b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa dang nye ba'i sgrub pa ston par mdzad do//nya chang bza' ba'i gsang mchod sogs//mngon dgyes gyur nas gang du sems///
425b5(rgyud): sems can mi ldan gnas par byed//de la dam tshig chen po yi//rnal 'byor brtsam par bya ba ste//de yi sangs rgyas sogs dngos grub//zla ba gcig gis de mthar phyin//ye shes 'khor lo bskul ba
425b6(rgyud): yis//de tshe de bzhin 'grub par 'gyur//thog mar zla ba gsum du ni//dang po'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya//phyag na rdo rje'i rigs 'byung la//'dir ni sngags chen bsgrub par bya//de nas bcom ldan
425b7(rgyud): 'das ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis dngos grub kyi dam tshig rin po che 'chang bar byed pa gsungs pa//rnam par snang mdzad zhes gzugs su//de ru bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//rang sngags
426a1(rgyud): /nas spyod na//mkhar ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rnam par ma pa gang/ na bdag nyid yang dag bstod//rang sngags/na nas brjod na//ma ze'i rnags pa 'dzin par 'gyur// ts+tshi nam
426a2(rgyud): par snang mdzad ces//der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//rang sngags pad+ma zhes brjod na//pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad ces//der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//rang sngags tri shA
426a3(rgyud): laM zhes brjod//rtse gsum rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rnam par snang mdzad ces bshad par//der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//rang sngags badz+ra zhes brjod na//rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rang sngags
426a4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad ces//de ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//rang sngags aM ku shaM byas na//lcags kyu zhes par mngon brjod 'gyur//rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad ces//der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//
426a5(rgyud): rang sngags pA shaM zhes brjod na//zhags pa'i rigs po 'dzin par 'gyur//phyag rgya che sogs mtshan nyid kyis//rang gi gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//de nyid yid bzhin nor bu mchog/rigs gzhan dbye bas
426a6(rgyud): rtogs par bya//'di ni dam tshig sgrub thabs te//sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya//skye ba 'dir ni grub par 'gyur//rang sngags dril bu'i tshul gyis ni//rang nyid bdag po rang nyid du//khru gang tsam du yang
426a7(rgyud): dag bskyed//sangs rgyas kyis kyang mthong mi 'gyur//cho ga shes pas bzhi rnams kyi 'ong //de nyid sbyor bas be sgom par bya//gzugs ni dbus su rnam bsgoms nas//myur du 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/
426b1(rgyud): gzugs su sbyong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis//der ni bdag nyid yang dag bskyed//rang sngags ut+pal ma byas nas//ye shes rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs rnam bsgoms nas//na/
426b2(rgyud): bekhe'i steng du yang dag parnam//snying khar rdo rje yang dag bskyed//ye shes rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//rdo rje rin chen rnam bsgom bya//ji srid dag pa'i bdag nyid
426b3(rgyud): 'dod//de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugasu yang dag bskyed//rdo rje pad+ma lag par dgod//pad+ma'i spyan ni bsgom par bya//sa bdun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgom
426b4(rgyud): nas//'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od//sangs rgyas gzugs ni kun bskyed nas//sangs rgyas rig pa 'dzin por 'gyur//rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas//sangs rgyas lnga ru nam bsgom bya//'od
426b5(rgyud): gzer lnga yis kun bkang nas//sangs rgyas sku dang mtshungs par 'gyur//rgyas pa'i nyi gzugs rnam bsgoms nas//las kyi rdo rje snying khar dgod//rang gi sngags ni yang dag bskyed//rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam
426b6(rgyud): par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//badz+ro&haM zhes bsgom par bya//snying khar rtse mo lnga pa 'am//rdo rje'i sku dang mnyam par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugasu rab bsgoms nas//rdo rje
426b7(rgyud): 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa//rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gzugs//sems dpa'i gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs su yang dag bskyed//'khor lo 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa//rang /
427a1(rgyud): gri gzugs ni sangs rgyas gzugs//sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//pad+ma 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa//rang gi gzugs ni chos kyi gzugs//chos kyi gan+daH//
427a2(rgyud): ni 'dzin par 'gyur//zla ba'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//dkar po 'bar bas rnam brgyan pa//'dod pa'i mchod pa rang gi gzugs//'dod mchod gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur//dang por yi ge gcis
427a3(rgyud): pa sogs//rig pa'i rgyal po skyabs po che//rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yis//rang gi phyag rgya sogs bsgoms pas//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ru//mchog tu phra ba'i bdag can bya//de nyid dam tshig
427a4(rgyud): dbus su ni//rdo rje'i gzugs ni sgom pa'o//nyi ma'i gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas//mu dro&haM zhes sgom pa ni//snying khar sngags yig byas nas ni//bskyed de 'dir ni the tshom med//sngags pas nyi ma'i
427a5(rgyud): /dkyil 'khor can//bsams nas dbus su gzugs bsgom bya//rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bskyed//bsam gtan 'byung bas bskyed par 'gyur//nye sgrub che ge byas nas ni//dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya//
