427a6(rgyud): /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga las//de yis 'jig rten gsum sgrub 'gyur//dang por rang gnas ri gnas su/zla ba drug tu bzlas byas nas//sgrub pa po yis rtag tu bsgrub//rdo rje sems dpa'i lhag par gnas//
427a7(rgyud): lce klu mo lha'i bu mo//mi mo 'am yang na lha min me//ji ltar rig par bkug nas ni//gsang ba'i mchod pa yang dag brtsam//rnam par dben dang yid 'ong dang //nigs dang dgan pa rnams su yang //de ru bkug
427b1(rgyud): nas nyer longs spyod//'dod yon lnga yi mchog rnams kyis//ye shes rdo rje rab bskul bas//dam tshig mnyan par bya ba yin//rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang //chog shes pas dgug par bya//
427b2(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya de rnams gzugs//rang gi brjod pa de rnams sngags//de nyid phyag rgya bcings nas ni//rang gis sngags 'di bzlas par bya//mtshan mo phyed du ji ltar bya//nyi ma'i gung la'ang de bzhin brjod//
427b3(rgyud): lcags kyu'i snying po de nyid kyis//de rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya//bskal pa bsreg pa ltar bsams nas//rdo rje mtshungs pas//snying pos lcags kyu sbyar byas nas//bkug la dbang du bya ba yin//khro bo chen
427b4(rgyud): po gshin rje gshed//de bzhin du ni rta 'grin dang //rdo rje'i dbyug dang bcom ldan 'das//'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por brjod//khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba//khro gnyer can yang gang zhig 'gyur//khro bo chen po stobs
427b5(rgyud): po che//khams gsum pa yang dbang du byed//bdud rtsi zhes bya'i khro bo che//stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po//rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa//sangs rgyas kyang ni skrod par byed//rig ma chen mo dri sogs ni//
427b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i phyag rdor stobs kyis ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang //khamus gsum pa yang 'bebs par byed//pho nya chen mo rdor sen mo//rab gtum la sogs rdo rje can//nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba
427b7(rgyud): yi//dug ni skad cig las 'joms byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dam tshig thams cad rnam par skrod par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//rdo rje gshin
428a1(rgyud): /mAng byud ces bya /rdorje'i sngags 'do gsus so//nam pa d+hAn ya//sa ma yas twAn//dkar/dusaR+tha/sa ma N+Do b+h+yaHb+h+yaSh+Tasar+b+ba k+Sha tang ta/sar+b+ba nA yak+Sharban nA ka d+ho bad+han+da k+Sha/ma pa kro/
428a2(rgyud): tsib tsa/sarba duSh+To/mahA ga Na be taM/dzI bait+tAr+b+ha ka ra/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/sa~Mrba gra hU~M/ShaTamra kha Sha rA D+ga dza/Shar+Na Nar Ne/ru mA na ya~M/bon+tu mAn yai/prah+ma d+h+waM sarba de bA nA na ya/mA~M bi lan+t+ra m+me bi lam+ba/la tshul hu/

428a5(rgyud): snga mdzad chen po ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje sgyu mar brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di ston par mdzad do//oM badz+ra khur bi kr-i tA na nu hUM pa//de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam
428a6(rgyud): li//bcom ldan 'das 'chang de nyid ni//de bzhin gshegs kun kun skrag pa'i//ched du brjod 'di med brjod mdzad//e ma'o sngags rnams thams cad kyi//rnam kun de nyid sbyin pa'o//'joms byed /
428b1(rgyud): rgyul mtshan gyis//sangs rgyas thams cad bzhag par grub/ nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mo dzang chen po rnamakha'i khamam thams cad kun tu snang bar byed pa'i dza rje zhes byu
428b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//sngags chen po 'di ston par mdzad do//oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha nang he pa tsa bi d+h+wa~M sa ya Ar+g+haMSh+Ta kro d+ha hU~M phaT/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la bcom ldan 'das rjen
428b3(rgyud): 'chang de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i 'ang gzer gyis kun tu bkang nas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod par mdzad do//

428b5(rgyud): cad kyi ngo ba nyid kyi tshu la gsal bangar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ras migs pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so//namaHsa man+ta bad+d+han+tu.atsa la kAn tsi ta mo ta ya ma

429a1(rgyud): dz+wa la yaN+DaH/yam tan ma/swA/de nas sangag gzug ga/drang 'angs sungs bcom la//bcom ldan 'das gzugs sna tshogapa 'chang chen po cing thams cad yang dag bskyed nas dpan na ga shegs

429b1(rgyud): /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byasarnam pa gang yin pa chad du brjod pa 'ang ca du brjod par mdzad do//sum du snganas
429b2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi ni//rdo rje'i dbye ba blan med//de nyid dmachog kun tu dag/rdo rje yid bzhin nor bur bshad//de nas bcom ldan 'das slang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi byed pa'i ngo bo nyid cing

429b4(rgyud): gr-iSh+Ta/ha na ne/gardza gordza/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+tho TA ya/da~M la dz+wa la/pra dz+wA la pra dz+wA la/gr-i sa grA sa/sarba bak+Shi bi nA yi k+She/bid+d+had+ha re ke wI kA la dz+wA li ta hu ta ba ha shir ma hU~M/b+hai ra bi nin+tiSh+Tha san+ni

430a1(rgyud): nurang //dam chogarnanas cad yang dag 'byung // khyod mi byud kun pa smram pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'as rnam par dag pa dun nas bla nga'i nga 'dzin la snyams pang jugs nas/ /
430a2(rgyud): 'di gsus so//oM aM h+ye ti b+ha ga ba ti mad+hA dz+ra gan+d+ha dI tra yA nAM/t+tAn+te/sar+b+he na/AHr+N+Na swA/ba la dab/mahe shar/gar+b+ba NAM/bits+tsha/k+Sham+WAr/brAh+maNAM//n+di/s+yA diH/ya maM/Shadra//ku l-i ra/
430a3(rgyud): rASh+TaM/bau d+han+takaM/bi rUp+natAM/shat+su k+ShA/gokaSh+Ta/s+thA lA m+b+ha d+h+r-i gI riH/nA wA//bain+na ya kaM/bAny+tsi//la haka/ShaSh+TI b+hI/ko Ta gi d+h+we/auk+ShI /dunAk+ShaN+ya NI/k+Sha t+sA sayaN+Di/mad+hAk+Shat+tA ma/ma
430a4(rgyud): tsAmr-i Sh+Ta/ d+h+waM/b+hai rA NI/ko bi r-I/ya~M ts+tshan+ya/ma ma yen/tiSh+Than+ti tAn+ta bat+ta yi b+h+ra moM shA g+h+ra~M br-i gr-id+d+ha/hu~M lu hu y+YA/tsu lu tsu lu/mu lu mu lu/d+hu ma d+hA mA/rad+ha rAng+ga/b+h+re ya p+pu ya/A bi sha a bi shaM b+hag pa
430a5(rgyud): badz+ra gAn+d+ha ra~M sid+d+hi shwa t+yA/badz+ra pA Ni rAdz+nyA pa ya ti/hrIHha haH hoHhahU~MHphaT swA hA/'do gsungs btsa la/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis bskong bar byur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
430a6(rgyud): kyi rig ma de sgrogs par byed pa 'di tshad du brjod pas ched du brjod par mdzad do//e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni//kun gzhi 'bebs par byed pa bdag/rdo rje rtse can gang 'od dran//sangs rgyas la sogs 'bebs par
430b1(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang zhiba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge chims snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje sen mo zhes bya ba'i pho nya chen mo 'di gsungs so//oM e h+ye hi badz+ren khing rdza
430b2(rgyud): bi/hA na ha na/patsa pa tsa/rang+ga rAng+ga/alpa al+la/A pi sha a bi sha/ha ya grI bA pa ya ti swA hA/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam la ji srid du dug chen po de rnams thams cad de rab tu bsgoms pas btsam
430b3(rgyud): pa bzhin du gyur to//de nas rig ma re de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rab tu btung nas ched du brjod pa 'di cheng du brjod pa mdzad do//e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni//dug rnams thams cad sel
430b4(rgyud): ba bdag/pho nya'i mchog dang de brten nas//sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sbyangs//de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

430b7(rgyud): pa'i rgya mtshor bdag gnas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang chas kyi dbyings su spro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rdo rje ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba'i rig ma'i rgyal
431a1(rgyud): po mchog 'di gsungs so//na maHsarba ta thA ga ta te b+h+yaHsarba bad+hi ga Ne b+h+yaHoM o he hi b+ha ga wa ti/yak+Shi trI ye/mA pe Ti i Ti paTe dze sa ru su ra pra ma tha ni/e ka dza TI ni rak+ta sa hi de bi ma bi he dza ya ni/ri bi ti ri kA/
431a2(rgyud): ti/ta pI ri/ka pA la ts+tsha dra/pri ye ma hA ka pA li ba le/ma hA tsa pa li/sid d+he sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya/sarba satwa big+h+na pra sha ma ni swA hA/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'chang ba de nyid na mkha'i
431a3(rgyud): khams thams cad rnam par spros nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan du gnas nas ched du brjod nas ched du brjod par mdzad do//e ma'o sngags rnams kun gyi ni//sngags kyi bdag nyid can

431b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rigs kyi yum 'di gsungaso//oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha/

431b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas nyon mongs pa za ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so//oM kla shA sha ni bi dza ye swA hA/de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
432a1(rgyud): nas chos kyil khor lo'i gtsug to shing gsungs so//a ts+tshi kya/ha na d+ha na/nga had ha/dAb+h+r-i tsakra h+Na/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting
432a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzi brjid kyi phung po 'di gsungs so//oM dz+wA la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+h+r-ika/da ra da ra/bI da ra bi dA ra/ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/b+hin+ta b+hin+da/hUM hUM phaT swAhA/de nas bcom ldan 'das slar yang rnam par
432a3(rgyud): /rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'di gsungs so//oM dzaM yoSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la/ban d+ha ban d+ha/da ma da ma/hUM hUM hUM/ha na ha na hUM phaT/de nas bcom ldan
432a4(rgyud): 'das dkar po 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/gtsug tor gdugs dkar po 'di gsungs so//oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
432a5(rgyud): cad 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rig ma chen mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so//oM tA re twAt+tA re t+tA re swAt+ma/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nges par
432a6(rgyud): sgrogs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus nas khro bo gzigs ma'i sngags chen po 'di gsungs so//oM ka na drA ni hU~M phaT/'jig rten gsum 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags shin tu
432a7(rgyud): ma rungs pa'i las te ji srid du gdon gzhan 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgoms pas/las rnam pa gsum byed do//mi g.yo zhes bya'i khro bo che//gshin rje mthar byed gsum
432b1(rgyud): 'byung ba//kun nas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su//khams gsum pa yang nges 'joms byed//khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang //khro pa ter rim par ldan gyur bang //rdo rje sems dpo'i rong //
432b2(rgyud): nyi kyang //khro bo 'di yis 'joms par byed//stobs chen bdud rtsi zhes grags dag/me shes 'jig cing 'phrog byed pa//na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa yang //the tshom med par 'joms par
432b3(rgyud): bye//'bum du bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis//kun tu son par byed pa yin//blo ldan sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'ang //'gugs par byed par the tshom med//khro gnyer tse ka Ta rig ma//'jigs pa
432b4(rgyud): yang ni 'jigs par byed//lho min chen po sogs sbyor bas//g.yul du rgyal bar byed pa yin//khro bo gzigs ma'i mchog rtser skyes//sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya//khro bo'i sems
432b5(rgyud): kyikyis sbyar byas na//ngos par sangs rgyas kyang 'jig byed//lag par de ni yang dag bskyod//mi s+sa der san bsams pa yi//pha rol dpung ni rings par byed//brgya byin gyi yang the tshom med//gzhi
432b6(rgyud): phung po bzlas nas ni//'bum phrag gsum du legs bskor nas//brgya byin sde yang nges par byed//'ga' zhig min par 'joms par bstan//sgrol ma sgrol len yang dag 'byung //'bar ba'i
432b7(rgyud): ye shes dge 'byung ba//'og gi sbyor ba bsgom pa yi//rdo rje'i sde yang tshangs par byed//de yi snying po'i mchog skyes gang //rigs dang rigs dbang rig par byed//de dang yang ni 'di nyid du//
